/study/scriptures/dc-testament/introduct.title: Mbueienyi
text: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi yi yɛ nyikyerɛ a ofir Nyame na nkenyan dawurbɔ a wɔdze maa dɛ wɔnhwɛ do mfa nkyekyer Nyankopɔn n’ahenman no wɔ asaase do wɔ nda a odzi ekyir yi mu. Ɔwɔ mu dɛ no mu afã no dodowara wɔkãa kyerɛɛ Jesus Christ N’Asɔr a ɔwɔ hɔ ma Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo no mu mba dze, naaso no mu nsɛm, kɔkɔbɔ na afotu nyina yɛ mfaso dze ma adasamba nyinara na nsɛm a ɔwɔ mu no yɛ nsa a wɔroto dze afrɛ nyimpa a wɔwɔ mbea nyina dɛ wontsie Ewuradze Jesus Christ ne ndze a ɔrekasa kyerɛ hɔn wɔ aber yi mu wɔ hɔn yieyɛ nye hɔn nkwagye a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem ho.

Nyikyerɛ a ɔwɔ nwoma yi mu no mu dodowara wɔdze duaa Joseph Smith Kakraba, a ɔyɛ Nkɔnhyɛnyi na President a odzi kan wɔ Jesus Christ N’Asɔr a ɔwɔ hɔ ma Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo no mu. Binom so wɔ hɔ a Asɔr ne President a Odzi Kan na N’apamfo a wodzii n’ekyir bɔhwɛɛ Asɔr no do no na wɔkyerɛwee (hwɛ nsɛm a wɔakyerɛw wɔ N&A 135, 136 na 138 etsifi no nye Tum Dawurbɔ 1 na 2 no).

Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi yi yɛ Asɔr no no nwoma etsitsir a wɔagye ato mu no mu kor a ɔkã Bible, Mormon Nwoma na Bota a Ɔsom Bo Mapa no ho. Mbom Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi no yɛ soronko osiandɛ ɔnnyɛ tsetseberdo kyerɛwsɛm bi a wɔakyerɛ ase, na mbom ɔyɛ nkyirmba aber do nsɛm a Nyankopɔn dze duaa No nkɔnhyɛfo a, ɔsaan mu yii hɔn no do dze mae wɔ N’edwuma krɔnkrɔn ne nsanananmu na wɔmfa nkyekyer Nyankopɔn n’ahenman no wɔ asaase do wɔ nda yi mu. Obi tse Ewuradze Jesus Christ, Ne ndze bɔkɔɔ na ɔyɛ ndam dɛ ɔrekasa fofor wɔ ne mberano ne mãhyɛ no mu wɔ nyikyerɛ no mu; na dwumadzi a ɔwɔ mu no yɛ Ne Mbae a Otsĩa Ebien no ho nsiesie, dze hyɛ, nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn nyina hɔn nyɛe nye hɔn nsɛm a wɔkãe fi wiadze ahyɛse no mã na ɔmmbɔ ebira.

Wɔwoo Joseph Smith Kakraba wɔ Mumu 23, 1805 wɔ Sharon, a ɔwɔ Windsor County, a ɔwɔ Vermont mu. Osuar no, ɔnye n’ebusuafo fii hɔ kɔr ndɛ Manchester, wɔ New York anee. Aber a ɔtse hɔ no, wɔ Fefɛwber, 1820 mu no, na oedzi mfe duanan no, nna onyaa n’enyido-adzehu sũahu a odzi kan, no mu na Nyankopɔn, Onnyiewiei Egya no, na Ne Ba Jesus Christ Hɔn ankasa bɛseraa no. Wɔsee no wɔ enyido-adzehu yi mu dɛ Jesus Christ no nokwar Asɔr no a wɔkyekyeer no wɔ Ahyɛmu Fofor aber do no a wɔdze asɛmpa ne mãhyɛ dzii dwuma no, nnyi asaase do bio. Onyaa nyikyerɛ binom so ekyir a ofir sor no, no mu na abɔfo pii kyerɛkyerɛɛ no; wɔdaa no edzi kyerɛɛ no dɛ Nyame wɔ dwuma soronko bi ma no dɛ odzi wɔ asaase do, na dɛ wɔnam no do dze nkenyan bɛma Jesus Christ N’Asɔr bɛsan aba asaase do.

Ekyir no wɔmaa Joseph Smith mboa nwanwa ma otumii kyerɛɛ Mormon Nwoma no ase na wotsintsimii dze puee guado. Aber yi mu no John Onumanyi no hyɛɛ ɔno na Oliver Cowdery Aaron Asɔfodzi no wɔ Esusow Aketseaba, 1829 (hwɛ N&A 13), annkyɛr, na tsetseberdo Asomafo Peter, James na John so dze Melchizedek Asɔfodzi no bɛhyɛɛ hɔn (hwɛ N&A 27:12). Asɔfohyɛ bi so dzii do a no mu no, Moses, Elijah, Elias nye tsetseberdo nkɔnhyɛfo pii dze asɔfodzi ne nsaafee no maa hɔn (hwɛ N&A 110; 128:18, 21). Nokwar, asɔfohyɛ yinom yɛ tum krɔnkrɔn a wɔdze maa nyimpa wɔ asaase do ne nsananan mu. Ebɔbira 6, 1830 mu na Nkɔnhyɛnyi Joseph Smith nam nkyerɛkyerɛ a ofi sor do kyekyeer Asɔr no, dɛm na Jesus Christ no nokwar Asɔr no sanee baa asaase do bio dɛ asɔrkuw wɔ adasa mu, a ɔwɔ tumdzi dɛ ɔkyerɛkyerɛ asɛmpa no na wɔdze yɛ nkwagye ho ayɛdze (Hwɛ N&A 20 na Bota a Ɔsom Bo Mapã, Joseph Smith—Abakɔsɛm 1.)

Nyikyerɛ krɔnkrɔn yi wonyae no wɔ mpaabɔ ho mbuae, wɔ ahokyer ber mu, na ɔbaa dɛ abrabɔ mu nsɛm a ɔfa nyimpa ankasa ne gyinabew ho. Nkɔnhyɛnyi no nye ne mfɛfo no hwehwɛɛ kwankyerɛ a ofir Nyame, na nyikyerɛ yinom kyerɛ dɛ hɔn nsa kãe. Wɔ nyikyerɛ no mu no, yetum hu Jesus Christ n’asɛmpa a ɔasan dze aba na mbrɛ osiansian na ɔrema mberano ne mãhyɛ no abɔbɔ adze. Asɔr no n’anee nkɔree, fi New York na Pennsylvania kɔr Ohio, kɔr Missouri, kɔr Illinois, na ewiei koraa no wɔdze kɔr Great Basin wɔ America anee nye Ahotseweefo no hɔn aperdzi kɛse a wodzii dɛ wɔbɛkyekyer Zion wɔ asaase do wɔ nkyirmba aber yi mu no so da edzi pefee wɔ nyikyerɛ yinom mu.

Nwoma yi n’afã a odzi kan no dodowara no mu nsɛm fa Mormon Nwoma no ne nkyerɛase nye mbrɛ wosii dze puee guado ho (hwɛ afã 3, 5, 10, 17, na 19 mu). Ekyir afã binom so kyerɛ dɛ Nkɔnhyɛnyi Joseph Smith dze nkenyan kyerɛɛ Bible no ase, dɛm mber yi mu na ɔmaa nsa kãa nkyerɛkyerɛ afã etsitsir pii no (hwɛ mfatoho bi fi, afã 37, 45, 73, 76, 77, 86, 91 na 132, nsɛm a ɔwɔ no mu biara dzi mu wɔ Bible ne nkyerɛase kɔ do).

Wɔ nyikyerɛ no mu no, wɔda asɛmpa no ne nkyerɛkyerɛ edzi na wɔkyerɛkyerɛ ne fapem ndzɛmba ase tse dɛ Nyametsir, nyimpa ahyɛse, dɛ Satan wɔ hɔ ampa, abrabɔ ne tsirmpɔw, siantsir a setsie hia, siantsir a nnuho hia, Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no dwumadzi no, ayɛdze na dwumadzi a wɔdze kɔ nkwagye mu, mbrɛ ndaamba wiadze bɛyɛ, mbrɛ nyimpa ne gyinabew bɛyɛ wɔ Owusoɛr na Atsɛmbu ekyir, awar ne mbersantsen nkitahodzi, na mbrɛ onnyiewiei ebusua no su tse. Dɛmara, so na nkakrankakra wosansan Asɔr no ne dzibewdzifo dwumadzi ne su, dza ɔfa mbrɛ wosi frɛ bishopfo, Asɔr ne President a Odzi Kan na n’Apamfo, Abaguafo Duebien Kuw, nye Eduosuonfo nye mbrɛ wosi tsew banodzifo dzibewdzifo nye quorumfo ekuwekuw binom. Dza obua ekyir nye dase a wɔgye wɔ Jesus Christ ho—dɛ Ɔyɛ Nyame, N’ahentum, N’emudzi, Ne dɔ na Ne tum a Ɔdze pon nkwa—dɛm ndzɛmba yi ma nwoma yi som bo kɛse ma adasa ebusua nyina, na “ɔsom bo dɛ Wiadze nyina mu ahonyadze ma Asɔr no” (hwɛ N&A 70 etsifi).

Ahyɛse no Joseph Smith n’akyerɛwfo na wɔkyerɛɛw nyikyerɛ no, na Asɔrmba no dze enyigye nye hɔnho kyɛɛ dza wɔdze nsa akyerɛw no. Ama woeenya nkyerɛwee a otsim yie no, annkyɛr na akyerɛwfo no hwɛɛ nyikyerɛ yinom do kyerɛwee guu nwoma nkyerɛwee mbukuu mu a, Asɔr banodzifo dze yɛɛ nsiesie a wɔdze betsintsim nyikyerɛ yinom. Joseph nye abɔasefo Ahotseweefo no hun nyikyerɛ yinom dɛ mbrɛ wohun Asɔr no, dɛ ahom wɔ mu, dɛ dza ɔrokɔ do resesã dze renya mpontu na ogye nsiesiei na nyikyerɛ bi kã ho. Wohun so dɛ mfomdo a wɔannhyɛda annyɛ etum aba mu ɔnam dɛ wɔhwɛ do kyerɛw nye ahoboa a wɔreyɛ dze etsintsim no. Dɛm ntsi Asɔr ehyiadzi banodzifo bisaa Joseph Smith wɔ afe 1831 mu dɛ ɔntsentsen mfomdo anaa mfom biara a obodua Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no do ehu no.

Wɔahwehwɛ nyikyerɛ no mu na wɔatsentsen no ewie no, Asɔrmba a wɔwɔ Missouri hyɛɛ ase dɛ woritsintim nwoma bi a ne dzin dze A Book of Commandments for the Government of the Church of Christ, (Mbrasɛm Nwoma a Wɔdze Bobu Christ N’asɔr), a nna Nkɔnhyɛnyi no n’asɔpɔkan nyikyerɛ no mu dodowara wɔ mu. Mbom dɛm mbɔdzembɔ yi a odzi kan a wɔyɛɛ dɛ wɔdze nyikyerɛ no bopue guado no baa ewiei ber a dɔm bi tuii hyɛɛ Ahotseweefo no do na wɔsɛɛ tsintsimfir ɔfese no wɔ Jackson County wɔ Ayɛwoho 20, afe 1833 mu.

Wɔtsee dɛ wɔasɛɛ Missouri tsintsimfir ɔfese no, Joseph Smith nye Asɔr banodzifo binom hyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔreyɛ ahoboa dze nyikyerɛ no epue guado wɔ Kirtland, Ohio. Ama bio wɔaatsen mfomdo, akyerɛkyerɛ nsɛmfua no mu, na wonyim dɛ Asɔr no enya mpuntu wɔ nkyerɛkyerɛ na nhyehyɛɛ mu no, Joseph Smith hwɛɛ do ma wɔhyehyɛɛ nyikyerɛ no mu bi ne nsɛnfua no yie dze ayɛ ahoboa ma wɔdze epue guado wɔ afe 1835 mu dɛ Doctrine and Covenants of the Church of the Latter Day Saints (Asɔr a ɔwɔ hɔ ma Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo ne Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi) Joseph Smith maa Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi nwoma kor so ho kwan, a wɔdze puee guado abosom krakra ara ekyir a wokuum Nkɔnhyɛnyi no wɔ ne gyedzi ho wɔ afe 1844 mu.

Nyikyerɛ yinom no soom Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo abɔasefo no bo na wɔhwɛɛ no dɛ nsɛm a ofi Nyame hɔ reba hɔn hɔ. Ɔdze rokɔ afe 1831 n’ewiei ber bi mu no, elderfo dodow ara a wɔwɔ Asɔr no mu no gyee dase awɔse mu dɛ Ewuradze agye dase akyerɛ hɔn akra dɛ, nyikyerɛ yinom yɛ nokwar. Dasegye yi wɔdze puee guado wɔ afe 1835 Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi no mu dɛ Asomafo Duebien no hɔn dasegye a wɔdze hɔn nsa akyerɛw.
Adasefo no hɔn dasegye wɔ Ewuradze ne Mbrasɛm Nwoma no ho, mbrasɛm no a ɔdze duaa Joseph Smith Kakraba, do dze maa N’asɔr no, ɔno nye nyia Asɔrtɔw no yii no sii hɔ dze maa dwumadzi yi no:

Dɛm ntsi, yɛpɛ dɛ yɛgye dase kyerɛ wiadzemba, kyerɛ abɔdze biara a ɔwɔ asaase enyi do, dɛ Ewuradze nam Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn a oehue egu hɛn do no do, agye dase akyerɛ hɛn akra, dɛ wɔnam Nyankopɔn ne nkenyan do dze mbrasɛm yinom mae na no ho wɔ mfaso dze ma adasa nyina na ɔyɛ nokwar ampa.

Yɛgye dɛm dase yi kyerɛ wiadze, Ewuradze nye hɛn boafo; na ɔnam Nyankopɔn Egya no, nye Ne Ba, Jesus Christ hɔn adom do, na wɔama hɛn kwan dɛ yɛngye dase yi nkyerɛ wiadze, na yedzi dɛw kɛse wɔ iyi mu, na yɛbɔ mpaa ma Ewuradze daadaa ama adasa eenya mu mfaso.
Duebien no hɔn edzin nye:
Thomas B. Marsh
David W. Patten
Brigham Young
Heber C. Kimball
Orson Hyde
William E. McLellin
Parley P. Pratt
Luke S. Johnson
William Smith
Orson Pratt
John F. Boynton
Lyman E. Johnson

Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi nwoma a ekyir no wɔdze puee guado no, wɔdze nyikyerɛ binom anaadɛ nsɛm a wɔkyerɛwee ber a nsa kãe ma etsitsir nhyiamu anaa, Asɔr n’ehyiadzi mba no agye ato mu no, akã ho. Afe 1876 nwoma no, Elder Orson Pratt na osiesiei wɔ Brigham Young no kwankyerɛ ase, ɔhyehyɛɛ nyikyerɛ no mber a nsɛm no sisii na ɔdze etsir afofor a ɔyɛ ho abakɔsɛm mbueienyi kãa ho.

Fitsi 1835 nwoma no a wɔdze puee guado no, wɔdze nyamesɛm adzesua esuon so kãa ho; Dɛm adzesua no dzin a wɔdze too do nye Lectures on Faith (Gyedzi ho Nkyerɛkyerɛ). Wɔyɛɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ yinom maa Nkɔnhyɛfo Skuul a ɔwɔ Kirtland, Ohio no no mu mba fi 1834 kesi 1835. Ɔwɔ mu dɛ no ho wɔ mfaso ma nkyerɛkyerɛ na kwankyerɛ dze, naaso woyii fii Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi Nwoma a wɔdze puee guado wɔ 1921 no mu, osiandɛ wɔammfa amma anaadɛ woennyi aankyerɛ Asɔrtɔw no nyina.

Afe 1981 Ngyiresi Borɔfokasa Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi nwoma mu no yɛ ber a odzi kan a wɔdze nkyerɛwee nwoma ebiasa kãa ho. Iyinom nye afã 137 na 138 a wɔda ewufo hɔn nkwagye fapem no edzi; nye Asɔr Dawurbɔ 2, rekã dɛ wɔbɛyɛ ayɛdze dze ahyɛ Asɔr no mu mbanyin nyinara a wodzi mu dze asɔfodzi aahyɛ hɔn a, wɔronnhwɛ ebusuakuw a ofi anaa no wer enyi.

Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi nwoma fofor biara a wɔdze epue guado no atsentsen mfomdo a ɔwɔ hɔ dadaw no na ɔdze nsɛm fofor akã ho nkanka abakɔsɛm a wɔakyerɛw wɔ afã-afã n’etsifi no mu no. Nwoma yi a wɔdze epue guado yi kɔ do siesie mber na mbea edzin na ɔyɛ ntsentsenee binom so. Wɔayɛ nsakyer yinom ama nwoma no mu nsɛm no nye abakɔsɛm mu nsɛm a wonyim dɛ ɔyɛ nokwar yie no asaa. Ndzɛmba soronko bi so a wɔayɛ wɔ nwoma fofor a wɔdze epue guado yi mu nye map horow a wɔayɛ ho nsesã a ɔkyerɛ mbea etsitsir a wonyaa nyikyerɛ yinom wɔ, nye Asɔr abakɔsɛm mbea mfonyin a wɔayɛ ne yie, nsɛm no ntõtõho, ɔfã tsir nsɛm, na nsɛngyinado a woetwitwa do esinesin no, wɔayɛ iyinom nyina ama wɔaaboa akenkanfo ma wɔaatse nsɛm no ase yie na woeedzi dɛw wɔ Ewuradze ne nsɛm a, ɔdze ama wɔ Nkyerɛkyerɛ Na Ahyɛmudzi Nwoma no mu no ho. Woyii ɔfã etsifi nsɛm no fii Asɔr Abakɔsɛm Mboano Nwoma nye History of the Church (Asɔr Abakɔsɛm) a wɔdze puee guado (etsifi nsɛm mu no nwoma ebien yinom na wɔfrɛɛ no Joseph Smith n’abakɔsɛm no) nye Joseph Smith Papers (Joseph Smith Nkrataa horow).

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/1.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 1
chapter_summary: 1–7, Kɔkɔbɔ ndze no wɔ hɔ ma nyimpa nyinara; 8–16, Gyedzi ho asehwe na emumuyɛdze bɛba ansaana Mbaa a Otsĩa Ebien no asõ; 17–23, Wɔfrɛɛ Joseph Smith dɛ ɔnsan mfa Ewuradze no nokwar na no tum mbra asaase do; 24–33, Wɔdze Mormon Nwoma no puee guado na wɔkyekyeer nokwar Asɔr no; 34–36, Wobeyi asomdwee efi asaase do; 37–39, Hom nhwehwɛ dɛm mbrasɛm yinom mu.

verses.text: Hom ntsie, O nkorɔfo a hom wɔ m’asɔr mu, nyia ne tsenabea wɔ sor ne ndze na ɔse, na n’enyiwa sõ adasa nyinara do; nyew, nokwar mese: Hom ntsie, nkorɔfo a hom fi ekyirekyir; nye hom a hom wɔ esupruw do wɔ po do, hom nyina ntsie.
Na nokwar, Ewuradze ne ndze wɔ hɔ ma adasa nyinara, na obiara nnyi hɔ a obefi nsa; na enyiwa biara nnyi hɔ a onnkohu, anaa asowa biara nnyi hɔ a ɔnnkɛtse, anaa akoma biara nnyi hɔ a onnkohwira mu.
Na awerɛhow kɛse bɛhɛn etuatsewfo mu; osiandɛ wɔbɛkã hɔn emumuyɛ wɔ adan etsifi, na wɔbɛda hɔn nsumaamu ndzeyɛɛ edzi.
Na m’esuafo a masan mu eyi hɔn wɔ nda a odzi ewiei yi mu no nna kɔkɔbɔ ndze befi hɔn anomu aba adasa nyina hɔ.
Na wɔbɔkɔ mbeambea na obiara nnyi hɔ a obesiw hɔn kwan, osiandɛ emi Ewuradze na mahyɛ hɔn.
Hwɛ, iyi nye mo tumdzi, nye mo nkowaa hɔn tumdzi, na me mbrasɛm no nyienyim a medze ama hɔn dɛ wontsintsim mfa mpue guado mma hom, O adasa a hom wɔ asaase do.
Dɛm ntsi, hom nsuro na homho mpopo, O hom adasa, na dza emi Ewuradze ahyɛ ɔmom wɔ mu biara bɛhyɛ mã.
Na nokwar mese hom dɛ, hɔn a wɔkɔ mbeambea kɛkã nsɛm yi kyerɛ adasa a wɔwɔ asaase do no, hɔn na wɔama hɔn tum dɛ wɔnsɔw hɔn a wɔwɔ asaase nye sor, ekyingyefo nye etuatsewfo ano;
Nyew, nokwar, wɔnsɔw hɔn ano mma da no a wobohue Nyame n’ebufuhyew egu emumuyɛfo do a nsusui biara nnyi ho no—
Nkodu da no a Ewuradze bɛba ebosusu nyimpa biara n’edwuma do etua no kaw, na ɔdze esusudze kor noara a nyimpa biara dze esusu ne nyɛnko nyimpa dze esusu no.
Dɛm ntsi na Ewuradze ne ndze wɔ hɔ ma asaase ano nyina no, aama hɔn a wɔbɛtse nyina aatse.
Hom nsiesie homho, hom nsiesie homho mma dza ɔreba no, osiandɛ Ewuradze abɛn;
Na Ewuradze n’ebufuw adzɛw, na ɔahohor ne nkrantsee ho wɔ sor, na ɔbɔtɔ adasa a wɔwɔ asaase do no do.

Na wɔbɛda Ewuradze n’abasa edzi akyerɛ; na da no reba a hɔn a wonnketsie Ewuradze ne ndze, anaa no nkowaa no hɔn ndze, anaa wonnkedzi nkɔnhyɛfo nye asomafo no hɔn nsɛm do no wobotwa hɔn akyen efi nyimpa mu;
Osiandɛ woefi me nhyehyɛɛ ho, na wɔatõ m’ahyɛmu a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no;

Wɔnnhwehwɛ Ewuradze ma ne tseneneeyɛ nnda edzi, mbom obiara fa nankasa no kwan do, na oedzi nankasa ne nyame ne saso ekyir, dza ne saso tse dɛ wiadze dze, na no hwɛbea tse dɛ ohonyi a, ɔyɛ dadaw na ɔbɛhera wɔ Babylon, Babylon kokroko no mpo, ɔbɔhwe ase.
Dɛm ntsi, emi Ewuradze, a minyim mbusu a ɔbɛba adasamba a wɔwɔ asaase do no ntsi, mefrɛɛ m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, na mekasaa kyerɛɛ no fi sor, na memaa no mbrasɛm;
Na memaa binom so mbrasɛm, dɛ wɔmbɔ dɛm nsɛm yinom ho dawur nkyerɛ wiadze; na mayɛ iyinom nyina ama dza nkɔnhyɛfo no kyerɛwee no aahyɛ mã—
Na wiadze dza ɔyɛ mberɛw no bɛba ebobubu dza ɔyɛ akɛse na ɔyɛ dzen no egu famu, amma ɔdasanyi eenntu ne nyɛnko ɔdasanyi fo, anaadɛ ɔaammfa no werɛ anntwer honam n’abasa—
Mbom ama ɔdasanyi biara aakasa wɔ Ewuradze Nyankopɔn ne dzin mu, nyia ɔyɛ wiadze Agyenkwa no mpo;
Ama gyedzi so adɔɔ sõ wɔ asaase do;
Ama wɔaada m’ahyɛmu a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no edzi.
Ama hɔn a wɔyɛ mberɛw nye akɔhweaban aabɔ m’asɛmpa no ne mãhyɛ ho dawur akyerɛ wiadze n’ano nyina, wɔ ahemfo nye ahwɛdofo enyim.
Hwɛ, meyɛ Nyame na makã iyi; dɛm mbrasɛm yinom fi mo hɔ, na wɔdze maa mo nkowaa wɔ hɔn mberɛwyɛ mu, dɛ mbrɛ hɔn kasaa tse, ama wɔaatse ase.
Na mber dodow biara a wɔbɔfom no, ɔbɛma woehu.
Na mber dodow biara a wɔbɔhwehwɛ nyansa no, ɔbɛkyerɛ hɔn;
Na mber dodow biara a wɔbɛyɛ bɔn no, ɔbɛtsẽa hɔn, ama woeenu hɔnho;
Na mber dodow biara a wɔbɛbrɛ hɔnho adze no, ɔbɛhyɛ hɔn dzen, na oehyira hɔn efi sor, na ɔama hɔn nyimdzee ofi ber to ber.
Na ekyir no a hɔn nsa akã Nephifo hɔn abakɔsɛm no, nyew, m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, mpo, nam Nyankopɔn n’ehumbɔbɔr do benya tum dze akyerɛ Mormon Nwoma no ase.

Na hɔn a wɔdze dɛm mbrasɛm yi bɛma hɔn no so benya tum dze akyekyer asɔr yi ne fapem, na wɔdze efi kusukusuyɛ nye sum mu epue, dɛ iyi nye nokwar nye asɔr tseasefo kortonoo a ɔwɔ asaase nyinara enyi do, dza ɔsɔ emi, Ewuradze m’enyi, mekasa kyerɛ asɔrtɔw no na nnyɛ ankorankor—
Na emi Ewuradze, munnkotum ahwɛ bɔn wɔ kwan ketseketse biara do;
Naaso, nyia onu noho na odzi Ewuradze ne mbrasɛm do no, ɔdze no bɔn bɛkyɛ no;
Na nyia onnu noho no, ɔbɛgye kan a oenya no mpo efi ne nsamu; osiandɛ mo Sunsum nnkɛnye nyimpa edzi aper daa, Dɔm Ewuradze na ɔse.
Na bio, nokwar mese hom dɛ, O hom adasa a wɔwɔ asaase do: Emi Ewuradze mepɛ dɛ mema honam nyina hu dɛm nsɛm yinom.
Na emi monnhwɛ nyimpa enyim, na mepɛ dɛ nyimpa nyina bohu dɛ da no reba ntsɛm; dɔn no nnyae nnsõe, na mbom ɔabɛn, ber a wobeyi asomdwee efi asaase do, na abɔnsam benya tum wɔ nankasa n’ahendzi do.
Na Ewuradze benya tum wɔ n’ahotseweefo so do, na obedzi hen wɔ hɔn mu, na obesian dze atsɛmbu aba Idumea anaa wiadze do.
Hom nhwehwɛ mbrasɛm yinom mu, osiandɛ ɔyɛ ampa na nokwar, na nkɔnhyɛ na anohoba a ɔwɔ mu nyina bɛhyɛ mã.

Dza emi Ewuradze makã no, nna makã, na mennsan m’ekyir; na sor na asaase twa mu kɔ mpo a, m’asɛm dze onnkotwa mu akɔ da, na ne nyina bɛhyɛ mã, dɛ ɔnam mankasa me ndze do anaa mo nkowaa ndze do, ne nyina yɛ kor.
Na hwɛ, hwɛ Ewuradze yɛ Nyame, na Sunsum no gye ho dase, na dasegye no yɛ nokwar, na nokwar no tsim hɔ fi afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/2.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 2
chapter_summary: 1, Elijah bɛda asɔfodzi no edzi akyerɛ; 2–3, Wɔdze egyanom anohoba ahyɛ mba akoma mu.

verses.text: Hwɛ, mubodua Elijah nkɔnhyɛnyi no ne nsa do ada Asɔfodzi no edzi akyerɛ hom, ansaana Ewuradze ne da kɛse no a ɔyɛ hu no aba.
Na ɔdze anohoba a wɔdze bɔɔ egyanom no bɛhyɛ mba no hɔn akoma mu, na mba no hɔn akoma bɛdan akɔ hɔn egyanom do.
Sɛ ɔnntse dɛm a, ber a ɔbɛba no wɔbɛsɛɛ asaase nyina koraa.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/3.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 3
chapter_summary: 1–4, Ewuradze n’akwan yɛ kor na ɔkɔ aprɔw na onnyi ewiei; 5–15, ɔwɔ dɛ Joseph Smith nu noho, ɔno ɔbɛyew nkyerɛase akyɛdze no; 16–20, Mormon Nwoma baa dɛ ɔrebɛgye Lehi n’asefo nkwa.

verses.text: Wonnkotum ama Nyame no ndwuma nye ne nhyehyɛɛ, nye ne botae asɛɛ, nna wonnkotum ama ɔayɛ kwa.
Osiandɛ Nyame nnantsew akwan akyewakyew mu, anaa ɔnndan mmfa nyimfa anaa bankum, nna ɔnnsakyer dza ɔakã, dɛm ntsi n’akwan tsen, na n’akwan yɛ kor na ɔkɔ aprɔw na onnyi ewiei.
Kaa, kaa dɛ nnyɛ Nyame n’edwuma na wɔsɛɛ no, mbom nyimpa n’edwuma a;

Na ɔwɔ mu dɛ nyimpa benya nyikyerɛ pii, na oenya tum dze ayɛ ndwuma akɛse pii, naaso sɛ otuw noho wɔ nankasa n’ahoɔdzen mu, na obu Nyame n’apam egyangyandze, na odzi nankasa ne pɛ do nye honam akɔndɔ ekyir a, otwar dɛ ɔhwe ase na Nyame nokwafo no n’awerdzi bɛba no do.
Hwɛ, ɔdze dɛm ndzɛmba yinom ahyɛ wo nsa, na mbom hwɛ mbrɛ wo mbrasɛm si dua yɛ dzen; na kaa anohoba no so a ɔdze bɔɔ wo no, sɛ anntõ a.
Na hwɛ, mpɛn ahen na atõ mbrasɛm nye Nyame ne mbra no, na edzi nyimpa ne ndaadaa ekyir.
Na hwɛ, nkyɛ onnyi dɛ isuro nyimpa kyɛn Nyame. Ɔwɔ mu dɛ nyimpa bu Nyame n’apam egyangyandze, na obu ne nsɛm enyimtsia—
Naaso nkyɛ ɔwɔ dɛ eyɛ nokwafo; na nkyɛ ɔbɛtsen n’abasa na ɔagye wo abamba efi ɔtamfo n’egyen-menaba nyina ano; na nkyɛ ɔnye wo tsenaa ɔhaw ber biara mu.
Hwɛ, ɔwo nye Joseph, na wɔasan mu eyi wo dɛ yɛ Ewuradze n’edwuma, mbom osian mbrato ntsi, sɛ annhwɛ yie a ebɔhwe ase.
Mbom kaa, dɛ Nyame yɛ mbɔbɔrhufo; dɛm ntsi, nu woho wɔ dza ayɛ a ɔnye mbrasɛm a medze maa wo no bɔ ebira no ho, na ebɔkɔ do ayɛ nyia wɔasan mu eyi no no, na ɔafrɛ wo bio dɛ yɛ edwuma no;
Gyedɛ eyɛ dɛm, ɔno obegyaa wo mu ma abɛyɛ dɛ nyimpa nkaa no, na innkenya akyɛdze bio.
Na sɛ igyaa dza Nyame dze ama wo no a ɔyɛ adzehu na tum a wɔdze kyerɛ ase a, nna egyaa adze a ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn mu ahyɛ nyimpa omumuyɛnyi nsa,
Nyia obuu Nyame n’apam egyangyandze, na ɔtoo anohoba krɔnkrɔn kɛse no a ɔbɔe wɔ Nyame enyim, na ɔtweer nankasa n’atsɛmbu na otuuw noho wɔ nankasa ne nyansaa mu no.
Na iyi ntsi na ayew wo ndzinoa mber kakra no.
Na ɔwo na ama woetsiatsia wo kwankyerɛfo n’asɛm do fi ahyɛse no.
Naaso, m’edwuma bɔkɔ do, susuampaara dɛ Agyenkwa no ho nyimdzee nam Jewfo hɔn dasegye do aba wiadze no, dɛmara so mpo na Agyenkwa no ho nyimdzee bɛba mo nkorɔfo hɔ—
Nye Nephifo, na Jacobfo, na Josephfo, na Zoramfo, osian hɔn egyanom hɔn dasegye ntsi—

Na dɛm dasegye yi bɛba Lamanfo, Lemuelfo, na Ishmaelfo benya nyimdzee a osian hɔn egyanom hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi wɔwodoow wɔ gyedzi mu, hɔn a Ewuradze maa kwan ma wɔsɛɛ hɔn enuanom Nephifo, osian hɔn emumuyɛ nye hɔn ekyiwadze ne nyɛe ntsi.
Na dɛm botae yi ntsi na wɔakora dɛm mprɛtse yinom do, dza kyerɛwsɛm yinom wɔ do no—ama Ewuradze n’anohoba no a ɔdze bɔɔ no nkorɔfo no aahyɛ mã;

Ama Lamanfo no ebenya hɔn egyanom ho nyimdzee na woeehu Ewuradze n’anohoba no, na wɔagye asɛmpa no eedzi na wɔdze hɔnho ato Jesus Christ no ndwuma pa do, na woeenya enyimnyam wɔ ne dzin mu na woeedua hɔn nnuho do wɔagye hɔn nkwa. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/4.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 4
chapter_summary: 1–4, Akokodur som gye Ewuradze n’asɔfoe nkwa; 5–6, Nyame su ma wɔfata ɔsomdwumadzi no; 7, Ɔwɔ dɛ wɔhwehwɛ Nyame ne ndzɛmba ekyir kwan.

verses.text: Afei hwɛ, dwumadzi a ɔyɛ ahobow bi rubopue adasamba mu.
Dɛm ntsi, O hom a hom rebɛyɛ Nyame n’edwuma, hom nhwɛ mfa hom akoma, ahom, adwen nye ahoɔdzen nyina nsom no, ama hom eetum egyina Nyame n’enyim wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu dɛ afɔdzi biara nnyi homho.
Dɛm ntsi, sɛ hom wɔ pɛ dɛ hom bɔsom Nyame a, wɔto nsa frɛ hom wɔ edwuma no ho;
Na hwɛ haban no ahoa dada na twaber no asõ; na hwɛ nyia ɔdze ahoɔdzen tow ne kantankrankye no, ɔnoara na ɔbɔboa ano ama noho aama ɔaannhera, mbom ɔdze nkwagye abrɛ ne kra;
Na nyia n’enyiwa bɛyɛ kor wɔ Nyame n’enyimnyam nko do, na ɔwɔ gyedzi, enyidado, ayamuyie na ɔdɔ no, na ɔfata edwuma no ne yɛ.
Hom nkaa gyedzi, ɔbra pa, nyimdzee, ahohyɛdo, abotar, enuadɔ, nyamesu, ayamuyie, ahobrɛadze, mbɔdzembɔ.
Hom mbisa, na hom nsa bɛkã; hom mbɔ mu, na wobobue ama hom. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/5.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 5
chapter_summary: 1–10, Ɔnam Joseph Smith do na dɛm ebusuasantsen yi nsa bɛkã Ewuradze n’asɛm; 11–18, Adasefo baasa bɛgye Mormon Nwoma no ho dase; 19–20, Ewuradze n’asɛm bɛyɛ hɔ dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛɛ hɔ mber a abasen kɔ no mu no; 21–35, Martin Harris botum enu noho na ɔabɛyɛ adasefo no mu kor.

verses.text: Hwɛ, mese wo dɛ, ɔnam dɛ m’akowaa Martin Harris apɛ dɛ obenya dasegye wɔ me nsamu dɛ, ɔwo, m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, enya dɛm mprɛtse no a agye ho dase dɛ enya efi mo hɔ no ntsi;

Na afei, hwɛ, iyi na kã kyerɛ no—nyia ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ wo no, see wo dɛ: Emi, Ewuradze, meyɛ Nyame, na medze dɛm ndzɛmba yinom ama ɔwo, m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, na mahyɛ wo dɛ gyina yɛ dasefo wɔ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom ho;
Na maama enye me edzi ahyɛmu, onnyi dɛ edze iyinom kyerɛ, gyedɛ nkorɔfo a mahyɛ wo wɔ hɔn ho no nko; na innyi tum wɔ do gyedɛ medze ma wo.

Na enya akyɛdze a ibotum dze akyerɛ mprɛtse no ase; na iyi nye akyɛdze a odzi kan a medze ama wo; na mahyɛ wo dɛ mma mmpetuw nnkã dɛ akyɛdze biara bio kesi dɛ me tsirmpɔw no bɛhyɛ mã; na mennkɛma wo akyɛdze fofor biara bio kesi dɛ ibowie yɛ.
Nokwar, mese wo dɛ, mbusu bɛba nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ asaase yi do no do sɛ wɔannyɛ aso amma me nsɛm a;
Na iyi ekyir no, wɔbɛhyɛ wo sɔfo ma edze me nsɛm akɛma adasamba.
Hwɛ, sɛ wɔanngye me nsɛm enndzi a, wɔnnkɛgye ɔwo Joseph, m’akowaa so edzi, sɛ ɔba no dɛ edze dɛm ndzɛmba yinom a medze ahyɛ wo nsa nyina mpo kyerɛ hɔn a.
O, dɛm ekyingyefo na akɔnkyefo ebusuasantsen yi—m’ebufuhyew redzɛw hɔn do.
Hwɛ, nokwar mese wo dɛ, medze dɛm ndzɛmba a medze ahyɛ ɔwo, m’akowaa Joseph nsa yi esie, wɔ me nyansaa mu, na wɔbɛda no edzi akyerɛ ebusuasantsen a wɔreba no;
Mbom dɛm ebusuasantsen yi bodua wo do enya m’asɛm;
Na mo nkowaa baasa dasegye bɛka wo dasegye ho, hɔn a mebɛfrɛ hɔn na mahyɛ hɔn asɔfo no, na medze dɛm ndzɛmba yinom bɛkyerɛ hɔn no, wɔdze me nsɛm a medze edua wo do ama no bɔkɔ mbeambea.
Nyew, wobohu ampaara dɛ ndzɛmba yinom yɛ nokwar, osiandɛ mebɛda no edzi efi sor akyerɛ hɔn.
Mebɛma hɔn tum ama woeetum ahwɛ na woeehu ndzɛmba yinom dɛ mbrɛ wɔtse;

Na mennkɛfa dɛm tum yi ama obiara bio, ma ɔdze agye dɛm dase yi ara wɔ ebusuasantsen yi mu, aber yi mu na m’asɔr bɛhyɛ ase asoɛr efi sar no do—na n’enyim atsew dɛ bosoom, na ɔayɛ fɛw dɛ ewia, na ɔayɛ hu dɛ nsordaafo a wokitsa mfrankaa.
Na adasefo baasa hɔn dasegye mu na medze m’asɛm bodua do akɔ.
Na hwɛ, obiara a ɔgye me nsɛm dzi no, hɔn na mo Sunsum bɛda edzi abɛsera hɔn; na medze nsu na Sunsum no mpo bɔwo hɔn—
Na ɔwɔ dɛ hom tweɔn kakra, osiandɛ wonnyae nnhyɛɛ hom asɔfo—
Na hɔn dasegye no so bɔkɔ ekobu ebusuasantsen yi fɔ, sɛ wopirim hɔn akoma dze tsia hɔn a;

Na amamfoyɛ ntsẽa besian adasamba a wɔwɔ asaase do no mu, na wɔbɔkɔ do ehue egu hɔn do ofi ber to ber, sɛ woennu hɔnho a, ekodu dɛ asaase yi bɔtɔ pan na me mbae ne hyerɛn bɛhyew adasa a wɔwɔ asaase do na ɔasɛɛ hɔn koraa.
Hwɛ, mekã nsɛm yinom kyerɛ hom, dɛ mbrɛ mekãa kyerɛɛ nkorɔfo so wɔ Jerusalem ne nsɛe ho no; na m’asɛm bɛyɛ hɔ dɛm aber yi mu dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛɛ hɔ wɔ ber a abasen kɔ no mu no.
Na afei mehyɛ ɔwo, m’akowaa Joseph, dɛ nu woho na nantsew tsenenee mu yie wɔ m’enyim, na mma nndzi nyimpa ndaadaa ekyir bio;
Na si nketse dzi mbrasɛm a medze ama wo no do; na sɛ eyɛ dɛm na woku wo mpo a, hwɛ mebɛma wo nkwa a onnyiewiei.
Na afei, bio, mekasa kyerɛ ɔwo, m’akowaa Joseph, dze fa nyimpa a ɔpɛ dɛ ɔyɛ dasefo no ho—

Hwɛ, mese wo dɛ, ɔmema noho do na ɔmmbrɛ noho adze dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɛ wɔ m’enyim; na mbom sɛ ɔbɔbɔ no mu adze wɔ m’enyim, na ofi n’akoma mu, brɛ noho adze bɔ mpaa dzendzen wɔ gyedzi mu a, mebɛma no kwan ma ɔahwɛ ndzɛmba a ɔpɛ dɛ ohu no.

Na ɔbɛkasa akyerɛ dɔm a wɔwɔ ebusuasantsen yi mu dɛ: Hwɛ, meehu ndzɛmba a Ewuradze dze akyerɛ Joseph Smith, Kakraba, no na minyim ampaara dɛ ɔyɛ nokwar, osiandɛ meehu, na ɔnam Nyame no tum do na ɔdze kyerɛɛ me na nnyɛ nyimpa dze.
Na emi Ewuradze mehyɛ ɔno m’akowaa Martin Harris dɛ, mma ɔnnkã biribiara a ɔfa ndzɛmba no ho bio nnkyerɛ hɔn, gyedɛ ɔkã dɛ: Meehu, na ɔnam Nyame no tum do na ɔdze kyerɛɛ me; na iyi nye nsɛm a ɔnkã.
Na sɛ ɔpow iyi a, ɔbɔtõ ahyɛmu a ɔnye me edzi no dada no, na hwɛ, woebu no fɔ.

Na afei, gyedɛ ɔbrɛ noho adze na ɔgye ndzɛmba a ɔayɛ a omuo no to mu ma muhu, nye ahyɛmu a ɔnye me edzi dɛ obedzi me mbrasɛm do, na oenya gyedzi wɔ mo mu, hwɛ, mese no dɛ, onnkohu dɛm ndzɛmba yi, osiandɛ mennkɛma oehu ndzɛmba no a maakã ho asɛm no.
Na sɛ dɛm na ɔtse a, nna mehyɛ wo, m’akowaa Joseph, dɛ kã kyerɛ no dɛ, mma ɔnnyɛ bio, eso mma ɔnnhaw me bio wɔ dɛm asɛm yi ho.
Na sɛ dɛm na ɔtse a, hwɛ, mese ɔwo Joseph dɛ, sɛ ekyerɛ nkrataafa kakra ase a, gyaa mber kakra, kesi dɛ mebɛhyɛ wo dɛ sɔw do bio; ansaana asɔw do akyerɛ ase bio.
Na gyedɛ eyɛ iyi, hwɛ, innkenya akyɛdze biara bio, na mebɛgye ndzɛmba a medze ahyɛ wo nsa no efi wo nkyɛn.
Na afei, ɔnam dɛ meehu dada dɛ wɔatsɛw rotweɔn asɛɛ wo ntsi, nyew, mehu dada dɛ sɛ m’akowaa Martin Harris ammbrɛ noho adze amma oennya me nsamu dasegye a, ɔbɔhwe ase wɔ mbrato mu;
Na dodowara wɔ hɔ a wɔatsɛw rotweɔn asɛɛ wo efi asaase enyi; na osian iyi ntsi na maama wo dɛm mbrasɛm yinom, ama wo nda aawar.
Nyew, na osian iyi ntsi na makã dɛ: Gyaa, na gyina dzinn kesi dɛ mebɛhyɛ wo, na mebɛkyerɛ wo kwan a ebɛfa do etum dze ayɛ dza mahyɛ wo dɛ yɛ no.
Na sɛ idzi nokwar wɔ me mbrasɛm mu a, wɔbɛma wo do wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/6.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 6
chapter_summary: 1–6, Edwumayɛfo a wɔwɔ Ewuradze ne haban mu no nya nkwagye; 7–13, Akyɛdze biara nnyi hɔ a, ɔkyɛn nkwagye akyɛdze no; 14–27, Wɔnam Sunsum no tum do nya nokwar no ho dase; 28–37, Hom nhwɛ Christ, na hom nyɛ papa daa nyina.

verses.text: Dwumadzi a ɔsõ na ɔyɛ ahobow bi rubopue adasamba mu.
Hwɛ, emi nye Nyame; hom ntsie m’asɛm, a nkwa na tum wɔ mu no, ɔyɛ ndam sen nkrantsee anofanu, na ohwira mu kodu dɛ ɔpaapaa akwaa nye ehuon mu; dɛm ntsi hom ntsie me nsɛm.

Hwɛ, haban no ahoa na twaber no asõ; dɛm ntsi, obiara a ɔpɛ dɛ otwa no, ɔmfa n’ahoɔdzen ntow ne kantankrankye na ontwa, wɔ ber a adzekyee wɔ do yi, aama ɔakora ne kra ama nkwagye a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem wɔ Nyame n’ahenman mu.
Nyew, obiara a ɔbɔtow ne kantankrankye na oetwa no, ɔnoara na Nyame afrɛ.
Dɛm ntsi, sɛ ibisa me a wo nsa bɛkã; sɛ ebɔ mu a wobobue ama wo.
Afei, ber a hom ebisa yi, hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, hom ndzi me mbrasɛm do, na hom mper dɛ hom bɛkyekyer Zion na wɔdze epue;
Mma hom nnhwehwɛ ahonya, na mbom hom nhwehwɛ nyansa, na hwɛ, wɔbɛda Nyame n’esumadze edzi akyerɛ hom, na nkyii wɔbɛyɛ hom ahonyafo. Hwɛ, nyia ɔwɔ onnyiewiei nkwa no yɛ ɔhonyanyi.
Nokwar, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, dza epɛ dɛ inya fi mo hɔ no ɔno na wo nsa bɛkã; na sɛ epɛ a, wobodua wo do ayɛ papa pii wɔ dɛm ebusuasantsen yi mu.
Mma nnkã hwee na mbom nnuho nko na kã kyerɛ ebusuasantsen yi; dzi me mbrasɛm do, na boa ma wɔnyɛ m’edwuma, dɛ mbrɛ me mbrasɛm kyerɛ, na wobehyira wo.
Hwɛ ewɔ akyɛdze, na nhyira akã wo osian w’akyɛdze no ntsi. Kaa dɛ ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn na ofi sor bae—
Na sɛ ibisa a, ibohu esumasɛm a ɔsõ na ɔyɛ ahobow; dɛm ntsi fa w’akyɛdze no yɛ edwuma, ama eehu esumasɛm, na eetum ama ɔdodow ebohu nokwar no, nyew, ama woeehu mfom a ɔwɔ hɔn akwan mu.
Mma nnda w’akyɛdze no edzi nnkyerɛ obiara, gyedɛ hɔn a wɔwɔ wo gyedzi no mu no bi nko. Mma mmfa ndzɛmba a ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn no nndzi agor.
Sɛ eyɛ papa, nyew, na idzi nokwar kɔ ewiei a, wɔbɛgye wo nkwa wɔ Nyame n’ahenman no mu, iyi nye dza ɔsõ kɛsenara wɔ Nyame n’akyɛdze nyinara mu; osiandɛ akyɛdze biara nnsõ nnkyɛn nkwagye akyɛdze.

Nokwar, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, nhyira akã wo wɔ dza ayɛ ho; osiandɛ ebisa me, na hwɛ, mber dodow biara a ibisae no, inyaa nkyerɛkyerɛ fii mo Sunsum nkyɛn. Sɛ ɔnntse dɛm a, nkyɛ ammba bea a ewɔ do dɛm aber yi.
Hwɛ, inyim dɛ ibisaa me na mubuee w’adwen mu; na sesei mekã wo dɛm nsɛm yinom ama eehu dɛ Sunsum nokwafo no na obuee w’adwen mu;
Nyew, mekã kyerɛ wo, ama eehu dɛ obiara nnyi hɔ bio, gyedɛ Nyame nko na onyim w’adwendwen nye w’akoma mu nsusui.
Mekã wo dɛm nsɛm yinom ama aayɛ dasegye ama wo—dɛ nsɛm anaadɛ edwuma a erekyerɛw yi yɛ nokwar.
Dɛm ntsi bɔ mbɔdzen; gyina m’akowaa Joseph n’afã nokwar mu, ama ɔhaw biara mu no, ɔnam asɛm no ntsi oeegyina.
Tu no fo wɔ no mfom mu, na wo so gye afotu fi no hɔ. Sie abotar; nya enyidahɔ; nya ahohyɛdo, nya abotar, gyedzi, enyidado na ayamuyie.

Hwɛ, ɔwo nye Oliver, na maakasa akyerɛ wo osian w’apɛdze ntsi; dɛm ntsi kora dɛm nsɛm yi do wɔ w’akoma mu. Dzi nokwar, na bɔ mbɔdzen dzi Nyame ne mbrasɛm do, na medze mo dɔ abasa no botwa wo ho ehyia.
Hwɛ, emi nye Jesus Christ, Nyame ne Ba no. Emi na mebaa mankasa medze nkyɛn, na mankasa medze anngye me. Emi nye kan a ɔhyerɛn sum mu, na sum no annkyer no.
Nokwar, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, sɛ epɛ dɛ inya dasegye bi so a, tow w’adwen to anago no a isui wɔ w’akoma mu frɛɛ me dɛ ibohu nokwar a ɔfa iyinom ho no.
Ana mammfa asomdwee ho asɛm annhyɛ w’adwen mu a ɔfa dɛm asɛm no ho? Ebɛn dasegye kɛse na ibotum enya akyɛn dza ofi Nyame hɔ?
Na afei, hwɛ, enya dasegye; na sɛ makã ndzɛmba a ɔdasanyi biara nnyim akyerɛ wo a, nna innyaa dasegye?
Na, hwɛ, sɛ erohwehwɛ efi mo hɔ, dze akyerɛ ase, tse dɛ m’akowaa Joseph mpo a, medze akyɛdze no ma wo.
Nokwar, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, abakɔsɛm bi wɔ hɔ a m’asɛmpa pii wɔ mu a, osian nkorɔfo no hɔn emumuyɛdze ntsi wɔatwe asan;
Na afei, mehyɛ wo dɛ, sɛ inya pɛpa—pɛ a edze besie akoradze ama woho wɔ sor a—nna fa w’akyɛdze boa ma wɔmfa ntwe me kyerɛwsɛm no a osian emumuyɛdze ntsi wɔdze esuma no mpue kan mu.
Na afei, hwɛ, medze dɛm akyɛdze yi ne nsaafee a hom bodua do dze ɔsomdwumadzi yi epue kan mu no, ma ɔwo nye m’akowaa Joseph so; na adasefo beenu anaa baasa anomu na wɔmfa do nsi asɛm ngyinae.
Nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, sɛ wɔpow me nsɛm, nye dɛm asɛmpa yi nye ɔsomdwuma n’afã bi yi a, nhyira akã hom, osiandɛ wonnkotum ayɛ hom biribi a ɔbor do kyɛn emi.
Mbom sɛ wɔyɛ hom dɛ mbrɛ wɔdze ayɛ me no mpo a, nhyira akã hom, osiandɛ hom nye me bɛtsena enyimnyam mu.
Na sɛ wɔammpow me nsɛm a, wɔnam dasegye a wɔdze bɛma no do esi no egyinae a, nhyira akã hɔn, na ɔno na hom bedzi dɛw wɔ aba a hom nsaano edwuma asow no ho.

Nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, dɛ mbrɛ mekãa kyerɛɛ m’esuafo no, beebiara a beenu anaa baasa edzi ehyia wɔ me dzin mu, wɔ adwensaa kor ho no, hwɛ, hɔ na mowɔ hɔn finimfin—dɛmara so mpo na mowɔ hom finimfin.
Mma hom nnsuro dɛ hom bɛyɛ papa, me mbabanyin, osiandɛ dza hom bodua no, ɔnoara so na hom bobu; dɛm ntsi, sɛ hom dua papa a hom bobu papa so ayɛ hom akatua.
Dɛm ntsi, mma hom nnsuro, nguambaakuw; hom nyɛ papa; ma asaase nye hɛl nyina mbɔmu ntsia hom, na sɛ hom si wɔ mo botan do a, wonnkotum edzi hom do konyim.
Hwɛ, mummbu hom fɔ; hom nkɔ hom kwan na mma hom nnyɛ bɔn bio; hom mfa ahobrɛadze nyɛ hom edwuma a mahyɛ hom no.
Hom nhwɛ me wɔ hom adwendwen biribiara mu; mma hom nngye kyim, mma hom nnsuro.
Hom nhwɛ me mfẽ mu epirakur, nye mprɛgow ananmu wɔ me nsa nye m’anan mu; hom ndzi nokwar, hom ndzi me mbrasɛm do, na hom benya ɔsor ahenman no edzi. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/7.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 7
chapter_summary: 1–3, John a Wɔdɔɔ no no bɛtsena ase ekodu dɛ Ewuradze bɛba; 4–8, Peter, James, na John na wokitsa asɛmpa ne nsaafee no.

verses.text: Na Ewuradze see me dɛ: John, mo dɔfo, ebɛnadze na epɛ? Na sɛ ibisa dza epɛ a, wɔdze bɛma wo.
Na mesee no dɛ: Ewuradze, ma me tum wɔ owu do, ama maatsena ase na medze akra abrɛ wo.
Na Ewuradze see me dɛ: Nokwar, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, osiandɛ iyi na epɛ ntsi, ebɛtsena ase ekodu dɛ mebɛba wɔ m’enyimnyam mu, na ebɛhyɛ nkɔm wɔ aman ebusuakuw, kasa horow nye nyimpa enyim.

Na osian iyi ntsi, Ewuradze see Peter dɛ: Sɛ mema ɔtsena ase kodu dɛ mebɛba a, iyi fa wo ho bɛn? Osiandɛ ɔpɛɛ fii me hɔ dɛ, obotum dze akra abrɛ me, na mbom ɔwo dze epɛ dɛ eba me nkyɛn ntsɛm wɔ m’ahenman mu.
Mese wo dɛ, Peter, w’apɛdze yi ye; na mbom mo dɔfo pɛ dɛ ɔyɛ dza ɔbor do, anaadɛ odzi dwuma kɛsenara wɔ nyimpa mu kyɛn dza ɔayɛ no dada no.
Nyew, ɔafa edwuma kɛse ato no do; dɛm ntsi mebɛyɛ no dɛ ogyaframee na ɔbɔfo a ɔsom; na ɔbɔsom hɔn a wɔbɛyɛ nkwagye ho adzedzifo a wɔtse asaase do no.
Na mebɛma asom no nye wo nua James; na hom baasa yi na medze dɛm tum nye ɔsomdwumadzi yi ho nsaafee bɛma ekodu dɛ mebɛba.
Nokwar mese hom dɛ, hom beenu nyina benya hom apɛdze, osiandɛ hom beenu nyina wɔ enyigye wɔ hom apɛdze ho.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/8.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 8
chapter_summary: 1–5, Nyikyerɛ nam Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no tum do ba; 6–12, Nyame n’esumasɛm ho nyimdzee na tum a wɔdze kyerɛ tsetseberdo abakɔsɛm ase no nam gyedzi do ba.

verses.text: Oliver Cowdery, nokwar, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, ampaara dɛ Ewuradze a ɔyɛ wo Nyankopɔn na wo Pomfo, tse ase yi, dɛmara so mpo na wo nsa bɛkã ndzɛmba biara a edze nokwar akoma bebisa wɔ gyedzi mu no no ho nyimdzee, wɔ aber a egye dzi dɛ ibenya nyimdzee wɔ abakɔsɛm dadaw a woekrukye, dza ɔyɛ tsetseberdo dze no, dza ɔyɛ me nsɛm no bi a wɔkãe a mo Sunsum ada no edzi no.
Na, hwɛ, mubodua Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no a ɔbɛba wo do na ɔabɛtsena w’akoma mu no do akã akyerɛ wo wɔ w’adwen nye w’akoma mu.
Afei, hwɛ, iyi nye nyikyerɛ sunsum no; hwɛ, iyi nye sunsum a Moses nam do dze Israelmba twaa Po Memen no ma wɔnantseew asaase kɛsɛɛ do no.
Dɛm ntsi iyi yɛ w’akyɛdze; fa dzi dwuma, na nhyira akã wo, osiandɛ ɔbɛgye wo efi w’atamfo nsamu, na sɛ ɔnntse dɛm a, nkyɛ woboku wo na wɔdze wo kra aba ɔsɛɛ mu.
O, kaa dɛm nsɛm yi, na dzi me mbrasɛm do. Kaa, dɛ iyi yɛ w’akyɛdze.
Na nnyɛ iyi nko nye w’akyɛdze nyina; na ewɔ akyɛdze bi so a, ɔyɛ Aaron n’akyɛdze no; hwɛ, ɔakã ndzɛmba pii akyerɛ wo;
Hwɛ, tum biara nnyi hɔ, gyedɛ Nyame no tum nko, ɔno na obotum ama dɛm Aaron n’akyɛdze yi aba wo hɔ.
Dɛm ntsi, mma nngye kyim, osiandɛ ɔyɛ akyɛdze a ofi Nyame hɔ; na edze wo nsa bosuo mu, na ayɛ ahobow ndwuma; na tum biara runntum nngye mmfi wo nsamu, osiandɛ ɔyɛ Nyame n’edwuma.
Na, dɛm ntsi, biribiara a ibebisa me dɛ mundua dɛm kwan no do nkã nkyerɛ wo no, medze bɛma wo, na ibenya ho nyimdzee.
Kaa dɛ sɛ innyi gyedzi a, innkotum ayɛ hwee; dɛm ntsi, bisa wɔ gyedzi mu. Mma mmfa dɛm ndzɛmba yinom nndzi agor; mma mmbisa dza onnyi dɛ ibisa.

Bisa ama eetum ehu Nyame n’esumasɛm, na ama eetum akyerɛ ase na eenya nyimdzee efi dɛm tsetseberdo abakɔsɛm nyinara a wɔdze esuma no ho, dza ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn no; na dɛ mbrɛ wo gyedzi tse no, ɔbɛyɛ hɔ ama wo.
Hwɛ, emi na makã; na emi nye nyia ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ wo fi ahyɛse no. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/9.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 9
chapter_summary: 1–6, Tsetseberdo abakɔsɛm bi so wɔ hɔ a ɔwɔ dɛ wɔkyerɛ ase; 7–14, Wɔnam osũa na sunsum ne pi si do kyerɛ Mormon Nwoma no ase.

verses.text: Hwɛ, me babanyin, mese wo dɛ, osiandɛ annkyerɛ ase dɛ mbrɛ epɛɛ fii mo hɔ no, na ehyɛɛ ase bio dɛ erekyerɛw ma m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, ntsi mebɛpɛ dɛ ekɔ do dɛmara kɛpem dɛ ibowie dɛm abakɔsɛm yi a, medze ahyɛ ne nsa no.
Na nkyii, hwɛ, abakɔsɛm binom so wɔ hɔ a mowɔ, na mebɛma wo tum ma aboa ma wɔakyerɛ ase.
Sie abotar, me babanyin, osiandɛ ɔyɛ enyansadze ma me, na mese dɛ onnhia mma wo dɛ ebɛkyerɛ ase wɔ dɛm aber yi mu.
Hwɛ, edwuma a wɔafrɛ wo dɛ yɛ nye dɛ ebɛkyerɛw ama m’akowaa Joseph.
Na, hwɛ, osiandɛ annkɔ do annyɛ dɛ mbrɛ ehyɛɛ ase no ntsi, ber a ehyɛɛ ase dɛ erekyerɛ ase no, megyee dɛm ndzinoa no fii wo nsamu.
Mma nnhwinhwin, me babanyin, osiandɛ ɔyɛ enyansadze ma me, na ɔmaa menye wo dzii no dɛm no.
Hwɛ, anntse ase; esusu dɛ medze bɛma wo, wɔ ber a anndwen ho, kɛpeem dɛ ibisaa me ara.
Mbom, hwɛ, mese wo dɛ, ɔwɔ dɛ eyɛ mpɛnsampɛnsamu wɔ w’adwen mu; na ɔwɔ dɛ ibisa me sɛ ɔtsen a, na sɛ ɔtsen a, mebɛma wo bo ayɛ wo hyew wɔ wo mu; na dɛm ntsi, ebɛtse nkã dɛ ɔtsen.
Na sɛ ɔnntsen a, erenntse dɛm nkã no, na mbom w’adwen mu bɛyɛ wo basaa a ɔbɛma wo werɛ efir dza omuo; dɛm ntsi, irunntum nnkyerɛw dza ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn, gyedɛ medze ma wo.
Afei, sɛ inyim iyi a nkyɛ itumii kyerɛɛ ase; naaso, onnhia mma wo dɛ ebɛkyerɛ ase seseiara;
Hwɛ, ber a ehyɛɛ ase no nna ohia; na mbom isuroi, na mber no apa ho, ntsi onnhia mma wo seseiara;
Ana innhu dɛ maama m’akowaa Joseph ahoɔdzen kɛse, na ɔyɛɛ dɛn baa no dɛm? Na mummbu hom mu biara fɔ.
Yɛ dza mahyɛ wo no, na ebɛyɛ prɔmprɔm. Dzi nokwar, na mma nngyaa woho mu mma nsɔhwɛ.
Gyina pintsinn wɔ edwuma a mafrɛ wo wɔ ho no mu, na wo tsinhwi kor mpo nnkɛyew wɔ wo tsir do, na wɔbɛma wo do wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/10.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 10
chapter_summary: 1–26, Satan nunu emumuyɛfo ma wotsia Ewuradze N’edwuma; 27–33, Ɔper hwehwɛ dɛ ɔsɛɛ nyimpa akra; 34–52, Asɛmpa no bodua Mormon Nwoma no do akɔ Lamanfo nye aman nyina hɔ; 53–63, Ewuradze bɛkyekyer N’Asɔr na N’asɛmpa no wɔ adasa mu; 64–70, Ɔbɔboaboa hɔn a woenu hɔnho no ano akɔ N’Asɔr mu na Ɔagye hɔn a wɔyɛ setsie no nkwa.

verses.text: Afei, hwɛ, mese wo dɛ, osiandɛ edze dɛm nkyerɛwee no a wɔmaa wo tum ma edze Urim na Thummim kyerɛɛ ase no hyɛɛ omumuyɛnyi nsamu ntsi, ayew no.
Na eyeew w’akyɛdze no so dɛm aber no ara, na w’adwen mu bɛyɛɛ sum.
Naaso, afei wɔdze asan ama wo bio; dɛm ntsi, hwɛ na dzi nokwar na kɔ do wie nkyerɛase edwuma no dɛ mbrɛ ahyɛ ase no.
Mma nntu mbirika ntsɛntsɛm anaadɛ nnyɛ edwumadzen nnsen mbrɛ w’ahom na mboa a wɔdze ama wo dɛ fa kyerɛ ase no botum; mbom bɔ mbɔdzen kesi ewiei.
Bɔ mpaa aber nyina, ama ayɛ konyim dzifo; nyew, ama eedzi Satan do konyim, na ama eetum eguan efi Satan no nkowaa a wodzi dwuma ma no no hɔn nsa.
Hwɛ, wɔrohwehwɛ asɛɛ wo; nyew, nyimpa a edze wo werɛ ahyɛ no mu no mpo rohwehwɛ asɛɛ wo.
Na iyi ho ntsi na mekãa dɛ ɔyɛ omumuyɛnyi no, na ɔrohwehwɛ agye ndzɛmba a wɔdze ahyɛ wo nsa no; na ɔrohwehwɛ so asɛɛ w’akyɛdze no.
Na osiandɛ edze nkyerɛwee no hyɛɛ ne nsa ntsi, hwɛ, emumuyɛfo agye efi wo hɔ.
Dɛm ntsi, egyaa adze a ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn mu ama, nyew, edze ama emumuyɛdze.
Na, hwɛ, Satan dze ahyɛ hɔn akoma mu dɛ wɔnsesã nsɛm a ama ɔakyerɛw no, anaadɛ dza akyerɛ ase no a, efi wo nsa no.
Na hwɛ, mese wo dɛ, osiandɛ wɔasesã nsɛm no ntsi, ɔnye dza ekyerɛɛ ase ma wɔkyerɛwee no bɔ ebira;
Na, osian iyi ntsi, abɔnsam aper dɛ ɔbɛfa ndaadaa kwan bi do, ama ɔasɛɛ dɛm dwumadzi yi;
Na ɔdze ahyɛ hɔn akoma mu dɛ wɔnyɛ dɛm adze yi, ama wɔnam ndabraba kwan do eetum akã dɛ wɔapa wo wɔ nsɛm a apatuw akyerɛ ase no ho.
Nokwar, mese wo dɛ, mennkɛma kwan ma Satan ne nsusui bɔn wɔ dɛm adze yi ho no ayɛ hɔ.
Na hwɛ, ɔdze ahyɛ hɔn akoma mu ama ne nsa aakã wo ma asɔ Ewuradze wo Nyankopɔn ahwɛ wɔ ber a ibebisa no dɛ ɔmma san kyerɛ ase bio no.
Na afei, hwɛ, wɔkã na wɔdwen wɔ hɔn akoma mu dɛ—Yɛbɔhwɛ dɛ sɛ Nyame ama no tum dɛ ɔnkyerɛ ase a; sɛ dɛm a, ɔbɛsan ama no tum bio;
Na sɛ Nyame ma no tum bio, anaa dɛ sɛ ɔkyerɛ ase bio, anaadɛ sɛ ɔsan dze dɛm nsɛm no ara so ba bio a, hwɛ, yɛwɔ ɔnoara so bi wɔ hɛn nkyɛn, na yɛasesã no;
Dɛm ntsi wɔrennyɛ pɛr, na yɛbɛkã dɛ oedzi ator wɔ ne nsɛm no mu, na dɛ onnyi akyɛdze biara, na dɛ onnyi tum biara;
Dɛm ntsi yɛbɛsɛɛ ɔno, nye edwuma no so; na yɛbɛyɛ iyi amma hɛn enyim eenngu ase ekyir yi, na ama yeenya wiadze mu enyimnyam.
Nokwar, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, Satan wɔ tum kɛse wɔ hɔn akoma do; na onunu hɔn ma wɔyɛ emumuyɛ dze tsia dza oye;
Na hɔn akoma aprɔw, na emumuyɛdze na ebusudze ahyɛ mu mã; na wɔdɔ sum kyɛn kan, osiandɛ hɔn ndwuma yɛ bɔn; dɛm ntsi worimmbisa me.
Satan nunu hɔn, ama oeegya hɔn akra akɔ ɔsɛɛ mu.
Na dɛm na ɔayɛ ndaadaa nhyehyɛɛ, na ɔdwen dɛ ɔdze resɛɛ Nyame n’edwuma; na mbom mebɛgye iyi efi hɔn nsamu, na ɔbɛdan hɔn enyimguase; na hɔn afɔbu wɔ atsɛmbu da no mu.
Nyew, onunu hɔn akoma ma wonya ebufuw tsia edwuma yi.

Nyew, ɔse hɔn dɛ: Hom ndaadaa hɔn na hom ntsɛw hɔn nkyer hɔn ama hom asɛɛ hɔn; hwɛ, iyi nnyɛ ɔhaw. Na dɛm na ɔdaadaa hɔn, na ɔse hɔn dɛ, ɔnnyɛ bɔn dɛ ibedzi ator ato ɔdasanyi do ama wɔakyer no ator mu ama wɔasɛɛ no.
Na dɛm na ɔdaadaa hɔn, na ɔgye hɔn do kɛpem dɛ ɔtwe hɔn akra kɔ hɛl; na dɛm so na ɔyɛ ama wɔapa hɔnankasa wɔ hɔn efir mu.
Na hwɛ okyin asaase do, pasapasar do dzi akɔnaaba, dze rohwehwɛ asɛɛ nyimpa akra.
Nokwar, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, nyia odzi ator dze daadaa ndue osiandɛ osusu dɛ obi so dzi ator dze daadaa, na dɛm nkorɔfo no rimmfi Nyame ne pɛrpɛrdzi nsa.
Afei, hwɛ, wɔsesã dɛm nsɛm yi, osiandɛ Satan ase hɔn dɛ: Ɔadaadaa hom—na dɛm na ɔdaadaa hɔn ma wɔyɛ emumuyɛ dze, na ɔyɛ ma esɔ Ewuradze wo Nyankopɔn hwɛ.
Hwɛ, mese wo dɛ, mma nnkyerɛ dɛm nsɛm no a oefi wo nsamu kɔ no ase bio;
Na, hwɛ, wonnkotum ayɛ hɔn nsusui bɔn a wɔdze bedzi ator etsia dɛm nsɛm no. Na, hwɛ, sɛ edze dɛm nsɛm no ara san ba bio a, wɔbɛkã dɛ, edzi ator na epetuw dɛ erekyerɛ ase, na mbom atotõ woara woho.
Na, hwɛ, wɔdze iyi bopue guado, na Satan epirim nkorɔfo no hɔn akoma na oenunu hɔn ma woenya ebufuw etsia wo, amma wɔanngye me nsɛm no enndzi.
Dɛm na Satan rodwen mbrɛ ɔbɛhyɛ wo dasegye do wɔ dɛm ebusuasantsen yi mu, amma edwuma no eemmpue wɔ dɛm ebusuasantsen yi mu.
Mbom hwɛ, nyansa nye yi, na osiandɛ mekyerɛ wo nyansa, na mema wo mbrasɛm a ɔfa dɛm ndzɛmba yinom ho ntsi, dza ɔwɔ dɛ eyɛ no, mma mmfa nnkyerɛ wiadze kesi dɛ ibowie nkyerɛase dwumadzi no.
Mma ɔnnyɛ wo ahobow dɛ mesee wo dɛ: Nyansa nye yi, mma mmfa nnkyerɛ wiadze—na mekãa dɛ, mma mmfa nnkyerɛ wiadze, ama wɔaakora wo do.
Hwɛ, mennse dɛ mma mmfa nnkyerɛ atseneneefo;

Mbom dɛ mbrɛ irunntum nnhu atseneneefo daa no, anaadɛ irunntum nnkyerɛ emumuyɛfo mfi atseneneefo mu daa no, hwɛ mese wo dɛ, mua w’ano kesi dɛ mubohu mber pa a ɔsɛ dɛ meda ndzɛmba nyinara a ɔfa dɛm adze yi ho edzi kyerɛ wiadze.
Na afei, nokwar mese wo dɛ, ndzɛmba a ekyerɛwee no a woeefi wo nsamu kɔ no, woekrukye no Nephi ne mprɛtse no do;
Nyew na ekaa dɛ wɔkãa wɔ dɛm nkyerɛwee no mu dɛ, dɛm ndzɛmba no no mu nsɛm dza ohia kɛse no wɔakyerɛw no Nephi ne mprɛtse no do.
Na afei, osiandɛ nsɛm a woekrukye no Nephi ne mprɛtse no do no yɛ ndzɛmba a no ho hia kɛse a ofi me nyansaa mu ntsi, mebɛma nkorɔfo enya ho nyimdzee wɔ dɛm nsɛm yi mu—
Dɛm ntsi, kyerɛ nkrukye no a ɔwɔ Nephi ne mprɛtse no do no ase, hyɛ ase na fa kɛpem ɔhen Benjamin n’ahendzi do, anaadɛ fa kɛpem dza akyerɛ ase no a, ɔwɔ wo hɔ no do;
Na hwɛ, fa pue guado dɛ ɔyɛ Nephi n’abakɔsɛm; na hwɛ mebɛma hɔn a wɔasesã me nsɛm no hɔn enyim egu ase.
Meremma kwan mma wɔnnsɛɛ m’edwuma; nyew, mebɛma woehu dɛ me nyansaa sõ sen abɔnsam ne ndaadaa.
Hwɛ, Nephi ne nsɛm no mu kakra ara, anaadɛ dza otwitwaa no esinesin no ara na wɔwɔ.

Hwɛ, ndzɛmba pii a ɔma wohu m’asɛmpa no mu yie no, woekrukye no Nephi ne mprɛtse no do; dɛm ntsi, osian nyansa a ɔwɔ mo mu ntsi na mese kyerɛ dza woekrukye no a ɔwɔ Nephi ne mprɛtse no do ne fã a odzi kan no ase, na fa kã dɛm dwumadzi yi ho.
Na, hwɛ, edwuma yi mu dza ɔaka ekyir nyinara mu na m’asɛmpa nyinara no a mo nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn, nyew, nye m’esuafo so, bɔɔ mpaa dɛ wɔpɛ dɛ dɔm yi hɔn nsa kã no wɔ.
Na mesee hɔn dɛ, wɔdze bɛma hɔn dɛ mbrɛ hɔn gyedzi a ɔwɔ hɔn mpaabɔ mu tse;
Nyew, na iyi nye hɔn gyedzi—dɛ m’asɛmpa a, medze maa hɔn dɛ wɔnkã wɔ hɔn aber do no, hɔn nuanom Lamanfo, nye hɔn so a osian hɔn etuatsew ntsi wɔbɛyɛɛ Lamanfo no nyina nsa bɛkã.
Afei, nnyɛ ne nyinara nye yi—hɔn gyedzi a ɔwɔ hɔn mpaabɔ mu nye dɛ sɛ ɔba no dɛ aman bi so bɛtsena asaase yi do a, wɔbɛma nkorɔfo so atse asɛmpa yi no;
Na dɛm ntsi, wɔnam mpaabɔ mu gyaa nhyira wɔ asaase yi do, ama obiara a ɔbɛgye dɛm asɛmpa yi edzi wɔ asaase yi do no eenya onnyiewiei nkwa;
Nyew, ama ɔman, ebusuakuw, kasa horow, anaa nyimpa biara eenya no kwa.
Na afei, hwɛ, osian hɔn gyedzi a ɔwɔ hɔn mpaabɔ mu ntsi, mebɛma mo nkorɔfo enya dɛm asɛmpa yi ho nyimdzee. Hwɛ, meremmfa mmbɛsɛɛ dza woenya no, na mbom ɔbɛyɛ ntowdo dze ama hɔn.
Na iyi ho ntsi na maakã dɛ: Sɛ ebusuasantsen yi emmpirim hɔn akoma a, mebɛkyekyer m’asɔr wɔ hɔn mu.
Afei mennkã iyi mmfa nnsɛɛ m’asɔr, na mbom mekã iyi dze tow m’asɔr do;
Dɛm ntsi, obiara a ɔwɔ m’asɔr mu no onnyi dɛ osuro, na woyinom na wobenya ɔsor ahenman no edzi.

Mbom woyinom na wonnsuro me, na wonndzi me mbrasɛm do na mbom wɔkyekyer asɔrasɔr ma hɔnho dze enya hɔnho, nyew, nye hɔn a wɔyɛ emumuyɛdze na wɔkyekyer abɔnsam n’ahenman no—nyew, nokwar, nokwar, mese wo dɛ woyinom na mebɛhaw hɔn, na mebɛma hɔnho apopo na wɔawosow akɔ hɔn mu.
Hwɛ, emi nye Jesus Christ, Nyame ne Ba no. Mebaa mankasa medze hɔ, na mankasa medze anngye me.
Emi nye kan a ɔhyerɛn wɔ sum mu, na sum no annkyer no.
Emi na mekãa dɛ—Mowɔ nguan binom so a wonnyi nguanbuw yi mu—mekãa kyerɛɛ m’esuafo, na pii wɔ hɔ a wɔanntse me ase.
Na mebɛma nkorɔfo ehu dɛ mowɔ nguan binom so, na wɔyɛ Jacob fi abaw no bi;
Na medze hɔn ahobow ndwuma a, wɔyɛe wɔ me dzin mu no bɛba kan mu;

Nyew, na medze m’asɛmpa no a wɔkãa kyerɛɛ hɔn no so bopue kan mu, na, hwɛ, wɔrommpow dza wo nsa akã yi, na mbom wɔbɔtow do, na wɔdze me nkyerɛkyerɛ ho nokwar botae no bopue kan mu, nyew, nkyerɛkyerɛ kortoo a ɔwɔ mu no.

Na dɛm na mebɛyɛ dze ada m’asɛmpa no edzi, amma wentwiwentwi pii ammba; nyew, Satan nunu nkorɔfo hɔn akoma ma wɔdze wentwiwentwi ba a ɔfa me nkyerɛkyerɛ no botae ho; na wɔfom wɔ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom ho, ntsi wɔdandan kyerɛwsɛm no na wɔnntse ase.
Dɛm ntsi, mubobue dɛm esumadze kɛse yi enyi do akyerɛ hɔn;
Na, hwɛ, sɛ woemmpirim hɔn akoma a, mobɔboaboa hɔn ano dɛ mbrɛ akokɔbaatan boaboa ne mba ano hyɛ ne ntsaban ase no.
Nyew, sɛ wɔpɛ dɛ wɔba a, wobotum na wɔabɛfa nkwa nsu no kwa.
Hwɛ, iyi nye me nkyerɛkyerɛ—obiara a onu noho na ɔba mo hɔ no, onyia no yɛ m’asɔrba.
Obiara a ɔdze bi bɛkã iyi ho anaa obeyi bi efi mu no nnyɛ medze, na mbom otsia me; dɛm ntsi ɔnnyɛ m’asɔrba.
Na afei, hwɛ, hɔn a wɔkã m’asɔr ho, na wotsim m’asɔr mu kodu ewiei no, na medze hɔn besi me ɔbotan do, na hɛl mbobow no nnkenya tum wɔ hɔn do.
Na afei, kaa nyia ɔno nye wiadze nkwa nye kan no, wo Pomfo, w’Ewuradze nye wo Nyankopɔn ne nsɛm no. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/11.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 11
chapter_summary: 1–6, Edwumayɛfo a wɔwɔ wenyin ture no mu no benya nkwagye; 7–14, Per hwehwɛ nyansa, bɔ nnuho ho dawur, twer Sunsum no; 15–22, Dzi mbrasɛm no do, na sũa Ewuradze n’asɛm no; 23–27, Mma mpow nyikyerɛ sunsum nye nkɔnhyɛ no; 28–30, Hɔn a wɔgye Christ no bɛyɛ Nyankopɔn ne mba.

verses.text: Dwumadzi a ɔsõ na ɔyɛ ahobow bi rubopue adasamba mu.
Hwɛ, meyɛ Nyame; hom ntsie m’asɛm a nkwa na tum wɔ mu no, ɔyɛ ndam sen nkrantsee anofanu, na ohwira mu kodu dɛ ɔpaapaa akwaa nye ehuon nyina mu; dɛm ntsi, hom ntsie m’asɛm.

Hwɛ, haban no ahoa na twaber no asõ; dɛm ntsi obiara a ɔpɛ dɛ otwa no, wɔmma ɔmfa n’ahoɔdzen ntow ne kantankrankye na ontwa ber a adzekyee wɔ do yi, ama ɔakora nkwagye a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem dze ama ne kra wɔ Nyame n’ahenman no mu.
Nyew, obiara a ɔbɔtow ne kantankrankye na oetwa no, ɔnoara na Nyame afrɛ no.
Dɛm ntsi, sɛ ibisa me a wo nsa bɛkã; sɛ ebɔ mu a wobobue ama wo.
Afei, ber a hom ebisa yi, hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, hom ndzi me mbrasɛm do, na hom mper dɛ hom bɛkyekyer Zion.
Mma hom mmper nnhwehwɛ ahonya na mbom hom nhwehwɛ nyansa; na, hwɛ, wɔbɛda Nyame n’esumasɛm edzi akyerɛ hom, na nkyii wɔbɛyɛ hom ahonyafo. Hwɛ, nyia ɔwɔ onnyiewiei nkwa no yɛ ɔhonyanyi.
Nokwar, nokwar, mese wo dɛ dza epɛ dɛ inya fi mo hɔ no, wɔbɛyɛ ama wo; na sɛ epɛ a, wobodua wo do ayɛ papa pii wɔ dɛm ebusuasantsen yi mu.
Mma nnkã hwee, mbom nnuho nko ho asɛm na kã kyerɛ dɛm ebusuasantsen yi. Dzi me mbrasɛm do, na boa ma wɔnyɛ m’edwuma, dɛ mbrɛ me mbrasɛm kyerɛ, na wobehyira wo.
Hwɛ, ewɔ akyɛdze, anaadɛ ibenya akyɛdze, sɛ edze gyedzi nye akoma a no mu tsew bisa me na egye Jesus Christ no tum no dzi, anaadɛ no tum a ɔrekasa kyerɛ wo yi dzi a;
Na, hwɛ, emi na merekasa no; hwɛ, emi nye kan a ɔhyerɛn wɔ sum mu, na mudua mo tum do dze me nsɛm yinom ma wo.
Na, afei, nokwar, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, fa wo werɛ hyɛ Sunsum no a ogya wo ma eyɛ papa—nyew, ma ɔma idzi pɛrpɛr, ɔma enantsew ahobrɛadze mu, ɔma ibu atsɛn tsenenee; na iyi nye mo Sunsum.
Nokwar, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, medze mo Sunsum ne kyɛfa bɛma wo, dza obobue w’adwen mu, dza ɔdze dɛw bɛhyɛ wo kra mã;
Na afei ibohu, anaadɛ ɔnam iyi do ibohu dɛ adze nyinara a ibebisa efi mo hɔ no, dza ɔyɛ tsenenee ndzɛmba no, sɛ egye me dzi a wo nsa bɛkã.
Hwɛ, mehyɛ wo dɛ mma nnsusu dɛ wɔafrɛ wo dɛ kã asɛmpa no, kesi dɛ wɔbɛfrɛ wo.
Tweɔn kakra, kesi dɛ ibenya m’asɛm, mo botan, m’asɔr nye m’asɛmpa no, ama eetum ehu dɛ me nkyerɛkyerɛ no yɛ nokwar.
Na afei, hwɛ, dɛ mbrɛ wo pɛ tse no, nyew, dɛ mbrɛ wo gyedzi so tse mpo no, wɔbɛyɛ ama wo.
Dzi me mbrasɛm do; mua w’ano; na bisa mo Sunsum no;
Nyew, fa w’akoma nyina bɛtakyer me, ama eetum aboa ma wɔdze ndzɛmba a wɔakã ho asɛm nyina no epue kan mu—nyew, m’edwuma ne nkyerɛase no; nya abotar kesi dɛ ibowie iyi yɛ.
Hwɛ, iyi nye w’edwuma, dɛ ibedzi me mbrasɛm do, nyew edze w’ahom, w’adwen nye w’ahoɔdzen nyina.

Mma mmper nnhwehwɛ dɛ ebɛkã m’asɛm no, na mbom dzi kan per hwehwɛ dɛ ibenya m’asɛm no, na nkyii wobesian wo tɛkyerɛma; nkyii, sɛ epɛ a, ibenya mo Sunsum nye m’asɛm no, nyew, Nyame no tum no a wɔdze kasa ma nkorɔfo gye dzi no.

Mbom sesei mua w’ano; sũa m’asɛm no a woepue adasamba mu no, na sũa m’asɛm no so a ɔbɛba adasamba hɔ no, dza wogu do rekyerɛ ase no, nyew, kesi dɛ wo nsa bɛkã dza medze bɛma adasamba a wɔwɔ ebusuasantsen yi mu nyinara no, na nkyii wɔdze ndzɛmba nyinara so bɛkã ho.
Hwɛ, ɔwo nye Hyrum, me babanyin, per hwehwɛ Nyame n’ahenman no, na wɔdze ndzɛmba nyinara bɛkã ho dɛ ɔsɛ.
Tow wɔ mo botan do, dza ɔyɛ m’asɛmpa no;
Mma mmpow nyikyerɛ sunsum, anaadɛ nkɔnhyɛ sunsum no, na nyia ɔpow ndzɛmba yinom ndue;
Dɛm ntsi, kora no wɔ w’akoma mu kesi aber a menam me nyansaa do bɛse wo dɛ kɔ.
Hwɛ, mekasa kyerɛ hɔn a wɔwɔ pɛ pa nyinara, na wɔatow hɔn kantankrankye dɛ worutwa no.
Hwɛ, emi nye Jesus Christ, Nyame ne Ba no. Emi nye nkwa nye wiadze kan no.
Emi nye nyia ɔbaa nankasa nedze nkyɛn na nankasa nedze anngye no no;
Mbom, nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, dodowara a wɔgye me no, mebɛma hɔn tum ma wɔabɛyɛ Nyame ne mba, hɔn a wɔgye me dzin dzi no mpo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/12.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 12
chapter_summary: 1–6, Edwumayɛfo a wɔwɔ wenyin ture no mu benya nkwagye; 7–9, Hɔn a wɔpɛ nyinara na wɔfata no botum aboa Ewuradze n’edwuma.

verses.text: Dwumadzi a ɔsõ na ɔyɛ ahobow bi rubopue adasamba mu.
Hwɛ, meyɛ Nyame; hom ntsie m’asɛm a nkwa na tum wɔ mu no, ɔyɛ ndam sen nkrantsee anofanu, na ohwira mu kodu dɛ ɔpaapaa akwaa nye ehuon nyina mu; dɛm ntsi hom ntsie m’asɛm.

Hwɛ, haban no ahoa na twaber no asõ, dɛm ntsi obiara a ɔpɛ dɛ otwa no wɔmma, ɔmfa n’ahoɔdzen ntow ne kantankrankye na ontwa wɔ ber a adzekyee wɔ do yi, ama ɔakora nkwagye a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem dze ama ne kra wɔ Nyame n’ahenman no mu.
Nyew, obiara a ɔbɔtow ne kantankrankye na oetwa no, ɔnoara na Nyame afrɛ no.
Dɛm ntsi, sɛ ibisa a wo nsa bɛkã, sɛ ebɔ mu a wobobue ama wo.
Afei, ber a hom ebisa yi, hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, hom ndzi me mbrasɛm do, na hom mper dɛ hom bɛkyekyer Zion.
Na, hwɛ, mekasa kyerɛ ɔwo nye hɔn a wɔwɔ pɛ dɛ wɔbɔboa ma dwumadzi yi epue guado no na woetsim yie;

Na obiara nnkotum aboa dwumadzi yi, gyedɛ nyia ɔbrɛ noho adze na ɔdɔ ahyɛ no mã, ɔwɔ gyedzi, enyidado, na ɔyɛ ayamuyie, na ɔyɛ ntoboase wɔ ndzɛmba nyinara mu, ɔfa no biribiara a wɔdze bɛhyɛ ne nsa no.
Hwɛ, emi nye kan nye wiadze nkwa, na merekã dɛm nsɛm yi, dɛm ntsi fa w’ahom tsie, na nkyii wɔbɛfrɛ wo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/13.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 13
chapter_summary: Ɔdze Aaron Asɔfodzi ne nsaafee na tum no to gua.

verses.text: Me mfɛfo asomfo, wɔ Messiah ne dzin mu medze Aaron Asɔfodzi no ma hom, dza okitsa abɔfo hɔn som, nye nnuho asɛmpa no, na nsumuhyɛ enuma a wɔdze kɔ bɔnfakyɛ mu no ne nsaafee; na wonnkeyi iyi efi asaase do bio da, kesi dɛ Levi mbabanyin bɔbɔ afɔr bio dze ama Ewuradze wɔ tseneneeyɛ mu.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/14.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 14
chapter_summary: 1–6, Edwumayɛfo a wɔwɔ wenyin ture no mu no benya nkwagye; 7–8, Onnyiewiei nkwa nye Nyame n’akyɛdze no mu dza ɔyɛ kɛse; 9–11, Christ na ɔbɔɔ sor na asaase.

verses.text: Dwumadzi a ɔsõ na ɔyɛ ahobow rubopue adasamba mu.
Hwɛ, meyɛ Nyame; hom ntsie m’asɛm a nkwa na tum wɔ mu no, ɔyɛ ndam sen nkrantsee anofanu, na ohwira mu kodu dɛ ɔpaapaa akwaa nye ehuon nyina mu, dɛm ntsi hom tsie m’asɛm.

Hwɛ, haban no ahoa na twaber no asõ; dɛm ntsi, obiara a ɔpɛ dɛ otwa no, wɔmma ɔmfa n’ahoɔdzen ntow ne kantankrankye na ontwa ber a adzekyee wɔ do yi, ama ɔakora nkwagye a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem dze ama ne kra wɔ Nyame n’ahenman no mu.
Nyew, obiara a ɔbɔtow ne kantankrankye na oetwa no, ɔnoara na Nyame afrɛ no.
Dɛm ntsi, sɛ ibisa me a, wo nsa bɛkã; sɛ ebɔ mu a wobobue ama wo.
Hom mper dɛ hom bɛkyekyer me Zion. Dzi me mbrasɛm do wɔ adze nyinara mu.
Na sɛ idzi me mbrasɛm do na itsim kodu ewiei a ibenya onnyiewiei nkwa, akyɛdze a ɔsõ sen Nyame n’akyɛdze nyina.

Na ɔbɛba dɛ, sɛ ibisa Egya no wɔ me dzin mu wɔ gyedzi mu na egye dzi a, ibenya Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no a okenyan wo ma ekasa, ama eegyina ayɛ ndzɛmba a ebɛtse nye dza ibohu nyina ho dasefo, na eso dɛ aabɔ nnuho ho dawur akyerɛ ebusuasantsen yi.
Hwɛ, emi nye Jesus Christ, Nyame tseasefo ne Ba no, nyia ɔbɔɔ ɔsorsor nye asaase, kan a sum nnkotum akata do;
Dɛm ntsi, ɔwɔ dɛ mefa me asɛmpa ne mãhyɛ no fi Amanamamfo hɔ dze brɛ Israel fifo.
Na, hwɛ, ɔwo nye David, ɔafrɛ wo dɛ bɔboa; na sɛ eyɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yi, na eyɛ nokwafo a, obehyira wo wɔ sunsum nye honam mu nyina, na w’akatua bɛyɛ kɛse. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/15.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 15
chapter_summary: 1–2, Ewuradze n’abasa kata asaase nyina do; 3–6, Ebɛkã asɛmpa no na agye akra nkwa no nye adze a ɔsom bo kɛse.

verses.text: Yɛ aso, m’akowaa John, na tsie Jesus Christ, w’Ewuradze na wo Pomfo no ne nsɛm.
Na hwɛ, medze ndamyɛ na tum kasa kyerɛ wo, osiandɛ m’abasa kata asaase nyina do.
Na mebɛkã nsɛm a obiara nnyim kã emi nye ɔwo nko ho akyerɛ wo—
Na mber pii na apɛ dɛ ihu adze a ɔbɔsom wo bo kɛse efi mo hɔ,
Hwɛ, nhyira akã wo wɔ dɛm adze yi ho, dɛ erekã m’asɛm a medze ama wo, dɛ mbrɛ me mbrasɛm se no.
Na afei, hwɛ, mese wo dɛ, adze a ɔbɔsom wo bo kɛse ama wo nye dɛ ebɔbɔ nnuho ho dawur akyerɛ nkorɔfo yi, ama aatwe akra abrɛ me, ama enye hɔn aahom wɔ m’Egya n’ahenman no mu. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/16.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 16
chapter_summary: 1–2, Ewuradze n’abasa kata asaase nyina do; 3–6, Ebɛka asɛmpa no na agye akra nkwa no nye adze a ɔsom bo kɛse.

verses.text: Yɛ aso, m’akowaa Peter, na tsie Jesus Christ, w’Ewuradze na wo Pomfo no ne nsɛm.
Na, hwɛ, medze ndamyɛ nye tum kasa kyerɛ wo, osiandɛ m’abasa kata asaase nyina do.
Na mebɛkã nsɛm a nyimpa biara nnyim kã emi nye ɔwo nko ho akyerɛ wo—
Na mber pii na apɛ dɛ ibohu adze a ɔbɔsom wo bo kɛse efi mo hɔ,
Hwɛ nhyira akã wo wɔ dɛm adze yi ho, dɛ erekã me nsɛm a medze ama wo no, dɛ mbrɛ me mbrasɛm se.
Na afei, hwɛ, mese wo dɛ, adze a ɔbɔsom wo bo kɛse ama wo nye dɛ ebɔbɔ nnuho ho dawur dze akyerɛ nkorɔfo yi, ama aatwe akra abrɛ me, ama enye hɔn aahom wɔ m’Egya n’ahenman no mu. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/17.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 17
chapter_summary: 1–4, Adasegyefo Baasa no nam gyedzi do bohu mprɛtse no nye ndzɛmba krɔnkrɔn binom so; 5–9, Christ gye dase dɛ Mormon Nwoma no fi Nyame hɔ.

verses.text: Hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, hom ntwer m’asɛm, na sɛ hom dze hom akoma nyina yɛ iyi a, hom bɔhwɛ mprɛtse no, nye akatabo no, Laban ne nkrantsee no, Urim na Thummim no a wɔdze maa Jared no nuabanyin no wɔ bepɔw no do no, wɔ ber a ɔnye Ewuradze kasaa enyim na enyim no, nye akyerɛakwan nwanwa no a wɔdze maa Lehi ber a nna ɔwɔ sar no do, wɔ Po Memen n’egya no.
Na ɔnam hom gyedzi do na hom bɔhwɛ ndzɛmba yinom, gyedzi a ɔtse dɛ dza tsetse nkɔnhyɛfo no mpo nyae no.
Na ber a hom enya gyedzi ekyir no na hom dze hom enyi ehu dɛm ndzɛmba yinom no, hom nam Nyame no tum do bɛgye ho dase.
Na iyi na hom bɛyɛ amma wɔaannsɛɛ m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, ama menam dɛm dwumadzi yi do dze me nhyehyɛɛ tsenenee aba adasamba mu.
Na hom bɛgye dase dɛ hom ehu dɛm ndzɛmba yinom, dɛ mbrɛ m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba so ehu no; na ɔnam mo tum do hunii, osiandɛ ɔwɔ gyedzi.
Nna ɔakyerɛ nwoma no ase, dɛm afã no mpo a mehyɛɛ no no, na dɛ mbrɛ hom Ewuradze na hom Nyankopɔn tse ase yi, ɔyɛ nokwar.
Dɛm ntsi, hom nsa akã tum kor noara, na gyedzi kor noara, nye akyɛdze kor noara tse dɛ ma ɔwɔ no.
Na sɛ hom dzi me mbrasɛm a odzi ewiei yinom do, dza medze ama hom no do a, hɛl mbobow no nnkenya tum wɔ hom do; osiandɛ m’adom dɔɔ sõ ma hom, na wɔbɛma hom do wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu.
Na emi, Jesus Christ, hom Ewuradze na hom Nyankopɔn no na makasa akyerɛ hom no, ama medze me nhyehyɛɛ tsenenee aaba adasamba mu. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/18.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 18
chapter_summary: 1–5, Kyerɛwsɛm kyerɛ mbrɛ wonsi nkyekyer Asɔr no; 6–8, emumuyɛ rodɔɔ sõ wɔ wiadze; 9–16, Akra som bo kɛse; 17–25, Sɛ nyimpa benya nkwagye a, ɔwɔ dɛ wɔfa Christ ne dzin to hɔn do; 26–36, Woyi Duebien no a wɔbɛfrɛ hɔn no nye dwuma a wobedzi no kyerɛ; 37–39, Oliver Cowdery na David Whitmer na ɔwɔ dɛ wɔhwehwɛ Duebien no; 40–47, Nyimpa benya nkwagye a, ɔwɔ dɛ wonu hɔnho, wonuma hɔn na wodzi mbrasɛm no do.

verses.text: Na, hwɛ, osian adze a ɔwo m’akowaa Oliver Cowdery, epɛ dɛ ihu fi mo hɔ ntsi, medze dɛm nsɛm yi ma wo;
Hwɛ, menam mo Sunsum do edua akwan pii do ada no edzi akyerɛ wo dɛ ndzɛmba a akyerɛw no yɛ nokwar.
Na sɛ inyim dɛ ɔyɛ nokwar a, hwɛ, merema wo mbrasɛm, dɛ fa wo werɛ twer ndzɛmba no a wɔakyerɛw no;
Na no mu na ndzɛmba nyina a wɔakyerɛw a ɔfa m’asɔr ne fapem, m’asɛmpa, nye mo botan ho no wɔ.
Dɛm ntsi, sɛ ekyekyer m’asɔr wɔ m’asɛmpa nye mo botan ne fapem do a, hɛl mbobow no nnkenya tum wɔ wo do.
Hwɛ, emumuyɛ rodɔɔ so wɔ wiadze; dɛm ntsi ohia dɛ wokenyan adasamba ma wonu hɔnho, Amanamamfo nye Israel fifo nyinara.
Dɛm ntsi, sɛ m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, enuma wo dɛ mbrɛ mehyɛɛ no no a, nna ɔahyɛ dza mehyɛɛ no no mã.

Na afei, mma ɔnnyɛ wo ahobow dɛ mafrɛ wo wɔ mankasa me siantsir bi ntsi, siantsir a monko na minyim; dɛm ntsi, sɛ ɔbɔ mbɔdzen dzi me mbrasɛm do a, wobehyira no akɔ onnyiewiei nkwa mu; na ne dzin nye Joseph.

Na afei, Oliver Cowdery, mekasa kyerɛ ɔwo nye David Whitmer so, wɔ mbrasɛm kwan do; na, hwɛ, mehyɛ nyimpa nyinara a wɔwɔ beebiara dɛ wonnu hɔnho, na mekasa kyerɛ wo, dɛ mbrɛ mekasaa kyerɛɛ mo ɔsomafo Paul no, na frɛ a medze frɛɛ no no na medze afrɛ wo.
Hom nkaa dɛ akra som bo kɛse wɔ Nyame enyim;
Na, hwɛ, Ewuradze wo Pomfo wui wɔ honam mu, dɛm ntsi ɔsɔɔw adasa nyinara hɔn yaw, ama adasa nyinara eenu hɔnho na wɔaaba no hɔ.
Na ɔasoɛr bio efi ewufo mu, ama ɔanam nnuhu ngyinado do, ɔaatwe adasa nyinara aba no hɔ.
Na mbrɛ n’enyigye si dɔɔ sõ wɔ ɔkra kor a onu noho no a!
Dɛm ntsi, wɔafrɛ hom dɛ, wɔmbɔ nnuho ho dawur nkyerɛ nkorɔfo yi.
Na sɛ ɔba dɛ hom dze hom nda nyina bɔ nnuho ho dawur kyerɛ nkorɔfo yi na hom dze ɔkra kor mpo brɛ me a, mbrɛ hom bodua nye no edzi dɛw kɛse wɔ m’Egya n’ahenman no mu a!
Na afei, sɛ hom dɛw bɔdɔɔ sõ wɔ ɔkra kor a hom dze no abrɛ me wɔ m’Egya n’ahenman mu ho a, nna sɛ edze akra pii brɛ me a, nna hom enyigye ne kɛse bɛyɛ dɛn!
Hwɛ, m’asɛmpa, nye mo botan, nye mo nkwagye na ɔda hom enyim yi.
Hom mbisa Egya no wɔ me dzin mu na hom ngye ndzi, dɛ hom nsa bɛkã, na hom benya Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no a ɔda ndzɛmba a no ho hia edzi kyɛrɛ adasamba nyina no.
Na sɛ hom nnyi gyedzi, enyidado nye ayamuyie a, hom runntum nnyɛ hwee.
Mma hom nnye asɔr biara nndzi aper gyedɛ dza ɔyɛ abɔnsam n’asɔr nko.
Hom mfa Christ ne dzin nto hom do, na hom nkã nokwar wɔ botooyɛ mu.
Na dodowara a wonu hɔnho na wonuma hɔn wɔ me dzin mu, a ɔyɛ Jesus Christ no, na wotsim kodu ewiei no, hɔn na wɔbɛgye hɔn nkwa.
Hwɛ, Jesus Christ nye dzin a Egya no dze ama, na dzin biara nnyi hɔ bio a wɔdze ama a wɔnam do bɛgye nyimpa nkwa;
Dɛm ntsi, nyimpa nyinara wɔ dɛ wɔfa dzin a Egya no dze ama no to hɔn do, osiandɛ dɛm dzin no na wɔdze bɛfrɛ hɔn wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu;
Dɛm ntsi, sɛ wonnyim dzin a wɔdze frɛ hɔn a, worinnya tsenabew wɔ m’Egya n’ahenman no mu.
Na, afei, hwɛ, binom wɔ hɔ a wɔafrɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnda m’asɛmpa no edzi nkyerɛ Amanamamfo nye Jewfo no mu biara;
Nyew, Duebien no mpo, na Duebien no bɛyɛ m’esuafo, na wɔdze me dzin bɔto hɔn do; na Duebien no nye hɔn a wɔbɛpɛ dɛ woyi hɔn akoma mu fa me dzin to hɔn do.
Na sɛ wɔpɛ dɛ woyi hɔn akoma mu fa me dzin to hɔn do a, nna wɔafrɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnkɔ wiadze nyinara mu nkɛkã m’asɛmpa no nkyerɛ abɔdze nyinara.
Na hɔn nye nkorɔfo a mahyɛ hɔn asɔfo dɛ wonnuma wɔ me dzin mu; dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no;
Na hom wɔ dza wɔakyerɛw no wɔ hom nkyɛn; dɛm ntsi, ɔwɔ dɛ hom dzi dwuma no dɛ mbrɛ m’asɛm a wɔakyerɛw no se.
Na afei mekasa kyerɛ hom Duebien yi dɛ—Hom nhwɛ, m’adom dɔɔ sõ ma hom; ɔwɔ dɛ hom nantsew tɔɔtsen wɔ m’enyim, na mma hom nnyɛ bɔn.

Na, hwɛ, hom nye nkorɔfo a mahyɛ hom asɔfo dɛ hom nhyɛ asɔfo na hom nyi akyerɛkyerɛfo; na hom nkã m’asɛmpa no, dɛ mbrɛ Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no tum a ɔwɔ hom mu no tse; na dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn n’akyɛdze nye ne frɛ a ɔdze frɛ adasa no tse;
Na emi, Jesus Christ, hom Ewuradze na hom Nyankopɔn no, na makã iyi.
Dɛm nsɛm yi mmfi ɔdasanyi biara, na mbom ofi mo hɔ; dɛm ntsi, hom ngye ho dase dɛ ofi mo hɔ, na ommfi nyimpa hɔ;
Na ɔyɛ me ndze na ɔkasa kyerɛ hom no; na mo Sunsum na ɔdze ama hom, na ɔnam mo tum do hom botum akenkan akyerɛ homho nkorkor; na sɛ nnyɛ mo tum a nkyɛ hom nsa rennkã;
Dɛm ntsi, hom botum agye dase dɛ hom atse me ndze, na hom nyim me nsɛm.
Na afei, hwɛ, medze ma ɔwo Oliver Cowdery na David Whitmer so dɛ, hom nhwehwɛ Duebien no a wobenya pɛ a makã ho asɛm no;
Na wɔnam hɔn pɛ nye hɔn ndwuma do na hom dze bohu hɔn.
Na sɛ hom hu hɔn a, hom mfa ndzɛmba yinom nkyerɛ hɔn.
Na hom nkotow na hom nsɔr mma Egya no wɔ me dzin mu.
Na hom nkã asɛm no nkyerɛ nyimpa a wɔwɔ wiadze dɛ: Ɔwɔ dɛ hom nu homho na wonuma hom wɔ Jesus Christ ne dzin mu;
Na ɔwɔ dɛ nyimpa nyina nu hɔnho na wonuma hɔn, na nnyɛ mbanyin nko, na mbom mbasiafo nye mbofra a woedu nkontaabu ber.
Na afei, hom nsa akã iyi ekyir no, hom ndzi me mbrasɛm do wɔ adze nyinara mu;
Na mubodua hom nsa do ayɛ ahobow dwuma wɔ adasamba mu, ma woeehu hɔn bɔn pii no, ama woeenya nnuho na woeetum aba m’Egya n’ahenman no mu.
Dɛm ntsi, nhyira a medze ma hom no bor adze nyinara do.
Na hom nsa akã iyi ekyir no, sɛ hom enndzi me mbrasɛm do a, wɔrenngye hom nkwa wɔ m’Egya n’ahenman no mu.
Hwɛ, emi Jesus Christ, hom Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn, na hom Pomfo, menam mo Sunsum no tum do na makã iyi. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/19.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 19
chapter_summary: 1–3, Christ wɔ tum nyina; 4–5, Nyimpa nyinara wɔ dɛ wonu hɔnho annyɛ dɛm a, wobohu amandze; 6–12, Onnyiewiei ntsẽa yɛ Nyankopɔn ne ntsẽa; 13–20, Christ hun amandze maa obiara, ama sɛ wonu hɔnho a, woeennhu amandze; 21–28, Kã nnuho asɛmpa no; 29–41, Bɔ asɛmpa no dawur.

verses.text: Emi nye Alpha na Omega, Ewuradze Christ no; nyew, emi nye ɔno, ahyɛse na ewiei no, wiadze Pomfo no.
Emi, na maayɛ meewie nyia meyɛ nedze no ne pɛ, Egya no mpo, dza ɔfa moho no—maayɛ ndzɛmba nyina ama medze ne nyina ahyɛ mo tum ase—

Mowɔ tum nyina, dza medze bɛsɛɛ Satan nye no ndwuma wɔ wiadze ewiei mu mpo, na atsɛmbu da kɛse a odzi ewiei mu no, medze bɛba adasamba do, mubobu ɔdasanyi biara atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ n’edwuma nye ndwuma a ɔayɛ tse.
Na nokwar, ɔdasanyi biara wɔ dɛ onu noho annyɛ dɛm a obohu amandze, na emi Nyankopɔn minnyi ewiei,
Dɛm ntsi, mennkantse m’atsɛmbu a medze bɛba no, mbom mbusu bɛba, osũ, kwadwomtwa, nye asetwɛr, nyew, na ɔbɛba hɔn a wobohu hɔn wɔ me nsa bankum no do.
Naaso, wɔnnkyerɛɛw dɛ ahohyehye yi remmba ewiei, mbom wɔakyerɛw no dɛ ɔyɛ ahohyehye a onnyi ewiei.
Bio wɔakyerɛw no dɛ ɔyɛ afɔdzi a onnyiewiei, dɛm ntsi wɔakyerɛkyerɛ mu koraa sen kyerɛwsɛm nkaa no, ama wɔaabɔ mu ayɛ edwuma wɔ adasamba hɔn akoma mu wɔ me dzin n’enyimnyam ntsi.
Dɛm ntsi, merebɛkyerɛ esumasɛm yi mu akyerɛ hom, osiandɛ oye ma hom dɛ hom hu tse dɛ m’esuafo noara.
Mekasa kyerɛ hom a wɔasan mu eyi hom wɔ dɛm adze yi mu, dɛ nyimpa kor ama hom eetum ahɛn m’ahomgye mu.
Na, hwɛ, mbrɛ nyamesu ho esumasɛm mu si dɔɔ sõ a! Na, hwɛ, minnyi ewiei, na ntsẽa a ofi me nsamu ba no yɛ ntsẽa a onnyi ewiei osiandɛ Onnyi Ewiei nye me dzin. Dɛm ntsi—
Ntsẽa onnyiewiei yɛ Nyame ne ntsẽa.
Ntsẽa a onnyi ewiei yɛ Nyame ne ntsẽa.
Dɛm ntsi, mehyɛ wo dɛ nu wo ho, na dzi mbrasɛm a wo nsa akã efi m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, hɔ wɔ me dzin mu no do;
Na ɔnam mo tum kɛse do na wo nsa akã;

Dɛm ntsi mehyɛ wo dɛ nu woho—nu woho, ɔno medze m’anomu abaa bɔhwe wo, na m’ebufuhyew na m’ebufuw, ama w’amandzehu ayɛ yaw—mbrɛ ne yaw tse no, innyim, mbrɛ ne yaw ne kɛse so tse no innyim, nyew, mbrɛ ne dzen tse so innyim.
Na, hwɛ, emi Nyankopɔn, meehu amandze yinom dze ama obiara, ama sɛ wonu hɔnho a, woennhu amandze,
Mbom sɛ woennu hɔnho a ɔwɔ dɛ wohu amandze dɛ mbrɛ emi mpo muhunii no;

Amandzehu a ɔmaa emi a meyɛ Nyame a mo sõ sen obiara mpo no, moho popoe, osian yaw ntsi, na bɔgya fii mo honandua enyi nyina kyĩi, na muhun amandze wɔ honam nye sunsum mu—na mepɛɛ dɛ nkyɛ monnkɔnom kuraba wenwen no ano na mawodow—
Naaso, enyimnyam nkã Egya no, na monomee na muwiee mo mboaboaho biara yɛ dze maa adasamba.

Dɛm ntsi, mehyɛ wo bio dɛ nu wo ho, ɔno medze mo tum kɛse no bɛbrɛ wo adze; na akã wo bɔn akyerɛ, ɔno ibohu amandze wɔ ntsea a maakã ho asɛm no, dza no mu kumaabi, nyew, no mu ketseketse mpo a esɔe hwɛe wɔ ber a motwee mo Sunsum fii hɔ no.
Na mehyɛ wo dɛ mma hom nnkã nsɛm biara nnkyerɛ kã nnuho asɛm nko ho, na mma mmfa ndzɛmba yinom nnkyerɛ wiadze kesi dɛ ɔbɛyɛ enyansadze ama me.
Osiandɛ worunntum nndzi nam sesei, mbom ɔwɔ dɛ wonya numfonsu; dɛm ntsi, ɔnnsɛ dɛ wohu ndzɛmba yinom, amma wɔaannhera.
Suã me, na tsie me nsɛm, nantsew ɔdwe mu wɔ mo Sunsum mu, na ibenya asomdwee wɔ mo mu.
Emi nye Jesus Christ, menam Egya ne pɛ do bae, na ne pɛ na meyɛ.
Na bio, mehyɛ wo dɛ mma w’enyi mmber wo nyɛnko ne yer; anaa mmper dɛ ibeyi no nkwa efi hɔ.
Na bio, mehyɛ wo dɛ mma nnkata w’egyapadze do, na mbom fa ma kwa ma wɔmfa ntsintsim Mormon Nwoma no a nokwar na Nyame ne nsɛm wɔ mu no—

Dza ɔyɛ m’asɛm a medze ama Amanamamfo no mu biara, na ɔnnkɛkyɛr biara na oedu Jewfo a wɔyɛ Lamanfo hɔn nkaa no mu biara hɔn nkyɛn, ama wɔaagye asɛmpa no edzi, na wɔaannhwɛ Messiah bi a ɔbɛba kwan, na onyia no ɔaba dada.
Na bio, mehyɛ wo dɛ bue w’ano bɔ mpaa na bɔ no wɔ w’akoma mu so; nyew, wɔ wiadze enyim nye nsumaamu so, wɔ bagua mu nye kokoa mu so.
Na da enyigyesɛm no edzi, nyew, bɔ no dawur wɔ mbepɔw do, nye bea biara a ɔkrɔn do, nye nyimpa nyinara a wɔbɛma wo kwan ma ehu hɔn no mu.
Na fa ahobrɛadze nyina yɛ, na gye me dzi, na mma nnkã nsɛmbɔn nntsia hɔn a wɔkã nsɛmbɔn tsia wo no.
Na mma nnkã asɛmpa ne nkyerɛkyerɛ dza no mu dɔ no, ho hwee, na mbom kã nnuho ho asɛm nye gyedzi wɔ Agyenkwa no mu, nye bɔnfakyɛ a ofi enuma na ogya mu ba, nyew, ogya a ɔyɛ Sunsum Krɔnkɔn no.
Hwɛ, iyi nye mbrasɛm kɛse nye dza odzi ewiei a medze rebɛma wo a ɔfa dɛm asɛm yi ho; na iyi beye ama wo wɔ wo daa daa abrabɔ mu, dze ekesi wo bra n’ewiei mpo.
Na sɛ ibu afotu yinom tootooba a, awerɛhow na ɔbɛba wo do, nyew, wɔbɛsɛɛ ɔwo nye w’egyapadze so mpo.
Fa w’egyapadze bi ma, nyew, wo nsaase bi so mpo, nye adze nyina gyedɛ dza edze bɔhwɛ w’ebusua nko.
Tua kaw biara a enye nyia oritsintsim nwoma no edzi ano ma woesi no. Yi woho fi nkowaasom mu.
Gya wo dan nye wo fie wɔ hɔ, gyedɛ ber a epɛ dɛ hom hu hom ebusuafo;
Na gyaa woho kasa kyerɛ obiara; nyew, kã asɛmpa no, tu fo, na da nokwar no edzi, fa enyigye ndze kɛse tsea mu dɛ—Hosanna, hosanna, nhyira nkã Ewuradze Nyankopɔn ne dzin!
Bɔ mpaa aber nyina, na mubohue mo Sunsum egu wo do, na wo nhyira bɛyɛ kɛse—nyew, ɔbɛyɛ mbordo mpo akyɛn dɛ ibenya asaase do sika nye ahonyadze a ɔprɔw no.
Hwɛ, ana nnkotum akenkan iyi a irinndzi ehurusi na mma w’akoma do wɔ enyigye mu?
Anaadɛ nnkotum dɛ ebɔkɔdo botu mbirika ekyin dɛ ɔkwankyerɛfo furafo?
Anaadɛ nnkotum dɛ ebɛyɛ ahobrɛadze na adwe, na edzi woho nyi wɔ nyansa mu wɔ m’enyim? Nyew, bra mo hɔ, w’Agyenkwa no. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/20.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 20
chapter_summary: 1–16, Mormon Nwoma no kyerɛ mu pefee dɛ da a odzi ekyir dwumadzi no fi Nyame hɔ; 17–28, Osi nkyerɛkyerɛ a ɔfa abɔdze, asehwe, werdambɔ, na enuma ho no pi; 29–37, Mbra a ɔhwɛ nnuho, bemdzi, ahosan, na enuma do no nyina wɔ hɔ; 38–67, Woetwitwa elderfo, asɔfo, akyerɛkyerɛfo na deaconfo hɔn ndwuma ho asɛm esinesin; 68–74, Asɔrmba hɔn ndwuma, mbrɛ wonsi nhyira mbofra, nye mbrɛ wonsi nnuma nyina oeyi akyerɛ; 75–84, Wɔdze sakrament mpaabɔ na nhyehyɛɛ a wɔdze hwɛ Asɔrmba do no nyina ama.

verses.text: Christ N’Asɔr no nsoɛree wɔ nda a odzi ekyir yi mu, a ɔyɛ afe apem ahaawɔtwe eduasa, fi ber a hɛn Ewuradze na hɛn Agyenkwa Jesus Christ bae wɔ honam mu no, wɔyɛɛ nhyehyɛɛ na wosii no pi dɛ mbrɛ hɛn man ne mbra se, wɔ Nyankopɔn ne pɛ nye mbrasɛm kwan do, wɔ bosoom a otsĩa anan a wɔfrɛ no Ebɔbira ne da a otsĩa esia no mu—
Dɛm mbrasɛm yi wɔdze maa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, a Nyame frɛɛ no, na ɔhyɛɛ no Jesus Christ ɔsomafo, ma ɔbɛyɛɛ Asɔr yi ne elder a odzi kan.
Na Oliver Cowdery a no so Nyame frɛɛ no, Jesus Christ ɔsomafo, ma ɔbɛyɛɛ asɔr yi mu elder a otsĩa ebien, na ɔdze nsa guu no do hyɛɛ no sɔfo;
Na iyi nam hɛn Ewuradze na hɛn Agyenkwa Jesus Christ n’adom, ɔno na enyimnyam nyina nkã no, sesei nye afebɔɔ. Amen.
Na nkyii ɔdaa no edzi nokwar mu kyerɛɛ elder a odzi kan yi dɛ wɔdze no bɔn akyɛ no no, wiadze egyangyandze sanee kyekyeer no ho;

Mbom ber a onuu noho, na ɔbrɛɛ noho adze nokwar mu wɔ gyedzi mu no, Nyankopɔn somaa ɔbɔfo krɔnkrɔn bi ma ɔbaa ne nkyɛn, na ɔbɔfo no no hwɛbea tse dɛ enyinam, na ne ntar ho tsew na ɔyɛ fitaa sen adze fitaa biara;
Na ɔmaa no mbrasɛm a okenyaan no.
Na ɔmaa no tum a ofi sor, na odzii kan siesiee dɛ mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ a obodua do, ama oetum akyerɛ Mormon Nwoma no ase;
Dza nkorɔfo bi a wɔahwe ase hɔn ho abakɔsɛm na Jesus Christ n’asɛmpa ne mãhyɛ a ɔdze maa Amanamamfo nye Jewfo so wɔ mu;
Dza wɔnam nkenyan do dze mae, na wɔnam abɔfo hɔn som do sii no pi dze kyerɛɛ binom, na wɔbɔɔ no dawur dze kyerɛɛ wiadze—

Wɔyɛe ama wiadze eehu dɛ kyerɛwsɛm krɔnkrɔn no yɛ nokwar, na dɛ Nyame kenyan nyimpa na ɔfrɛ hɔn wɔ n’edwuma krɔnkrɔn ho wɔ mber yi na ebusuasantsen yi mu, dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛɛ no wɔ tsetseberdo ebusuasantsen no.
Dze kyerɛ dɛ ɔno nye Nyame kor no ara a ɔtse dɛm ndeda, ndɛ na afebɔɔ no. Amen.
Dɛm ntsi, wɔwɔ adasegyefo pii a, wobodua hɔn do ebu wiadze atsɛn, nye nyimpa dodow biara a wɔbɛba ebenya dɛm dwumadzi yi ho nyimdzee no so mpo.
Na hɔn a wɔdze gyedzi gye, na wɔyɛ ndwumatsenenee no benya onnyiewiei nkwa ahenkyɛw;
Na mbom hɔn a wopirim hɔn akoma wɔ ekyingye mu, na wɔpow no no, bɛdan hɔn akɔ hɔnankasa hɔn afɔdzi mu—
Na Ewuradze Nyankopɔn na ɔakã iyi; na hɛn a yɛyɛ asɔr no mu elderfo no atse na yɛgye dase wɔ enyimnyam Hen a ɔwɔ sor no ne nsɛm ho, ɔno na enyimnyam nka no afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ. Amen.
Dɛm ndzɛmba yinom na ɔma yehu dɛ Nyame bi wɔ sor a ɔmmbɔadze da na ɔyɛ onnyiewiei, fi daapem kesi daapem, Nyame kor no ara a ɔnnsakyer, sor nye asaase nye ndzɛmba a ɔwɔ mu nyina bɔfo no;
Na dɛ ɔbɔɔ nyimpa, ɔbanyin nye ɔbaa, wɔ nankasa no su nye ne saso do, na ɔbɔɔ hɔn;
Na ɔmaa hɔn mbrasɛm dɛ wɔndɔ no na wɔnsom no, ɔno a ɔyɛ Nyame tseasefo nokwafo kortonoo no, na ɔno nko nye nyia ɔsɛ dɛ wɔsom.
Mbom ɔnam ne mbrato wɔ dɛm mbra krɔnkrɔn yinom no nyimpa betseen n’akɔndɔdze do na ɔbɛyɛɛ abɔnsamdze, na ɔbɛyɛɛ nyimpa a ɔahwe ase.
Dɛm ntsi, Otumfo Nyankopɔn dze ne Ba a Wɔwoo no Kortoo no mae, dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw wɔ dɛm kyerɛwsɛm a ɔdze mae a ɔfa no ho no mu no.
Ɔsɔɔw nsɔhwɛ naaso oenngyaa noho mu amma hɔn.
Wɔbɔɔ no mbeamudua mu, owui, na ɔsoɛree bio wɔ da a otsĩa ebiasa no mu;
Na ɔfowee kɔr sor, akɛtsena Egya no n’abanyimfa, dze tum kɛse ebedzi hen dɛ mbrɛ Egya ne pɛ se;
Na dodowara a wɔbɛgye edzi na woenuma hɔn wɔ ne dzin krɔnkrɔn mu no, na wobetsim wɔ gyedzi mu akɔ ewiei no, wɔbɛgye hɔn nkwa—

Nnyɛ hɔn a wɔgyee dzii wɔ ber a ɔbaa asaase do wɔ mber nkyekyɛmu ntamu wɔ honam mu ekyir no nkõ, mbom hɔn a wɔwɔ hɔ fi ahyɛse no nyina, dodow biara a wɔwɔ hɔ ansaana ɔreba no mpo, hɔn a wɔgyee nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn no hɔn nsɛm a wɔnam Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn akyɛdze ne nkenyan do kãe no, hɔn a wɔgyee dase nokwar mu wɔ noho wɔ adze nyinara mu no, wɔ dɛ wonya nkwa a onnyiewiei,
Nye hɔn so a wɔbɛba ekyir yi, hɔn a wɔbɛgye akyɛdze nyina nye frɛ a Nyame nam Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn do frɛ no edzi, dza ɔgye Egya no nye Ɔba no hɔn ho dase no;
Egya, Ɔba, nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no yɛ Nyame kor, wɔyɛ ɔdomankoma na onnyiewiei na wonnyi ewiei. Amen.

Na yenyim dɛ otwar dɛ nyimpa nyina nu hɔnho na wɔgye Jesus Christ ne dzin dzi, na wɔsom Egya no wɔ ne dzin mu, na wɔgye ne dzin no dzi, na wotsim wɔ gyedzi mu kɔ ewiei, annyɛ dɛm a, wɔrenngye hɔn nkwa wɔ Nyame n’ahenman mu.
Na yenyim dɛ bemdzi a ɔnam hɛn Ewuradze, nye hɛn Agyenkwa Jesus Christ n’adom do no tsen na ɔyɛ nokwar.
Na yenyim so dɛ ahosan a ɔnam hɛn Ewuradze, nye hɛn Agyenkwa Jesus Christ n’adom do no tsen na ɔyɛ nokwar so, ma hɔn a wɔdze hɔn ahom, hɔn adwen, nye hɔn ahoɔdzen nyina dɔ Nyame na wɔsom no no.
Mbom obotum aba dɛ nyimpa bɔhwe ase efi adom no ho na oefi Nyame tseasefo no ne nkyɛn;
Dɛm ntsi, hom mma asɔr no nyɛ ahwɛyie na ɔmbɔ mpaa da biara, amma waannkɔ nsɔhwɛ mu;
Nyew, na hom mma hɔn a wɔatsew hɔnho no so mpo nhwɛ yie.

Na yenyim dɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom yɛ nokwar dɛ mbrɛ John ne nyikyerɛ no tse, dɛ mma mmfa bi nnkã nkɔnhyɛ a ɔwɔ no nwoma no a ɔyɛ kyerɛwsɛm krɔnkrɔn no ho, nna mma nnyi bi so mmfi mu, anaa Nyame ne nyikyerɛ a ekyir no wɔnam Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn n’akyɛdze nye no tum do a ɔyɛ Nyame ne ndze anaa abɔfo hɔn som do bɛba no.
Na Ewuradze Nyankopɔn na ɔakã iyi; na wɔmfa enyidzi, tum nye enyimnyam mma ne dzin krɔnkrɔn no, sesei nye daapem. Amen.

Na bio, mbrasɛm a wɔdze maa asɔr no a ɔfa kwan a wɔmfa do nnuma—Hɔn a wɔbrɛ hɔnho adze wɔ Nyame enyim nyina, na wɔpɛ dɛ wonuma hɔn, na wɔdze akoma a abobɔ nye sunsum a abotow bɛba abɛgye dase wɔ asɔr no enyim dɛ woenu hɔnho nokwar mu wɔ hɔn bɔn nyinara ho, na wɔpɛ dɛ wɔfa Jesus Christ ne dzin to hɔn do, na wɔagye ato mu dɛ wɔbɔsom no akɔ ewiei, na wɔma hɔn ndwuma da edzi ampa dɛ woenya Christ no Sunsum ma woenya hɔn bɔnfakyɛ no, wobonuma hɔn na wɔagye hɔn ato n’asɔr no mu.
Elderfo, asɔfo, akyerɛkyerɛfo, deaconfo, na Christ n’asɔrmba hɔn ndwuma—Ɔsomafo yɛ elder, na ɔyɛ ne frɛ dɛ onuma;
Na ɔnhyɛ binom elderfo, asɔfo, akyerɛkyerɛfo na deaconfo;
Na oehyira paanoo nye wenyin—no a ɔyɛ Christ no honam nye no bɔgyaa ho asɛnkyerɛdze no do—
Na ɔmfa ne nsa ngu hɔn a woenuma hɔn no do ma woenya ogya nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn n’enuma no dɛ mbrɛ kyerɛwsɛm no se, mmfa nsi hɔn pi ngye hɔn nto asɔr no mu;
Na ɔnkyerɛkyerɛ, onsansan nsɛm mu, ontu fo, onuma na ɔnhwɛ asɔr no do;
Na ɔmfa nsa ngu tsir do, mfa Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no mma mfa nsi asɔr no pi;
Na ondzi nhyiamu nyina do bano.
Elderfo na wodzi nhyiamu biara mu dwuma dɛ mbrɛ Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no bɛkyerɛ hɔn, dɛ mbrɛ Nyame ne mbrasɛm nye nyikyerɛ no se.
Ɔsɔfo ne ndwuma nye dɛ ɔkã asɛmpa no, ɔkyerɛkyerɛ, osansan nsɛm mu, otu fo, na onuma na ɔma sacrament.
Na ɔsera asɔrmba kor biara wɔ hɔn efiefi, na otu hɔn fo ma wobue hɔn ano bɔ mpaa na wɔbɔ mpaa wɔ nsumaamu so, na wodzi hɔn ebusua mu dwuma nyina.
Na otum hyɛ binom so asɔfo, akyerɛkyerɛfo na deaconfo.
Na sɛ elder biara nnyi hɔ a, ɔno na ondzi nhyiamu biara no do bano;
Na mbom sɛ elder bi wɔ hɔ a, dza ɔwɔ dɛ ɔyɛ ara nye dɛ ɔkã asɛmpa no, ɔkyerɛkyerɛ, osansan nsɛm mu otu nkorɔfo fo, na onuma,
Na ɔnsera asɔrmba no nkorkor wɔ hɔn efiefi, otu hɔn fo ma wobue hɔn ano bɔ mpaa na wɔbɔ mpaa wɔ nsumaamu so, na wodzi hɔn ebusua mu dwumadzi nyina.
Dwumadzi yinom nyina mu no, sɔfo no wɔ dɛ ɔboa elder no sɛ okehia dɛ ɔboa a.
Kyerɛkyerɛnyi ne ndwuma nye dɛ ɔhwɛ asɔrmba no do aber nyinara, na ɔnye hɔn dzi nkitaho na ɔhyɛ hɔn dzen;
Na ɔhwɛ ma emumuyɛdze biara mmba asɔr no mu, anaa obiara nnya atsenkã bɔn wɔ no nua ho, anaa wonndzi ator, wonntwitwa anantsir, anaa wɔnnkã kasa bɔn biara.
Na ɔhwɛ ma asɔrmba no taa hyia mu mpɛn pii, na ɔhwɛ so ma asɔrmba no yɛ hɔn ndwuma.
Na ondzi bano wɔ nhyiamu no do sɛ elder anaa sɔfo biara nnyi hɔ a—
Na ɔwɔ dɛ deaconfo boa no wɔ no dwumadzi nyina mu wɔ asɔr no mu aber nyina sɛ okehia dɛ wɔboa a.
Mbom akyerɛkyerɛfo na deaconfo no mu biara nnyi tum dɛ wonuma, na wohyira sacrament do, anaa wɔdze nsa gu tsir do;
Naaso, wɔwɔ dɛ wɔbɔ kɔkɔ, wosansan nsɛm mu, wotu fo, wɔkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn, na wɔto nsa frɛ obiara dɛ ɔmbra Christ hɔ.

Elder, sɔfo, kyerɛkyerɛnyi, anaa deacon biara wɔ dɛ wɔhyɛ no sɔfo, dɛ mbrɛ akyɛdze nye frɛ a Nyame dze afrɛ no no tse; na ɔwɔ dɛ wɔnam Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no tum a ɔwɔ nyia ɔhyɛ sɔfo no mu no do dze hyɛ no.
Elderfo dodowara a wɔyɛ Christ n’asɔr no no wɔ dɛ wɔkɔ ehyiadzi kor wɔ bosoom ebiasa biara mu, anaadɛ ofi ber to ber dɛ mbrɛ dɛm ehyiadzi no bɛkyerɛ anaa wɔbɛhyehyɛ;
Na dɛm ehyiadzi yi mu na ɔwɔ dɛ asɔr no mu dwumadzi biara a ohia wɔ dɛm mber no mu no wodzi;
Ɔwɔ dɛ elderfo no gye hɔn tum nkrataa fi elderfo nkaafo, wɔ abatow mu wɔ asɔr a wɔwɔ mu no, anaa efi ehyiadzi no ase.

Sɔfo, kyerɛkyerɛnyi anaa deacon biara a sɔfo bi bɛhyɛ no no, wɔ dɛ onya abɔdzin krataa fi nyia ɔhyɛɛ no sɔfo no hɔ wɔ dɛm aber no mu, ama sɛ ɔdze dɛm abɔdzin krataa no kyerɛ elder biara a, ɔama no tum ma ɔdze eedzi dwuma a ne frɛ no ma no ho kwan dɛ ondzi, anaa obotum agye efi ehyiadzi kɛse bi ase.
Onnyi dɛ wɔhyɛ obiara dzibew biara wɔ asɔr yi mu wɔ ber a asɔr no no nkorbata oetsim yie no, dɛm asɔr no nntoow no ho aba;
Mbom elderfo banodzifo, bishopfo a wotutu akwan, abaguafo etsitsir, asɔfo mpanyimfo, nye elderfo wɔ ho tum dɛ wɔhyɛ asɔfo wɔ beebi a asɔr no bi nnyi nkorbata wɔ hɔ a wobotum wɔama wɔatow aba wɔ ho.

Asɔfodzi a ɔkrɔn no president biara (anaa elder banodzinyi), bishop, baguafo tsitsir na ɔsɔfopanyin, no abaguafo etsitsir nhyiamu anaa wiadze mfɛndzanan Asɔr ehyiadzi no na wɔbɛkyerɛ kwan a wɔmfa do nhyɛ hɔn asɔfo.

Asɔrmba no ber a wɔnam enuma mu wɔagye hɔn ato mu no hɔn ndwuma—Elderfo anaa asɔfo no wɔ dɛ wonya mber a ɔfata dze siansian ndzɛmba nyina mu a ɔfa Christ n’asɔr ho no mu yie ma wɔtse ase, ansaana wobedzi sacrament no, ɔwɔ dɛ elderfo no dze hɔn nsa gu hɔn tsir do na wosi hɔn pi ama ndzɛmba nyinara aakɔ do esiado esiado.

Na ɔwɔ dɛ asɔrmba no nantsew nyamesu mu, na hɔn kasaa gye dase wɔ asɔr no enyim, nye elderfo so hɔn enyim, dɛ woedzi mu wɔ ho, ama dwumadzi nye gyedzi aasaa kor dɛ mbrɛ kyerɛwsɛm krɔnkrɔn no se—hom nantsew krɔnkrɔnyɛ mu wɔ Ewuradze enyim.
Christ n’asɔr mu ba biara a ɔwɔ mba no wɔ dɛ ɔdze hɔn ba elderfo no wɔ asɔr no enyim, ma wɔdze nsa gu hɔn do wɔ Jesus Christ dzin mu, na wohyira hɔn wɔ ne dzin mu.
Worunntum nngye obiara nnto Christ n’asɔr mu gyedɛ onyia no edzi mfe a obotum ebu no nkontaa wɔ Nyame enyim na obotum enu noho.
Dɛm kwan yi na ɔwɔ dɛ wɔfa do numa hɔn a wonu hɔnho no—

Nyimpa a Nyame afrɛ no na ɔwɔ tumdzi fi Jesus Christ hɔ dɛ onnuma no, ɔnye nyimpa a ɔdze noho ama dɛ wonnuma no no bɔkɔ ekegyina nsu no mu, na ɔabɔ ne dzin akã dɛ: Ɔnam tumdzi a Jesus Christ dze ama no do no ntsi, munuma wo wɔ Egya, nye Ɔba, nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn dzin mu. Amen.
Afei ɔdze no bɛhyɛ nsu no mu, na oeyi no efi nsu no mu epue bio.
Ohia dɛ asɔrmba no hyia mu mpɛn pii na wodzi paanoo na wɔnom wenyin no dze kaa Ewuradze Jesus;
Na elder anaa sɔfo na obehyira do; na kwan a ɔbɛfa do ehyira do nye yi—ɔnye asɔrmba no bobu ntwɛr na ɔabɔ gyedzi mpaa awɔse mu akã dɛ:

O Nyankopɔn, Onnyiewiei Egya, yɛserɛ wo wɔ wo Ba, Jesus Christ ne dzin mu, dɛ hyira dɛm paanoo yi do na tsew ho ma akra a wobedzi nyina, ama woedzi dze akaa wo Ba no honandua, na wɔagye dase dze ama wo, O Nyankopɔn, Onnyiewiei Egya, dɛ woenya pɛ dɛ wɔbɛfa wo Ba ne dzin ato hɔn do, na wɔakaa no aber nyina na woedzi ne mbrasɛm a ɔdze ama hɔn no do; ama aber nyina woenya no Sunsum ma ɔnye hɔn atsena. Amen.
Kwan a wɔfa do hyira wenyin no do—ɔbɛfa kuraba no so na ɔakã dɛ:
