O Nyankopɔn, Onnyiewiei Egya, yɛserɛ wo wɔ wo Ba Jesus Christ ne dzin mu, dɛ hyira dɛm wenyin yi do na tsew ho ma akra a wɔbɔnom nyina, ama wɔayɛ dze akaa wo Ba no bɔgyaa a okyii maa hɔn; ama wɔagye dase dze ama wo, O Nyankopɔn, Onnyiewiei Egya, na wɔakaa no aber nyina, ama woenya no Sunsum ma ɔnye hɔn atsena. Amen.
Christ n’asɔrba biara a ɔbɔfom no anaa mfom bɛfa no mprase no, ɔwɔ dɛ wɔnye no dzi no dɛ mbrɛ kyerɛwsɛm no se.
Ɔwɔ dɛ asɔr horow a wɔbɔ mu yɛ Christ n’asɔr no hɔn ndwuma dɛ, wɔsoma hɔn akyerɛkyerɛfo no mu kor anaa mboree ma wɔkɔ asɔr no n’ehyiadzi dodow no a elderfo no frɛ no bi.

Wɔdze asɔrmba dodowara a wɔabɛkã asɔr no ho no hɔn edzin a wɔakyerɛw fitsi ber a wɔyɛɛ ehyiadzi a odzi ewie no; anaa wɔdze ahyɛ sɔfo bi nsa ma ɔdze akɔ; ama aber biara woenya edzin a ɔwɔ asɔrtɔw no mu no na wɔakyerɛw no wɔ nwoma mu a elderfo no hɔn mu kor bɛkyerɛw, nyia elderfo nkaa no beyi no ofi ber to ber.
Na eso, sɛ woeyi obi edzi efi asɔr no mu a woetum apepa hɔn edzin efi wiadze mfɛndzanan asɔr edzin nwoma no mu.

Asɔrmba a worutu efi bea a wɔtse dada no, sɛ wɔrokɔ bea fofor a no mu asɔrmba no nnyim hɔn a, wobotum dɛ wɔgye krataa a ɔkyerɛ dɛ wɔyɛ asɔrmba na hɔn gyinabew so ye, dɛm dasegye krataa no elder anaa sɔfo biara botum dze ne dzin ahyɛ ase, sɛ elder no anaa sɔfo no nyim asɔrba no a ɔregye krataa no yie a, anaaso akyerɛkyerɛfo anaa deaconfo a wɔwɔ asɔr no mu so botum dze hɔn edzin ahyɛ ase.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/21.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 21
chapter_summary: 1–3, Wɔfrɛ Joseph Smith ma ɔbɛyɛ adzehunyi, nyia ɔkyerɛ adze ase, nkɔnhyɛnyi, ɔsomafo na elder; 4–8, N’asɛm bɛkyerɛ Zion kwan; 9–12, Ahotseweefo no bɛgye n’asɛm a ɔnam Ɔwerɛkyekyefo no do bɛka no edzi.

verses.text: Hwɛ, ɔwɔ dɛ wɔkyerɛw abakɔsɛm yi wɔ hom mu na wɔdze sie; no mu na wɔbɛfrɛ wo adzehunyi, nyia ɔkyerɛ adze ase, nkɔnhyɛnyi, Jesus Christ ɔsomafo, asɔr no mu elder a wɔnam Egya Nyankopɔn ne pɛ, nye hom Ewuradze Jesus Christ n’adom do yii no.
Hom nam Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn ne nkenyan do rotow asɔr yi ne fapem, na hom esi ama gyedzi krɔnkrɔn mapa no.
Dɛm asɔr no a wɔahyehyɛ na wɔakyekyer wɔ hom Ewuradze n’afe apem ahaawɔtwe eduasa mu, wɔ no bosoom a otsĩa anan mu, ne da a otsĩa esia wɔ bosoom a wɔfrɛ no Ebɔbira mu.
Dɛm ntsi, me kyerɛ asɔr no, hom bɛyɛ aso dze ama ne nsɛm na mbrasɛm nyina a ne nsa bɛkã dze ama hom no, na ɔnantsew krɔnkrɔnyɛ mu wɔ m’enyim;
Na n’asɛm na hom bɛgye, tse dɛ ofi mankasa m’anomu, wɔ abotar nye gyedzi nyina mu.
Na sɛ wɔyɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom a hɛl mbobow no nnkotum edzi hom do konyim; nyew, na Ewuradze Nyankopɔn bɔhwetse sum no tum efi hom enyim, na ɔama sor awosow ama hom yieyɛ, nye ne dzin n’enyimnyam ntsi.
Na dɛm na Ewuradze Nyankopɔn se: Ɔno na mekenyan no dɛ ɔmfa tum kɛse mpia ama Zion enya kankɔ dze ama hom yieyɛ, na no mbɔdzembɔ dze minyim, na ne mpaabɔ no matse.

Nyew, no sũ a orusũ ma Zion no meehu, na mebɛyɛ ma onnkedzi awerɛhow ama no bio; na ne da a obenya n’enyigye ber no edu ama woenya no bɔn ho fakyɛ, na nhyira a medze ehyira no dwumadzi no so ada edzi.

Na, hwɛ, medze nhyira kɛse behyira hɔn a wɔyɛ edwuma wɔ mo wenyin ture mu nyina, na wɔbɛgye ne nsɛm, a ofi mo hɔ a Ɔwerɛkyekyefo no dze ama no edzi, dza ɔda no edzi dɛ ndzebɔnyɛfo bɔɔ Jesus mbeamudua mu dze maa wiadze bɔn, nyew, ama bɔnfakyɛ abɛyɛ hɔn a hɔn akoma abobɔ no dze.
Dɛm ntsi, ɔyɛ me pɛ dɛ ɔwo Oliver Cowdery mo somafo bɛhyɛ no sɔfo;
Iyi yɛ ayɛdze a ɔwɔ hɔ ma wo, dɛ ayɛ elder wɔ ne nsa ase yi, ɔno a odzi wo kan, ama abɛyɛ elder wɔ Christ n’asɔr yi mu, dza me dzin da do no—
Na asɛmpakãnyi a odzi kan wɔ asɔr yi mu, na ɔdze ato asɔr no na wiadzemba enyim, nyew, wɔ Amanamamfo enyim; na dɛm na Ewuradze Nyankopɔn no se, hwɛ! hwɛ! dze ama Jewfo no so. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/22.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 22
chapter_summary: 1, Enuma yɛ ahyɛmudzi fofor a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem; 2–4, Enuma a nyia wɔama no tumdzi a ɔfata no na wɔrohwehwɛ.

verses.text: Hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, mahyɛ dɛ wonyi ahyɛmu dadaw nyina akwa wɔ adze yi ho; na iyi yɛ ahyɛmudzi fofor a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem, dza nna ɔwɔ hɔ mpo fir ahyɛse no.
Dɛm ntsi, sɛ ɔba dɛ wonnuma nyimpa mpɛn ɔha mpo a, no ho nnkɛba no mfaso biara, osiandɛ hom nnkotum edua Moses mbra do anaa hom ndwuma ewui do ahɛn abow tseaba no mu.
Na osian hom ndwuma ewui ntsi na ɔama mama wɔakyekyer dɛm ahyɛmu a odzi ewiei yi, na dɛm asɔr yi dze ama me, dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse wɔ tsetseberdo no.
Dɛm ntsi, hom nhɛn abow no mu, dɛ mbrɛ mahyɛ no, na mma hom mmper nnhwehwɛ dɛ hom botu hom Nyame fo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/23.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 23
chapter_summary: 1–7, Wɔfrɛɛ dɛm tsetse esuafo yinom dɛ wɔnkã nyamesɛm nkyerɛ, wontu fo, na wɔnhyɛ Asɔr no dzen.

verses.text: Hwɛ, mekã nsɛm kakra yi kyerɛ ɔwo, Oliver. Hwɛ, woehyira wo, na ennhyɛ afɔbu biara ase. Na mbom hwɛ yie wɔ ahantanyɛ ho, amma aannkɔ nsɔhwɛ mu.
Ma asɔr nhu wo frɛ no na ɔnda wiadzemba so enyim, na wobobue w’akoma mu ma akã nokwar no fitsi aber yi na afebɔɔ. Amen.

Hwɛ, mekã nsɛm kakra yi kyerɛ ɔwo, Hyrum, na ɔwo so innyi afɔbu biara ase, na woebue w’akoma mu na woegyaa wo tɛkyerɛma mu so, na wo frɛ nye dɛ ibotu fo na akɔ do ahyɛ asɔr no dzen. Dɛm ntsi, ebɛyɛ edwuma ama asɔr no afebɔɔ, na iyi osian w’ebusua ntsi. Amen.
Hwɛ, mekã nsɛm kakra yi kyerɛ ɔwo, Samuel; dɛ ɔwo so innyi afɔbu biara ase, na wo frɛ nye dɛ ibotu fo na ahyɛ asɔr no dzen; na wonnyae mmfrɛɛ wo dɛ kã asɛmpa no wɔ wiadzemba enyim. Amen.
Hwɛ, mekã nsɛm kakra yi kyerɛ ɔwo, Joseph; na ɔwo so innyi afɔbu biara ase, na wo so wo frɛ nye dɛ ibotu fo, na ahyɛ asɔr no dzen; na iyi nye wo dwuma fitsi aber yi na afebɔɔ. Amen.

Hwɛ, menam nsɛm kakra yi do da no edzi kyerɛ ɔwo Joseph Knight dɛ ɔwɔ dɛ epegya wo mbeamudua, na iyi mu no, ɔwɔ dɛ epaa mu bɔ mpaa wɔ wiadze enyim na ebɔ mpaa so wɔ nsumaamu, wɔ w’ebusua mu, nye w’anyɛnkofo mu, nye mbea nyina do.
Na, hwɛ, ɔyɛ wo dwuma dɛ edze woho bɔ nokwar asɔr no ho, na ekɔ do kã kasa wɔ afotu mu, ama wo nsa aakã odwumayɛnyi n’akatua. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/24.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 24
chapter_summary: 1–9, Wɔfrɛ Joseph Smith dɛ ɔnkã asɛmpa na ɔnkyerɛkyerɛ ndzɛmba ase, onsansan kyerɛwsɛm no mu; 10–12, Wɔfrɛ Oliver Cowdery dɛ ɔnkã asɛmpa no; 13–19, Wɔda mbra a ɔfa anwanwadze ho, ndom, ananadze huntuma mpopoee na sika-kotoku anaa bɔtɔ a onnyi dɛ wɔfa dze fir edzi.

verses.text: Hwɛ, wɔfrɛɛ wo na wɔsaan mu yii wo dɛ kyerɛw Mormon Nwoma no, na bra me somdwuma no mu; na meeyi wo efi w’amandzehu mu, na meetu wo fo dɛ wɔagye wo efi w’atamfo nyina nsa, na wɔagye wo efi Satan no tum nye sum mu!
Naaso, kwan nnda hɔ mma wo wɔ wo mbrato ho; naaso, kɔ wo kwan na mma nnyɛ bɔn bio.
Krɔn wo dzibew; na sɛ idua wo haban mu edziban na isiesie ho wie a, kɔ asɔr a ɔwɔ Colesville, Fayette na Manchester ntsɛmara, na wɔbɔhwɛ wo; na mibehyira hɔn wɔ sunsum nye honam mu nyina;
Mbom sɛ wɔanngye wo a, medze ndom bɛba hɔn do na nnyɛ nhyira.
Na kɔ do frɛ Nyame wɔ me dzin mu, na kyerɛw ndzɛmba a Ɔwerɛkyekyefo no dze bɛma wo no, na siansian kyerɛwsɛm ne nyina mu kyerɛ asɔr no.
Na wɔdze dza ɔwɔ dɛ ekã na ekyerɛw bɛma wo wɔ dɔn no ara mu, na wobetsie, annyɛ dɛm a medze ndom bɛba hɔn do na nnyɛ nhyira.
Na fa wo mber nyina som wɔ Zion; na iyi mu na ibenya ahoɔdzen.
Nya abotar wɔ amandzehu mu, osiandɛ ibohu pii; na mbom sɔw ne nyina, na, hwɛ, menye wo wɔ hɔ, kesi wo nda ewiei mpo.

Na honam mu ndwumayɛ dze, irinnya ho ahom, osiandɛ iyi nnyɛ wo frɛ. Yɛ dza wɔfrɛɛ wo ho no na ibenya dza edze bɔkrɔn wo dzibew, na esansan kyerɛwsɛm no nyina mu akyerɛ, na kɔ do fa wo nsa gu nkorɔfo do na si nsɔr no pi.
Na wo nuabanyin Oliver bɔkɔ do ama me dzin do wɔ wiadzemba enyim, nye asɔr no so enyim. Na mma onnsusu dɛ obotum akã m’edwuma ho nsɛm nyina akyerɛ; na hwɛ, menye no wɔ hɔ kesi ewiei.
Mo mu na obenya enyimnyam, na nnyɛ nankasa noho bi, sɛ mberɛwyɛ anaa ahoɔdzen mu o, sɛ nkyehoma anaa fahodzi mu o;
Na aber nyina, wɔ mbea nyina do no, obobue n’ano dze abɔ m’asɛmpa no dawur tse dɛ ɔdze totorobɛnto ndze, adzekyee nye adzesaa nyina. Na mebɛma no ahoɔdzen a wonnhun bi da wɔ adasa mu.
Mma mmper nnhwehwɛ anwanwadze ne yɛ, gyedɛ mehyɛ wo, gyedɛ mbɔnsam no tu, ayarsa, nye dza wɔdze tsia mbowatsena hɔn bɔr, nye dza wɔdze tsia owu no bɔr;
Na dɛm ndzɛmba yinom no na mma nnyɛ, gyedɛ hɔn a wɔpɛ dɛ eyɛ ma hɔn no bisa wo, ama kyerɛwsɛm no aahyɛ mã; na yɛ dza wɔakyerɛw no.
Na beebiara a ebɛhɛn, na wɔanngye wo wɔ me dzin mu no, nkyɛ ɔwɔ dɛ igya nhyira no, poroporow w’ananadze huntuma gu hɔn do fa gya ndom, na fa yɛ dasegye tsia hɔn, na tsew w’anan ho wɔ kwankyɛn.
Na ɔbɛba dɛ obiara a ɔdze ne nsa bɛkã wo ayɛ wo basabasa no, hyɛ ma wɔntsẽa no wɔ me dzin mu; na, hwɛ, mebɛtsea no dɛ mbrɛ w’asɛm se wɔ mankasa me ber ano.
Na obiara a ɔnye wo bɔkɔ mbra ase no, wɔdze mbra no bɔdom no.
Na mma mmfa sika kotoku, anaa bɔtɔ, anaa poma, anaa ntar ebien osiandɛ dɛm dɔn noara mu asɔr no dze dza ihia wɔ edziban ho, nye atar, nye mpaboa, nye sika, nye bɔtɔ bɛma wo.
Na wɔafrɛ wo dɛ fa adze a ɔyɛ dzen besiesie mo wenyin ture mu, nyew, wɔ mber a odzi ekyir yi mu mpo; nyew, na hɔn so a ahyɛ hɔn asɔfo nyina no, wɔbɛyɛ dɛmara. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/25.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 25
chapter_summary: 1–6, Wɔfrɛɛ Emma Smith, ewuraba a wɔasan mu eyi no no dɛ ɔmboa no kun na ɔnkyekye no werɛ; 7–11, Wɔfrɛɛ no so dɛ ɔnkyerɛw, na onsansan kyerɛwsɛm mu, na ɔnhwehwɛ mu nyiyi asɔr ndwom; 12–14, Atseneneefo hɔn ndwontow yɛ mpaabɔ ma Ewuradze; 15–16, Setsie ho mbrasɛm a ɔwɔ nyikyerɛ no mu yi yɛ obiara dze.

verses.text: Tsie Ewuradze wo Nyankopɔn ne ndze, ber a merekasa kyerɛ ɔwo, me babaa, Emma Smith; na nokwar, mese wo dɛ, hɔn a wɔgye m’asɛmpa nyina yɛ me mbabanyin nye mbabaa a wɔwɔ m’ahenman mu.
Nyikyerɛ a medze ma ɔwo yi fa mepɛ ho; na sɛ idzi nokwar na enantsew kwan pa mu wɔ m’enyim a, mobɔbɔ wo nkwa ho ban, na ibenya egyapadze wɔ Zion.
Hwɛ, medze wo bɔn akyɛ wo, na eyɛ ewuraba a idzi mu a mafrɛ wo.
Ma mma osian ndzɛmba no a innhunii no ntsi nnhwinhwin, na mber bi bɛba a ibohu dɛ ɔyɛ nyansa a ɔwɔ mo mu ntsi na wɔdze ehuntsa ɔwo nye wiadze no.
Na dzibew a mafrɛ wo ho nye dɛ dua ɔdwe sunsum do, fa awerɛkyekyesɛm ma m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, wo kun, wɔ n’amandzehu mu.
Na enye no nkɔ beebiara a ɔbɔkɔ aber nyina, na yɛ ne kyerɛwfo, ber a obiara nnyi hɔ a ɔbɛyɛ kyerɛwfo ama no, ama maasoma m’akowaa Oliver Cowdery, ma ɔaakɔ beebiara a mepɛ dɛ ɔkɔ.
Na ɔdze ne nsa bogu wo tsir do ama eetum esiansian kyerɛwsɛm no mu, na etu asɔr no fo dɛ mbrɛ mo Sunsum bɛkyerɛ wo no.
Na ɔdze ne nsa bogu wo do, na ibenya Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no, na ebɛfa wo mber akyerɛw, na fa sũa pii.
Na onnyi dɛ isuro, osiandɛ wo kun bɛtaa w’ekyir wɔ asɔr no mu; na hɔn ntsi na wɔafrɛ no, ama meeyi ndzɛmba nyina akyerɛ hɔn, biribiara a mepɛ, dɛ mbrɛ hɔn gyedzi tse.
Na, nokwar, mese wo dɛ fa wiadze ndzɛmba to nkyɛn, na per hwehwɛ ndzɛmba a ofir bea pa.
Na wɔbɛma ahwehwɛ mu eyiyi ndwom krɔnkrɔn so a wobenya no wɔ m’asɔrfi mu, dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɔ m’enyi a wɔdze bɛma wo.
Osiandɛ me kra enyi gye ndwom a ofi akoma mu ho; nyew, atseneneefo ndwontow yɛ mpaabɔ ma me, na wobohue nhyira egu hɔn etsir do dze ama hɔn ho mbuae.
Dɛm ntsi, ma w’akoma do na dzi dɛw, na suo ahyɛmu a edzi no mu yie.
Kɔ do wɔ ɔdwe wɔ sunsum mu, na hwɛ yie wɔ ahantanyɛ ho. Ma wo kra enyi ngye wɔ wo kun ho, nye enyimnyam a ɔbɛba no do no mu.
Kɔ do dzi me mbrasɛm do, na tsenenee ahenkyɛw na ibenya. Na gyedɛ eyɛ dɛm, bea a mowɔ no irunntum mmba hɔ.
Na nokwar, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, iyi yɛ me ndze a ɔwɔ hɔ ma obiara. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/26.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 26
chapter_summary: 1, Ɔahyɛ hɔn dɛ wonsũa kyerɛwsɛm no na wɔnkã asɛmpa no; 2, Wosi do kã adwen kor ho mbra no.

verses.text: Hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, hom ntu hom mber nsi hɔ mfa nsũa kyerɛwsɛm no, na hom nkã asɛmpa no, na hom nsi Colesville asɔr no pi, na hom nyɛ hom edwuma wɔ asaase no do, dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɛ, kesi dɛ hom bɔkɔ anee apaamu akɛyɛ ehyiadzi a ɔreba no; na iyi ekyir na mebɛkyerɛ hom dza hom nyɛ.
Na hom ndua mpaabɔ na gyedzi kɛse do nyɛ adwen kor mfa nyɛ ndzɛmba nyinara wɔ asɔr no mu, osiandɛ hom nam gyedzi do benya ndzɛmba nyinara. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/27.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 27
chapter_summary: 1–4, Wɔkyerɛ ndzɛmba a wɔmfa ndzi sacrament no; 5–14, Christ na No nkowaa a wofi mberano to mberano nyina no bedzi sacrament no; 15–18, Hom nhyɛ Nyame N’akodze no nyina.

verses.text: Hom ntsie Jesus Christ ne ndze, hom Ewuradze, hom Nyankopɔn, na hom Pomfo no, m’asɛm a nkwa na tum wɔ mu.

Na, hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, dza hom bedzi anaa dza hom bɔnom ber a hom redzi sacrament no nnhia, sɛ hom dze enyiwa kor wɔ m’enyimnyam nko ho dzi a—na wɔdze kaa Egya no wɔ mo nyimpadua a wɔdze too hɔ maa hom, nye mo bɔgyaa a wokyii wɔ hom bɔnfakyɛ ntsi.
Dɛm ntsi, me ma hom mbrasɛm dɛ, mma hom nntɔ hom atamfo hɔn wenyin anaa hɔn nsãdzen biara.
Dɛm ntsi, mma hom nnnom bi, gyedɛ dza wɔayɛ no fofor wɔ hom mu; nyew, iyi mu na wɔdze bɛkyekyer m’Egya n’ahenman wɔ asaase yi do.

Hwɛ, ɔyɛ nyansadze ma me; dɛm ntsi, mma ɔnnyɛ hom nwanwa, osiandɛ mber no reba a menye hom nye Moroni bɔnom wenyin eduaba wɔ asaase do, mekyerɛ nyia mosomaa no wɔ hom hɔ dɛ ombeyi Mormon Nwoma no a asɛmpa ne mãhyɛ a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no wɔ mu no nkyerɛ, nyia medze Ephraim no poma ho abakɔsɛm nsaafee ahyɛ ne nsa no;
Nye Elias so, a medze ndzɛmba nyinara a nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn nyina dze hɔn ano kãe fi wiadze ahyɛse ne nsanananmu a ɔbɛba no ne nsaafee ahyɛ ne nsa no a ɔfa nda a odzi ekyir no;
Nye John a ɔyɛ Zacharias ne babanyin no so, dɛm Zacharias nye nyia ɔno (Elias) kɛseraa no na ɔbɔɔ no anohoba dɛ obenya babanyin, na ne dzin wɔ dɛ ɔyɛ no John, na Elias no sunsum bɛhyɛ no mã;

Dɛm John no na mosomaa no wɔ hom mo nkowaa, Joseph Smith, Kakraba, nye Oliver Cowdery, hɔ no dɛ ɔmbɛhyɛ hom asɔfo, wɔ asɔfodzi a odzi kan no a hom nsa akã no, ama woeetum afrɛ hom ahyɛ hom asɔfo tse dɛ Aaron mpo;
Nye Elijah so a medze tum ho nsaafee no a ɔbɛdan egyanom hɔn akoma aba mba do, na mba so hɔn akoma aba egyanom do no ahyɛ ne nsa no, amma wɔammfa ndom ammbɔbɔ asaase nyina;
Nye hom egyanom Joseph, na Jacob, na Isaac, na Abraham so, hɔn na anohoba no gyina hɔn do;
Nye Michael, anaa Adam so, nyimpa nyina hɔn egya, adasa nyina hɔn henbabanyin, a ne nda fir tsetse no;

Nye Peter, na James, na John so, hɔn na masoma wɔ hom nkyɛn no, menam hɔn do hyɛɛ hom asɔfo na misii hom pi dɛ hom mbɛyɛ asomafo, na me dzin ho adasefo soronko, na hom nsuo hom somdwuma ho nsaafee nye ndzɛmba kor noara a meyi akyerɛ hɔn no mu;
Hom a medze m’ahenman ho nsaafee nye asɛmpa ne mberano no ho dwumadzi wɔ mber a odzi ekyir yi mu ahyɛ hom nsa; na mber ne mãhyɛ mu a mobɔboa ndzɛmba nyinara ano kor dza ɔwɔ sor nye asaase do no;
Nye hɔn nyinara so a m’Egya eyi hɔn efi wiadze ama me no.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mma hom akoma do na hom ndzi dɛw, na hom mbɔ hom asen do, na hom mfa m’akodze nyina, ama hom eetum egyina wɔ da bɔn no mu, na sɛ hom wie ne nyina yɛ a, hom eetum egyina.
Dɛm ntsi, hom nsoɛr ngyina, hom mfa nokwar no mbɔ hom asen, na hom nhyɛ tsenenee akatabo no, na hom mfa asomdwee asɛmpa no ho ahosiesie nhyehyɛ hom anan a masoma m’abɔfoe dɛ wɔmfa nhyɛ hom nsa no;
Hom nkura gyedzi akokyɛm no na ɔno na hom botum dze edum emumuyɛfo hɔn ogya egyen-menaba nyina;

Hom mfa nkwagye dadzekyɛw, nye mo Sunsum nkrantsee no a mubohue egu hom do no, nye m’asɛm a mibeyi akyerɛ hom no, na hom nyɛ adwen kor wɔ ndzɛmba nyina a hom bebisa me no ho, na hom ndzi nokwar nkesi dɛ mebɛba, na wobohwim hom akɔ sor, na bea a metse no, hom so hom bɛtsena hɔ. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/28.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 28
chapter_summary: 1–7, Joseph Smith na okura esumasɛm ho nsaafee, na ɔno nko na onya nyikyerɛ ma Asɔr no; 8–10, Ɔwɔ dɛ Oliver Cowdery kɛkã asɛmpa no kyerɛ Lamanfo no; 11–16, Satan daadaa Hiram Page na ɔmaa no ator nyikyerɛ.

verses.text: Hwɛ, mese ɔwo Oliver dɛ, wɔdze bɛma wo ama Asɔr no etsie ndzɛmba nyinara a enam Ɔwerɛkyekyefo no do edze bɛkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn no, dza ɔfa nyikyerɛ nye mbrasɛm a medze ama no.
Mbom hwɛ, nokwar, nokwar, mese wo dɛ wonnkeyi obiara a obenya mbrasɛm nye nyikyerɛ wɔ asɔr yi mu gyedɛ m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, osiandɛ onya no dɛ mbrɛ Moses so nyae no mpo.
Na yɛ setsie fa ma ndzɛmba a medze bɛma no no, tse dɛ Aaron mpo, na fa tum na tumdzi da mbrasɛm nye nyikyerɛ no edzi nokwar mu kyerɛ asɔr no.
Na sɛ Ɔwerɛkyekyefo no kyerɛ wo ber bi mu, anaa mber nyina ɔhyɛ wo dɛ kasa anaa kyerɛkyerɛ asɔr no a, ɔwɔ dɛ eyɛ.
Mbom mma nnkyerɛw no wɔ mbrasɛm kwan do, mbom wɔ nyansa kwan do;
Na mma nnhyɛ nyia odzi wo do na ɔda asɔr no ne tsir no;
Osiandɛ medze esumadze ne nsaafee ama no nye nyikyerɛ a wɔasɔw ano, kesi dɛ mibeyi obi fofor esi n’ananmu ama hɔn.

Na afei, hwɛ, mese wo dɛ kɔ Lamanfo hɔ na kɛkã asɛmpa no kyerɛ hɔn; na mber dodow biara a wɔbɛgye wo nkyerɛkyerɛ no, ma wɔnkyekyer m’asɔr wɔ hɔn mu; na ibenya nyikyerɛ, na mbom mma nnkyerɛw no wɔ mbrasɛm kwan do.
Na afei, hwɛ, mese wo dɛ wonnyii nnkyerɛe, na nyimpa biara so nnyim bea a wɔbɛkyekyer Zion kurowpɔn no wɔ, na mbom wɔbɛkyerɛ ekyir yi. Hwɛ, mese wo dɛ ɔbɛbɛn Lamanfo hɔn he no do.
Mma mmfi bea yi do kesi dɛ wobowie ehyiadzi no; na wɔdze hɔn ndze beyi m’akowaa Joseph ma ɔaahwɛ ehyiadzi no do, na dza ɔbɛse wo no na kã.
Na bio, frɛ wo nuabanyin Hiram Page na wo nye no nko ntamu na kã kyerɛ no dɛ dza ɔkyerɛwee fii ɔbo no do no mmfir emi na Satan na ɔdaadaa no;
Na, hwɛ, wɔmmfaa dɛm ndzɛmba yinom mmaa no, na wɔnnkɛfa biribiara a ɔnye asɔr no mu ahyɛmudzi bɔ ebira ama obiara wɔ asɔr yi mu.
Osiandɛ ɔwɔ dɛ wɔyɛ ndzɛmba nyinara esiado esiado, dɛ mbrɛ dɔm no nam gyedzi mpaabɔ do ayɛ adwen kor wɔ asɔr no mu no.
Na ɔwɔ dɛ eboa ma wɔtoto ndzɛmba yinom nyinara, dɛ mbrɛ asɔr n’ahyɛmu tse, ansaana etu wo kwan akɔ Lamanfo no mu.
Na fi ber a edze bɔkɔ kesi ber a ebɛsan aba no, wɔbɛkyerɛ wo dza ebɛyɛ.
Na ɔwɔ dɛ ibue w’ano aber nyina, na edze ehurusi ndze da m’asɛmpa edzi. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/29.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 29
chapter_summary: 1–8, Christ boaboa Ne mpamufo no ano; 9–11, Ne mbaa no dze Mfe Apem no bɛba; 12–13, Duebien no bobu Israel nyina atsɛn; 14–21, Nsɛnkyerɛdze, ɔyardɔm na amamfoyɛ bɛba ansaana Mbaa a Otsĩa Ebien no asõ; 22–28, Owusoɛr a odzi ewiei no nye atsɛmbu a odzi ewiei no bedzi Mfe Apem no ekyir; 29–35, Ndzɛmba nyina yɛ sunsum ma Ewuradze; 36–39, Wɔpaam abɔnsam na no dɔm fii sor dɛ wɔmbɔsɔ nyimpa nhwɛ; 40–45, Asehwe no na Werdambɔ dze nkwagye ba; 46–50, Wɔnam Werdambɔ no do pon mbofra nkakramba.

verses.text: Hom ntsie Jesus Christ, hom Pomfo no ndze, Okokroko Emi Mara no, nyia n’ehumbɔbɔr abasa abɔ werdam dze etua hom bɔn no;
Ɔno na ɔbɔboaboa no nkorɔfo ano mpo tse dɛ mbrɛ akokɔ baatan boaboa ne mba ano hyɛ ne ntsaban ase, dodowara a wobetsie me ndze na wɔabrɛ hɔnho adze wɔ m’enyim, na wɔafrɛ me wɔ mpaabɔ dzendzen mu no.
Hwɛ, nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, wɔdze hom bɔn akyɛ hom wɔ aber yi mu, dɛm ntsi na hom nsa akã dɛm ndzɛmba yinom; na mbom hom nkaa, amma hom annyɛ bɔn bio, mma mbusu ammba hom do.
Nokwar, mese hom dɛ wɔasan mu eyi hom efi wiadze mu dɛ hom mfa enyigye ndze a ɔtse dɛ totorobɛnto ndze mbɔ m’asɛmpa no dawur.
Hom mma hom akoma do na hom enyi ngye, osiandɛ mowɔ hom finimfin, na emi nye hom dzimafo wɔ Egya no enyim; na ɔyɛ ne pɛ pa dɛ ɔdze ahenman no ma hom.
Na dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no—Biribiara a hom bebisa wɔ gyedzi mu no, hom yɛ kor wɔ mpaabɔ mu dɛ mbrɛ mahyɛ hom no a, hom nsa bɛkã.
Na wɔafrɛ hom dɛ hom mboaboa m’apamufo ano; osiandɛ m’apamufo tsie me ndze na wommpirim hɔn akoma;

Dɛm ntsi, ɔmom no fi Egya no hɔ aba dɛ wɔbɔboaboa hɔn ano wɔ bea kor do wɔ asaase yi enyi do, ama woeesiesie hɔn akoma na woeesiesie hɔnho wɔ adze nyinara mu dze atweɔn da no a wɔdze abɛbrɛsɛ nye amamfoyɛ bɛba emumuyɛfo do no.
Na dɔn no abɛn, na da no rosõ ber a asaase ne twaber edu; na hɔn a wɔyɛ ahantan nye emumuyɛfo nyinara bɛyɛ dɛ mburonan; na mebɛhyew hɔn, Dɔm Ewuradze na ɔse; amma emumuyɛ annka asaase yi do;
Na dɔn no asõ, na dza m’asomafo kãe no wɔ dɛ ɔhyɛ mã; na dza wɔkãe no dɛmara so na ɔbɛba.
Na medze tum nye enyimnyam kɛse bɛda moho edzi efi sor, na menye sor dɔm-tutuw a wɔwɔ hɔ nyina, na yɛnye nyimpa abɛtsena asaase do wɔ tsenenee mu mfe apem, na emumuyɛfo nnkotum egyina ano.

Na bio, nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, ɔnam Egya ne pɛ do, na ɔmom ne pi si do no, dɛ m’asomafo, Duebien no a wɔkã moho wɔ me ɔsomdwuma mu wɔ Jerusalem no, begyina m’enyimfa wɔ ogya fadum mu wɔ da a mebɛba no mu, wɔahyehyɛ hɔn tsenenee ntar, wɔdze ahenkyɛw ahyehyɛ hɔn tsir, wɔ enyimnyam mu dɛ mara so mpo, na woebobu Israel fifo nyina atsɛn, dodowara mpo a wɔdɔɔ me na wodzii me mbrasɛm do no, na obiara nnkã ho bio.

Na wɔbɛhɛn totorobɛnto dzendzenndzen akyɛr, tse dɛ Bepɔw Sinai do mpo, na asaase nyina bɔwosow, na wɔaba kan—nyew, hɔn a wowui wɔ mo mu no benya tsenenee ahenkyɛw, na wɔahyɛ hɔn ntar dɛ mara so mpo, na wɔabɛkã moho, ama yaayɛ kor.
Mbom, hwɛ, mese hom dɛ ansaana dɛm da kɛse yi bɔsõ no, ewia bɛdan sum, na bosoom adan bɔgya, na nworaba befi sor atotɔ, na nsɛnkyerɛdze akɛse besisi wɔ sorsor no sor nye asaase n’ase;
Na sũ nye nkekamu besi nyimpa dɔm mu;
Na wɔbɛma ɔsor-bo abɛsɛɛ asaase do ndɔbaa.
Na ɔbɛba dɛ, osian wiadze n’emumuyɛdze ntsi, mibedzi emumuyɛfo hɔn wer, osiandɛ worunnu hɔnho; na m’ebufuw kɔɔpow no ayɛ mã; na hwɛ, sɛ woenntsie me a, mo bɔgyaa no renntsew hɔn ho.
Dɛm ntsi, emi Ewuradze Nyankopɔn mobɔsoma nwansema ma wɔaba asaase enyi do, na wɔbɔfɔr hɔn a wɔwɔ do nyina, na wobedzi hɔn honam, na wɔama wɔadɔr nsaamaa;
Na hɔn tɛkyerɛma bɛfam ma worunntum nnkasa nntsia me; na hɔn honam bodwuruw efi hɔn mbiew ho egu, na hɔn enyiwamba botutu efi hɔn enyiwa mu;
Na ɔbɛba dɛ haban mu mbowa nye wimu ntumbowa bɔwe hɔn.

Na ogyatanaa bɛhyew mbusu asɔr kɛse no, a ɔyɛ asaase nyina do edwaman no, egu famu, dɛ mbrɛ Ezekiel nkɔnhyɛnyi no dze n’ano kãe no, ɔno na ɔkãa dɛm ndzɛmba yi a ɔmmbaa mu yi, na mbom dɛ metse ase yi, otwar dɛ ɔba mu, osiandɛ dza ɔyɛ mbusu nnkotum edzi hen.
Na bio, nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, sɛ mfe apem no ba ewiei a, na nyimpa hyɛ ase bio pow hɔn Nyame a, mibegyaa asaase bɛyɛ mber kakra;
Na ewiei no bɛba, na sor nye asaase bɛhyew na woetwa mu akɔ, na sor fofor nye asaase fofor bɛba.
Na ndzɛmba dadaw nyinara botwa mu akɔ, na ndzɛmba nyinara abɛyɛ fofor, sor nye asaase mpo, nye ne mãhyɛ a ɔwɔ hɔ nyinara, nyimpa nye mbowa nyinara, wimu ntumbowa, nye po mu nam nyinara;
Na tsinhwi kor, anaa duaba rennyew, osiandɛ ɔyɛ me nsaano edwindze.

Mbom, hwɛ, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, ansaana asaase botwa mu akɔ no, Michael a ɔyɛ mo ɔbɔfopanyin no bɛhɛn no totorobɛnto, na nkyii ewufo nyinara bɔsoɛr, osiandɛ obobuebue hɔn owumaa, na wobefifi mu epue—nyew, hɔn nyinara mpo.
Na wɔbɔboaboa atseneneefo no ano wɔ me nsa enyimfa dze hɔn akɔ onnyiewiei nkwa mu; na ɔbɛyɛ me enyimguase dɛ mebɛfa emumuyɛfo no a wɔwɔ me nsa bankum no ayɛ medze wɔ Egya n’enyim;
Dɛm ntsi, mebɛse hɔn dɛ—Hom mfi me nkyɛn nkɔ, hom a ndom akã hom, hom nkɔ ogya a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem a woesiesie ama abɔnsam nye n’abɔfoe no mu.
Na afei, hwɛ, mese hom dɛ mimmfii m’ano nnkãa no pɛn dɛ wɔbɛsan hɔn ekyir aba, osiandɛ bea a mowɔ no, wonnkotum aba hɔ, osiandɛ wonnyi ho tum biara.

Na mbom hom nkaa dɛ wɔmmfaa m’atsɛmbu nyina mmaa adasa; na dɛ mbrɛ nsɛm no efi m’anomu epue no, ɔbɛba mu dɛmara so, na dɛ edzikamfo bedzi ekyir, na edziekyirfo so ebedzi kan wɔ biribiara a menam mo tum asɛm a ɔyɛ mo Sunsum no tum do bɔe no mu.
Na menam mo Sunsum no tum do bɔɔ hɔn; nyew sunsum nye honam mu ndzɛmba nyina—
Odzi kan, sunsum mu, ɔtɔ do ebien, honam mu, dza a ɔyɛ m’edwuma ahyɛse; na bio, odzi kan, honam mu, na ɔtɔ do ebien, sunsum mu, dza ɔyɛ m’edwuma a odzi ewiei—
Merekasa dɛm kyerɛ hom ama hom aatse ase dɛmara; na mbom mara dze minyim dɛ mo ndwuma nnyi ewiei, na onnyi ahyɛse; mbom wɔdze ama hom ama hom aatse ase, osiandɛ hom ayɛ kor ebisa me ho asɛm.
Dɛm ntsi, nokwar mese hom dɛ ndzɛmba nyinara yɛ sunsum ma me, na aber biara nnyi hɔ a medze honam mu mbra ama hom; nna me mmaa nyimpa biara, anaa adasamba; anaa Adam, hom egya no a mobɔɔ no no.

Hwɛ, memaa no ho kwan dɛ ɔnyɛ dza noara pɛ; na memaa no mbrasɛm, na mbom nnyɛ honam mu mbrasɛm na medze maa no, osiandɛ me mbrasɛm yɛ sunsum mu dze; na wɔnnyɛ asaase do dze anaa honam mu dze, nna wɔnnyɛ honam su dze, anaa akɔndɔdze.

Na ɔbaa dɛ abɔnsam sɔɔ Adam hwɛe—na, hwɛ, abɔnsam wɔ hɔ ansaana Adam reba, osiandɛ ɔtseew mo do etua, see dɛ, fa w’enyimnyam ma me, a ɔyɛ mo tum no; na osian hɔn pɛ ntsi, sor dɔmtutuw no mu nkyɛmu ebiasa mu kor fii me nkyɛn kɔr n’afã;
Na wɔtoow hɔn kyeen famu, na dɛm na ɔmaa abɔnsam na n’abɔfoe bae;
Na, hwɛ, woesiesie beebi ama hɔn fi ahyɛse no, na bea no nye hɛl.
Na ɔwɔ dɛ abɔnsam sɔ adasamba hwɛ, sɛ ɔnntse dɛm a, nna nnyɛ hɔnara wɔdze hɔn pɛ; osiandɛ sɛ woennya dza ɔyɛ wen a, wonnkohu dza ɔyɛ dɛw—
Dɛm ntsi, ɔbaa dɛ Abɔnsam sɔɔ Adam hwɛɛ, na odzii eduaba no a wɔabra no ntsi ɔtõo mbrasɛm no, na ɔmaa ɔbɛhyɛɛ abɔnsam ne pɛ ase, osiandɛ ogyaa noho mu maa nsɔhwɛ.

Dɛm ntsi, emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, memaa kwan ma wɔpaam no fii Eden Ture no mu, dze fii m’enyim, osian ne mbrato ntsi, ɔno mu na ɔmaa owuu sunsum mu, dza ɔyɛ owu a odzi kan no, na dɛm owu kor yi ara so mpo nye owu a odzi ewiei no, dza ɔyɛ sunsum mu owu, a mebɛkã egu emumuyɛfo do ber a mebɛse dɛ: Hom mfi ha, hom a ndom akã hom.

Mbom, hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn mehyɛɛ Adam nye n’asefo dɛ mma wonnwu honam mu owu, kesi dɛ emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn mobɔsoma abɔfo dɛ wɔmbɛkã nnuho nye ɔpon, a ɔnam gyedzi wɔ me Ba a Wɔwoo no Kortoo no ne dzin mu no ho nsɛm nkyerɛ hɔn.
Na dɛm na emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn mehyehyɛe maa nyimpa wɔ ne nsɔhwɛber mu—dɛ sɛ owu honam mu a, woeenyan no wɔ bɛkyebo mu dze no akɔ onnyiewiei nkwa mu, na iyi wɔ hɔ ma dodowara a wɔbɛgye edzi;
Na hɔn a wɔnngye nndzi no, bɔkɔ onnyiewiei afɔbu mu; osiandɛ wonnkotum apon hɔn efi bɔn sunsum asehwe mu, osiandɛ woennu hɔnho;
Na wɔdɔ sum sen kan, na hɔn ndwuma yɛ bɔn, na wonya hɔn akatua fi nyia wɔpɛ dɛ wotsie no no hɔ.
Mbom hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, mbofra nkakraba no dze, wɔnam nyia me Woo no Kortoo no no do apon hɔn fi wiadze ne fapem;
Dɛm ntsi, wonnkotum ayɛ bɔn, osiandɛ wɔmmaa Satan tum dɛ ɔnsɔ mbofra nkakraba nhwɛ, kesi dɛ wobodu ber a wobotum ebu hɔnho nkontaa wɔ m’enyim;
Na wɔdze ama hɔn dɛ ma mepɛ mpo tse, sɛ mankasa mepɛ a, mimbisa dɛm ndzɛmba akɛse no mfi hɔn egyanom nsamu.
Na, bio, mese hom dɛ, ana mennhyɛɛ obiara a ɔwɔ nyimdzee dɛ onnu noho?
Na nyia onnyi ntseasee no, ɔyɛ m’ahyɛdze dɛ meyɛ dza wɔakyerɛw no. Na afei, merennkã hwee nnkyerɛ hom bio ber yi mu. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/30.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 30
chapter_summary: 1–4, Wɔkã David Whitmer n’enyim dɛ ɔronnsom enyiberdo; 5–8, Wɔse Peter Whitmer Kakraba dɛ ɔnkã Oliver Cowdery ho nkɔ asɛmpakã dwumadzi wɔ Lamanfo mu; 9–11, Wɔfrɛ John Whitmer dɛ ɔnkɛkã asɛmpa no.

verses.text: Hwɛ, mese ɔwo David dɛ, esuro nyimpa na anntwer me ammfa ennya ahoɔdzen dɛ ma ɔwɔ dɛ inya,

Mbom w’adwen wɔ wiadze ndzɛmba do sen emi, wo Yɛfo me ndzɛmba do, nye ɔsomdwuma a wɔafrɛ wo ho dɛ dzi no do; na annyɛ setsie amma mo Sunsum nye hɔn a wɔhwɛ wo do, na mbom hɔn a memmaa hɔn mbra biara no adan w’adwen.
Dɛm ntsi, woegyaa wo dɛ wankasa bisa fi mo hɔ, na dwendwen ndzɛmba a wo nsa akã no ho.
Na wo fie bɔwɔ w’egya ne fie, kesi dɛ mebɛma wo mbrasɛm bi so. Na ebɛhɛn asɔr no ɔsomdwuma mu, na wɔ wiadze enyim, nye mbeambea a ɔwɔ mantamu hɔ nyina. Amen.

Hwɛ, mese ɔwo Peter dɛ, enye wo nuabanyin Oliver botu wo kwan no; osiandɛ mber asõ a ohia dɛ mema ibue w’ano dze bɔ m’asɛmpa no dawur; dɛm ntsi mma nnsuro, na mbom tsie wo nuabanyin ne nsɛm na afotu a ɔdze bɛma wo no.
Na ma n’ahohiahia nyina nhia wo, na aber nyina ma w’akoma do ma me wɔ mpaabɔ nye gyedzi mu, fa ma ɔno nye ɔwo hom ngyee; osiandɛ mama no tum dɛ ɔmfa nkyekyer m’asɔr wɔ Lamanfo mu;
Na minnyii obiara nnsii hɔ dɛ ɔnyɛ ne ɔpamfo a ɔhwɛ no do wɔ asɔr no mu, wɔ nsɛm a ɔfa asɔr no ho, gyedɛ no nuabanyin Joseph Smith, Kakraba, nko.
Dɛm ntsi, tsie dɛm nsɛm yi na bɔ mbɔdzen dzi mbrasɛm no do enyiberdo, na wobehyira wo dze akɔ onnyiewiei nkwa mu. Amen.
Hwɛ, mese ɔwo m’akowaa John dɛ, ebɛhyɛ ase efi aber yi dze kɔ no abɔ m’asɛmpa dawur tse dɛ mbrɛ edze totorobɛnto ndze.
Na ebɛyɛ w’edwuma wɔ wo nuabanyin Philip Burroughs ne fie, nye mantamu hɔ nyina, nyew, wɔ beebiara a wobotum atse wo nkã, kodu dɛ mebɛhyɛ wo dɛ fi hɔ kɔ.
Na fa wo kra nyina yɛ w’edwuma nyina wɔ Zion ofi ndɛ dze kɔ; nyew, bue w’ano aber nyina wɔ m’edwuma ho, na mma nnsuro dza nyimpa botum ayɛ, osiandɛ menye wo wɔ hɔ. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/31.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 31
chapter_summary: 1–6, Wɔfrɛ Thomas B. Marsh dɛ ɔnkã asɛmpa no na wɔma no awerɛhyɛmu wɔ n’ebusua ne yieyɛ ho; 7–13, Wotu no fo dɛ onya abotar, ɔmbɔ mpaa aber nyina, na ɔnyɛ setsei mma Ɔwerɛkyekyefo no.

verses.text: Thomas, me babanyin, nhyira akã wo osian gyedzi a enya wɔ m’edwuma ho ntsi.
Hwɛ, osian w’ebusuafo ntsi, ehu amandze pii; naaso mibehyira ɔwo nye w’ebusuafo, nyew, wo mba nkakraba no so; na da no reba a wɔbɛgye edzi na woehu nokwar no na wɔnye wo abɛyɛ kor wɔ m’asɔr mu.
Ma w’akoma do na dzi dɛw, osiandɛ w’asɛmpakã dwuma dɔn no asõ; na wobegyaa wo tɛkyerɛma mu, na ebɔbɔ enyigyesɛm kɛse yi ho dawur akyerɛ dɛm ebusuasantsen yi.
Ebɔbɔ ndzɛmba a woeyi akyerɛ m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, no ho dawur. Ebɛhyɛ ase akã asɛmpa no ofi aber yi dze kɔ, nyew, na ibotwa ndɔbaa wɔ haban a wɔahoa na asõ dɛ wɔhyew no no mu.
Dɛm ntsi, fa wo kra nyinara tow wo kantankrankye, na wɔdze wo bɔn akyɛ wo, na wɔbɛkyekyer efi-efi pii egu w’ekyir, osiandɛ odwumayɛnyi n’akatua sɛ no. Dɛm ntsi w’ebusua bɛtsena ase.
Hwɛ, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, fi hɔn nkyɛn mber tsia, na kɛkã m’asɛm no, na mibesiesie beebi ama hɔn.
Nyew, mubobue nkorɔfo no hɔn akoma, na wɔbɛgye wo. Na mobodua w’abaw do akyekyer asɔr;
Na ebɛhyɛ hɔn dzen na esiesie hɔn ama ber no a wɔbɔboaboa hɔn ano no.
Nya abotar wɔ amandzehu mu, mma nnkã kasa bɔn nntsia hɔn a wɔkã kasa bɔn tsia wo no. Fa ɔdwe hwɛ wo fie do na gyina pintsinn.
Hwɛ, mese wo dɛ, ebɛyɛ asɔr no no duyɛfo, na mbom erennyɛ mma wiadze, osiandɛ wɔrenngye wo nnto mu.
Kɔ wo kwan, beebiara a mepɛ dɛ ekɔ na Ɔwerɛkyekyefo no bɛkyerɛ wo dza yɛ nye bea a ebɔkɔ.
Bɔ mpaa dabaa, amma aannkɔ nsɔhwɛ mu na aannyew w’akatua.
Dzi nokwar kesi ewiei, na hwɛ, menye wo wɔ hɔ. Dɛm nsɛm yi mmfi nyimpa bi anaa adasa hɔ, na mbom ofi mo hɔ, emi Jesus Christ, hom Pomfo no mpo a, ɔnam Egya ne pɛ do. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/32.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 32
chapter_summary: 1–3, Wɔfrɛ Parley P. Pratt na Ziba Peterson dɛ wɔnkɛkã asɛmpa no nkyerɛ Lamanfo no na wɔnkɛkã Oliver Cowdery na Peter Whitmer Kakraba ho; 4–5, Ɔwɔ dɛ wɔbɔ mpaa ama wɔaatse kyerɛwsɛm no ase.

verses.text: Na afei ɔfa m’akowaa Parley P. Pratt ho no, hwɛ, mese no dɛ ampaara dɛ metse ase yi, mebɛpɛ dɛ ɔbɔbɔ m’asɛmpa no dawur na osũa me, na ɔdwe, na ɔyɛ botoo wɔ akoma mu.
Na dza medze hyɛ ne nsa nye dɛ ɔnye mo nkowaa Oliver Cowdery na Peter Whitmer, Kakraba, nkɔ Lamanfo no mu wɔ sar no do.
Na Ziba Peterson so nye hɔn bɔkɔ; na emi mara so menye hɔn bɔkɔ na mebɛtsena hɔn finimfin, na emi nye hɔn dzimafo wɔ Egya n’enyim, na biribiara nnkotum esiw hɔn kwan.
Na wobedzi dza wɔakyerɛw no do, na mma wɔnnkyerɛ dɛ wɔwɔ nyikyerɛ fofor biara, na wɔmbɔ mpaa dabaa ama maama woeebue no ho ntseasee.
Na wobetsie dɛm nsɛm yinom na wonnkobu no tootooba, na mibehyira hɔn. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/33.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 33
chapter_summary: 1–4, Wɔfrɛ edwumayɛfo dɛ wɔmbɔ asɛmpa no dawur wɔ dɔn a otsĩa dubiako no mu; 5–6, Wɔakyekyer Asɔr no na ɔwɔ dɛ wɔboa mpamufo no ano; 7–10, Hom nnu homho, na sor ahenman no abɛn; 11–15, Woesi Asɔr no wɔ asɛmpa no botan do; 16–18, Hom nsiesie homho mma Ayeforkun ne mbae no.

verses.text: Hwɛ, mese hom, mo nkowaa Ezra na Northrop dɛ, hom mbue hom aso na hom ntsie Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn ne ndze, nyia n’asɛm nkwa na tum wɔ mu, ɔyɛ ndam sen nkrantsee anofanu, na ohwira mu kodu dɛ ɔpaapaa akwaa nye ehuon mu, ɔkra nye sunsum mu; na ohu adwen nye akoma mu nsusui.
Na nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ wɔafrɛ hom dɛ hom mma hom ndze do dɛ mbrɛ hom dze totorobɛnto, na hom mbɔ m’asɛmpa no dawur nkyerɛ ebusuasantsen kɔntɔnkye a wɔakyea yi.
Na, hwɛ, haban no ahoa na twaber no asõ; dɔn a otsĩa dubiako no abɔ, ber a odzi ewiei a mebɛfrɛ m’edwumayɛfo ma wɔakɔ mo wenyin ture mu no.
Na mo wenyin ture ne fã biara asɛɛ; na obiara nnyi hɔ a ɔyɛ papa gyedɛ kumaabi; na osian asɔfoɔtorsom ntsi hɔn nyinara wɔ adwen a wɔaprɔw, na wɔfom wɔ akwan pii mu.
Na, nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, makyekyer dɛm asɔr yi na mafrɛ no efi sar no do.
Na dɛmara so na mobɔboaboa me mpamufo no ano efi asaase ne mfɛndzanan nyina, dodowara mpo a wɔbɛgye me edzi, na woetsie me ndze.
Nyew, nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, haban no ahoa na twaber no asõ dada; dɛm ntsi, hom mfa hom ahom, adwen, nye ahoɔdzen nyina ntow hom kantankrankye.
Hom mbue hom anomu na wɔbɛhyɛ no mã, na hom bɛyɛ mpo dɛ tsetseberdo Nephi a otuu kwan fii Jerusalem wɔ sar no do no.
Nyew, hom mbue hom anomu na mma hom nngyaa obiara, na wɔbɛkyekyer efi-efi no egu hom ekyir, na hwɛ, mekã hom ho.
Nyew, hom mbue hom anomu na wɔbɛhyɛ no mã, rekã dɛ: Hom nnu homho, hom nnu homho, na hom nsiesie Ewuradze no kwan, na hom mma n’atsempɔn ntsentsen; na sor ahenman no abɛn;
Nyew, hom nnu homho ma wonnuma hom mu kor biara, nkɔ hom bɔnfakyɛ mu; nyew, wonnuma hom wɔ nsu mpo mu, na ɔno ekyir ogya nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn enuma so aba.
Hwɛ, nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, iyi nye m’asɛmpa no; na hom nkaa dɛ ɔwɔ dɛ wonya gyedzi wɔ mo mu, annyɛ dɛm a wonnkotum agye hɔn nkwa wɔ kwan biara do.
Na ɔbotan yi do na mibesi m’asɔr; nyew, wɔdze hom esi ɔbotan yi do, na sɛ hom kɔ do a, hɛl mbobow nnkotum enya tum wɔ hom do.
Na hom nkaa asɔr ne nkyerɛkyerɛ nye ahyɛmu no na hom ndzi do.
Na obiara a ɔwɔ gyedzi no, hom mfa nsa ngu no do, nsi no pi wɔ m’asɔr mu, na mubohue Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn akyɛdze no egu hɔn do.
Na mara medze Mormon Nwoma no nye kyerɛwsɛm krɔnkrɔn no mae dɛ wɔmfa nkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn; na mo Sunsum no tum no kenyan ndzɛmba nyinara.
Dɛm ntsi, hom ndzi nokwar, na hom mbɔ mpaa dabaa, na hom nsiesie hom nkandzea ma ɔndzɛw na hom mfa ngo so, ama hom aayɛ krado dze atweɔn Ayeforkun no ne mbae—
Na, hwɛ, nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, mereba ntsɛm. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/34.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 34
chapter_summary: 1–4, Agyedzifo nam Werdambɔ no do bɛyɛ Nyame ne mba; 5–9, Asɛmpakã no siesie kwan mu dze ama Mbae a Otsĩa Ebien no; 10–12, Nkɔnhyɛ nam Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no tum do ba.

verses.text: Me babanyin Orson, yɛ aso na tsie na hwɛ dza Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn bɛkã akyerɛ wo no, Jesus Christ wo Pomfo no mpo;
Wiadze kan na nkwa no, kan a ɔhyerɛn wɔ sum mu na sum no enntum annkyer no;
Nyia ɔdɔɔ wiadze no a ɔdze nankasa no nkwa too hɔ, ama dodowara a wɔbɛgye no edzi no abɛyɛ Nyame ne mba. Dɛm ntsi eyɛ me ba;
Na woehyira wo osiandɛ agye edzi;
Na woehyira wo pii osiandɛ mafrɛ wo dɛ kã m’asɛmpa no—

Dɛ ebɛma wo ndze do tse dɛ mbrɛ edze totorobɛnto, hɛn ma ɔnkyɛr na ɔnyɛ dede so, na tsea mu kã nnuho ho asɛm kyerɛ ebusuasantsen kɔntɔnkyefo a wɔakyea yi, fa siesie Ewuradze no kwan mu ma ne mbae a otsĩa ebien no.
Na hwɛ, nokwar, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, mber no ɔabɛn, na mebɛba wɔ mununkum fua mu wɔ tum nye enyimnyam kɛse mu.
Na me mbae ber no bɛyɛ da kɛse, osiandɛ aman nyina ho bɔpopo.
Mbom ansaana dɛm da kɛse no bɛba no, ewia bɛhyɛ sum, na bosoom adan bɔgya; na nworaba nnkɛma hɔn kan ahyerɛn, na bi bɔtotɔ, na ɔsɛɛ kɛse rotweɔn emumuyɛfo.
Dɛm ntsi, ma wo ndze do na mma nngyaa, na Ewuradze Nyankopɔn akasa; dɛm ntsi, hyɛ nkɔm, na wɔnam Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no tum do dze bɛma.
Na sɛ idzi nokwar a, hwɛ, menye wo wɔ hɔ kesi dɛ mebɛba—
Na, nokwar, nokwar, mese wo dɛ mereba ntsɛm. Emi nye w’Ewuradze nye wo Pomfo. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/35.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 35
chapter_summary: 1–2, Mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ ma nkorɔfo etum abɛyɛ Nyame ne mba; 3–7, Wɔfrɛ Sidney Rigdon dɛ onnuma na ɔmfa Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no mma; 8–12, Wɔnam gyedzi do yɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze na anwanwadze; 13–16, Ewuradze no nkowaa nam Sunsum no tum do bɔpose aman; 17–19, Joseph Smith kura esumasɛm ne nsaafee; 20–21, Mpamufo no botum egyina Ewuradze ne mbaa da no ano; 22–27, Wɔbɛgye Israel nkwa.

verses.text: Tsie Ewuradze wo Nyankopɔn ne ndze, nyia ɔyɛ Alpha nye Omega, ahyɛse nye ewiei no, nyia n’akwan yɛ kor na ɔkɔ aprɔw onnyiewiei, nyia ɔtse dɛm ndɛ dɛ ndeda, na afebɔɔ.

Emi nye Jesus Christ, Nyankopɔn ne Ba no, nyia wɔbɔɔ no mbeamudua mu dze maa wiadze nyina no bɔn, na dodowara a wɔbɛgye me dzin edzi no, ama wɔabɛyɛ Nyankopɔn ne mba, na wɔbɛyɛ kor mpo wɔ mo mu dɛ mbrɛ meyɛ kor wɔ Egya no mu no, dɛ mbrɛ Egya no yɛ kor wɔ mo mu no, ama yaayɛ kor.
Hwɛ, nokwar, nokwar, mese m’akowaa Sidney dɛ, mahwɛ ɔwo nye wo ndwuma. Matse wo mpaabɔ, na mesiesie wo ama edwuma kɛse bi.
Woehyira wo, na ebɛyɛ ndzɛmba akɛse. Hwɛ, wɔasoma wo tse dɛ mbrɛ wɔsomaa John dɛ ombesiesie mo kwan mu no, nye Elijah so a ɔbɛba no n’enyim, na ɔwodze innyim.
Na ɔwo edze nsu numae dze kɔr nnuho mu, na mbom woennya Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no;
Na, hwɛ, merema wo mbrasɛm, dɛ fa nsu numa, na sɛ edze nsa gu hɔn do a, wobenya Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no, tse dɛ mbrɛ tsetseberdo Asomafo no yɛe no.
Na ɔbɛba dɛ edwuma kɛse bi bɛba asaase no do, wɔ Amanamamfo no mu mpo, na hɔn nkwaseadze nye ebusudze bɛda edzi wɔ nkorɔfo nyinara enyim.
Na meyɛ Nyame, na m’abasa nnyɛ tsia; na mebɛda etumdze, nsɛnkyerɛdze, nye anwanwadze edzi akyerɛ hɔn a wɔgye me dzin dzi no.
Na hɔn a wobebisa wɔ me dzin mu wɔ gyedzi mu no, wobotu mbɔnsam; wɔbɛsa ayarfo yar, wɔbɛma efurafo ehu adze, na etsitsifo atse asɛm, na mmum akasa, na ebubuafo anantsew.
Na mber no reba ntsɛm ama woeeyi ndzɛmba akɛse akyerɛ adasamba;
Na mbom sɛ woennya gyedzi a wonnkeyi biribiara akyerɛ hɔn, gyedɛ amamfoyɛ nko na ɔbɛba Babylon do, ɔno a ɔmaa Amanamamfo nyina noom ne ndwamanyɛ ebufuw wenyin no.
Na obiara nnyi hɔ a ɔyɛ papa, gyedɛ hɔn a wɔayɛ krado dɛ wɔbɛgye m’asɛmpa ne mãhyɛ no, dza medze ama ebusuasantsen yi no.
Dɛm ntsi, mefrɛ wiadze ndzɛmba a ɔyɛ mberɛw, hɔn a wonnyi nyimdzee na wɔnnsɛ hwee no, ma wɔdze mo Sunsum no tum no apose aman.

Na hɔn abasa bɛyɛ m’abasa, na mebɛyɛ hɔn akokyɛm na nkataenyim; na mobɔbɔ hɔn asen do, na wɔbɔkõ mbarimba mu ama me; na wɔdze hɔn atamfo bɛba hɔn ananadze; na mobɔtwe nkrantsee wɔ hɔn afã, na medze m’ebufuhyew gyatanaa bɔkora hɔn do.
Na wɔbɛkã asɛmpa no akyerɛ ehiafo na hɔn a wɔdwe, na wɔbɔhwɛ me mbae no kwan, osiandɛ abɛn—
Na wobosũa adɔmbadua no ho abɛbusɛm no, osiandɛ seseiara mpo ɔhyewber no abɛn.
Na masoma m’akowaa Joseph, na medze m’asɛmpa ne mãhyɛ no ahyɛ ne nsa; na ne mberɛwyɛ mu na meehyira no;

Na medze dɛm ndzɛmba no a ɔyɛ esumasɛm a wɔasɔw ano no ne nsaafee ama no, nye ndzɛmba a ɔwɔ hɔ fi wiadze ne fapem no mpo, nye ndzɛmba a sɛ ɔtsena mo mu a ɔbɛba, ofi ber yi dze kesi ber a mebɛba, na sɛ nnyɛ dɛm a, obi fofor na medze no besi n’ananmu.
Dɛm ntsi, hwɛ no do amma ne gyedzi ammpa, na Ɔwerɛkyekyefo a ɔyɛ Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no a onyim adze nyinara no dze bɛma no.
Na mbrasɛm yi na medze ma wo—dɛ kyerɛw ma no; na wɔdze kyerɛwsɛm no a ɔwɔ mankasa mo bo mu no bɛma, dze ama mankasa me mpamufo no eenya nkwagye.
Na wɔbɛtse me ndze, na woehu me, na wɔnnkɛda, na wobegyina wɔ da a mebɛba no mu; na wɔbɛtsew hɔnho, dɛ mbrɛ mo ho tsew no.
Na afei mese wo dɛ, tsena ne nkyɛn, na ɔnye wo botu kwan, mma mmpow no, na ndzɛmba yinom bɛba mu ampa.
Na mber dodowara a erennkyerɛw no, hwɛ, wɔbɛma ɔahyɛ nkɔm; na ɔwo so bɛkã m’asɛmpa no na abɔ nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn no hɔn edzin dze ada ne nsɛm no nokwar no edzi, dɛ mbrɛ wɔdze bɛma no no.
Dzi mbrasɛm nye ahyɛmu a wɔdze ama wo no nyinara do; na mebɛma sor awosow ama wo yieyɛ, na Satan no ho bɔpopo na Zion bedzi ehurusi wɔ mbepɔw no do na ɔayɛ prɔmprɔm;
Na wɔbɛgye Israel nkwa wɔ mankasa me mber pa mu; na nsaafee a medze ama no bɛkyerɛ hɔn kwan, na hɔn enyim runngu ase bio da.
Hom mma hom akoma do na hom enyi ngye, osiandɛ hom ɔpon abɛn.
Mma hom nnsuro, nguankuw ketseaba, ahenman no yɛ hom dze kesi dɛ mebɛba. Hwɛ, mereba ntsɛm. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/36.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 36
chapter_summary: 1–3, Ewuradze dua Sidney Rigdon ne nsa do dze Ne nsa gu Edward Partridge do; 4–8, Wɔfrɛ banyin biara a ɔgye asɛmpa no na asɔfodzi no dɛ omfir edzi na ɔnkɛkã asɛmpa no.

verses.text: Dɛm na Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, Israel Kokroko no se: Hwɛ, mese ɔwo m’akowaa Edward dɛ, woehyira wo, na wɔdze wo bɔn akyɛ wo, na wɔafrɛ wo dɛ fa ndze a ɔtse dɛ totorobɛnto kã m’asɛmpa no.
Mubodua m’akowaa Sidney Rigdon ne nsa do medze me nsa egu wo do, na ibenya mo Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no, Ɔwerɛkyekyefo no mpo, ɔno na ɔbɛkyerɛkyerɛ wo ahenman n’asomdwee ndzɛmba no;
Na fa ndze kɛse bɔ no dawur, se dɛ: Hosanna, nhyira nkã ɔsorsor Nyankopɔn ne dzin.
Na afei, ɔfrɛ nye mbrasɛm yi na medze ma wo a ɔfa nyimpa nyinara ho—
Dɛ dodowara a wɔbɛba mo nkowaa Sidney Rigdon na Joseph Smith, Kakraba, hɔ, na woesuo frɛ nye mbrasɛm yi mu no, wɔnhyɛ hɔn asɔfo wɔasoma hɔn ma wɔakɛkã asɛmpa a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem yi wɔ aman mu—
Wɔmbɔ nnuho ho dawur nse dɛ: Hom ntwe homho mfi dɛm ebusuasantsen asokyewfo yi ho, na hom mfi ogya no mu mfi, hom nkyir ntar a honam nkekãa wɔ mu mpo.
Na wɔdze mbrasɛm yi bɛma m’asɔr ne elderfo no, dɛ obiara a ɔdze akoma kor bosuo mu no, wobotum ahyɛ no sɔfo na wɔasoma no, dɛ mbrɛ makã no.
Emi nye Jesus Christ, Nyame ne Ba no; dɛm ntsi, bɔ w’asen do na mebɛba me temple mu awerɛfir mu ara. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/37.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 37
chapter_summary: 1–4, Wɔfrɛ Ahotseweefo no dɛ wɔmboa hɔn ano wɔ Ohio no.

verses.text: Hwɛ, mese hom dɛ osian ɔtamfo no nye homankasa hom yieyɛ ntsi, onnhia mma me dɛ hom kyerɛ biribiara ase bio kesi dɛ hom bɔkɔ Ohio no.

Na bio, mese hom dɛ mma hom nnkɔ kesi dɛ hom bɛkã m’asɛmpa no wɔ dɛm mbea no nyinara do, na hom ahyɛ asɔr no dzen wɔ beebiara a ɔwɔ no, nkanka dza ɔwɔ Colesville no; osiandɛ, hwɛ, wɔbɔ mpaa pii ma me wɔ gyedzi kɛse mu.
Na bio, mbrasɛm yi na medze ma asɔr no, dɛ ohia ma me dɛ wɔbɔboa hɔn ano wɔ Ohio no, dze atweɔn ber a m’akowaa Oliver Cowdery bɛsan aba hɔn nkyɛn.
Hwɛ, iyi yɛ nyansa, ntsi hom mma nyimpa biara nsan mu nyi mma noho kesi dɛ mebɛba. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/38.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 38
chapter_summary: 1–6, Christ na ɔbɔɔ ndzɛmba nyina; 7–8, Ɔwɔ N’Ahotseweefo no a ɔnnkɛkyɛr na woehu No no mu; 9–12, Honam nyinara aprɔw wɔ N’enyim; 13–22, Oesiesie anohoba asaase ato hɔ ama N’Ahotseweefo wɔ aber yi nye mbersantsen mu; 23–27, Wɔhyɛ Ahotseweefo dɛ wɔnyɛ kor na wɔmfa obu mma hɔnho nkorkor dɛ wɔyɛ enuanom; 28–29, Wɔhyɛ akõkoekõ ho nkɔm; 30–33, Wɔbɛma Ahotseweefo no tum efi sor na wɔakɔ aman nyinara mu; 34–42, Wɔhyɛ Asɔr no dɛ wɔnhwɛ ehiafo na abɔbɔfo, na wɔmper nhwehwɛ mbersantsen ahonyadze no.

verses.text: Dɛm na Ewuradze, hom Nyankopɔn, Jesus Christ mpo, Okokroko Emi Mara no, Alpha na Omega, ahyɛse na ewiei no, nyia n’enyi sõ mbersantsen mbea nyina do, nye Seraphfo dɔmtutuw a wɔwɔ sor, ansaana wɔrobɔ wiadze no se;
Emi na minyim ndzɛmba nyinara no, osiandɛ ndzɛmba nyinara gu m’enyim;
Emi nye nyia ɔkasae, na wɔyɛɛ wiadze no, na ndzɛmba nyinara nam mo do bae.

Emi nye nyia ɔafa Enoch ne Zion abɔ no bo no; na nokwar, mese dɛ dodowara a wɔagye me dzin edzi no, osiandɛ emi nye Christ, na mankasa me dzin ntsi, na osian bɔgya a mikyii no tum ntsi, maserɛ wɔ Egya no hɔ ama hɔn.
Mbom hwɛ, medze emumuyɛfo hɔn asefo no ato sum mpokyerɛ no mu ekesi atsɛmbu da kɛse no a ɔbɛba asaase n’ewiei no;
Na dɛm na mebɛma wɔdze emumuyɛfo a worinntsie me ndze na mbom wopirim hɔn akoma no esie, na wondue, wondue, wondue na mbusu bɛba hɔn do.
Na, hwɛ, nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ m’enyi wɔ hom do. Mowɔ hom finimfin na hom nntum nnhu me;
Na da no bɛba ntsɛm a hom bohu me, na hom ehu dɛ emi nye mara; na ɔnnkɛkyɛr na sum n’akataenyim no apa, na nyia wɔnntseew no ho no nnkotum egyina wɔ da no mu.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mbɔ hom asen do na hom nyɛ ahosiesie. Hwɛ, ahenman no yɛ homdze, na ɔtamfo no nnkedzi konyim.
Nokwar mese hom dɛ, hom ho atsew, na mbom nnyɛ hom nyinara; na dɔm biara nnyi hɔ bio a m’enyi gye hɔnho yie;
Osiandɛ honam nyinara aprɔw wɔ m’enyim; na sum no tum agye asaase do, wɔ adasamba mu, wɔ sor dɔmtutuw nyinara enyim—
Dza ɔma kommyɛ dzi hen, na yaw kã mbersantsen nyina, na abɔfo no rotweɔn dza mbra kɛse no dɛ wontwa asaase do ndɔbaa, na wɔbɛtase nworahaban no na wɔahyew; na hwɛ, ɔtamfo no ayɛ kor.
Na afei merekyerɛ hom esumadze bi, adze a ɔhyɛ nsumaamu, ɔdze hom nsɛɛe bɛba aber yi mu, na hom nnyim;
Na afei merekã kyerɛ hom, na woehyira hom, nnyɛ osian hom emumuyɛ ntsi, nna nnyɛ hom ekyingye akoma so ntsi; na nokwar, hom mu binom dzi fɔ wɔ m’enyim, na mbom mubohu hom mberɛwyɛ ho mbɔbɔr.
Dɛm ntsi, ofi aber yi dze kɔ hom nhyɛ dzen; mma hom nnsuro, osiandɛ ahenman no yɛ homdze.
Na osian hom nkwagye ntsi mema hom mbrasɛm, osiandɛ matse hom mpaabɔ, na ehiafo no dze hɔn nsɛm ato m’enyim, na esikafo no emi na mobɔɔ hɔn, na honam nyina yɛ medze, na monnhwɛ nyimpa enyim.
Na mayɛ asaase frɔmfrɔm, na hwɛ, ɔyɛ m’ananadze egua, dɛm ntsi, mibegyina do bio.
Na mema me nsa do na ɔyɛ mepɛ dɛ medze ahonyadze kɛse ma hom, ɔyɛ anohoba asaase mpo, asaase a numfonsu na ewo repem do, dza sɛ Ewuradze ba a ndom biara nnkɛba do;
Na sɛ hom dze hom akoma nyina per hwehwɛ a, medze bɛma hom dɛ ɔyɛ hom egyapadze asaase.
Na iyi bɛyɛ ahyɛmu ama hom, hom benya dze ayɛ hom egyapadze asaase, na ɔayɛ hom mba hɔn egyapadze afebɔɔ, mber dodow a asaase yi bɛtsena hɔ, na ɔbɛyɛ homdze bio kesi mbersantsen, na orunntwa mu da.
Mbom, nokwar mese hom dɛ ɔrennkyɛr na hom rinnya ɔhen anaa ɔhwɛdofo, na mebɛyɛ hom hen na mahwɛ hom do.
Dɛm ntsi, hom ntsie me ndze na hom nkã mo do, na hom bɛyɛ fahodzifo, na sɛ meba a hom rinnya mbra biara nnkã medze ho; osiandɛ emi nye hom mbramafo, na ebɛnadze na obotum apem me nsa adze?
Na nokwar, mese hom dɛ, hom nkyerɛkyerɛ homho nkorkor dɛ mbrɛ dzibew a medze hom esisi no tse;
Na hom mma nyimpa biara mbu no nua dɛ nankasa noho, na hom mbɔ ɔbra pa nye krɔnkrɔnyɛ wɔ m’enyim.
Na bio, mese hom dɛ, hom mma nyimpa biara mbu no nua dɛ nankasa noho.

Na hom mu woana na ɔwɔ mba duebien, na wɔsom no setsie mu, na ɔnnyɛ nyiyimu, na ɔbɛse kor dɛ: Wɔnhyɛ no ntar a ɔyɛ fɛw na ɔntsena ha, na ɔbɛse kor so dɛ: Wɔnhyɛ no ntar a atsetsew na ɔntsena noho—na ɔbɔhwɛ ne mba no na ɔakã dɛ midzi pɛrpɛr?
Hwɛ, medze iyi ayɛ abɛbu ama hom, na ɔtse dɛ mara so mpo. Mese hom dɛ, hom nyɛ kor; na sɛ hom annyɛ kor a, nna hom nnyɛ medze.
Na bio, mese hom dɛ ɔtamfo no hyɛ nsumaamu, na ɔreper hwehwɛ hom nkwa.

Hom tse akõkoekõ nkã wɔ aman a ɔwɔ ekyirekyir no mu, na hom kã dɛ ɔrennkyɛr na akõkoekõ akɛse esisi aman a ɔwɔ ekyirekyir no mu, na mbom hom nnyim nyimpa a wɔwɔ homankasa hom asaase do no hɔn akoma mu.

Mekã nsɛm yinom kyerɛ hom, osian hom mpaabɔ ntsi; dɛm ntsi hom nkora nyansa wɔ hom bo mu, amma emumuyɛfo enndua hɔn emumuyɛdze mu annda ndzɛmba yinom edzi annkyerɛ hom, wɔ kwan bi do a ɔbɛma wɔdze ndze a ɔyɛ dede akasa wɔ hom asowa mu akyɛn dza ɔbɛma asaase awosow; na mbom sɛ hom ayɛ ahosiesie a, hom nnkosuro.
Na ama hom eetum eguan efi ɔtamfo no tum ase, na wɔdze hom aaboa ano ayɛ hom atseneneefo a nkekãa nye afɔbu biara nnyi hom ho dze ama me—
Dɛm ntsi na mehyɛɛ hom dɛ hom nkɔ Ohio no; na hɔ na medze me mbra bɛma hom, na hɔ na medze adom akyɛdze tum a ofi sor bɛma hom.

Na hɔ na obiara a mepɛ no, mebɛma ɔakɔ aman nyinara mu, na wɔbɛkã dza ɔwɔ dɛ wɔyɛ akyerɛ hɔn; na mahyehyɛ dwumadzi kɛse bi ato hɔ, na wɔbɛgye Israel nkwa, na mibegya hɔn akɔ beebiara a mepɛ, na tum biara nnkotum apem me nsa adze.
Na afei, medze mbrasɛm ma asɔr a ɔwɔ dɛm mbea yi do no dɛ wɔmma nyimpa binom a wɔwɔ hom mu nsisi dzibew, asɔrmba nyina na wɔmbɔ mu mfa hɔn ndze nyi hɔn;
Na hɔn na wɔbɔhwɛ ehiafo nye abɔbɔfo do, na wɔama hɔn mboa amma woeennhu amandze; na wɔasoma hɔn dze hɔn akɔ bea a mahyɛ hɔn no do;
Na iyi nye hɔn edwuma, dɛ wɔbɔhwɛ asɔr yi n’egyapadze ho nsɛm do.
Na hɔn a wɔwɔ haban a wonnkotum atɔn no, wɔmma wongya no hɔ anaadɛ wɔmfa mma binom ma wɔnyɛ do edwuma dɛ mbrɛ wɔhwɛ a oye ma hɔn.
Wɔnhwɛ mbɔ ndzɛmba nyina ho ban; na sɛ wɔdze adom akyɛdze tum a ofi sor no nya hyɛ nyimpa no mã na wɔsoma hɔn a, wɔbɔboaboa ndzɛmba yinom nyina ano akɔ asɔr no bo mu.

Na sɛ hom per hwehwɛ ahonyadze no a ɔyɛ Egya ne pɛ dɛ ɔdze ma hom a, hom bɛyɛ ahonyafo wɔ nyimpa nyinara mu, osiandɛ hom benya onnyiewiei ahonyadze; na wiadze ahonyadze so yɛ medze a ɔsɛ dɛ medze ma; na mbom hom nhwɛ yie wɔ ahantanyɛ ho, amma hom ammbɛyɛ dɛ tsetseberdo Nephifo no.
Na bio, mese hom dɛ, mema hom mbra yi, dɛ banyin biara, elder, ɔsɔfo, kyerɛkyerɛnyi nye asɔrba so dɛ, ɔmfa n’ahoɔdzen nye ne nsa nkɛyɛ edwuma mfa nyɛ ndzɛmba a mahyɛ no ho.
Na hom mma hom asɛmpakã nyɛ kɔkɔbɔ ndze, obiara nkasa wɔ botooyɛ nye ɔdwe mu nkyerɛ ne nyɛnko.
Na hom mfi emumuyɛfo no mu. Hom ngye homho nkwa. Hom mma homho ntsew, hom a hom soso Ewuradze nkuraba no. Ɔnyɛ dɛm so. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/39.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 39
chapter_summary: 1–4, Ahotseweefo no wɔ tum dɛ wɔbɛyɛ Nyame ne mba; 5–6, Egye asɛmpa no a, nna agye Christ; 7–14, Wɔhyɛ James Covel dɛ ɔmma wonnuma no na ɔnyɛ edwuma wɔ Ewuradze no wenyin ture mu; 15–21, Ewuradze no nkowaa wɔ dɛ wɔkã asɛmpa no ansaana Mbaa a Otsĩa Ebien no aso; 22–24, Wɔbɔboaboa hɔn a wɔgye asɛmpa no hɔn ano wɔ aber yi nye mbersantsen mu.

verses.text: Yɛ aso na tsie nyia ɔwɔ hɔ fi mbersantsen nyina kesi mbersantsen nyina no, Okokroko Emi Mara no, Jesus Christ no mpo—
Wiadze ne kan nye nkwa no; kan a ɔhyerɛn wɔ sum mu na sum no nntum nnkyer no;
Emi nye nyia mebaa mankasa medze hɔ wɔ mber nkyekyɛmu ntamu, na mankasa medze anngye me no;
Na mbom dodowara a wɔgyee me no, memaa hɔn tum dɛ wɔmbɛyɛ me mba; na dɛmara so mpo na medze tum bɛma dodowara a wɔbɛgye me no, ama wɔaabɛyɛ me mba.
Na nokwar, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, nyia ɔgye m’asɛmpa no ɔgye me; na nyia ɔnngye m’asɛmpa no ɔnngye me.

Na iyi nye m’asɛmpa no—nnuho na nsu mu enuma, na ekyir no ogya nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn mu enuma ba, Ɔwerɛkyekyefo no a oyi ndzɛmba nyina kyerɛ na ɔkyerɛkyerɛ ndzɛmba a ɔyɛ ahenman n’asomdwee ndzɛmba no mpo no.
Na afei, hwɛ, mese ɔwo, m’akowaa James dɛ, mahwɛ wo ndwuma na minyim wo.
Na nokwar, mese wo dɛ, afei w’akoma atsen wɔ m’enyim aber yi mu; na, hwɛ, mehue nhyira kɛse egu w’etsifi;
Naaso, edzi awerɛhow kɛse, osian ahantanyɛ nye wiadze yi mu akɔdadwen ntsi apow me mpɛn pii.
Mbom, hwɛ, wo gyeda aba, sɛ ibetsie me ndze no a ɔse wo dɛ: Soɛr na wonnuma wo, na hohor wo bɔn gu, na bɔ me dzin, na wo nsa bɛkã mo Sunsum no, nye nhyira kɛse a innhun bi da.
Na sɛ eyɛ iyi a, mibesiesie wo ama dwumadzi kɛse bi. Ebɛkã m’asɛmpa ne mãhyɛ no a medze ama wɔ nda a odzi ekyir yi mu no, ahyɛmu a medze ama dɛ wɔmfa ngye mo nkorɔfo a wɔyɛ Israelfifo no.
Na ɔbɛba dɛ tum bɛba wo do; ibenya gyedzi kɛse, na mebɛba wo nkyɛn na medzi w’enyim kan.
Wɔafrɛ wo dɛ yɛ edwuma wɔ mo wenyin ture mu, na kyekyer m’asɔr, na kyekyer Zion, ama oeedzi ehurusi wɔ bepɔw no do na ɔaayɛ prɔmprɔm.
Hwɛ, nokwar, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, wɔammfrɛ wo dɛ kɔ boka nkurow no mu, na mbom wɔafrɛ wo dɛ kɔ Ohio no.
Na medze nhyira kɛse bi a wɔnntsee nkã da wɔ adasamba mu esie, na mber dodowara a mo nkorɔfo bɔboa hɔn ano wɔ Ohio no, mubohue egu hɔn etsifi. Na ofi hɔ no nyimpa bɔkɔ aman nyina mu.
Hwɛ, nokwar, nokwar, mese wo dɛ nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Ohio no dze gyedzi kɛse frɛ me, na wɔdwen dɛ mebɛpem me nsa adze wɔ atsɛmbu mu wɔ aman do, na mbom munnkotum etwa abrɔdɔ wɔ m’asɛm ho.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mfa hom ahoɔdzen ndzi dwuma na hom mfrɛ edwumayɛfo nokwafo wɔ mo wenyin ture no mu, ama oesiesie mu wɔ aber a odzi ewiei yi mu.
Na mber dodow a wobonu hɔn ho na wɔagye m’asɛmpa ne mãhyɛ, na hɔn ho bɛtsew no, mebɛpem me nsa adze wɔ atsɛmbu mu.
Dɛm ntsi kɔ na fa ndze kɛse tsẽatsẽa mu dɛ: Ɔsor ahenman no abɛn; tsẽatsẽa mu kã dɛ: Hosanna! nhyira nkã Ɔsorsor Nyankopɔn ne dzin.
Kɔ konuma wɔ nsu mu, na siesie m’enyim kwan ma me mbae;
Osiandɛ aber no abɛn; na da anaa dɔn no dze nyimpa biara nnyim; na mbom ɔbɛba ampa.
Na nyia ɔgye dɛm ndzɛmba yinom no ɔgye me; na wɔbɔboa hɔn ano dze hɔn ama me wɔ aber yi nye mbersantsen mu.
Na bio, ɔbɛba dɛ dodowara a hom bonuma hɔn wɔ nsu mu no, hom mfa nsa ngu hɔn do, na wobenya Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn n’akyɛdze no, na wɔbɔhwehwɛ me mbae ho nsɛnkyerɛdze, na wobohu me.
Hwɛ, mereba ntsɛm. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/40.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 40
chapter_summary: 1–3, Atseetsee ho suro nye wiadze yi mu akɔdadwen ntsi na ɔma wɔpow asɛmpa no.

verses.text: Hwɛ, nokwar, mese hom dɛ nna m’akowaa James Covel n’akoma tsen wɔ m’enyim, na ɔnye me dzii ahyɛmu dɛ ɔbɛyɛ setsie ama m’asɛm.
Na ɔdze enyigye gyee asɛm no, na mbom ntsɛmara na Satan sɔɔ no hwɛe; na atseetsee ho suro nye wiadze yi mu akɔdadwen ntsi ɔpoow asɛm no.
Dɛm ntsi ɔtõo m’ahyɛmu no, na afei ɔato mara dɛ meyɛ no dza oye ma me. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/41.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 41
chapter_summary: 1–3, Elderfo no nam nyikyerɛ sunsum do bɔhwɛ Asɔr no do; 4–6, Esuafo nokwafo no nsa bɛkã Ewuradze ne mbra no na woedzi do; 7–12, Wɔbɔ Edward Partridge ne dzin dɛ ɔnyɛ bishop mma Asɔr no.

verses.text: Hom nyɛ aso na hom ntsie, O mo nkorɔfo, dɛm na Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn no se, hom a ɔyɛ me enyigye dɛ medze nhyira a ɔsõ wɔ nhyira nyinara mu behyira hom, hom a hom tsie me; na hɔn a wonntsie me no so mobɔdom hɔn, na medze ndom a no mu yɛ dur wɔ ndom nyinara mu no bɔdom hɔn a wɔakã dɛ wonyim me dzin pɛn no.
Hom nyɛ aso, O elderfo a wɔwɔ m’asɔr mu a mafrɛ hom, hwɛ, medze mbrasɛm yi ma hom, dɛ hom mboa hom ano, na hom ngye m’asɛm nto mu;
Na ɔnam hom gyedzi mpaabɔ do hom nsa bɛkã me mbra, ama hom eehu mbrɛ hom besi ahwɛ m’asɔr do na hom ama ndzɛmba nyina atsen wɔ m’enyim.
Na sɛ meba a, mebɛyɛ hom hwɛdofo; na hwɛ, mereba ntsɛm, na hom nhwɛ ma wondzi me mbra do.
Nyia ɔgye me mbra na odzi do no, ɔno na ɔyɛ mo suanyi; na nyia ɔkã dɛ ɔagye na onndzi do no, ɔnnyɛ mo suanyi, na wobotwa no efi hom mu akyen;
Osiandɛ ɔnnsɛ dɛ wɔdze ndzɛmba a ɔyɛ ahenman ne mba dze no ma hɔn a wɔmmfata, anaadɛ wɔdze ma nkraman, anaadɛ wɔbɔtow bota egu mpreko enyim.
Na bio, ɔsɛ dɛ wosi dan ma m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, ma ɔtsena mu kyerɛ nwoma no ase.
Na bio, ɔsɛ dɛ m’akowaa Sidney Rigdon mber dodowara a obedzi me mbrasɛm do no, ɔtsena bea a oye ma no.
Na bio, mafrɛ m’akowaa Edward Partridge; na mehyɛ hom dɛ, asɔrmba no nyina mbɔ mu nyi no na wɔnhyɛ no bishop mma asɔr no, na ongyaa n’eguadzi no na ɔmfa ne mber nyina nyɛ asɔr no ndwuma;
Na ɔnhwɛ ndzɛmba nyina a mebɛkyerɛ no wɔ me mbra mu wɔ da no a medze mbra no bɛma no no.
Na mereyɛ iyi osiandɛ n’akoma mu tsew wɔ m’enyim, na ɔtse dɛ tsetseberdo Nathanael no a ndaadaa biara nnyi no mu no.
Wɔdze nsɛm yinom ama hom, na no ho tsew wɔ m’enyim; dɛm ntsi, hom nhwɛ kwan a hom fa do suo mu no yie, osiandɛ hom akra beyi ano wɔ atsɛmbu da no mu. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/42.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 42
chapter_summary: 1–10, Wɔfrɛ elderfo no dɛ wɔnkã asɛmpa no, wonnuma hɔn a wɔasakyer no, na wɔnkyekyer Asɔr no; 11–12, Ɔwɔ dɛ wɔfrɛ hɔn na wɔhyɛ hɔn asɔfo na wɔkɛkyerɛkyerɛ asɛmpa ne fapem no a ɔwɔ kyerɛwsɛm no mu no; 13–17, Ɔwɔ dɛ wodua Sunsum no tum do kyerɛkyerɛ na wɔhyɛ nkɔm; 18–29, Wɔhyɛ Ahotseweefo no dɛ mma wonndzi ewu, wonnwia adze, wonndzi ator, wonndzi honam akɔndɔ ekyir, wɔnntõ awar, anaadɛ wɔnnkã nsɛm bɔn nntsia binom; 30–39, Wɔhyɛ mbra a wɔnam do dze hɔn ahodze bɔbɔ afɔr ama Ewuradze; 40–42, Wɔkasa tsia ahantanyɛ na enyihaw; 43–52, Ɔwɔ dɛ wodua ngo sera ayɛdze na gyedzi do sã yarba; 53–60, Kyerɛwsɛm na wɔdze hwɛ Asɔr no do na ɔwɔ dɛ wɔbɔ no dawur kyerɛ wiadze; 61–69, Wɔbɛda bea a wɔbɛkyekyer Jerusalem Fofor no nye ahenman no n’esumasɛm no edzi; 70–73, Ɔwɔ dɛ wɔdze ahodze a wɔdze abɔ afɔr ama Ewuradze no boa Asɔr mu edzibewdzifo no; 74–93, Wɔdze mbra a wɔdze bɔhwɛ ndwamanbɔ, awartõ, ewudzi, adzewia, nye bɔnkã do no ma.

verses.text: Hom nyɛ aso, O m’asɔr mu elderfo a hom ehyia wɔ me dzin mu, emi Jesus Christ Nyame tseasefo ne Ba, wiadze Agyenkwa no; mber dodowara a hom gye me dzin dzi na hom dzi me mbrasɛm do no.
Bio, mese hom dɛ, hom nyɛ aso na hom ntsie na hom ndzi mbra no a medze bɛma hom no do.
Na nokwar mese dɛ, dɛ hom akã homho aboa ano dɛ mbrɛ mbrasɛm a medze maa hom no tse, na hom esi hom adwen pi wɔ adze kor yi ho, na hom ebisa Egya no wɔ me dzin mu no, dɛm so mpo na hom nsa bɛkã.
Hwɛ, nokwar mese hom dɛ, medze mbrasɛm a odzi kan yi ma hom, dɛ hom nkɔ wɔ me dzin mu, hom mu kor biara, ma ɔnka mo nkowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, na Sidney Rigdon.
Na mbrasɛm a medze ma hɔn nye dɛ wɔbɔkɔ mber kakra, na wɔnam Sunsum no tum do beyi akyerɛ hɔn mber a wɔbɛsan aba.
Na hom nkɔ wɔ mo Sunsum no tum mu, nkɛkã m’asɛmpa no, beenu beenu, wɔ me dzin mu, hom mma hom ndze do tse dɛ totorobɛnto, mbɔ m’asɛm no dawur tse dɛ Nyankopɔn n’abɔfoe.
Na hom nkɔ, na hom mfa nsu nkonuma, nkã dɛ: Hom nnu homho, hom nnu homho, na sor ahenman no abɛn.
Na hom fi bea yi do a, hom nkɔ anee apaamu so; na mber dodow biara a hom bohu hɔn a wɔbɛgye hom no, hom nkyekyer m’asɔr wɔ apaamu biara mu—
Kesi dɛ mber bɛba a wobeyi fi sor akyerɛ hom, ber a wɔbɛkyekyer Jerusalem kuropɔn Fofor no, nna wɔbɔboaboa hom ano ayɛ hom kor, ama hom abɛyɛ mo nkorɔfo na mabɛyɛ hom Nyame.
Na bio, mese hom dɛ, wɔmma m’akowaa Edward Partridge ngyina dzibew a medze no esi no. Na ɔba dɛ sɛ ɔtõ mbra a, wɔmfa obi fofor nhyɛ n’ananmu. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.
Bio, mese hom dɛ, mma wɔmma obi nnkɔ nnkɛkã m’asɛmpa, anaadɛ ɔnnkyekyer m’asɔr, gyedɛ obi a ɔwɔ tumdzi dze ne nsa egu no do, na asɔr no nyim dɛ ɔwɔ tumdzi na banodzifo ahyɛ no sɔfo.
Na bio, asɔr yi mu elderfo, asɔfo na akyerɛkyerɛfo nkyerɛkyerɛ m’asɛmpa ne fapem no, a ɔwɔ Bible na Mormon Nwoma no mu, dza m’asɛmpa ne mãhyɛ wɔ mu no.
Na wondzi ahyɛmu nye asɔr ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no do, na iyinom bɛyɛ hɔn nkyerɛkyerɛ, dɛ mbrɛ Sunsum no bɛkyerɛ hɔn kwan no.
Na wɔnam gyedzi mpaabɔ do benya Sunsum no; na sɛ hom nsa nnkãa Sunsum no a mma hom nnkyerɛkyerɛ.
Na hom ndzi iyi nyinara do na hom nyɛ no dɛ mbrɛ mahyɛ hom no, dza ɔfa hom nkyerɛkyerɛ ho no, kesi dɛ wɔdze me kyerɛwsɛm ne mãhyɛ no bɛma hom.
Na sɛ hom nam Ɔwerɛkyekyefo no do ma hom ndze do a, hom bɛkasa na hom ahyɛ nkɔm dɛ mbrɛ oye ma me;
Na hwɛ, Ɔwerɛkyekyefo no nyim ndzɛmba nyinara, na ɔgye Egya na Ɔba no hɔn ho dase.
Na afei, hwɛ, mekasa kyerɛ asɔr no. Mma nndzi ewu; na nyia odzi ewu no nnkenya bɔnfakyɛ wɔ wiadze yi mu, anaa wiadze a ɔreba no mu.
Na bio, mese dɛ, mma nndzi ewu, na nyia odzi ewu no wobokum no.
Mma nnwia adze; na nyia owia adze na orunnu noho no, wonyi no edzi.
Mma nndzi ator; nyia odzi ator na orunnu noho no wonyi no edzi.
Fa w’akoma nyina dɔ wo yer, na takyer ɔno nko.
Na nyia ɔhwɛ ɔbaa na no kɔn dɔ no no, ɔpow gyedzi no, na orinnya Sunsum no, na sɛ oennu noho a, wonyi no edzi;
Mma nntõ awar; na nyia ɔtõ awar, na oennu noho no, wonyi no edzi.
Mbom nyia ɔtõ awar na ɔdze n’akoma nyina nu noho, na ɔtwẽ noho fi ho, na ɔnnyɛ bio no, hom mfa nkyɛ no;
Na mbom sɛ ɔyɛ bio a, mma wɔmmfa nnkyɛ no, na wonyi no edzi.
Mma nnkã wo nyɛnko ho asɛm bɔn, anaa nnyɛ no bɔn.
Hom nyim me mbra a ɔfa ndzɛmba yinom ho a wɔdze ama wɔ me kyerɛwsɛm no mu; nyia ɔyɛ bɔn na onnu noho no, wobeyi no edzi.
Sɛ hom dɔ me a, hom bɔsom me na hom edzi me mbrasɛm nyina do.
Na hwɛ, hom nkaa ehiafo, na hom mfa hom ahodze mbɔ afɔr ma wɔmfa mboa hɔn, na dza hom dze maa hɔn no bɛyɛ ahyɛmu nye ndzeyɛɛ a worunntum nndan no.

Na mber dodowara a hom dze hom ahodze rema ehiafo no, nna hom dze rema me; na hom mfa mbogu bishop a ɔwɔ m’asɔr mu no nye n’apamfo, elderfo anaa asɔfo mpanyimfo beenu, a obeyi hɔn anaadɛ oeyi hɔn dada, anaa oeyi hɔn esi hɔ ama dɛm dwumadzi yi no enyim.

Na ɔbɛba dɛ wɔdze egu bishop a ɔwɔ m’asɔr mu no enyim, na ekyir no ɔagye dase yinom a ɔfa ahonyadze no a wɔdze abɔ afɔr ama m’asɔr a, dɛ worunntum nngye mmfi asɔr no hɔ bio, osiandɛ wɔagye me mbrasɛm no ato mu, na obiara bobu nankasa n’egyapadze ho akontaa akyerɛ me dɛ ɔyɛ ɔhwɛdofo, anaa dza wɔdze abɔ afɔr dze ama no a ɔbɔso ɔno nye n’ebusua nyina no.

Na bio, sɛ asɔr no wɔ egyapadze bi wɔ ne nsamu, anaa ankorankor bi wɔ egyapadze na sɛ oedzi kan dze bi ama dada na sɛ ɔda ho wɔ mbordo a, ɔmfa dza ɔbor do no nsan mbɔ afɔr mma bishop no ama ofi ber to ber ɔdze ama hɔn a wohia ama obiara eenya dza ohia.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mfa dza ɔbor do nyina nsie m’adzekorabea, na wɔdze ama ehiafo nye abɔbɔfo, dɛ mbrɛ asɔr no n’abaguafo etsitsir nye bishop na n’abaguafo bɛkyerɛ;

Na hom mfa bi so ntɔ nsaase mma asɔr no mfa nyɛ ndzɛmba a no ho bɛba mfaso ama obiara, na hom mfa bi so nsisi adan a wɔbɔsom wɔ mu, na hom mfa bi so nkyekyer Jerusalem Fofor no a ekyir yi wobeyi akyerɛ no—
Ama wɔdze aaboaboa m’ahyɛmu mba no ano wɔ bea kor do wɔ ber a mebɛba me temple mu. Na mereyɛ iyi wɔ mo nkorɔfo hɔn nkwagye ntsi.
Na ɔbɛba dɛ nyia ɔyɛ bɔn na onnu noho no, wobeyi no edzi efi asɔr no mu, na wɔrennsan mmfa dza wɔdze abɔ afɔr dze ama ehiafo nye abɔbɔfo a wɔwɔ m’asɔr mu no bio, anaadɛ, wɔdze ama me no bio—
Na susuampaara dɛ hom ayɛ ama nketseaba yi mu kor no, hom ayɛ ama me.
Na ɔbɛba dɛ dza muduaa mo nkɔnhyɛfo ano kãe no bɛhyɛ mã; na mibehyira hɔn a wɔwɔ Amanamamfo mu a wɔgye m’asɛmpa no hɔn ahonyadze do ama mo nkorɔfo ehiafo a wɔyɛ Israel fifo no.
Na bio, mma hom nnyɛ ahantan wɔ hom akoma mu; na ma w’afadze nda famu, na ne fɛw nyɛ dɛ wankasa wo nsaano edwuma ne fɛw;
Na hom nyɛ ndzɛmba nyinara wansawansa wɔ m’enyim.
Mma hom nnyɛ enyihafo; na nyia ɔyɛ onyihafo no mma onndzi odwumayɛnyi n’edziban anaa ɔnnhyɛ ne ntar.
Na hom mu biara a ɔyar, na onnyi gyedzi dɛ wobotum asã no yar, na mbom ɔgye dzi no, wɔmfa nhatanhataw nye edziban a ɔgow, nnya tsema nhwɛ no, na mma wɔmma ɔtamfo mmfã ne nsa nnkã no.
Na wɔmfrɛ asɔr no mu elderfo beenu anaa ma ɔbor dɛm ma wɔmfa hɔn nsa ngu hɔn do wɔ me dzin mu mbɔ mpaa; na sɛ wowu a wobowu ama me; na sɛ wɔtsena ase a wɔbɛtsena ase ama me.
Hom mbɔ mu ntsena wɔ ɔdɔ mu, ama hom eetum esũ ama hɔn a wowu, nye nkanka hɔn a wonnyi enyidado biara wɔ enyimnyam wusoɛr no ho no.
Na ɔbɛba dɛ hɔn a wowu wɔ mo mu no nnkɔsɔ owu ahwɛ, osiandɛ ɔbɛyɛ dɛw ama hɔn;
Na hɔn a woennwu wɔ mo mu no, wondue, osiandɛ hɔn wu yɛ wen.
Na bio, ɔbɛba dɛ nyia ɔwɔ gyedzi wɔ mo mu dɛ obenya ayarsa no, sɛ wɔnnhyehyɛe mmaa no dɛ obowu a, obenya ayarsa.
Nyia ɔwɔ gyedzi dɛ obohu no obohu.
Nyia ɔwɔ gyedzi dɛ ɔbɛtse asɛm no ɔbɛtse.
Obobuafo a ɔwɔ gyedzi dɛ obohuruw no obohuruw.
Na hɔn a wonnyi gyedzi dɛ wɔbɛyɛ ndzɛmba yinom no, na mbom wɔwɔ gyedzi wɔ mo mu no, wɔ tum dɛ wɔbɛyɛ me mba; na mber dodowara a wommbuu me mbra do no, hom nsoa hɔn wɔ hɔn mberɛwyɛ ho.
Hom ngyina gyinabew a wɔdze hom esisi no.
Mma mmfa wo nua n’atar; na dza agye efi wo nua hɔ no, tua kaw.
Na sɛ inya ndzɛmba ma obu dza edze bɔhwɛ wo ho do a, fa kɔ m’adzekorabea ama hom aayɛ biribiara dɛ mbrɛ mase hom no.
Hom mbisa, na wɔdze me kyerɛwsɛm a mahyehyɛ ato hɔ dze ama no bɛma hom, na wɔnkora do dwodwoodwo;
Na obeye dɛ ibomua w’ano wɔ ho, na mma nnkyerɛkyerɛ kesi dɛ hom nsa bɛkã ne nyinara.
Na mebɛma hom mbrasɛm bi na n’ekyir na hom dze bɛkyerɛkyerɛ nyimpa nyinara; na ɔwɔ dɛ wɔdze bɛkyerɛkyerɛ aman, ebusuakuw, kasahorow nye nyimpa nyinara.
Hom mmfa ndzɛmba nyinara a hom nsa akã a medze ama wɔ me kyerɛwsɛm mu a ɔyɛ mbra no nyɛ mbra a hom dze bɔhwɛ m’asɔr do;
Na nyia ɔbɛyɛ ndzɛmba yinom no benya nkwa, na nyia ɔrennyɛ no, sɛ ɔkɔ do yɛ dɛmara a, wobobu no fɔ.
Sɛ hom bisa a, hom benya nyikyerɛ mu nyikyerɛ, nyimdzee mu nyimdzee, ama hom eehu esumadze nye asomdwee ndzɛmba—dza ɔdze enyigye ba, dza ɔdze onnyiewiei nkwa ba.
Hom mbisa na wobeyi bea a wɔbɛkyekyer Jerusalem Fofor no akyerɛ hom wɔ mankasa me ber a ɔsɛ mu.
Na hwɛ, ɔbɛba dɛ wɔbɔsoma mo nkowaa ma wɔaakɔ boka nye anee, etsifi nye anaafo.
Na seseiara mpo, hom mma nyia ɔkɔ boka no nkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn a wɔbesakyer no dɛ wonguan nkɔ anee, na wɔnyɛ dɛm osian dza ɔreba asaase do, nye nsumaamu fɛkuwbɔ ntsi.
Hwɛ, hom ndzi ndzɛmba yinom nyinara do, na hom akatua bɛyɛ kɛse; na hom dze, wɔdze ama hom dɛ hom nhu ahenman no mu esumadze, na mbom wiadze dze wɔmmaa hɔn kwan dɛ wonhu.
Hom nhyɛ mbra a hom nsa akã no nsew na hom ndzi nokwar wɔ ho.
Na ekyir yi hom nsa bɛkã asɔr ahyɛmudzi no, dza ɔbɔso ma hom etsim wɔ ha nye Jerusalem Fofor no mu.
Dɛm ntsi, nyia ne nyansaa tɔ sin no, ombisa me na medze bɛma no kwa na merennkã n’enyim.
Hom mma hom akoma do na hom ndzi dɛw osiandɛ wɔdze ahenman no, anaadɛ asɔr no ne nsaafee ama hom. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.
Asɔfo nye akyerɛkyerɛfo no benya dwuma a wobedzi, asɔrmba no so mpo.

Na elderfo anaadɛ asɔfo mpanyin a woeyi hɔn dɛ wɔmboa bishop no dɛ wɔ n’apamfo no wɔ ndzɛmba nyinara mu no, ɔwɔ dɛ wɔdze egyapadze a wɔdze abɔ afɔr dze ama bishop no dɛ ɔmfa nhwɛ ehiafo hɔn ebusuafo na ɔmfa ndzi dwuma binom so dɛ mbrɛ wɔakã no dada no.
Anaadɛ, ɔwɔ dɛ wotua hɔn kaw wɔ edwuma a wɔreyɛ nyinara ho, dɛ wɔdze dwuma tsitsir bi bɛhyɛ hɔn nsa anaadɛ biribi fofor, dɛ mbrɛ oye a apamfo no nye bishop no bɛgye ato mu.
Na bishop no so wɔ dɛ ne nsa kã biribi a ɔdze bɔhwɛ noho, anaadɛ wotua no kaw wɔ no dwuma a oridzi wɔ asɔr no mu no ho.

Hwɛ, nokwar, mese hom dɛ nyimpa biara a wɔwɔ hom mu a osian ndwamanbɔ ntsi wobeyi hɔn hokafo edzi, no, sɛ wɔdze ahobrɛadze akoma bɛgye dase wɔ hom enyim dɛ dɛm na asɛm no tse a, mma hom nnyi hɔn edzi mmfi hom mu;
Na mbom sɛ hom hu dɛ osian awartõ ho ntsi nkorɔfo bi egyaa hɔn hokafo, na sɛ mfom no gyina hɔnankasa hɔn do, na sɛ hɔn hokafo no tse nkwa mu a, hom nyi hɔn edzi mfi hom mu.
Na bio, mese hom dɛ, hom nhwɛ yie wɔ nhwehwɛmu biara a hom yɛ ho, amma sɛ wɔawar a hom anngye hɔn a wɔtsetse dɛm no wɔ hom mu;
Na sɛ wɔnnwaree a, wonnu hɔnho wɔ hɔn bɔn nyina ho, annyɛ dɛm a mma hom nngye hɔn.
Na bio, nyimpa biara a ɔdɔm Christ n’asɔr yi no wɔ dɛ ɔhwɛ na odzi asɔr ne mbrasɛm nye ahyɛmu nyinara do.

Na ɔbɛba dɛ sɛ nkorɔfo bi wɔ hom mu dzi ewu a wonyi hɔn mma na wɔnye hɔn ndzi no dɛ mbrɛ mbra a ɔwɔ asaase no do se; na hom nkaa dɛ onnyi bɔnfakyɛ; na wɔbɛda no edzi dɛ mbrɛ mbra a ɔwɔ asaase no do se.

Na sɛ banyin anaa ɔbaa tõ awar a, wondzi n’asɛm wɔ asɔr no mu wɔ elderfo beenu anaa dza ɔbor dɛm enyim, na asɛm biara a wɔbɛkã etsia no no, ɔwɔ dɛ asɔr no mu adasefo beenu gye dase tsia no wɔ ho, na mma wonntsie ɔtamfo ne dasegye; na mbom oye dɛ adasefo no wɔbor beenu.

Na mbom adasefo beenu hɔn anomusɛm na wongyina do mfa mbu no fɔ; na elderfo no mfa asɛm no nto asɔrmba no enyim, na asɔrmba no mma hɔn nsa do mfa ntsia no, ama wɔnye no eedzi dɛ mbrɛ Nyame ne mbra se.
Na sɛ ɔbɛyɛ yie a, bishop no so ntsena mu bi.
Na dɛm na hom nyɛ wɔ asɛm biara a wɔdze bɛba hom enyim no ho.
Na sɛ banyin anaa ɔbaa bi bɔ epoo a, wɔmma wɔnye no ndzi dɛ mbrɛ mbra a ɔwɔ asaase no do se.
Na sɛ owia adze a, wɔmma wɔnye no ndzi dɛ mbrɛ mbra a ɔwɔ asaase no do se.
Na sɛ odzi ator a, wɔmma wɔnye no ndzi dɛ mbrɛ mbra a ɔwɔ asaase no do se.
Na sɛ ɔyɛ emumuyɛdze biara a, wɔmma wɔnye no ndzi dɛ mbrɛ mbra no se, ɔyɛ Nyame ne dze no mpo.
Na sɛ wo nuabanyin anaa w’akyerɛbaa bi fom wo a, frɛ no nko na enye no nkã; na sɛ ɔgye no mfom to mu a, enye no mbɔ mu bio.
Na sɛ ɔanngye no mfom annto mu a, fa no kɔ asɔr no enyim, nnyɛ asɔrmba no, na mbom elderfo no a. Na wɔbɛkã no wɔ nhyiamu ase, na nnyɛ wɔ bagua mu.
Na sɛ wo nuabanyin anaa w’akyerɛbaa bi fom ɔdodow a, wɔntsẽa no wɔ ɔdodow enyim.
Na sɛ obi fom wɔ bagua mu a, wɔnka n’enyim wɔ bagua mu, ama n’enyim eegu ase. Na sɛ ɔanngye no mfom annto mu a, wɔnye no ndzi dɛ mbrɛ Nyame ne mbra se.
Sɛ obi fom wɔ nsumaamu a, wɔnkã n’enyim wɔ nsumaamu ama oeenya kwan akã no mfom akyerɛ onyia ɔafom no no, nye Nyankopɔn wɔ nsumaamu, amma asɔr no annkasa ammfa enngu n’enyim ase.
Na dɛm na hom nyɛ wɔ adze nyinara mu.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/43.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 43
chapter_summary: 1–7, Nyikyerɛ na mbrasɛm fi nyimpa kortonoo a woeyi no esi hɔ mu ba; 8–14, Wɔtsew Ahotseweefo ho wɔ ber a woridzi dwuma wɔ krɔnkrɔnyɛ mu wɔ Ewuradze n’enyim no; 15–22, Wɔsoma elderfo dɛ wɔnkɛkã nnuho ho asɛm na wonsiesie adasa mfa mma Ewuradze Ne da kɛse no; 23–28, Ewuradze dua nankasa Ne ndze na abɔdze no tum do frɛ nyimpa; 29–35, Mfe Apem no na Satan ne nkyekyeree no bɛba.

verses.text: O Hom ntsie, hom elderfo a hom wɔ m’asɔr mu, na hom nyɛ aso mma nsɛm a merebɛkã akyerɛ hom yi.
Na hwɛ, nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, hom nsa akã mbrasɛm a ɔyɛ m’asɔr ne mbra no, medze duaa nyia meyi no esi hɔ ama hom dɛ ɔngye mbrasɛm nye nyikyerɛ mfi me nsamu no do.
Na iyi na hom bohu dɛ ɔyɛ nokwar—dɛ obiara nnyi hɔ bio a woeyi no esi hɔ ama hom dɛ ɔngye mbrasɛm nye nyikyerɛ mfa mma hom kodu dɛ wɔbɛfa no, sɛ ɔtsena mo mu a.
Na nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ obiara nnyi hɔ bio a wobeyi no esi hɔ dze ama dɛm akyɛdze yi gyedɛ wɔdze dua ɔno nko do; na sɛ wɔgye fi ne nsamu a orinnya tum bio gyedɛ woyi obi fofor si n’ananmu.
Na iyi bɛyɛ mbra ama hom, dɛ mma hom nngye nkyerɛkyerɛ biara mmfi obiara a ɔbɛba hom enyim abɛkã dɛ onya nyikyerɛ anaa mbrasɛm hɔ;
Na medze iyi ma hom amma wɔaanndaadaa hom na mbom hom eehu dɛ ommfi mo hɔ.

Na nokwar, mese hom dɛ, nyia mahyɛ no sɔfo no wɔ dɛ odua abow no mu ba na wɔhyɛ no sɔfo dɛ mbrɛ makã akyerɛ hom dada no, ama ɔaakyerɛkyerɛ dɛm nyikyerɛ a hom nsa akã nye dza hom nsa bɛkã efi nyia meyi no esi hɔ no hɔ.

Na afei, hwɛ, mbrasɛm a medze ma hom nye dɛ, sɛ hom hyia a, hom nkyerɛkyerɛ homho na hom ntotow homho do ama hom eetum ehu dza ɔwɔ dɛ hom yɛ, na hom akyerɛ m’asɔr no kwan, mbrɛ obesi edzi me mbra nye me mbrasɛm a medze ama no do.
Na dɛm kwan yi na hom mfa do nya nkyerɛkyerɛ wɔ m’asɔr ne mbra ho na hom mma dza hom nsa akã no ntsew homho, na hom bɛhyɛ bɔw abɔ bra wɔ krɔnkrɔnyɛ wɔ m’enyim—
Na mber dodowara a hom bɛyɛ dɛm no, wɔdze enyimnyam bɛkã ahenman a hom nsa akã no ho. Na mber dodowara a hom nnkɛyɛ no, wɔbɛgye dza hom nsa akã no mpo.
Hom ntow emumuyɛ a ɔwɔ hom mu no ngu; hom ntsew homho wɔ m’enyim;
Na sɛ hom pɛ ahenman no mu enyimnyam a, hom nyi m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, na hom mpegya no wɔ m’enyim wɔ mpaabɔ a gyedzi wɔ mu.
Na bio, mese hom dɛ, sɛ hom pɛ ahenman mu esumasɛm ehu a, hom mma no edziban na ntar, nye dza ohia biara a ɔdze bɛyɛ edwuma a mahyɛ no dɛ ɔnyɛ no;
Na sɛ hom annyɛ a, ɔbɔkɔ do ayɛ hɔn a wɔagye no edzi no nko dze, ama maakora nkorɔfo a hɔnho tsew do wɔ m’enyim.

Bio, mese dɛ, hom ntsie hɔn a wɔyɛ m’asɔr mu elderfo a meyi hɔn esi hɔ no: Wɔannsoma hom dɛ hom nkɔ na wɔnkyerɛkyerɛ hom, na mbom dɛ hom nkɛkyerɛkyerɛ adasamba ndzɛmba a menam mo Sunsum no tum do dze ahyɛ hom nsamu no;
Na wofi sor bɛkyerɛkyerɛ hom. Hom ntsew homho na wɔdze adom akyɛdze tum bɛhyɛ hom mã, ama hom dze dza makã no mpo ama.
Hom ntsie, osiandɛ, hwɛ, Ewuradze ne da kɛse no abɛn.

Na da no bɛba a Ewuradze dze ne ndze bɛkasa efi sor, na ɔsorsor bɔwosow na asaase apopo, na Nyame no totorobɛnto bɛtsẽa mu kɛse akyɛr, na ɔase aman a wɔadeda no dɛ: Hom ahotseweefo, hom nsoɛr na hom ntsena ase; hom ndzebɔnyɛfo, hom ntweɔn na hom nda kesi dɛ mebɛfrɛ bio.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mbɔ hom asen do amma woeennhu hom wɔ emumuyɛfo mu.
Hom mma hom ndze do na mma hom nngyaa. Hom nse aman dɛ wonnu hɔnho, mpanyimfo nye mbofra, ndɔmmumfo nye fahodzifo, hom nse dɛ: Hom nsiesie homho mma Ewuradze ne da kɛse no;

Na sɛ emi a meyɛ nyimpa, mema me ndze do na mese hom dɛ hom nnu homho, na sɛ hom tan me a, sɛ da no ba na wimu paapaa mu fi asaase ne mfɛndzanan nyina, kasa gu atseasefo nyina asowa mu, se dɛ—Hom nnu homho; na hom nsiesie homho mma Ewuradze ne da kɛse no a, hom bɛse dɛn?

Nyew, na bio, sɛ enyinam tsew fi boka afamu dze kɔ anee dze ndze tsẽa mu kyerɛ atseasefo nyinara, na ɔma hɔn a wɔbɛtse nyinara hɔn asowa mu yɛ hɔn heii, na ɔse dɛ—Hom nnu homho, na Ewuradze ne da kɛse no aba so ɛ?
Na bio, Ewuradze bɛma ne ndze do fi sor ase dɛ: Hom nyɛ aso, O hom aman a hom wɔ asaase do, na hom ntsie dɛm Nyankopɔn no a ɔbɔɔ hom no ne nsɛm.
O, hom aman a hom wɔ asaase do, mpɛn ahen na matase hom aboa ano dɛ mbrɛ akokɔ baatan boaboa ne mba dze hyɛ ne ntsaban ase, na mbom hom mma ho kwan!

Mpɛn ahen na medua mo nkowaa ano do afrɛ hom, na menam abɔfo hɔn som do, na wɔ mankasa me ndze do, na wɔ sor mpaapaamu ndze do, nye enyinam ndze do, nye ehum ndze do, nye asaasewosow ndze do, nye mframa dzendzen, nye ɔkɔm na ɔyardɔm ahorow ndze do, nye totorobɛnto ndze kɛse do, nye atsɛmbu ndze do, nye da nyina mu mbɔbɔrhu ndze do, nye enyimnyam na emudzi ndze do, nye onnyiewiei nkwa mu ahonya do, na medze nkwagye a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem agye hom nkwa, na mbom hom mma ho kwan!
Hwɛ, da no aba, na m’ebufuhyew kɔɔpow no ayɛ mã.
Hwɛ, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, iyi nye Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn ne nsɛm.
Dɛm ntsi, hom nyɛ edwuma, hom nyɛ edwuma wɔ mo wenyin ture mu wɔ aber a odzi ekyir yi mu—ber a odzi ekyir a wɔdze refrɛ hɔn a wɔtse asaase do.
Na mebɛba asaase do mankasa me ber ano ebobu atsɛn, na wɔbɔpon mo nkorɔfo na wɔnye me edzi hen wɔ asaase do.
Na Mfe Apem kɛse no a medua mo nkowaa ano akã no, bɛba.
Na wɔbɛkyekyer Satan, na sɛ wɔsan no bio a, obedzi hen mber tsiabaa mu, na afei asaase bɛba ewiei.
Na wɔbɛsakyer nyia ɔtsenaa ase wɔ tseneneeyɛ mu no ntsɛmara, na asaase botwa mu akɔ tse dɛ mbrɛ wɔdze ogya ahyew.
Na emumuyɛfo bɔkɔ ogya a onndum da mu, na hɔn ewiei dze, ɔdasanyi biara nnyim, anaadɛ orunnhu, kesi dɛ wɔbɛba m’enyim wɔ atsɛmbu mu.
Hom ntsie dɛm nsɛm yi. Hwɛ, emi nye Jesus Christ, wiadze Agyenkwa no. Hom nkora ndzɛmba yinom do wɔ hom akoma mu, na hom mma mbersantsen ne duryɛ no ho adwendwen nda hom adwen mu.
Hom nyɛ botoo. Hom ndzi me mbrasɛm nyinara do. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/44.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 44
chapter_summary: 1–3, Elderfo no wɔ dɛ wohyia mu wɔ nhyiamu kɛse no ase; 4–6, Ɔwɔ dɛ wɔhyehyɛ biribiara dɛ mbrɛ mbra a ɔwɔ asaase no do se na wɔhwɛ ehiafo no.

verses.text: Hwɛ, dɛm na Ewuradze se hom mo nkowaa, muhu dɛ wɔbɛkyerɛw nkrataa anaa wɔbɛfa kwan bi do afrɛ m’asɔr mu elderfo efi boka na anee, nye etsifi na anaafo ma woebehyia mu.
Na ɔbɛba dɛ, susuampaara dɛ wodzi nokwar, na wɔwɔ gyedzi wɔ mo mu no, sɛ wohyia mu a, da no mubohue mo Sunsum egu hɔn do.
Na ɔbɛba dɛ wɔbɔkɔ mbea a ɔwɔ apaamu hɔ no do, na wɔakɛkã nnuho ho asɛm akyerɛ nkorɔfo no.
Na dodowara bɛsakyer ama hom eenya tum dze ahyehyɛ hom dwumadzi biara dɛ mbrɛ nyimpa mbra se.
Ama hom atamfo enntum enya tum wɔ hom do; na wɔbɔbɔ hom ho ban wɔ ndzɛmba nyinara mu, ama hom eetum edzi me mbra do; na nhyehyɛɛ biara a ɔtamfo no ayɛ dɛ ɔdze rohwehwɛ asɛɛ mo nkorɔfo no aayɛ kwa.

Hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, hom nserasera ehiafo nye abɔbɔfo na wɔmma hɔn mboa aama woeyi hɔn ahokyer efi hɔ, ama hom aakora hɔn do ekesi dɛ hom bɛyɛ ndzɛmba nyina yie dɛ mbrɛ me mbra a hom nsa akã no se. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/45.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 45
chapter_summary: 1–5, Christ yɛ hɛn dzimafo wɔ Egya N’enyim; 6–10, Asɛmpa no yɛ ɔsomafo a oribesiesie kwan wɔ Ewuradze N’enyim; 11–15, Ewuradze gyee Enoch na no nuanom no maa Noho; 16–23, Christ yii Ne mbaa ho nsɛnkyerɛdze kyerɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ woyii kyerɛe wɔ Bepɔw Olives do no; 24–38, Wɔdze asɛmpa no bɛsan aba, Amanamamfo hɔn mber no bɛhyɛ mã, na amamfoyɛ yarba akata asaase no do; 39–47, Nsɛnkyerɛdze, anwanwadze, na Owusoɛr no na obedzi Mbae a Otsĩa Ebien no enyim; 48–53, Christ begyina Bepɔw Olives do, na Jewfo no bohu Ne nsamu na N’anan ho pirakur no; 54–59, Ewuradze bedzi hen wɔ Mfe Apem no mu; 60–62, Wɔhyɛɛ Nkɔnhyɛnyi no dɛ ɔnhyɛ ase nkyerɛ Ahyɛmu Fofor no ase, ama woeedua do ada nsɛm a ho hia no edzi; 63–75, Wɔhyɛ Ahotseweefo no dɛ wɔmboa hɔn ano na wɔnkyekyer Jerusalem Fofor no, hɔ na nkorɔfo befi aman nyinara mu aba.

verses.text: Hom ntsie, O hom a hom yɛ m’asɔrmba, hom a wɔdze ahenman no ama; hom ntsie, na hom nyɛ aso mma nyia ɔtoow asaase ne fapem no, nyia ɔbɔɔ sor nye dɔmtutuw a wɔwɔ mu nyinara no, nyia wɔnam no do yɛɛ ndzɛmba nyinara a wɔtse ase na wɔkekã hɔn ho, na wɔwɔ hɔ.
Na bio, mese, hom ntsie me ndze, amma owu aammfa hom; wɔ dɔn a hom nnsusu mu dɛ ɔhyewber botwa mu, na twaber aba ewiei, na hom akra nnyaa nkwa.
Hom ntsie nyia ɔyɛ dzimafo no wɔ Egya n’enyim, nyia ɔserɛ hom asɛm ma hom wɔ n’enyim no—
Se dɛ: Egya, hwɛ nyia ɔannyɛ bɔn no n’amandzehu na no wu, ɔno a ɔsɔ w’enyi no; hwɛ wo Ba no bɔgyaa a okyii no, nyia iyii no mae ama woeekyi no bɔgyaa aahyɛ wo enyimnyam;
Dɛm ntsi, Egya, gye mo nuanom yinom a wɔgye me dzin dzi no, ama wɔaaba mo hɔ na woeenya daapem nkwa.
Hom ntsie, O, mo nkorɔfo a hom yɛ m’asɔrmba, na hom elderfo, hom mbɔ mu ntsie, na hom ntsie me ndze wɔ ber a hom kã dɛ ndɛ yi, na mma hom mmpirim hom akoma;
Na nokwar, mese hom dɛ, emi nye Alpha na Omega, ahyɛse nye ewiei no, wiadze kan nye nkwa no—kan a ɔhyerɛn wɔ sum mu na sum no annkyer no.

Mebaa mankasa medze hɔ, na mankasa medze anngye me; na mbom dodowara a wɔgyee me no, memaa hɔn tum dɛ wɔmfa nyɛ etumdze pii, na wɔmbɛyɛ Nyame ne mba; na hɔn a wɔgyee me dzin dzii no so mpo memaa hɔn tum ma wɔdze eenya onnyiewiei nkwa.

Na masoma m’ahyɛmudzi a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no so mpo wɔ wiadze dɛ ɔmbɛyɛ kan mfa mma wiadze, na ɔnyɛ esusudze mfa mma mo nkorɔfo, na Amanamamfo mper nhwehwɛ no, na ɔnyɛ ɔsomafo ndzi m’enyim nkesiesie kwan a ɔda m’enyim no.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mbra ne nkyɛn, na nyia ɔba no, menye no beyi atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ menye tsetseberdomba no yii atsɛn no, na mebɛma hom ehu mbrɛ me nyansaa mu dɔ.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mbɔ mu ntsie na hom mma menkyerɛ hom me nyansaa—nyia hom kã dɛ ɔyɛ Enoch na no nuanom hɔn Nyame ne nyansaa no,
Hɔn a wɔpaa hɔn fii asaase do, na megyee hɔn dze maa moho—kuropɔn a wɔdze esie kesi dɛ tseneneeyɛ da no bɛba—da a nyimpa ahotsewfo nyina peree hwehwɛe, na osian emumuyɛ nye ndzeyɛbɔn ntsi woennhu no;
Na wɔpaa mu dɛ wɔyɛ anana na akwantufo wɔ asaase do;
Mbom wɔbɔɔ hɔn anohoba dɛ wɔnhwehwɛ na wonhu wɔ honam mu.
Dɛm ntsi, hom ntsie na menye hom beyi atsɛn, na mebɛkasa akyerɛ hom na mahyɛ nkɔm, dɛ mbrɛ medze yɛɛ tsetseberdomba no.

Na medze bɛkyerɛ hom pefee dɛ mbrɛ medze kyerɛɛ m’esuafo no ber a migyinaa hɔn enyim wɔ honam mu, na mekasaa kyerɛɛ hɔn se dɛ: Dɛ mbrɛ hom ebisa me wɔ nsɛnkyerɛdze a ɔfa me mbae ho no, wɔ da a mebɛba wɔ m’enyimnyam mu wɔ sor mununkum mu no, dɛ merebɛhyɛ anohoba a medze bɔɔ hom egyanom mã no.
Na dɛ mbrɛ hom ahwɛ mber tsentsen a hom esunsum fii hom nyimpadua mu no dɛ ɔyɛ ndɔmmumfa no, mebɛkyerɛ hom mbrɛ ɔpon da no bɛyɛ bɛba, na ber so a Israelmba a wɔabɔ apetse no hɔn nsanananmu.
Na sesei, hom hu temple a ɔwɔ Jerusalem yi, dza hom frɛ no Nyankopɔn ne fie, na hom atamfo so kã dɛ fie yi nnkɔhwe ase da,
Na nokwar, mese hom dɛ, dɛm amamfoyɛ yi bɛba ebusuasantsen yi do anafua dɛ owifo, na wɔbɛsɛɛ nkorɔfo yinom na wɔabɔ hɔn apetse aman nyina do.
Na temple yi a hom hu no sesei yi wonkegya ɔbo kor mpo a ɔda kor do wɔ hɔ a wonnkodwuruw egu famu.
Na ɔbɛba dɛ, Jewfo ebusuasantsen yi runntwa mu nnkɔ gyedɛ amamfoyɛ biara a makã ho asɛm akyerɛ hom no ayɛ hɔ ansaana.
Hom kã dɛ, hom nyim dɛ wiadze ewiei reba, na hom kã so dɛ hom nyim dɛ ɔsor nye asaase botwa mu;
Na dza hom kã wɔ iyinom ho no yɛ nokwar; osiandɛ, ɔtse dɛmara; na mbom nsɛm a makã akyerɛ hom yinom runntwa mu nnkɔ gyedɛ ne nyina ayɛ hɔ ansaana.
Na iyi na makã akyerɛ hom fa Jerusalem ho; na sɛ dɛm da no ba a, wɔbɔbɔ nkaa no apetse aman nyinara mu.
Mbom wɔbɔboaboa hɔn ano bio; na mbom wɔbɛtsena hɔara ekesi dɛ Amanamamfo hɔn mber no bɛhyɛ mã.
Na dɛm da no mu no wɔbɛtse akõkoekõ nye ɔkõ ho nsɛm, na asaase no do nyina bɛyɛ begyabegya, na nyimpa bɔtɔ akɔtɔmborɔnsa, na wɔbɛkã dɛ Christ ekyinkyim ne mbae ho ekesi asaase n’ewiei.
Na nyimpa no dɔ bɛyɛ nwin, na emumuyɛ bɔdɔɔ sõ.
Na sɛ Amanamamfo hɔn mber no sõ a, kan bopue wɔ hɔn a wɔtse sum mu no do, na ɔbɛyɛ m’asɛmpa ne mãhyɛ.
Na mbom wɔnngye; osiandɛ wonnhu kan no, osian nyimpa nkyerɛkyerɛ ntsi wɔdan hɔn akoma fi me nkyɛn.
Na dɛm ebusuasantsen no mu na Amanamamfo hɔn mber no bɛhyɛ mã.
Na dɛm ebusuasantsen no mu nyimpa binom bɛtsena hɔ na worunntwamu nnkɔ kesi dɛ wobohu ɔhaw mbordo no; osiandɛ amamfoyɛ yarba bɛkata asaase no do.
Na mbom m’esuafo begyina mbea krɔnkrɔn do, na worinnhihim; na mbom emumuyɛfo hɔn mu no, nyimpa bɛma hɔn ndze do na wɔakã ndom etsia Nyame na woewu.
Na asaasewosow nye ɔsɛɛ pii besi mbea pii do; naaso nyimpa bepirim hɔn akoma dze etsia me, na wɔbɔtwetwe nkrantsee wɔ hɔnankasa hɔn do, na wobokuku hɔnho nkorkor.
Na afei, ber a emi Ewuradze mekãa nsɛm yinom kyerɛɛ m’esuafo no, ɔhaaw hɔn.
Na mesee hɔn dɛ: Mma ɔnnhaw hom, osiandɛ sɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom si a, hom bohu dɛ anohoba a wɔdze abɔ hom no bɛhyɛ mã.
Na sɛ kan no hyɛ ase dɛ orupue a, ɔbɛyɛ hɔn dɛ abɛbusɛm a merekã akyerɛ hom yi—
Hom hwɛ ndɔmbadua, na hom dze hom enyiwa hwɛ na hom hu dɛ ɔrefefɛw, na hɔn nhataw da ho yɛ momon a, nna ɔkyerɛ dɛ ɔhyewber abɛn;
Dɛmara na sɛ wohu ndzɛmba yinom a, ɔbɛyɛ wɔ dɛm da no mu, na wobohu dɛ dɔn no abɛn.
Na ɔbɛba dɛ nyia osuro me no bɔhwɛ Ewuradze ne da kɛse no a ɔbɛba no kwan, wɔbɔhwɛ Nyimpa Ba no ne mbae ho nsɛnkyerɛdze no mpo.
Na wobohu nsɛnkyerɛdze nye anwanwadze, osiandɛ wobeyi akyerɛ wɔ sorsor no sor nye asaase n’ase.
Na wobohu bɔgya, na ogya, nye wusiw kumbɔɔ.
