Na ansaana Ewuradze ne da no bɛba no, ewia bɛdan sum, na bosoom adan bɔgya, na nworaba botutu efi sor atotɔ.
Na wɔbɔboaboa nkaa no ano wɔ bea yi do.
Na wɔbɔhwehwɛ me, na hwɛ, mebɛba; na wobohu me wɔ sor mununkum mu dɛ medze tum na enyimnyam kɛse, nye abɔfo krɔnkrɔn risian; na nyia ɔannhwɛ me kwan no wobotwa no akyen.
Na ansaana Ewuradze n’abasa bɛba famu no, ɔbɔfo bɛhɛn no totorobɛnto no, na ahotsewfo a wɔadeda no bɔsoɛr ebehyia me wɔ mununkum no mu.

Dɛm ntsi, sɛ hom daa asomdwee mu a nna nhyira akã hom; na afei hom ehu me na hom nyim dɛ Metse ase yi, dɛmara so mpo na hom bɛba mo hɔ na hom akra bɛtsena ase, na hom ɔpon bedzi mu; na ahotseweefo befi asaase ne mfɛndzanan nyinara aba.
Na Ewuradze n’abasa bɔtɔ aman no do.
Na Ewuradze dze ne nan besi bepɔw yi do, na no mu bɛpaa ebien, na asaase apopo, na oehimahima fi ha akɔ hɔ, na ɔsorsor so bɔwosow.
Na Ewuradze dze ne ndze bɛkasa, na asaase n’ano nyina bɛtse; na aman a wɔwɔ asaase do nyina esi nkrum, na hɔn a wɔserewee no bohu hɔn nkwasea a wɔayɛ.
Na mbusu bogu ɔtwetwesifo do, na wɔbɛhyew ɔnokumfo; na wobotwa emumuyɛfo akyen na wɔatow hɔn akyen gya mu.
Na nkyii Jewfo no bɔhwɛ me na wɔakã dɛ: Ebɛn epirakur na ɔwɔ wo nsamu nye w’anan ho yi?

Nkyii na wobohu dɛ emi nye Ewuradze no; osiandɛ mebɛse hɔn dɛ: Epirakur yinom yɛ epirakur a minyae wɔ m’anyɛnkofo fie. Emi nye nyia wɔmaa no do no. Emi nye Jesus a wɔbɔɔ no mbeamudua mu no. Emi nye Nyame ne Ba no.
Na nkyii osian hɔn emumuyɛ ntsi, wobosũ, na ɔnam dɛ wɔyɛɛ hɔn hen ayakayakadze ntsi wobotwa kwadwom.
Na nkyii wɔbɔpon aman a wɔyɛ abosonsɔrfo no, na hɔn a wonnyim mbra biara benya kyɛfa wɔ owusoɛr a odzi kan no mu; na wobotum egyina ano.
Na wɔbɛkyekyer Satan amma oeennya adasamba hɔn akoma mu kwan.
Na dɛm da no, sɛ meba wɔ m’enyimnyam mu a, nna abɛbu a mekãe a ɔfa mbaabun du no ho no bɛhyɛ mã.

Na hɔn a wɔyɛ enyansafo na wɔgyee nokwar no, na wɔfaa Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no dze yɛɛ hɔn kwankyerɛfo, na wɔamma wɔaanndaadaa hɔn no—nokwar, mese hom dɛ worunntwa hɔn nnto famu na wɔnntow hɔn nnkyen ogya mu, mbom, wobotum egyina wɔ da no mu.
Na wɔdze asaase no bɛma hɔn ma ɔaayɛ hɔn egyapadze; na wɔbɔdɔr na hɔn ho bɛyɛ dzen, na hɔn mba benyin na wɔrennyɛ bɔn dze akɔ nkwagye mu.
Na Ewuradze bɛtsena hɔn finimfin, na n’enyimnyam bɛba hɔn do, na ɔbɛyɛ hɔn hen na hɔn mbrahyɛfo.
Na afei, hwɛ, mese wo dɛ, wɔmmaa wo ho kwan dɛ ebohu dɛm tsir yi mu akɔ ekyir, kesi dɛ wɔbɛkyerɛ Ahyɛmu Fofor no ase, no mu na wɔbɛda ndzɛmba yinom edzi akyerɛ;
Dɛm ntsi, mema wo kwan dɛ afei kyerɛ ase, ama eesiesie woho dze ama ndzɛmba a ɔbɛba no.
Na nokwar, mese hom dɛ, ndzɛmba akɛse wɔ hɔ rotweɔn hom;
Hom tse akõkoekõ wɔ anana asaase do; na hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, ɔabɛn hom, oedu hom abowano mpo, na ɔrennkyɛr na hom atse akõkoekõ wɔ homankasa hom nsaase do.

Dɛm ntsi, emi Ewuradze, makã dɛ hom mma hɔn a wɔwɔ boka nsaase do mboa hom ano mbra, na hom nhyia, hom a hom yɛ m’asɔr mu elderfo nyina; hom nkɔ anee nkurow do nkɛse nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ hɔ no dɛ wonnu hɔnho, na mber dodowara a wobonu hɔnho no, hom nkyekyer asɔr mma me.
Na hom mfa akoma kor na adwen kor mboaboa hom sika ano ama hom dze aatɔ egyapadze a wɔbɛkyerɛ hom ekyir yi.
Na wɔbɛfrɛ no Jerusalem Fofor no, asomdwee asaase, guandɔbea kurow, Ɔsorsor Nyankopɔn n’ahotseweefo hɔn sumabew;
Na Ewuradze n’enyimnyam bɛtsena hɔ, na Ewuradze ho suro bɔwɔ hɔ so, dɛm bɛma emumuyɛfo nnkotum aba hɔ, na wɔbɛfrɛ no Zion.
Na ɔbɛba wɔ emumuyɛfo no mu dɛ nyimpa biara a ɔnnkɔtwe ne nkrantsee wɔ ne nyɛnko do no boguan akɔ Zion ekosuma.
Na nkorɔfo befi ɔman biara a ɔwɔ asaase do akɔboa hɔn ano wɔ hɔ; na hɔn nko nye nkorɔfo a wɔrennye obiara nnkõ.
Na wɔbɛkã wɔ emumuyɛfo mu dɛ: Mma wɔmma yɛnye Zion nnkɔkõ, osiandɛ hɔn a wɔwɔ Zion no ho yɛ hu; dɛm ntsi yerunntum hɔn.
Na ɔbɛba dɛ wɔbɔboaboa atseneneefo ano efi aman nyinara mu na wɔaba Zion, na wɔbɔtow daapem enyigye ndwom.

Na afei, mese hom dɛ, hom mfa ndzɛmba yinom nsie amma aammpetse wiadze kesi dɛ ɔbɛyɛ me pɛ, ama hom etum edzi dwuma yi wɔ nkorɔfo enyim, nye hom atamfo so enyim, amma woeennhu hom ndwuma kesi dɛ hom bowie dza mahyɛ hom dɛ hom nyɛ no;
Ama ber a wobohu no, wɔaadwen ndzɛmba yinom no ho.
Na ber a Ewuradze bɛba no, no ho bɛyɛ hɔn hu, na suro bekitsa hɔn, na wobegyina ekyirekyir na hɔn ho apopo.
Na osian Ewuradze no ho hu nye no tum ahoɔdzen no ntsi, aman nyina bosuro. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/46.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 46
chapter_summary: 1–2, Elderfo wɔdɛ wɔhwɛ som dwumadzi do dɛ mbrɛ Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no bɛkyerɛ; 3–6, Mma wɔmmpam hɔn a wɔreperhwehwɛ nokwar no mmfi sacrament som ase; 7–12, Wombisa Nyankopɔn na wɔmper nhwehwɛ Sunsum n’akyɛdze no; 13–26, Wɔbobɔ Sunsum n’akyɛdze binom edzin no dze ma; 27–33, Wɔma Asɔr no mu banodzifo no tum ama woeetum ehu Sunsum n’akyɛdze no.

verses.text: Hom ntsie, O hom a hom yɛ m’asɔrmba; na nokwar, mese hom dɛ wɔakã ndzɛmba yinom akyerɛ hom ama hom eenya ho mfaso na hom eesũa.

Mbom wɔakyerɛw dɛm ndzɛmba yinom nyina, naaso ɔwɔ dɛ m’asɔr mu elderfo hwɛ nhyiamu nyinara wɔ kwan a Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no bɛkyerɛ no do, wɔakã dɛm akyerɛ hom fi ahyɛse no, na wɔbɔkɔ do akã akyerɛ hom daa.
Eso wɔhyɛ hom dɛ mma hom mmpam obiara mmfi hom bagua mu nhyiamu a wɔyɛ no wɔ wiadze enyim no mu.
Wɔhyɛ hom so dɛ mma hom mmpam obiara a ɔdɔm asɔr no mmfi hom sacrament nhyiamu ase; naaso, sɛ obi afom a, mma wɔmma onndzi bi kesi dɛ ɔbɛyɛ no bɔn ho mpatadze.
Na bio, mese hom dɛ, mma hom mmpam obiara a oesi nketse dɛ ɔrohwehwɛ ahenman no mmfi hom sacrament nhyiamu ase—Mekyerɛ hɔn a wɔnnkã asɔr no ho no.
Na bio, mese hom dɛ mma hom mmpam obiara a ɔnnkã asɔr no ho na oesi nketse dɛ ɔrohwehwɛ ahenman no mmfi hom episi nhyiamu ase.

Mbom wɔahyɛ hom dɛ adze nyina mu hom mbisa Nyame, nyia ɔdze ma kwa; na dza Sunsum no bɛgye ho dase akyerɛ hom no, mebɛpɛ dɛ hom dze akoma a no mu yɛ krɔnkrɔn, hom nnantsew nokwar mu wɔ m’enyim, na hom ndwen hom nkwagye n’ewiei no ho, na hom mfa mpaabɔ nye ndaase nyɛ ndzɛmba nyinara, amma esunsum bɔn, anaadɛ mbɔnsam nkyerɛkyerɛ, anaadɛ nyimpa ne mbrasɛm aanndaadaa hom; osiandɛ bi fi nyimpa, na bi so fi mbɔnsam.
Dɛm ntsi, hom nhwɛ yie amma wɔaanndaadaa hom; na hom nsi nketse nhwehwɛ akyɛdze papa no amma wɔaanndaadaa hom; na aber nyina hom nkaa dza ɔnam do ma wɔdze mae;

Na nokwar, mesɛ hom dɛ, osian hɔn a wɔdɔ me na wodzi me mbrasɛm nyina do, nye hɔn a wɔper dɛ wɔbɛyɛ dɛm ntsi na wɔdze ma; ama aayɛ mfaso ama hɔn a wɔhwehwɛ me anaa wobisa me, na wommbisa mmfa nnhwehwɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze a wɔbɔhwer no wɔ hɔn akɔndɔdze ho.
Na bio, nokwar mese hom dɛ, mepɛ dɛ aber biara hom kaa dza akyɛdze yinom a wɔdze ma asɔr yi yɛ, na hom dze sie hom adwen mu aber nyina.
Na hɔn nyinara nnyi akyɛdze no nyina; osiandɛ akyɛdze no dɔɔ sõ, na Nyame no Sunsum no ma nyimpa biara akyɛdze.
Binom ɔma hɔn kor, binom so ɔma hɔn kor bi so ama no ho aaba mfaso ama hɔn nyinara.
Binom Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no ma wohu dɛ Jesus Christ nye Nyame ne Ba no, na wɔbɔɔ no mbeamudua mu dze maa wiadze bɔn.
Binom so ɔma wɔgye hɔn nsɛm no dzi, dɛ sɛ wɔkɔ do dzi nokwar a, hɔn so wobenya onnyiewiei nkwa.

Na bio, binom so Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no ma wohu mbrɛ wosi hwɛ dwumadzi horow do, dɛ mbrɛ ɔbɔsɔ Ewuradze kor noara n’enyi, dɛ mbrɛ Ewuradze ne pɛ tse, dɛ mbrɛ n’ehumbɔbɔr a ɔwɔ dze ma adasamba wɔ hɔn asetsena mu tse.
Na bio, Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no ma binom so tum ma wohu sunsum mu dwumadzi dɛ ofi Nyame, ama dza Sunsum no bɛda no edzi no ho aaba mfaso aama obiara.
Na bio, nokwar mese hom dɛ, binom so Nyame no Sunsum no ma hɔn enyansasɛm.
Obi so ɔma no nyimdzeesɛm, ama wɔaakyerɛkyerɛ hɔn nyinara ma wɔaayɛ enyansafo na woeenya nyimdzee.
Na bio, binom so ɔma hɔn gyedzi ma wonya ayarsa;
Na binom so ɔma hɔn gyedzi ma wɔdze sa yarba.
Na bio, binom so ɔma hɔn etumdzeyɛ;
Na binom so ɔma wɔhyɛ nkɔm.
Na binom so esunsum mu nhumu.
Na bio, ɔma binom so kasa kasa horow;
Na binom so ɔma hɔn kasa horow nkyerɛase.
Na akyɛdze yinom nyina fi Nyame hɔ ba, ama Nyame ne mba eenya ho mfaso.

Na bishop a ɔwɔ asɔr no mu, nye hɔn a Nyame eyi hɔn ahyɛ hɔn asɔfo dɛ wɔnhwɛ asɔr no do na wɔnyɛ asɔr no mu elderfo no, wɔdze bɛma hɔn dɛ wobenya akyɛdze yinom nyina mu nhunii, amma obiara emmfi hom mu annkã biribi a ommfi Nyame.
Na ɔbɛba dɛ obiara a obebisa wɔ Sunsum mu no benya no wɔ Sunsum mu;
Na binom benya dɛm akyɛdze no nyinara ama woeenya banodzi dzibew, ama asɔrba biara eenya ho mfaso.
Nyia obisa wɔ Sunsum mu no, obisa wɔ kwan a Nyame pɛ do; dɛm ntsi ɔyɛ dza oebisa no ma no.
Na bio, mese hom dɛ, ɔwɔ dɛ wɔyɛ adze nyina wɔ Christ ne dzin mu, biribiara a wɔbɛyɛ no, wɔnyɛ no wɔ Sunsum mu.
Na ɔwɔ dɛ hom da Nyame ase wɔ Sunsum mu wɔ nhyira biara a ɔdze behyira hom ho.
Na hom mbɔ bra pa na hom nyɛ krɔnkrɔn wɔ m’enyim aber nyina. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/47.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 47
chapter_summary: 1–4, Wɔdze hyɛ John Whitmer nsa dɛ ɔnkyerɛw Asɔr n’abakɔsɛm no na ɔnkyerɛw mma Nkɔnhyɛnyi no.

verses.text: Hwɛ, oye ma me dɛ m’akowaa John hwɛ kyerɛw dza osisi aber biara no na ɔhwɛ do so, na ɔboa ɔwo m’akowaa Joseph ma ɔkyerɛw ndzɛmba nyinara a wɔdze bɛma wo no, kɛpem dɛ wɔbɛfrɛ no dɛ ɔnkɛyɛ ndwuma binom so.
Bio, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, obotum so ama ne ndze do akasa wɔ nhyiamu ase ber biara a ɔsɛ no.
Na bio, mese wo dɛ meyi no esi hɔ dɛ ɔnhwɛ asɔr ne kyerɛwsɛm na abakɔsɛm do daa nyina, osiandɛ medze dzibew bi so ama Oliver Cowdery.
Dɛm ntsi, susuampaara dɛ odzi nokwar no, wɔdze Ɔwerɛkyekyefo no bɛma no ma ɔakyerɛw ndzɛmba yinom. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/48.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 48
chapter_summary: 1–3, Ahotseweefo a wɔwɔ Ohio no wɔ dɛ wɔnye hɔn nuanom no kyɛ hɔn nsaase no; 4–6, Ahotseweefo no wɔ dɛ wɔtɔ nsaase, wɔkyekyer kuropɔn, na wodzi afotu a hɔn dwumadzi mu banodzifo dze bɛma hɔn no do.

verses.text: Ohia dɛ aber yi mu hom bɛtsena bea a hom tse yi ara, na dɛm beye ama hom.
Na susuampaara dɛ hom wɔ nsaase a ɔdɔɔ sõ no, hom mma hom nuanom a wofi boka apaamu no bi;
Na susuampaara dɛ hom nnyi nsaase no, hom mma wɔntɔ dza wɔhwɛ a oye ma hɔn wɔ apaamu ha aber yi ara mu, osiandɛ obehia ama hɔn dɛ wobenya beebi atsena aber yi mu.
Obehia dɛ hom sie hom sika nyinara dɛ mbrɛ hom botum, na hom nya dza hom botum enya nyinara wɔ kwan tsenenee do, ama ɔnnkɛkyɛr biara hom eetum atɔ asaase a ɔbɛyɛ hom egyapadze, ɔyɛ kuropɔn mpo.

Onnyi dɛ woyi hom bea no kyerɛ seseiara; na mbom ekyir no a hom nuanom no fi boka apaamu aba no, mbarimba binom wɔ hɔn mu a wobeyiyi hɔn, na hɔn na wɔbɛma woeehu dɛm bea no, anaadɛ hɔn na wobeyi akyerɛ hɔn.

Na wobeyi hɔn ma wɔaakɔtɔ nsaase no, na wɔahyɛ ase atow kuropɔn no ne fapem; na afei hom bɛhyɛ ase aboaboa hom ebusua ebusua ano, ɔbarimba biara nye n’ebusua dɛ mbrɛ ne gyinabew tse, na mbrɛ asɔr mu president na n’apamfo nye asɔr no mu bishop no bɛkyerɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnyɛ a ɔfa mbra nye mbrasɛm a hom nsa akã, nye dza hom nsa bɛka no ekyir yi do. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/49.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 49
chapter_summary: 1–7, Da na dɔn no a Christ bɛba no wonnkohu kɛpem dɛ Ɔbɛba; 8–14, Ɔsɛ dɛ nyimpa nu hɔnho, wɔgye asɛmpa no dzi, na wɔyɛ ayɛdze ama woeenya nkwagye; 15–16, Nyankopɔn na ɔhyehyɛɛ awar; 17–21, Wɔpen bɔnam ne dzi do; 22–28, Zion bɛyɛ prɔmprɔm, na Lamanfo bɛpaa dɛ nhyiren ansaana Mbae a Otsĩa Ebien no asõ.

verses.text: Hom ntsie m’asɛm, mo nkowaa Sidney na Parley nye Leman; na hwɛ, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, mbrasɛm a medze ma hom nye dɛ, hom nkɔ nkɛkã m’asɛmpa a hom nsa akã no, dɛ mbrɛ hom nsa kãe no, nkyerɛ Shakerfo no.
Hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, wɔpɛ dɛ wohu nokwar no ne fã bi, na mbom nnyɛ ne nyinara, osiandɛ wɔnntsen wɔ m’enyim na ɔsɛ dɛ wonu hɔnho.
Dɛm ntsi morosoma hom, mo nkowaa Sidney na Parley, dɛ hom nkɛkã asɛmpa no nkyerɛ hɔn.

Na m’akowaa Leman na wɔmfa edwuma yi nhyɛ ne nsa, ama oeetum nye hɔn ayɛ mpɛnsampɛnsamu, nnyɛ dza ne nsa kãe fii hɔn nkyɛn no, na mbom dza hom mo nkowaa dze bɛkyerɛkyerɛ no no; na sɛ ɔyɛ dɛm a, mibehyira no, na sɛ annyɛ dɛm a, orinnya mpontu.

Dɛm na Ewuradze se; Meyɛ Nyame, na masoma me Ba a Wɔwoo no Kortoo no no wɔ wiadze dɛ ɔmbɔpon wiadze, na mahyɛ ɔmom dɛ nyia ɔbɛgye no ato mu no, wɔbɛgye no nkwa, na nyia ɔnnkɛgye no ato mu no wobobu no fɔ—

Na dza wɔpɛ na wɔdze yɛɛ Nyimpa Ba no; na ɔagye no tum wɔ n’enyimnyam nsa nyimfa, na seseiara odzi hen wɔ ɔsorsor, na obedzi hen ekesi dɛ obesian aba asaase do dze n’atamfo nyina ahyɛ n’ananadze, na dɛm aber no abɛn—
Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, na makã; na mbom dɔn nye da no dze nyimpa biara nnyim, na sor abɔfo so mpo nnyim, na wonnkohu so kɛpem dɛ ɔbɛba.
Dɛm ntsi, mebɛpɛ dɛ nyimpa nyinara nu hɔnho, osiandɛ hɔn nyinara hyɛ bɔn ase, gyedɛ hɔn a megya hɔn mama moho no nko, nyimpa krɔnkrɔn binom a hom nnyim hɔn.
Dɛm ntsi, mese hom dɛ, medze me ahyɛmu a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem abrɛ hom, dza nna ɔwɔ hɔ mpo fir ahyɛse no.

Na dza mobɔɔ ho anohoba no mahyɛ no mã so, na asaase do aman bɔbɔ hɔn mu adze ama no, na sɛ hɔnankasa annyɛ dɛm a, wɔbɛbrɛ hɔn adze, osiandɛ adze biara a ɔmema noho do seseiara no, wɔbɛbrɛ no tum adze.
Dɛm ntsi, mbrasɛm a medze ma hom nye dɛ hom nkɔ nkorɔfo yi mu, na hom nkasa nkyerɛ hɔn dɛ mbrɛ tsetseberdo mo somafo no a, ne dzin dze Peter kãe no:
Hom ngye Ewuradze Jesus Christ ne dzin ndzi, nyia nna ɔwɔ asaase do, na ɔbɛba, ahyɛse nye ewiei no;
Hom nnu homho na wonnuma hom wɔ Jesus Christ ne dzin mu, ama hom eenya bɔnfakyɛ, dɛ mbrɛ mbrasɛm krɔnkrɔn no se;
Na obiara a ɔyɛ iyi no sɛ asɔr no mu elderfo dze hɔn nsa gu no do a, obenya Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn n’akyɛdze no.
Na bio, mese hom dɛ obiara a ɔbra awar no, no tumdzi no mmfi Nyame, osiandɛ Nyankopɔn na ɔhyehyɛɛ awar dze maa ɔdasanyi.
Dɛm ntsi, ɔsɛ dɛ onya yer kor, na hɔn beenu bɛyɛ honankor, na iyi nyina ama ewiei no asaase eetum ama no mbɔe ho mbuae.
Ama woeetum dze nyimpadodow a ɔsɛ no ahyɛ do mã, dɛ mbrɛ n’abɔdze ho nhyehyɛɛ tse ansaana wɔrobɔ wiadze.
Na obiara a ɔbra na otua bɔnam, na dɛ mma nyimpa nndzi no, dɛm nyimpa no no tumdzi mmfi Nyame.
Na, hwɛ, hamu mbowa nye wimu ntumbowa, nye dza ofi asaasetsirmu ba, ne nyinara wɔbɔe dze maa nyimpa dɛ ondzi na ɔmfa nyɛ akataho, ama oeenya no mbordo.
Na mbom wɔammfa amma dɛ nyimpa kor nya ma ɔmbor do nkyɛn obi, dɛm ntsi na ɔama wiadze tse bɔn mu no.
Na nyimpa a ɔkã bɔgya gu anaadɛ ɔsɛɛ honam a onnyi ho hia no ndue.
Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ Nyimpa Ba no remmba wɔ ɔbaa su do, nna ɔnntse dɛ ɔbarimba a orutu kwan wɔ asaase do.

Dɛm ntsi, mma wɔnndaadaa hom, na mbom hom nkɔ do ngyina pintsinn, nhwɛ kwan ber a ɔsorsor bɔwosow, na asaase bɔtɔ ntentan na oehimahima dɛ ɔsãbofo, na wɔbɛma mbɔnsa do, na wɔbɛbrɛ mbepɔw adze na wɔayɛ mbea krann ayɛ tromtrom—na iyinom nyina besi wɔ ber a ɔbɔfo no bɛhɛn no totorobɛnto no.
Mbom ansaana Ewuradze ne da kɛse no bɛba no, Jacob bɛyɛ prɔmprɔm wɔ sar no do na Lamanfo apaa dɛ rose-nhyiren.
Zion bɛyɛ prɔmprɔm wɔ akoko do na woedzi ehurusi wɔ mbepɔw do, na wɔbɔboaboa hɔn ano akɔ bea a makyerɛ hɔn no.
Hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, hom nkɔ kan dɛ mbrɛ mahyɛ hom no; hom nnu homho mfi hom bɔn ho; hom mbisa na hom nsa bɛkã; hom mbɔ mu na wobobue ama hom.
Hwɛ, mibedzi hom enyim na mayɛ hom kyirtaafo; mobɔwɔ hom finimfin, na hom enyim runngu ase.
Hwɛ, emi nye Jesus Christ, na mereba ntsɛm. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/50.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 50
chapter_summary: 1–5, Esunsum atorfo pii atahye asaase do; 6–9, Enyidosomkyerɛfo no wondue na hɔn a woetwa hɔn efi Asɔr no mu akyen no; 10–14, Elderfo wɔ dɛ wɔdze Sunsum kã asɛmpa no; 15–22, Hɔn a wɔkã nyamesɛm nye etsiefo nyina hia dɛ Sunsum no kenyan hɔn; 23–25, Dza ɔmma ntowdo no mmfi Nyame; 26–28, Hɔn a wodzi nokwar no wɔ adze nyina; 29–36; Wotsie hɔn a hɔn ho tsew no hɔn mpaabɔ; 37–46, Christ nye Oguanhwɛfo Pa na Israel Ɔbo no.

verses.text: Hom ntsie, O hom a hom yɛ m’asɔr mu elderfo, na hom nyɛ aso mma Nyame tseasefo ne ndze; na hom ntsie enyansasɛm a wɔdze bɛma hom no, dza hom ayɛ kor ebisa a ɔfa asɔr no ho, nye esunsum a wɔatahye wɔ asaase yi do no.
Hwɛ, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, esunsum pii a wɔyɛ esunsum atorfo a wɔapetse asaase do, redaadaa wiadze.
Na Satan so aper dɛ ɔbɛdaadaa hom, ama oeedzi hom do konyim.
Hwɛ, emi Ewuradze mahwɛ hom mu, na mehu ekyiwadze wɔ asɔr a ɔbɔ me dzin no mu.
Na mbom nhyira akã hɔn a wɔyɛ agyedzifo na wotsim, wɔ nkwa anaadɛ owu mu, hɔn na wobenya onnyiewiei nkwa no edzi.
Na mbom hɔn a wɔyɛ ndabrabafo na enyidosomkyerɛfo no wondue, na dɛm na Ewuradze se, menye hɔn bɛba atsɛmbu ase.
Hwɛ, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, enyidosomkyerɛfo bi wɔ hom mu a wɔadaadaa binom, ma dɛm ntsi ɔama ɔtamfo no tum; na mbom, hwɛ, wɔbɛsan agye dɛm nkorɔfo yi bio;

Na mbom wobohu enyidosomkyerɛfo no na woetwa hɔn akyen, wɔ nkwa mu anaadɛ owu mu, dɛ mbrɛ me pɛ mpo tse; na hɔn a woetwa hɔn efi m’asɔr mu akyen no wondue, na woyinom ara so na wiadze edzi hɔn do konyim no.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mma nyimpa biara nhwɛ yie amma ɔaannyɛ dza ɔnnyɛ nokwar na ɔnntsen wɔ m’enyim.
Na afei hom mbra, Ewuradze na ɔnam Sunsum mu rekasa kyerɛ n’asɔr mu elderfo no, hom mma yɛmbɔ mu nyi atsɛn, ama hom aatse ase;
Hom mma yɛmbɔ mu nyi atsɛn tse dɛ mbrɛ nyimpa nye ne nyɛnko tsena ase yi atsɛn enyim na enyim.
Na sɛ nyimpa nye ne nyɛnko yi atsɛn a, ɔtse no ase osiandɛ ɔdwen dɛ oyi atsɛn dɛ nyimpa; dɛmara so na emi, Ewuradze menye hom yi atsɛn ama hom atse ase.
Dɛm ntsi, emi, Ewuradze mibisa hom asɛm yi—ebɛn dwumadzi ho ntsi na wɔhyɛɛ hom asɔfo?
Dɛ hom ndua Sunsum no a ɔyɛ Ɔwerɛkyekyefo no mpo do a wɔsomaa no dɛ ɔmbɛkyerɛkyerɛ nokwar no no nkã m’asɛmpa no.
Na afei, hom agye esunsum a hom nntum nntse ase, na hom agye hɔn dɛ wofi Nyame; ana hom dzi bem wɔ iyi ho?
Hwɛ, homankasa na hom beyi asɛmbisa yi ano; naaso mubohu hom mbɔbɔr; ofi aber yi dze kɔ, wɔbɛhyɛ nyia ɔyɛ mberɛw wɔ hom mu no dzen.
Nokwar, mese hom dɛ, nyia emi mahyɛ no sɔfo na masoma no dɛ ondua Ɔwerɛkyekyefo no do nkã nokwasɛm no wɔ Sunsum nokwafo no mu no, ana ɔnam nokwar Sunsum no do kã anaa ɔnam kwan fofor bi do kã?
Na sɛ ɔnam kwan fofor bi do a, nna ommfi Nyame.
Na bio, nyia ɔgye nokwasɛm no, ana ɔnam nokwar Sunsum no do gye anaa ɔnam kwan fofor bi do gye?
Sɛ ɔnam kwan fofor bi do a, nna ommfi Nyame.
Sɛ dɛm a, nna ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom nntum nntse ase na hom nnhu dɛ nyia ɔnam nokwar Sunsum no do gye asɛm no, wɔnam nokwar Sunsum no do kã?
Dɛm ntsi, nyia ɔkã na nyia otsie no nyina nya hɔnho ntseasee, na wonya ntowdo na wɔbɔ mu enyi gye.
Na dza ɔmma ntowdo no mmfi Nyame, na ɔyɛ sum.
Dza ofi Nyame no yɛ kan; na nyia ɔgye kan no, na ɔkɔ do tsena Nyame mu no, nya kan no bi kã ho; na dɛm kan no kɔ do ara hyerɛn dze kɛpem da a odzi mu no.
Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, mekã iyi ama hom eehu nokwar no, na hom aapam sum efi hom mu;
Nyia Nyame ahyɛ no sɔfo na ɔasoma no no, dɛm nyimpa no ara so na woeyi no dɛ ɔyɛ ɔkɛse, ɔmmfa ho dɛ ɔyɛ kumabaa na hom nyina mu akowaa.
Dɛm ntsi, ɔno na ndzɛmba nyina yɛ nedze; osiandɛ ndzɛmba nyina hyɛ n’ase, dza ɔwɔ sor nye asaase do nyina, nkwa nye kan, Sunsum nye tum no a, Egya no ne pɛ do dze edua ne Jesus Christ Ba, no do no.
Mbom nyimpa biara nnyi hɔ a ɔwɔ ndzɛmba nyina, gyedɛ wɔatsew noho na wɔahohor bɔn nyina efi ho.
Na sɛ hom tsew homho fi bɔn nyina ho a, hom bebisa biribiara a hom pɛ wɔ Jesus ne dzin mu, na ɔbɛyɛ.
Mbom hom nhu iyi, dza hom bebisa no wɔdze bɛma hom; na dɛ wɔayɛ hom banodzifo yi, esunsum no bɛhyɛ hom ase.

Dɛm ntsi, ɔbɛba dɛ, sɛ hom hu dɛ sunsum bi a ɔda noho edzi no hom nntse ase, na hom ennya dɛm sunsum no a, hom mbisa Egya no wɔ Jesus ne dzin mu; na sɛ wɔammfa dɛm sunsum no amma hom a, nna ɔwɔ dɛ hom hu dɛ ommfi Nyame.
Na wɔbɛma hom tum wɔ dɛm sunsum no do; na hom mfa ndze kɛse nkasa ntsia dɛm sunsum no dɛ ommfi Nyame—
Mma hom mmfa ntsẽatsẽamu mmbu atsɛn, amma woeenndzi hom do konyim, eso mma hom mmfa ahantanyɛ anaa dɛwdzi nnyɛ, amma wɔaammfa do annkyer hom.
Nyia onyae fii Nyame hɔ no, hom mma ombu ho akontaa mma Nyame, na hom mma ondzi dɛw dɛ Nyame ehu dɛ odzi mu dɛ ne nsa bɛkã.
Na sɛ hom tsie na hom yɛ ndzɛmba yinom a hom nsa akã yi, nye dza hom nsa bɛkã ekyir yi—na Egya no dze ahenman no ama hom, nye tum a hom dze bedzi ndzɛmba nyinara a nnyɛ ɔno na ɔhyehyɛe no do konyim—
Na hwɛ, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, nhyira akã hom a hom ritsie me nsɛm yinom fi m’akowaa n’ano, osiandɛ wɔdze hom bɔn akyɛ hom.
Hom mma m’akowaa Joseph Wakefield, a m’enyi gye no ho no, nye m’akowaa Parley P. Pratt nkɔ nsɔr no mu nkɛkã m’afotusɛm no mfa nhyɛ hɔn dzen;

Na m’akowaa John Corrill so, anaadɛ mo nkowaa mu dodowara a wɔahyɛ hɔn dzibew yi no, hom mma wɔnkɛyɛ edwuma wɔ wenyin ture no mu; na mma hom mma obiara nnsiw hɔn kwan wɔ dwuma a medze ahyɛ hom nsa no ho—
Dɛm ntsi, m’akowaa Edward Partridge nndzi bem wɔ adze yi mu; naaso hom mma onnu noho na wɔdze no bɔn bɛkyɛ no.
Hwɛ, hom yɛ mbofra nkakramba ntsi hom runntum nngye ndzɛmba no nyina sesei; ɔwɔ dɛ hom nyin wɔ adom nye nokwar no ho nyimdzee no mu.
Mma hom nnsuro, mbofra nkakramba, osiandɛ hom yɛ medze, na meedzi wiadze do konyim, na hom kã hɔn a m’Egya dze hɔn ama me no ho;
Na hɔn a m’Egya dze hɔn ama me no, hɔn mu biara rennyew.
Na Egya no nye Emi yɛyɛ kor. Mowɔ Egya no mu, na Egya no so wɔ mo mu; na susuampaara dɛ hom agye me no, hom wɔ mo mu, na Mo wɔ hom mu.
Dɛm ntsi, Mowɔ hom finimfin, na Emi nye oguanhwɛfo pa, na Israel ɔbo no. Nyia osi ne dan wɔ ɔbo yi do no ronnhwe ase da.
Na da no bɛba a hom bɛtse me ndze na hom ehu me, na hom ehu dɛ metse ase.
Dɛm ntsi, hom nweɔn, ama hom aayɛ krado. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/51.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 51
chapter_summary: 1–8, Woyi Edward Partridge dɛ ɔnhwɛ dwumadzi horow na egyapadze no; 9–12, Ɔwɔ dɛ Ahotseweefo no dzi nokwar na wɔkyɛ biribiara pɛpɛɛpɛr; 13–15, Ɔwɔ dɛ wonya bishop n’adzekorabea, na wɔhyehyɛ egyapadze no dɛ mbrɛ Ewuradze ne mbra se; 16–20, Ɔwɔ dɛ Ohio yɛ bea a wɔbɔboa hɔn ano wɔ mber tsiabaa mu.

verses.text: Hom ntsie me, hom Ewuradze Nyankopɔn na ɔse, mebɛkasa akyerɛ m’akowaa Edward Partridge, na makyerɛ no kwan a ɔmfa do mfa nhwɛ dɔm yi do.
Na ohia dɛ wɔfa me mbra no do dze yɛ nhyehyɛɛ ma hɔn; na sɛ annyɛ dɛm a, wobotwa hɔn akyen.

Dɛm ntsi, hom mma m’akowaa Edward Partridge, nye hɔn a wɔasan mu eyi hɔn a m’enyi gye hɔn ho no nkyekyɛ nkorɔfo yi hɔn afamudze pɛpɛɛpɛr mfa mma nyimpa biara dɛ mbrɛ n’ebusua no dodow tse, dɛ mbrɛ ne gyinabew nye n’ehiadze tse.

Na sɛ m’akowaa Edward Partridge, dze nyimpa biara n’afamudze ma no a, hom mma ɔmma no nwoma bi a ɔkyerɛ n’afamudze a ɔdze ama no, ama ɔaayɛ nedze wɔ ber a ɔyɛ asɔrba no, osiandɛ iyi yɛ ne kyɛfa na n’egyapadze wɔ asɔr no mu, kɛpem ber a ɔbɔto mbra na asɔrmba bɛkã dɛ onndzi mu wɔ asɔr no mu mbra na ahyɛmudzi ho, na dɛm ntsi, ɔmmfata dɛ ɔkã asɔr no ho.

Na sɛ ɔtõ mbra na asɔrmba no se onndzi mu dɛ ɔbɛkã asɔr no ho a, onnyi tum dɛ ɔbɛgye adze biara a ɔdze abɔ afɔr dze ama bishop no dɛ ɔmfa mma abɔbɔfo na ehiafo a wɔwɔ asɔr no mu no; dɛm ntsi orunntum nngye dɛm akyɛdze no, na mbom ne nsa bɛkã n’afamudze a wɔdze ayɛ krataa ama no no nko.
Na dɛm na ɔsɛ dɛ wosi ndzɛmba nyinara pi dɛ mbrɛ asaase no do mbra no se.
Na hom mfa dza ɔyɛ nkorɔfo yi dze no mma hɔn.
Na sika a woegya dze ama nkorɔfo yi no—hom nyi ananmusinyi bi nnsi hɔ mma nkorɔfo yĩ, na ɔmfa sika no ntɔ edziban na ntar mma nkorɔfo yi dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ehiadze tse.
Na hom mma obiara ndzi nokwar, na hom nye nkorɔfo yi nyɛ kor ntsena, na hom nkyɛ biribiara pɛpɛɛpɛr, ama hom aayɛ kor dɛ mbrɛ mahyɛ hom no.
Na mma hom mma kwan mma wɔmmfa dza ɔyɛ nkorɔfo yi dze no nnkɛma asɔr bi so mu mba.
Dɛm ntsi, sɛ asɔr bi so mu mba bɛgye sika fi asɔr yi mu a, hom mma wontua mma asɔr yi dɛ mbrɛ nhyehyɛɛ a wɔbɛyɛ no tse;
Na iyi wondua bishop anaa ananmusinyi no a asɔrmba no bɛkã dze eyi ama hɔn no do nyɛ.
Na bio, hom mma bishop no nhwehwɛ adzekorabea mma asɔr yi; na hom mfa ndzɛmba nyinara a ɔyɛ sika na edziban a abor nkorɔfo yi ehiadze do no mma bishop ma ɔmfa nsie.
Na hom mma no so mfa bi nsie mma nankasa noho nye n’ebusua so, tse dɛ ma hom afa no dɛ ɔnyɛ dɛm edwuma yi.
Na dɛm ntsi mema nkorɔfo yi kwan dɛ wɔmboa hɔn ano ntsena dɛ mbrɛ me mbra se.
Na mehyira dɛm asaase yi dze ama hɔn mber kakraabi, kodu dɛ emi, Ewuradze, mebɛma hɔn beebi fofor na mahyɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnkɔ hɔ;
Na dɔn nye da no dze, wɔmmfae mmaa hɔn; dɛm ntsi, hom mma wɔntsena asaase yi do dɛ mbrɛ wɔbɛtsena do mfe pii, na iyi bɛyɛ papa ama hɔn.
Hwɛ, iyi bɛyɛ esusudze ama m’akowaa Edward Partridge, wɔ mbea fofor nye nsɔr nyina mu.
Na nyia wobohu dɛ odzi nokwar, odzi pɛrpɛr, na ɔyɛ odwumayɛnyi nyansafo no ɔbɔkɔ ne Ewuradze ne dɛwdzi mu na obenya nkwa a onnyiewiei.
Nokwar, mese hom dɛ, emi nye Jesus Christ, nyia ɔreba ntsɛm wɔ dɔn a hom nnyim mu no. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/52.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 52
chapter_summary: 1–2, Wɔhyehyɛ dɛ wɔbɛyɛ ehyiadzi no a odzi do no wɔ Missouri; 3–8, Wɔda elderfo binom a ɔsɛ dɛ wɔbɔ mu tu kwan no edzi; 9–11, Ɔwɔ dɛ elderfo no kyerɛkyerɛ dza asomafo na nkɔnhyɛfo no akyerɛw no; 12–21, Hɔn a Sunsum no ekenyan hɔn no sow ayɛyi na nyansa aba; 22–44, Woyiyi elderfo binom a sɛ worutu kwan akɔ akɛyɛ ehyiadzi wɔ Missouri a, wɔnkã asɛmpa no wɔ kwan mu.

verses.text: Hwɛ, dɛm na Ewuradze nam no Sunsum ndze do kã kyerɛ elderfo a ɔasan mu afrɛ hɔn wɔ nda a odzi ekyir yi mu no—

Ɔse: Emi Ewuradze, merebɛda dza mepɛ dɛ hom yɛ fi aber yi mu dze kɛpem aber a ehyiadzi a wɔrebɛyɛ no wɔ Missouri, bea a mibehyira do dze ama mo nkorɔfo a wɔyɛ Jacob n’asefo no nkaa, nye hɔn a wɔyɛ ahyɛmudzi no n’adzedzifo no edzi akyerɛ hom.
Dɛm ntsi, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, hom mma mo nkowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, nye Sidney Rigdon mboaboa hɔnho na womfi hɔn efiefi na wontu kwan nkɔ Missouri asaase do.
Na susuampaara dɛ wodzi nokwar ma me no, wɔbɛma woehu dza ɔsɛ dɛ wɔyɛ.
Na eso, susuampaara dɛ wodzi nokwar no, wɔbɛma woehu hom egyapadze asaase no.
Na susuampaara dɛ wonndzi nokwar no, wobotwa hɔn akyen, dɛ mbrɛ me pɛ tse, dɛ mbrɛ mohwɛ a oye ma me mpo.
Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, hom mma m’akowaa Lyman Wight nye m’akowaa John Corrill ntu hɔn kwan no ntsɛm;
Na m’akowaa John Murdock, nye m’akowaa Hyrum Smith so mfa Detroit nkɔ dɛm bea kor noara do.

Na wɔmma wɔnhyɛ akwantu no ase mfi ha nkɔ na wɔnkã nyamesɛm no wɔ kwan no do, mma wɔnnkã asɛm fofor biara nnkã dza nkɔnhyɛfo na asomafo no akyerɛw, nye dza Ɔwerɛkyekyefo no nam gyedzi mpaabɔ do bɛkyerɛ hɔn no ho.
Wɔmma wɔnkɔ beenu beenu, na dɛm ntsi wɔmma wɔnkã nyamesɛm no wɔ kwan no do nkyerɛ mboanofo biara, na wonnuma hɔn wɔ nsu mu, na wɔmfa hɔn nsa ngu hɔn do wɔ nsu no nkyɛn.
Na dɛm na Ewuradze se, mubotwa m’edwuma do tsia wɔ tseneneeyɛ mu, osiandɛ nda no reba a mobɔsoma atsɛmbu akɔ konyimdzi mu.
Na wɔmma m’akowaa Lyman Wight nhwɛ yie, osiandɛ Satan rohwehwɛ apo no do dɛ ntsɛw.
Na hwɛ, nyia odzi nokwar no, wɔbɛyɛ no ɔhwɛfo wɔ ndzɛmba pii do.
Na bio, mebɛma hom nhwɛdo wɔ ndzɛmba nyina mu, amma wɔaanndaadaa hom; osiandɛ Satan atahye asaase do, na oefir edzi redaadaa amanaman—
Dɛm ntsi, nyia ɔbɔ mpaa, na ne sunsum abotow no, sɛ odzi m’ayɛdze do a ɔno na mebɛgye no.
Nyia ɔkasa, na no sunsum abotow, na ɔdwe wɔ kasa mu na ɔma ntowdo no, sɛ odzi m’ayɛdze do a, ɔno na ɔyɛ Nyame nedze.
Na bio, nyia noho bɔpopo wɔ mo tum ase no, wɔbɛma no ahoɔdzen, na ɔbɔsow aba a ɔfata ayɛyi na nyansa, dɛ mbrɛ me nyikyerɛ nye mo nokwar a medze ama hom no tse.
Na bio, nyia wodzi no do konyim na ɔnnsow aba dɛ mbrɛ nhwɛdo yi kyerɛ no a, ɔnnyɛ medze.
Dɛm ntsi, ɔnam nhwɛdo yi do hom bohu esunsum ahorow nyinara a wɔwɔ ɔsorsor n’ase.
Na nda no aba, na mbrɛ nyimpa ne gyedzi tse no wɔbɛyɛ ama no.
Hwɛ, mbrasɛm yi na medze ma asɔr no mu elderfo no a masan mu eyi hɔn no.
Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, wɔmma m’akowaa Thomas B. Marsh nye m’akowaa Ezra Thayre so ntu hɔn kwan no, na wɔnkã nyamesɛm no wɔ kwan no mu araa nkodu asaase kor yi ara so do.
Na bio, wɔmma m’akowaa Isaac Morley nye m’akowaa Ezra Booth ntu hɔn kwan, na wɔnkã nyamesɛm no so wɔ kwan no do mfa nkodu dɛm asaase kor no ara so do.
Na bio, wɔmma mo nkowaa Edward Partridge nye Martin Harris nye mo nkowaa Sidney Rigdon na Joseph Smith, Kakraba ntu hɔn kwan no.
Wɔmma mo nkowaa David Whitmer na Harvey Whitlock so ntu hɔn kwan, na wɔnkã asɛmpa no wɔ kwan no do, mfa mbra asaase kor no ara so do.
Na wɔmma mo nkowaa Parley P. Pratt na Orson Pratt ntu hɔn kwan, wɔnkã asɛmpa no wɔ kwan no do, mfa mbra asaase kor no ara do mpo.
Na wɔmma mo nkowaa Solomon Hancock na Simeon Carter so ntu hɔn kwan mfa mbra dɛm asaase kor no ara do, na wɔnkã asɛmpa no wɔ kwan no do.
Wɔmma mo nkowaa Edson Fuller na Jacob Scott so ntu hɔn kwan.
Wɔmma mo nkowaa Levi W. Hancock na Zebedee Coltrin so ntu hɔn kwan.
Wɔmma mo nkowaa Reynolds Cahoon na Samuel H. Smith so ntu hɔn kwan.
Wɔmma mo nkowaa Wheeler Baldwin na William Carter so ntu hɔn kwan.
Na hom nhyɛ mo nkowaa Newel Knight na Selah J. Griffin beenu yi asɔfo na hɔn so wontu hɔn kwan.
Nyew, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, wɔmma nkorɔfo yinom nyina ntu hɔn kwan nkɔ bea kor do, na mma obiara nntow wɔ ne nyɛnko ne fapem do, anaadɛ ɔmmfa kwan a ne nyɛnko afã do no do.
Nyia obedzi nokwar no, wɔbɔbɔ noho ban na wɔama ɔasow eduaba pii.
Na bio, mese hom dɛ, wɔmma mo nkowaa Joseph Wakefield na Solomon Humphrey ntu hɔn kwan nkɔ boka asaase do;
Wɔmma wɔnye hɔn ebusua ebusua nyɛ edwuma, na mma wɔnnkã biribiara nnkã dza nkɔnhyɛfo nye asomafo no, dza woehu na wɔatse na wɔgye dzi nokwar mu no, ama nkɔnhyɛ no nyina aahyɛ mã.
Osian mbrato ntsi, wɔngye dza wɔdze maa Heman Basset no mfi ne nsamu na wɔmfa mma Simonds Ryder.
Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, hom nhyɛ Jared Carter sɔfo, na wɔnhyɛ George James so sɔfo.
Wɔmma elderfo a wɔaka no nhwɛ nsɔr no do na wɔnkã asɛm no nkyerɛ hɔn a wɔwɔ mantɔw a etwa hɔn ho ehyia no; na wɔmma wɔmfa hɔnankasa hɔn nsa nyɛ edwuma na mma wɔnnyɛ abosondze na emumuyɛdze biara.
Na wɔ adze nyina mu no, wɔnkaa ehiafo na abɔbɔfo, ayarfo nye hɔn a wɔretseetsee hɔn no, na nyia ɔnnyɛ ndzɛmba yinom no nnyɛ mo suanyi.
Na bio, hom mma mo nkowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, na Sidney Rigdon nye Edward Partridge ngye dasegye nwoma mfi asɔr no hɔ. Na wɔngye kor mma m’akowaa Oliver Cowdery so.
Na dɛ mbrɛ makã no, sɛ hom dzi nokwar a, hom bɔboa hom ano edzi ehurusi wɔ Missouri asaase do, dza ɔyɛ hom egyapadze a seseiara ɔyɛ hom atamfo asaase no.
Mbom, hwɛ, emi Ewuradze mebɛyɛ ntsɛm agye kuropɔn no wɔ ne ber mu no, na medze dɛw na enyigye abɔ nokwafo no abɔtsir.
Hwɛ, emi nye Jesus Christ, Nyankopɔn ne Ba no, na mebɛma hɔn do wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/53.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 53
chapter_summary: 1–3, Sidney Gilbert ne frɛ na dzibew wɔ Asɔr no mu nye wɔbɛhyɛ no elder; 4–7, Ɔnsom dɛ bishop n’ananmusinyi so.

verses.text: Hwɛ, mese ɔwo, m’akowaa Sidney Gilbert dɛ, matse wo mpaabɔ; na ase me dɛ Ewuradze wo Nyankopɔn nda dza ɔfa wo frɛ na nsanmuyi wɔ asɔr no mu, dza emi, Ewuradze maakyekyer wɔ nda a odzi ekyir yi mu no edzi nkyerɛ wo.
Hwɛ, emi Ewuradze a wɔbɔɔ me mbeamudua mu dze maa wiadze bɔn no, dze mbrasɛm yi ma wo dɛ, ɔwɔ dɛ epow wiadze.
Gye m’asɔfodzi to wo do, elder dzibew no mpo, ama akã gyedzi nye nnuho nye bɔnfakyɛ ho asɛm, dɛ mbrɛ m’asɛm, nye nsa a wɔdze gu do ma nsa kã Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no se;
Na aayɛ ananmusinyi so ama asɔr no wɔ beebi a bishop no bɛkyerɛ, dɛ mbrɛ mbrasɛm a wɔdze bɛma ekyir yi se.
Na bio, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, enye mo nkowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, nye Sidney Rigdon botu wo kwan no.
Hwɛ, iyinom nye ayɛdze a odzi kan a wo nsa bɛkã na mber bi bɛba a wɔbɛma ehu nkaa no so, dɛ mbrɛ wo dwumadzi tse wɔ wo wenyin ture mu.
Na bio, mepɛ dɛ ibohu dɛ nyia otsim kodu ewiei no na wɔbɛgye no nkwa. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/54.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 54
chapter_summary: 1–6, Ɔwɔ dɛ Ahotseweefo no dzi asɛmpa n’ahyɛmu no do ama woeehu hɔn mbɔbɔr; 7–10, Ɔwɔ dɛ wosie abotar wɔ abɛbrɛsɛ mu.

verses.text: Hwɛ, dɛm na Ewuradze, nyia ɔyɛ Alpha na Omega, ahyɛse nye ewiei no, nyia wɔbɔɔ no mbeamudua mu dze maa wiadze bɔn no se—
Hwɛ, nokwar, nokwar, mese ɔwo m’akowaa Newel Knight dɛ, gyina pintsinn wɔ dzibew a menye wo egyina no.
Na sɛ wo nuanom no pɛ dɛ wofi hɔn atamfo nsa a, ma wonnu hɔnho mfi hɔn bɔn ho, na wɔmbrɛ hɔnho adze nokwar mu, na hom mbotow wɔ m’enyim.
Na osiandɛ dɛ woebu ahyɛmu a wɔnye me dzii no do no, ntsi ɔayɛ kwa, na mfaso biara nnyi ho so bio.
Na nyia ɔnam no do ma mfom iyi bae no ndue, osiandɛ nkyɛ obeye ama no dɛ wɔbɔtow no akyen nsu mu wɔ po no bun mu.
Mbom nhyira nye hɔn a woesie ahyɛmu no na woedzi mbrasɛm no do, na wobohu hɔn mbɔbɔr.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mfi ha nkɔ sesei na hom nguan mfi asaase no do amma hom atamfo ammba hom do; hom ntu hom kwan no, na hom nhwehwɛ obi ma ɔnyɛ hom banodzifo, na ontuatua sika mfa mma hom.
Na dɛm na hom ntu hom kwan mfa anee afamu nkɔ Missouri asaase do, nkodu Lamanfo hɔn ahe do.
Na sɛ hom du hom akwantu n’ewiei a, hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, hom mbɔ bra dɛ mbrɛ nyimpa bɔ kɛpem dɛ mibesiesie beebi ama hom.
Na bio, hom nya abotar wɔ abɛbrɛsɛ mu kɛpem dɛ mebɛba, na hwɛ, mereba ntsɛm, na medze m’akatua nam, na hɔn a wɔhwehwɛɛ m’ekyir kwan ntsɛm no benya ahomgye ama hɔn akra. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/55.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 55
chapter_summary: 1–3, Wɔfrɛ William W. Phelps na wɔasan mu eyi no dɛ wonnuma no, na wɔnhyɛ no elder, na ɔnkã asɛmpa no; 4, Ɔwɔ dɛ ɔkyerɛw nwoma so dze ma mbofra a, wɔwɔ Asɔr no skuul mu no; 5–6, Ɔwɔ dɛ otu kwan kɔ Missouri, hɔ nye bea a ɔbɛyɛ n’edwuma.

verses.text: Hwɛ, dɛm na Ewuradze se wo, m’akowaa William, nyew, asaase nyina Ewuradze no, mafrɛ wo na masan mu eyi wo ber a wonumaa wo wɔ nsu mu ekyir no, a sɛ edze enyiwa kor yɛ biribiara dze hyɛ me enyimnyam a, ibenya bɔnfakyɛ, nye nsa a wɔdze gu do ma nsa kã Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no;
Na m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba ne nsa na ɔbɛhyɛ wo elder wɔ asɔr yi mu, na akã nnuho nye bɔnfakyɛ ho asɛm, na enuma wɔ Jesus Christ, Nyame tseasefo no ne Ba ne dzin mu.
Na hɔn a edze wo nsa bogu hɔn do no, sɛ hɔn akoma botow wɔ m’enyim a, ibenya tum dze Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no ama hɔn.

Na bio, wɔbɛhyɛ wo sɔfo ma aaboa m’akowaa Oliver Cowdery wɔ skuul a ɔwɔ asɔr no mu nwoma ne ntsintsimii na ne nyiyimu, na ne nkyerɛwee edwuma, ama mbofra nkakraba so enya nkyerɛkyerɛ wɔ m’enyim dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɔ m’enyi.
Na bio, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, ɔnam iyi ntsi, enye mo nkowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, na Sidney Rigdon botu kwan ama hom etsim wɔ hom egyapadze asaase do ayɛ edwuma yi.
Na bio, ma m’akowaa Joseph Coe so nye hɔn ntu kwan no. Na dza ɔaka ekyir no nyina wɔbɛda no edzi ekyir yi dɛ mbrɛ me pɛ tse. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/56.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 56
chapter_summary: 1–2, Ɔwɔ dɛ Ahotseweefo no fa hɔn mbeamudua no na wɔkã Ewuradze do ama woeenya nkwagye; 3–13, Ewuradze hyɛ mbra na ɔdan no, na wotwa asokyewfo no kyen; 14–17, Esikafo a wɔmmboa ehiafo wondue, na ehiafo a hɔn akoma mmbobɔe wondue; 18–20, Nhyira nkã ehiafo a hɔn akoma mu tsew, na hɔn na wobenya asaase no edzi.

verses.text: Hom ntsie, O hom a hom bɔ me dzin, Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn no na ɔse; na hwɛ, m’ebufuw adzɛw etuatsewfo do, na wobohu m’abasa nye mbrɛ m’ebufuhyew tse wɔ nsera da a m’ebufuw bɛba aman do no.
Na nyia ɔnnkɛfa ne mbeamudua na ɔakã mo do, na onnkedzi me mbrasɛm do no, wɔrenngye no nkwa.
Hwɛ, emi Ewuradze, mehyɛ mbra; na nyia onnkedzi do no, wobotwa no akyen wɔ mankasa me mber pa mu, ber a mahyɛ mbra no ewie na woebu mbra no.
Dɛm ntsi, emi Ewuradze, mehyɛ mbra na mekantse no so, dɛ mbrɛ mohwɛ a oye ma me; na iyi nyina wobobua egu etuatsewfo no tsir do, Ewuradze na ɔse.

Dɛm ntsi, masesã mbra a me dze maa mo nkowaa Thomas B. Marsh na Ezra Thayre, na medze mbra fofor ma m’akowaa Thomas dɛ ontu no kwan no ntsɛmara nkɔ Missouri asaase do, na m’akowaa Selah J. Griffin so nye no bɔkɔ.
Na hwɛ, osian mo nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Thompson hɔn akɔnkye ntsi, masesã mbra a mehyɛe dze maa mo nkowaa Selah J. Griffin na Newel Knight.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mma m’akowaa Newel Knight nka hɔn nkyɛn; na dodowara a wɔabotow wɔ m’enyim na wɔpɛ dɛ wɔkɔ no botum akɔ, na ɔbɛyɛ hɔn kandzifo nye hɔn akɔ asaase a makyerɛ no do.
Na bio, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, ɔwɔ dɛ m’akowaa Ezra Thayre nu noho fi n’ahantanyɛ nye ne pɛsɛankonya ho, na odzi mbrasɛm a medze ama no dada no do, dza mehyɛɛ no a ɔfa bea a ɔtse ho no.
Na sɛ ɔbɛyɛ dɛm dze a, ɔnam dɛ wɔrennkyekyɛ asaase no mu ntsi, wɔbɛda ho ama ɔakɔ Missouri asaase no do;
Annyɛ dɛm a wɔdze ne sika a oetua no bɛma no, na oefi bea no do akɔ, na wobeyi no edzi efi m’asɔr mu, dɔm hen Ewuradze Nyankopɔn na ɔse;
Na sɛ sor na asaase twa mu kɔ mpo a, nsɛm yinom nnkotwa mu da, mbom wɔbɛhyɛ no mã.
Na sɛ ɔwɔ dɛ m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, tua sika no a, hwɛ, emi Ewuradze, mubotua ama no bio wɔ Missouri asaase do, ama hɔn a wɔdze bɛma no no enya ho akatua bio, dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ndzeyɛɛ tse;
Osiandɛ dza wɔyɛ no ara na hɔn nsa bɛkã ho akatua, wɔ nsaase no mpo a ɔbɛyɛ hɔn egyapadze.
Hwɛ, dɛm na Ewuradze kã kyerɛ mo nkorɔfo—hom wɔ ndzɛmba pii yɛ na ndzɛmba pii nu homho wɔ ho; na hwɛ, hom bɔn afow aba mo hɔ, na bɔnfakyɛ biara nnyi hɔ ma hom, osiandɛ hom dan homankasa hom afotu.
Na hom akoma nntɔ hom yamu. Na hom nndzi nokwar ekyir, mbom hom wɔ enyigye wɔ dza ɔnntsen ho.

Hom esikafo a hom mmfa hom ahonyadze mma ehiafo wondue, na hom sika bɔdɔ hom akra ho nkandar; na iyi bɛma hom etwa kwadwom wɔ nsera nye atsɛmbu nye ebufuhyew da no mu. Otwaber apa ho, ɔhyewber aba ewiei, na me kra ennya nkwagye!

Hom ehiafo a hom akoma mmbobɔe wondue, hom a hom esunsum mmbotowee, na hom yafun mmee da, na hom nnyii hom nsa mmfii binom ndzɛmba ho, na enyiber ahyɛ hom enyiwa mu mã, na hom remmfa homankasa hom nsa nnyɛ edwuma!

Na mbom nhyira nkã hom ehiafo a hom akoma mu tsew, na hɔn a hɔn akoma abobɔ, na hɔn esunsum abotow, osiandɛ wobohu Nyankopɔn n’ahenman no dɛ ɔreba wɔ tum nye enyimnyam kɛse mu dze abɛgye hɔn; na asaase ne seradze no bɛyɛ hɔndze.
Na hwɛ, Ewuradze bɛba, na ɔdze n’akatua nam, na obotua obiara kaw, na ehiafo bedzi dɛw.
Na hɔn ebusuasantsen benya asaase no edzi fi ebusuasantsen ekesi ebusuasantsen afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ. Na afei medze dza mowɔ kã kyerɛ hom no aba ewiei. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/57.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 57
chapter_summary: 1–3, Independence, Missouri, nye bea a wɔbɛkyekyer Zion Kuropɔn na temple no; 4–7, Ɔwɔ dɛ Ahotseweefo no tɔ nsaase na wonya egyapadze wɔ dɛm bea no do; 8–16, Ɔwɔ dɛ Sidney Gilbert bue fiadze, William W. Phelps so tsintsim mbuukuu, na Oliver Cowdery so kenkan nsɛm a wɔbɛkyerɛw no, osiesie no yie, ama wɔdze epue guado.

verses.text: Hom ntsie, Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn no na ɔse, O m’asɔr mu elderfo a osian me mbrasɛm ntsi hom ehyia mu wɔ Missouri asaase do, asaase a meyi na matsew ho dze ama ahotseweefo dɛ wɔmboa hɔn ano wɔ do.
Dɛm ntsi, asaase yi nye anohoba asaase no, bea a wɔbɛkyekyer Zion kuropɔn no.

Dɛm na Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn se, sɛ hom rohwehwɛ nyansa a, ha na nyansa wɔ: Hwɛ, bea a seseiara wɔfrɛ no Independence no nye bea no ne finimfin; na bea a wobesi temple no wɔ dɛm bea yi n’anee afamu, wɔ bea a ofi hɔ kɔ asɛndzibea no nnwar koraa.
Dɛm ntsi, ɔyɛ nyansadze dɛ ahotseweefo no bɔtɔ dɛm asaase no, nye asaase biara a ɔda anee afamu hɔ nyinara so, ofi hɔ ara dze kesi ɔhẽ a ɔtsen da Jewfo nye Amanamamfo no mu biara ntamu hɔ no;
Na asaase biara a otwa sar no ho hyia nyina so, susuampaara dɛ mbrɛ m’esuafo no botum atɔ no. Hwɛ, nyansa wɔ iyi mu, ama hɔn nsa aakã dze ayɛ hɔn egyapadze a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem.

Na hom mma m’akowaa Sidney Gilbert ngyina dzibew a medze ama no no, ɔnyɛ asɔr no n’ananmusinyi na ɔngyegye sika mfa mma asɔr no, na wɔmfa ntɔ asaase wɔ mantɔw nyina a etwa bea no ho ehyia no, dɛ mbrɛ wobotum ayɛ no wɔ tsenenee mu, susuampaara dɛ mbrɛ nyansa bɛkyerɛ.
Na hom mma m’akowaa Edward Partridge ngyina dzibew a medze ama no no, na ɔnye hɔn a woeyi hɔn dɛ wɔmboa no no nkyekyɛ ahotseweefo no hɔn egyapadze no mma hɔn dɛ mbrɛ mahyɛ no no.

Na bio, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, ma m’akowaa Sidney Gilbert ntsena bea no do, na ombue fiadze na ɔntɔn ndzɛmba; mbom mma ɔmmbɔ epoo wɔ eguadzi no mu, ama oeenya sika dze atɔ asaase ama ahotseweefo no wɔ hɔn yieyɛ ntsi, na ama woeetum enya biribiara a esuafo no behia a ɔbɛma woeetum atsena hɔn egyapadze asaase no do.

Ma m’akowaa Sidney Gilbert so ngye tum krataa—hwɛ, ha na nyansa wɔ, na ma nyia ɔbɛkan biara nnya ho ntseasee—ama wɔdze ndzɛmba so asoma n’akrakyefo no a ɔafa hɔn wɔ n’edwuma mu no ma wɔdze ndzɛmba abrɛ nkorɔfo no.
Na dɛm na yɛfa hwɛ m’ahotseweefo no, ama wɔaakã m’asɛmpa no akyerɛ hɔn a wɔtsetse sum nye owu sunsum mu wɔ mantɔw ahorow mu hɔ no.
Na bio, nokwar, mese wo dɛ ma m’akowaa William W. Phelps ntsena bea yi do, na ontsintsim asɔr no no nwoma.
Na hwɛ, sɛ wiadze gye dza ɔakyerɛw no to mu a—hwɛ, ha na nyansa wɔ, ma ondua tsenenee kwan do mfa nya dza obotum enya biara, wɔ ahotseweefo no hɔn yieyɛ ntsi.

Na ma m’akowaa Oliver Cowdery mboa no, dɛ mbrɛ mahyɛ no no, na bea biara a mebɛse no dɛ ɔnkɔ no, ɔnhwɛ do nkyerɛw, na ɔntsentsen no, na ɔnsa mu, ama biribiara aakɔ do yie wɔ m’enyim, dɛ mbrɛ Sunsum no bodua no mu agye ato mu.
Na dɛm na wɔmma hɔn a makã hɔn ho nsɛm no nye hɔn ebusua ebusua nyɛ ntsɛm dɛ mbrɛ wobotum akɛtsena Zion asaase no do, na wɔnyɛ ndzɛmba a mase hɔn no mpo.

Na afei, ɔfa dza mese ɔmboaboa ano no—ma bishop nye asɔr no n’ananmusinyi no nsiesie ndzɛmba ntsɛmara mma dɛm ebusua ebusua no a wɔahyɛ hɔn dɛ wɔmbra asaase yi do no, na wosiesie hɔnho wie a wɔakɛtsena hɔn egyapadze asaase no do wɔ mber a obeye mu.
Na ɔfa elderfo nye asɔrmba a wɔaka no, wɔbɛkyerɛ hɔn dza wɔnyɛ ekyir yi. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/58.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 58
chapter_summary: 1–5, Wɔdze enyimnyam ahenkyɛw bɛhyɛ hɔn a wɔsɔw abɛbrɛsɛ no; 6–12, Ɔwɔ dɛ Ahotseweefo no siesie hɔnho dze ma eguambaa n’ayeforhyia na Ewuradze n’edzidzi no; 13–18, Bishopfo no nye ɔdodow atsɛmbuafo; 19–23, Ɔwɔ dɛ Ahotseweefo no dzi ɔman no no mu mbra do; 24–29, Ɔwɔ dɛ nyimpa dua hɔn pɛ do yɛ papa; 30–33, Ewuradze ma mbra na ɔkantse; 34–43, Sɛ nyimpa benya nnuho a, gyedɛ ɔkã no bɔn na ogyaa yɛ; 44–58, Ɔwɔ dɛ Ahotseweefo no tɔ hɔn egyapadze na wɔboa hɔn ano wɔ Missouri; 59–65, Ɔwɔ dɛ wɔkã asɛmpa no kyerɛ abɔdze biara.

verses.text: Hom ntsie, O hom elderfo a hom wɔ m’asɔr mu, na hom nyɛ aso mma m’asɛm, na hom nsũa nhu dza mepɛ a ɔfa hom ho, nye dza ɔfa asaase a masoma hom do yi.
Na nokwar, mese hom dɛ, nhyira nkã nyia odzi me mbrasɛm do, wɔ nkwa anaa owu mu; nye nyia ogyina sɔw abɛbrɛsɛ wɔ gyedzi mu ɔnoara so na n’akatua yɛ kɛse wɔ ɔsor ahenman no mu.
Aber yi mu hom nnkotum dze hom honam enyiwa ehu ɔfa dɛm ndzɛmba soronko a ɔbɛba ekyir a hom Nyankopɔn ahyehyɛ, nye enyimnyam a odzi abɛbrɛsɛ kɛse ekyir.
Osiandɛ abɛbrɛsɛ kɛse ekyir na nhyira ba. Dɛm ntsi, da no bɛba a wɔbɛhyɛ hom enyimnyam ahenkyɛw; dɔn no nnsõe, na mbom ɔabɛn.
Hom nkaa dza mekã kyerɛ hom ana, ama hom dze eesie hom akoma mu, na hom agye dza ɔkã do yi.
Hwɛ, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, iyi ntsi na masoma hom—ama hom aayɛ setsie, na woeesiesie hom akoma ama hom aagye dase wɔ ndzɛmba a ɔreba ho;
Na ama woeedzi hom nyi so wɔ fapem a hom bɔtow, nye dase a hom bɛgye wɔ asaase a wɔbɛkyekyer Nyankopɔn ne Zion wɔ do no ho;
Na ama woeesiesie edziban a angoa wɔ mu dze ama ehiafo; nyew, edziban a angoa wɔ mu, wenyin a ɔagyen atɔ mu a wɔasɔn do krɔnn, ama wiadze eehu dɛ nkɔnhyɛfo hɔn anomusɛm nnkɛyɛ kwa;
Nyew, edzidzi wɔ Ewuradze fie, a wɔayɛ no yie na wɔato nsa afrɛ aman nyina.
Odzi kan, wɔbɛfrɛ esikafo nye enyimdzefo, enyansafo nye ekunyin;
Na iyi ekyir no na mo tum da no bɛba; nkyii na ehiafo, mpakye, nye efurafo, nye etsitsifo bɛba Eguambaa n’ayefor ase, na woebedzi Ewuradze n’edziban no a oesiesie ama dɛm da kɛse a ɔbɛba no.
Hwɛ, emi, Ewuradze na makã.
Na ama dasegye yi eefi Zion akɔ, nyew, efi Nyame n’egyapadze kuropɔn no anomu—
Nyew, iyi ho ntsi na masoma hom wɔ hɔ no, na meyi m’akowaa Edward Partridge, na medze dɛm dwumadzi yi aahyɛ ne nsa wɔ asaase yi do.
Mbom sɛ oennu noho wɔ no bɔn a ɔyɛ ekyingye nye akoma a oepirim no ho a, ɔnhwɛ yie mma ɔaannhwe ase.
Hwɛ wɔdze n’edwuma ama no, na wɔremmfa mma bio.
Na nyia wɔdze dɛm dwumadzi yi ahyɛ ne nsa no, nna wɔayɛ no ɔdodow ɔtsɛmbuafo, tse dɛ mbrɛ wɔyɛɛ no tsetseberdo no, ama ɔakyekyɛ Nyame n’egyapadze asaase no dze ama ne mba;
Na ogyina pɛrpɛrdzi ne dasegye nye n’apamfo hɔn mboa do ebu atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ ahenman no ne mbra a wɔdze ama Nyame no nkɔnhyɛfo no tse.
Na nokwar, mese hom dɛ, wobedzi me mbra do wɔ asaase yi do.
Mma nyimpa bi nndwen dɛ ɔyɛ ɔhwɛdofo, mbom hom mma Nyankopɔn nhwɛ nyia obu atsɛn no do, wɔ nankasa n’afotu na kwan a ɔpɛ do, mekyerɛ nyia otu fo anaa ɔtse atsɛmbu egua do no.
Mma wɔmma obiara nntõ mbra a ɔwɔ asaase no do no, osiandɛ nyia odzi Nyankopɔn ne mbra do no nnsɛ dɛ ɔtõ mbra a ɔwɔ asaase no do no.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mbrɛ homho adze mfa mma tum biara a ɔwɔ hɔ, kesi ber a nyia ɔyɛ nedze dɛ odzi hen no bedzi hen, na ɔdze atamfo nyinara ahyɛ n’ananadze.
Hwɛ, mbra a hom nsa akã efi mo hɔ no yɛ asɔr ne mbra, na dɛm kan yi na hom bɛda no edzi. Hwɛ, ha na nyansa wɔ.
Na afei, dɛ mbrɛ mekãe a ɔfa m’akowaa Edward Partridge ho no, asaase yi nye bea a ɔnye hɔn a oeyi dɛ wɔyɛ n’apamfo no ntsena; na nyia meyi no dɛ ɔnhwɛ m’adzekorabea do no so ntsena asaase yi do bi;
Dɛm ntsi, hom mma wɔnye hɔn ebusua ebusua nyina mbra asaase yi do, ama wɔnye hɔnho nye emi aafa apam.
Na hwɛ, ɔnnsɛ dɛ mehyɛ hom wɔ ndzɛmba nyinara mu; osiandɛ nyia wɔhyɛ no wɔ ndzɛmba nyinara mu no yɛ onyihafo na ɔnnyɛ akowaa nyansafo; dɛm ntsi, orinnya akatua biara;
Nokwar mese dɛ, ɔsɛ dɛ nyimpa dze enyimpi yɛ adzepa, na wɔdze hɔnankasa hɔn pɛ yɛ ndzɛmba pii, ama woeetum ada ndzeyɛtsenenee pii edzi;
Osiandɛ tum no wɔ hɔn mu ntsi, wɔyɛ dza hɔnankasa wɔpɛ. Na susuampaara dɛ adasa yɛ papa no wɔrennyew hɔn akatua wɔ kwan biara do.
Na mbom nyia ɔnnyɛ biribiara gyedɛ wɔahyɛ no ana, na ɔdze akoma a ekyingye wɔ mu bɛgye mbrasɛm no na ɔayɛ ho akwadwer no, ɔno na wobu no fɔ.
Emi nye woana a meyɛɛ nyimpa, Ewuradze na ɔse na sɛ oenndzi me mbrasɛm do a munnkobu no fɔ?
Emi nye woana, Ewuradze na ɔse, na mobɔɔ anohoba a menndzi do?
Mehyɛ mbra na adasa nndzi do; mekantse na hɔn nsa nnkã nhyira no.
Na wɔkã wɔ hɔn akoma mu dɛ: Iyi nnyɛ Ewuradze n’edwuma, osiandɛ anohoba no annhyɛ mã. Mbom dɛm nkorɔfo no ndue, osiandɛ hɔn akatua esuma wɔ ase rotweɔn, na onnyi sor.
Na afei merekyerɛ hom biribi bio a ɔfa asaase yi ho.
Ɔyɛ nyansadze ma me dɛ m’akowaa Martin Harris bɛyɛ fasusu dze ama asɔr no, dɛ ɔdze ne sika bogu bishop a ɔwɔ asɔr mu no enyim.
Na hwɛ, iyi so nye mbra a medze ma nyimpa biara a ɔba asaase yi do dɛ obenya egyapadze; na ɔmfa ne sika nyɛ dza mbra no bɛkyerɛ.
Na ɔyɛ nyansadze so dɛ wɔbɔtotɔ nsaase wɔ Independence hɔ na woesi adzekoradan nye dan a wobetsintsim nwoma wɔ mu.
Na nsɛm bi so a ɔfa m’akowaa Martin Harris ho no, Sunsum no dze bɛma no, ama oenya n’egyapadze dɛ ma oye ma no no;
Na wɔmma onnu noho wɔ no bɔn ho, osiandɛ ɔper hwehwɛ wiadze mu abɔdzin.
Afei so wɔmma m’akowaa William W. Phelps ngyina dzibew a medze no esi no, na ɔngye n’egyapadze wɔ asaase no do.
Na afei so ɔwɔ dɛ onu noho, osiandɛ ɔnnsɔ emi, Ewuradze m’enyi, na ɔpɛ dɛ ɔbɔ obiara do wɔ biribiara mu, na ɔnndwe koraa wɔ m’enyim.
Hwɛ, nyia oenu noho wɔ no bɔn ho no—ɔno na wɔdze no bɔn akyɛ, na Emi, Ewuradze, merennkaa no bio.
Ɔnam iyi do na hom bohu dɛ sɛ nyimpa no enu noho wɔ no bɔn ho a—hwɛ, ɔbɛkã no bɔn no akyerɛ na ɔatwe noho efi ho.

Na afei, nokwar, merekã biribi a ɔfa m’asɔr mu elderfo nkaa no ho, aber no nnyae mmbae, na aka mfe piinara ansaana hɔn nsa akã hɔn egyapadze wɔ asaase yi do, gyedɛ wɔnam gyedzi mpaabɔ do nya pɛ no, anaadɛ gyedɛ Ewuradze nankasa dze ma hɔn.
Na hwɛ, wobepĩapĩa nyimpa aboa ano efi asaase n’ano nyina do.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mboa hom ano; na hɔn a onnyi dɛ wɔtsena asaase yi do no, wɔmma wɔnkã asɛmpa no wɔ mantɔw ahorow a etwa asaase yi ho ehyia no do; na sɛ wowie a, wɔmma wɔnsan hɔn ekyir nkɔ hɔn efiefi.
Wɔmma wɔnkã asɛmpa no wɔ kwan no do, na wɔngye nokwar no ho dase wɔ mbea nyina, na wɔnse esikafo, ebirɛmpɔn na abɔbɔfo, nye ehiafo nyina dɛ wonnu hɔnho.
Na wɔmma wɔnkyekyer nsɔr, wɔ mber dodow a nyimpa a wɔwɔ asaase no do no bonu hɔnho.
Na wɔmma asɔr no nyi ananmusinyi a ɔbɛgyegye sika efi asɔr a ɔwɔ Ohio no hɔ dze atotɔ nsaase wɔ Zion.
Na mehyɛ m’akowaa Sidney Rigdon dɛ ɔnkyerɛw mbrɛ Zion asaase no tse ho asɛm na ɔnkyerɛw Nyame n’apɛdze nyina so a sunsum no bɛda no edzi akyerɛ no no;

Na wɔmfa nwoma na edzin na sika a wobotua, na wɔmfa sika no nhyɛ bishop noara ne nsa, anaa ananmusinyi no nsa dɛ mbrɛ ɔnoara ɔpɛ anaa ɔbɛkyerɛ, na wɔmfa ntotɔ nsaase mma Nyame ne mba ma wɔmfa nyɛ hɔn egyapadze.
Na hwɛ, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, Ewuradze pɛ dɛ n’esuafo nye adasamba bue hɔn akoma mu, dze tɔ ɔman no mantamu yi nyina dɛ mbrɛ mber bɛma ho kwan.
Hwɛ, ha na nyansa wɔ. Ma wɔnyɛ iyi, annyɛ dɛm a worinnya egyapadze biara, nna gyedɛ wɔkã bɔgya gu ana.
Na bio, susuampaara dɛ hom enya asaase no, hom nhwehwɛ edwimfo ahorow nyina na hom mfa hɔn mbra asaase no do, ma wɔmbɛyɛ edwuma mfa mma Nyame n’ahotseweefo.
Ma wɔnyɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yi nyina esiado esiado; na wɔmma bishop anaa asɔr no n’ananmusinyi no mma wonhu asaase no do ndzinoa nyina ofi ber to ber.
Na mma wɔmmpɛ ntsɛm, anaadɛ mma wonntu mbirika wɔ mboano edwuma no ne yɛ ho; na mbom wɔmfa afotusɛm a asɔr no mu elderfo no hɔn nsa bɛkã wɔ ehyiadzi ase ofi ber to ber no do no nyɛ.
Na ma m’akowaa Sidney Rigdon ntsew asaase yi nye bea a wobesi temple ama Ewuradze no ho na ontu nhyɛ Ewuradze nsa.

Na hom mfrɛ nhyiamu; na ɔno ekyir no wɔmma mo nkowaa Sidney Rigdon nye Joseph Smith, Kakraba, nye Oliver Cowdery so nsan hɔn ekyir nkɔ hɔnankasa hɔn asaase do nkɔsɔw edwuma nkaa no a mehyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnyɛ no do, nye dza aka a ehyiadzi no bɛkyerɛ.
Na mma obiara nnsan n’ekyir mmfi asaase yi do nnkɔ gyedɛ ɔagye dase wɔ dza onyim nye dza ɔgye dzi nokwar mu no ho wɔ kwan no do.

Wɔngye biribiara a wɔdze maa Ziba Peterson no mfi ne nsamu; na wɔmma ɔnyɛ asɔrba ara wɔ asɔr no mu, na ɔnkã enuanom no ho na ɔmfa nankasa ne nsa nyɛ edwuma, kesi dɛ wɔbɛtsẽa no ara yie wɔ no bɔn ho; osiandɛ ɔnnkã no bɔn, na osusuu dɛ obotum dze esuma.
Ma asɔr no mu elderfo nkaa a wɔreba asaase yi do no a hɔn mu binom woehyira hɔn mbordo no so nyɛ ehyiadzi wɔ asaase yi do.
Na wɔmma m’akowaa Edward Partridge nhwɛ ehyiadzi a wɔrebɛyɛ no do.
Na wɔmma hɔn a wɔresan aba no so nkã asɛmpa no na wɔngye dase wɔ ndzɛmba a woeyi akyerɛ hɔn no ho wɔ kwan no do.
Na, nokwar, ɔwɔ dɛ ndze no fi bea yi do kɔ wiadze nyina mu, dze ekodu asaase ano noho nyina do—Ɔwɔ dɛ wɔkã asɛmpa no kyerɛ abɔdze nyina, na nsɛnkyerɛdze bedzi hɔn a wɔgye dzi no ekyir.
Na hwɛ, Nyimpa Ba no reba. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/59.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 59
chapter_summary: 1–4, Wobehyira Ahotseweefo nokwafo no a wɔwɔ Zion; 5–8, Ɔwɔ dɛ wɔdɔ Ewuradze, wɔsom no na wodzi Ne mbrasɛm do; 9–19, Sɛ Ahotseweefo no sie Ewuradze Ne da no krɔnkrɔn a, wobehyira hɔn wɔ honam nye sunsum mu; 20–24, Wɔbɔ atseneneefo no anohoba dɛ wobenya asomdwee wɔ wiadze yi mu nye onnyiewiei nkwa wɔ wiadze a ɔreba no mu.

verses.text: Hwɛ, Ewuradze se, nhyira akã hɔn a wɔaba asaase yi do a wɔdze enyiwa kor hwɛ m’enyimnyam dɛ mbrɛ me mbrasɛm no se.
Na hɔn a wɔbɛtsena nkwa mu no benya asaase yi edzi, na hɔn a wobowu no bɔhom efi hɔn berɛ nyina mu, na hɔn ndwuma bedzi hɔn ekyir; na wobenya ahenkyɛw wɔ m’Egya fie no a mesiesie ama hɔn no mu.
Nyew, nhyira akã hɔn a hɔn anamɔn si Zion asaase do, hɔn a wɔayɛ setsie ama m’asɛmpa no; na hɔn akatua nye dɛ wobenya asaase no do ndzepa nyina na ɔbɔsow aba wɔ n’ahoɔdzen mu.
Na wɔdze nhyira so a ofi sor bɛhyɛ hɔn ahenkyɛw; nyew, mbrasɛm a ɔkã ho no nnyɛ kuma, nye nyikyerɛ wɔ n’aber mu—hɔn a wodzi nokwar na wosi nketse wɔ m’enyim no.
Dɛm ntsi, medze mbrasɛm yi ma hɔn se dɛ: Hom mfa hom akoma nyina, nye hom ahom, hom adwen, nye hom ahoɔdzen nyina ndɔ Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn, na hom nsom no wɔ Jesus Christ ne dzin mu.
Hom ndɔ hom nyɛnko dɛ homankasa homho. Mma hom nnwia adze; mma hom nntõ awar, na mma hom nndzi ewu so, anaadɛ mma hom nnyɛ biribiara a ɔtsetse dɛm.
Hom nda Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn ase wɔ adze nyina mu.
Hom mbɔ afɔr mma Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn wɔ tseneneeyɛ mu, hom mfa akoma a abobɔ nye sunsum a abotow mpo nyɛ.
Aama hom eetum aatsew homho efi wiadze nkekãa ho, hom nkɔ mpaabɔ fie wɔ me da krɔnkrɔn no mu nkedzi sacrament no;
Na nokwar, iyi nye da a woeyi esi hɔ ama hom dɛ hom nhom mfi hom ndwuma nyina ho, na hom nsom Ɔsorsornyi no;
Naaso, hom tum bɔ hom anohoba wɔ tseneneeyɛ mu da biara na aber biara.
Mbom hom nkaa dɛ Ewuradze ne da yi, ɔwɔ dɛ hom bɔ hom afɔr ma Ɔsorsornyi no, na hom dzi hom sacrament no, na hom nkã hom bɔn nkyerɛ hom nuanom, na wɔ Ewuradze enyim.
Na ɔnnsɛ dɛ hom yɛ biribiara wɔ dɛm da yi mu, na mbom hom mfa komakor nyɛ hom edziban ama hom akɔnkye eedzi mu, anaa yɛbɛkã dɛ, ama hom enyigye aahyɛ mã.
Nokwar, iyi nye akɔnkye na mpaabɔ, anaa yɛbɛkã dɛ, enyigye na mpaabɔ.
Na mber dodow a hom dze akoma a enyigye ahyɛ no mã nye enyimtsewee da ase wɔ ndzɛmba yinom ne yɛ ho, na hom nnyɛ no atwetwesi mu, osiandɛ iyi yɛ bɔn, na mbom hom dze enyigye akoma nye enyimtsewee yɛ—
Nokwar mese dɛ, mber dodow a hom yɛ iyi no, asaase ne mãhyɛ yɛ homdze, hamu mbowa nye wimu ntumbowa nye dza wɔfow ndua nye dza wɔnantsew asaase do nyina;
Nyew, nye ahataw, nye ndzepa a ofi asaase mu ba, dɛ ɔyɛ dza wodzi anaa wɔdze yɛ efuradze, anaa wɔdze si adan, anaa asɛn anaa nduaba kwã, anaa ture anaa wenyin ture;
Nyew, ndzɛmba nyina a ofi asaase mu ba, wɔ ne ber ano no, wɔyɛe dze maa nyimpa ne yieyɛ, dɛ ɔnsɔ enyi na ɔmfa dɛw nhyɛ akoma mu;
Nyew, wɔmfa nyɛ edziban nye efuradze, ama wɔayɛ dɛw, na wɔayɛ huam, wɔahyɛ honandua no dzen na woekenyan ɔkra no.
Na ɔyɛ Nyame enyigye dɛ ɔdze ndzɛmba yinom ama nyimpa; na dɛm ntsi na ɔyɛe, na dɛ wonsusu ne ndzii ho, na mma wonndzi no ntrado, na mma wɔmmbɔ epoo so wɔ ho.
Na biribiara nnyi hɔ a nyimpa nam do fom Nyankopɔn, anaa obiara nnyi hɔ a n’ebufuhyew dzɛw no do, kã hɔn a wɔnngye nnto mu dɛ ne nsa wɔ biribiara mu, na wonndzi ne mbrasɛm do.
Hwɛ, iyi nye dza mbra no nye nkɔnhyɛfo no akã; dɛm ntsi, mma hom nnhaw me bio wɔ asɛm yi ho.
Mbom hom nhu dɛ nyia ɔyɛ tsenenee ndwuma no benya n’akatua, obenya asomdwee so mpo wɔ wiadze yi mu, nye onnyiewiei nkwa wɔ wiadze a ɔreba no mu.
Emi, Ewuradze na makã dɛm, na Sunsum no gye ho dase. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/60.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 60
chapter_summary: 1–9, Ɔwɔ dɛ elderfo no kã asɛmpa no kyerɛ mboanofo emumuyɛfo no; 10–14, Onnyi dɛ wɔsɛɛ hɔn mber, anaa wɔdze hɔn talent sie; 15–17, Wobotum ahohor hɔn anan ho dze ayɛ dasegye etsia hɔn a wɔpow asɛmpa no.

verses.text: Hwɛ, dɛm na Ewuradze se n’asɔr mu elderfo no a ɔwɔ dɛ wɔsan hɔn ekyir ntsɛm kɔ asaase a wofi bae no: Hwɛ, ɔyɛ me enyigye dɛ hom aba ha;
Mbom minnyi hom mu binom ho enyigye koraa, osiandɛ wommbue hɔn ano, na wɔdze talent a medze ama hɔn no esuma osiandɛ wosuro nyimpa. Nkorɔfo a wɔtse dɛm no wondue, na m’ebufuhyew no redzɛw tsia hɔn.
Na ɔbɛba dɛ sɛ woenndzi nokwar amma me a, wɔbɛgye dza wɔwɔ no mpo efi hɔn nsamu.
Na emi, Ewuradze, na midzi hen wɔ sor na asaase nsordaafo do; na da a mebeyi m’egudze no, nyimpa nyina bohu dza ɔda Nyame no tum edzi no mbrɛ ɔtse.

Na nokwar, mebɛkã dza ɔfa hom kwan a hom rubotu akɔ asaase a hom fi do bae no ho akyerɛ hom. Hom nyɛ nsuhɛn bi, anaa hom ntɔ, dɛ mbrɛ hom hwɛ a oye ma hom, ɔmmfa mo ho, na hom ntu kwan no ntsɛm nkɔ bea a wɔfrɛ no St. Louis.
Na sɛ hom du hɔ a, hom mma mo nkowaa Sidney Rigdon, Joseph Smith, Kakraba, nye Oliver Cowdery nsɔw hɔn akwantu no do nkɔ Cincinnati;

Na wɔ bea yi do na hom mma wɔmma hɔn ndze do ntsẽa mu kɛse mbɔ m’asɛm no dawur, mma wɔmmfa ebufuw anaadɛ wɔnngye kyim, na mbom wɔmma nsa krɔnkrɔn do wɔ hɔn do. Na emi mubotum mayɛ hom krɔnkrɔn, na medze hom bɔn akyɛ hom.

Na hom mma hɔn a wɔaka no mfi St. Louis hɔ nkɔ nkɛkã asɛm no, wɔnkɔ no beenu beenu, na mma wɔnnkɔ no ɔhardo, wɔntɔ hɔn bo nkyima mboanofo emumuyɛfo no mu nkã asɛm no nkyerɛ hɔn, nkodu dɛ wɔbɛsan hɔn ekyir akɔ hɔn nsɔr a wofi mu bae no.
Na ne nyinara nsɔr no yieyɛ ho ntsi a; na iyi ho ntsi na masoma hɔn.
Na wɔmma m’akowaa Edward Partridge nyi sika a medze ama no no bi mfa mma me elderfo a mahyɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnsan hɔn ekyir mbra no.
Na nyia obotum no, wɔmma ɔmfa nsan mma asɔr n’ananmusinyi no; na nyia orunntum no, mma wommbisa no.
Na afei mekasa kyerɛ hɔn a wɔaka a ɔsɛ dɛ wɔba asaase yi do no.
Hwɛ, wɔasoma hɔn dɛ wɔnkɛkã m’asɛmpa no wɔ mboanofo emumuyɛfo mu; dɛm ntsi, mehyɛ hɔn dɛ: Mma wɔnnyɛ akwadwer mmfa nnsɛɛ hɔn mber, na mma wɔmmfa hɔn talent nnsie ɔno worunnhu.

Na hom ba Zion asaase do, na hom bɔ m’asɛm no dawur wie a, hom nsan hom ekyir ntsɛm mbra mbɔbɔ m’asɛm no dawur wɔ mboanofo emumuyɛfo no mu, mma hom nnyɛ no ɔhyew do anaa wɔ ebufuw do, nna nnyɛ aperdzi mu.
Na hom mporoporow hom ananadze huntuma ngu hɔn a wɔanngye hom no, nnyɛ wɔ hɔn enyim amma aannhyɛ hɔn ebufuw, na mbom wɔ nsumaamu; na hom nhohor hom ananho mfa ngye dase ntsia hɔn wɔ atsɛmbu da no mu.
Hwɛ, kakra yi dɔɔ sõ ma hom, na iyi yɛ nyia ɔsomaa hom ne pɛ.
Na mubodua m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, n’anomu do akã dza ɔfa Sidney Rigdon nye Oliver Cowdery ho. Hɔn a wɔbɛka ekyir no. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/61.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 61
chapter_summary: 1–12, Ewuradze ahyɛ mom dɛ adzesɛɛ pii bɛba esu no do; 13–22, John dom esu no, na ɔsɛɛfo no nam nsu no do; 23–29, Binom wɔ tum a wɔdze kasa kyerɛ esu no; 30–35, Elderfo no wɔdɛ wotu kwan beenu beenu na wɔkã asɛmpa no; 36–39, Ɔwɔ dɛ wosiesie hɔnho dze ma Nyimpa Ba no ne mbae.

verses.text: Hom nhwɛ, na hom ntsie nyia ɔwɔ tum nyinara no ne ndze, nyia ɔwɔ hɔ fi daapem kesi daapem, Alpha na Omega, ahyɛse na ewiei no mpo.

Hom nhwɛ, nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se hom, O hom a hom yɛ m’asɔr mu elderfo, hom a hom ehyia mu wɔ bea yi do, hom a wɔdze hom bɔn akyɛ hom, na Emi, Ewuradze, na medze bɔn kyɛ, meyɛ mbɔbɔrhufo ma hɔn a wɔdze akoma a abotow kã hɔn bɔn;
Mbom nokwar, mese hom dɛ, onnhia dɛ hom, me elderfo kuw nyina, botwa nsu yi ɔhardo, wɔ ber a dɔm a wɔtsetse esu yi n’afã na n’afã nyina rehera wɔ ekyingye mu.
Naaso, me ma ho kwan ama hom aagye ho dase; hwɛ mbusu pii wɔ esu yi do, na ne kɛse wɔ ekyir;
Na Emi, Ewuradze, mahyɛ mom wɔ m’ebufuw mu dɛ ɔsɛɛ pii mbra esu no do; nyew, nkanka wɔ esu yinom no do.
Naaso, honam nyinara wɔ me nsamu, na nyia odzi nokwar wɔ hom mu no rennhera wɔ esu no do.
Dɛm ntsi, ohia dɛ m’akowaa Sidney Gilbert nye m’akowaa William W. Phelps bɛyɛ ntsɛm akɔ hɔn soma na wɔakɛyɛ hɔn nyamedwuma no.
Mbom mennkɛpɛ dɛ hom befi ha akɔ gyedɛ wɔatsẽa hom wɔ hom bɔn nyina ho, ama hom aayɛ kor, na hom annhera wɔ emumuyɛdze mu.

Mbom seseiara, nokwar, mese, oye ma me dɛ hom bɛpaapaa mu. Dɛm ntsi, wɔmma mo nkowaa Sidney Gilbert nye William W. Phelps mfa hɔn dɔm dadaw no, na wontu hɔn kwan wɔ ɔhardo ama woeetum ayɛ hɔn nyamedwuma no nyina, na wɔnam gyedzi do bedzi konyim.
Na mber dodow a wobedzi nokwar no, wɔbɔkora hɔn do, na emi, Ewuradze mebɛkã hɔn ho.
Na wɔmma hɔn a wɔaka no mfa hɔn adzefuradze a wohia.
Wɔmma m’akowaa Sidney Gilbert mfa dza wonnhia no so nkɔ, dɛ mbrɛ hom adwen besi pi wɔ ho.
Na afei, hwɛ, hom yieyɛ ntsi na medze mbrasɛm a ɔfa ndzɛmba yinom ho ma hom; na Emi, Ewuradze, menye hom beyi atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ menye tsetseberdomba yɛe no.
Hwɛ, Emi Ewuradze, mihyiraa esu no ahyɛse no; na mbom nda a odzi ekyir no, muduaa m’akowaa John n’anomusɛm do dze ndom kãa esu no.
Dɛm ntsi, nda bi bɛba a honam biara a ɔbɛfa nsu no do no, ɔnnkɛyɛ dwodwoodwo ama no.
Na nda bi bɛba a wɔbɛkã dɛ obiara nnkotum afa esu no do dze akɔ Zion, gyedɛ nyia n’akoma mu tsen.
Na dɛ mbrɛ emi, Ewuradze ahyɛse no medze ndom kãa asaase no, dɛmara so na nda a odzi ekyir no mehyira do wɔ n’aber do dze ama m’ahotseweefo, ama woeedzi no do seradze.
Na afei medze mbrasɛm yi ma hom dɛ dza mekã kyerɛ kor no, mekã kyerɛ hom nyina dɛ hom ndzi kan mbɔ hom nuanom kɔkɔ wɔ esu yi ho, dɛ mma wonntu kwan mmfa do, amma hɔn gyedzi ammpa na mfir ammpa hɔn;
Emi, Ewuradze, mahyɛ mom, na ɔsɛɛfo no nam esu n’enyi, na mekantse ɔmom no.
Emi, Ewuradze, mo bo fuuw hom ndeda, na mbom ndɛ m’ebufuw no kɔ.
Dɛm ntsi, wɔmma hɔn a makã yi fa hɔn ho no nyɛ ntsɛm ntu hɔn kwan no—bio, mese hom dɛ, wɔmma wontu hɔn kwan no ntsɛm.
Na ɔmmfa mo ho koraa, dɛ mber kakra botwa mu, na ɔba no dɛ wɔyɛ hɔn nyamedwuma wie a, dɛ wɔbɛfa nsu do anaa asaase do no, wɔnyɛ dza wobodua hɔn adwendwen mu ada no edzi.

Na afei, ɔfa mo nkowaa Sidney Rigdon, Joseph Smith, Kakraba, nye Oliver Cowdery no, mma wɔmmfa esu no do bio, gyedɛ wɔfa nsuka no do dze kɔ hɔn efiefi; mekyerɛ dɛ mma wonntu kwan mmfa esu no do, na mbom wɔmmfa nsuka no do.

Hwɛ, emi, Ewuradze, makyerɛ kwan a m’ahotseweefo mfa do ntu hɔn kwan no, na hwɛ, kwan no nye yi—sɛ wotwa nsuka no wie a wɔmfa asaase do, mber dodow biara a wɔbɛhyɛ hɔn dɛ wontu kwan no, na wɔnkɔ Zion asaase do;
Na wɔnyɛ no dɛ mbrɛ Israelmba yɛe no, wosisii hɔn nseraban wɔ kwan no do.
Na hwɛ, mbrasɛm yi na hom mfa mma hom enuanom nyina.
Na nyia wɔama no tum dɛ ɔnkasa nkyerɛ esu no, ɔnoara na Sunsum no bɛma oehu n’akwan nyinara so;
Dɛm ntsi, hom mma onyia no nyɛ dza Nyame tseasefo no Sunsum ahyɛ no dɛ ɔnyɛ no, wɔ asaase anaa esu no do, dɛ mbrɛ ɔwɔ mo hɔ a ɔwɔ dɛ mebɛyɛ no ekyir yi.
Na wɔakyerɛ hom kwan no, anaadɛ mbrɛ ahotseweefo a wɔwɔ Ewuradze ne nseraban mu no nyɛ ntu hɔn kwan no.
Na bio, nokwar mese hom, mo nkowaa Sidney Rigdon, Joseph Smith, Kakraba, nye Oliver Cowdery, dɛ mma hom mmbue hom ano wɔ mboanofo emumuyɛfo no mu kɛpem dɛ wobodu Cincinnati;
Na dɛm bea no do na wɔmma hɔn ndze do nkasa nkyerɛ Nyame, mfa ntsia dɛm nkorɔfo no, nyew, nyia n’ebufuw adzɛw wɔ hɔn emumuyɛ ho do, nkorɔfo a woenyin ama ɔsɛɛ no.
Na ɔno ekyir wɔnsɔw hɔn akwantu no do nkɔ hɔn nuanom mboanofo no nkyɛn, osiandɛ hɔn na ohia kɛse dɛ wokedzi dwuma wɔ hɔn mu sen mboanofo emumuyɛfo no hɔn mu.
Na afei, ɔfa hɔn a wɔaaka ho no, wɔmma wɔnkɔbɔ asɛm no dawur wɔ mboanofo emumuyɛfo no mu, susuampaara dɛ wɔdze ama no.
Na mber dodow a wɔbɛyɛ dɛm no, wɔbɔhor hɔn ntar, na nkekãa biara remmba hɔnho wɔ m’enyim.

Na wɔmma wɔmbɔ mu ntu kwan no, anaadɛ wɔnkɔ no beenu beenu, dɛ mbrɛ wɔhwɛ a obeye ama hɔn, na mbom hom mma m’akowaa Reynolds Cahoon na m’akowaa Samuel H. Smith a m’enyi gye hɔn ho no nko mbɔ mu nnantsew, mma wɔnntsetsew hɔn mu kɛpem dɛ wɔbɛsan akɔ hɔn efiefi; na osian nyansa a ɔwɔ mo mu no ntsi na mereyɛ iyi.
Na afei, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, dza mekã kyerɛ kor no, mekã kyerɛ hom nyinara, me mbofra nkakraba, hom mma hom enyi ngye; osiandɛ mowɔ hom finimfin, na mommpoow hom;
Na susuampaara dɛ hom abrɛ homho adze wɔ m’enyim yi, ahenman ne nhyira yɛ homdze.
Hom mbɔ hom asen do, na hom nweɔn na hom nya enyida hɔ, na hom nhwɛ Nyimpa Ba no ne mbae no kwan, osiandɛ ɔbɛba wɔ dɔn ber a hom enyi nnda.
Hom mbɔ mpaa aber nyina amma hom annkɔ nsɔhwɛ mu, ama hom eetum egyina ne mbae da no mu, wɔ nkwa anaa owu mu. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/62.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 62
chapter_summary: 1–3, Wɔkyerɛw adasegye wɔ sor; 4–9, Elderfo no wɔdɛ wotu kwan na wɔkɛkã nyamesɛm dɛ mbrɛ hɔn adwen bɛyɛ hɔn na mbrɛ Sunsum no bɛkyerɛ.

verses.text: Hom nhwɛ, na hom ntsie, O hom m’asɔr mu elderfo, Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn na ɔse, Jesus Christ mpo, hom dzimafo, nyia onyim nyimpa ne mberɛwyɛ na mbrɛ wosi boa hɔn a wɔsɔ hɔn hwɛ no na ɔse.
Na nokwar, m’enyi wɔ hɔn a wonnyae nnkɔr Zion asaase do no do; dɛm ntsi hɔn dwumadzi no nndzii mu.
Na osian dasegye a hom agye na wɔakyerɛw no wɔ sor ma abɔfo no hwɛ do ntsi woehyira hom; na wodzi dɛw wɔ hom ho, na wɔdze hom bɔn so akyɛ hom.
Na afei, hom nsɔw hom akwantu no do. Hom mboa hom ano wɔ Zion asaase no do; na hom nyɛ nhyiamu na hom mbɔ mu ndzi ehurusi, na hom nyɛ sacrament mma Ɔsorsornyi no.

Na nkyii hom botum asan hom ekyir ebedzi dase, nyew hom mbɔ mu kor, anaa hom nkɔ no beenu beenu, dɛ mbrɛ hom hwɛ a oye ma hom, emidze ɔmmfa mo ho; mbom hom ndzi nokwar, na hom mbɔ enyigyesɛm no ho dawur nkyerɛ nyimpa a wɔwɔ asaase do, anaadɛ wɔ mboanofo emumuyɛfo no mu.

Hwɛ, emi Ewuradze maboa hom ano dze hom aba ama anohoba no aahyɛ mã, ama anokwafo a wɔwɔ hom mu no wɔabɔ hɔnho ban na wɔabɔ mu edzi dɛw wɔ Missouri asaase do. Emi, Ewuradze, mobɔ anokwafo no anohoba na minndzi ator.

Emi, Ewuradze, mema ho kwan, sɛ obi wɔ hom mu a ɔpɛ dɛ ɔtsena mpɔnkɔ do, anaa nsoaso do, anaa tseaseanam mu a, ne nsa bɛkã nhyira yi, na sɛ ne nsa kã fi Ewuradze nsamu a, ɔmfa n’akoma nyina nda ase wɔ adze nyinara mu.
Ndzɛmba yinom wɔ hɔ ma hom dɛ hom yɛ no wɔ atsɛmbu kwan do nye kwan a Sunsum no bɛkyerɛ do.
Hwɛ, ahenman no yɛ homdze. Na hom nhwɛ na hom nhu dɛ menye anokwafo no wɔ hɔ daa. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/63.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 63
chapter_summary: 1–6, Ebufuhyew da no bɛba emumuyɛfo do; 7–12, Nsɛnkyerɛdze nam gyedzi do ba; 13–19, Hɔn a wɔtõ awar wɔ hɔn akoma mu no bɔpow gyedzi no na wɔbɔtow hɔn akyen ogya baka no mu; 20, Anokwafo no benya egyapadze wɔ asaase a wɔasakyer no no do; 21, Wɔnndaa Nsakyer a osii Bepɔw no do no mu nsɛm nyina edzi nnkyerɛe; 22–23, Hɔn a wɔyɛ setsie no hɔn nsa kã ahenman no mu esumadze no; 24–31, Ɔwɔ dɛ wɔtɔ egyapadze a ɔwɔ Zion no; 32–35, Ewuradze hyɛ akõkoekõ ho ɔmom, na emumuyɛfo ku emumuyɛfo; 36–48, Ahotseweefo no wɔdɛ wɔboa hɔn ano kɔ Zion na wɔma sika ma wɔdze kyekyer; 49–54, Wɔbɔ anokwafo anohoba dɛ wobehyira hɔn wɔ Mbae a Otsĩa Ebien, Owusoɛr na Mfe Apem no mu; 55–58, Iyi nye kɔkɔbɔ da no; 59–66, Hɔn a wɔmmaa hɔn tumdzi na wɔdze Ewuradze ne dzin dzi dwuma no bɔ no gyangyan.

verses.text: Hom ntsie, O hom adasa, na hom mbue hom akoma mu, na hom nyɛ aso wɔ ekyirekyir; na hom ntsie, hom a hom frɛ homho Ewuradze no nkorɔfo, na hom ntsie Ewuradze n’asɛm nye ne pɛ a ɔfa homho.
Nyew, nokwar, mese hom dɛ hom ntsie nyia n’ebufuw adzɛw wɔ emumuyɛfo nye etuatsewfo do no n’asɛm;
Nyia ɔfa hɔn a ɔpɛ dɛ ɔfa hɔn, na hɔn a ɔpɛ dɛ ɔbɔ hɔn nkwa ho ban no ɔbɔ no;
Nyia ɔma do si hɔ wɔ nankasa ne pɛ na n’enyigye do; na ɔsɛɛ no wɔ ne pɛ do, na otum ma ɔkra kɔ hɛl.
Hwɛ, Emi, Ewuradze, mema me ndze do, na wobedzi do.

Dɛm ntsi, nokwar, mese dɛ, wɔmma emumuyɛfo nhwɛ yie, na wɔmma etuatsewfo nsuro na hɔn ho mpopo; na wɔmma ekyingyefo mmua hɔn ano, osiandɛ ebufuw da no bɛba hɔn do dɛ ekyinehyia-mframa, na honam nyina bohu dɛ Emi nye Nyame.
Na nyia ɔrohwehwɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze no bohu nsɛnkyerɛdze, mbom nnyɛ dza ɔdze kɔ nkwagye mu.
Nokwar, mese hom dɛ binom wɔ hom mu a wɔrohwehwɛ ehu nsɛnkyerɛdze, na binom fi ahyɛse no mpo;
Mbom, hwɛ, gyedzi nndua nsɛnkyerɛdze do ba, na mbom nsɛnkyerɛdze dzi hɔn a wɔgye dzi ekyir.
Nyew, nsɛnkyerɛdze nam gyedzi do ba, onndua nyimpa hɔn pɛ do, dɛ mbrɛ wɔrohwehwɛ, na mbom ɔnam Nyame ne pɛ do.

Nyew, nsɛnkyerɛdze nam gyedzi do, dze yɛ ndwuma akɛse mu, osiandɛ nyimpa biara a onnyi gyedzi no orunntum nnsɔ Nyame enyi; na nyia Nyame no bo efuw no no, n’enyi nngye no ho; dɛm ntsi, hɔn a wɔtsetse dɛm no, onnyi nsɛnkyerɛdze biara nnkyerɛ hɔn, na mbom n’ebufuw nko na ɔdze hɔn kɔ afɔbu mu.
Dɛm ntsi, emi, Ewuradze, m’enyi nngye hɔn a wɔwɔ hom mu a wɔpɛ dɛ wohu nsɛnkyerɛdze na anwanwadze ama woeenya gyedzi, na mbom wɔnnyɛ dza oye mmfa mma nyimpa nnhyɛ me enyimnyam.
Eso, mema mbrasɛm, na dodowara adan efi me mbrasɛm ho na wonndzi do.
Mbarimba na mbasiafo awartofo wɔ hom mu; binom efi hom mu kɔ, na binom so da ho wɔ hom mu na wɔbɛda hɔn edzi akyerɛ hom ekyir yi.
Hɔn a wɔtsetse dɛm no nhwɛ yie na wonnu hɔnho ntsɛm, amma atsɛmbu ammfa hɔn mprase, na hɔn nkwaseadze bɛda edzi, na hɔn ndwuma so bedzi hɔn ekyir ma nkorɔfo ehu.
Na nokwar, mese hom dɛ, dɛ mbrɛ makã akyerɛ hom dada no, nyia ɔhwɛ ɔbaa na no kɔn dɔ no, anaadɛ wɔbɔtõ awar wɔ hɔn akoma mu no, worinnya Sunsum no, na mbom wɔbɔpow gyedzi no na wobosuro.

Dɛm ntsi, emi, Ewuradze makã dɛ ehufo, nye ekyingyefo, nye atorfo nyina, nye obiara a ɔdɔ na odzi ator, nye edwamambɔnyi, nye nkaberkyernyi benya hɔn kyɛfa wɔ baka a ɔdzɛw ogya nye brimstone, dza ɔyɛ owu mprenu no mu.
Nokwar mese dɛ, worinnya kyɛfa wɔ owusoɛr a odzi kan no mu.
Na afei hwɛ, emi, Ewuradze, mese hom dɛ hom nndzi bem, osiandɛ ndzɛmba yinom wɔ hom mu.
Naaso, nyia otsim gyedzi mu kɔ ewiei na ɔyɛ m’apɛdze no, sɛ nsakyer da no ba a, dɛm nyimpa no bedzi konyim, na obenya egyapadze wɔ asaase yi do;
Ber a wɔbɛsakyer asaase yi, tse dɛ nhwɛdo a woyii kyerɛɛ m’asomafo no wɔ bepɔw no do no; dɛm asɛm no ne mãhyɛ no hom nsa nnyae nnkae.
Na afei, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, dɛ mbrɛ mekãa kyerɛɛ hom, dɛ mebɛda me pɛ edzi akyerɛ hom no, hwɛ, mebɛda no edzi akyerɛ hom, nnyɛ wɔ mbrasɛm kwan do, osiandɛ dodowara wɔ hɔ a wonndzi me mbrasɛm do.
Mbom nyia odzi me mbrasɛm do no, mibeyi m’ahenman mu esumadze akyerɛ no, na ɔbɛyɛ nkwa nsubura wɔ no mu, na ɔapem akɔ nkwa a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem mu.
Na afei, hwɛ, iyi nye Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn ne pɛ a ɔfa n’ahotseweefo ho, dɛ wɔbɔboa hɔn ano na wɔakɔ Zion asaase do, mma wɔnnkɔ no ɔhardo, amma basabasayɛ ennsi, dza ɔdze yardɔm bɛba.
Hwɛ, Zion asaase no—Emi, Ewuradze na okitsa mankasa me nsamu;
Naaso, Emi, Ewuradze, medze ndzɛmba a ɔyɛ Cæsar dze no ma Cæsar.
Dɛm ntsi, Emi, Ewuradze mepɛ dɛ hom totɔ nsaase no, ama hom eedzi wiadze ewuramim, ama hom nsa aada wiadze do, amma wɔaanngyegye hɔn ebufuw.
Osiandɛ Satan dze ebufuw ahyɛ hɔn akoma mu dze etsia hom, dɛ wɔnkã hom bɔgya ngu.
Dɛm ntsi, mma hom nngye Zion asaase no kwa mbom wɔntɔ, anaadɛ wɔmmfa bɔgya nngye, annyɛ dɛm a ɔrennyɛ hom egyapadze.
Na sɛ hom tɔ a, hwɛ wobehyira hom.

Na sɛ hom kã bɔgya gu, wɔ ber a wɔabra hom dɛ mma hom nnkã bɔgya nngu a, hwɛ, hom atamfo bɔsoɛr hom do, na wɔahwe hom mbaa fi kurow do akɔ kurow do, fi nhyiamudan mu akɔ nhyiamudan mu, na kumaabi na wobegyina na hɔn nsa akã egyapadze.
Emi, Ewuradze, mo bo efuw emumuyɛfo; morotwe mo Sunsum efi nyimpa a wɔwɔ asaase do no do.
Makã ntam wɔ m’ebufuhyew mu, na mahyɛ mom dɛ akõkoekõ mbra asaase enyi do, na emumuyɛfo bokuku emumuyɛfo, na obiara bosuro;
Na ɔbɛyɛ dzen dɛ ahotseweefo so mpo befi nsa; naaso, emi, Ewuradze, menye hɔn wɔ hɔ, na mibefi m’Egya n’enyim wɔ sor esian aba na medze ogya a onndum da abɛhyew emumuyɛfo.
Na hwɛ, iyi nnyaa mmbae seseiara, na mbom ɔbɛba.
Dɛm ntsi, hom ehu dɛ Emi, Ewuradze na mahyɛ ndzɛmba yinom nyina ho mom wɔ asaase yi enyi do, mepɛ dɛ m’ahotseweefo hyia mu wɔ Zion asaase do;

Na ɔsɛ dɛ nyimpa biara fa tseneneeyɛ kitsa ne nsamu, na ɔfa nokwardzi bɔ n’asen do, na ɔma kɔkɔbɔ ndze do bɔ dawur kyerɛ nyimpa a wɔwɔ asaase do; hom nkã asɛm no nkyerɛ hɔn wɔ ber a hom ruguan so, dɛ amamfoyɛ bɛba emumuyɛfo do.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mma m’esuafo a wɔwɔ Kirtland no a wɔtse dɛm haban yi mu no mboaboa hɔn ndzɛmba ano.

Wɔmma m’akowaa Titus Billings a ɔhwɛ hɔn do no ntɔn asaase no, ama oeetum esiesie noho ama fefɛw ber a ɔreba yi na oeetu kwan akɔ Zion asaase do, ɔnye hɔn a wɔtse n’enyi hɔ nyina nkɔ ma ɔnka hɔn a meyi hɔn ama moho no nko, dɛ mma wɔnnkɔ nkesi ber a mebɛhyɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnkɔ.
Na sika nyina a hom botum dze ato hɔ no, dɛ osuar anaa ɔsõ no, ɔmmfa mo ho, wɔmfa nkɔ Zion asaase do nkɛma nkorɔfo a meyi hɔn dɛ wɔngyegye no.
Hwɛ, emi, Ewuradze, mebɛma m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, tum a ɔbɛma oetum enya Sunsum mu nhumu akyerɛ hɔn a wɔbɔkɔ Zion asaase no do, nye m’esuafo hɔn mu binom so a wɔbɔtweɔn.
Wɔmma m’akowaa Newel K. Whitney nkɔ n’eguadzi no do, anaadɛ ɔnhwɛ efiadze no do mber kakra.
Mbom sika dodow biara a obotum eyi ama no, ɔmma wɔmfa nkɔ Zion asaase do.
Hwɛ, ndzɛmba yinom nyina wɔ nankasa ne nsamu, dɛm ntsi, ma ɔnyɛ dza ɔhwɛ a ɔyɛ enyansadze ma no.
Nokwar, mese dɛ, ma wɔnyɛ no ananmusinyi wɔ m’esuafo no a wɔbɔtweɔn no do, na ma wɔmfa tum no nhyɛ ne nsa;
Na afei enye m’akowaa Oliver Cowdery nyɛ ntsɛm nkɛsera nsɔr no, na hom nsiansian ndzɛmba yinom nyina mu nkyerɛ hɔn. Hwɛ, iyi nye me pɛ, dɛ hom ngyegye sika dɛ mbrɛ makyerɛ hom no.
Nyia obedzi nokwar na oetsim no, obedzi wiadze do konyim.
Nyia ɔbɛma egudze ma wɔdze akɔ Zion asaase do no benya egyapadze wɔ wiadze yi mu, na no ndwuma bedzi n’ekyir, na obenya akatua so wɔ wiadze a ɔbɛba no mu.

Nyew, na nhyira nkã ewufo a wowu wɔ Ewuradze mu, ofitsi aber yi dze kɔ aber a Ewuradze bɛba, ndzɛmba dadaw nyina botwa mu akɔ, na ndzɛmba nyina bɛyɛ fofor, na wɔbɔsoɛr efi owu mu, na worunnwu bio, na wobenya egyapadze wɔ Ewuradze enyim, wɔ kuropɔn krɔnkrɔn no mu.
Na nyia ɔtse ase ber a Ewuradze bɛba na oesie gyedzi no, wobehyira no; mbom wɔahyehyɛ ato hɔ dɛ sɛ onyin yɛ panyin a, otwar dɛ owu.
Dɛm ntsi, mbofra benyin ekodu dɛ wɔbɛyɛ nkɔdaa; nkɔdaa bowu; mbom wɔrennda huntuma mu, wɔbɛsakyer hɔn ntsɛmara.
Dɛm ntsi, na asomafo no kãa wusoɛr ho asɛm kyerɛɛ wiadze no.
Ndzɛmba yinom nye dza ɔsɛ dɛ hom hwehwɛ; na dɛ mbrɛ Ewuradze kãe no, ɔabɛn, na ɔnnkɛkyɛr na ɔaba, ɔbɛba mpo wɔ da a Nyimpa Ba no bɛba.

Na ansaana dɔn no bɔsõ no, mbaabun nkwaseafo bɔfora enyansafo no mu; na aber no wobeyi atseneneefo efi emumuyɛfo mu koraa; na da no mu mobɔsoma m’abɔfoe ma wɔabɛpa emumuyɛfo na wɔatow hɔn egu ogya a onndum da no mu.
Na afei, hwɛ, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, emi Ewuradze m’enyi nngye m’akowaa Sidney Rigdon ho, ɔmema noho do wɔ n’akoma mu na onntsie afotu, na mbom ɔhow Sunsum no werɛ;
Dɛm ntsi, dza ɔakyerɛw no nnsɔ Ewuradze n’enyi, na ɔwɔ dɛ ɔkyerɛw fofor; na sɛ Ewuradze anngye a, hwɛ orinngyina dzibew a emi medze no esi no bio.
Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, hɔn a woenya pɛ wɔ hɔn akoma mu, wɔ ɔdwe mu dɛ wɔbɔbɔ ndzɛbɔnyɛfo kɔkɔ ma woeenu hɔnho efi hɔn bɔn ho no, ma wɔnhyɛ hɔn asɔfo ma wonya dɛm tum yi.
Na dɛm da yi yɛ kɔkɔbɔ da, na nnyɛ da a wɔkasa pii wɔ mu. Na Emi, Ewuradze, onnyi dɛ wosi me atwetwe wɔ nda a odzi ekyir yi mu.
Hwɛ, mifi sor, na mo tum wɔ asaase do. Mobɔ adze nyina do, na mowɔ adze nyina mu, na mudua adze nyina mu, na da bi bɛba a ndzɛmba nyina bɛhyɛ m’ase.
Hwɛ, emi nye Alpha na Omega, Jesus Christ no mpo.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mma nyimpa nyina nhwɛ yie wɔ kwan a wɔfa do bɔ me dzin wɔ hɔn ano no ho—
Na hwɛ, nokwar, mese dɛ, dodowara wɔ hɔ a wɔhyɛ afɔbu yi ase, hɔn a wɔbɔ Ewuradze ne dzin egyangyan, na wonnyi tumdzi no.
Dɛm ntsi, ma asɔr no nnu hɔnho wɔ hɔn bɔn ho, na emi, Ewuradze, mebɛfa hɔn ayɛ medze, annyɛ dɛm a, wobotwa hɔn akyen.

Hom nkaa dɛ dza ofi sor no yɛ krɔnkrɔn, na ɔwɔ dɛ wɔdze ahwɛyie kã ho asɛm, na wɔma Sunsum no pem hɔn adze; na dɛm nnkɛma afɔdzi biara aba, na hom nam mpaabɔ do nya Sunsum no; dɛm ntsi, sɛ wɔannyɛ iyi a, nna afɔbu wɔ hɔ ma hom.
Ma mo nkowaa, Joseph Smith, Kakraba, nye Sidney Rigdon nhwehwɛ fie mma hɔn, na sɛ wɔbɔ mpaa a Sunsum no bɛkyerɛ hɔn dza wɔnyɛ.
Ndzɛmba yinom wɔ hɔ, na wɔdze abotar bedzi do konyim, na dɛm bɛma woenya onnyiewiei enyimnyam a ɔyɛ dur, sɛ annyɛ dɛm a, wobenya afɔdzi kɛsenara. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/64.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 64
chapter_summary: 1–11, Wɔhyɛ Ahotseweefo no dɛ wɔmfa hɔn bɔn nkyekyɛ hɔnho nkorkor, amma bɔn ne kɛse aammbɛda hɔn do; 12–22, Ɔwɔ dɛ hɔn a wonnu hɔnho no, wɔdze hɔn ba Asɔr enyim; 23–25, Ber a Ewuradze bɛba no, wɔrennhyew nyia otua ebupɛn du no; 26–32, Wɔbɔ Ahotseweefo no kɔkɔ dɛ mma wonnkitsa kaw; 33–36, Wobotwa etuatsewfo no efi Zion akyen; 37–40, Asɔr no bobu aman atsɛn; 41–43, Zion bɛyɛ prɔmprɔm.

verses.text: Hwɛ, dɛm na Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn no se hom, O hom a hom yɛ m’asɔr mu elderfo, hom nyɛ aso na hom ntsie na hom ngye dza ɔyɛ me pɛ a ɔfa hom ho.
Na nokwar, mese hom dɛ, mepɛ dɛ hom dzi wiadze do konyim; dɛm ntsi, mibenya ayamuhyehye wɔ hom do.
Binom wɔ hom mu a wɔayɛ bɔn; mbom nokwar, mese hom dɛ, wɔ mber yi nko mu no, osian mankasa m’enyimnyam, nye akra nkwagye ntsi, medze hom bɔn akyɛ hom.
Mubohu hom mbɔbɔr, osiandɛ medze ahenman no ama hom.
Na wɔrenngye ahenman no n’esumadze nsaafee no mmfi m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba no, ne nsamu, ɔnam iyi ntsi na meyi no esi hɔ ber a ɔtse ase yi, mber dodow a odzi m’ahyɛdze do.
Binom wɔ hɔ a ɔnnyɛɛ hɔn hwee eso wɔaper dɛ wobenya kwan bi egyina do dze etsia no;
Mbom ɔayɛ bɔn; naaso, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, Emi, Ewuradze, medze hɔn a wɔkã hɔn bɔn kyerɛ me, na wɔnnyɛɛ bɔn a wɔdze kɔ owu mu, na wobisa bɔnfakyɛ no, hɔn bɔn kyɛ hɔn.

Tsetseberdo no, m’esuafo no peree dɛ wobenya biribi egyina do dze etsia hɔnho nkorkor, na wɔammfa hɔn bɔn annkyɛ hɔnho nkorkor wɔ hɔn akoma mu, na osian bɔn yi no ntsi, wɔtsẽaa hɔn yayaaya na wohun amandze.
Dɛm ntsi, mese hom dɛ, ɔsɛ dɛ hom dze hom bɔn kyɛ homho nkorkor; na nyia ɔmmfa no nua no bɔn nnkyɛ no no dzi fɔ wɔ Ewuradze n’enyim, na bɔn ne kɛse so no.
Emi, Ewuradze, medze hɔn a mepɛ no hɔn bɔn kyɛ hɔn, na mbom homdze, ɔyɛ hom ahyɛdze dɛ hom dze nyimpa nyina hɔn bɔn kyɛ hɔn.
Na ɔsɛ dɛ hom kã wɔ hom akoma mu dɛ—ma Nyame mbua emi nye ɔwo ntamu atsɛn na ontua wo kaw dɛ mbrɛ wo ndzeyɛɛ tse.
Na nyia onnu noho wɔ no bɔn ho, na ɔnnkã no bɔn nnkyerɛ no, hom mfa no mbra asɔr no enyim, na hom nye no ndzi dɛ mbrɛ kyerɛwsɛm no se hom, wɔ mbrasɛm anaa nyikyerɛ kwan do.
Na iyi na hom nyɛ ama wɔaahyɛ Nyame enyimnyam—nnyɛ dɛ hom ammfa no bɔn annkyɛ no, anaadɛ hom nnyi ayamuhyehye, mbom ama hom eedzi bem wɔ mbra n’enyi do, amma hom ammfom nyia ɔyɛ hom mbramafo no—
Nokwar, mese dɛ, iyi ho ntsi na hom nyɛ ndzɛmba yinom.
Hwɛ, emi, Ewuradze, mo bo fuuw nyia ɔyɛ m’akowaa Ezra Booth, nye m’akowaa Isaac Morley so, osiandɛ woenndzi mbra no do, na woenndzi mbrasɛm no so do;
Wosusuu bɔn wɔ hɔn akoma mu, na Emi, Ewuradze, motwee mo sunsum fii hɔn nkyɛn. Wobuu dza ɔnnyɛ bɔn no fɔ; naaso, medze m’akowaa Isaac Morley no bɔn akyɛ no.
Hwɛ, m’akowaa Edward Partridge so ayɛ bɔn, na Satan rohwehwɛ asɛɛ ne kra; mbom sɛ wɔda ndzɛmba yinom edzi kyerɛ hɔn, na wonu hɔnho wɔ bɔn no ho a, wɔdze bɛkyɛ hɔn.
Na afei, nokwar, mese dɛ, ohia me dɛ m’akowaa Sidney Gilbert, bɛyɛ adapɛn kakra ekyir no, ɔbɛsan n’ekyir akɔsɔw n’edwuma do, na ɔayɛ n’ananmusinyi edwuma wɔ Zion asaase no do;
Na dza oehu na ɔatse no oetum ada no edzi akyerɛ m’esuafo no, amma wɔaannhera. Na iyi ho ntsi na makã nsɛm yinom.
Na bio, mese hom dɛ, wɔronnsɔ m’akowaa Isaac Morley nnhwɛ mma ɔmmbor dza obotum asɔw, nna mma wɔmma afotu bɔn mma wɔnnhaw hom, Emi na mehyɛɛ hom dɛ hom ntɔn ne haban.

Mennkɛpɛ dɛ m’akowaa Frederick G. Williams bɔtɔn ne haban, osiandɛ, Emi, Ewuradze, mubosuo Kirtland asaase no mu dzen bɛyɛ mfe enum, na dɛm aber no mu no, merennkã emumuyɛfo no nngu, ama meetum agye binom nkwa.
Na dɛm da no ekyir no, Emi, Ewuradze, murummbu obiara a obobue n’akoma mu dze akɔ Zion asaase do no fɔ; osiandɛ, Emi, Ewuradze, morohwehwɛ adasamba hɔn akoma.
Hwɛ, sesei wɔfrɛ no ndɛ kɛpem dɛ Nyimpa Ba no bɛba, na nokwar, ɔyɛ afɔrbɔ da, nye da a mo nkorɔfo dze tua hɔn ebupɛn du; na nyia otua n’ebupɛn du no wɔnnkɛhyew no wɔ ne mbae ber no mu.

Na nhyewee no bɛba da yi ekyir—dɛm na Ewuradze ne kasa kwan tse—na nokwar Mese, ɔkyena ahantanfo nye emumuyɛfo nyinara bɛyɛ dɛ nwura; na mebɛhyew hɔn, na Emi nye Dɔm Ewuradze; na meremma obiara a ɔda ho tse Babylon no mmfa noho tɔtrɔtɔ.
Dɛm ntsi, sɛ hom gye me dzi a, hom bɛyɛ edwuma wɔ ber a wɔfrɛ no ndɛ da yi.
Na onnye dɛ mo nkowaa Newel K. Whitney nye Sidney Gilbert bɔtɔn hɔn fiadze nye hɔn ahodze wɔ ha; osiandɛ iyi nnyɛ enyansadze kɛpem dɛ asɔrmba nkaa no a wɔaka bea yi do no bɔkɔ Zion asaase do.
Hwɛ, wɔakã wɔ me mbra no mu, anaadɛ wɔabra hom dɛ, mma hom nnkitsa hom atamfo kaw;
Mbom hwɛ, wɔnnkãa no wɔ aber biara mu dɛ mma Ewuradze mmfa wɔ ber a ɔpɛ, na ontua wɔ ber a ɔhwɛ a oye ma no.
Dɛm ntsi, ber a hom yɛ ananmusifo yi, nna hom yɛ Ewuradze n’asomafo; na biribiara a hom bɛyɛ a ɔyɛ Ewuradze n’apɛdze no yɛ Ewuradze n’edwuma.
Na ɔdze hom esi hɔ dɛ hom nhwɛ ma n’ahotseweefo nnya dza wohia wɔ nda a odzi ekyir yi mu, ama woeenya egyapadze wɔ Zion asaase do.
Na hwɛ, emi, Ewuradze, mekã kyerɛ hom dɛ, hɔn nsa bɛkã, na emi me nsɛm si pi na munntwa abrɔdɔ.
Mbom ɔsɛ dɛ ndzɛmba nyinara ba mu wɔ hɔn aber do.
Dɛm ntsi, mma hom mmberɛ wɔ papayɛ ho, osiandɛ hom rotow dwumadzi kɛse bi ne fapem. Na ndzɛmba nkakraba mu na dza ɔyɛ akɛse fi mu ba.
Hwɛ, Ewuradze rohwehwɛ akoma nye adwen pa; na nyia ɔwɔ su pa na ɔyɛ setsie no, obedzi Zion asaase no do ndzepa wɔ nda a odzi ekyir yinom mu.
Na wobotwa etuatsewfo no efi Zion asaase do akyen, na wɔbɛpam hɔn efi hɔ, na worinnya asaase no nndzi.
Na nokwar, mese dɛ etuatsewfo no mmfi Ephraim no bɔgyaa mu, dɛm ntsi wobeyi hɔn efi mu.
Hwɛ, Emi, Ewuradze, maayɛ m’asɔr wɔ nda a odzi ekyir yi mu tse dɛ ɔtsɛmbuafo a ɔtsena koko anaa bea a ɔkrɔn do, dɛ orubobu aman atsɛn.
Na ɔbɛba dɛ hɔn a wɔtse Zion asaase do no bobu ndzɛmba a ɔfa Zion ho nyina atsɛn.
Na wɔbɔsɔ atorfo na enyidosomkyerɛfo ahwɛ, na hɔn a wɔnnyɛ asomafo na nkɔnhyɛfo no, wobohu hɔn.
Na bishop mpo a ɔyɛ ɔtsɛmbuafo no, nye n’apamfo no, sɛ woenndzi nokwar wɔ hɔn dwumadzi ho a, wobobu hɔn fɔ; na wɔdze binom esi hɔn ananmu.
Na hwɛ, mese hom dɛ Zion bɛyɛ prɔmprɔm, na Ewuradze n’enyimnyam bɛba no do;
Na ɔbɛyɛ frankaa dze ama nkorɔfo, na ɔman biara a ɔwɔ asaase yi do no bɛba no hɔ.
Na da bi bɛba a osian ɔno ntsi, aman a ɔwɔ asaase do no ho bɔpopo, na osian ne mba hɔn ho hu ntsi, wobosuro. Ewuradze na ɔakã iyi. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/65.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 65
chapter_summary: 1–2, Wɔdze Nyankopɔn n’ahenman ne nsaafee no ama nyimpa wɔ asaase do, na asɛmpa no dwumadzi bedzi konyim; 3–6, Ɔsor Mfe Apem ahenman no bɛba abɛkã Nyankopɔn n’ahenman no a ɔwɔ asaase do no ho.
