verses.text: Tsie, na hwɛ, ndze bi a ɔsõ na tum wɔ mu fi sor retsẽa mu wɔ ase ha dze rokɔ asaase n’ano nyina, nyew, na ndze no ɔwɔ hɔ ma adasa, na ɔse—Hom nsiesie Ewuradze no kwan, hom mma n’atsempɔn ntsentsen.

Wɔdze Nyankopɔn n’ahenman ne nsaafee no ama nyimpa wɔ asaase do, na asɛmpa no bepirepirew efi hɔ akɔ asaase ano nyina, tse dɛ ɔbo bi a wɔnndze nsa twae fii bepɔw mu no bepirepirew ekesi dɛ ɔbɛtahye asaase nyina do.
Nyew, ndze bi retsea mu dɛ—Hom nsiesie Ewuradze no kwan, hom nsiesie Eguambaa no n’edzidzi, na hom nyɛ krado ntweɔn Ayeforkun no.
Hom mbɔ mpaa mma Ewuradze, hom mbɔ ne dzin krɔnkrɔn no, hom nda ndwuma nwanwa no edzi wɔ nyimpa mu.

Hom mfrɛ Ewuradze, ama n’ahendzi atserɛw wɔ asaase do, ama hɔn a wɔtse do no aagye, na hom nsiesie homho mfa mma nda a ɔreba no, no mu na Nyimpa Ba no besian dze sor aba asaase do efura n’enyimnyam a ɔhyerɛn no, ebehyia Nyankopɔn n’ahenman a ɔakyekyer no asaase do no.

Dɛm ntsi, hom mma Nyankopɔn n’ahenman no nnyin, ama ɔsor ahenman no aaba, ama ɔwo, O Nyankopɔn, aama wɔaahyɛ wo enyimnyam wɔ sor nye asaase, aama wɔaakã w’atamfo ahyɛ, na ɔwo na enyidzi, tum nye enyimnyam yɛ wodze afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/66.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 66
chapter_summary: 1–4, Ahyɛmu a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no nye asɛmpa ne mãhyɛ; 5–8, Elderfo no wɔdɛ wɔkã nyamesɛm, gye dase, na wɔnye nkorɔfo yi atsɛn; 9–13, Sɛ wɔyɛ ɔsomdwuma nokwar mu a osi egyapadze a ɔyɛ nkwa a onnyiewiei no pi.

verses.text: Hwɛ, dɛm na Ewuradze mekã kyerɛ m’akowaa William E. McLellin—Nhyira nkã wo, susuampaara dɛ adan efi wo bɔn ho, na agye mo nokwar no, dɛm na Ewuradze wo Pomfo no a ɔyɛ wiadze Agyenkwa no kã kyerɛ wo nye dɔm dodow biara mpo a wɔbɛgye me dzin edzi no.

Nokwar, mese wo dɛ, nhyira akã wo, osiandɛ agye me ahyɛmudzi a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no, m’asɛmpa ne mãhyɛ no a wɔasoma ma wɔdze abrɛ adasamba no, ama woeenya nkwa na wɔaayhɛ hɔn enyimnyam a wɔrebɛda no edzi wɔ nda a odzi ekyir no mu no fafafo, dɛ mbrɛ nkɔnhyɛfo na asomafo no kyerɛwee wɔ tsetseberdo no.
Nokwar, mese ɔwo m’akowaa William dɛ wo ho atsew, na mbom inndzii mu; dɛm ntsi, nu woho fi ndzɛmba a ɔnnsɔ m’enyi ho, Ewuradze na ɔse, na Ewuradze beyi akyerɛ wo.
Na hwɛ, nokwar, Emi, Ewuradze, mibeyi dza mepɛ a ɔfa wo ho akyerɛ wo, anaadɛ dza ɔyɛ me pɛ a ɔfa wo ho edzi akyerɛ wo.
Hwɛ, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, ɔyɛ me pɛ dɛ ebɔbɔ m’asɛmpa no dawur fi asaase kɔ asaase, fi kurow kɔ kurow, nyew, wɔ dɛm mantɔw no a etwa ehyia a wɔmmbɔɔ no dawur wɔ hɔ no.
Mma nntweɔn mber pii wɔ bea yi do; mma nnkɔ Zion asaase no do seseiara; mbom susuampaara dɛ ibotum asoma no, soma; na mbom, mma nndwen w’egyapadze ho.
Kɔ boka afamu nsaase do, kɛgye dase wɔ bea biara do, gye kyerɛ nyimpa nyinara, wɔ hɔn nhyiamudan mu, na enye dɔm no nyi atsɛn.
Ma m’akowaa Samuel H. Smith nye wo nkɔ, na mma mmpow no, na ma no nkyerɛkyerɛ; na nyia obedzi nokwar no, wɔbɛhyɛ no dzen wɔ beebiara, na Emi, Ewuradze, menye wo bɔkɔ.
Fa wo nsa gu ayarfo do, na wobenya ayarsa. Mma nnsan w’ekyir kesi dɛ Emi, Ewuradze, mobɔsoma wo. Nya abotar wɔ amandzehu mu. Bisa na wo nsa bɛkã; bɔ mu, na wobobue ama wo.
Mma nnhaw wo ho. Twẽ woho fi dza ɔnntsen nyina ho. Mma nntõ awar—iyi yɛ nsɔhwɛ a ɔhaw wo.
Dzi nsɛm yinom do, osiandɛ ɔyɛ ampa nye nokwar; krɔn wo dzibew, na twẽ dɔm pii ma wɔntow daapem enyigye ndwom mfa nkɔ Zion.
Kɔ do dzi dɛm ndzɛmba yinom do kɔ ewiei, na ibenya onnyiewiei nkwa ahenkyɛw no wɔ m’Egya n’abanyimfa hɔ, nyia adom na nokwar ahyɛ no mã no.
Nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze wo Nyankopɔn se, wo Pomfo, Jesus Christ mpo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/67.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 67
chapter_summary: 1–3, Ewuradze tsie elderfo hɔn mpaabɔ na Ɔhwɛ hɔn do; 4–9, Ɔnye onyansafo mapã no gye taferbanyinmbɔmu dɛ ɔno so ɔmma Ne nyikyerɛ no mu kakraabi mpo; 10–14, Sunsum no dze nkenyan bɛma elderfo nokwafo no na wobohu Nyankopɔn N’enyim.

verses.text: Hwɛ na tsie, O hom a hom yɛ m’asɔr mu elderfo a hom ehyia mu wɔ ha, hom a maatse hom mpaabɔ, na minyim hom akoma mu, na hom ahwehwɛdze edu m’enyim.
Hwɛ na tsie, m’enyi wɔ hom do, na sor nye asaase wɔ me nsamu, na mbersantsen ahonyadze yɛ medze dɛ medze ma.
Hom bɔɔ mbɔdzen dɛ hom bɛgye edzi dɛ hom nsa bɛkã nhyira a wɔdze ama hom no; mbom hwɛ, nokwar, mese hom dɛ nna suro wɔ hom akoma mu, na nokwar, iyi ho ntsi na hom nsa annkã no.
Na afei, Emi, Ewuradze, megye dase wɔ nokwar a ɔwɔ mbrasɛm yinom a ɔda hom enyim yi ho kyerɛ hom.

Hom enyi tsim m’akowaa Joseph Smith Kakraba do; ne kasaa hom nyim na n’esintɔ so hom nyim; na hom adwen ho wɔ hom akoma mu dɛ hom wɔ nyimdzee a hom botum dze akyerɛkyerɛ biribiara mu yie akyɛn nedze koraa; na iyi so hom nyim.
Afei, hom nhwehwɛ Mbrasɛm Nwoma no mu, nyia ɔyɛ kuma wɔ hom mu no so mpo, na hom nyi nyia ɔyɛ nyansafo kɛse wɔ hom mu;
Anaadɛ, sɛ obi wɔ hom mu a obotum ayɛ no ne nsaso a, na sɛ hom kã dɛ hom nngye nntõ mu dɛ ɔyɛ nokwar a, nna hom dzi bem.
Mbom sɛ hom enntum annyɛ kor a ɔtse dɛ iyi ne nsaso na sɛ hom anngye dase wɔ ho dɛ ɔyɛ nokwar a, nna hom wɔ afɔbu mu.
Osiandɛ hom nyim dɛ dza ɔnnyɛ tseneneeyɛ biara nnyi mu, na dɛ dza ɔtsen biara fi sor ba, fi kan Egya no hɔ ba.

Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, ɔyɛ hom ndzinoa na anohoba a medze robɔ hom a wɔahyɛ hom asɔfo wɔ dɛm ɔsomdwumadzi yi mu, na susuampaara dɛ sɛ hom yi nyinkuntwe nye suro fi hom mu, na hom brɛ homho adze wɔ m’enyim a, osiandɛ hom nnyɛ ahobrɛadze dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɛ ntsi, wobeyi nkataenyim no efi hɔ na hom bohu me na hom ehu dɛ ɔyɛ Emi mara ankasa—nnyɛ honam dze anaa nyimpa adwen bi na mbom sunsum mu dze.
Na nyimpa biara nnhun Nyankopɔn pɛn wɔ honam mu, gyedɛ Nyankopɔn no Sunsum ekenyan no.
Eso honammunyi nnkotum egyina Nyankopɔn enyim, anaa ɔanam honam su adwen do.
Hom nnkotum egyina Nyankopɔn n’enyim seseiara, anaadɛ abɔfo hɔn som enyim; dɛm ntsi, hom nkɔ do nnya abotar kesi dɛ hom bedzi mu.
Mma hom adwen nnsesã, na ber a hom bedzi mu, wɔ mankasa me ber a ɔsɛ mu no, hom bohu na hom atse dza m’akowaa Joseph Smith Kakraba dze maa hom ber a ɔdze ne nsa guu hom do no ase. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/68.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 68
chapter_summary: 1–5, Sɛ Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no kenyan elderfo no a, hɔn anomusɛm yɛ kyerɛwsɛm; 6–12, Elderfo no wɔdɛ wɔkã asɛmpa na wonuma, na nsɛnkyerɛdze bedzi agyedzifo nokwafo no hɔn ekyir; 13–24, Aaron ne mbabanyin hɔn abakamba botum asom dɛ Bishop Banodzifo (ɔkyerɛ dɛ, hɔn na wobokura president na n’apamfo no ne nsaafee dɛ ɔyɛ bishop) dɛ mbrɛ President a Odzi Kan na n’Apamfo no bɛkyerɛ; 25–28, Wɔhyɛ awofo dɛ wɔnkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn mba asɛmpa no; 29–35, Ɔwɔ dɛ Ahotseweefo no sie Ahomgyeda no Krɔnkrɔn, wɔyɛ edwuma enyiberdo na wɔbɔ mpaa.

verses.text: M’akowaa Orson Hyde no, wɔfrɛɛ no Nyame tseasefo no Sunsum do hyɛɛ no sɔfo dɛ ɔmbɔ asɛmpa a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no ho dawur mfi nyimpa kor do nkɔ nyimpa kor do, mfi asaase kor do nkɔ asaase kor do, wɔ mboanofo emumuyɛfo mu, wɔ hɔn asɔrfi mu; nye hɔn nyi atsɛn na onsiansian kyerɛwsɛm nyinara mu nkyerɛ hɔn.
Na, hwɛ, na hu dɛ iyi yɛ mfatoho dze ma hɔn a wɔama hɔn asɔfodzi no, hɔn a wɔasoma hɔn dɛ wɔnkɔ kan no.
Na iyi yɛ mfatoho dze ma hɔn dɛ wɔbɛkã dza Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no kenyan hɔn dɛ wɔnkã no.

Na biribiara a Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no bekenyan hɔn dɛ wɔnkã no bɛyɛ kyerɛwsɛm, ɔbɛyɛ Ewuradze ne pɛ, ɔbɛyɛ Ewuradze n’adwen, ɔbɛyɛ Ewuradze n’asɛm, ɔbɛyɛ Ewuradze ne ndze, nye Nyame no tum a ɔdze kɔ nkwagye mu.
Hwɛ, iyi nye Nyame n’anohoba a ɔdze bɔ hom, O hom a hom yɛ mo nkowaa.

Dɛm ntsi, hom enyi ngye, na mma hom nnsuro, na emi, Ewuradze, menye hom wɔ hɔ, na mibegyina hom afã; na hom bɛgye mo ho dase mpo dɛ, Jesus Christ meyɛ Nyame tseasefo ne Ba, na dɛ, nna mowɔ hɔ, na mowɔ hɔ na mebɛba.

Iyi nye Ewuradze m’asɛm a medze ma ɔwo, m’akowaa Orson Hyde nye ɔwo so m’akowaa Luke Johnson, nye ɔwo m’akowaa Lyman Johnson, nye ɔwo m’akowaa William E. McLellin, nye m’asɔr mu elderfo anokwafo nyinara—
Hom nkɔ wiadze nyina mu, nkɛkã asɛmpa no nkyerɛ abɔdze nyinara, hom ndzi dwuma wɔ tumdzi a medze ama hom no mu, hom nnuma wɔ Egya no, nye Ɔba no, nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no ne dzin mu.
Na nyia ɔbɛgye edzi na woenuma no no, wɔbɛgye no nkwa, na nyia ɔnnkɛgye edzi no, wobobu no fɔ.
Na nyia ɔbɛgye edzi no, wɔdze nsɛnkyerɛdze a odzi do yi behyira no, dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no.
Na hom na wɔama hom ho kwan dɛ wonhu mber mu nsɛnkyerɛdze; nye Nyimpa Ba ne mbae no ho nsɛnkyerɛdze;
Na dodowara a Egya no bɛgye hɔn ho dase no, ɔbɛma hom tum ma wɔasɔw hɔn ano dze ama onnyiewiei nkwa. Amen.
Na afei, ɔfa ndzɛmba no a ɔkã ahyɛmudzi nye mbrasɛm no ho nye iyinom—
Dza ɔaka ekyir nye dɛ, wɔ Ewuradze ne mber pa mu no, hom nyi bishopfo binom nsi hɔ mma asɔr no, ma wɔnyɛ ɔsomdwuma no dɛ mbrɛ hom yɛɛ no ahyɛse no mpo;
Dɛm ntsi, wɔbɛyɛ asɔfompanyimfo a wodzi mu, na Melchizedek Asɔfodzi President a Odzi Kan no na n’Apamfo na wobeyi hɔn, gyedɛ wɔyɛ Aaron n’asefo ankasa.
Na sɛ wɔyɛ Aaron n’asefo ankasa a, nna mbrasɛm no ma hɔn ho kwan dɛ wɔkɛhɛn bishop na n’apamfo fɛkuw no mu, sɛ wɔyɛ Aaron ne mbabanyin hɔn abakamba a;
Osiandɛ abakamba no na ɔwɔ president na n’apamfo hɔ kwan wɔ asɔfodzi yi ho na okitsa ho nsaafee anaa no tumdzi no.
Obiara nnyi mbrasɛm ho kwan wɔ dzibew yi ho, dɛ obekitsa asɔfodzi yi ho nsaafee, gyedɛ ɔyɛ Aaron n’asenyi abakamba ankasa.

Mbom ɔnam dɛ Melchizedek sɔfopanyin no wɔ tumdzi dɛ odzi dwuma wɔ dzibew nkakraba nyina mu ntsi obotum edzi dwuma wɔ bishop dzibew mu, sɛ woennya Aaron n’asenyi ankasa a, Melchizedek President a Odzi Kan na n’Apamfo no botum ato nsa afrɛ no na wɔdze nsa egu no do dze dɛm tum yi dwumadzi no ama no.

Aaron n’asenyi ankasa no mpo, ɔwɔ dɛ President na n’Apamfo yi hwehwɛ no mu hu dɛ odzi mu, na wɔsera no ngo na President na n’Apamfo yi dze nsa gu no do dze dɛm asɔfodzi no ahyɛ no, ɔnntse dɛm a, wonnyi mbrasɛm ho kwan dɛ wɔdze hɔn asɔfodzi no mu no dzi dwuma.

Mbom, ɔnam ɔmom a wɔahyehyɛ ato hɔ a ɔyɛ hɔn kyɛfa a wɔwɔ no wɔ asɔfodzi ho dɛ ofi egya do sian ba babanyin do no ntsi, sɛ wotum kyerɛ ma wohu dɛ wofi dɛm ebusua no mu a, wotum kã ma wɔfɔw hɔn ngo, anaadɛ sɛ Ewuradze da no edzi kyerɛ hɔn wɔ nyikyerɛ mu a, President na n’Apamfo a wɔabɔ hɔn edzin yi tum dze hɔn nsa gu hɔn do.
Na, bio, sɛ bishop anaa sɔfopanyin a wobeyi no esi hɔ dɛ ɔnyɛ ɔsomdwuma yi fom a, onnyi dɛ obiara dze no kɔ asɛndzii anaadɛ obu no fɔ, gyedɛ asɔr no ne President a Odzi Kan na n’Apamfo no nko enyim;
Na susuampaara dɛ odzi fɔ wɔ President yi na n’Apamfo no enyim no, ɔnam dasegye a ekyingye biara nnyi ho no, wobobu no fɔ;
Na sɛ onu noho a, wɔdze bɛkyɛ no, dɛ mbrɛ asɔr n’ahyɛmudzi na mbrasɛm no se.

Na, bio, susuampaara dɛ awofo wɔ mba wɔ Zion, anaa ne stake a wɔakyekyer no mu bi no, na wɔannkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn ma wɔanntse nkyerɛkyerɛ a ɔfa nnuho ho, nye gyedzi wɔ Jesus Christ, Nyame tseasefo ne Ba no mu, nye enuma, nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn n’akyɛdze no a wɔdze nsa gu do ma wonya no, sɛ wodzi mfe awɔtwe a, bɔn no bogu awofo no hɔn etsifi.
Na iyi bɛyɛ mbra ama nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Zion anaa wɔ ne stake a wɔakyekyer no nyina mu.
Na sɛ hɔn mba dzi mfe awɔtwe a, wobonuma hɔn ama woeenya bɔnfakyɛ na wɔdze nsa egu hɔn do.
Na wɔbɛkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn mba so mbrɛ wonsi mbɔ mpaa, na wɔnantsew nokwar mu wɔ Ewuradze enyim.
Na hɔn a wɔwɔ Zion no so bɛkaa Ahomgyeda no na woesie no krɔnkrɔn.
Na hɔn a wɔwɔ Zion so bɛkaa hɔn ndwuma, mber dodowara a wɔahyɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnyɛ edwuma wɔ nokwardzi mu no; na wɔbɛkaa onyihafo no wɔ Ewuradze enyim.

Afei, Emi, Ewuradze, m’enyi nngye hɔn a wɔwɔ Zion no ho, osiandɛ enyihafo wɔ hɔn mu; na hɔn mba so rinyin wɔ emumuyɛdze mu; na hɔn so wɔmmper nnhwehwɛ mbersantsen ahonyadze, mbom enyiber ahyɛ hɔn enyiwa mu mã.
Ndzɛmba yinom nnyi dɛ ɔba no dɛm, na ɔwɔ dɛ woyi fi hɔn mu; dɛm ntsi wɔmma m’akowaa Oliver Cowdery mfa nsɛm yinom nkɛma hɔn a wɔwɔ Zion asaase no.
Na mbrasɛm a medze ma hɔn nye yi—dɛ nyia onndzi ne mpaabɔ do wɔ Ewuradze enyim wɔ ne mber mu no, wɔnkaa no wɔ mo nkorɔfo no hɔn ɔtsɛmbuafo no enyim.
Nsɛm yinom yɛ ampa nye nokwar; dɛm ntsi, mma hom nntõ, nna mma hom nnyi bi mmfi mu so.
Hwɛ, Emi nye Alpha na Omega, na mereba ntsɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/69.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 69
chapter_summary: 1–2, Woyi John Whitmer dɛ ɔnkã Oliver Cowdery ho nkɔ Missouri; 3–8, Ɔwɔ dɛ ɔkã nyamesɛm so na ɔboaboa kyerɛwsɛm ano, na ɔkyerɛw abakɔsɛm.

verses.text: Hom ntsie me, Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn no na ɔse, osian m’akowaa Oliver Cowdery ntsi. Ɔnnyɛ nyansadze mma me dɛ wɔdze mbrasɛm no nye sika no bɛma no dɛ ɔmfa nkɔ Zion asaase do, gyedɛ obi a obedzi nokwar na ɔayɛ nokwafo kã no ho nye no kɔ.
Dɛm ntsi, Emi, Ewuradze mepɛ dɛ m’akowaa, John Whitmer, ɔkã m’akowaa Oliver Cowdery ho ma wɔkɔ;
Na ɔnoara so nkɔ do nkyerɛw ndzɛmba nyina a obesisi a ho hia nye dza obohu na onyim a ɔfa m’asɔr ho no ma ɔayɛ abakɔsɛm.
Na no so ngye afotu nye mboa mfi m’akowaa Oliver Cowdery na binom so hɔ.
Na mo nkowaa so a wɔapetsẽ wɔ asaase yi do no mubobu hɔn dwumadzi ho nkontaa wɔ Zion asaase do;
Na Zion asaase do hɔ bɛyɛ atsenae nye bea a wɔbɛgye na wɔayɛ ndzɛmba yinom nyina.
Naaso, wɔmma m’akowaa John Whitmer ntu kwan nkɔ mbeambea pii do, na ɔnkɛsera nsɔr horow no, ama oeetum enya nyimdzee yie a ɔbɔboa no—

Ɔnkã nyamesɛm na onsiansian mu nkyerɛ, ɔnkyerɛw, ɔnhwɛ dza wɔakyerɛw ho nkyerɛw, ɔnyɛ nyiyimu na ɔnhwehwɛ ndzɛmba nyina a obeye ama asɔr no, nye ebusuasantsen a wobenyin wɔ Zion asaase do, ama ɔaayɛ hɔndze fi ebusuasantsen kesi ebusuasantsen, afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/70.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 70
chapter_summary: 1–5, Woyi ahwɛfo dɛ wɔmfa nyikyerɛ no mpue guado; 6–13, Hɔn a wodzi dwuma wɔ sunsum mu ndzɛmba ho no fata dɛ wonya hɔn akatua; 14–18, Ɔwɔ dɛ ahotseweefo no yɛ pɛr wɔ honam mu ndzɛmba mu.

verses.text: Hom nhwɛ, na hom ntsie, O hom a hom wɔ Zion, nye hom nyina a hom wɔ m’asɔr mu wɔ ekyirekyir, na wɔntsie Ewuradze n’asɛm a medze ma m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, nye m’akowaa Martin Harris so, nye m’akowaa Oliver Cowdery so, nye m’akowaa John Whitmer so, nye m’akowaa Sidney Rigdon so, nye m’akowaa William W. Phelps so, dza menam mbrasɛm kwan do dze ma hɔn no.
Na mbrasɛm yi na medze ma hɔn; dɛm ntsi, hom nyɛ aso na hom ntsie, na dɛm na Ewuradze se hɔn—
Emi Ewuradze na meyi hɔn, na mahyɛ hɔn dɛ ahwɛfo wɔ nyikyerɛ na mbrasɛm a medze ama hɔn no do, nye dza medze bɛma hɔn ekyir yi so do;
Na mebɛma woebu dɛm dwuma a medze ahyɛ hɔn nsa yi ho akontaa wɔ atsɛmbu da no mu.
Dɛm ntsi, meyi hɔn esi hɔ, na iyi nye hɔn edwuma wɔ Nyankopɔn n’asɔr mu, dɛ wɔnhwɛ do na wɔntoto no mu ndzɛmba yie, nyew, ama no ho aaba mfaso.
Dɛm ntsi mbrasɛm a medze ma hɔn nye dɛ, mma wɔmmfa ndzɛmba yinom mma asɔr no, nna mma wɔmmfa mma wiadze so;
Naaso, susuampaara dɛ wobenya ma abor dza wɔrohwehwɛ nye hɔn ehiadze do no, wɔmfa nkɔ m’adzekorabea;
Na, susuampaara dɛ wɔbɛyɛ adzedzifo dɛ mbrɛ ahenman no ne mbra se no, wobotu mfaso no esi hɔ ama nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Zion nye hɔn ebusuasantsen.
Hwɛ, iyi nye dza Ewuradze rohwehwɛ efi obiara a wɔdze nkontaabudze bi ahyɛ ne nsa no hɔ, dɛ mbrɛ Emi, Ewuradze mahyehyɛ anaadɛ merebɛhyehyɛ dze ama nyimpa biara.
Na hwɛ, wonnyi obiara a ɔdɔm tseasefo Nyankopɔn n’asɔr no mmfi dɛm mbra yi ho.
Nyew, wonnyi bishop, nna wonnyi ananmusinyi a ɔhwɛ Ewuradze n’adzekorabea do, nna wonnyi nyia woeyi no dɛ ɔnhwɛ dza ɔwɔ ho nkontaa bu wɔ honam afamu ndzɛmba do mmfi ho.
Nyia woeyi no dɛ ɔnhwɛ sunsum afamu ndzɛmba do no, ɔsɛ dɛ ne nsa kã n’akatua, tse dɛ hɔn a woeyi hɔn dɛ wɔnhwɛ honam afamu dwumadzi do no so.
Nyew, wɔmma hɔn mbordo mpo, mbordo a wɔnam Sunsum no dwumadzi do bɔbɔ ho no.
Naaso, ɔfa honam afamu ndzɛmba no, ɔsɛ dɛ hom nyina yɛ pɛr, na mma hom nnhwinhwin wɔ iyi ho, annyɛ dɛm a, Sunsum n’edziyi mbordo a ɔba no wɔbɔtwe asan.
Afei, medze mbrasɛm yi ma mo nkowaa wɔ ber a wɔrotweɔn yi ama ɔaayɛ mfaso ama hɔn, ma me nhyira n’edziyi egu hɔn tsir do, na osian hɔn mbɔdzembɔ ntsi, ɔaayɛ akatua nye bambɔ so dze ama hɔn;
Na ɔbɛma hɔn edziban na efuradze, na ɔbɛma hɔn egyapadze; ɔbɛma hɔn adan na nsaase wɔ gyinabew biara a Emi, Ewuradze menye hɔn begyina, na beebiara a Emi, Ewuradze mobɔsoma hɔn.
Osiandɛ woedzi nokwar wɔ ndzɛmba pii mu, na wɔayɛ dza oye na susuampaara dɛ wɔannyɛ bɔn no.
Hwɛ, Emi, Ewuradze, mowɔ ehumbɔbɔr na mibehyira hɔn, na wɔbɔkɔ ndzɛmba yinom ne dɛw mu. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/71.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 71
chapter_summary: 1–4, Wɔsoma Joseph Smith na Sidney Rigdon dɛ wɔnkɔbɔ asɛmpa no dawur; 5–11, Wɔbɛhyɛ Ahotseweefo no hɔn atamfo fɛr.

verses.text: Hwɛ, dɛm na Ewuradze se, hom mo nkowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, nye Sidney Rigdon, dɛ nokwar, mber no aba a ekehia na ɔfata ma me dɛ hom bue hom ano bɔ m’asɛmpa no dawur na hom kã ahenman no no mu ndzɛmba nye esumasɛm a ɔwɔ kyerɛwsɛm no mu no kyerɛ, na hom kyerɛkyerɛ dɛ mbrɛ Sunsum nye tum no bi a medze bɛma hom no bɛkyerɛ, dɛ mbrɛ me pɛ tse.
Nokwar, mese hom dɛ, hom mbɔ no dawur nkyerɛ wiadze nye mantɔw a etwa hom ho ehyia nyina, nye asɔr no mu so, bɛyɛ mber kakra, kɛpem dɛ wɔbɛda no edzi akyerɛ hom.
Nokwar, iyi yɛ dwuma bi a medze ama hom dɛ hom ndzi no mber kakra no mu.
Dɛm ntsi, hom nyɛ edwuma wɔ mo wenyin ture mu. Hom mfrɛ hɔn a wɔwɔ asaase yi do, na hom ngye dase, na hom nsiesie kwan mma mbrasɛm nye nyikyerɛ a ɔbɛba no.
Na hwɛ, iyi yɛ nyansa; obiara a ɔbɛkenkan no, hom mma ɔntse ase na ɔngye so;
Na nyia ɔgye no, wɔdze mbordo bɛma no, obenya tum mpo.
Dɛm ntsi, hom nhyɛ hom atamfo fɛr; hom mfrɛ hɔn ma wonhyia hom wɔ bagua mu nye nsumaamu nyina; na susuampaara dɛ hom dzi nokwar ntsi, hɔn enyimguase bɛda edzi.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mma wɔnda hɔn siantsir tsitsir a ɔnam do a wotsia Ewuradze no edzi.
Nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se hom—akõdze biara a wɔbɔ tsia hom no rennsaa;
Na sɛ nyimpa biara ma ne ndze do dze tsia hom a, n’enyim bogu ase wɔ mankasa me mber pa mu.
Dɛm ntsi, hom ndzi me mbrasɛm do; na ne nyina yɛ ampa nye nokwar. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/72.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 72
chapter_summary: 1–8, Elderfo wɔ dɛ wobu hɔn dwumadzi ho nkontaa kyerɛ bishop no; 9–15, Bishop no na ɔhwɛ adzekorabea no do na ɔhwɛ ehiafo na abɔbɔfo no; 16–26, Bishop na ɔwɔ dɛ wodzi elderfo no hɔn mudzi ho dase.

verses.text: Hom nyɛ aso, na hom ntsie Ewuradze ne ndze, O hom a hom ehyia mu, hom a hom yɛ asɔfompanyin wɔ m’asɔr mu, hom a wɔdze ahenman no nye tum ama.
Na nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se, ohia ma me dɛ woyi bishop ma hom, anaadɛ woyi hom mu obi dze ma asɔr no wɔ Ewuradze no wenyin ture a ɔwɔ apaamu ha yi.
Na nokwar, dɛm adze yi dze hom ayɛ no nyansa mu, osiandɛ iyi na Ewuradze rohwehwɛ fi ɔhwɛfo biara nsa mu ma woebu nankasa no dwumadzi ho nkontaa wɔ aber yi mu nye mbersantsen mu.
Na nyia ɔyɛ nokwafo na nyansafo wɔ aber yi mu no, wobobu no bem dɛ ɔfata dɛ onya tsenabew no a m’Egya esiesie ama no no akɛtsena mu.
Nokwar, mese hom dɛ, asɔr yi mu elderfo a wɔwɔ mo wenyin ture a ɔwɔ apaamu ha yi bobu hɔn dwumadzi ho nkontaa akyerɛ bishop a mibeyi no wɔ mo wenyin ture a ɔwɔ apaamu ha no.
Wɔbɛkyerɛw dɛm ndzɛmba yinom nyina wɔ nkrataa do dze akɛma bishop a ɔwɔ Zion no.
Na wɔnam mbrasɛm a wɔdze ama yi, nye dza wɔbɛkã wɔ ehyiadzi yi ase no do dze bohu bishop no ndwuma.
Na afei, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, m’akowaa Newel K. Whitney nye nyimpa a wonyi no nhyɛ no sɔfo na wɔmfa dɛm tum yi mma no. Iyi nye Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn, hom Pomfo no ne pɛ. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.
Ewuradze n’asɛm a ɔkã mbra a wɔdze ama no ho a ɔkyerɛ bishop a woeyi no ama asɔr no wɔ wenyin ture a ɔwɔ apaamu ha yi no ndwuma ho nye—
Dɛ ɔnhwɛ Ewuradze n’adzekorabea do; ɔngyegye asɔr a ɔwɔ wenyin ture a ɔwɔ apaamu ha yi no mu no foto;
Dɛ elderfo no bobu hɔn nkontaa ama no dɛ mbrɛ wɔahyɛ dada dɛ wɔnyɛ no; ɔnhwɛ hɔn ehiadze do, na ɔnhwɛ ma, susuampaara dɛ wɔwɔ bi a wobotum dze etua no, wontua dza wɔbɛgye no kaw;
Ama wɔdze iyi so abɔ afɔr dze ama asɔr ne yieyɛ, dɛ wɔdze bɔboa ehiafo na abɔbɔfo.
Na nyia onnyi bi a ɔdze botua no, wɔmfa no ho nkontaa nkɛma Zion bishop ma ɔmfa sika a Ewuradze dze bɛhyɛ ne nsa no bi ntua kaw.
Na nokwafo ndwumayɛfo a ɔyɛ no wɔ sunsum ndzɛmba ho no, na wɔkã asɛmpa no, na odzi ahenman no mu ndzɛmba ho dwuma dze ma asɔr nye wiadze no, beyi dɛm kaw no ano dze ama bishop a ɔwɔ Zion no;
Dɛm na ofi asɔr no mu ba; osiandɛ mbra no se obiara a ɔba Zion no wɔ dɛ ɔdze ne ndzɛmba nyina bogu bishop a ɔwɔ Zion no enyim.
Na afei, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, elder biara a ɔwɔ wenyin ture a ɔwɔ apaamu ha yi wɔ dɛ obu no dwumadzi ho nkontaa kyerɛ bishop no a ɔwɔ wenyin ture a ɔwɔ apaamu ha yi—

Ɔtsɛmbuafo anaadɛ bishop no a ɔwɔ wenyin ture a ɔwɔ apaamu ha yi dze abɔdzin krataa a ɔkyerɛ dɛ wɔagye obiara ato mu no bɔkɔ akɛma bishop a ɔwɔ Zion, na obeyi ndzɛmba nyina ano ma oenya n’egyapadze, na wɔnam do aagye no ato mu dɛ ɔyɛ nyansafo nye ɔhwɛfo nokwafo.
Sɛ annyɛ dɛm a, bishop a ɔwɔ Zion no renngye no nntomu.

Na afei, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, wɔmma elder biara a obobu nkontaa dze ama bishop no a ɔwɔ asɔr no mu wɔ wenyin ture a ɔwɔ apaamu ha yi nya nkamfo pa mfi asɔr anaa nsɔr a oedzi dwuma wɔ mu pɛn no hɔ ama nankasa no nkontaabu aayɛ dza ɔsɔ enyi wɔ ndzɛmba nyinara ho.
Na bio, wɔmma mo nkowaa a woeyi hɔn dɛ ahwɛfo wɔ m’asɔr no mu akyerɛw dwumadzi do no ngye mboa mfi bishop anaa bishop no hɔ wɔ ndzɛmba nyinara mu—
Ama woeetum dze nyikyerɛ yi epuee guado wɔ asaase n’ano n’ano nyinara; ama hɔn so woeetum enya foto a ɔbɛyɛ mfaso ama asɔr no wɔ ndzɛmba nyinara mu;
Ama hɔn so woeetum asɔ enyi wɔ ndzɛmba nyinara mu, na woeehu dɛ wɔyɛ ahwɛfo enyansafo.
Na afei, hwɛ, iyi bɛyɛ mfatoho dze ama m’asɔr no nkorbata horow nyina, wɔ asaase biara a wɔbɛkyekyer wɔ do no. Na afei medze me nsɛm aba ewiei. Amen.
Nsɛm kakra a ɔfa asɔr no mu mba ho a ɔkã ahenman no ne mbra ho—hɔn a Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn eyi hɔn dɛ wɔnkɔ Zion, nye hɔn a wɔama hɔn kwan dɛ wɔnkɔ Zion—
Wɔmma wɔngye abɔdzin krataa mfi elderfo baasa a wɔwɔ asɔr no mu, anaadɛ mfi bishop no hɔ, mfa nkã hɔnho nkɔ bishop no hɔ;
Sɛ annyɛ dɛm a, onyia no kɔ Zion asaase do a wɔrennkan no mmfora ahwɛfo enyansafo no. Iyi so yɛ mfatoho. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/73.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 73
chapter_summary: 1–2, Elderfo wɔdɛ wɔkɔ do kã nyamesɛm no; 3–6, Joseph Smith na Sidney Rigdon wɔdɛ wɔkɔ do kyerɛ Bible no ase kɛpem dɛ wobowie.

verses.text: Na nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se, ohia ma me dɛ wɔbɔkɔ do akã asɛmpa no na wɔakɔdo etu nsɔrmba a wɔwɔ mantɔw a etwa ehyia nyina fo kɛpem ehyiadzi a ɔtoado no;
Na nkyii, hwɛ, wɔbɛma woehu, anam ehyiadze ne ndze do, hɔn asɛmpakã ndwuma ahorow.
Afei, nokwar mese mo nkowaa, Joseph Smith, Kakraba, na Sidney Rigdon, dɛm na Ewuradze se, ohia dɛ hom kyerɛ ase bio;

Na susuampaara dɛ mbrɛ hom botum no, hom nkã asɛmpa no wɔ mantɔw a etwa ehyia nyina mu ansaana ehyiadzi no n’aber asõ; na n’ekyir no so obehia dɛ hom bɔkɔ akɔsɔw ndzɛmba a hom rekyerɛ ase no do akɛpem dɛ hom bowie.
Na hom mma iyi nyɛ nhwɛdo mma elderfo no nkɛpem dɛ wɔbɛma hɔn nyimdzee bi so bio akã ho, dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no mpo no.
Afei meremmfa bi nnkã hom ho seseiara. Hom mbɔ hom asen do na hom nyɛ botoo. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/74.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 74
chapter_summary: 1–5, Paul tu Asɔr a ɔwɔ n’aber do no fo dɛ mma wonndzi Moses mbra no do; 6–7, Mbofra nkakramba yɛ krɔnkrɔn na wɔnam Werdambɔ no do atsew hɔnho.

verses.text: Na kun a ɔnngye nndzi no, no ho tsew ɔyer no mu, na ɔyer a ɔnngye nndzi no no ho tsew wɔ okun no mu; ɔnntse dɛm a, nna hom mba ho wɔ fĩ, na afei wɔyɛ hɔn krɔnkrɔn.
Afei asomafo hɔn aber do no nna Jewfo nyinara a wɔnngye Jesus Christ n’asɛmpa no nndzi no dzi twatsiatwa mbra no do.
Na ɔbaa dɛ wentwiwentwi kɛse bi sii nkorɔfo no mu a ɔfa twatsiatwa mbra no ho, osiandɛ nna kun a ɔnngye nndzi no pɛ dɛ wotwa ne mba twatsia ma wɔbɛhyɛ Moses mbra ase, dɛm mbra a wɔahyɛ no mã no.
Na ɔbaa dɛ mbofra no a wɔatsetse hɔn wɔ Moses mbra ase no, dzii hɔn egyanom amambra do, na wɔanngye Christ n’asɛmpa no enndzi, dɛm ntsi wɔammbɛyɛ krɔnkrɔn.

Dɛm ntsi, na osian siantsir yi ntsi ɔmaa ɔsomafo no kyerɛɛw kɛmaa asɔr no, maa hɔn mbrasɛm, ommfi Ewuradze, mbom ofi nankasa, dɛ mma gyedzinyi nnwar nyia ɔnngye nndzi; gyedɛ woyi Moses mbra no fi hɔn mu.
Ama hɔn mba aatsena dɛ wonntwa twatsia; ama woeeyi dɛm amambra no a ɔkã dɛ, mbofra nkakramba nnyɛ krɔnkrɔn no akwa; osiandɛ dɛm na Jewfo no gyee dzii;
Mbom mbofra nkakramba yɛ krɔnkrɔn, wɔnam Jesus Christ no werdambɔ do atsew hɔnho; na dɛm na kyerɛwsɛm no ase kyerɛ.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/75.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 75
chapter_summary: 1–5, Elderfo nokwafo no a wɔkã asɛmpa no benya nkwa a onnyiewiei; 6–12, Bɔ mpaa fa nya Ɔwerɛkyekyefo no a, ɔno na ɔkyerɛkyerɛ ndzɛmba nyina no; 13–22, Elderfo bɛtsena ase ebu hɔn a wɔpoow hɔn nsɛm no atsɛn; 23–36, Asɛmpasomafo no hɔn ebusua-ebusua no wɔdɛ wɔgye mboa fi Asɔr no hɔ.

verses.text: Nokwar, nokwar, Mese hom dɛ, Emi a medze mo Sunsum ne ndze mpo rekasa yi, Alpha na Omega mpo, hom Ewuradze na hom Nyankopɔn—
Hom ntsie, O hom a hom dze hom edzin ama dɛ hom bɔkɔ akɔbɔ m’asɛmpa no dawur, na hom besiesie mo wenyin ture mu no.
Hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, ɔyɛ me pɛ dɛ hom bɔkɔ ntsi, mma hom nnkyinkyim, na mma hom nnyɛ enyihafo so, mbom hom mfa hom ahoɔdzen nyɛ edwuma—
Hom mma hom ndze do dɛ mbrɛ hom dze totorobɛnto ndze kɛse robɔ nokwar no ho dawur dɛ mbrɛ nyikyerɛ na mbrasɛm a medze ama hom no kyerɛ.
Na sɛ hom dzi nokwar a, wɔbɛkyekyer efi-efi pii asoa hom, na wɔbɛhyɛ hom enyidzi na enyimnyam ahenkyɛw, na hom enya bɛkyebo nye onnyiewiei nkwa.
Dɛm ntsi, nokwar, mese m’akowaa William E. McLellin dɛ, mekantse dwuma a medze hyɛɛ ne nsa dɛ ɔnkɔ boka afamu nkurow do nkɛyɛ no;
Na medze dwumadzi nye mbrasɛm fofor ma no, iyi mu na Emi, Ewuradze, metsẽa no wɔ n’akoma a ohwinhwin ho;
Na ɔyɛɛ bɔn; naaso medze akyɛ no, na mese no bio dɛ, kɔ ɔman a ɔwɔ anaafo afamu no mu.
Na ma m’akowaa Luke Johnson nye no nkɔ, na wɔmbɔ dza medze ahyɛ hɔn no ho dawur—
Wɔmbɔ Ewuradze ne dzin mbisa Ɔwerɛkyekyefo no, a ɔbɛkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn ndzɛmba nyinara a ohia ma hɔn—
Wɔmbɔ mpaa aber nyina amma wɔanntɔ bitsi; na susuampaara dɛ wɔbɛyɛ dɛm no, mebɛkã hɔn ho dze ekesi ewiei mpo.
Hwɛ, iyi nye Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn ne pɛ a ɔwɔ ma hom. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

Na bio, nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se, ma m’akowaa Orson Hyde nye m’akowaa Samuel H. Smith ntu hɔn kwan nkɔ boka afamu aman no mu, na wɔnkɔbɔ dza mahyɛ hɔn no dawur; na mber dodow biara a wobedzi nokwar no, hwɛ, mebɛkã hɔn ho dze ekesi ewiei.
Na bio, nokwar mese m’akowaa Lyman Johnson, nye m’akowaa Orson Pratt dɛ hɔn so wobotu hɔn kwan akɔ boka afamu aman no mu; na hwɛ, menye hɔn so wɔ hɔ kesi ewiei mpo.
Na bio, mese m’akowaa Asa Dodds nye m’akowaa Calves Wilson, dɛ hɔn so wontu hɔn kwan nkɔ anee afamu aman mu, na wɔnkɔbɔ m’asɛmpa no dawur dɛ mbrɛ mahyɛ hɔn no.
Na nyia obedzi nokwar no bedzi ndzɛmba nyinara do konyim, na wɔbɛma no do wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu.
Na bio, mese m’akowaa Major N. Ashley, na m’akowaa Burr Riggs dɛ wontu hɔn kwan nkɔ anaafo afamu aman no mu.
Nyew, ma wontu hɔn kwan no, dɛ mbrɛ mahyɛ hɔn no, womfi fie mu nkɔ fie mu, womfi ekuraase mu nkɔ ekuraase mu, na womfi kurow mu nkɔ kurow mu.
Na fie biara a hom bɛhɛn mu no, sɛ wɔgye hom a, hom ngyaa hom nhyira ngu dɛm fie no do.
Na fie biara a hom bɛhɛn mu no, sɛ wɔanngye hom a, hom mfi dɛm fie no mu ntsɛmara, na hom mporoporow hom ananadze huntuma ngu hɔ mfa ngye dase ntsia hɔn.
Na dɛw na enyigye bɛhyɛ hom mã; na hom nhu iyi, dɛ atsɛmbu da no, hom bɛyɛ atsɛmbuafo ama dɛm fie no, na hom ebu hɔn fɔ;

Na obeye koraa ama abosonsɔrfo wɔ atsɛmbu da no mu akyɛn dɛm fie no; dɛm ntsi, hom mbɔ hom asen do na hom ndzi nokwar, na hom bedzi ndzɛmba nyina do konyim, na wɔbɛma hom do wɔ da a odzi ewiei no mu. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.
Na bio, dɛm na Ewuradze se hom, O hom m’asɔr mu elderfo, a hom dze hom edzin ama, aama hom eetum ehu ne pɛ a ɔwɔ no wɔ hom ho—
Hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, ɔyɛ asɔr no n’edwuma dɛ ɔboa ma wɔhwɛ hɔn ebusa-ebusua, na ɔhwɛ hɔn a wɔafrɛ hɔn na ɔwɔ dɛ wɔsoma hɔn dɛ wɔnkɔbɔ asɛmpa no ho dawur nkyerɛ wiadze no hɔn ebusua-ebusua so.
Dɛm ntsi, emi Ewuradze, medze dɛm mbrasɛm yi ma hom dɛ susuampaara dɛ hom nuanom enya pɛ dɛ wobobue hɔn akoma mu no, hom mpɛ tsenabew mfa mma hom ebusua-ebusua.
Na ma hɔn a wobenya tsenabew ama hɔn ebusua-ebusua nyinara na asɔr no so bɔhwɛ hɔn no, mmpow dɛ wɔbɔkɔ wiadze, sɛ wɔbɔkɔ boka anaa anee, anaa etsifi anaa anaafo afamu a.
Ma wombisa na hɔn nsa bɛkã, wɔmbɔ mu na wobobue ama hɔn, na Ɔwerɛkyekyefo no fi sor bɛma woehu bea a ɔwɔ dɛ wɔkɔ.
Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, obiara a nankasa botum ahwɛ n’ebusua no, wɔmma ɔnhwɛ hɔn, na ɔrennyew n’ahenkyɛw dabiarada; na wɔmma ɔnyɛ edwuma wɔ asɔr no mu.
Wɔmma obiara nsi nketse wɔ ndzɛmba nyinara mu. Na onyihafo rinnya tsenabew wɔ asɔr no mu, gyedɛ onu noho na ɔsesã n’akwan.
Dɛm ntsi, ma m’akowaa Simon Carter na m’akowaa Elmer Harris mbɔ mu kor wɔ ɔsomdwumadzi mu;
Na m’akowaa Ezra Thayre so nye m’akowaa Thomas B. Marsh;
Na m’akowaa Hyrum Smith nye m’akowaa Reynolds Cahoon so;
Na m’akowaa Daniel Stanton nye m’akowaa Seymour Brunson so;
Na m’akowaa Sylvester Smith nye m’akowaa Gideon Carter so;
Na m’akowaa Ruggles Esmes nye m’akowaa Stephen Burnett so;
Na m’akowaa Micah B. Welton nye m’akowaa Eden Smith so. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/76.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 76
chapter_summary: 1–4, Ewuradze nye Nyankopɔn; 5–10, Wɔbɛda ahenman no mu esumadze edzi akyerɛ nokwafo nyinara; 11–17, Nyimpa nyina befir edzi akɔ atseneneefo wusoɛr mu anaa afɔdzi wusoɛr mu; 18–24, Nkorɔfo a wɔtse wiadze horow nyinara mu no nam Jesus Christ No Werdambɔ no do bɛyɛ Nyankopɔn ne mbabanyin na ne mbabaa; 25–29, Nyame no bɔfoe hwee ase na ɔbɛyɛɛ abɔnsam; 30–49, Ɔsɛe mbambanyin no bohu amandze wɔ afɔbu a onnyiewiei no mu; na nkaa no nyinara benya nkwagye ne kyɛfa bi; 50–70, Wɔkyerɛ hɔn a wonya nkwagye ntowdo no hɔn enyimnyam na akatua wɔ celestial ahenman no mu; 71–80, Wɔkyerɛ hɔn a wobenya terrestrial ahenman no mu; 81–113, Wɔkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn a wɔwɔ telestial, terrestrial na celestial enyimnyam no hɔn gyinabew mu; 114–119, Nokwafo no bodua Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no tum mu ehu Nyankopɔn n’aheman mu esumasɛm na wɔatse ase.

verses.text: O Ɔsorsor, hom ntsie, O asaase, hom nyɛ aso, hom nyɛ aso, na hom a hom wɔ do nyina no ndzi dɛw, na Ewuradze nye Nyame, na Agyenkwa biara nnyi hɔ kã no ho.
Ne nyansaa sõ, na n’akwan yɛ ahobow, na obiara runnhu no ndwuma mbrɛ n’ano kɔsõ.
Ne tsirmpɔw annyɛ gyan da, na obiara so nnyi hɔ a obotum esianka ne nsa.
Ofi mbersantsen kesi mbersantsen no ɔtse dɛmara, na ne mfe nnsã da.
Na dɛm na Ewuradze se—emi, Ewuradze mowɔ ehumbɔbɔr na medze adom ma hɔn a wosuro me, na ɔyɛ me enyigye dɛ medze enyimnyam bɛma hɔn a wɔsom me wɔ tseneneeyɛ nye nokwar mu dze kɔ ewiei.
Hɔn akatua bɛyɛ kɛse na onnyiewiei bɛyɛ hɔn enyimnyam.

Na hɔn na mibeyi m’esumasɛm akyerɛ, nyew, m’ahendzi ho esumasɛm nyina a ehuntsa fi tsetseberdo, nye mfesantsen a ɔreba no, na mebɛma woehu ndzepa a ɔwɔ me pɛ ho a ɔfa ndzɛmba nyina a ɔwɔ m’ahenman mu no.
Nyew, mbersantsen anwanwadze mpo na wobohu, na ndzɛmba a obesi no na mebɛkyerɛ hɔn, ebusuasantsen pii ho ndzɛmba no mpo.
Na hɔn nyansaa bɛyɛ kɛse, na hɔn ntseasee bodu sor; na hɔn enyim na enyansafo hɔn nyansaa bɛhera, na abadwembafo hɔn ntseasee bɛyɛ kwa.
Na menam mo Sunsum do bobue hɔn adwen mu, na menam mo tum do bɛma woehu me pɛ mu esumasɛm—nyew, ndzɛmba a enyiwa mpo nnhunii, na asowa so nntsee, na onnyae nnhɛɛn nyimpa n’akoma mu.
Hɛn, Joseph Smith, Kakraba, na Sidney Rigdon a Kwakwar ne da a otsĩa duesia mu, wɔ hɛn Ewuradze n’afe apem, ahaawɔtwe eduasa ebien mu a nna yɛwɔ Sunsum mu no—
Wɔnam Sunsum no tum do ebue hɛn enyiwa na wobuee hɛn ntseasee, ama yeehu na yaatse Nyame ne ndzɛmba ase—
Dɛm ndzɛmba no a ɔwɔ hɔ fi ahyɛse no ansaana wɔrobɔ wiadze no, dza Egya no nam ne Ba a Wɔwoo no Kortoo no no a ɔda no bo mu hyehyɛe fi ahyɛse no mpo;
Ɔno na yɛgye no ho dase; na dase a yɛgye no nye Jesus Christ n’asɛmpa ne mãhyɛ no, a ɔyɛ Ɔba no, nyia yehun no na yɛnye no kasae wɔ sor enyido-adzehu mu no.
Na ber a yɛrekyerɛ ndzɛmba no ase, dɛ mbrɛ Ewuradze ase hɛn dɛ yɛnyɛ no, yebodur John asɛmpa, tsir enum ne nkyekyɛmu eduonu akron no a oyii kyerɛɛ no na odzi do yi—
Dza ɔkã owusoɛr ho asɛm no, ɔfa hɔn a wɔbɛtse Nyimpa Ba ne ndze, na wɔasoɛr ho no,
Na wobefir edzi hɔn a wɔayɛ papa no akɔ atseneneefo wusoɛr mu, na hɔn a wɔyɛɛ bɔn no akɔ afɔdzi wusoɛr mu.
Na iyi maa hɛn ho boow hɛn, osiandɛ Sunsum no na oyii kyerɛɛ hɛn.
Na ber a yɛrodwendwen dɛm ndzɛmba yinom ho no, Ewuradze dze ne nsa kãa hɛn ntseasee enyi ma obuee, na Ewuradze n’enyimnyam hyerɛnee twaa hɛn ho hyiae.
Na yehun Ɔba no a ɔtse Egya n’abanyimfa no n’enyimnyam na yenyaa ne mãhyɛ no;
Na yehun abɔfo krɔnkrɔn nye hɔn a wɔatsew hɔn ho no wɔ ahengua no enyim, na wɔrosom Nyame na Eguambaa no, hɔn na wɔsom no afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ.
Na afei, dasegye pii a wɔdze ama wɔ no ho no, iyi nye dasegye a odzi ekyir koraa, yɛgye dase wɔ no ho dɛ: Ɔtse ase!
Osiandɛ yehun no, dɛ ɔwɔ Nyame n’abanyimfa; na yɛtsee ndze a ɔregye dase dɛ ɔno nye Egya ne Ba a Wɔwoo no Kortoo no—
Na wɔnam no do, na wɔnam no mu, na ɔnoara so na ɔbɔɔ wiadze, na hɔn a wɔtse do nyina wɔwoo hɔn Nyame ne mbabanyin na mbabaa.

Na yehun iyi so, na yɛgye ho dase, dɛ ɔbɔfo a nna wɔdze tum ahyɛ ne nsa wɔ Nyankopɔn n’enyim, na ɔtseew Ɔba a Wɔwoo no Kortoo no no a Egya dɔ no, na ɔda Egya no bo mu no do etua no, wɔtoow no fii sor kyeen asaase do fii Egya na Ɔba no hɔn enyim.
Na wɔfrɛɛ no Ɔsɛɛfo, osiandɛ ɔsor sũi guu no do—Ɔno nye Lucifer, anapa ba no.
Na yehunii, na hwɛ, ɔahwe ase! ɔahwe ase, anapa ba no mpo no!

Na ber a yɛda ho wɔ Sunsum mu no, Ewuradze hyɛɛ hɛn dɛ yɛnkyerɛw enyido-adzehu no; na yehun Satan, abowatsena dadaw no, abɔnsam no mpo a, nyia ɔtseew etua wɔ Nyankopɔn do no, na ɔpɛɛ dɛ ɔgye hɛn Nyankopɔn nye ne Christ hɔn Ahenman no.
Dɛm ntsi, ɔnye Nyankopɔn n’ahotseweefo kõe na otwaa hɔn ho hyiae.
Na yenyaa enyido-adzehu a ɔfa hɔn a ɔnye hɔn kõe na odzii hɔn do konyim no hɔn amandzehu ho, na dɛm na Ewuradze ne ndze baa hɛn nkyɛn;
Dɛm na Ewuradze se, hɔn a wonyim mo tum, na woenya kyɛfa wɔ mu da, na wɔama hɔnho kwan ma abɔnsam nam no tum do edzi hɔn do konyim, na wɔpow nokwar no, na wogu mo tum ho fĩ no—
Hɔn nye ɔsɛɛ mbabanyin no a mese hom dɛ nkyɛ obeye ama hɔn dɛ wɔannwo hɔn koraa no;
Na hɔn nye ebufuw nkuraba no a wɔ nye abɔnsam na n’abɔfoe, wɔadom hɔn dɛ wonhu amandze wɔ Nyankopɔn n’ebufuhyew mu nkɔ mbersantsen mu;
Ɔfa dɛm nkorɔfo yinom dze, bɔnfakyɛ nnyi hɔ ma hɔn wɔ wiadze yi mu anaadɛ wiadze a ɔreba no mu—
Susuampaara dɛ hɔn nsa kãa Sunsum krɔnkrɔn no, na wɔpowee, na wɔpoow Egya ne Ba a Wɔwoo no Kortoo no no, na wɔabɔ no mbeamudua mu dze ama hɔnho na wɔhyɛ no bagua mu fɛr.
Dɛm nkorɔfo yinom nye hɔn a wɔnye abɔnsam na n’abɔfoe bɔkɔ ogya baka na brimstone no mu—
Na hɔn nko na owu mprɛnu no benya hɔn do tum;
Nyew, nokwar, hɔn nko na wɔasɔw n’ebufuhyew ho amandzehu ekyir no wɔremmpon hɔn wɔ Ewuradze noara ne mber do no.
Na hɔn a wɔaka nyinara no, wɔnam Eguambaa a wokum no, na ɔda Egya no bo mu ansaana wɔrobɔ wiadze no no konyimdzi na n’enyimnyam mu dze hɔn bɛba wusoɛr mu.
Na iyi nye asɛmpa no, enyigyesɛm no a ndze a ofi ɔsorsor gyee ho dase kyerɛɛ hɛn no.
Na ɔbaa wiadze, Jesus no mpo, ama wɔaabɔ no mbeamudua mu dze ama wiadze, na ɔaasoa wiadze bɔn, na ɔaatsew wiadze ho, na ɔaatsew ho efi dza ɔnntsen nyina ho;
Ama wɔnam no do aagye obiara nkwa, hɔn a Egya yɛɛ hɔn na ɔdze hɔn ahyɛ no tum mu no;
Nyia ɔhyɛ Egya no enyimnyam, na ɔgye ne nsaano ndwuma nyina nkwa, gyedɛ ɔsɛɛ mbambanyin no a Egya no yii Ɔba no kyerɛe ekyir no wɔpoow no no nko.

Dɛm ntsi, ɔgye hɔn nyinara nkwa gyedɛ hɔn nko—Wɔbɔkɔ ntsẽa a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem mu, dza ɔyɛ ntsẽa onnyi ewiei no, ɔyɛ onnyiewiei ntsẽa no na wɔnye abɔnsam na n’abɔfoe bedzi hen mbersantsen no, hɔ na hɔn abowaba nnwu da, na ogya no so nndum da, iyi nye hɔn ahohyehye—
Na dɛm bea no, nye n’ewiei, nye hɔn ahohyehye no dze, ɔdasanyi biara nnyim;
Na woennyi annkyerɛ, nna wonnyii nnkyerɛe, nna worinnyi nnkyerɛ ɔdasanyi biara, gyedɛ hɔn a wɔama hɔn mu kyɛfa no nko.
Naaso, emi Ewuradze, mudua enyido-adzehu do yi kyerɛ dodowara na motow mu bio ntsɛmara.
Dɛm ntsi, n’ewiei, ne tɛtɛr, no krɔn, no bun, na no mu nkukuhwease dze, wɔnntse ase, nna ɔdasanyi biara so renntse ase, gyedɛ hɔn a wɔahyehyɛ hɔn akɔ dɛm afɔbu no mu no nko.
Na yɛtsee dɛ ndze no rekã dɛ: Kyerɛw enyido-adzehu no, na hwɛ, na iyi nye enyido-adzehu a ɔfa ndzebɔnyɛfo hɔn amandzehu ho no n’ewiei.
Na bio, yɛgye dase wɔ ho—osiandɛ yehunii na yɛtsee, na iyi nye Christ n’asɛmpa ho dasegye a ɔfa hɔn a wɔbɔsoɛr wɔ atseneneefo wusoɛr no mu—
Hɔn nye nkorɔfo a wonyaa Jesus ho dasegye, na wɔgyee ne dzin dzii na wonumaa hɔn wɔ ne nsiei saso mu, wɔnye hɔn hyɛɛ nsu mu wɔ ne dzin mu, na iyi tse dɛm, dɛ mbrɛ ne mbrasɛm a ɔdze ama no tse—
Dɛ sɛ wodzi mbrasɛm no do a wɔbɔhohor hɔn ho na wɔatsew hɔnho efi hɔn bɔn nyina ho, na nyia wɔahyɛ no sɔfo na wɔasɔw ano ama dɛm tum yi no dze ne nsa bogu hɔn do ma woeenya Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no;
Na wɔdze gyedzi dzi konyim, na anohoba Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no a Egya no hue gu hɔn a wodzi pɛrpɛr na nokwar nyina hɔn do no sɔɔw hɔn ano.
Hɔn nye Abakamba n’asɔr no.
Hɔn nye nkorɔfo a Egya no dze ndzɛmba nyina ahyɛ hɔn nsa mu.
Hɔn nye nkorɔfo a wɔyɛ asɔfo na ahemfo, hɔn na wɔagye ne mãhyɛ, na n’enyimnyam no;
Na wɔyɛ Ɔsorsornyi no n’asɔfoe wɔ Melchizedek nhyehyɛɛ do, nyia ɔwɔ Enoch nhyehyɛɛ do, nyia ɔwɔ Ɔba a Wɔwoo no Kortoo no nhyehyɛɛ no.
Dɛm ntsi, dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no, wɔyɛ enyame, Nyankopɔn ne mbabanyin no mpo.
Dɛm ntsi, ndzɛmba nyina yɛ hɔndze, dɛ nkwa anaa owu, anaa ndzɛmba a ɔwɔ hɔ sesei, anaa ndzɛmba a ɔbɛba, ne nyina yɛ hɔndze, na wɔyɛ Christ dze, na Christ so yɛ Nyankopɔn dze.
Na wobedzi ndzɛmba nyina do konyim.
Dɛm ntsi, mma ɔdasanyi biara nnhyɛ noho enyimnyam wɔ nyimpa mu, mbom ɔnhyɛ noho enyimnyam wɔ Nyame mu, nyia ɔdze atamfo nyina bɛhyɛ n’ananadze no.
Woyinom na wɔbɛtsena Nyame nye ne Christ no hɔn enyim afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ.
Woyinom nye hɔn a sɛ ɔnam fua mu reba ebedzi hen wɔ no nkorɔfo do wɔ asaase do a, ɔnye hɔn bɛba.
Woyinom nye hɔn a wobenya kyɛfa wɔ owusoɛr a odzi kan no mu.
Woyinom nye hɔn a wɔbɔsoɛr wɔ atseneneefo wusoɛr no mu.
Woyinom nye hɔn a wɔaba Bepɔw Zion do, na wɔaba Nyame tseasefo no kuropɔn mu no, ɔsor bea no a ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn mu krɔnkrɔn no.
Woyinom nye hɔn a wɔafora abɔfokuw mpempem no mu aba ɔdodow nhyiamu no ase, nye Enoch n’asɔr mu, nye Abakamba dze no mu.
Woyinom nye hɔn a wɔakyerɛw hɔn edzin wɔ sor, bea a Nyankopɔn na Christ yɛ adze nyina do ɔtsɛmbuafo no.
Woyinom nye hɔn a wɔtsen a wɔnam Jesus a ɔyɛ ahyɛmu fofor mu ntamugyinafo no do woedzi mu no, ɔno nankasa no bɔgyaa a okyii dze bɔɔ werdam a odzi mu no.
Woyinom nye hɔn a hɔn nyimpadua yɛ dɛ celestial dze no, hɔn a hɔn enyimnyam tse dɛ ewia, yɛ Nyame n’enyimnyam mpo a ɔkrɔn ɔkyɛn adze nyina no, nyia n’enyimnyam wɔakyerɛw dɛ ɔtse dɛ wimu ewia no.

Na bio, yehun terrestrial wiadze no, na hwɛ, na hu woyinom nye hɔn a wɔyɛ terrestrial dze no, hɔn a hɔn enyimnyam nntse dɛ Abakamba n’asɔr mu mba no a woenya Egya ne mãhyɛ no, tse dɛ mbrɛ soronko da bosoom na ewia ntamu no mpo.
Hwɛ, woyinom nye hɔn a wokwetsii mbra biara na wowui no;
Nye hɔn so a wɔyɛ nyimpa esunsum a wɔdze hɔn egu efiadze no a Ɔba no kɛseraa hɔn, na ɔkãa asɛmpa no kyerɛɛ hɔn no, ama woeebu hɔn atsɛn tse dɛ nyimpa a wɔwɔ honam mu;
Hɔn na woennya Jesus no ho dasegye ber a wɔwɔ honam mu no na mbom nkyii wonyae no.
Woyinom nye hɔn a nna wɔyɛ enyimdzefo wɔ asaase do a ndabrabafo furaa hɔn enyi no.
Woyinom nye hɔn a wonya n’enyimyam no na mbom nnyɛ ne mãhyɛ no.
Woyinom nye hɔn a wonya Ɔba no ne nkyɛn kwan no, na mbom nnyɛ Egya no ne mãhyɛ.
Dɛm ntsi, hɔn nyimpadua yɛ terrestrial dze, na nnyɛ celestial nyimpadua, na soronko da hɔn enyimnyam no ntamu tse dɛ mbrɛ soronko da bosoom na ewia ntamu no.
Woyinom nye hɔn a hɔn dasegye a ɔwɔ Jesus ho no nnyɛ dzen; dɛm ntsi, woennya Nyankopɔn n’ahenman mu ahenkyɛw no.
Na afei, iyi nye enyido-adzehu a yehunii wɔ terrestrial no ho no n’ewiei, dza Ewuradze hyɛɛ hɛn dɛ yɛnkyerɛw wɔ ber a nna yɛda ho wɔ sunsum mu no.
Na bio, yehun telestial n’enyimnyam no, na dɛm enyimnyam no yɛ ketseaba, dɛ mbrɛ soronko da nworaba enyimnyam nye bosoom n’enyimnyam mu wɔ wimu no, dɛmara na no so tse.
Woyinom nye hɔn a woennya Christ n’asɛmpa no, nye Jesus ho dasegye no.
Woyinom nye hɔn a wɔammpow Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no.
Woyinom nye hɔn a wɔatow hɔn egu hɛl.
Woyinom nye hɔn a wɔrennpon hɔn mmfi abɔnsam hɔ, gyedɛ owusoɛr a odzi ewiei no mu, kesi dɛ Ewuradze, Christ Eguambaa no mpo, bowie n’edwuma yɛ.
Woyinom nye hɔn a woennya ne mãhyɛ wɔ onnyiewiei wiadze no mu, na mbom wɔnam terrestrialfo no hɔn som do benya Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no;
Na terrestrialfo no so nam celestialfo no hɔn som do.
Na telestialfo no so nam abɔfo hɔn dwuma a wɔdze ahyɛ hɔn nsa dɛ wɔnnsom hɔn no do benya, anaadɛ hɔn a wɔahyɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnyɛ esunsum mu asomfo mma hɔn no; na hɔn so wɔbɛyɛ nkwagye n’adzedzifo.
Na dɛm na yehunii wɔ ɔsor enyido-adzehu no mu, telestial n’enyimnyam no, na ɔbor ntseasee nyina do;
Na ɔdasanyi biara nnyim gyedɛ nyia Nyame beyi akyerɛ no.
Na dɛm na yehun terrestrial n’enyimnyam no a ɔbɔ telestial ho ndzɛmba nyina n’enyimnyam do, wɔ enyimnyam nye tum nyina mu mpo, wɔ ahoɔdzen na ahendzi mu.
Na dɛm na yehun celestial n’enyimnyam no a ɔbɔ ndzɛmba nyina do no—bea a Nyankopɔn, Egya no mpo, tse dzi hen wɔ n’ahengua do afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ;
N’ahengua enyim na ndzɛmba nyina bɔ hɔn mu adze ahobrɛadze na enyidzi mu, na wɔhyɛ no enyimnyam afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ.
Hɔn a wɔtse n’enyim nye Abakamba n’asɔr mu mba; na wohu dɛ mbrɛ wohu hɔn, na wonyim dɛ mbrɛ wonyim hɔn, a woeenya ne mãhyɛ nye n’adom no;
Na ɔayɛ hɔn pɛr wɔ tum, nye ahoɔdzen, nye ahendzi mu.
Na celestial n’enyimnyam no yɛ kor, dɛ mbrɛ ewia so n’enyimnyam yɛ kor no.
Na terrestrial n’enyimnyam no yɛ kor, dɛ mbrɛ bosoom so n’enyimnyam yɛ kor.

Na telestial n’enyimnyam no yɛ kor, dɛ mbrɛ nworaba so hɔn enyimnyam yɛ kor no; na dɛ mbrɛ soronko da woraba kor nye kor ntamu wɔ enyimnyam mu no, dɛmara so na soronko da kor na kor ntamu wɔ enyimnyam mu wɔ telestial wiadze no mu;
Na woyinom nye hɔn a wɔyɛ Paul, na Appollos nye Cephas dze.

Woyinom nye hɔn a wɔkã dɛ hɔn mu binom yɛ oyi nedze na binom so yɛ oyi nedze no—binom yɛ Christ dze, na binom yɛ John dze, na binom so yɛ Moses dze, na binom so yɛ Elias dze, na binom so yɛ Esiaias dze, na binom so yɛ Isaiah dze, na binom so yɛ Enoch dze;
Mbom woennya asɛmpa no, nna woennya Jesus anaa nkɔnhyɛfo no ho dasegye, anaa ahyɛmu a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no.
Ewiei no, woyinom nye hɔn a wɔrennkan hɔn mmfora ahotseweefo no ma wonnhwim hɔn mmfa nsuwusiw mu nntu nnkehyia Abakamba n’asɔr no mu.
Woyinom nye hɔn a wɔyɛ atorfo, na nkaberkyerfo, awartofo, na ndwaman, nye obiara a ɔpɛ na odzi ator.
Woyinom nye hɔn a wohu amandze wɔ Nyame n’ebufuw ano wɔ asaase do.
Woyinom nye hɔn a wohu amandze wɔ onnyiewiei awerdzi ogya no mu.
Woyinom nye hɔn a wɔtow hɔn gu hɛl na wohu amandze wɔ Otumfo Nyankopɔn n’ebufuw ano, kodu mber ne mãhyɛ, ber a Christ dze n’atamfo nyina bɛhyɛ n’ananadze na ɔama n’edwuma edzi mu.
Ber a obegyaa ahenman no mu na ɔdze ama Egya no, dɛ nkekãa nnyi ho, na ɔase dɛ; medzi konyim na monko na mitsiatsiaa wenyintwer no do no, Otumfo Nyankopɔn n’ebufuhyew wenyintwer a ɔyɛ hu no mpo.
Afei na wɔdze enyimnyam ahenkyɛw no bɔsoa no, ma ɔaatsena no tum ahengua no do edzi hen afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ.
Mbom hwɛ, na hu, yehun telestial wiadze n’enyimnyam no nye hɔn a wɔwɔ mu no, na hɔn dodow tse dɛ sor nworaba anaadɛ mpoano anhwea;
Na yɛtsee Ewuradze ndze dɛ ɔrese dɛ: Woyinom nyina bɔbɔ hɔn mu adze, na tɛkyerɛma nyina bɛkã hɔn bɔn akyerɛ nyia ɔtse ahengua do afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ.
Na wobobu hɔn atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ndwuma tse, na mbrɛ ɔdasanyi biara no ndwuma tse no na ɔbɛkyerɛ ne tsenabew a obenya wɔ efi a woesiesie no mu;
Na wɔbɛyɛ Ɔsorsornyi no no nkowaa; mbom bea a Nyankopɔn na Christ tse no dze, wonnkotum akɔ hɔ mbersantsen mfesantsen nyina mu.
Iyi nye enyido-adzehu a yehunii no n’ewiei, ɔno na wɔhyɛɛ hɛn dɛ yɛnkyerɛw ber a yɛda ho wɔ Sunsum mu no.
Mbom Ewuradze no ndwuma sõ na ɔyɛ ahobow, na n’ahenman no mu esumasɛm no a oyii kyerɛɛ hɛn no, bor ntseasee nyina a ɔwɔ enyimnyam, tum, nye ahendzi mu do.
A ɔhyɛɛ hɛn dɛ mma yɛnnkyerɛw wɔ ber a yɛda ho wɔ Sunsum mu no, na nyimpa nnyi ho kwan dɛ ɔkã;
Na nyimpa so nnkotum ada no edzi, osiandɛ wɔnam Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no tum no a Nyankopɔn dze ma hɔn a wɔdɔ no no, na wɔtsew hɔnho wɔ n’enyim no nko do na wɔdze bohu na wɔatse ase;
Hɔn na ɔma hɔn ho ndzinoa ma wohu na wɔtse ase dze ma hɔnankasa hɔnho;
Ama ber a wɔwɔ honam mu yi, wɔnam Sunsum no tum nye edziyi do eetum egyina n’enyim wɔ enyimnyam wiadze no mu.
Na enyimnyam, na enyidzi, na ahendzi nyɛ Nyankopɔn na Eguambaa no hɔndze afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/77.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 77
chapter_summary: 1–4, Mbowa wɔ esunsum na wɔbɛtsena ase onnyiewiei enyigye mu; 5–7, Asaase yi bɛtsena hɔ mfe tsiabaa, mpemesuon; 8–10, Abɔfo ahorow san dze asɛmpa no ba asaase do na wɔsom; 11, Nyimpa mpem ɔha eduanan-anan hɔn nsɔwano; 12–14, Christ bɛba mfe mpemesuon n’ahyɛse no mu; 15, Nkɔnhyɛfo beenu na wobeyi hɔn ama Jewfo hɔn man no.

verses.text: Asɛmbisa. Ebɛnadze nye ahwehwɛ po no a John kãa ho asɛm wɔ Nyikyerɛ, Tsir 4, nkyekyɛmu 6 no?Mbuae. Ɔno nye asaase no a wɔatsew ho, wɔayɛ bɛkyebo, na ɔwɔ onnyiewiei gyinabew mu.

Asɛmbisa. Mbowa anan no a wɔakã ho asɛm wɔ dɛm nkyekyɛmu kor noara mu no yɛtse ase dɛn?Mbuae. Ɔyɛ mfatoho bi a John dze rekyerɛkyerɛ mbrɛ sor tse mu, Nyame ne paradise, nyimpa n’enyigye nye mbowa, nye ndzɛmba a wɔwea, nye wimu ntumbowa; dza ɔyɛ sunsum mu abɔdze no tse dɛ honam mu dze, na dza ɔyɛ honam mu dze no tse dɛ sunsum mu dze: nyimpa no sunsum a ɔtse dɛ nankasa no nyimpadua, dɛmara na abowa no sunsum na adze biara a Nyankopɔn abɔ no so tse.

Asɛmbisa. Ana mbowa anan no gyina hɔ ma mbowa ankorankor, anaadɛ wogyina hɔ ma ekuwekuw anaa nhyehyɛɛ bi?Mbuae. Dza woyii kyerɛɛ John no gyina hɔ ma mbowa ankorankor anan, na ogyina hɔ ma nyimpa ekuw horow no mu biara dɛwdzi a wobenya wɔ hɔn onnyiewiei enyigye, dɛ mbrɛ abɔdze ahyehyɛ ato hɔ no.

Asɛmbisa. Enyiwa na ntsaban no a mbowa no wɔwɔ no, yɛtse ase dɛn?Mbuae. Hɔn enyiwa no gyina hɔ ma kan na nyimdzee, ɔkyerɛ dɛ nyimdzee ahyɛ hɔn mã; na hɔn ntsaban no so gyina hɔ ma tum a wɔdze bɛkã hɔn ho, wɔdze bedzi dwuma na ne nkekaho.

Asɛmbisa. Elderfo eduonu anan no a John kãa ho asɛm no, yɛtse ase dɛn?Mbuae. Ɔwɔ dɛ yɛtse ase dɛ dɛm elderfo no a John hun hɔn no, yɛ elderfo a wodzii nokwar wɔ hɔn somdwumadzi mu a woewuwu; nna wɔyɛ nsɔr esuon no mu mba, na afei wɔwɔ Nyame ne paradise hɔ.

Asɛmbisa. Yɛtse nwoma no a John hunii no a wɔdze nsɔwano esuon asɔw n’ekyir no ase dɛn?Mbuae. Ɔwɔ dɛ yɛtse ase dɛ Nyame ne pɛ, n’esumasɛm na no ndwuma a wɔada no edzi no na ɔwɔ mu; dza ɔyɛ esumadze a wɔahyehyɛ a ɔfa asaase yi ho wɔ ne mfe mpem esuon a ɔwɔ mu anaadɛ ne mber tsiabaa a ɔwɔ mu no.

Asɛmbisa. Nsɔwano esuon a wɔdze sɔɔw ano no, yɛtse ase dɛn?Mbuae. Ɔwɔ dɛ yɛtse ase dɛ nsɔwano a odzi kan no, mfe apem a odzi kan no mu ndzɛmba na ɔwɔ mu, na dza otsĩa ebien no so mfe apem dze na ɔwɔ mu, na ɔtse dɛmara kesi esuon no.

Asɛmbisa. Abɔfo anan no a wɔakã hɔn ho nsɛm wɔ Nyikyerɛ Tsir 7, nkyekyɛmu 1 no, yɛtse ase dɛn?Mbuae. Ɔwɔ dɛ yɛtse ase dɛ wɔyɛ abɔfo anan a Nyankopɔn somaa hɔn, a ɔama hɔn tum wɔ asaase ne mfɛndzanan nyina do dɛ wɔngye nkwa na wɔnsɛɛ adze; woyinom nye hɔn a wɔwɔ asɛmpa a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no a wɔdze bɛma aman, ebusuakuw, kasa horow, na nyimpa nyina no, na wɔwɔ tum dɛ wɔtow ɔsorsor mu, na wɔsɔw ano dze ma nkwa, anaadɛ wɔtow gu sum kebii bea mu no.

Asɛmbisa. Bɔfo no a ofi boka rofow wɔ Nyikyerɛ Tsir 7, nkyekyɛmu 2 no, yɛtse ase dɛn?Mbuae. Ɔwɔ dɛ yɛtse ase dɛ, bɔfo no a ofi boka rofow no nye nyia wɔdze Nyame tseasefo no nsɔwano ama no dɛ ɔmfa nhwɛ Israel ebusuakuw duebien do no; dɛm ntsi, ɔtsẽa mu frɛ abɔfo anan no a wɔwɔ asɛmpa a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no, se dɛ: Mma hom nnhaw asaase, anaa po, anaa ndua, ma onkodu dɛ yɛbɔsɔw hɛn Nyankopɔn no nkowaa ano wɔ hɔn momapɔw do. Na sɛ hom pɛ dɛ hom gye to mu a, iyi nye Elias no a ɔbɛba abɔboaboa Israel ebusuakuw no ano na ɔasan dze ndzɛmba nyinara aba no.
Asɛmbisa. Ebɛn aber na ndzɛmba a wɔakã ho nsɛm wɔ dɛm Tsir yi mu no bɛyɛ hɔ?Mbuae. Ɔbɛyɛ hɔ wɔ mfe mpem a otsia esia no mu, anaadɛ ber a wɔbɛtsew nsɔwano no a otsĩa esia no ano no.

Asɛmbisa. Wɔsɔɔw mpem ɔha eduanan anan hɔn ano wɔ Israel ebusuakuw nyina mu—ebusuakuw biara mu mpem duebien no, yɛtse ase dɛn?Mbuae. Ɔwɔ dɛ yɛtse ase dɛ, hɔn a wɔasɔw hɔn ano no yɛ asɔfompanyin a wɔhyɛɛ hɔn asɔfo wɔ Nyankopɔn ne nhyehyɛɛ krɔnkrɔn mu dɛ wɔnkã asɛmpa a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no; na hɔn nye nkorɔfo a woyii hɔn fii aman, ebusuakuw, kasa horow na nyimpa nyina mu, na abɔfo no a wɔmaa hɔn tum dɛ wɔnhwɛ asaase do aman do no hyɛɛ hɔn asɔfo dɛ wɔntwe hɔn a wɔpɛ no mbra Abakamba n’asɔr no mu.

Asɛmbisa. Totorobɛnto a wɔhɛnee a wɔabɔ dzin wɔ Nyikyerɛ Tsir 8 no, yɛtse ase dɛn?Mbuae. Ɔwɔ dɛ yɛtse ase dɛ, dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn dze nda esia bɔɔ wiadze, na owiee n’edwuma yɛ wɔ da a otsĩa esuon no, na ɔtseew ho, na ɔdze asaase do huntuma yɛɛ nyimpa no, dɛmara so na mfe mpemesuon n’ahyɛse no Ewuradze Nyankopɔn bɛtsew asaase ho, na oewie nyimpa no nkwagye, na oebu ndzɛmba nyina atsɛn, na abɔpon ndzɛmba nyina, gyedɛ dza ɔammfa annhyɛ no tum ase no nko, ber a ɔbɔsɔw ndzɛmba nyina ano dze ama ndzɛmba nyina n’ewiei; na abɔfo beesuon no hɔn totorobɛnto a wɔhɛnee no yɛ n’edwuma ne nsiesiei a ɔdze reba ewiei wɔ mfe mpem-esuon n’ahyɛse—dza wɔdze risiesie kwan ato hɔ ansaana ne mbae no aso.
Asɛmbisa. Dabɛn na wobowie ndzɛmba a wɔakyerɛw no wɔ Nyikyerɛ Tsir 9 no yɛ?Mbuae. Sɛ wɔtsew nsɔwano a otsĩa esuon no n’ano wie a, nna wobowie yɛ ansaana Christ ne mbae no aso.

Asɛmbisa. Nwoma kakraba no a John dzii no a wɔakyerɛw no wɔ Nyikyerɛ Tsir 10 no, yɛtse ase dɛn?Mbuae. Ɔwɔ dɛ yɛtse ase dɛ nna ɔyɛ dwumadzi nna ayɛdze ma no dɛ ɔboaboa Israel ebusuakuw ano; hwɛ, iyi nye Elias, nyia wɔakyerɛw no ho asɛm dɛ ɔwɔ dɛ ɔba na ɔdze ndzɛmba nyinara san ba no.

Asɛmbisa. Adasegyefo beenu no a ɔwɔ Nyikyerɛ Tsir 11 no, n’ase kyerɛ dɛn?Mbuae. Hɔn nye nkɔnhyɛfo beenu no a wobeyi hɔn ama Jewfo hɔn man no wɔ nda a odzi ekyir no mu, wɔ nsanananmu ber no mu, na wɔahyɛ nkɔm akyerɛ Jewfo no wɔ ber a wɔaboa hɔn ano ewie, na wɔaakyekyer Jerusalem kuropɔn no wɔ hɔn egyanom asaase do.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/78.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 78
chapter_summary: 1–4, Ahotseweefo no wɔ dɛ wohyia na wosi adzekoradan; 5–12, Sɛ wɔhwɛ hɔn egyapadze do yie a, obegya hɔn akɔ nkwagye mu; 13–14, Ɔnnsɛ dɛ Asɔr no twer asaase do tum; 15–16, Michael, (Adam) som wɔ Krɔnkrɔnnyi (Christ) no ne nkyerɛkyerɛ ase; 17–22, Nhyira akã agyedzifo, osiandɛ wobenya adze nyinara edzi.

verses.text: Ewuradze kasaa kyerɛɛ Joseph Smith, Kakraba see dɛ: Tsie me, Ewuradze wo Nyankopɔn no na ɔse, hom a wɔahyɛ hom asɔfodzi a ɔkrɔn wɔ m’asɔr mu, na hom akã homho aboa ano;
Na hom ntsie afotu a ofi nyia ofi sor ahyɛ hom asɔfo no, ɔno na ɔbɛkã enyansasɛm egu hom asomu, dɛ nkwagye nyɛ hom dze wɔ dza homdze abɔto m’enyim yi ho, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn na ɔse.

Na nokwar, mese hom dɛ, mber no edu, na ɔabɛn; na hwɛ, na hu dɛ, ohia dɛ wɔyɛ nhyehyɛɛ bi wɔ mo nkorɔfo mu a wɔnam do bɔhwɛ esiesie m’adzekorabea, dɛ mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ a wobotum dze no mu ndzɛmba no ahwɛ ehiafo a wɔwɔ mo nkorɔfo mu, nye hɔn so a wɔwɔ Zion asaase do—
Ama ɔayɛ nhyehyɛɛ bi a obetsim na ɔwɔ hɔ daapem ama m’asɔr dze aboa dza hom dze esi hom enyi do ho no, dze ama nyimpa no nkwagye, nye hom Egya a ɔwɔ sor n’enyimnyam;
Ama hom nye sor ndzɛmba aabɔ mu ayɛ pɛr wɔ sor ahyɛmudze ho, nyew, nye asaase ndzɛmba so, ama hom eenya sor ndzɛmba.
Osiandɛ sɛ hom annyɛ kor wɔ asaase ndzɛmba ho a, hom nnkotum ayɛ kor dze enya sor ndzɛmba;
Na sɛ hom pɛ dɛ mema hom tsenabew wɔ celestial wiadze no mu a, ɔwɔ dɛ hom yɛ ndzɛmba a mahyɛ hom no, nye dza morohwehwɛ efi hom hɔ no, dze siesie hom ho.
Na afei, nokwar dɛm na Ewuradze se, ohia dɛ hom a hom akã hom ho abɔmu wɔ dɛm nhyehyɛɛ yi mu no yɛ ndzɛmba nyina dze ma m’enyimnyam;
Mekyerɛ dɛ, ma m’akowaa Newel K. Whitney, nye m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba nye m’akowaa Sidney Rigdon, nye ahotseweefo a wɔwɔ Zion no ntsena ase mbɔ ngua;
Annyɛ dɛm a Satan bɛper dɛ ɔbɛdan hɔn akoma efi nokwar no ho, ma wɔabɛyɛ efurafo, amma wɔaanntse ndzɛmba a woesiesie ama hɔn no ase.
Dɛm ntsi, mehyɛ hom dɛ, hom nhyɛ ase nsiesie homho na hom nyɛ nhyehyɛɛ a ɔbɛkã hom abɔ mu anaadɛ ahyɛmu a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem a no mu nnkɛtsetsew da.
Na nyia obobu do no bɛyew ne dzibew na ne gyinabew wɔ asɔr no mu, na wobegyaa no ahyɛ Satan n’ekutukubɔ nsa ekesi dɛ ɔpon da no bɔsõ.
Hwɛ, iyi nye nsiesie a medze risiesie hom nye fapem na esusudze a medze rema hom, ama hom eedua do dze edzi mbrasɛm a wɔdze ama hom no do;
Na ɔnam m’adom ntsi, abɛbrɛsɛ biara a ɔbɛba hom do no, asɔr no nko etum egyina, na ɔabor abɔdze nkaa nyinara a ɔwɔ celestial wiadze n’ase no do;
Ama hom aaba sor abɛfa ahenkyɛw a woeesiesie ama hom no, na wɔaayɛ hom ahenman pii do ahwɛdofo, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, Zion Krɔnkrɔnnyi Kor no, nyia ɔtoow Adam-ondi-Ahman fapem no na ɔse;
Ɔno na oyii Michael, hom henba no, na otsintsiim n’anan, na ɔkrɔɔn no, na wɔnam Krɔnkrɔnnyi kor no a ne nda nnyi ahyɛse, anaa ne nkwa onnyi ewiei no n’apam do dze nkwagye nsaafee no ama no.
Nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, hom yɛ mbofra nkakraba, na hom nnyae nntsee nhyira akɛse a ɔwɔ Egya ne nsamu a oesiesie ama hom no ase;
Na hom nnkotum agye ndzɛmba nyina sesei; naaso, hom enyi ngye, osiandɛ mibedzi hom kan. Ahenman no yɛ homdze, na nhyira a ɔwɔ hɔ no yɛ homdze, na mbersantsen ahonyadze so yɛ homdze.
Na nyia ɔnam ndaase mu bɛgye ndzɛmba nyina no, wɔbɛhyɛ no enyimnyam; na wɔdze wiadze yi mu ndzɛmba bɛkã no ho, ɔha na no mbɔho mpo, nyew, mbordo.
Dɛm ntsi, hom nyɛ ndzɛmba a mahyɛ hom no, hom Pomfo no na ɔse, Ahman Ba no mpo, nyia osiesie ndzɛmba nyina ansaana ɔafa hom no;
Na hom nye Abakamba n’asɔr no, na ɔbɛfa hom akɔ sor wɔ nsuwisuw mu, na ɔdze nyimpa biara ne kyɛfa ama no.
Na ɔhwɛfo nokwafo na nyansafo no benya ndzɛmba nyinara. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/79.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 79
chapter_summary: 1–4, Wɔfrɛ Jared Carter dɛ ondua Ɔwerɛkyekyefo no do nkã asɛmpa no.

verses.text: Nokwar, mese wo dɛ, ɔyɛ me pɛ dɛ m’akowaa Jared Carter bɔkɔ boka nkurow do bio, omfi bea do nkɔ bea do, na omfi kuropɔn do nkɔ kuropɔn do, ɔmfa asɔfodzi tum no a wɔdze hyɛɛ no sɔfo no mbɔ enyigyesɛm no dawur, asɛmpa a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no mpo.
Na mobɔsoma Ɔwerɛkyekyefo no ma ɔaaba ne nkyɛn, ɔno na ɔbɛkyerɛkyerɛ no nokwar no nye kwan a ɔbɛfa do akɔ.
Na susuampaara dɛ ɔyɛ nokwafo no, medze efi-efi bɛhyɛ no ahenkyɛw bio.
Dɛm ntsi, ma w’akoma ndzi dɛw, m’akowaa Jared Carter, na mma nnsuro, wo Ewuradze na ɔse, Jesus Christ no mpo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/80.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 80
chapter_summary: 1–5, Wɔfrɛ Stephen Burnett na Eden Smith dɛ wɔnkɛkã asɛmpa wɔ beebiara a wɔpɛ.

verses.text: Nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze, mekã kyerɛ m’akowaa Stephen Burnett: Kɔ, kɔ wiadze mu na kɛkã asɛmpa no kyerɛ abɔdze biara a ɔbɛtse wo ndze.
Na susuampaara dɛ erohwehwɛ adamfo ma ɔakã woho no, medze m’akowaa Eden Smith bɛma wo.
Dɛm ntsi, kɔ na kɛkã m’asɛmpa no, sɛ ebɔkɔ etsifi anaa anaafo, anaa boka, anaa anee a ɔmmfa ho, osiandɛ wo nkɔree no nnkɛyɛ gyan.
Dɛm ntsi, gye ndzɛmba a atse, na agye edzi nokwar mu, na inyim dɛ ɔyɛ nokwar no no ho dase kyerɛ.
Hwɛ, iyi nye nyia ɔafrɛ wo no ne pɛ, wo Pomfo, Jesus Christ no mpo. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/81.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 81
chapter_summary: 1–2, President a Odzi Kan na n’Apamfo no na daa nyina wokura ahenman no ne nsaafee; 3–7, Sɛ Frederick G. Williams dzi nokwar wɔ no ɔsomdwumadzi mu a, obenya onnyiewiei nkwa.

verses.text: Nokwar, nokwar, mese ɔwo m’akowaa Frederick G. Williams dɛ: Tsie nyia ɔrekasa yi ne ndze, tsie Ewuradze wo Nyankopɔn n’asɛm no, na tsie frɛ a wɔdze afrɛ wo yi, dɛ ebɛyɛ sɔfopanyin wɔ m’asɔr mu, na ayɛ ɔpamfo ama m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba.
Ɔno na medze ahenman no ne nsaafee ama, dza aber nyina odzi wɔ Asɔfodzi a Ɔkrɔn ne President na n’Apamfo kuw no:

Dɛm ntsi, nokwar, megye no to mu, na mibehyira ɔno nye ɔwo so, susuampaara dɛ eyɛ nokwafo wɔ apam mu yi, wɔ dzibew a medze ama wo no, wɔ daa mpaa a ebɔ no w’ano nye w’akoma mu, wɔ bagua mu nye kokoa mu, nye w’asɔfodwumadzi mu so, wɔ asɛmpa no a ebɔ no dawur wɔ atseasefo asaase yi do, nye w’enuanom mu no.
Na ndzɛmba yinom ne nyɛe mu no, ebɛyɛ adzepa kɛsenara dze ama wo mfɛfonom adasamba, na ama nyia ɔyɛ w’Ewuradze no n’enyimnyam akrɔn.
Dɛm ntsi, dzi nokwar, gyina dzibew a medze ama wo no; boa hɔn a wɔyɛ mberɛw no, ma nsa a ɔsensɛn famu no do wɔ sor, na ma nkotodwe a wɔagow no mu nyɛ dzen.
Na sɛ idzi nokwar dze kɔ ewiei a, ibenya bɛkyebo ahenkyɛw, nye onnyiewiei nkwa wɔ tsenabew a mesiesie wɔ m’Egya fie no.
Hwɛ, na hu dɛ, iyi nye Alpha na Omega, Jesus Christ no, ne nsɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/82.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 82
chapter_summary: 1–4, Nyia wɔama no dodow no, wɔbɛgye dodow efi no hɔ; 5–7, Sum na odzi hen wɔ wiadze; 8–13, Sɛ yedzi dza Ewuradze akã no do a, yɛbɔ No dua mu; 14–18, Ɔsɛ dɛ Zion tu mpon wɔ ahoɔfɛw na krɔnkrɔnyɛ mu; 19–24, Ɔwɔ dɛ nyimpa biara hwehwɛ ne nyɛnko ne yieyɛ.

verses.text: Nokwar, nokwar, mese hom, mo nkowaa, dɛ susuampaara dɛ hom dze hom bɔn akyekyɛ homho nkorkor no, dɛm so mpo na Emi, Ewuradze, medze hom bɔn kyɛ hom.

Eso, binom wɔ hom mu a wɔayɛ bɔn mbordo; nyew, hom nyinara mpo ayɛ bɔn; mbom nokwar mese hom dɛ, ofi aber yi dze kɔ, hom nhwɛ yie, na hom ntwe homho mfi bɔn ho, amma atsɛmbu dzendzen ammba hom tsir do.
Na nyia wɔma no dodow no, wɔbɛgye dodow efi no hɔ; na nyia ɔyɛ bɔn tsia kan kɛse no benya afɔbu kɛse so.
Hom bɔ me dzin bisa nyikyerɛ, na medze ma hom; na susuampaara dɛ hom nndzi me nsɛm a medze ma hom do no, hom abɛyɛ mbratofo; na pɛrpɛrdzi na atsɛmbu nye ntsẽa a ɔbata me mbra ho.
Dɛm ntsi, dza mekã kyerɛ kor no, mekã kyerɛ hom nyina: Hom nweɔn, osiandɛ ɔtamfo no atserɛw n’ahentum mu, na sum na odzi hen;
Na Nyankopɔn n’ebufuw redzɛw tsia hɔn a wɔwɔ asaase do no do; na hɔn mu biara nnyɛ papa, osiandɛ hɔn nyinara amanman efi kwan no do.

Na afei, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, emi Ewuradze, meremmfa bɔn biara nnto hom do; hom nkɔ hom kwan na mma hom nnyɛ bɔn bio; na mbom ɔkra biara a ɔbɛyɛ bɔn no, no bɔn dadaw no bɛsan aba no do, Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn no na ɔse.
Na bio, mese hom dɛ, medze mbrasɛm fofor rema hom, ama hom aatse dza mepɛ a ɔfa hom ho ase;
Mekyerɛ dɛ, merekyerɛ hom akwan a hom mfa do mbɔ bra wɔ m’enyim, ama aayɛ nkwagye ama hom.
Emi Ewuradze, sɛ hom yɛ dza mekã a, hom kyekyer me; mbom sɛ hom annyɛ dza mekã a nna hom nnyi anohoba biara.

Dɛm ntsi, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, obeye ama mo nkowaa Edward Patridge na Newel K. Whitney, A. Sidney Gilbert na Sidney Rigdon, nye m’akowaa Joseph Smith, nye John Whitmer na Oliver Cowdery, nye Parley P. Pratt na Martin Harris, dɛ wɔbɛkã hɔnho abɔ mu na woedzi ahyɛmu a mbrato mpo nnkotum atsetsew mu, gyedɛ hom dwumadzi ahorow no ho atsɛmbu ba ntsɛm—
Dɛ hom nhwɛ ehiafo nye bishop na n’apamfo ndzɛmba nyinara a ɔwɔ Zion asaase do nye Kirtland asaase do;
Na mehyira Kirtland asaase no do wɔ mankasa me mber pa mu dze ama Ɔsorsornyi no n’ahotseweefo no, ma wɔdze aayɛ stake ama Zion.
Osiandɛ ɔwɔ dɛ Zion n’ahoɔfɛw nye no krɔnkrɔnyɛ nya mpontu; ɔwɔ dɛ wɔtserɛw n’ahe do; wɔmma ne stake horow no mu nyɛ dzen; nyew, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, ɔwɔ dɛ Zion soɛr na ɔfa n’atar fɛɛfɛw hyɛ.
Dɛm ntsi, mbrasɛm a medze ma hom nye dɛ hom ndua dɛm ahyɛmu yi do nkã homho mbɔ mu, na ɔbɛyɛ hɔ dɛ mbrɛ Ewuradze ne mbra no se.
Hwɛ, iyi so yɛ nyansadze ma me wɔ hom yieyɛ ntsi.

Ɔwɔ dɛ hom yɛ pɛr, mekyerɛ dɛ, ɔwɔ dɛ hom nyinara nya kyɛfa pɛr wɔ egyapadze no mu, ama hom eetum edzi dwuma a wɔdze ahyɛ hom nsa no; ɔwɔ dɛ obiara nya dza ɔrohwehwɛ nye dza ohia, susuampaara dɛ dza ɔrohwehwɛ no dzi mu no—

Aama iyinom nyinara ho aaba mfaso ama tsease Nyankopɔn no n’asɔr no; aama obiara eetu ne talent mu mpon, na nyimpa biara eenya talent bi so, nyew, mbɔho ɔha mpo, ama wɔdze eegu Ewuradze n’adzekorabea, na ɔaabɛyɛ asɔrmba nyinara hɔn kwasafo egyapadze—
Na obiara repɛ ne nyɛnko ne yieyɛ, na wɔdze enyiwa kor reyɛ adze nyina rehyɛ Nyankopɔn enyimnyam.
Nhyehyɛɛ yi mayɛ dɛ ɔnyɛ nhyehyɛɛ mma hom daapem, susuampaara dɛ hom nnyɛ bɔn yi, na ɔbɛyɛ hom adzedzifo so dze.
Na ɔkra biara a ɔbɛyɛ bɔn etsia ahyɛmu yi no, na obepirim n’akoma etsia no, wɔnye no bedzi dɛ mbrɛ m’asɔr no ne mbra se, na wɔdze no bɛhyɛ Satan n’ekutukubɔ nsa ekesi dɛ mponee da no bɔsõ.
Na afei, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, na iyi yɛ nyansa, hom mfa ahonyadze a ɔnntsen no nyɛnko, na wɔnnkɛsɛɛ hom.
Hom ngyaa atsɛmbu nko mu nhyɛ me nsa, osiandɛ ɔyɛ medze na mubotua kaw. Asomdwee nkã hom; me nhyira da ho wɔ hom do.
Na iyi mpo, sɛ hom annhwe ase wɔ hom pinstinnyɛ mu a ahenman no da ho yɛ homdze, na ɔbɛyɛ hɔ afebɔɔ. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/83.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 83
chapter_summary: 1–4, Kwan da hɔ dɛ mbaa na mba nya kyɛfa wɔdan hɔn kunnom na egyanom no ma wɔhwɛ hɔn 5–6, Kwan da hɔ dɛ ekunafo na ngyankaba nya kyɛfa wɔdan Asɔr no ma ɔhwɛ hɔn.

verses.text: Nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se, dza ɔkã asɔr no ne mbra ho a ɔfa mbaa na mbofra ho, hɔn a wɔwɔ asɔr no mu a hɔn kunnom anaa hɔn egyanom efi mu no;
Kwan da hɔ dɛ mbaa nya kyɛfa wɔdan hɔn kunnom ma wɔhwɛ hɔn kɛpem dɛ hɔn kunnom befi mu; na sɛ woennhu mbrato biara wɔ hɔn mu a, wɔnye asɔr no bɔbɔ fɛkuw.
Na sɛ wohu dɛ wɔnnyɛ anokwafo a, wɔnye asɔr no nnkɔbɔ fɛkuw no; naaso, wobotum akã hɔn egyapadze do, dɛ mbrɛ ɔman no ne mbra se.
Mbofra nyina wɔ kyɛfa dɛ wɔdan hɔn awofo ma wɔhwɛ hɔn kɛpem dɛ wobenyin.
Na iyi ekyir, sɛ hɔn awofo nnyi egyapadze a wɔdze bɛma hɔn a, ɔyɛ asɔr no n’asɛdze dɛ ɔhwɛ hɔn, anaa mekyerɛ dɛ ɔdze Ewuradze n’akoradze mu adze hwɛ hɔn.
Na asɔr no na ɔbɔhwɛ adzekorabea no do; na no mu ndzɛmba na wɔdze bɔhwɛ ekunafo na ngyankaba, nye ehiafo so. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/84.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 84
chapter_summary: 1–5, Wɔbɛkyekyer Jerusalem Fofor no na woeesi temple no wɔ Missouri; 6–17, Wɔdze asɔfodzi santsen no fi Moses aber do dze bodu Adam aber do no ma; 18–25, Asɔfodzi a ɔkrɔn no na okitsa Nyankopɔn no ho nyimdzee saafee; 26–32, Asɔfodzi kuma no na okitsa abɔfo hɔn som ho nsaafee na odzi asɛmpa no ne nyienyim ho dwuma; 33–44, Nyimpa nam asɔfodzi nsewdzi na ahyɛmudzi do nya onnyiewiei nkwa; 45–53, Christ no Sunsum tsew nyimpa n’adwen mu, na wiadze tse bɔn mu; 54–61, Ahotseweefo no wɔ dɛ wɔgye dase wɔ ndzɛmba a hɔn nsa akã no ho; 62–76, Ɔwɔ dɛ wɔkã asɛmpa no, na nsɛnkyerɛdze bedzi ekyir; 77–91, Onnyi dɛ elderfo no fa sika kotoku anaa bɔtɔ, na Ewuradze bɔhwɛ hɔn ehiadze; 92–97, Ɔyardɔm na ndom wɔ hɔ ma hɔn a wɔpow asɛmpa no; 98–102, Wɔma Zion no ɔpon ho ndwom fofor no; 103–110, Wɔmma nyimpa biara ngyina nankasa ne dzibew na ɔnyɛ n’edwuma a wɔafrɛ no dɛ ɔnyɛ no; 111–120, Ɔwɔ dɛ Ewuradze no nkowaa bɔ amambɔe ekyiwadze a ɔbɛba nda a odzi ekyir no ho dawur.

verses.text: Jesus Christ ne nyikyerɛ a ɔdze maa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, nye elderfo beesia no, wɔ ber a wɔdze akoma kor maa hɔn ndze do wɔ sor no.

Nyew, Ewuradze n’asɛm a ɔfa n’asɔr a ɔakyekyer wɔ nda a odzi ekyir yi mu dze aama no nkorɔfo no hɔn nsanananmu no, dɛ mbrɛ no nkɔnhyɛfo no dze hɔn ano kãe, na dɛ ɔbɔboaboa n’ahotseweefo ano wɔ Bepɔw Zion do, bea a ɔbɛyɛ Jerusalem Fofor no kuropɔn no.

Dɛm kuropɔn a wɔbɛkyekyer no wɔbɛhyɛ ase efi bea a temple no wɔ no, dza Ewuradze dze ne nsatseaba kyerɛe wɔ Missouri ɔman n’anee ahe do, ma Joseph Smith, Kakraba, dze ne nsa hyiraa do nye binom so a wɔsɔ Ewuradze n’enyi.

Nokwar, iyi yɛ Ewuradze n’asɛm, dɛ Jerusalem kuropɔn Fofor no, ahotseweefo na wɔbɔboaboa hɔn ano dze hɔn akyekyer, na wɔbɛhyɛ ase efi dɛm bea yi do, temple n’ananmu mpo, dɛm temple no a dɛm ebusuasantsen yi besi.
Na nokwar, ebusuasantsen yi nyina runntwa mu nnkɔ kesi dɛ wobesi dan dze ama Ewuradze ana, na fua bɛhyɛ do, dɛm fua no bɛyɛ Ewuradze n’enyimnyam mpo, na ɔbɛhyɛ dan no mã.
Na Moses ne mbabanyin no, dɛ mbrɛ ne nsa kãa Asɔfodzi Krɔnkrɔn no, ber a n’asew Jethro dze ne nsa guu no do no;
Na Jethro nyae fii Caleb ne nsamu;
Na Caleb nyae fii Elihu ne nsamu;
Na Elihu nyae fii Jeremy ne nsamu;
Na Jeremy nyae fii Gad ne nsamu;
Na Gad nyae fii Esaias ne nsamu;
Na Esaias nyae fii Nyankopɔn nsamu.
Esaias tsenaa ase wɔ Abraham ne nda mu, na wohyiraa no—
Na Abraham nyaa asɔfodzi no fii Melchizedek ne nsamu, ɔno so nyae fii n’egyanom hɔn ebusuasantsen hɔ, dze kesi Noah do mpo;
Na ofi Noah do dze kesi Enoch do, fi hɔn egyanom ebusuasantsen mu;

Na afei, fi Enoch do dze kesi Abel no a no nua faa no ho apam bɔn kum no no nyia ɔnam Nyankopɔn dze mbrasɛm do gyee asɔfodzi no, na n’egya Adam, a ɔno nye nyimpa a odzii kan no, dze ne nsa guu no do dze maa no—
Dɛm asɔfodzi no da ho wɔ Nyame n’asɔr mu wɔ ebusuasantsen nyina mu, na onnyi ahyɛse na onnyi ewiei so.
Na Ewuradze sii asɔfodzi no pi dze maa Aaron na n’asefo wɔ hɔn ebusuasantsen nyinara mu, dɛm asɔfodzi yi ara so na ɔkɔdo na ɔwɔ hɔ afebɔɔ a ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn ne nhyehyɛɛ krɔnkrɔn ne saso do.
Na asɔfodzi a ɔkrɔn yi na wɔdze dzi asɛmpa no ho dwuma na wɔdze kura ahenman n’esumasɛm saafee no, dza ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn no ho nyimdzee saafee no.
Dɛm ntsi, wɔ ayɛdze yi mu na nyamesu mu tum no da edzi.
Na sɛ wokwetsir dɛm ayɛdze nye asɔfodzi tumdzi yi a, nyamesu mu tum rennda edzi mma adasa wɔ honam mu;
Na sɛ wokwetsir iyi a, ɔdasanyi biara nnkotum ahwɛ Nyame n’enyim, Egya no mpo, na ɔaatsena ase.
Na iyi na Moses dze kyerɛkyerɛɛ Israelmba no pefee wɔ sar no do, na ɔbɔɔ mbɔdzen dɛ ɔbɛtsew no nkorɔfo ho ama woeetum woeehu Nyame n’enyim;

Mbom wopiriim hɔn akoma ntsi, woenntum enngyina n’enyim; dɛm ntsi, Ewuradze n’ebufuhyew dzɛɛw hɔn do, na ɔkãa ntam dɛ mma wɔnnhɛn n’ahomgye mu ber a wɔwɔ sar no do no, dɛm ahomgye no nye n’enyimnyam ne mãhyɛ no.
Dɛm ntsi, ɔfaa Moses fii hɔn finimfim, nye Asɔfodzi Krɔnkrɔn no so;
Na asɔfodzi kuma no nko na ɔkae, dɛm asɔfodzi yi na okitsa abɔfo hɔn som nye asɛmpa ne nyienyim ho dwuma saafee no;

Dɛm asɛmpa no nye nnuho na enuma asɛmpa no, nye bɔnfakyɛ; na honam mu mbrasɛm no, dza Ewuradze nam n’ebufuhyew do maa ɔkaa Aaron fie wɔ Israelmba mu kesi John no a Nyame maa no do, nyia Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn ahyɛ no mã fi ne nã ne yamu no aber do.

Na wonumaa no ne mbafobermu, na Nyame no bɔfoe na ɔhyɛɛ no tum ber a odzii ndaawɔtwe dɛ ombutuw Jewfo hɔn ahenman ahengua no, na ɔntsentsen Ewuradze no kwan no wɔ no nkorɔfo enyim, na onsiesie hɔn mma Ewuradze ne mbae no, ɔno ne nsamu na wɔdze tum nyina ahyɛ.
Na bio, elder na bishop hɔn dzibew no yɛ adze a ohia a ɔkã na ɔfam asɔfodzi a ɔkrɔn no ho.
Na bio, kyerɛkyerɛnyi na deacon dzibew no yɛ adze a ohia a ɔkã na ɔfam asɔfodzi kuma no ho, dɛm asɔfodzi no na wosii no pi dze maa Aaron na ne mbabanyin no.

Dɛm ntsi, dɛ mbrɛ mekãe a ɔfa Moses ne mbabanyin ho no—na Moses ne mbabanyin na Aaron so ne mbabanyin no bɔbɔ afɔr a ɔsɔ enyi wɔ Ewuradze ne fie, dɛm fie no na wobesi no wɔ ebusuasantsen yi mu, wɔ bea a woehyira do no a emi makyerɛ no—

Na Ewuradze n’enyimnyam no bɛhyɛ Moses na Aaron hɔn mbabanyin no mã wɔ Bepɔw Zion do wɔ Ewuradze ne fie, na hɔn mbabanyin no nye hom; nye dodow so a mafrɛ hɔn na masoma hɔn dɛ wɔnkɔ nkɛkyekyer m’asɔr no.
Na hɔn nyina so a wɔbɛgye asɔfodzi ebien yinom a makã ho asɛm yi na wobedzi nokwar wɔ ho, na wɔakrɔn hɔn frɛ no, Sunsum no bɛtsew hɔn ho na wɔayɛ hɔn nyimpadua no fofor.
Na wɔabɛyɛ Moses na Aaron hɔn mbabanyin na Abraham asefo, na asɔr no nye ahenman no, na Nyankopɔn n’apamfo.
Na hɔn nyinara a wɔgye asɔfodzi yi no wɔgye me, Ewuradze na ɔse;
Na nyia ɔgye m’asomfo no ɔgye me;
Na nyia ɔgye me no ɔgye m’Egya;
Na nyia ɔgye m’Egya no ɔgye m’Egya n’ahenman; dɛm ntsi, dza m’Egya wɔ nyinara no wɔdze bɛma no.
Na iyi nye nsewdzi nye ahyɛmudzi a ɔkã asɔfodzi no ho.
Dɛm ntsi, hɔn a wɔgye asɔfodzi no nyinara gye m’Egya ne nsewdzi nye ahyɛmudzi yi, a onnkobu do, nna wonnkotum eyi efi hɔ so.
Mbom obiara a obedzi ahyɛmu yi na ekyir yi obobu do no, na ɔadan efi ho koraa no, orinnya bɔnfakyɛ wɔ wiadze yi mu anaa wiadze a ɔreba no mu.
Na hɔn a wɔremmba mmbɛgye dɛm asɔfodzi yi a hom nsa akã yi mu no wondue, dza menam mankasa me ndze a ofi sor dze rema hom a hom wɔ ha ndɛ yi; na mahyɛ ɔsor dɔm nye m’abɔfoe mbra mpo wɔ hom ho.
Na afei, mehyɛ hom dɛ hom nhwɛ homho yie, na hom ndzi onnyiewiei nkwa nsɛm no do enyiberdo.
Na hom mfa asɛm biara a ofi Nyankopɔn n’anomu aba no do mbɔ bra.
Na Ewuradze n’asɛm yɛ nokwar, na adze biara a ɔyɛ nokwar no yɛ kan, na adze biara a ɔyɛ kan no yɛ Sunsum, Jesus Christ no Sunsum no.
Na Sunsum no ma ɔdasanyi biara a ɔbɛba wiadze yi mu no kan; na Sunsum no ma ɔdasanyi biara a ɔwɔ wiadze yi mu a otsie Sunsum ne ndze no nyimdzee.
Na ɔdasanyi biara a otsie Sunsum ne ndze no ba Nyankopɔn hɔ, Egya no mpo.

Na Egya no kyerɛkyerɛ no ahyɛmu no a wɔayɛ no fofor na woesi no pi dze ama hom no, dza ɔnam hom yieyɛ ntsi woesi no pi dze ama hom no, na nnyɛ hom nko hom yieyɛ ntsi, na mbom wiadze nyina yieyɛ so ntsi.
Na wiadze nyina tse bɔn mu, na osi nkrum wɔ sum mu, na ɔhyɛ bɔn nkyehoma mu.
Na ɔnam iyi do hom bohu dɛ wɔhyɛ bɔn nkyehoma mu; osiandɛ wommfi mu mmba me nkyɛn.
Osiandɛ obiara a ɔmmba me nkyɛn no hyɛ bɔn ne nkyehoma mu.
Na obiara a onntsie me ndze no nnyim me ndze, na ɔnnyɛ medze.
Na ɔnam iyi do hom bohu soronko a ɔda atseneneefo nye emumuyɛfo mu, na seseiara mpo wiadze nyina risi nkrum wɔ bɔn nye sum mu.
Na mber bi a etwa mu kɔ no, nna osian ekyingye nye ndzɛmba a hom buu no tootooba ntsi hom adwen hyɛ sum mu.
Dɛm egyangyandze na ekyingye yi dze asɔrtɔw nyina abɛhyɛ afɔbu ase.
Na dɛm afɔbu yi wɔ Zionmba do, hɔn nyina mpo.
Na wɔbɛhyɛ afɔbu yi ase ekesi ber a wobonu hɔnho na wɔakaa ahyɛmu fofor no, Mormon Nwoma no, nye mbrasɛm dadaw no a medze ama hom no, nnyɛ dɛ wɔbɛkã nko, na mbom wɔbɛyɛ dza makyerɛw no—
Ama ɔaasow eduaba a ɔfata hɔn Egya n’ahenman no; annyɛ dɛm a, dza ɔwɔ hɔ ma hɔn ara nye ɔhwe na atsɛmbu a wobohue egu Zionmba do.
Ana ɔsɛ dɛ ahenman mu mba gu m’asaase krɔnkrɔn no fĩ? Nokwar, mese hom dɛ, Oho.
Nokwar, nokwar, mese hom a seseiara hom tse me nsɛm, a ɔyɛ me ndze yi, na susuampaara dɛ hom gye ndzɛmba yinom no, nhyira akã hom;

Sɛ hom si hom adwen pi, wɔ botooyɛ na wɔ mpaabɔ sunsum mu, gye dase wɔ ndzɛmba yinom a makã ho asɛm akyerɛ hom yi, na hom gye ho dase kyerɛ wiadze nyina a, osian dɛm mbrasɛm yi ntsi—medze hom bɔn bɛkyɛ hom.
Dɛm ntsi, hom nkɔ wiadze nyina; na beebiara a hom runntum nnkɔ no, hom nsoma, ama dasegye no efi hom hɔ akɔ abɔdze biara hɔ wɔ wiadze nyina mu.
Na dɛ mbrɛ mekãa kyerɛɛ m’asomafo no, dɛmara so na mekã kyerɛ hom, osiandɛ hom yɛ m’asomafo, Nyame n’asɔfompanyin mpo; hom nye hɔn a m’Egya dze hom ama me; hom yɛ m’anyɛnkofo;
Dɛm ntsi, dɛ mbrɛ mekãa kyerɛɛ m’asomafo no, mekã no bio kyerɛ hom, dɛ ɔkra biara a ɔbɛgye hom nsɛm edzi na wobonuma no wɔ nsu mu dze ama bɔnfakyɛ no, benya Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no.
Na nsɛnkyerɛdze yinom bedzi hɔn a wɔgye dzi no ekyir—
Wɔbɛyɛ tum ndwuma pii wɔ me dzin mu;
Wobotu mbɔnsam wɔ me dzin mu;
Wɔbɛsa yar wɔ me dzin mu;
Wobobue efurafo enyi na woebue hɔn etsitsifo aso wɔ me dzin mu;
Na mmum ne tɛkyerɛma akasa;
Na sɛ wɔma hɔn bɔr ma wɔnom a ɔrennyɛ hɔn hwee;
Na abowatsena no bɔr rinnya tum nnhaw hɔn.
Mbom mehyɛ hɔn dɛ, mma wɔmmfa ndzɛmba yinom nntuw hɔnho, nna mma wɔnnkã wɔ wiadzemba enyim; osian hom mfaso na nkwagye ntsi na wɔdze iyinom ama.

Nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, hɔn a wɔnngye hom nsɛm nndzi, na woennuma hɔn wɔ nsu mu wɔ me dzin mu ammfa hɔn bɔn annkyɛ hɔn, ama woenya Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no, wobobu hɔn fɔ, na wɔremmba m’Egya n’ahenman no mu, bea a Egya na emi yɛwɔ no.
Na nyikyerɛ yi na mbrasɛm yi wɔdze ma hom nye wiadze nyina fi dɔn yi ara mu dze kɔ, na asɛmpa no wɔ hɔ ma hɔn a wɔnntsee nyina.

Mbom, nokwar, mese hom nyina a wɔdze ahenman no ama hom no—fi hom hɔ na ɔwɔ dɛ hom kã asɛmpa no kyerɛ hɔn, aama woeenu hɔnho wɔ hɔn ndwuma bɔn dadaw no ho; na wɔbɛkã hɔn enyim wɔ hɔn ekyingye akoma bɔn ho, nye hom enuanom a wɔwɔ Zion no so osiandɛ ber a mosomaa hom no, wɔtseew etua wɔ hom do.

Na bio, mese hom, m’anyɛnkofo dɛ, ofi ndɛ kɔ, mebɛfrɛ hom anyɛnkofo, ohia dɛ medze dɛm mbrasɛm yi ma hom, ama hom aabɛyɛ dɛ m’anyɛnkofo no a ber a nna menye hɔn wɔ hɔ no murututu kwan akɛkã asɛmpa no wɔ mo tum mu no;
Na mehyɛɛ hɔn dɛ mma wɔmmfa sika kotoku anaa bɔtɔ, anaa ntar ebien.
Hwɛ, mosoma hom ma hom akɔ wiadze akɔsɔ hɔn ahwɛ, na odwumayɛnyi biara n’apaadze sɛ no.

Na obiara a ɔbɔkɔ akɛkã dɛm asɛmpa yi a ɔfa ahenman no ho no, na ɔnnkɛpa abaw na ɔbɔkɔ do edzi nokwar wɔ ndzɛmba nyina mu no, ɔnnkɔtɔ bahaw wɔ adwen mu, nna no mu nnkɛyɛ kunsaa, nna wɔ honandua mu, n’anankɔkɔmu anaa n’akwaado; na ne tsinhwi kor mpo nnyi hɔ a ɔbɔtɔ famu a wonnkohu. Na kɔm renndze hɔn, nna nsukɔm so renndze hɔn.
Dɛm ntsi, mma hom nndwendwen adzekyee ho, dɛ ebɛnadze na hom bedzi anaa hom bɔnom, anaa hom bofura.
Na hom nhwɛ haban mu nsukookoo mbrɛ wosi nyin, wɔnnyɛ edwuma, eso wɔnntow asaaba, na wiadze mu ahenman nyina hɔn enyimnyam wɔnhyehyɛ hɔnho dɛ iyinom mu kor mpo.
Na hom Egya a ɔwɔ sor nyim dɛ hom hia dɛm ndzɛmba yinom nyina.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mma adzekyee ndwendwen nankasa no ho.
Eso mma hom nndzi kan nndwendwen dza hom bɛkã ho; na mbom hom nkora nkwa nsɛm wɔ hom adwen mu aber nyina, na dɔn no nya sõ a, wɔdze obiara nedze bɛma no.

Na dɛm mbrasɛm yi wɔdze ma agyedzifo nyina a Nyame afrɛ hɔn wɔ n’asɔr mu dɛ wɔnyɛ ɔsomdwuma no; dɛm ntsi, ofi dɔn yi mu kɔ no, mma hɔn a wɔkɔbɔ ahenman no ho asɛmpa dawur no mmfa sika kotoku anaa bɔtɔ nnkɔ.
Hwɛ, mosoma hom ma hom ekeyi wiadzemba atsɛn wɔ hɔn ndwuma bɔn ho, na hom akyerɛkyerɛ hɔn atsɛmbu a ɔreba no ho adze.
Na obiara a ɔbɛgye hom no, hɔ na mo so mebɛba, osiandɛ mibedzi hom enyim. Mibedzi hom nyimfa na hom bankum, na mo sunsum bɛhɛn hom akoma mu, na m’abɔfoe etwa hom ho ehyia, na wɔasoa hom.
Na obiara a ɔgye hom no, ɔgye emi; na ɔnoara na ɔbɛma hom edziban, na ɔbɛma hom efuradze, na ɔama hom sika.
Na nyia ɔma hom edziban, anaa efuradze anaa sika no, rennyew n’akatua dabiarada.
Na nyia ɔnnyɛ ndzɛmba yinom no nnyɛ mo suanyi; na dɛm kwan yi do na hom bohu m’esuafo.

Nyia ɔanngye hom no, hom mfi ne nkyɛn nkɔ, na hom mfa nsu, nsu krɔngyekrɔngye nhohor hom ananadze, dɛ ɔyɛ ɔhyewber anaa awɔwber no, na hom mfa ngye ho dase mma hom Egya a ɔwɔ sor, na mma hom nnsan hom ekyir nnkɔ dɛm nyimpa no hɔ bio.
Na ekuraase anaa kurow biara a hom bɛhɛn mu no, hom nyɛ dɛmara.
Na hom nsi nketse nhwehwɛ mu, na mma hom nngyaa; na dɛm fie no ndue, anaa ekuraase, anaa kurow a ɔpow hom; anaa hom nsɛm, anaa hom dasegye a ɔfa mo ho no.
Wondue, misi do bio dze ma dɛm fie, anaa ekuraase, anaa kurow a ɔpow hom, anaa hom nsɛm, anaa hom dasegye wɔ mo ho no;
Na emi, Otumfo no, medze me nsa ato aman do, dɛ merebɛtsẽa hɔn wɔ hɔn emumuyɛdze ho.
Na ɔyardɔm bɛtsen akɔ, na worinnyi mmfi asaase do kesi dɛ mubowie m’edwuma yɛ, dza wobotwa no tsia tseneneeyɛ mu no—

Kɛpem dɛ obiara bohu me, hɔn a wɔakã no, ofi kumabaa do kesi ɔkɛse do mpo, na wɔdze Ewuradze ho nyimdzee bɛhyɛ hɔn mã, na wobohu enyiwa tua enyiwa na wɔbɛma hɔn ndze do na wɔdze ndze abɔ mu atow dɛm ndwom fofor yi, akã dɛ:
Ewuradze dze Zion aba bio;Ewuradze apon no nkorɔfo, Israelfo,Dɛ mbrɛ adom nsanmunyi no tse,Dza wɔnam gyedzi do dze bae no,Nye hɔn egyanom ahyɛmu no.
Ewuradze apon no nkorɔfo;Na ɔakyekyer Satan na mber nnyi hɔ bio.Ewuradze aboaboa ndzɛmba nyina ano ayɛ no kor.Ewuradze dze Zion fi sor aba famu.Ewuradze dze Zion fi ase akɔ sor.
Asaase aper na ɔawo n’ahoɔdzen aaba;Na wɔada nokwar no edzi wɔ n’ayamudze mu;Na ɔsor akyerɛ n’ayamuyie wɔ no do;Na wɔdze ne Nyankopɔn n’enyimnyam efura no;Na ogyina no nkorɔfo finimfin.
Wɔmfa enyimnyam, na abɔdzin, na tum na ahoɔdzen,Mma hɛn Nyankopɔn; osiandɛ ehumbɔbɔr ahyɛ no mã,Pɛrpɛrdzi, adom na nokwar, na asomdwee,Afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ. Amen.

Na bio, nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, ohia dɛ obiara a ɔbɔkɔ akɔbɔ mo asɛmpa a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem dawur no, susuampaara dɛ wɔwɔ ebusua-ebusua, na wɔkyɛ hɔn sika no, ɔsɛ dɛ wɔdze kɛma hɔn anaadɛ wɔdze yɛ biribi a no ho bɛba mfaso ama hɔn dɛ mbrɛ Ewuradze bɛkyerɛ hɔn, osiandɛ dɛm na oye ma me.
Na wɔmma hɔn a wonnyi ebusuafo na wonya sika no, mfa mma bishop a ɔwɔ Zion no, anaa bishop a ɔwɔ Ohio no, aama oeehyira do dze ada nyikyerɛ no edzi nye ne ntsintsimii, na wɔdze akyekyer Zion.
Na sɛ obi ma hom atar a, hom nyi dadaw no na hom mfa mma ehiafo, na hom mfa ehurusi nkɔ hom kwan.
Na sɛ obi wɔ hom mu a ɔyɛ dzen wɔ Sunsum mu a, hom mma ɔmfa nyia ɔyɛ mberɛw nkã no ho ama oenya ntowdo wɔ ɔdwe nyina mu, ama no so ɔaayɛ dzen.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mfa hɔn a wɔahyɛ hɔn asɔfodzi kuma no nkã homho, na hom nsoma hɔn ma wondzi hom enyim kan nkesiesie kwan no, na wondzi dwuma a homankasa enntum enndzi no.
Hwɛ, iyi nye kwan a tsetseberdo m’asomafo no faa do kyekyeer m’asɔr dze maa me no.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mma obiara ngyina nankasa ne dzibew mu, na ɔnyɛ edwuma wɔ nankasa ne frɛ ho dwuma; na mma tsir nnse nan dɛ no ho nnhia; osiandɛ sɛ nan nnyi hɔ a honandua besi dɛn egyina?
Na honandua ne mfafakuwa nyina ho hia no, ama hɔn nyina aabɔ mu ayɛ edwuma ma honandua no eetum edzi mu.

Na hwɛ, ɔsɛ dɛ asɔfompanyin no tu kwan, na elderfo so dɛmara, nye asɔfo nkakraba no so; na mbom deaconfo no nye akyerɛkyerɛfo no dze ɔsɛ dɛ woyi hɔn si hɔ ma wɔnweɔn asɔr no do na wogyina dzi dwuma som asɔr no.
Na bishop, Newel K. Whitney so ɔsɛ dɛ otu kwan kɔ aprɔw wɔ nsɔr nyinara mu kɔhwehwɛ ehiafo no na ɔma hɔn, hɔn ehiadze ber a ɔbrɛ esikafo nye ahantanfo no adze.
Na ɔsɛ dɛ ɔfa ananmusinyi na ɔkyerɛkyerɛ no n’edwuma no ma ɔyɛ ma no.

Na wɔmma bishop no nkɔ New York kurow mu nye Albany kuropɔn so, nye Boston kuropɔn so mu na ɔmfa ndze kɛse mbɔ asɛmpa no ho kɔkɔ nkyerɛ nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ nkuropɔn yi mu dɛ, sɛ wɔpow ndzɛmba yinom a, amamfoyɛ na ɔsɛɛ kɛse bi bɛba hɔn do.
Na sɛ wɔpow ndzɛmba yinom a, nna hɔn atsɛmbu ber no abɛn na hɔn efi bɛyɛ afõ ama hɔn.
Ma ɔngye me ndzi na n’enyim runngu ase; na ne tsinhwi kor mpo ronntɔ famu a worunnhu.

Na nokwar, mese hom, mo nkowaa a hom aka dɛ, hom nkɔ nkedzi dwuma a mafrɛ hom wɔ ho no wɔ nkuropɔn nye nkuraase a wɔagye dzin mu, hom nyi wiadzemba atsɛn wɔ tseneneeyɛ mu wɔ hɔn ndzeyɛbɔn nye ndwuma bɔn ho na hom mma ɔnda edzi pefee na wɔntse ase dɛ, amamfoyɛ ekyiwadze a ɔwɔ nda a odzi ekyir no mu.
Na Ewuradze Tumfo no na ɔse, mebɛma hom atsetsew hɔn ahenman mu; meremma asaase nko nnwosow, mbom sor nworaba so behihim.
Na emi, Ewuradze matsen me nsa dze ekenyan sor etumfo; hom runntum nnhu no sesei, na mbom ɔnnkɛkyɛr na hom ehu, na hom nhu dɛ Emi nye mara, na mebɛba menye mo nkorɔfo ebedzi hen.
Meyɛ Alpha na Omega, ahyɛse na ewiei no. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/85.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 85
chapter_summary: 1–5, Zion egyapadze no, ɔwɔ dɛ wodua afɔrbɔ do wɔdze ma; 6–12, Obi a ɔyɛ otumfo na noho yɛ dzen na ɔdze Ahotseweefo no hɔn egyapadze bɛma hɔn wɔ Zion.

verses.text: Ɔyɛ Ewuradze ne krakye a oeyi no esi hɔ no dwuma dɛ ɔkyerɛw abakɔsɛm, nye ndzɛmba biara a wɔyɛ no wɔ asɔr no mu wɔ Zion nye hɔn a wɔdze hɔn ahodze bɔ afɔr, nye hɔn a wɔnam mbra kwan do nya egyapadze fi bishop hɔ nyinara;
Nye hɔn bra mu nsɛm, nye hɔn gyedzi, nye hɔn edwuma so; nye hɔn a sɛ etuatsewfo nsa kã hɔn egyapadze wie a wɔtsew etua no so.

Otsia Nyame ne pɛ na ne mbrasɛm dɛ hɔn a wɔammfa afɔrbɔ egyapadze amma hɔn dɛ mbrɛ ne mbra a ɔdze ama no tse no, ama no nkorɔfo etua hɔn ebupɛn du dze esiesie hɔn ama woeetum egyina awerdzi na ogyahyew da no ano no, ɔnnsɛ dɛ wɔkyerɛw kã Nyankopɔn no nkorɔfo hɔn edzin ho.
Eso ɔnnsɛ dɛ wɔkyerɛw hɔn ebusuasantsen ho nsɛm wɔ asɔr n’abakɔsɛm nwoma no mu.
Ɔnnsɛ dɛ wɔkyerɛw hɔn edzin, anaadɛ hɔn egyanom edzin, anaadɛ hɔn mba edzin wɔ Nyankopɔn ne mbra nwoma no mu, Ewuradze na ɔse.
Nyew, dɛm na ndze tseaba no se, dza ɔwasa a ohwira adze nyina mu, na mpɛn pii sɛ ɔda noho edzi a, ɔma me mbiew wosow no se:

Na ɔbɛba dɛ Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, mobɔsoma otumfo na ɔhoɔdzenfo a tum kitsa ne nsamu na n’akataho yɛ kan, ɔno na onnyiewiei asɛm befi n’anomu epue; n’abadaa mu na nokwar nsubura wɔ, na ɔdze bɔtoto Nyankopɔn ne fie ndzɛmba esiado esiado, na oesiesie ahotseweefo a wobohu hɔn edzin nye hɔn egyanom edzin, nye hɔn mba edzin wɔ Nyankopɔn ne mbra nwoma no mu no hɔn egyapadze;
Ber a nyia Nyankopɔn frɛɛ no na oyii no tseen ne nsa suoo Nyankopɔn n’adakaa mu dze atseen no no obodua owu egyanmenaba mu ahwe ase, tse dɛ dua a asenaman egyanmenaba atsew esi mu.
Na hɔn a wɔnnkyerɛɛw hɔn edzin wɔ nkaa nwoma no mu nyinara nnkenya egyapadze biara wɔ dɛm da no mu, mbom wobotwa hɔn akyen, na wɔdze hɔn bɔfora ekyingyefo mu, beebi a sũ na asetwɛr wɔ.
Dɛm nsɛm ntsi, dɛ ma Ewuradze kã no ɔbɛhyɛ no mã so.

Na hɔn a wɔwɔ Asɔfodzi a Ɔkrɔn a woennhu hɔn edzin wɔ mbra nwoma no mu no, anaadɛ wɔatsew etua, anaadɛ woeyi hɔn efi asɔr no mu nye asɔfo nkakraba, anaadɛ asɔrmba no, dɛm da no worinnya egyapadze wɔ Ɔsorsornyi n’ahotseweefo no mu;
Dɛm ntsi, wɔbɛyɛ hɔn dɛ mbrɛ wɔdze yɛɛ asɔfomba no, dza wɔakyerɛw wɔ Ezra Nwoma, Tsir ebien, nkyekyɛmu eduosia biako na eduosia ebien no.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/86.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 86
