chapter_summary: 1–7, Ewuradze kyerɛ abɛbusɛm a ɔfa ewifua na nworahaban ho no ase; 8–11, Ɔkyerɛ asɔfodzi nhyira mu kyerɛ hɔn a wɔyɛ adzedzifo wɔ mbra kwan do, dɛ mbrɛ honam afamu tse.

verses.text: Nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze kã dze kyerɛ hom a hom yɛ mo nkowaa, abɛbusɛm a ɔfa ewifua na nworahaban ho no:
Hwɛ, nokwar, mese dɛ, kwã no nye wiadze, na asomafo no nye hɔn a worudua aba no;

Na ber a wɔdedae no, asɔr no ne ɔtseetseefo kɛse no, otuatsewnyi no, edwamambɔnyi no, Babylon mpo a ɔma aman nyina nom no kuraba ano no, nyia n’akoma mu na ɔtamfo no, Satan no tse mu dzi hen wɔ no—hwɛ, ɔno na odua nworahaban no; dɛm ntsi, nworahaban no mia ewifua no na ɔpam asɔr no kɔ sar no do.
Na hwɛ, nda a odzi ekyir no, seseiara mpo a Ewuradze rehyɛ ase dze n’asɛm no aba yi, na ewifua n’ahaban ahyɛ ase rupuepue na ɔda ho yɛ afɔr—
Hwɛ, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, adzekyee na adzesaa nyina abɔfo a wɔayɛ krado rotweɔn Ewuradze ma wɔaasoma hɔn ma woeebotwa kwã no egu famu;
Mbom Ewuradze se hɔn dɛ, mma wonntutu nworahaban no wɔ ber a ewifua no nnyinii no (osiandɛ nokwar, hom gyedzi yɛ mberɛw) bɛyɛ na hom asɛɛ ewifua no so.

Dɛm ntsi, hom mma ewifua na nworahaban no nyina nnyin nkesi twaber no; na twaber no na hom bedzi kan aboaboa ewifua no ano efi nworahaban no mu, na sɛ hom wie a, hwɛ, hom bɛkyekyer nworahaban no efiefi na wɔahyew no.
Dɛm ntsi, dza Ewuradze kã kyerɛ hom a asɔfodzi no hyɛɛ ase fii hom egyanom do dze ebesi hom do no—
Na hom nye mbra mu adzedzifo ankasa wɔ honam afamu, na wɔdze hom akã Christ ho wɔ Nyame mu ehuntsa wiadze—

Dɛm ntsi, hom nkwa na asɔfodzi no etsim, na ɔsɛ dɛ odua hom nye ebusuasantsen do tsim kɛpem dɛ wɔdze ndzɛmba nyinara ne nsanananmu, dɛ mbrɛ a nkɔnhyɛfo ahotseweefo dze hɔn ano kãe fitsi wiadze ahyɛse no.
Dɛm ntsi, sɛ hom kɔ do wɔ me papayɛ mu, na hom yɛ kan ma Amanamamfo, na hom nam asɔfodzi yi do, hom yɛ agyenkwa bi ma me nkorɔfo Israelfo a, nhyira akã hom. Ewuradze na ɔse. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/87.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 87
chapter_summary: 1–4, Wɔhyɛ ɔkõ a obesi America Etsifi na America Anaafo ntamu ho nkɔm; 5–8, Ahokyer kɛse bɛba asaase mba nyina do.

verses.text: Nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se wɔ akõkoekõ a ɔnnkɛkyɛr na ɔaba ho, ɔbɛhyɛ ase efi Carolina Anaafo dɛ etuatsew, na ɔdze nkakrankakra ne nsunsuando ekowie akra pii hɔn wu na amandze hu.
Na mber bi bɛba a ɔkõ besi aman nyina mu, na ɔbɛhyɛ ase efi bea yi do.

Na hwɛ, America Anaafo bɛtsew etua wɔ America Etsifi, na America Anaafo mu mba bɔto nsa afrɛ aman binom tse dɛ Ngyeresi Abɔrekyir man, dɛ mbrɛ wɔfrɛ no no, na hɔn so bɔto nsa afrɛ aman binom, dɛ mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ a wobotum akõ agye hɔnho efi aman nkaa no nsa; na afei, ɔkõ besi aman nyina do.
Na ɔbɛba dɛ nda pii ekyir no, ndɔnkɔfo bɔsoɛr etsia hɔn wuranom, na hɔn so wɔbɔboa hɔn ano nye hɔn akõ dze atsẽa hɔn.
Na ɔbɛba so dɛ koromanfo a wɔaka asaase no do no bɔboa hɔn ano, na hɔn bo bofuw kɛsenara, na wɔdze atseetsee a ɔyɛ dzen bɛtseetsee Amanamamfo no.

Na dɛm ntsi, nkrantsee a wɔbɔtwe nye bɔgya a obogu no bɛma hɔn a wɔwɔ asaase do esi nkrum, na ɔkɔm, na ɔyardɔm, na asaasewosow, na sor mpaapaamu, na asenaman yerɛyerɛw huuhu so, bɛma hɔn a wɔwɔ asaase do no ehu Nyankopɔn Tumfo no n’ebufuw, na n’ebufuhyew, na ne ntsẽa nsa; ekesi dɛ ɔhyew a wɔahyehyɛ dɛ ɔbɛba aman do no bowie sã.
Na ahotseweefo hɔn sũ nye hɔn bɔgyaa begyaa dɛ ofi asaase do fow sor du Sabaoth Ewuradze n’asomu dɛ ondzi hɔn atamfo hɔn wer mma hɔn.
Dɛm ntsi, hom ngyina mbea krɔnkrɔn do, na mma hom nnhihim, nkɛpem dɛ Ewuradze ne da no bɛba; na hwɛ, ɔreba ntsɛntsɛm, Ewuradze na ɔse. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/88.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 88
chapter_summary: 1–5, Ahotseweefo nokwafo no nya dɛm Ɔwerɛkyekyefo, no a ɔyɛ onnyiewiei nkwa anohoba no; 6–13, Christ Ne Kan no na ɔkora na ɔhwɛ adze nyina do; 14–16, Owusoɛr no fi Ɔpon mu ba; 17–31, Setsie a nyimpa bɛyɛ ama celestial, terrestrial, anaa telestial ho mbra no na osiesie nyimpa ma dɛm ahenman kor no na enyimnyam horow no mu biara; 32–35, Hɔn a wɔpɛ dɛ wɔtsena bɔn mu no bɛda ho atsena fĩ mu; 36–41, Wɔdze mbra hwɛ ahenman nyinara do; 42–45, Nyankopɔn ahyɛ mbra ama ndzɛmba nyina; 46–50, Nyimpa bɛtse Nyankopɔn mpo ase; 51–61, Abɛbusɛm a ɔfa ɔbarimba no a ɔsomaa no nkowaa ma wɔkɔr no kwã mu na ɔkɛseraa hɔn nkorkor no ho; 62–73, Hom ntwe mbɛn Ewuradze na hom bohu N’enyim; 74–80, Hom ntsew homho na hom nkyerɛkyerɛ homho ahenman no ho nkyerɛkyerɛ no; 81–85, Nyimpa biara a wɔabɔ no kɔkɔ no, no so mbɔ ne nyɛnko kɔkɔ; 86–94, Nsɛnkyerɛdze, wimuadze na asaase nye no mu ndwuma nsakyer, na abɔfo siesie kwan ma Ewuradze Ne mbae; 95–102, Abɔfo hɛn totorobɛnto dze frɛ ewufo wɔ hɔn nhyehyɛɛ do; 103–116, Abɔfo hɛn totorobɛnto dze bɔ asɛmpa no ne nsananamu, Babylon n’asehwe, nye Nyankopɔn no kõ kɛse no ho dawur; 117–126, Hom mper nsũa, hom nsi Nyankopɔn Ne (temple), na hom mfa ayamuyie mfura homho; 127–141, Wɔda Nkɔnhyɛfo Skuul no ho nhyehyɛɛ edzi, nye anan ho nhohoree ho ayɛdze no so.

verses.text: Nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze kã kyerɛ hom a hom aboa hom ano dɛ hom rebɛgye dza me pɛ a ɔfa hom ho:

Hwɛ, iyi na ɔsɔ Ewuradze enyi, na abɔfo so dzi dɛw wɔ hom ho; hom ayɛdze ho mpaabɔ afow sor edu Sabaoth Ewuradze n’asomu, na wɔakyerɛw wɔ nwoma a hɔn a wɔatsew hɔn ho hɔn edzin wɔ mu no mu, hɔn a wɔwɔ celestial wiadze mu no mpo.

Dɛm ntsi, afei morosoma Ɔwerɛkyekyefo bi so ma ɔaaba hom do, hom a hom yɛ me mfɛfo do, ama ɔaatsena hom akoma mu, dza ɔyɛ anohoba Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no mpo; dɛm Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn kor noara a ɔyɛ Ɔwerɛkyekyefo no a medze bɔɔ m’esuafo anohoba no, dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no wɔ John ne dasegye mu no.
Ɔwerɛkyekyefo yi nye anohoba a medze ma hom a hom yɛ onnyiewiei nkwa no, dza ɔyɛ celestial ahenman n’enyimnyam no mpo;
Dɛm enyimnyam yi nye Abakamba n’asɔr no, nyia ɔyɛ Nyame mpo no, krɔnkrɔn nyina mu krɔnkrɔn no, a ɔnam ne Ba Jesus Christ mu no—
Nyia ɔfowee kɔr sor, dɛ ɔno ara so sianee baa ndzɛmba nyinara ase, ama ɔaatse ndzɛmba nyinara ase, ama oeedua ndzɛmba nyinara mu, nokwar kan no;
Dɛm nokwar no na ɔhyerɛn. Iyi nye Christ ne kan no. Na ɔno na ɔwɔ ewia mu so, na ɔyɛ ewia ne kan, nye tum a wɔdze yɛe no.
Dɛmara so na ɔwɔ bosoom mu, na ɔyɛ bosoom ne kan, nye tum a wɔdze yɛe no;
Dɛmara so na ɔyɛ nworaba ne kan, nye tum a wɔdze yɛɛ hɔn no;
Na asaase so, na tum a ɔwɔ mu, asaase no mpo a hom gyina do yi.
Nye kan a ɔhyerɛn yi, dza ɔma hom kan yi, dua ɔno no mu na obue hom enyi, dɛm kan yi ara so na okenyan hom ntseasee;
Dɛm kan yi na ofi Nyankopɔn n’enyim ba bɛhyɛ bea a ɔda hɔ pan kɛsenara no no mã—

Kan a ɔwɔ ndzɛmba nyinara mu, dza ɔma ndzɛmba nyinara nkwa no, dza ɔyɛ mbra a ɔhwɛ ndzɛmba nyinara do no, Nyankopɔn a ɔtse n’ahengua do no tum no mpo, nyia ɔwɔ mbersantsen no bo mu no, nyia ɔtse ndzɛmba nyina finimfin no.
Afei, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, ɔnam ɔpon a wɔayɛ ama hom no do dze nyan a wonyan fi ewufo mu no aba.
Na sunsum na honandua no nye nyimpa ne kra.
Na owusoɛr fi ewufo mu no nye ɔkra ne ɔpon.
Na ɔkra ne ɔpon nam nyia okenyan ndzɛmba nyinara no do, ɔno no bo mu na wɔhyɛɛ ɔmom dɛ ehiafo na hɔn a wɔdwe wɔ asaase yi benya ayɛ hɔn dze.
Dɛm ntsi, obehia dɛ wɔbɛtsew ho efi dza ɔnntsen nyina ho, ama woeesiesie no dze ama celestial enyimnyam no;
Na sɛ odzi ne mbɔe ho botae do a, wɔdze enyimnyam bɔbɔ no abɔtsir, wɔ Nyame Egya no mpo enyim;
Ama nyimpadua a wɔyɛ celestial ahenman mu mba no enya ayɛ hɔn dze afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ; na osian iyi ntsi wɔyɛe na wɔbɔe, na iyi ho so ntsi na wɔtseew ho.
Na hɔn a woenndua mbra a medze ama hom no do anntsew hɔnho no, dza ɔyɛ Christ ne mbra no mpo, benya ahenman fofor edzi, terrestrial ahenman anaadɛ telestial ahenman no.
Na nyia oenntum enndzi celestial ahenman ne mbra do no nnkotum atsena celestial enyimnyam no mu.
Na nyia oenntum enndzi terrestrial ahenman ne mbra do no nnkotum atsena terrestrial enyimnyam no mu.

Na nyia oenntum enndzi telestial ahenman ne mbra do no nnkotum atsena telestial enyimnyam no mu; dɛm ntsi ɔmmfata ahenman a ɔwɔ enyimnyam. Dɛm ntsi otwar dɛ ɔtsena ahenman a ɔnnyɛ enyimnyam ahenman mu.
Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, asaase dzi celestial ahenman ne mbra do, osiandɛ oedzi ne mbɔe ho botae, na ɔnntõ mbra no—
Dɛm ntsi wɔbɛtsew ho, nyew, ɔmmfa ho dɛ obowu, wobekenyan no bio, na oegyina tum a wɔdze kenyaan no ano, na atseneneefo na wobenya edzi.
Na sɛ wowu mpo a, wɔdze sunsum nyimpadua bɔsoɛr bio.

Hɔn a wɔwɔ celestial sunsum no benya dɛm nyimpadua kor noara a nna ɔyɛ nokwar nyimpadua n’awo su no; hom benya hom nyimpadua no ara mpo, na hom enyimnyam bɛyɛ enyimnyam kor no ara a okenyan hom nyimpadua no.
Hom a celestial enyimnyam ne fã bi ekenyan hom no benya ne mãhyɛ dɛmara mpo.
Na hɔn a terrestrial enyimnyam ne fã bi ekenyan hɔn no benya ne mãhyɛ dɛmara mpo.
Na hɔn so a telestial enyimnyam ne fã bi ekenyan hɔn no benya ne mãhyɛ dɛmara mpo.

Na hɔn a wɔbɛka no so wɔdze nkenyan bɛma hɔn; eso wɔbɛsan hɔn ekyir akɔ hɔnankasa hɔn bea do, akɛgye hɔn enyi wɔ dza hɔnankasa wɔpɛ dɛ wonya no ho, osiandɛ wɔammpɛ dɛ wɔgye hɔn enyi wɔ dza nkyɛ ɔsɛ dɛ wonya no ho.
Na ebɛn mfaso na sɛ wɔma nyimpa akyɛdze na ɔanngye dɛm akyɛdze no a onya? Hwɛ, n’enyi nngye dza wɔdze ama no no ho, nna n’enyi nngye nyia ɔdze akyɛdze rema no no ho.
Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ adze a mbra hwɛ do no ara so na ɔbɔ ho ban, na ɔma odzi mu na ɔtsew ho.

Na nyia ɔtõ mbra, na onndzi mbra do, na mbom ɔper dɛ ɔbɛyɛ mbra ama noho, na ɔpɛ dɛ ɔtsena bɔn mu, na adze nyina mu ɔtsena bɔn mu no, mbra nnkotum atsew no ho, anaa ehumbɔbɔr, pɛrpɛrdzi anaa atsɛmbu. Dɛm ntsi otwar dɛ wɔda ho tsena fĩ mu.
Wɔama ahenman nyina ho mbra.
Na ahenman pii wɔ hɔ; na bea pan biara nnyi hɔ a ahenman nnyi ho; nna ahenman biara so nnyi hɔ a bea pan biara nnyi ho, dɛ ɔyɛ ahenman kɛse anaa ahenman kumabaa no.
Na ahenman biara wɔama no mbra; na mbra biara wɔ mbrɛ ne hẽ na ne nhyehyɛɛ so tse.
Abɔdze nyinara a wonndzi dɛm nhyehyɛɛ yi do no wommbu hɔn bem.

Osiandɛ enyansafo fua enyansafo; nyansa nya nyansa; nokwar fua nokwar; ɔbrayɛ dɔ ɔbrayɛ, kan takyer kan, ayamuhyehye tse ma ehumbɔbɔr na ɔfa no yɛ nedze; pɛrpɛrdzi kɔ do yɛ n’edwuma dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɛ na ɔfa nankasa nedze yɛ nedze; atsɛmbu fi nyia ɔtsena ahengua no do bu na ɔyɛ ndzɛmba nyinara yie.

Ɔno na onyim adze nyinara, na adze nyinara so da n’enyim, na ndzɛmba nyinara so etwa no ho ehyia; na ɔbɔ ndzɛmba nyinara do, na ɔwɔ ndzɛmba nyinara mu, na ɔnam ndzɛmba nyinara so mu, na ɔbɔ adze nyinara ho aprɔw, na ndzɛmba nyinara so fi no hɔ, na ɔno so na ɔyɛe, Nyankopɔn afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ no mpo.
Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, ɔama ndzɛmba nyinara mbra, na wodzi hɔn dwuma wɔ hɔn aber na hyɛber ano;
Na wɔakyerɛ obiara no kwan a ɔfa do dzi no dwuma, a asaase na okyin nworaba nyina kã ho.

Na wɔma hɔnho kan wɔ hɔn aber na hyɛber ano, wɔ sima mu, wɔ hɔn ndɔnhwer mu, wɔ hɔn nda mu, wɔ hɔn adapɛn mu, wɔ hɔn abosoom mu, wɔ hɔn mfe mu—iyinom nyina yɛ afe kor ma Nyame, na ɔnnyɛ dɛm mma nyimpa.

Asaase pirepirew wɔ ne ntsaban do, na ewia ma ne kan adzekyee, na bosoom ma ne kan adzesaa, na nworaba so ma hɔn kan, ber a wopirepirew wɔ hɔn ntsaban do wɔ hɔn enyimnyam mu, wɔ Nyame no tum ne finimfin.
Ebɛnadze na memfa nto dɛm ahenman yinom ho, ma hom ntse ase?
Hwɛ, iyinom nyina yɛ ahenman, na obiara a oehu iyinom anaa oehu no mu kumaabi no ehu Nyankopɔn a ɔnam n’ahentum nye no tum mu.
Mese hom dɛ, oehu no; eso onyia no baa nankasa nedze hɔ na wɔanntse no ase.
Kan no hyerɛɛn sum mu na sum no annkyer no; eso da bi bɛba a hom bɛtse no Nyankopɔn no mpo ase, a wɔnam no do dze nkenyan bɛma hom wɔ no mu.
Afei hom bohu dɛ hom ehu me, dɛ mowɔ hɔ, na dɛ emi nye nokwar kan no a ɔwɔ hom mu no, na dɛ hom wɔ mo mu; sɛ ɔnntse dɛm a nkyɛ hom rennyɛ prɔmprɔm.
Hwɛ, medze ahenman yi bɔto nyimpa bi a ɔwɔ kwã na ɔsomaa no nkowaa wɔ kwã no mu dɛ wonkotutu kwã no mu.
Na ɔsee dza odzi kan no dɛ: Kɔ kɛyɛ edwuma wɔ mo kwã no mu, na mebɛba wo nkyɛn dɔn a odzi kan no mu, na ibohu m’enyim enyigye.
Na ɔsee dza otsĩa ebien no so dɛ: Wo so kɔ kwã no mu, na mebɛba dɔn a otsĩa ebien no medze m’enyim enyigye bɛba abɛsera wo.
Na dza otsĩa ebiasa no so ɔsee no dɛ: mebɛba abɛsera wo.
Na ɔsee dza otsĩa anan no dɛmara kesii dza otsĩa duebien no do.
Na kwã no wura no kɔr dza odzi kan no hɔ wɔ dɔn a odzi kan no mu, na otsintsimii wɔ ne nkyɛn hɔ dɛm dɔnhwer no nyinara mu, na kan a ɔwɔ no wura n’enyim no maa n’enyi gyee kɛse.
Na ɔtwee noho fii dza odzi kan no nkyɛn ama oeetum akɛsera dza otsĩa ebien no so, na dza otsĩa ebiasa nye anan, dɛm araa dze kesii duebien no do.
Na iyi maa hɔn nyinara nyaa hɔn wura n’enyim kan no, hɔn mu biara wɔ nankasa no dɔn na ne mber, na ne hyɛber mu.
Ɔhyɛɛ ase fii dza odzi kan no do dze kesii dza odzi ewiei no do, na ofii dza odzi ewiei no do dze kesii dza odzi kan no do, na ofii dza odzi kan no do dze kesii dza odzi ewiei no do.
Obiara wɔ n’esiado esiado, kɛpem dɛ no dɔn no sõe, dɛ mbrɛ no wura ahyɛ no no pɛpɛɛpɛr, ama wɔaahyɛ no wura no enyimnyam wɔ no mu, na no so wɔ no mu, ama wɔaahyɛ hɔn nyinara hɔnho enyimnyam.
Dɛm ntsi, dɛm abɛbu yi na medze to ahenman yinom nyina ho, nye hɔn a wɔwɔ mu nyina—ahenman biara wɔ noara no dɔm, na ne mber, na ne hyɛber, dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn ahyɛ ɔmom no.
Na bio, nokwar mese hom, a hom yɛ m’anyɛnkofo, dɛ migya dɛm asɛm yi mu ma hom dɛ hom ndwendwen ho wɔ hom akoma mu, na mbrasɛm a medze ma hom nye dɛ hom mfrɛ me ber a mebɛn—
Hom ntwe mbɛn me na mobɔtwe abɛn hom; hom nhwehwɛ me enyiberdo na hom bohu me; hom mbisa na hom nsa bɛkã; hom mbɔ mu, na wobobue ama hom;
Biribiara a hom bebisa Egya no wɔ me dzin mu na ho hia ma hom no, wɔdze bɛma hom;
Na sɛ hom bisa biribi a ho nnhia mma hom a, ɔbɛdan ayɛ afɔbu ama hom.

Hwɛ, dza hom tse yi tse dɛ obi ne ndze a ɔretsẽa mu wɔ sar no do—wɔ sar no do osiandɛ hom nnkotum ehu no—me ndze, osiandɛ me ndze yɛ Sunsum; mo Sunsum nye nokwar no; nokwar tsim hɔ daa na onnyi ewiei; na sɛ iyi wɔ hom mu a hom bɛyɛ prɔmprɔm.
Na sɛ hom enyiwa yɛ kor dze ma m’enyimnyam a, kan bɛhyɛ hom nyimpadua nyina mu mã, na sum biara nnkɛba hom mu; na dɛm nyimpadua no a kan ahyɛ no mã no tse ndzɛmba nyina ase.

Dɛm ntsi, hom ntsew homho ama hom adwen aayɛ kor dze ama Nyame, na nda bɛba a hom bohu no; na obeyi n’enyim akyerɛ hom, na iyi bɛyɛ hɔ wɔ nankasa ne ber mu, na nankasa no kwan do, dɛ mbrɛ nankasa ne pɛ tse.
Hom nkaa anohoba kɛse a odzi ewiei a medze bɔɔ hom no; hom nyi akwadwer adwendwen mu nye atwetwesi mbordo no mfi hom mu.
Hom ntweɔn, hom ntweɔn wɔ dɛm bea yi do, na hom nhyia mu, nkanka hɔn a wɔyɛ edwumayɛfo edzikamfo wɔ ahenman a odzi ewiei yi mu no.
Na hom mma hɔn a wɔabɔ hɔn kɔkɔ wɔ hɔn akwantu mu no mfrɛ Ewuradze, na wɔndwen kɔkɔbɔ a hɔn nsa akã no ho wɔ hɔn akoma mu hyɛber kakra.
Hom nhwɛ, na hom bohu dɛ mobɔhwɛ hom nguankuw do, na mibeyi elderfo na masoma hɔn wɔ hɔn nkyɛn.
Hwɛ, merebɛyɛ edwuma ntsɛm wɔ ne ber mu.

Na hom a hom yɛ edwumayɛfo edzikamfo wɔ ahenman a odzi ewiei yi mu, mbrasɛm a medze ma hom nye dɛ hom nhyia mu, na hom mboaboa hom ho na hom nsiesie homho, na hom ntsew homho; nyew hom ntsew hom akoma mu, na hom ntsew hom nsa na hom anan ho wɔ m’enyim, ama maatsew hom ho;

Ama maagye hom ho dase akyerɛ hom Egya, na hom Nyankopɔn, na me Nyankopɔn, dɛ hom atsew homho efi dɛm ebusuasantsen emumuyɛfo yi hɔn bɔgyaa ho; ama meedzi anohoba yi, dɛm anohoba kɛse a odzi ewiei a medze abɔ hom yi do, wɔ ber a mepɛ.
Mbrasɛm a medze ma hom so nye dɛ hom nkɔ do wɔ mpaabɔ nye akɔnkye mu ofi aber yi dze kɔ.
Na mbrasɛm a medze ma hom nye dɛ hom mfa ahenman ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no nkyerɛkyerɛ homho nkorkor.

Hom nkyerɛkyerɛ enyiberdo na m’adom bɛba hom do, na ɔbɛkyerɛkyerɛ hom wɔ emudzi mbordo mu, wɔ adwenkyerɛ nsɛm ho, nye fapem mu, nye asɛmpa ne nkyerɛkyerɛ mu, wɔ ndzɛmba nyinara a ɔfa Nyankopɔn n’ahenman ho a ohia dɛ hom tse ase no mu.

Ɔfa ndzɛmba a ɔwɔ sor nye asaase do, nye asaase n’ase; ndzɛmba a esi dada, ndzɛmba a ɔwɔ hɔ, ndzɛmba a ɔnnkɛkyɛr na aba; ndzɛmba a ɔwɔ fie, ndzɛmba a ɔwɔ ekyirekyir; na aman mu akõkoekõ nye ɔhaw, nye atsɛmbu a ɔwɔ asaase do; nye nkurow na ahenman mu nyimdzee so—
Ama sɛ mosoma hom bio a, hom eetum esiesie homho wɔ ndzɛmba nyinara mu, na hom etu mpon wɔ frɛ a medze afrɛ hom nye somdwuma a medze ahyɛ hom nsa no mu.
Hwɛ, mosomaa hom dɛ hom nkɔ nkɛgye dase na hom mbɔ nkorɔfo kɔkɔ na ɔmba no dɛ obiara a hom abɔ no kɔkɔ no, no so bɔbɔ no nua kɔkɔ.
Dɛm ntsi, ɔbɛba dɛ worinnya asɛm biara nnkã mmfa nngye hɔnho, na hɔn bɔn bogu hɔnankasa hɔn etsifi.
Nyia ɔhwehwɛ me ntsɛm no bohu me, na wɔrommpow no.

Dɛm ntsi, hom ntweɔn wɔ hɔ na hom nyɛ edwuma enyiberdo, ama hom eedzi mu wɔ hom somdwuma ne yɛ mu, na mber a odzi ewiei no hom aakɔ Amanamamfo mu, na nyimpa dodow biara a Ewuradze bobue n’ano afrɛ hɔn no, wɔmfa dasegye nkyekyer mbra no na wɔnsɔw ano, na wonsiesie ahotseweefo no mfa ntweɔn atsɛmbu ber no a ɔbɛba no;

Ama wɔaagye hɔn akra efi Nyankopɔn n’ebufuhyew mu, amamfoyɛ ekyiwadze a ɔrotweɔn emumuyɛfo wɔ wiadze yi nye dza ɔbɛba mu no. Nokwar, mese hom dɛ hom mma hɔn a wɔnnyɛ elderfo akandzifo no nkɔ do nyɛ edwuma wɔ wenyin ture no mu nkesi ber a Ewuradze bobue n’ano afrɛ hɔn, osiandɛ hɔn mber nnsõe; hɔn ntar ho nntsewee mmfii dɛm ebusuasantsen yi hɔn bɔgyaa ho.
Hom ntsena ahotɔ a ama hom enya fahodzi no mu; mma hom mmfa bɔn nnkyekyer homho, mbom hom mma hom nsa ho ntsew nkesi dɛ Ewuradze bɛba.

Na ɔnnkɛkyɛr biara na asaase apopo na ɔatɔ ntentan na oehimahima tse dɛ ɔsãbowfo, na ewia dze n’enyim bosuma, na ɔbɔpow dɛ ɔbɛma ne kan ahyerɛn; na bɔgya bɛyɛ bosoom ho; na nworaba no hɔn bo bofuw kɛse, na wɔbɛtsew atotɔ famu, tse dɛ adɔmba a ɔtsetsew fi adɔmbadua do tɔ famu.
Na hom dasegye ekyir no na ebufuhyew na ntsẽa bɛba nkorɔfo no do.
Na hom dasegye ekyir no na asaasewosow bɛba abɛgye dase, na ɔbɛma sũ wenwen aba ne finimfin, na nyimpa bɔhwehwe ase na worunntum nnsoɛr nngyina.
Na dasegye so a ɔbɛba nye wimu mpaapaamu ndze, nye enyinam ndze, nye ehum dzendzen ndze; na po asorɛkye worubu tra hɔn ahe do ndze.
Ndzɛmba nyinara bɛyɛ begyabegya; na nokwar, adasa hɔn akoma botutu; na suro bɛba nkorɔfo nyinara do.

Na abɔfo botu ekyin sor, dze ndze kɛse atsẽa mu, ahɛn Nyankopɔn no totorobɛnto ase dɛ: Hom nsiesie homho, hom nsiesie homho, O hom a hom wɔ asaase do; na Nyankopɔn n’atsɛmbu aba. Hwɛ, na hu dɛ Ayeforkun no reba; hom mpue nkehyia no kwan.
Na ntsɛmara, nsɛnkyerɛdze kɛse bi bopue sor, na nkorɔfo nyinara bɔbɔ mu ehu.

Na bɔfo bi so bɛhɛn totorobɛnto ase dɛ: Dɛm asɔr kɛse no, ebusudze ne nã no, a ɔmaa aman nyinara noom n’ebufuhyew ndwamanbɔ wenyin no, nyia ɔtseetsee Nyame n’ahotseweefo no, nyia ɔkãa hɔn bɔgyaa gui no—ɔno a ɔtse esu pii nye po n’esupruw do no—hwɛ, ɔno nye asaase do nworahaban no; wɔakyekyer no efiefi; wɔayɛ ne nkyehoma no dzen, ɔdasanyi biara nnkotum esian; dɛm ntsi wɔayɛ krado dɛ wɔrebɛhyew no. Na ɔbɛhɛn no totorobɛnto dzendzenndzen ma akyɛr, na aman nyinara bɛtse.
Na sor bɛtaa dzinn bɛyɛ dɔnhwer fã na iyi ekyir no, wɔbɛpa sor nkataenyim no ntsɛmara, tse dɛ worisiansian nwoma mbobɔwee mu, na Ewuradze n’enyim bɛda hɔ;
Na wɔdze nkenyan bɛma ahotseweefo a wɔwɔ asaase do a wɔtse nkwa mu no, na wobohwim hɔn akɔ sor ekehyia no kwan.
Na hɔn a wɔadeda wɔ hɔn nda mu no bɔsoɛr epue, osiandɛ hɔn nda do bobuebue; na hɔn so wɔbɛfa hɔn akɔ sor ekehyia no kwan wɔ sor fadum ne finimfin—

Wɔyɛ Christ dze, eduaba kan no, hɔn na wobedzi kan nye no esian, na hɔn a wɔwɔ asaase do nye hɔn a wɔwɔ hɔn nda mu, hɔn a wodzii kan kehyiaa no no; na iyi nyinara besi ber a Nyankopɔn no bɔfoe no bɛhɛn totorobɛnto no.

Na iyi ekyir no, bɔfo bi so bɛhɛn abɛn, na iyi nye totorobɛnto a otsĩa ebien no; na iyi ekyir hɔn a wɔyɛ Christ dze a ɔapon hɔn no aber a ɔbae no bɛba; hɔn a wonyaa hɔn kyɛfa wɔ efiadze a wosiesiei maa hɔn no ama hɔn nsa aakã asɛmpa no, na woeebu hɔn atsɛn tse dɛ nyimpa a wɔwɔ honam mu.
Na bio, wɔbɛhɛn totorobɛnto bi so, iyi nye totorobɛnto a otsĩa ebiasa; na iyi ekyir no nyimpa a ɔsɛ dɛ wobu hɔn atsɛn no hɔn esunsum bɛba, na wobohu hɔn dɛ wɔhyɛ afɔbu ase;
Na woyinom nye ewufo a wɔaka no; na wɔnnkɛtsena nkwa mu bio kesi dɛ mfe apem no bɛba n’ewiei, eso wɔnnkɛba bio, kesi wiadze n’ewiei.
Na wɔbɛhɛn totorobɛnto bi so bio, ɔno nye totorobɛnto a otsĩa anan no, bɛse dɛ: Woehu hɔn a ɔsɛ dɛ wɔka kɛpem da kɛse a odzi ewiei no mu, na ekyir no mpo, hɔn a wɔaka no bɛda ho ayɛ efĩfĩfo.

Na wɔbɛhɛn totorobɛnto kor bi so, ɔno nye totorobɛnto a otsĩa enum no, ɔno nye ɔbɔfo a otsia enum no na ɔno na asɛmpa a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no hyɛ ne nsa—obotu ekyin wimu, wɔ sor, wɔ aman, ebusuakuw, kasahorow, nye nkorɔfo nyinara do;

Na ɔbɛhɛn no totorobɛnto no ase nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ sor nye asaase do nyinara, nye hɔn a wɔwɔ asaase n’ase—na aso biara bɛtse, na anankoroma biara bobu ntwɛr, na tɛkyerɛma biara agye dase, ber a wɔbɛtse totorobɛnto yi ndze, rese dɛ: Hom nsuro Nyankopɔn, na hom mfa enyimnyam mma nyia ɔtse ahengua no do no afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ; osiandɛ n’atsɛmbuber no asõ.
Na bio, ɔbɔfo bi so bɛhɛn totorobɛnto, na ɔno nye bɔfo a otsĩa esia no, na ɔbɛse dɛ: Ɔbaa no a ɔmaa aman nyina noom n’ebufuhyew edwamanbɔ wenyin no ahwe ase; ɔahwe ase, ɔahwe ase!

Na bio, ɔbɔfo bi so bɛhɛn totorobɛnto, ɔno nye bɔfo a otsĩa esuon no, na ɔbɛse dɛ: Oewie; oewie! Nyankopɔn n’Eguambaa no nko na oedzi konyim na oetsia wenyintwer no do, Otumfo Nyankopɔn n’ebufuhyew dzendzen wenyintwer no mpo.
Na afei wɔdze no tum enyimnyam kyɛw no bɔsoa abɔfo no, na wɔdze n’enyimnyam no ahyɛ ahotseweefo no mã, na hɔn nsa akã hɔn egyapadze no na wɔama wɔnye no abɛyɛ pɛr.
Na afei, ɔbɔfo a odzi kan no bɛhɛn no totorobɛnto no bio egu atseasefo nyinara asomu, na oeyi adasa hɔn nsumaamu ndzeyɛɛ ato gua, nye Nyankopɔn no tum ndwuma wɔ mfe apem a odzi kan no mu.

Na afei, ɔbɔfo a otsĩa ebien no bɛhɛn no totorobɛnto no, na oeyi adasa hɔn nsumaamu ndzeyɛɛ ato gua, nye hɔn adwen mu nye hɔn akoma mu nsusui, nye Nyankopɔn no tum ndwuma wɔ mfe apem a otsĩa ebien no mu—

Dɛmara, kɛpem dɛ ɔbɔfo a otsĩa esuon no bɛhɛn no totorobɛnto no; na ɔbɔsoɛr egyina asaase na po do, na ɔakã ntam wɔ nyia ɔtse ahengua do no ne dzin mu, na mber nnyi hɔ bio; na wɔbɛkyekyer Satan, dɛm abowatsena dadaw no a wɔfrɛ no abɔnsam no, na worinnsian no bɛyɛ mfe apem ntamu.
Na afei, wobesian no mber kakra, ama oeetum aboaboa no nsordaafo ano.
Na Michael, ɔbɔfo a otsĩa esuon no, bɔfopanyin no, bɔboaboa no nsordaafo ano sor dɔmtutuw no mpo.
Na abɔnsam no so bɔboaboa no nsordaafo ano; hɛl dɔm no, na wɔbɛba na wɔnye Michael na no nsordaafo no abɔkõ.
Na afei, Nyankopɔn Kokroko no kõ no besi, na wɔbɔtow abɔnsam na no nsordaafo no akyen hɔnankasa hɔn bea do, amma woeennya tum bio wɔ ahotseweefo no do.
Osiandɛ, Michael bɔkõ ama hɔn, na obedzi nyia ɔrohwehwɛ agye nyia ɔtse ahengua no do no, ɔyɛ Eguambaa no mpo, n’ahengua no no do konyim.
Iyi nye Nyankopɔn n’enyimnyam na hɔn a wɔatsew hɔnho no; na worunnhu owu bio.
Dɛm ntsi, nokwar, mese hom, m’anyɛnkofo, hom mfrɛ hom awɔse nhyiamu no, dɛ mbrɛ mahyɛ hom no.

Na dɛ mbrɛ hom nyina nnyi gyedzi no, hom mper nhwehwɛ enyiber do na hom nkyerɛkyerɛ homho enyansasɛm no nkorkor; nyew, hom nhwehwɛ mfi enyansasɛm nwoma a odzi mu no mu; hom mper nsũa nwoma na hom ndua adzesua mpo nye gyedzi so do.

Hom mboaboa homho; na hom nsiesie biribiara a ohia no yie; na hom nsi ofi, ofi a wɔbɔ mpaa wɔ mu, ofi a wɔkyen kɔm wɔ mu, gyedzi fi, nwomasũa fi, enyimnyam fi, ofi a no mu ndzɛmba wɔyɛ no esiado esiado, Nyankopɔn ne fi;
Ama hom mbae aayɛ wɔ Ewuradze ne dzin mu; ama hom nkɔree ayɛ wɔ Ewuradze ne dzin mu ama hom nkyia nyina aayɛ wɔ Ewuradze ne dzin mu, na hom ama hom nsa do wɔ sor dze ama Ɔsorsornyi no.
Dɛm ntsi, hom ngyaa hom kasahun no, na hom ngyaa hom atwetwesi, hom ngyaa akɔndɔbɔn no, nye hom ahantanyɛ, nye hom adwenhun no, na hom ngyaa hom emumuyɛdze no.

Hom nyi kyerɛkyerɛnyi mma homho, na mma hom nyina mmbɔ mu nnkasa prɛko, mbom hom nkasa nkorkor na hom mma obiara ntsie nyia ɔrekasa no, ama sɛ hom nyinara kasa wie a, hom nyina aama homho ntowdo, na hom ndzinoa aayɛ pɛr.
Hom nhwɛ ndodɔ homho nkorkor; hom nngyaa dɛ hom yɛ edzifodzipɛfo; hom nsũa dɛ hom mmfa hom ahodze mmema homho nkorkor dɛ mbrɛ asɛmpa no kyerɛ.

Hom nngyaa dɛ hom yɛ enyihaw; hom nngyaa dɛ hom yɛ efĩfĩdze; hom nngyaa dɛ hom hwehwɛ mfom wɔ hom ho nkorkor; hom nngyaa dɛ hom bɛda ma ɔatra do; hom nda ntsɛm, amma hom aammfona; hom nsoɛr ntsɛm, ama hom mpɔw mu aayɛ hom dzen na hom adwen mu so aatsew.
Na ndzɛmba nyinara ekyir no, hom mfa ayamuyie mfura homho, iyi nye emudzi na asomdwee mapã.
Hom mbɔ mpaa aber nyina amma hom aanntɔ bitsi, kɛpem dɛ mebɛba. Hom nhwɛ na hom nhu dɛ, mebɛba ntsɛm, na mabɛfa hom akɔ mankasa me nkyɛn. Amen.

Na bio, dan a wosiesiei dze maa nkɔnhyɛfo skuul ne president na n’apamfo no, dza wosii maa hɔn ma wɔakyerɛkyerɛ hɔn ndzɛmba nyinara a ohia ma hɔn no, asɔr no mu dzibewdzifo no nyina mpo, mekyerɛ hɔn a wɔafrɛ hɔn wɔ ɔsomdwumadzi mu wɔ asɔr no mu no, ɔhyɛ ase fi asɔfompanyin do dze besi deaconfo do—

Na iyi nye nhyehyɛɛ a wɔayɛ a ɔfa president na n’apamfo a ɔbɔhwɛ skuul no do ho! Nyia woeyi no esi hɔ dɛ president anaadɛ kyerɛkyerɛnyi no, wobu no dɛ ogyina ne gyinabew, wɔ dan a woesiesie ama no no.
Dɛm ntsi obedzi kan wɔ Nyame ne fie hɔ, na oegyina bea a mboanofo a wɔwɔ hɔ no botum atse ne nsɛm a ɔrekã no yie, nnyɛ dɛ ɔbɛkasa dzendzenndzen bi.
Na sɛ ɔreba Nyame ne fie a, ɔsɛ dɛ ɔno na odzi kan kɔ fie no mu—Hwɛ, dɛm na ɔyɛ fɛw, ama ɔaayɛ fasusu—
Hom mma ombu ntwɛr mbɔ mpaa mfa noho mbɔ afɔr mma Nyankopɔn, mfa nkyerɛ anaa mfa nkaa ahyɛmu a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no.
Na sɛ obi si n’ekyir ba a, ɔsɛ dɛ kyerɛkyerɛnyi no soɛr na ɔma ne nsa do kyerɛ sor, nyew, na ɔtsen wɔ no do, na okyia no nua no anaa no nuanom no na ɔkã dɛm nsɛm yi:

Ana eyɛ onua anaadɛ hom yɛ enuanom? Mikyia hom wɔ Ewuradze Jesus Christ ne dzin mu dze kaa ahyɛmudzi a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no, dɛm ahyɛmu no na medze gye wo wɔ fɛkuwbɔ mu, wɔ nhyehyɛɛ a otsim, onnhihim, na ɔnnsakyer da mu, dɛ mebɛyɛ wo nyɛnko na wo nuabanyin wɔ Nyankopɔn n’adom a ɔwɔ ɔdɔ fɛkuwbɔ mu no, yɛbɛnantsew Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm nyinara mu, dɛ afɔdzi nnyi ho wɔ ndaase mu, afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ. Amen.
Na nyia wobohu no dɛ onndzi mu dɛ wokyia no dɛm nkyia yi no, ɔnnsɛ dɛ ɔtsena hom mu; osiandɛ ɔnnsɛ dɛ wɔma kwan ma obogu me fie fĩ.

Na nyia ɔbɛba mu no, sɛ ɔyɛ nokwafo wɔ m’enyim, na sɛ ɔyɛ onua, anaadɛ wɔyɛ enuanom a, wɔbɛma hɔn nsa do wɔ sor na wɔdze dɛm mpaabɔ na ahyɛmudzi nkyia yi so ara ekyia president no anaadɛ kyerɛkyerɛnyi no, anaadɛ wɔbɛse Amen, dze agye ne nkyia no do.
Hwɛ, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, iyi nye nhwɛdo nkyia a ɔsɛ dɛ hom dze kyiakyia homho nkorkor wɔ Nyame ne fie, wɔ nkɔnhyɛfo skuul hɔ.

Na wɔafrɛ hom dɛ hom mfa mpaabɔ na ndaase nyɛ dɛm adze yi, dɛ mbrɛ Sunsum no bɛkyerɛ hom dɛ hom nyɛ wɔ hom nyɛe nyinara mu wɔ Ewuradze ne fie, wɔ nkɔnhyɛfo skuul hɔ, ama hɔ aayɛ krɔnkrɔnbea, Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn ne ntamadan, ama hom eenya ntowdo.
Na mma hom nngye obiara nnkã homho wɔ dɛm skuul ha, gyedɛ onyia no atsew noho efi dɛm ebusuasantsen yi bɔgyaa ho;
Na sɛ wɔbɛgye no ato mu a, ɔsɛ dɛ wɔyɛ ananho hohor ayɛdze no ma no, osiandɛ iyi ho ntsi na wɔyɛɛ dɛm ananho hohor ayɛdze no.
Na bio, dɛm ananho hohor ayɛdze yi no, asɔr no mu president, anaa elder banodzinyi no na ɔsɛ dɛ ɔyɛ.

Sɛ wɔrebɛyɛ a, ɔsɛ dɛ wɔdze mpaabɔ hyɛ ase; na sɛ wodzi paanoo na wɔnom wenyin no so wie a, ɔwɔ dɛ ɔbɔ n’asen do dɛ nhwɛdo a wɔakyerɛw wɔ John ne dasegye nwoma ne tsir duebiasa mu no a ɔfa mo ho no. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/89.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 89
chapter_summary: 1–9, Wɔbra wenyin, nsãdzen, towa na anondze a ɔyɛ hyew; 10–17, Wohyira nhaban, nduadzewa, bɔnam na ewifua do ma nyimpa na mbowa dɛ wondzi; 18–21, Asɛmpa ne mbra, nye Enyansasɛm ho setsie dze honam mu na sunsum mu nhyira ba.

verses.text: Enyansasɛm a ɔbɛyɛ mfaso ama asɔfompanyin abaguafo a woehyia mu wɔ Kirtland, nye asɔr, nye ahotseweefo so a wɔwɔ Zion—

Wɔrebrɛ hom nhyira; nnyɛ mbrasɛm kwan do, nna nnyɛ nhyɛ kwan do so, mbom wɔ nyikyerɛ nye enyansasɛm kwan do a ɔkyerɛ nhyehyɛɛ na Nyankopɔn ne pɛ a ɔbɛma ahotseweefo nyina enya hɔn honandua mu nkwagye wɔ nda a odzi ewiei yi mu—
Ɔyɛ nhyehyɛe a anohoba bata ho a wɔdze ama a wɔadan no ama ahotseweefo a wɔyɛ mberɛw anaa wɔyɛ mberɛw koraa; hɔn a wɔyɛ anaa yebotum afrɛ hɔn ahotseweefo.

Hwɛ, nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se hom: Ɔnam bɔn na nhyehyɛɛ a ɔbɔwɔ nkorɔfo a wosusu bɔn wɔ hɔn akoma mu wɔ nda a odzi ewiei yi mu ntsi, mabɔ hom kɔkɔ, na medze dɛm nyikyerɛ a ɔyɛ enyansasɛm yi rema hom dze abɔ hom kɔkɔ—
Dɛ susuampaara dɛ obi wɔ hom mu a ɔnom wenyin anaa nsãdzen no, hwɛ ɔnnyɛ adze pa, nna ɔnnyɛ adze pa so wɔ hom Egya n’enyi do, gyedɛ hom ehyia mu ridzi hom sacrament wɔ n’enyim nko.
Na, hwɛ, iyi so mpo wɔ dɛ ɔyɛ wenyin, nyew, wenyin krɔngyekrɔngye a ofi wenyindua do a homankasa ayɛ.
Na, bio, nsãdzen onnye mma hom yafun, mbom hom mfa nguar hom nyimpadua—
Na bio, towa onnye mma nyimpadua no, nna onnye so mma yafun, na onnye mma nyimpa, mbom ɔyɛ habandur a wɔdze yɛ ekur mu nye anantwi a wɔyar, ɔsɛ dɛ nyia ɔawea ho na ɔdze yɛ na ɔyɛ no no kwan do.
Na bio, anondze a ɔyɛ hyew so onnye mma nyimpadua anaadɛ yafun.
Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, nhaban pa nyina Nyame ehyira do ama nyimpa, ama ne bɔbea, awoo su, na dɛ nyimpa ndzi—
Nhabanhaban biara a ɔsow wɔ ne hyɛber mu, nye nduaba biara so a ɔsow wɔ ne hyɛber mu; iyinom nyinara ɔsɛ dɛ wodzi no nyansa mu na wɔda ase wɔ ho.
Nyew, hamu mbowa nye wimu nnoma so hɔn nam, emi Ewuradze mehyira do ama nyimpa dɛ wondzi na wɔnda ase wɔ ho; na mbom wonsɔn ndzi no nyansa mu.
Na ɔbɛyɛ me enyigye dɛ wonnkedzi gyedɛ awɔwber anaa awɔw mu, anaa ɔkɔmber mu nko.

Ewifua nyina woehyira do ama nyimpa na mbowa dɛ wondzi, dɛ ɔnyɛ nkwa poma, nnyɛ nyimpa nko dze, na mbom hamu mbowa, nye sor ntumbowa, nye mbowa abɔyafo nyinara a wotu enguan anaa wɔwea wɔ asaase do so dze;
Na iyinom na Nyankopɔn abɔ ama nyimpa dɛ wondzi wɔ ɔkɔmber mu nko anaadɛ ber a ɔkɔm esi dzendzenndzen no.
Ewifua nyina yɛ edziban pa ma nyimpa; dɛmara na wenyin n’eduaba so ye; dua biara a ɔsow eduaba, dɛ ɔwɔ asaase do, anaadɛ ɔsor.

Eso, ewifua ye ma nyimpa, na eburow ye ma anantwi, na oats so ye ma mpɔnkɔ, na rye so ye ma nnoma nye mpreko, nye mbowa nyina a wɔwɔ haban mu, na atoko dze oye ma mbowa a hɔn ho hia, na wɔdze yɛ mborɔnsã dɛ mbrɛ wɔdze ewifua binom so yɛ.
Na ahotseweefo nyina a wɔkaa na wodzi nsɛm yinom do, na wɔyɛ setsie dze mbrasɛm no bɔ hɔn bra no benya apɔwmudzen wɔ hɔn funuma mu, na woenya ehuon ama hɔn mbiew;
Na wobenya nyansa na nyimdzee mu ehutudze kɛsenara, nsumaamu ehutudze no.
Na wobotu mbirika na wɔnnkɛberɛ, na wɔbɛnantsew na wɔnnkɔtɔ bitsi.
Na Emi, Ewuradze mobɔ hɔn anohoba, dɛ bɔfo ɔsɛɛfo no bɛpa hɔn ho dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛe maa Israelmba no, na orunnkum hɔn. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/90.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 90
chapter_summary: 1–5, Wɔdze ahenman ne nsaafee no ama Joseph Smith, na wodua no do dze ma Asɔr no; 6–7, Sidney Rigdon na Frederick G. Williams wɔ dɛ wɔsom wɔ President a Odzi Kan na n’Apamfo no mu; 8–11, Ɔwɔ dɛ wɔka asɛmpa no kyerɛ Israel aman, nye Amanamamfo, na Jewfo no; obiara wɔ dɛ ɔtse wɔ nankasa ne kasaa mu; 12–18, Joseph Smith na n’apamfo no wɔdɛ wɔtoto Asɔr no mu ndzɛmba esiado esiado; 19–37, Ewuradze tu ankorankor fo dɛ wɔnnantsew tɔɔtsen mu na wɔnsom wɔ N’ahenman mu.

verses.text: Dɛm na Ewuradze se, nokwar, nokwar, mese ɔwo me babanyin dɛ, wɔdze wo bɔn akyɛ wo, dɛ mbrɛ apa ho kyɛw no, osiandɛ ɔwo nye wo nuanom hom mpaabɔ afow sor edu m’asomu.
Dɛm ntsi, ofi ndɛ kɔ woehyira wo, ɔwo na wɔdze ahenman no ne nsaafee ekitsa wo nsamu; dɛm ahenman no a ɔreba mber a odzi ewiei mu no.
Nokwar, mese wo dɛ wɔnnkɛgye ahenman yi ne nsaafee efi wo nsamu da wɔ ber a etse wiadze yi mu, nna wɔnnkɛgye so wɔ wiadze a ɔreba no mu;
Eso wobodua wo do ama binom ehu hɔn ndaamba dza obesi hɔn do, nyew, dze ama asɔr no mpo.

Na hɔn a hɔn nsa bɛkã hɔn ndaamba dza obesi hɔn do yi efi Nyame hɔ no nhwɛ yie wɔ mbrɛ wosi suo mu ho amma woeemmbu no adze tootooba, na wɔaammbɛhyɛ afɔbu ase, mma woeemmfintsiw, na sɛ ehum tu na mframa bɔ, na nsu tɔ, na ɔhwe hɔn adan a, wɔaannhwe ase.
Na bio, nokwar, mese wo nuanom Sidney Rigdon na Frederick G. Williams dɛ, wɔdze hɔn so hɔn bɔn akyɛ hɔn, na wɔdze hɔn akã wo ho dɛ hom nyɛ pɛr nkura ahenman a odzi ewiei yi ne nsaafee.
Na ɔnam wo dwumadzi mu na medze nkɔnhyɛfo skuul no a mahyɛ wo dɛ kyekyer no so ne nsaafee ahyɛ wo nsamu;
Na dɛm bɛma woeedzi mu wɔ hɔn ɔsomdwumadzi no mu dze ama Zion ne nkwagye, nye Israel aman, nye Amanamamfo dodowara a wɔbɛgye edzi no hɔn nkwagye;
Ama ɔnam wo dwumadzi do hɔn nsa aakã asɛm no, na wɔnam hɔn dwumadzi do asɛm no akɔ asaase ano nyina, obedzi kan akɔ Amanamamfo hɔ, na afei, hwɛ, na hu dɛ wɔbɛsan aba Jewfo hɔ.
Na nkyii no da no bɛba a Ewuradze no tum bɛda n’abasa edzi wɔ tum mu ma aman, abosonsɔrfo aman, Joseph fifo agye hɔn nkwagye ho asɛmpa no edzi.

Na ɔbɛba dɛ dɛm da no, ɔdasanyi biara bɛtse asɛmpa no ne mãhyɛ no wɔ nankasa ne kasaa mu, na wɔnam hɔn a wɔdze tum yi ahyɛ hɔn asɔfo nye Ɔwerɛkyekyefo no a woehue egu hɔn do no no dwumadzi do a ɔma woyi Jesus Christ kyerɛ.
Na afei, nokwar mese wo dɛ, dɛm mbrasɛm yi na medze ma wo dɛ kɔ do yɛ ɔsomdwuma no na kã president na n’apamfo no ho.
Na sɛ ekyerɛ nkɔnhyɛsɛm no ase wie a, ofitsi dɛm aber no dze kɔ, hwɛ asɔr no nye skuul no ho nsɛnkaa do;
Na ofi ber to ber, dɛ ma Ɔwerɛkyekyefo no bɛda no edzi akyerɛ wo no, ebenya nyikyerɛ a ɔbɛma ada ahenman no n’esumasɛm edzi;
Na atoto nsɔr mu ndzɛmba nyina esiado esiado, na esũa na ehu na ebohu nwoma apapa nyina, na atse kasa na kasa horow na nkorɔfo so ase.
Na iyi nye hom edwuma wɔ hom nkwa nda nyina mu, hom bedzi bano wɔ abaguafo do na hom ahwɛ atoto asɔr yi nye ahenman no mu nsɛnkaa nyina esiado esiado.
Mma hom enyi nntõ, eso mma hom mmfɛr; mbom hom ngye afotu amma hom tsir mu annyɛ hom dɛw na hom ammema homho do, osiandɛ dɛm bosua hom akra efir.
Hom ntoto hom efiefi mu ndzɛmba yie; hom nyi enyihaw na dza ho nntsew akwa.
Afei, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, hwehwɛ tsenabew ma wo pamfo na kyerɛwfo, Frederick G. Williams mpo, n’ebusua ntsɛmara.
Na ma m’akowaa a n’enyi efir, Joseph Smith, Panyin, nye n’ebusua nkɔ do ntsena bea a wɔtse seseiara no; na mma wɔnntɔn kesi dɛ Ewuradze bobue n’ano akã.
Na ma me pamfo Sidney Rigdon mpo nda ho ntsena bea a ɔtse seseiara no nkesi dɛ Ewuradze bobue n’ano akã.
Na ma bishop no nhwehwɛ ananmusinyi enyiberdo, na dɛm nyimpa no wɔ dɛ ɔyɛ obi a ɔwɔ ne sika—Nyame nyimpa, na ne gyedzi yɛ dzen—
Ama oeetum etua kaw biara; amma nkorɔfo eennhu na wɔaannkasa enngu Ewuradze n’adzekorabea ho fĩ.

Hom nhwehwɛ enyiber do, na hom mbɔ mpaa aber nyina, na hom ngye ndzi, na sɛ hom nantsew tsenenee kwan do, na hom kaa ahyɛmu a hom nye homho edzidzi nkorkor no a, ndzɛmba nyina bɔkɔ do yie ama hom yieyɛ.
Hom mma hom ebusua ebusua nyɛ kakraba, nkanka m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Panyin, a n’enyi efir no, ɔfa hɔn a wɔnnkã w’ebusuafo ho no;
Ama dɛm ndzɛmba no a woesiesie ato hɔ dɛ fa yɛ m’edwuma no, wɔaanngye emmfi wo nsamu aammfa amma hɔn a wɔmmfata—
Na dɛm no besiw wo kwan ma irunntum nnyɛ ndzɛmba a mahyɛ wo dɛ yɛ no.
Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, ɔyɛ mepɛ dɛ hom ma m’abaawa Vienna Jaques sika ma ɔdze twa noho esu kɔ Zion asaase do;
Na sika a ɔbɛka no, wonhyira do mma me, na obenya n’akatua wɔ mankasa me mber mu.
Nokwar, mese hom dɛ, ɔtsen wɔ m’enyi do dɛ ɔbɔkɔ Zion asaase do, na ɔakɛgye egyapadze efi bishop no hɔ;
Ama mber dodow biara a obedzi nokwar no ɔaatsena asomdwee mu, na ofi dɛm da no kɔ no mma ɔnnyɛ enyihaw wɔ n’abrabɔ mu.
Na hwɛ, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, hom nkyerɛw mbrasɛm yi, na hom nse hom nuanom a wɔwɔ Zion dɛ, hom kyia hɔn wɔ ɔdɔ mu, na dɛ mafrɛ hom so dɛ hom nhwɛ Zion do wɔ mankasa me mber mu.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mma wongyaa me haw wɔ dɛm nsɛm yi ho.
Hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, hom nuanom a wɔwɔ Zion no ahyɛ ase runu hɔnho, na abɔfo ridzi dɛw wɔ hɔn ho.

Naaso, m’enyi nngye ndzɛmba pii ho; na m’enyi nngye m’akowaa William E. McLellin ho, nna m’enyi nngye m’akowaa Sidney Gilbert ho; nye bishop so ho; na binom so wɔ ndzɛmba pii a ɔsɛ dɛ wonu hɔnho wɔ ho.
Na nokwar, mese hom dɛ, emi, Ewuradze, menye Zion bedzi esi, na matotɔ aserɛ n’ahoɔdzenfo na matsẽa no ekesi dɛ obedzi do nyim na no ho atsew wɔ m’enyim.
Na worinnyi no mmfi n’ananmu. Emi, Ewuradze, na makã. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/91.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 91
chapter_summary: 1–3, Esumadze no mu dodowara wɔkyerɛɛ ase yie na mbom no mu pii so nkorɔfo na wɔdze kãa ho a ɔnnyɛ nokwar; 4–6, Hɔn a sunsum no ama hɔn nyimdzee no nya mfaso fi mu.

verses.text: Nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se wɔ Esumadze no ho—Ndzɛmba pii wɔ mu a ɔyɛ nokwar, na wɔkyerɛɛ ase yie so;
Ndzɛmba pii so wɔ mu a ɔnnyɛ nokwar, dza adasa kyerɛwee dze kãa ho no.
Nokwar, mese hom dɛ, onnhia dɛ wɔbɛkyerɛ Esumadze no ase.
Dɛm ntsi, nyia ɔkenkan no, ɔntse ase, osiandɛ Sunsum no na ɔda nokwar edzi;
Na nyia Sunsum no ama no nyimdzee no benya mfaso efi mu;
Na nyia ɔnnam Sunsum do no nya no, onnkenya mu mfaso biara. Dɛm ntsi onnhia dɛ wɔbɛkyerɛ ase. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/92.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 92
chapter_summary: 1–2, Ewuradze ma mbrasɛm a ɔfa mbrɛ wosi gye obi to nkabɔmu nhyehyɛɛ no mu.

verses.text: Nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se, medze nyikyerɛ na mbrasɛm no a ɔfa m’akowaa Frederick G. Williams ho no ma nkabɔmu kuw, a wɔahyehyɛ no dɛ mbrasɛm a meedzi kan dze ama no, dɛ hom ngye no nto kuw no mu. Dza mekã kyerɛ kor no mekã kyerɛ obiara.
Na bio, mese ɔwo m’akowaa Frederick G. Williams, dɛ ebɔbɔ hyew wɔ kuw yi mu, na mber dodow biara a ibedzi mbrasɛm dadaw ne nyina do wɔ gyedzi mu no, wobehyira wo afebɔɔ. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/93.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 93
chapter_summary: 1–5, Hɔn a wodzi nokwar nyina bohu Ewuradze; 6–18, John gyee dase dɛ Nyankopɔn ne Ba no fii adom mu kɔr adom mu kɛpem dɛ Ne nsa kãa Egya no n’enyimnyam ne mãhyɛ no; 19–20, Nkorɔfo a wodzi nokwar na wofi adom mu kɔ adom mu no, so hɔn nsa bɛkã N’amãhyɛ no; 21–22, Hɔn a wɔnam Christ mu awo hɔn no yɛ Abakamba N’Asɔr no; 23–28, Christ ne nsa kãa nokwar nyina ne mãhyɛ no, na nyimpa so nam setsie do ne nsa bɛkã; 29–32, Ahyɛse no nna nyimpa nye Nyame wɔ hɔ; 33–35, Adzebɔdze no yɛ onnyiewiei, na nyimpa ne nsa botum akã enyigye ne mãhyɛ wɔ Owusoɛr no mu; 36–37, Nyankopɔn n’enyimnyam nye nyansa; 38–40, Osian Christ ne ɔpon no ntsi, mbofra nnyi mbrato wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim; 41–53, Wɔhyɛ enuanom a wodzi bano no dɛ wɔnhwɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua yie dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɛ.

verses.text: Nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se: Ɔbɛba dɛ ɔkra biara a obegyaa no bɔn yɛ na ɔbɛba mo hɔ, na ɔbɔbɔ me dzin afrɛ me, na obetsie me ndze, na obedzi me mbrasɛm do no, obohu m’enyim na oehu dɛ metse ase;
Na dɛ Emi nye nokwar kan no a ɔma ɔdasanyi biara a ɔba wiadze yi mu kan no;
Na dɛ mowɔ Egya no mu, na Egya no so wɔ mo mu, na Egya no na Emi yɛ kor—
Egya no, osiandɛ ɔmaa me ne mãhyɛ no, nna Ɔba no osiandɛ mowɔ wiadze na meyɛɛ honam me ntamadan, na metsenaa adasamba mu.
Nna mowɔ wiadze mu na megyee fii m’Egya no hɔ, na no ndwuma daa edzi pefee.
Na John hunii na ɔgyee dase wɔ m’enyimnyam ne mãhyɛ ho, na John ne kyerɛwsɛm ne mãhyɛ no, wɔbɛda no edzi ekyir yi.
Na ɔgyee dase see dɛ: Muhun n’enyimnyam, dɛ ahyɛse no nna ɔwɔ hɔ, ansaana wɔrobɔ wiadze;
Dɛm ntsi, ahyɛse no nna Asɛm no wɔ hɔ, na ɔno nye Asɛm no, nkwagye no somafo no mpo—
Wiadze ne kan na Pomfo no; nokwar no Sunsum no, nyia ɔbaa wiadze no, osiandɛ ɔno na ɔbɔɔ wiadze, na no mu na nyimpa no nkwa na ne kan wɔ.
Ɔno na ɔbɔɔ wiadze; ɔno na ɔbɔɔ nyimpa; ɔno na ɔyɛɛ ndzɛmba nyina wɔnam no do, na wɔnam no mu, ɔnoara so na ɔyɛe.
Na emi, John, megye dase dɛ muhun n’enyimnyam, dɛ nyia Egya Woo no Kortoo no no n’enyimnyam a adom na nokwar ahyɛ no mã, ɔyɛ nokwar Sunsum no mpo, ɔno a ɔbae na ɔbɛtsenaa honam mu na ɔnye hɛn tsenae.
Na emi, John, muhun dɛ ne nsa annkã mãhyɛ no fi ahyɛse no, mbom onyae fii adom mu kɔr adom mu.
Na oennya mãhyɛ no fi ahyɛse, mbom ɔkɔr do fii adom mu kɔr adom mu, kɛpem dɛ onyaa mãhyɛ no.
Na dɛm na ɔmaa wɔfrɛɛ no Nyankopɔn ne Ba, osiandɛ oennya mãhyɛ no fi ahyɛse no.
Na emi, John, megye dase, na hwɛ, sor buei, na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no sianee baa no do wɔ ebubur no su do, na obesii no do, na ndze fi sor see dɛ: Oyi nye mo dɔ Ba no.
Na emi, John, megye dase dɛ ne nsa kãa Egya n’enyimnyam ne mãhyɛ no;
Na ne nsa kãa tum nyina a ɔwɔ sor nye asaase, na Egya n’enyimnyam no bɛkãa no ho, osiandɛ nna ɔtse no mu.
Na ɔbɛba dɛ, sɛ hom dzi nokwar a, hom nsa bɛkã John ne kyerɛwsɛm ne mãhyɛ no.
Medze nsɛm yinom ma hom ama hom aatse ase na hom ehu mbrɛ wosi sɔr, na hom ehu dza hom rosɔr, ama hom aaba Egya no hɔ wɔ me dzin mu, na hom nsa akã ne mãhyɛ no wɔ ne mber mu.
Na sɛ hom dzi me mbrasɛm do a hom nsa bɛkã ne mãhyɛ no, na wɔahyɛ hom enyimnyam wɔ mo mu dɛ mbrɛ mowɔ Egya no mu; dɛm ntsi, mese hom dɛ, hom nsa bɛkã adom akɔ adom mu.
Na afei, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, ahyɛse no, nna menye Egya no wɔ hɔ, na emi nye Abakan no;
Na hɔn a wɔnam mo mu awo hɔn nyinara yɛ fafafo wɔ dɛm enyimnyam kor noara so mu, na wɔyɛ Abakan n’asɔr no.
Ahyɛse no, nna hom so hom nye Egya no wɔ hɔ, dza ɔyɛ Sunsum no, ɔyɛ nokwar Sunsum no;
Na nokwar nye ndzɛmba a nkyɛ ɔwɔ hɔ, nye dza ɔwɔ hɔ seseiara, nye dza ɔbɛba no ho nyimdzee;
Na biribiara a ɔbor do anaa ɔtɔ sin wɔ iyi ho no yɛ omumuyɛnyi no a ɔyɛ ɔtorfo fi ahyɛse no no sunsum.
Nokwar Sunsum no fi Nyame. Emi nye nokwar Sunsum no, na John gyee mo ho dase see dɛ: Ne nsa kãa nokwar ne mãhyɛ no, nyew, nokwar nyinara no;
Na nyimpa biara ne nsa rennkã ne mãhyɛ gyedɛ odzi ne mbrasɛm do.
Nyia odzi ne mbrasɛm do no nya nokwar na kan kɛpem dɛ wɔbɛhyɛ no enyimnyam wɔ nokwar no mu, na onyim ndzɛmba nyinara.
Nyimpa so, nna ahyɛse no ɔnye Nyame wɔ hɔ. Nyansa anaadɛ nokwar kan no, wɔammbɔ anaadɛ wɔannyɛ no, eso wonnkotum aabɔ anaa wɔaayɛ.
Nokwar nyinara si sibew a Nyankopɔn dze no esi, na ɔnoara na odzi no dwuma, dɛ mbrɛ nyansa nkaa nyinara so tse; ɔnntse dɛm a nkyɛ nkwa nnyi hɔ.
Hwɛ, ha na nyimpa ne pɛ no wɔ, na ha so na nyimpa n’afɔbu wɔ; osiandɛ dza ofi ahyɛse no wɔdaa no edzi pefee kyerɛɛ hɔn, na wɔanngye kan no.
Na nyimpa biara a no sunsum anngye kan no hyɛ afɔbu ase.
Osiandɛ nyimpa yɛ sunsum. Na adzebɔdze no yɛ onnyiewiei, na sunsum na adzebɔdze no, sɛ wɔbɔ mu a, nna wonya enyigye ne mãhyɛ;
Na sɛ wɔpaapaa mu a nyimpa runntum nnya enyigye ne mãhyɛ no.
Adzebɔdze no nye Nyankopɔn ne ntamadan no; nyew, nyimpa yɛ Nyankopɔn ne ntamadan, temple nyina mpo; na temple biara a wogu ho fĩ no, Nyankopɔn bɛsɛɛ dɛm temple no.
Nyankopɔn n’enyimnyam yɛ nyansa, dza morohwehwɛ akã nye dɛ, ɔkyerɛ kan na nokwar.
Kan na nokwar pow obusufo no.
Ahyɛse no nna nyimpa sunsum biara nnyim bɔn; na Nyankopɔn poon nyimpa fii asehwe mu no, nyimpa sanee bɛyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse wɔ hɔn mbofaber mu no, nnyim no bɔn ho wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim.
Na osian hɔn egyanom hɔn amambra ntsi, dɛm omumuyɛnyi no duaa asokyew do beyi kan na nokwar no fi adasamba mu.
Mbom mahyɛ hom dɛ hom ntsetse hom mbofra wɔ kan na nokwar mu.
Na nokwar, mese ɔwo m’akowaa Frederick G. Williams dɛ akɔ do wɔ dɛm afɔbu yi mu;
Annkyerɛkyerɛ wo mbofra kan na nokwar no, dɛ mbrɛ mbrasɛm no se; na dɛm omumuyɛnyi no da ho wɔ tum wɔ wo do, na iyi nye w’amandzehu yi ase.
Na afei, mbrasɛm a medze ma wo nye yi—sɛ wobeyi wo efi mu a, siesie w’ankasa wo fie yie, osiandɛ ndzɛmba pii nnda yie wɔ wo fie.
Nokwar, mese m’akowaa Sidney Rigdon dɛ ndzɛmba binom mu no, wenndzi mbrasɛm no do wɔ ne mba afamu; dɛm ntsi, dzi kan siesie wo fie yie.
Nokwar, mese m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, dza morohwehwɛ akã nye dɛ, mebɛfrɛ hom m’anyɛnkofo, osiandɛ hom yɛ m’anyɛnkofo, na hom nye me benya mo hɔ egyapadze—
Mefrɛɛ hom nkowaa, osian wiadzemba ntsi, na hom yɛ hɔn nkowaa wɔ emi ntsi—
Na afei, nokwar, mese Joseph Smith, Kakraba, dɛ—enndzi mbrasɛm no do, na ɔsɛ dɛ wɔkã w’enyim wɔ Ewuradze enyim;
Ɔsɛ dɛ w’ebusua nu hɔnho na woyi ndzɛmba bi akwa, na wotsie wo nsɛm yie, annyɛ dɛm a wobotu hɔn efi hɔn sibea.
Dza mekã kyerɛ kor no mekã kyerɛ hom nyinara, hom mbɔ mpaa daadaa amma dɛm omumuyɛnyi no eennya tum wɔ hom mu, na oeennyi hom eemmfi hom sibea.

M’akowaa Newel K. Whitney so a ɔyɛ bishop wɔ m’asɔr mu no, ɔsɛ dɛ wɔtsẽa no, na osiesie n’ebusua yie, na ɔhwɛ ma wosi nketse yɛ fie asɛdze esiado esiado, na wɔbɔ mpaa daadaa, annyɛ dɛm a wobeyi hɔn efi hɔn sibea.

Afei, mese hom, m’anyɛnkofo, dɛ hom mma m’akowaa Sidney Rigdon ntu no kwan no, na ɔnyɛ ntsɛm so nkɔbɔ Ewuradze n’enyisɔ afrenhyia nye nkwagye asɛmpa no dawur, dɛ mbrɛ mebɛma no ho kwan ma ɔakasa; na ɔnam hom koryɛ gyedzi mpaabɔ do mebɛhyɛ no dzen.

Na hom mma mo nkowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, nye Frederick G. Williams so nyɛ ntsɛm, na wɔdze bɛma hɔn dɛ mbrɛ hom gyedzi mpaabɔ tse; na mber dodow biara a hom bedzi me nsɛm do no, hom enyim runngu ase wɔ wiadze yi mu, nye wiadze a ɔreba no mu.

Na, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, ɔyɛ me pɛ dɛ hom bɛyɛ ntsɛm akyerɛ me kyerɛwsɛm no ase, na osian Zion no nkwagye ntsi, hom nhwehwɛ abakɔsɛm, amanaman, ahenman, Nyame ne mbra na nyimpa so ne mbra ho nyimdzee. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/94.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 94
chapter_summary: 1–9, Ewuradze ma mbrasɛm a ɔfa dan a wobesi ama President na n’Apamfo Kuw no ma woedzi hɔn dwuma wɔ mu; 10–12, Wobesi dan a wobetsintsim nwoma wɔ mu; 13–17, Wɔkyɛɛ egyapadze bi dze mae.

verses.text: Na bio, nokwar mese hom, m’anyɛnkofo, mbrasɛm a medze rema hom nye dɛ, hom nhyɛ ase mboaboa homho ntow Zion stake kuropɔn ne fapem wɔ Kirtland asaase do ha, wɔnhyɛ ase wɔ me fie.
Na hwɛ, hom nyɛ no dɛ mbrɛ nhwɛdo a medze ama hom no tse.

Na hom ntu asaase a odzi kan no a ɔda anaafo afamu hɔ no nsi hɔ dɛ wobesi dan wɔ do dze ama President na n’Apamfo no do, wonsi mma president na n’apamfo no ma wɔnyɛ edwuma wɔ mu, na wonnya nyikyerɛ wɔ mu; na president na n’apamfo no hɔn somdwumadzi no wɔ mu, ndzɛmba nyina a ɔfa asɔr na ahenman no ho.
Nokwar, mese hom dɛ, wonsi ma ne tɛtɛr nyɛ anamɔn eduonum enum na ne tsentsen so nyɛ anamɔn eduosia enum wɔ ne paado.
Ɔwɔ dɛ wonya ase pia na sor pia kɛse wɔ no mu, dɛ mbrɛ nhwɛdo a wɔdze bɛma hom ekyir no tse.
Na wobotu fapem no ahyɛ Ewuradze nsa, dɛ mbrɛ asɔfodzi ne nhyehyɛɛ no tse, dɛ mbrɛ nhwɛdo no a wɔdze bɛma hom ekyir no tse.
Na wobotu ne nyinara ahyɛ Ewuradze nsa ama president na n’apamfo no hɔn dwumadzi ntsi.
Na ɔnnsɛ dɛ wɔma adze biara a ho nntsew ba mu; na m’enyimnyam bɛba hɔ, na wobohu m’enyim wɔ hɔ.
Mbom sɛ adze biara a ho nntsew ba mu a, m’enyimnyam remmba hɔ, na merennda m’enyim edzi wɔ mu.

Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, asaase a otsĩa ebien wɔ anaafo afamu no wobotu esi hɔ ama me na woesi dan wɔ do dze ama me, na woetsintsim me kyerɛwsɛm a wɔrekyerɛ ase no wɔ mu, nye ndzɛmba nyinara a mebɛhyɛ hom no.
Na ne tɛtɛr bɛyɛ anamɔn eduonum enum na ne tsentsen so ayɛ anamɔn eduosia enum wɔ no mu, kor wɔ ase na kor so wɔ sor.

Na wobotu dɛm dan no nyina fi ne fapem ahyɛ Ewuradze nsa, dze ayɛ bea a wobetsintsim nwoma, nye ndzɛmba nyina so a mebɛhyɛ hom, hom mma ɔnyɛ krɔnkrɔn na, mma wonngu ho fĩ dɛ mbrɛ nhwɛdo wɔ ndzɛmba nyinara a wɔdze bɛma hom ho no.
Na asaase a otsĩa ebiasa no na m’akowaa Hyrum Smith mfa nyɛ n’egyapadze.
Na nsaase a odzi kan nye dza otsĩa ebien no a ɔwɔ etsifi afamu no, mo nkowaa Reynolds Cahoon na Jared Carter mfa nyɛ hɔn egyapadze—
Ama woeetum aayɛ edwuma a medze ama hɔn no, dɛ wɔnyɛ apamfo kuw a wobesisi m’adan, dɛ mbrɛ mbrasɛm a Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, dze ama hom no tse.
Adan ebien yinom, mma wonnsi kesi dɛ medze mbrasɛm bɛma hom wɔ ho.
Na afei, merennkã nsɛm pii nnkyerɛ hom wɔ dɛm aber yi mu. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/95.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 95
chapter_summary: 1–6, Wɔkã Ahotseweefo no enyim dɛ woenntum ennsi Ewuradze Ne fi no; 7–10, Ewuradze pɛ dɛ ɔdze tum fi sor kyɛ No nkorɔfo wɔ Ne fi mu; 11–17, Ɔwɔ dɛ wotu fie no si hɔ dze yɛ bea a wɔsom na Asomafo skuul.

verses.text: Nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se hom a modɔ hom, na hɔn a modɔ hɔn no, hɔn na metsẽa hɔn ama wɔdze hɔn bɔn aakyɛ hɔn, na mudua ntsea no mu bɔ kwan gye hɔn wɔ ndzɛmba nyinara mu ma wofi nsɔhwɛ mu, na madɔ hom—
Dɛm ntsi, ɔsɛ dɛ wɔtsẽa hom na wɔkã hom enyim wɔ m’enyim.
Na hom ayɛ bɔn kɛse etsia me, na hom anndwen mbrasɛm kɛse a ɔwɔ ndzɛmba nyina mu no ho, dza makã akyerɛ hom a ɔfa me fi ne nsii ho no;
Na ahoboa a mayɛ a medze ribesiesie m’asomafo ma woesiesie mo wenyin ture no dze ama mber a odzi ekyir yi mu, ama maada m’anwanwa edwuma edzi, na meehue mo Sunsum eegu honam nyinara do—
Na hwɛ, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, dodowara wɔ hɔ a wɔahyɛ hɔn asɔfo wɔ hom mu a mafrɛ hɔn, na mbom kumaabi na wɔasan mu eyi hɔn.
Hɔn a wɔannsan mu ennyi hɔn no ayɛ bɔn kɛsenara, iyi ntsi, wɔnantsew sum mu ewiaber.

Na iyi ntsi, mbrasɛm a medze ma hom nye dɛ, hom mfrɛ hom awɔse nhyiamu, ama hom akɔnkye na hom sũ aafow edu Sabaoth Ewuradze n’asomu, a ne nkyerɛase nye, bɔadze a ɔbɔɔ da a odzi kan no, ahyɛse nye ewiei no.
Nyew, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, mbrasɛm a medze maa hom nye dɛ, hom nsi dan mma me, dɛm dan no na mahyehyɛ ato hɔ dɛ mubodua mu dze tum a ofi sor akyɛ hɔn a masan mu eyi hɔn no;
Na iyi nye anohoba a Egya no dze abɔ hom; dɛm ntsi, mehyɛ hom dɛ, hom ntweɔn, dɛ mbrɛ m’asomafo a wɔwɔ Jerusalem no yɛe.
Eso, mo nkowaa ayɛ bɔn kɛsenara; na wentwiwentwi sii nkɔnhyɛfo hɔn skuul hɔ; na iyi ahyɛ me awerɛhow kɛsenara, hom Ewuradze no na ɔse; dɛm ntsi, meyi hɔn ama dɛ wɔntsẽa hɔn.
Nokwar, mese hom dɛ, ɔyɛ me pɛ dɛ hom besi dan. Sɛ hom dzi me mbrasɛm do a, hom benya tum dze esi.
Sɛ hom enndzi me mbrasɛm do a Egya no dɔ no rennka hom nkyɛn, dɛm ntsi, hom bɛnantsew sum mu.
Afei nyansa nye yi, nye Ewuradze n’adwen—hom nsi dan no, mma wonnsi no wiadze kwan do, osiandɛ memmaa hom kwan dɛ hom ntsena ase dɛ wiadzemba;
Dɛm ntsi, hom nsi no wɔ kwan a mibeyi akyerɛ hom mu baasa a hom beyi hɔn esi hɔ na wɔdze tum yi ahyɛ hɔn no.
Na ne tɛtɛr bɛyɛ anamɔn eduonum enum na ne tsentsen ayɛ anamɔn eduosia enum wɔ ne paado.

Na hom ntsew paa a ɔwɔ n’ase no ho na hom mbɔ hom sacrament afɔr no wɔ hɔ, na hom nkã asɛmpa no wɔ hɔ, na hom nyɛ hom akɔnkye na mpaabɔ wɔ hɔ, na hom nkã hom apɛdze a ho tsew mbɔ afɔr mma me, hom Ewuradze na ɔse.
Na paa a ɔwɔ sor no, hom ntu nsi hɔ mfa nyɛ skuul mma m’asomafo, Ahman Ba na ɔse; mekyerɛ Alpha; mekyerɛ Omega; hom Ewuradze Jesus Christ no. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/96.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 96
chapter_summary: 1, Ɔwɔ dɛ wɔhyɛ Kirtland Stake a ɔwɔ Zion no dzen; 2–5, Ɔwɔ dɛ bishop no kyekyɛ egyapadze no ma Ahotseweefo no; 6–9, Ɔwɔ dɛ wɔgye John Johnson to nkabɔmu nhyehyɛɛ no mu.

verses.text: Hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, nyansa nye yi, ama hom eetum ehu dza hom bɛyɛ wɔ asɛm yi ho, osiandɛ ohia ma me dɛ wɔhyɛ stake yi a makyekyer esi hɔ dɛ Zion n’ahoɔdzen no dzen.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mma m’akowaa Newel K. Whitney nhwɛ bea no a wɔato no dzin wɔ hom mu no a mahyehyɛ dɛ mibesi me fi krɔnkrɔn wɔ do no do.
Na bio, hom nkyekyɛmu kumaa pii wɔ nyansa kwan do mma hɔn a wɔrohwehwɛ egyapadze, dɛ mbrɛ abaguafo a wɔwɔ hom mu bɛkyerɛ.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mbɔ mbɔdzen nhwɛ dɛm asɛm yi, na bea a obeye ama me nhyehyɛɛ no, ama hom eetum dze m’asɛm no aabrɛ adasamba.
Na hwɛ, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, iyi nye dza ohia me tsitsir, dɛ m’asɛm no bɔkɔ adasamba hɔ, ama wɔaabrɛ adasamba hɔn akoma adze dze ama hom yieyɛ. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, ɔyɛ me nyansaa na ohia ma me dɛ m’akowaa John Johnson no a magye n’afɔrbɔdze na matse ne mpaabɔ no, susuampaara dɛ odzi me mbrasɛm do ofi mber yi kɔ a, medze onnyiewiei nkwa bɔ no anohoba—
Osiandɛ ɔyɛ Joseph n’asenyi, na ɔyɛ fafafo wɔ nhyira a wɔdze bɔɔ n’egyanom anohoba no mu—
Nokwar, mese hom dɛ, ohia ma me dɛ wɔbɛma ɔabɛkã kuw no ho ama ɔaaboa ma wɔdze m’asɛm no aabrɛ adasamba.
Dɛm ntsi, hom nhyɛ no sɔfo wɔ dɛm nhyira yi mu, na ɔbɔbɔ mbɔdzen enyiberdo eyi asodzi biara a ɔda fie a wɔato no dzin wɔ hom mu no, ama oeetum atsena mu. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/97.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 97
chapter_summary: 1–2, Wohyira Ahotseweefo dodowara a wɔwɔ Zion (Jackson Mansin, Missouri) wɔ hɔn nokwardzi ho; 3–5, Wɔkamfo Parley P. Pratt wɔ dwuma a odzii wɔ Skuul a ɔwɔ Zion no ho; 6–9, Ewuradze gye hɔn a wodzi hɔn ahyɛmu do no; 10–17, Ɔwɔ dɛ wosi dan wɔ Zion, na no mu na hɔn a hɔn akoma mu tsew no bohu Nyame; 18–21, Zion nye hɔn a hɔn akoma mu tsew; 22–28, Sɛ Zion dzi nokwar a, wobefi Ewuradze n’ebufuhyew ano.

verses.text: Nokwar, mese hom m’anyɛnkofo dɛ, medze me ndze kasa kyerɛ hom, mo Sunsum ne ndze mpo, ama maada me pɛ edzi akyerɛ hom wɔ hom enuanom a wɔwɔ Zion asaase do ho, hɔn mu dodowara yɛ ahobrɛadze ampa, na wɔreper esũa nyansa na woehu nokwar no.
Nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, nhyira nye dɛm nkorɔfo no, na hɔn nsa bɛkã, na Emi, Ewuradze, muhu hɔn a wɔdwe nyinara nye hɔn a mepɛ mbɔbɔr ama sɛ medze hɔn ba atsɛmbu ase a meedzi bem.
Hwɛ, dza mekã kyerɛ hom wɔ skuul a ɔwɔ Zion ho nye dɛ, Emi, Ewuradze, ɔyɛ me enyigye pii dɛ wonya skuul wɔ Zion, na m’enyi gye m’akowaa Parley P. Pratt so ho osiandɛ ɔtse mo mu.
Na mber dodow biara a ɔbɔkɔ do atsena mo mu no, ɔbɔkɔ do ahwɛ skuul no a ɔwɔ Zion asaase do no do ekesi dɛ mebɛma no mbrasɛm fofor bi so.
Na medze nhyira mbɔho behyira no ma ɔaakyerɛkyerɛ kyerɛwsɛm nye esumasɛm nyina mu dze aama skuul no nye asɔr a ɔwɔ Zion no ntowdo.
Na hɔn a wɔwɔ skuul hɔ no, Emi, Ewuradze, mepɛ dɛ muhu hɔn mbɔbɔr; eso hɔn mu binom wɔ hɔ a ɔsɛ dɛ wɔtsẽa hɔn, na hɔn ndwuma bɛda edzi.
Wɔdze ekuma ato dua no ndwow ho dada; dɛ dua biara a ɔannsow eduaba pa no, wobotwa no egu na wɔatow no akyen gya mu. Emi, Ewuradze, na makã.

Nokwar, mese hom a hom wɔ hɔn mu nyina a hom nyim dɛ hɔn akoma abobɔ na hɔn esunsum abotow na wodzi nokwar, na wɔpɛ dɛ wɔdze hɔnho bɔ afɔr dzi hɔn ahyɛmu do no—nyew, afɔrbɔdze biara a Emi, Ewuradze, mebɛhyɛ no—mebɛgye hɔn ato mu.
Na emi, Ewuradze, mebɛma wɔayɛ dɛ dua a wɔatsɛw no wɔ esutsen pa ho. Wɔbɔsow eduaba a ɔsom bo pii.
Nokwar, mese hom dɛ, ɔyɛ me pɛ dɛ wosi fi ma me wɔ Zion asaase do, tse dɛ nhwɛdo a medze ama hom no.
Nyew, hom mfa mo dɔm no hɔn ebupɛn du no nsi.
Hwɛ, iyi nye ebupɛn du na afɔrbɔdze a Emi, Ewuradze, morohwehwɛ efi hɔn nsamu, ama wɔdze esi dan ama medze ama Zion no nkwagye—
Ɔbɛyɛ bea a ahotseweefo nyina ndaase bea, a hɔn a wɔafrɛ hɔn dɛ wɔmbɛyɛ ɔsomdwuma wɔ hɔn ɔfrɛ na dzibewdzi horow nyina mu no bɛgye nkyerɛkyerɛ efi.

Ama woeenya ntseasee a odzi mu wɔ hɔn ɔsomdwuma no ho, wɔ nwomasũa mu, nye fapem ho, nye nkyerɛkyerɛ, nye biribiara a ho hia ma Nyankopɔn n’ahenman no wɔ asaase do, dɛm ahenman no a wɔdze ne nsaafee ama hom no.
Na mber dodow biara a mo nkorɔfo besi dan ama me wɔ Ewuradze ne dzin mu, na wɔnnkɛma wɔdze adze fĩ biara akɔ mu dze egu ho fĩ no, m’enyimnyam bɛhyerɛn do;
Nyew, na m’enyim bɔwɔ hɔ, osiandɛ mebɛba mu, na hɔn a wɔbɛba mu nyina a hɔn akoma mu tsew no bohu Nyame.
Mbom sɛ wogu ho fĩ a, meremmba mu, na m’enyimnyam rennhyerɛn hɔ; osiandɛ meremmba temple a no mu nntsew mu.
Na afei, hwɛ, sɛ Zion yɛ ndzɛmba yinom a ɔbɛyɛ prɔmprɔm, na ɔatserɛw no mu, na oenya enyimnyam, na ɔayɛ kɛse, na no ho ayɛ hu.
Na asaase do aman bedzi no nyi, na wɔase dɛ: Ampa, Zion yɛ hɛn Nyame no kuropɔn, na ampa, Zion runntum nnhwe ase, nna orunntu mmfi ne sibew, osiandɛ Nyame wɔ hɔ, na Ewuradze ne nsa so wɔ hɔ;
Na ɔdze no tum ahoɔdzen akã ntam dɛ ɔbɛyɛ ne nkwagye na n’abantsentsen.
Dɛm ntsi, nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se, hom mma Zion ndzi ehurusi osiandɛ iyi nye Zion—akoma a no mu tsew; dɛm ntsi, hom mma Zion ndzi ehurusi, ber a emumuyɛfo nyina besi nkrum no.
Na hwɛ, na hu, awerdzi reba ndzebɔnyɛfo do ntsɛm dɛ ekyinehyia-mframa; na woana na obefi nsa?
Na Ewuradze ne ntsẽa botwuw afa hɔn do anago na adzekyee, na no ho amandzɛɛ bɛyɛ nyimpa nyina hu; nyew, onnkegyaa ekesi dɛ Ewuradze bɛba;
Na hɔn mbusu a wɔabɔ na emumuyɛdze nyina bɛma Ewuradze n’ebufuhyew aba hɔn do.
Eso, sɛ Zion bɔ mbɔdzen yɛ ndzɛmba nyinara a mahyɛ no a, obefi nsa.
Mbom sɛ ɔammbɔ mbɔdzen enndzi adze nyina a mahyɛ no do a, medze ɔhaw kɛse, nye atseetsee, nye ɔyardɔm, nye nkrantsee, nye awerdzi, nye ogyaframee bɛba abɛsera no dɛ mbrɛ no ndwuma nyina tse.
Na wɔmma wɔnkenkan ngu n’asomu bio dɛ, emi, Ewuradze magye n’afɔrbɔdze; na sɛ ɔannyɛ bɔn bio a, dɛm ndzɛmba yinom mu biara nnkɛba no do;
Na medze nhyira behyira no, na mama ne nhyira nye n’ebusuasantsen so dze ayɛ mbɔho mbɔho afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ, dɛm na Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn se. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/98.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 98
chapter_summary: 1–3, Ahotseweefo hɔn amandzehu no bɔboa hɔn yieyɛ; 4–8, Ahotseweefo no wɔdɛ wofua amambusɛm mbra a ɔwɔ asaase no do no do; 9–10, Ɔwɔ dɛ wɔboa nokwafo, enyansafo, na apapafo no ma wobu man no; 11–15, Hɔn a wɔdze hɔn nkwa to hɔ wɔ Ewuradze no dwumadzi mu no benya onnyiewiei nkwa; 16–18, Wonkyir ɔkõ na wɔmbɔ asomdwee ho dawur; 19–22, Wɔkã Ahotseweefo a wɔwɔ Kirtland no enyim na wɔhyɛ hɔn dɛ wonnu hɔnho; 23–32, Ewuradze da Ne mbra a ɔkora atseetsee na amandze a No nkorɔfo ruhu no edzi; 33–38, Sɛ Ewuradze hyɛ dɛ wɔnkõ a nna ɔtsen; 39–48, Ahotseweefo wɔ dɛ wɔdze hɔn atamfo hɔn mfom kyɛ hɔn, na sɛ dɛm nkorɔfo no nu hɔnho a, wobefi Ewuradze n’ebufuhyew no mu.

verses.text: Nokwar, mese hom, m’anyɛnkofo dɛ, mma hom nnsuro, hom mma hom akoma ntɔ hom yamu; nyew, hom ndzi ehurusi mbordo, na hom nda ase wɔ adze nyina mu.
Hom ntweɔn Ewuradze abotar mu, osiandɛ hom mpaabɔ edu Sabaoth Ewuradze n’asomu, na wɔdze nsɔwano na ahyɛmu yi akyerɛw—Ewuradze akã ntam na ɔahyɛ ɔmom dɛ wɔbɛyɛ ama hom.

Dɛm ntsi, ɔbɔ hom anohoba yi na ɔnye hom dzi ahyɛmu a ɔnnsesã dɛ ne nyina bɛhyɛ ma; na ndzɛmba nyina a hom hun amandze wɔ mu no bɔbɔ mu edzi dwuma ama hom yieyɛ, nye me dzin n’enyimnyam, Ewuradze na ɔse.
Na afei, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, ɔfa mbra a ɔwɔ asaase no do ho no, ɔyɛ me pɛ dɛ mo nkorɔfo bɔhwɛ na woedzi ndzɛmba biara a mahyɛ hɔn no do.
Na asaase no do mbra no a ɔyɛ amambusɛm no fua fahodzi fapem na obiara ne kyɛfa na ndzinoa ekyir no yɛ adasamba nyina dze, na ɔyɛ adze a ɔtsen wɔ m’enyim.
Dɛm ntsi, Emi, Ewuradze, mema ɔwo nye wo nuanom a wɔwɔ m’asɔr mu no tse ase dɛ, ɔtsen dɛ wofua dɛm mbra no a ɔwɔ asaase no do no ekyir.
Na ɔfa no nyimpa ne mbra ho no, biribiara a ɔbor iyi do anaa ɔtɔ sin wɔ ho no fi bɔn.
Emi, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, mama hom fahodzi, dɛm ntsi, hom enya fahodzi ampa; na mbra no so ama hom fahodzi.
Naaso, sɛ omumuyɛnyi dzi tum a, ɔman no si nkrum.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mfa enyiber nhwehwɛ nkorɔfo a wodzi nokwar nye nkorɔfo a wɔyɛ enyansafo na nkorɔfo apapa na enyansafo na hom nhwɛ mpegya hɔn; annyɛ dɛm a, biribiara a ɔtɔ sin wɔ iyinom ho no fi bɔn.
Na mbrasɛm a medze ma hom nye dɛ, hom nkyir bɔn nyina na hom ntakyer dza oye nyina, ama hom dze asɛm a ofi Nyankopɔn n’anomu ba biara aabɔ bra.
Na ɔbɛma agyedzifo no nsɛm ofi ber to ber nye ne nkyerɛkyerɛ so nkakrankakra; na medze iyinom bɔsɔ hom ahwɛ.
Na obiara a ɔdze no nkwa bɔto hɔ wɔ me dwumadzi ntsi, nye me dzin ntsi no benya no bio, dza ɔyɛ onnyiewiei nkwa no mpo.

Dɛm ntsi, mma hom nnsuro hom atamfo, osiandɛ mahyɛ ɔmom wɔ m’akoma mu, Ewuradze na ɔse, dɛ mobɔsɔ hom ahwɛ wɔ ndzɛmba nyina mu, dɛ gyangyanbiara hom bɛtsena m’ahyɛmu mu dze akɔ owu mu mpo, ama woeebu hom bem.
Na sɛ hom anntsena ahyɛmu no mu a, hom nnsɛ me.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mpow ɔkõ na hom mbɔ asomdwee ho dawur, na hom mper enyiberdo dɛ hom bɛdan mba hɔn akoma dze akɔ hɔn egyanom do, na egyanom akoma dze akɔ mba do;
Na bio, Jewfo hɔn akoma akɔ nkɔnhyɛfo do, na nkɔnhyɛfo dze akɔ Jewfo do; annyɛ dɛm a, medze ndom bɛba abɔbɔ asaase nyina, na honam nyina bɛhyew wɔ m’enyim.
Mma hom akoma nntutu; na m’Egya fie wɔ tsenabew pii, na mesiesie bea ama hom; na bea a m’Egya na emi wɔ no, hɔ na hom bɛba.
Hwɛ, Emi, Ewuradze, m’enyi nngye dɔm pii a wɔwɔ Kirtland asɔr mu no ho;

Osiandɛ wɔmmpow hɔn bɔn nye hɔn emumuyɛ akwan no, nye hɔn akoma mu ahantanyɛ, nye hɔn enyikaber, nye hɔn ndzɛmba nyinara a omuo no, na wɔnnhwɛ nndzi enyansasɛm nye onnyiewiei nkwa no a medze ama hɔn no do.
Nokwar, mese hom dɛ, Emi, Ewuradze, sɛ woennu hɔnho na wɔannyɛ ndzɛmba nyina a mase hɔn no a, mebɛtsẽa hɔn na mayɛ biribiara a mepɛ no.
Na bio, mese hom dɛ, sɛ hom hwɛ yɛ biribiara a mahyɛ hom no a, emi, Ewuradze, mibeyi ebufuw na ebufuhyew nyina efi hom do, na hɛl mbobow runntum nndzi hom do nyim.

Afei, merekã dza ɔfa hom ebusua-ebusua ho akyerɛ hom—sɛ nkorɔfo bɔ hom, anaa hom ebusua-ebusua bɔ hom kor na hom dze abotar gye, na hom annkasa enntsia hɔn, na hom ammper so dɛ hom bɛyɛ hɔn bi etua kaw a, hom benya hom akatua;
Mbom sɛ hom annsɔw no abotar mu a, wɔbɛfa no dɛ hom ayɛ bi ahyɛ ananmu dze etua kaw.
Na bio, sɛ hom atamfo bɔ hom ne mpɛn a otsĩa ebien na sɛ hom annkasa enntsia hom atamfo no annhyɛ ananmu na hom sɔw no abotar mu a, hom akatua bɛyɛ ɔha mbɔho.
Na bio, sɛ ɔbɔ hom ne mpɛn a otsĩa ebiasa, na hom sɔw no abotar mu a, wɔbɔbɔ hom akatua ho mpɛn anan;
Na sɛ hom atamfo no ennu hɔnho a, dɛm dasegye ebiasa yi begyina hɔ dze etsia hɔn na wɔremmpepa mmfi hɔ.

Na afei, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, sɛ dɛm ɔtamfo no fi m’awerdzi no ase fi a, ma wɔnye no ammba atsɛmbu mu wɔ m’enyim a, hom nhwɛ na hom mbɔ no kɔkɔ wɔ me dzin mu, amma ɔaammba hom do bio, anaa w’ebusua do, anaa wo mba hɔn mba do kesi ebusuasantsen ebiasa na anan no mpo do.
Na nkyii, sɛ ɔba hom do, anaa hom mba, anaa hom mba hɔn mba do dze kesi ebusuasantsen ebiasa anaa anan do a, medze hom atamfo no ahyɛ hom nsa;
Na nkyii, sɛ edze no ho kyɛ no a, ebenya w’akatua wɔ wo ndzeyɛtsenenee ho; nye wo mba na hɔn mba so dze kesi ebusuasantsen ebiasa na anan do.
Naaso, wo tamfo hyɛ wo nsamu; na sɛ etua no kaw dɛ mbrɛ no ndwuma tse a, ɔtsen ma wo; sɛ ɔrohwehwɛ wo nkwa, na wo nkwa wɔ mbusu mu a, nna wo tamfo hyɛ wo nsamu, na ɔtsen ma wo.
Hwɛ, iyi nye mbra a medze maa m’akowaa Nephi, na hom egyanom Joseph, na Jacob, na Isaac, na Abraham, na me tsetseberdo nkɔnhyɛfo na asomafo no.
Na bio, iyi nye mbra a medze maa me tsetseberdofo, dɛ mma wɔnnkɔ nye ɔman, anaa ebusua, anaa kasa horow, anaa nyimpa biara nnkɔkõ, gyedɛ emi, Ewuradze, mahyɛ hɔn.
Na sɛ ɔman, kasa horow, anaa nyimpa biara se wɔnye hom robɔkõ a, hom ndzi kan mfa asomdwee frankaa nkɔ nkorɔfo, ɔman, anaa kasa horow no nkyɛn;
Na sɛ dɛm nkorɔfo no anngye asomdwee a hom dze ama hɔn no, ne mpɛn a otsĩa ebien, anaa ebiasa a, wɔmfa dasegye yinom mbra Ewuradze n’enyim.
Nkyii Emi, Ewuradze, medze mbrasɛm bɛma hɔn na mase hɔn dɛ ɔtsen, na wɔnkɔ dɛm ɔman, kasa horow anaa dɔm no do nye hɔn nkɔkõ.
Na Emi, Ewuradze, mobɔkõ hɔn kõ, nye hɔn mba, nye hɔn mba hɔn mba nyina hɔn kõ ama hɔn, kesi dɛ wobedzi hɔn wer wɔ atamfo nyina do dze ekesi ebusuasantsen ebiasa na anan do.
Hwɛ, na iyi bɛyɛ fasusu ama nyimpa nyinara, Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn na ɔse, dze akyerɛ pɛrpɛrdzi wɔ m’enyim.
Na bio, nokwar mese hom dɛ, sɛ hom tamfo ba hom do ber a odzi kan no ara, na onu noho na ɔba wo nkyɛn na ɔserɛ wo bɔnfakyɛ a, fa no bɔn kyɛ no na mma nndwen ho bio mmfa nngye dase nntsia wo tamfo no—
Yɛ no dɛmara otsĩa mpɛn ebien na ebiasa; nye mpɛn dodow biara a wo tamfo bonu noho wɔ bɔn a ɔyɛe dze tsiaa wo no ho, fa kyɛ no, kɛpem mpɛn eduosuon mbɔho esuon.
Na sɛ ɔfom wo kor na oennu noho a, ɔmmfa ho, fa kyɛ no.
Na sɛ ɔfom wo mpɛn ebien, na oennu noho a, ɔmmfa ho, hom mfa nkyɛ no.
Na sɛ ɔfom wo mpɛn ebiasa, na oennu noho a, hom mfa nkyɛ no bio.

Mbom sɛ ɔfom wo mpɛn anan a, mma mmfa nnkyɛ no, na mbom fa dasegye yinom bra Ewuradze n’enyim; na wɔremmpepa kesi dɛ obonu noho wɔ ndzɛmba a ɔyɛe dze tsiaa wo no ho na otua wo kaw mbɔ ho mpɛn anan wɔ ndzɛmba nyina a ɔfoom wo wɔ ho no.
Na sɛ ɔyɛ dɛm a, pra w’akoma mu fa kyɛ no; na sɛ ɔannyɛ no dɛm a, Emi, Ewuradze, mibedzi wo tamfo wer ɔha mbɔho;
Na mebɛma ɔaba ne mba do, na ɔaba ne mba so hɔn mba do, hɔn a wɔtan me nyina, dze kesi ebusuasantsen ebiasa na anan do.

Mbom sɛ mba no nu hɔnho, anaadɛ mba no hɔn mba no nu hɔnho, na wɔdze hɔn akoma na hɔn ahom, hɔn adwen, na hɔn ahoɔdzen nyina dan ba Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn hɔ, na mfom a wɔdze foom wo no, anaa mfom a hɔn egyanom anaa hɔn egyanom hɔn egyanom dze foom wo no na wotua ho kaw mbɔho anan a, ebɛdan w’ebufuw efi hɔ;
Na awerdzi remmba hɔn do bio, Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn na ɔse, na wɔremmfa hɔn mfom mmba Ewuradze enyim mmfa nngye dase nntsia hɔn bio. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/99.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 99
chapter_summary: 1–8, Wɔfrɛ John Murdock dɛ ɔmbɔ asɛmpa no dawur, na hɔn a wɔgye no no, gye Ewuradze na wobohu hɔn mbɔbɔr.

verses.text: Hwɛ, dɛm na Ewuradze se m’akowaa John Murdock—wɔafrɛ wo dɛ kɔ boka aman mu, fi fie kɔ fie mu, fi ekurase kɔ ekurase, fi kurow kɔ kurow mu kɔbɔ m’asɛmpa a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem ho dawur kyerɛ nkorɔfo a wɔtsetse mbeambea hɔ no, wɔ atseetsee na emumuyɛdze mu.
Na nyia ɔgye wo no, nna ɔagye me; na mo Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn ne dwumadzi bɛma enya tum dze abɔ m’asɛm no dawur.
Na hɔn a wɔbɛgye wo dɛ abofra no, bɛgye m’ahenman no; na nhyira akã hɔn, osiandɛ wobohu hɔn mbɔbɔr.
Na hɔn a wɔbɔpow wo no, Egya no na ne fie so bɔpow hɔn; na ebɔporoporow w’anan ase wɔ nsumaamu dze ayɛ dasegye etsia hɔn.
Na hwɛ, na hu dɛ, mereba ntsɛm ebobu atsɛn, ama wɔaagye hɔn emumuyɛdze nyina a wɔayɛ etsia me no ato mu, dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw wɔ mo ho wɔ nwoma mu no.
Na afei, nokwar mese wo dɛ, ɔnnsɛ dɛ ekɔ kesi dɛ wɔbɔhwɛ wo mba do ama wo, na ahwɛ yie dze hɔn akɛma bishop a ɔwɔ Zion no.
Na mfe kakra ekyir no, sɛ epɛ a, ibotum ebisa me, na wo so akɔ asaase pa no do akɛfa w’egyapadze;
Sɛ epɛ so a, ibotum akɔ do abɔ m’asɛmpa dawur ekesi dɛ wɔbɛfa wo akɔ. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/100.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 100
chapter_summary: 1–4, Joseph na Sidney wɔdɛ wɔkɛkã asɛmpa no ama akra eenya nkwagye; 5–8, Dɔn no mu wɔdze dza ɔsɛ dɛ wɔnkã no bɛma hɔn; 9–12, Sidney nyɛ ɔkasamaafo na Joseph nyɛ obi a onya oyikyerɛfo, na ɔyɛ ɔdasegyefo mapã; 13–17, Ewuradze beyi nkorɔfo a hɔn ho tsew ama, na wɔbɛgye hɔn a wɔyɛ setsie no nkwa.

verses.text: Nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se, hom m’anyɛnkofo Sidney Rigdon na Joseph, hom ebusuafo ho ye; wɔhyɛ me nsamu, na dza oye ma me no na mebɛyɛ ama hɔn; na mo mu na tum nyina wɔ.
Dɛm ntsi, hom nkã mo do, na hom ntsie afotu a medze bɛma hom.
Hwɛ na hu dɛ mowɔ nkorɔfo pii wɔ dɛm mbea yi do, mantɔw a etwa hɛn ho ehyia yi nyina do; na wobobue abow pa bi wɔ dɛm mbea a etwa ehyia mantɔw yi ho wɔ boka asaase yi do.
Dɛm ntsi, emi, Ewuradze, memaa hom kwan dɛ hom mbra dɛm bea yi do; na dɛm na no ho hia me osian akra hɔn nkwagye ntsi.
Dɛm ntsi, nokwar mese hom dɛ, hom mma hom ndze do wɔ nkorɔfo yi do; hom nkã nsɛm a medze bɛhyɛ hom akoma mu no, na hom enyim runngu ase wɔ nkorɔfo enyim;
Na dɔn noara mu, nyew, wɔ ber noara mu, na wɔdze dza ɔsɛ dɛ hom kã no bɛma hom.
Mbom mbrasɛm a medze ma hom nye dɛ, dza hom bɛkã biara wɔ me dzin mu no, hom mfa akoma a ɔyɛ awɔse nye sunsum a ɔyɛ ɔdwe nkã.
Na mobɔ hom anohoba yi dɛ, mber dodow biara a hom bɛyɛ iyi no, mebɛma Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no edzi hom kan agye dase wɔ ndzɛmba nyina a hom bɛkã ho.
Na ohia ma me dɛ m’akowaa Sidney bɛyɛ ɔkasamaafo ama nkorɔfo yi; nyew, nokwar, mebɛhyɛ wo sɔfo dze ama dɛm ɔfrɛ yi, dɛ ebɛyɛ ɔkasamaafo mpo ama m’akowaa Joseph.
Na mebɛma no tum ma ɔayɛ ɔdasegyefo mapã.

Na mebɛma wo tum ma etum esiansian kyerɛwsɛm no nyina mu yie, ama eetum ayɛ ɔkasamaafo ama no, na ɔno so bɛyɛ oyikyerɛfo ama wo, ama eetum ehu dɛ m’ahenman a ɔwɔ asaase do no mu ndzɛmba nyina yɛ nokwar.
Dɛm ntsi, hom nsɔw hom akwantu no do na hom mma hom akoma ndzi dɛw; na hom nhwɛ nhu dɛ, menye hom wɔ hɔ kesi ewiei mpo.
Na afei, merekã hom asɛm bi a ɔfa Zion ho. Ɔwɔ mu dɛ wɔretsẽa Zion hyɛber kakra dze, naaso wɔbɔpon no.
Hom nuanom, mo nkowaa Orson Hyde na John Gould, wɔ me nsamu; na mber dodow biara a wobedzi me mbrasɛm do no, wɔbɛgye hɔn nkwa.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mma hom akoma ntɔ hom yamu; osiandɛ ndzɛmba nyina besi yie ama hɔn a wɔnantsew nokwar mu, ama ɔaatsew asɔr no ho.
Na mibeyi nkorɔfo a hɔn ho tsew ama moho, na wɔbɔsom me wɔ tseneneeyɛ mu;
Na hɔn a wɔbɔ Ewuradze ne dzin na wodzi ne mbrasɛm do no, wɔbɛgye hɔn nkwa. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/101.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 101
chapter_summary: 1–8, Wɔtsẽa Ahotseweefo no na wohu amandze wɔ hɔn mbrato ntsi; 9–15, Ewuradze bohue n’ebufuhyew egu aman nyina do, na mbom wɔbɔboa No nkorɔfo ano na wɔakyekye hɔn werɛ; 16–21, Wɔbɛkyekyer Zion na ne stake nyina; 22–31, Wɔda mbrɛ Mfe Apem mu asetsena no bɛyɛ no edzi; 32–42, Wobehyira Ahotseweefo no na woenya hɔn akatua so; 43–62, Abɛbusɛm a ɔfa ɔdzefo na olive ndua ho no kyerɛ ɔhaw a ɔbɛba Zion do na ekyir no wɔbɔpon no no; 63–75, Ɔwɔ dɛ wɔkɔ do boaboa Ahotseweefo no ano; 76–80, Ewuradze hyehyɛɛ United States Amambusɛm no, 81–101, Ahotseweefo no wɔ kwan dɛ wɔdze hɔn asɛm kɔto enyim ma wɔhwehwɛ mu ma hɔn, tse dɛ mbrɛ abɛbusɛm a ɔfa ɔbaa na ɔtsɛmbuafo sisifo ho no.

verses.text: Nokwar, mese hom dɛ, ɔfa hom nuanom a wohu amandze, na wɔtseetsee hɔn, na wɔapam hɔn efi hɔn egyapadze asaase do no—
Emi, Ewuradze, na mama kwan dɛ dɛm amandzehu no mbra hɔn do, osian hɔn mbrato ntsi na wohu amandze;
Naaso, mebɛfa hɔn, na wɔbɛyɛ medze wɔ da no a mebɛba abɛyɛ m’egudze no.
Dɛm ntsi, ɔsɛ dɛ wɔtsẽa hɔn na wɔsɔ hɔn hwɛ, tse dɛ Abraham a wɔsee no dɛ ɔmfa ne ba kortonoo mbɔ afɔr no.
Na hɔn a wonnkotum asɔw asotwe, na wɔpow me no wonnkotum atsew hɔnho.
Hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, epintampintan na wentwiwentwi, na enyitan, na aperdzi, na akɔndɔ bɔn, na enyiber apɛdze a ɔwɔ hɔn mu ntsi wɔama woegu hɔn egyapadze ho fĩ.
Wɔyɛ nyaa dɛ wɔbɛyɛ aso Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn ne ndze; dɛm ntsi, Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn so yɛ nyaa dɛ obetsie hɔn mpaabɔ wɔ hɔn ɔhaw da mu.
Hɔn asomdwee da mu no wobuu m’afotu tootooba; mbom hɔn ɔhaw da mu no wɔhwehwɛɛ m’ekyir kwan.
Nokwar, mese hom dɛ ɔmmfa ho dɛ wɔayɛ bɔn, ayamuhyehye ahyɛ m’abadaa mu mã wɔ hom ho. Mirinnyi hɔn tokyen koraa; na m’ebufuhyew da no mu no, mebɛkaa ehumbɔbɔr.
Makã ntam, na ɔmom no akɔ osian mbrasɛm a medze maa hɔn ahyɛse no a ɔkyerɛ dɛ mebɛma m’ebufuhyew nkrantsee no atɔ hɔn do, osian mo nkorɔfo ntsi no; na dɛ mbrɛ maka no mpo, ɔbɛyɛ hɔ.
M’ebufuhyew bohue egu aman nyina do a orunnsusu koraa; na dɛm na sɛ hɔn bɔn kɔɔpow no yɛ mã a mebɛyɛ.
Na da no, hɔn a wɔwɔ abantsentsen do, mekyerɛ mankasa me Israelfo no nyinara benya nkwagye.
Na hɔn a wɔabɔ hɔn apetse no wɔbɔboaboa hɔn ano.
Na hɔn a hɔn werɛ ahow nyina wɔbɛkyekye hɔn werɛ.
Na hɔn a wɔdze hɔn nkwa ama wɔ me dzin ntsi no, wɔbɛhyɛ hɔn ahenkyɛw.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mma hom akoma ntɔ hom yamu wɔ Zion ho; osiandɛ honam nyinara hyɛ me nsamu; hom nyɛ komm na hom nhu dɛ meyɛ Nyame.
Worunntu Zion mmfi n’ananmu, ɔmmfa ho dɛ wɔabɔ ne mba apetse.
Hɔn a wɔaka, na hɔn akoma mu tsew no bɛsan hɔn ekyir, na wɔaba hɔn egyapadze do, hɔn nye hɔn mba, wɔdze daapem enyigye ndwom bɛkyekyer Zion, me bea a ayeyɛ afõ no—
Na dɛm ndzɛmba yinom nyina bɛba ama nkɔnhyɛfo no nsɛm ahyɛ mã.
Na, hwɛ, bea biara nnyi hɔ a wɔakyerɛ kã dza emi makyerɛ no ho; nna bea biara so nnyi hɔ a wɔbɛkyerɛ akã dza emi makyerɛ no, aama m’Ahotseweefo no hɔn ano mboaboa dwumadzi no ho—
Kesi dɛ da bi bɛba a wobohu dɛ kwan nnyi hɔ bio ma hɔn; na afei, mowɔ mbea bi so wɔ hɔ a medze bɛma hɔn, na wɔbɛfrɛ dɛm mbea no stake horow, dze abɛyɛ Zion ne ntwamutam anaa n’ahoɔdzen.
Hwɛ, ɔyɛ me pɛ dɛ hɔn a wɔbɔ me dzin nyinara, na wɔsom me dɛ mbrɛ m’asɛmpa a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem kyerɛ no boa hɔn ano na wogyina mbea krɔnkrɔn do;
Na wɔnyɛ ahoboa ntweɔn nyikyerɛ a ɔbɛba no, na sɛ woyi nkataenyim a ɔkata me temple enyim wɔ me ntamadan mu no, dza ɔkata asaase enyim no, fi hɔ a, honam nyina bɔbɔ mu ehu me.
Na biribiara a ɔprɔw, nyimpa, anaa hamu mbowa, anaa sor ntumbowa, anaa nam a wɔwɔ pomu, dza ɔwɔ asaase enyi do nyina bɛhyew;
Na abɔdze-dze nyina so dze ɔhyew a ɔyɛ dzen bɛnan; na ndzɛmba nyina bɛyɛ fofor ama me nyimdzee na m’enyimnyam atsena asaase nyina do.
Na da no mu ɔtan a ɔda nyimpa mu na ɔtan a ɔda mbowa mu, nyew, honam nyina mu ɔtan, bɔbɔ adze wɔ m’enyim.
Na da no mu biribiara a nyimpa biara bebisa no, wɔdze bɛma no.
Na da no mu, Satan rinnya tum nnsɔ nyimpa biara nnhwɛ.
Na awerɛhow biara nnyi hɔ osiandɛ owu nnyi hɔ.
Da no abofra biara runnwu kɛpem dɛ obenyin ayɛ akɔdaa; na obenyin akyɛr dɛ dua;
Na sɛ owu a ɔrennda, ɔkyerɛ dɛ ɔrennka adakamaa mu, mbom ɔbɛsakyer ntsɛmara, na wobohwim no akɔ sor, na n’ahomgye bɛyɛ enyimnyam dze.
Nyew, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, dɛm da no a Ewuradze bɛba no, ɔbɛda ndzɛmba nyina edzi—
Ndzɛmba a etwa mu kɔ, na nsumaamu ndzɛmba a nyimpa biara nnyim, asaase do ndzɛmba, dza wɔnam do yɛe, na ne siantsir na ne nkrabea—
Ndzɛmba a ɔsom bo mapã, ndzɛmba a ɔwɔ wimu, na ndzɛmba a ɔwɔ asaase ase, na ndzɛmba a ɔwɔ asaase do nye sor.
Na hɔn a wɔtseetsee hɔn wɔ me dzin ntsi, na wotsim wɔ gyedzi mu no, ɔwɔ mu dɛ wɔma wɔdze hɔn nkwa to hɔ wɔ emi ntsi, naaso wobenya enyimnyam yi nyina mu kyɛfa.
Dɛm ntsi, sɛ owu mu mpo a mma hom nnsuro; osiandɛ wiadze yi mu no, hom enyigye nnhyɛ mã, mbom emi mo mu na hom enyigye hyɛ mã.
Dɛm ntsi, mma hom nndwendwen hom nyimpadua ho, na nyimpadua no n’asetsena ho; mbom hom ndwendwen ɔkra no nye n’asetsena ho.
Na hom mper nhwehwɛ Ewuradze n’enyim daa, ama hom nsa aakã hom akra abotar mu, na hom benya onnyiewiei nkwa.
Sɛ wɔfrɛ nyimpa ma wɔba m’asɛmpa a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem ho, na wodzi ahyɛmu a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no a, wɔfa hɔn dɛ asaase do nkyen na nyimpa ne dɛw;
Wɔfrɛ hɔn dɛ wɔmbɛyɛ nyimpa ne dɛw; dɛm ntsi, sɛ nkyen no yew ne dɛw a, hwɛ, onnye mma hwee bio na mbom wɔtow gu ma nyimpa dze hɔn ananadze tsiatsia do.
Hwɛ, iyi nye nyansadze a ɔfa Zionmba ho, hɔn mu dodowara, mbom nnyɛ hɔn nyina; wohun hɔn dɛ wɔyɛ mbratofo, dɛm ntsi, ɔsɛ dɛ wɔtsẽa hɔn—
Nyia ɔma noho do no, wɔbrɛ no adze, na nyia ɔbrɛ noho adze no, wɔbɛma no do.
Na afei, mebɛkã hom abɛbusɛm bi, ama hom eehu me pɛ wɔ Zion no mponee ho.
Ɔdzefo bi wɔ asaase bi, a ɔyɛ asaaseber; na ɔsee no nkowaa dɛ: Hom nkɔ mo wenyin ture no mu, na asaaseber potsee no mpo do na hom ndua olive ndua duebien wɔ hɔ;

Na hom mfa aweɔmfo ma wɔmbɔ ho aprɔw, na hom nsi abantsentsen, ama hom mu kor aakɔ do akɔweɔn, ama oeetum ehu asaase a ɔabɔ ho aprɔw nyina, amma atamfo aammba emmbobubu m’olive ndua no enngu famu ammbɛsɛɛ adze, na wɔaammfa mo wenyin ture mu nduadzewa no annkɔ.
Na ɔdzefo no no nkowaa no kɔree kɛyɛɛ dza hɔn wura hyɛɛ hɔn no, na woduaa olive ndua no, na wɔgyee ho ban hyiae, na wɔfaa aweɔmfo guu mu, na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ worisi abantsentsen no.
Na ber a wogu do rotow abantsentsen ne fapem no, wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrekã kyerɛ hɔnho dɛ: Na ebɛnadze na hɛn wura hia wɔ dɛm abantsentsen yi ho?
Na wɔdwendween dɛm asɛm yi ho mber pii, na wɔsee hɔnho dɛ: Ebɛnadze na hɛn wura dze dɛm abantsentsen yi rebɛyɛ, wɔ ber a onyim dɛ aber yi yɛ asomdweeber?
Ana onnkotum dze sika yi akɛma sikasesafo? Osiandɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom ho nnhia.
Na ber a wɔregye kyim wɔ hɔn mu no, wɔyɛɛ akwadwefo, na woenndzi hɔn wura ne mbrasɛm do.
Na ɔtamfo no baa anafua, na obobubuu ban no; na ɔdzefo no nkowaa no soɛree na wosuroi, na woguanee; na ɔtamfo no sɛɛ hɔn ndwuma no, na obubuu olive ndua no guu famu.
Afei, hwɛ, ɔdzefo no a ɔyɛ wenyinture wura no frɛɛ no nkowaa no, na ɔsee hɔn dɛ, Dɛn ntsi a! emumuyɛdze kɛse yi ase nye dɛn?

Ana ɔnnsɛ dɛ nkyɛ hom yɛ dza mehyɛɛ hom no, dɛ—sɛ hom dua wenyin no wie a, hom ngye ban wɔ ho, na hom mfa aweɔmfo ma wɔnweɔn—na hom nsi abantsentsen so, na hom mfa aweɔmfo nsi afasu no do—ma ɔnweɔn wɔ abantsentsen no do mfa nhwɛ mo wenyin ture no do, na mma hom nndeda, amma ɔtamfo ammba hom do?

Na hwɛ, nkyɛ ɔweɔmfo no a ɔwɔ abantsentsen no do no eehu ɔtamfo no wɔ ekyirekyir; na nkyɛ hom aayɛ krado na hom eesiw ɔtamfo no kwan amma oeemmbobubu ban no, na hom aagye mo wenyin ture no efi ɔsɛɛfo no nsa.

Na wenyin ture no wura no see no nkowaa no mu kor dɛ: Kɔ na kɔboaboa mo nkowaa a wɔaka no ano, na fa hɔn a wɔwɔ me fie mu dɔm nyina, hɔn a wɔyɛ mo nsordaafo no, me mberantsɛ na hɔn a woenyin kakra so a wɔwɔ mo nkowaa nyina mu no a hɔn ho yɛ dzen wɔ me fie no, ma ɔnka hɔn a meyi hɔn dɛ wɔnweɔn no;
Na hom nkɔ mo wenyin ture no mu ntsɛmara na hom nkɔpon mo wenyin ture no; osiandɛ ɔyɛ medze; medze sika tɔe.
Dɛm ntsi hom nkɔ m’asaase no do ntsɛmara; hom mbubu m’atamfo hɔn ban no ngu famu; hom mbubu hɔn abantsentsen no ngu famu, na hom mbɔ hɔn aweɔmfo no mpetse.
Na susuampaara a wɔbɔboa hɔn ano etsia hom no, hom ndzi m’atamfo no wer mma me, aama aber bi menye me fifo a wɔaka no aaba abɛfa asaase no.
Na akowaa no see no wura dɛ: Dabɛn na dɛm ndzɛmba yinom besi?
Na ɔsee n’akowaa no dɛ: Ber a mepɛ; kɔ seseiara, na kɛyɛ ndzɛmba a mahyɛ wo no nyina;
Na iyi bɛyɛ mo nsɔwano nye nhyira ama wo—ɔwo nokwafo, onyansafo paafo a ewɔ me fie, m’ahenman mu ɔhwɛdofo.
Na n’akowaa no kɔr ntsɛmara, na ɔkɛyɛɛ ndzɛmba nyinara a no wura ahyɛ no, na nda pii ekyir no ndzɛmba nyina hyɛɛ mã.
Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, mebɛkyerɛ hom nyansa a ɔwɔ mo mu a ɔfa nsɔr nyinara ho, mber dodow biara a wobenya pɛ dɛ wɔnkyerɛ hɔn nokwar kwan a oye ma hɔn nkwagye no—
Ama dwuma a woridzi dze aboa m’ahotseweefo hɔn ano no aakɔ do no, ma medze hɔn esi mbea krɔnkrɔn do ama me dzin; osiandɛ otwaber no asõ, na ɔwɔ dɛ m’asɛm no hyɛ mã.

Dɛm ntsi, ɔwɔ dɛ moboaboa mo nkorɔfo ano, dɛ mbrɛ mbɛbusɛm a ɔfa ewifua na nworahaban ho kyerɛ no, ama wɔdze ewifua no eekesie yie ma woenya onnyiewiei nkwa, na wɔdze celestial enyimnyam no abɔ hɔn abɔtsir, ber a mebɛba m’Egya n’ahenman no mu ebotua obiara kaw dɛ mbrɛ no ndwuma tse no;
Ber a wɔbɛkyekyer nworahaban no efi-efi, na woemia ne nkyehoma mu dzendzenndzen na wɔdze ogya a onndum da ahyew no.
Dɛm ntsi, mbrasɛm a medze ma nsɔr nyina nye dɛ wɔnkɔ do mboaboa hɔn ano nkɔ bea a makyerɛ hɔn no do.
Eso, dɛ mbrɛ mahyɛ hom dada no, mma hom mmboaboa homho ɔhardo, nna mma hom nntu enguan so; mbom hom mma wonsiesie ndzɛmba nyina wɔ hom enyim.
Na mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ a wobesiesie ndzɛmba nyina wɔ hom enyim no, hom ndzi mbrasɛm a medze ama hom a ɔfa dɛm ndzɛmba yinom ho no do—
Dza ɔkã anaa ɔkyerɛ dɛ hom mfa sika ntɔ asaase nyina a wobotum dze sika atɔ a ɔbɔ dɛm mantɔw yi ho aprɔw no, bea a makyerɛ dɛ ɔnyɛ Zion asaase no, ama wɔaahyɛ ase aboaboa m’ahotseweefo ano wɔ hɔ;
Asaase nyina a wobotum atɔ wɔ Jackson mansin mu, nye amansin a etwa ho ehyia no, na hom ngyaa dza ɔaka no nhyɛ me nsa.
Afei, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, hom mma nsɔr nyina nkã hɔn sika nyina mbɔ mu, hom nyɛ dɛm ndzɛmba nyina wɔ hɔn mber mu, mbom mma wɔnnyɛ no ɔhardo; na hom nhwɛ ma wonsiesie ndzɛmba nyina wɔ hom enyim.
Na hom nyi enyimdzefo anaa enyansafo, na wɔnsoma hɔn ma wɔnkɔtɔ dɛm nsaase no.
Na nsɔr a ɔwɔ boka aman do no, ber a wɔbɛkyekyer no, sɛ wobetsie dɛm afotu yi a, wobotum atɔ nsaase na wɔaboa hɔn ano wɔ do, na dɛm kwan yi na wɔnam do botum akyekyer Zion.

Seseiara mpo foto a oye wɔ hɔ, nyew, dza ɔdɔɔ sõ a wobotum dze apon Zion, na woesiesie ne mbea a ɔayɛ afõ nyina, na sɛ nsɔr a wɔdze me dzin ato do no nya pɛ dɛ wɔbɛyɛ aso ama me ndze a, worummbubu nngu famu bio.
Na bio, mese hom dɛ, hɔn a hɔn atamfo abɔ hɔn apetse no, ɔyɛ me pɛ dɛ wɔbɔkɔ do aper ma woetsie hɔn nsɛm na hɔn a wɔhwɛ hɔn do na wɔwɔ tum wɔ hɔn do no apon hɔn—
Dɛ mbrɛ nkorɔfo no hɔn mbra na amambusɛm tse no, dza mafona ho ahyehyɛ no, ɔwɔ dɛ wokura mu yie ma honam nyina kyɛfa na banbɔ, dɛ mbrɛ fapem a ɔyɛ pɛrpɛr na ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn no tse;
Ama nyimpa biara abɔ bra wɔ nkyerɛkyerɛ na fapem pa kwan do dze ama ne ndaamba, dɛ mbrɛ medze ne pɛ su ama no no, ama nyimpa biara eebu ne bɔn ho nkontaa wɔ atsɛmbu da no mu.
Dɛm ntsi, ɔnnsɛ dɛ nyimpa biara bɔkɔ nkowaasom ase ama obi.
Na botae iyi ho ntsi na mayɛ Amambusɛm wɔ dɛm asaase yi ho, menam enyansafo a meyi hɔn wɔ botae iyi ankasa ho do yɛɛ dɛm adze yi, nna menam bɔgyagu do poon asaase no.
Na ebɛnadze na medze bɔto Zionmba ho? Medze hɔn bɔto abɛbusɛm a ɔfa ɔbaa no nye ɔtsɛmbuafo sisifo no ho, na ɔwɔ dɛ nyimpa bɔ mpaa aber nyina amma wɔaanntɔ bitsi, dza ɔse—
Ɔtsɛmbuafo bi wɔ kurow bi mu a onnsuro Nyame na ommbu ɔdasanyi biara.
Na okunafo bi wɔ dɛm kurow no mu, na ɔbaa ne nkyɛn bɛsee no dɛ: Dzi me otsiafo no wer ma me.

Na ɔannkasa no ho mber kakra, mbom ekyir no, ɔkãe wɔ nankasa ne tsirmu dɛ: Ɔwɔ mu dɛ munnsuro Nyame, nna mummbu ɔdasanyi biara, naaso, osiandɛ okunafo yi haw me dodow ntsi, mibedzi n’asɛm ama no, mma ɔaammfa ne ba a ɔba daa no amma moho ennguan me.
Dɛm asɛm yi na medze bɔto Zionmba ho.
Wɔmma wɔnkɔ do ntwa nhwe ɔtsɛmbuafo no n’ananadze;
Na sɛ ɔannkasa hɔn ho a, wɔmma wontwa nhwe ambrado no n’ananadze;
Na sɛ ambrado no annkasa hɔn ho a, wɔmma wontwa nhwe president no n’ananadze;
Na sɛ president no annkasa hɔnho a, afei Ewuradze bɔsoɛr efi no sumabew hɔ, na ɔahaw aman no wɔ n’ebufuhyew mu;
Na n’ebufuhyew dzendzen mu, na n’akomahyew do wɔ ne mber mu na obotwa emumuyɛfo, na hɔn a wonndzi nokwar, nye ndwumayɛfo atorfo no akyen, na ɔakyerɛ hɔn hɔn kyɛfa wɔ enyisomakyerɛfo na ekyingyefo mu.
Wɔ ekyirekyir sum mu mpo, bea a osũ na kwadwomtwa na asetwɛr wɔ no.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mbɔ mpaa, ama woeebue hɔn aso etsie hɔn sũ, ama meehu hɔn mbɔbɔr, amma dɛm ndzɛmba yinom ammba hɔn do.
Ohia dɛ mekã dɛm nsɛm yi kyerɛ hom, amma nyimpa nyina ennya asɛm annkã ammfa anngye hɔnho;
Ama enyansafo nye ahemfo aatse na woeehu dza wɔnndween ho da no;
Ama maaba abɛyɛ m’adze, m’anwanwadze no, na mayɛ edwuma, m’anwanwadwuma no, ama adasa eehu soronko a ɔda atseneneefo nye emumuyɛfo mu, hom Nyankopɔn na ɔse.
Na bio, mese hom dɛ, ɔnnyɛ me pɛ, nna ɔnnyɛ me mbrasɛm dɛ m’akowaa Sidney Gilbert bɔtɔn m’adzekorabea no, dza mahyɛ ama mo nkorɔfo, ma ekedzi m’atamfo nsamu.
Mma hom mma dza mahyehyɛ esi hɔ no, hɔn a wɔdze me dzin ato hɔn do no mma kwan mma atamfo nngu ho fĩ.
