Na iyi yɛ bɔn yaayaw a ɔyɛ dzen tsia me, nye mo nkorɔfo, na iyi yɛ ndzɛmba a mahyɛ ho ɔmom dɛ ɔnnkɛkyɛr na ɔaba aman do no no nsunsuando.
Dɛm ntsi, sɛ wɔremma mo nkorɔfo kwan ma wɔnntsena dza medze ama hɔn no mu mpo a, ɔyɛ me pɛ dɛ mo nkorɔfo bɛgye ho ndzinoa no ma wɔabɛyɛ hɔn dze.
Eso, mennkã dɛ wɔnnkɛtsena do; susuampaara dɛ wɔsow eduaba na wodzi dwuma a ɔsɛ m’ahenman no, wɔbɛtsena do.
Wobesi, na obi so remmfa nndzi; wobodua wenyin ndua na woedzi no do eduaba. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/102.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 102
chapter_summary: 1–8, Woyi abaguafo etsitsir bi si hɔ dɛ hɔn na wɔbɔhwɛ esiesie nsɛm a ɔyɛ dzen a obesi Asɔr no mu no; 9–18, Wɔma akwan a wɔbɛfa do ebua nsɛm no; 19–23, President a ɔda abaguafo no ano no na obobua asɛm biara; 24–34, Wɔkyerɛw nhyehyɛɛ a wɔbɛfa do adan asɛm a woebua no to hɔ.

verses.text: Ndɛ da yi na ɔnam nyikyerɛ a wonyae ntsi, asɔfompanyin eduonu anan a wɔyɛ abaguafo kuw no hyiaa mu wɔ Joseph Smith, Kakraba, ne fie, na wɔtseew abaguafo etsitsir dze maa Christ n’asɔr no, dza no mu nyimpa yɛ asɔfompanyin duebien, na president kor anaa baasa dɛ mbrɛ obehia.

Nyikyerɛ a wonyae no na wɔnam do dze tseew dɛm abaguafo etsitsir kuw yi, hɔn na wobesiesie nsɛm a ɔyɛ dzen a ɔbɛba asɔr no mu, dza asɔr no anaa bishop n’abaguafo no enntum ennsiesie ma abodwee ammba ekuw no ntamu no.

Joseph Smith, Kakraba, Sidney Rigdon, na Frederick G. Williams na dɔm a wɔwɔ nhyiamu no ase gyee hɔn too mu dɛ wɔnyɛ president; Joseph Smith, Panyin, John Smith, Joseph Coe, John Johnson, Martin Harris, John S. Carter, Jared Carter, Oliver Cowdery, Samuel H. Smith, Orson Hyde, Sylvester Smith na Luke Johnson nye asofompanyin a abaguafo no nyinara dze ndze kor yii hɔn dɛ wongyina nyɛ abaguafo mma asɔr no.

Afei, wobisaa abaguafo a wɔabobɔ hɔn edzin wɔ ha yi dɛ, ana dwuma a wɔdze ahyɛ hɔn nsa no wɔpen do, na wobedzi dwuma wɔ dɛm dzibew no dɛ mbrɛ sor mbra no se, na hɔn nyina buaa dɛ wɔagye hɔn dwuma no ato mu, na wɔbɛyɛ no dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn n’adom a ɔdze ama hɔn no tse.

Nyimpa a wogyinae maa asɔr no, na wɔdze edzin a wɔabobɔ wɔ sor ha no mae ma wɔtoow ho aba no, hɔn dodow yɛ eduanan ebiasa, na hɔn nye yi: Asɔfompanyin baakron, elderfo duesuon, asɔfo baanan, na asɔrmba duebiasa.
Wɔtoow aba dɛ: Abaguafo etsitsir no nnyi tum dɛ wɔbɛyɛ biribiara gyedɛ hɔn a wɔabobɔ hɔn edzin no mu beesuon wɔ hɔ, anaadɛ hɔn ananmusifo a woeyi hɔn wɔ no kwan do no wɔ hɔ.
Beesuon yi wɔ tum dɛ woyi asɔfompanyin binom a wɔfata na wobotum ayɛ edwuma ma wɔbɛhyɛ abaguafo no a wonnyi hɔ no anan mu.

Wɔtoow aba dɛ: aber biara a dzibew bi bɛda hɔ pan wɔ abaguafo a wɔabobɔ hɔn edzin yi ɔnam owu, anaadɛ osian mbrato ntsi woyi obi edzi fi ne dzibew do, anaa otu fi asɔr no bea hɔ a, ɔwɔ dɛ president anaa presidentfo no yi obi ma asɔfompanyin abaguafo no a osian dɛm dwumadzi yi ntsi woehyia mu na wogyina asɔr no ananmu no hwɛ hyɛ nyia oefi mu no ananmu.
Wɔnam nyikyerɛ do yi asɔr no mu president a ɔnoara so nye abaguafo no hɔn president no, na asɔrtɔw nyina no kã ho ma wɔgye no to mu dɛ ɔnhwɛ asɔr no do.
Na ne dzibew no na ɔma no ho kwan ma ɔhwɛ asɔr no mu abaguafo no do; na ɔyɛ ne ndzinoa dɛ onya presidentfo beenu bi so ma wɔboa no, a wɔnam dɛm kwan kor no ara a wɔnam do yii no no do, yi hɔn.

Na sɛ hɔn a wɔboa no no mu kor anaa beenu nyina a woeyi hɔn dɛ wɔmboa no no nnyi hɔ a, ɔwɔ tum dɛ odzi bano wɔ abaguafo no do a ɔboafo biara nnkã ho; na sɛ ɔnoara so nnyi hɔ a, presidentfo no wɔ tum dɛ wogyina n’ananmu hwɛ do, hɔn nyina anaa hɔn mu biara.

Aber biara a Christ n’asɔr mu abaguafo etsitsir no behyia wɔ no kwan do no, wɔ nhwɛdo a wɔahyehyɛ ato hɔ no do no, ɔyɛ abaguafo duebien no dwuma dɛ wɔbɔtow aba ahwɛ duebien no hɔn mu nyia ɔwɔ dɛ odzi kan kasa, wɔbɛhyɛ ase efi nkanee kor ara dze ekesi nkanee duebien no.

Aber biara a abaguafo yi behyia wɔ asɛm bi ho no, ɔwɔ dɛ abaguafo duebien no dzi kan hwɛ dɛ asɛm no yɛ dzen anaa ɔnnyɛ dzen; sɛ ɔnnyɛ dzen a, abaguafo no mu beenu ara na wɔbɛkasa ho, dɛ mbrɛ woedzi kan akyerɛ wɔ sor ha no.
Mbom sɛ wɔdwen ho hu dɛ asɛm no yɛ dzen a, wobeyi baanan, na sɛ ɔyɛ dzen papaapa a, wobeyi beesia; mbom kwan biara do no, onnyi dɛ hɔn a wobeyi hɔn dɛ wɔnkã no bor beesia.
Asɛm biara mu no, nyia wɔabɔ no sombo no wɔ kyɛfa dɛ abaguafo no mu fã twitwa gye no, aama woekwetsir dɛ wɔbɛkã nsɛm a ɔnnsɛ akyerɛ no anaadɛ woeebua no ntɛnkyew.

Na abaguafo a woeyi hɔn dɛ wɔnkasa wɔ abaguafo no enyim no wɔ dɛ wɔhwehwɛ asɛm no mu yie, hu no mu nokwar nyina ansaana wɔdze asɛm no abɔto abaguafo no nyina enyim, na hɔn mu biara wɔ dɛ ɔkasa wɔ kwan pa na pɛrpɛrdzi do.

Dɛm abaguafo a wobeyi hɔn dɛ nkanee a ɔyɛ 2, 4, 6, 8, 10 na 12 nye ankorankor a ɔwɔ dɛ wogyina ma nyia wɔabɔ no sombo no, na wotwitwa gye no, aama woekwetsir dɛ wɔbɛkã nsɛm a ɔnnfata akyerɛ no anaa woeebua no ntɛnkyew.

Asɛm biara mu no nyia ɔkɔbɔɔ sombo no, na nyia wɔbɔɔ no sombo no nyina wɔ kwan dɛ wɔkasa dze gye hɔnho wɔ abaguafo no enyim, woetsie adasegye no ewie ekyir no na abaguafo a woeyi hɔn dɛ wɔnhwehwɛ asɛm no mu ewie hɔn asɛm kã no.

Woetsie adasefo no, abaguafo no, nyia ɔkɔbɔɔ sombo na nyia wɔbɔɔ no sombo nyina akasa ewie no, afei president no bɛda n’adwen pɔw wɔ asɛm no ho edzi, na oebisa, abaguafo duebien no ma wɔatow aba wɔ adwenpɔw no ho.

Mbom sɛ abaguafo nkaa no a wɔannkasa no, anaa hɔn mu kor mpo tsie dasegye no nye no ho akyɛpa no na gyangyanbiara ohu mfom bi wɔ adwen pɔw a president no dze too gua no a, wotum da no edzi, na wodzi asɛm no bio.
Na sɛ wodzi asɛm no ahwɛyie mu bio wie na ekyir yi wohu dɛ nokwar bi epue a, ɔbɛsesã adwen pɔw no a ɔbɔe no dɛ mbrɛ ɔfata.
Mbom sɛ nokwar biara emmpue bio a, adwen pɔw no ara a odzi kan no do na wogyina, na abaguafo no mu dodowara wɔ tum dɛ wɔkyerɛ dɛmara.

Asɛm a ɔyɛ dzen a ɔfa nkyerɛkyerɛ anaa nokwar fapem ho no sɛ dza wɔakyerɛw ato hɔ no nndɔɔsõ a ɔbɛma abaguafo no etum ehu asɛm no mu yie a, dza president no wɔ dɛ ɔyɛ nye dɛ ɔdze asɛm no to Ewuradze enyim ama oeenya Ewuradze n’adwen wɔ ho wɔ nyikyerɛ kwan do.
Sɛ asɔfompanyin no wɔ akwantu mu so a, wɔwɔ tum dɛ wohyia mu na wɔfa dɛm kwan yi ara do dze frɛ na wɔhyehyɛ abaguafo bi a wobesiesie nsɛm a ɔyɛ dzen a nkorɔfo dodow biara dze abɔto hɔn enyim no.
Na dɛm asɔfompanyin abaguafo no wɔ tum dɛ dɛm aber no woyi hɔn mu kor ma ɔhwɛ nhyiamu no do.
Ɔyɛ dɛm abaguafo kuw no hɔn dwuma dɛ wɔkyerɛw kwan a wɔfaa do dzii asɛm bi na dase na nsɛm a wɔkãa wɔ ho nyina dze bɔɔ adwen pɔw no kɛma Asɔr no ne President a Odzi Kan na n’Apamfo no ntsɛmara.

Sɛ nkorɔfo a wodzii hɔn asɛm no, anaa hɔn mu binom enyi anngye kwan a dɛm abaguafo no hɔn adwen pɔw no ho a, otum dze kɔto Asɔr no President a Odzi Kan na n’Apamfo no, totɔserɛ abaguafo etsitsir egua no enyim ma wɔsan frɛ asɛm no bio; hɔn so bɛfa nhwɛdo kwan a wɔakyerɛw ato hɔ no do dze akã asɛm no tse dɛ mbrɛ wɔmmbɔɔ adwen pɔw wɔ dɛm asɛm no ho no pɛn mpo.

Gyedɛ asɛm no yɛ dzen papaapa, ansaana wɔato nsa afrɛ dɛm asɔfompanyin abaguafo no a wɔwɔ akwantu mu no ma wɔaakã asɔr no mu asɛm no; na sɛ asɛm no nnyɛ dzen biara anaa ho nnhia kɛse biara a, onnhia dɛ wɔto nsa frɛ dɛm abaguafo no.
Asɔfompanyin a wɔwɔ akwantu mu anaa wɔtse amanandze no wɔ tum dɛ wɔkã dɛ ohia anaa onnhia dɛ wɔto nsa frɛ dɛm abaguafo no ma wɔba.
Soronko bi da abaguafo anaadɛ asɔfompanyin a wɔwɔ akwantu mu no na abaguafo etsitsir a wɔyɛ akwantufo no a wɔyɛ asomafo duebien no hɔn adwen pɔw mu.
Hɔn a wodzi kan no hɔn adwen pɔw no, wotum san hwehwɛ mu bio; na mbom kuw a wɔtɔ do ebien no hɔn adwen pɔw no wonntum nnhwehwɛ mu bio.
Hɔn a wodzi ekyir yi dze, gyedɛ asɔr no mu dzibewdzi etumdzifo etsitsir na wɔato nsa afrɛ hɔn ebisa hɔn hɔn mbrato ho nsɛm.

Wɔgyee too mu: dɛ president anaa presidentfo a wɔtse Asɔr no ne President a Odzi Kan na n’Apamfo egua no do na wobenya tum a wɔdze bua dɛ ohia anaa onnhia dɛ wɔsan dzi asɛm bi a wɔdze abɔto hɔn enyim no bio na wɔahwehwɛ ntotɔserɛ na dase na nsɛm a wɔkãa faa ho no nyina mu.

Iyi ekyir no, abaguafo duebien no twee ntonto anaa wɔtoow aba dze hwɛɛ nyimpa a ɔsɛ dɛ odzi kan kasa, na ma no nsunsuando bɛyɛɛ nye yi: 1, Oliver Cowdery; 2, Joseph Coe; 3, Samuel H. Smith; 4, Luke Johnson; 5, John S. Carter; 6, Sylvester Smith; 7, John Johnson; 8, Orson Hyde; 9, Jared Carter; 10, Joseph Smith, Panyin; 11, John Smith; 12, Martin Harris.Wɔbɔɔ mpaa wiei no, wɔdze nhyiamu no baa ewiei.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/103.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 103
chapter_summary: 1–4, Siantsir a Ewuradze maa kwan ma wɔtseetsee Ahotseweefo no a wɔwɔ Jackson Mansin no; 5–10, Sɛ Ahotseweefo no dzi mbrasɛm no do a, wobedzi konyim; 11–20, Wɔnam tum do bɔpon Zion, na Ewuradze bedzi No nkorɔfo enyim akɔ; 21–28, Ɔwɔ dɛ Ahotseweefo no boa hɔn ano wɔ Zion, na hɔn a wɔdze hɔn nkwa to hɔ no benya no bio; 29–40, Wɔfrɛ enuanom binom dɛ wɔnhyehyɛ Zion ne nseraban, na womfi hɔ nkɛtsena Zion; wɔbɔ hɔn anohoba dɛ sɛ wodzi nokwar a wobedzi konyim.

verses.text: Nokwar, mese hom, m’anyɛnkofo dɛ, hwɛ, medze nyikyerɛ na mbrasɛm bɛma hom aama hom eehu mbrɛ hom besi ayɛ hom edwuma a ɔfa hom nuanom a wɔabɔ hɔn apetse wɔ Zion asaase do no hɔn nkwagye na hɔn ɔpon ho;
Hɔn a m’atamfo wɔabɔ hɔn apetse na ahaw hɔn no, na mubohue m’ebufuhyew a wonnkosusu ho no egu hɔn do wɔ mankasa me mber mu.
Na maama hɔn kwan ara ebodu sesei aama wɔaahyɛ hɔn emumuyɛ mã, na hɔn kɔɔpow ayɛ mã;
Na aama hɔn a wɔdze me dzin ato hɔn do no, wɔdze ntsẽa a ɔyɛ dzen ara yie atsẽa hɔn hyɛber kakra, osiandɛ woenntsie me nkyerɛkyerɛ nye mbrasɛm a medze maa hɔn no.
Na nokwar, mese hom dɛ, mahyɛ ɔmom a ɔwɔ dɛ mo nkorɔfo hyɛ no nsew na susuampaara dɛ wodzi do fi dɛm dɔn yi ara mu dze kɔ, na wotsie afotu a Emi, Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn dze bɛma hɔn no.
Hwɛ, ɔbɛyɛ hɔ, osiandɛ Emi na maahyɛ ho ɔmom, dza makã no bɛhyɛ ase dɔn yi mu ayɛ edwuma dze etsia m’atamfo.

Na sɛ wotsie na wɔyɛ nsɛm a Emi, Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn mebɛkã akyerɛ hɔn no a, wonnkegyaa dɛ wobedzi konyim ekodu dɛ wɔdze wiadze mu ahenman nyina bɛhyɛ m’ananadze, na wɔdze asaase nyina ama ahotseweefo no ma wɔafa no afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ.
Mbom susuampaara dɛ wonnkedzi me mbrasɛm do na wɔnnyɛ setsie mma me nsɛm nyina no, wiadze mu ahenman bedzi hɔn do konyim.
Osiandɛ, wɔayɛ hom kan ama wiadze, na wɔnyɛ adasa hɔn agyenkwa.
Na susuampaara dɛ wɔnnkɛyɛ nyimpa hɔn agyenkwa no, wɔbɛyɛ dɛ nkyen a ɔayew ne dɛw, onnye mma hwee bio, na mbom wɔtow gu ma nyimpa dze hɔn anan tsiatsia do.
Na nokwar, mese hom dɛ, mahyɛ ɔmom dɛ hom nuanom no a wɔabɔ hɔn apetse no bɛsan hɔn ekyir aba hɔn egyapadze asaase do, na wɔbɛkyekyer Zion ne mbea a wɔayɛ amamfo no.
Na abɛbrɛsɛ kɛse nyina ekyir no, dɛ mbrɛ makã akyerɛ hom wɔ me mbrasɛm a odzi kan no mu no, nhyira bɛba.

Hom nhwɛ, iyi nye nhyira a maabɔ hom ho anohoba dɛ ɔbɛba hom abɛbrɛsɛ ekyir no, na hom enuanom abɛbrɛsɛ ekyir no—hom mponee nye hom nuanom hɔn mponee, dɛ wɔbɛsan aba Zion asaase do mpo, wɔbɛtsena hɔ na wɔrunntum nndzi hom do da.
Naaso, sɛ wogu hɔn egyapadze no ho fĩ a, wɔbɔtow hɔn akyen; osiandɛ sɛ wogu hɔn egyapadze no ho fĩ a, meremmfa hɔnho nnkyɛ hɔn.
Hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, Zion no mponee no, ɔsɛ dɛ wɔdze nam tum do ba.
Dɛm ntsi, mebɛma ɔbarimba bi asoɛr ama mo nkorɔfo, a obedzi hɔn enyim tse dɛ mbrɛ Moses dzii Israelmba enyim no.
Na hom nye Israelmba, na hom yɛ Abraham n’asefo na ɔsɛ dɛ wɔdze tum, nye nsa a wɔatsen mu gye hom fi nkowaasom mu.
Na dɛ mbrɛ wodzii hom egyanom enyim ahyɛse no, dɛmara so na Zion no mponee no bɛyɛ.
Dɛm ntsi, mma hom akoma nntɔ bitsi, osiandɛ mennkã nnkyerɛ hom dɛ mbrɛ mekãa kyerɛɛ hom egyanom no: Mo bɔfoe bedzi hom enyim nye hom akɔ, na mbom nnyɛ mara m’enyim bi a.
Na mese hom dɛ: M’abɔfoe bedzi hom enyim akɔ, na emi mara m’enyim so, na ɔnnkɛkyɛr na hom akɛfa asaase pa no.
Nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba nye ɔbarimba no a medze no too akowaa no a wenyin ture no wura no kãa no ho asɛm wɔ abɛbusɛm a makã akyerɛ hom no mu no ho no.

Dɛm ntsi, hom mma m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba nkã nkyerɛ me fie mu dɔm no, me mberantsɛ nye hɔn a hɔn enyi efir kakra ara yie no dɛ—Hom mboaboa hom ano na hom nkɔ Zion asaase do, asaase no a medze sika tɔe na wɔatsew ho ama me no do.
Na hom mma nsɔr no nyina nsoma hɔn mu enyansafo no ma wɔmfa hɔn sika nkɔtɔ nsaase no dɛ mbrɛ mahyɛ hɔn no.

Na susuampaara dɛ m’atamfo bɛba hom do dɛ wɔrebɛpam hom efi m’asaase pa no do no efi homankasa hom nsaase mpo do dza matsew ho dɛ ɔbɛyɛ Zion asaase no, adasegye a hom nkyii hom dze bogu m’enyim dze etsia hɔn no, hom ndom hɔn;
Na obiara a hom dze ndom kã no no, me dze ndom bɛkã no, na hom bedzi m’atamfo hɔn wer ama me.
Na mebɛkã hom ho wɔ ber a hom ridzi m’atamfo hɔn wer ama me no, fi ebusuasantsen a ɔtɔ do ebiasa dze kesi anan no a wɔtan me no do.
Mma nyimpa biara nnsuro dɛ ɔdze no nkwa bɔto hɔ wɔ emi ntsi, na obiara a ɔdze no nkwa bɔto hɔ wɔ emi ntsi no, benya no bio.
Na obiara a ɔmmpɛ dɛ ɔdze no nkwa to hɔ wɔ emi ntsi no nnyɛ mo suanyi.

Ɔyɛ me pɛ dɛ m’akowaa Sidney Rigdon bɛma ne ndze do wɔ asɔrmba a wɔwɔ boka aman do no mu, dze akyerɛkyerɛ nsɔr no ma woeedzi mbrasɛm a medze ama hɔn no a ɔfa Zion ne nsan anan mu na no mponee ho no do.

Ɔyɛ me pɛ dɛ m’akowaa Parley P. Pratt nye m’akowaa Lyman Wight nnkɛsan hɔn ekyir akɔ hɔn nuanom no hɔn asaase do, kesi dɛ wobenya me fie mu dɔm a wɔnye hɔn bɔkɔ Zion asaase do, ekuwekuw du du, anaa eduonu eduonu, anaa eduonum eduonum, anaa ɔha ɔha, kɛpem dɛ wobenya me fifo ahaenum no.
Hwɛ, iyi nye me pɛ; hom mbisa na hom nsa bɛkã; mbom adasa nnyɛ m’apɛdze daa.
Dɛm ntsi, sɛ hom enntum ennya ahaenum a, hom nsi nketse nhwɛ dɛ gyangyanbiara hom botum enya ahaebiasa a.
Na sɛ hom ennya ahaebiasa a, hom nsi nketse dɛ hom botum enya ɔha.
Mbom nokwar, mese hom dɛ, mbrasɛm a medze ma hom nye dɛ, mma hom nnkɔ Zion asaase do kesi dɛ hom benya me fie mu dɔm ɔha na wɔnye hɔn akɔ Zion asaase do.

Dɛm ntsi, dɛ mbrɛ mekãa kyerɛɛ hom, dɛ hom mbisa na hom nsa bɛkã; hom mbɔ mpaa enyiberdo dɛ gyangyanbiara m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba nye hom bɔkɔ, na ɔahwɛ mo nkorɔfo do, na ɔakyekyer m’ahenman no wɔ asaase a matsew ho no do, na ɔahwɛ ma Zion mba no etsim hɔ, na woedzi mbrasɛm a wɔdze ama hɔn nye dza wɔdze bɛma hɔn no do.
Wɔnam hom mbɔdzembɔ, nokwardzi na gyedzi mpaabɔ do dze konyimdzi na enyimnyam nyina brɛ hom.
Hom mma m’akowaa Parley P. Pratt nye m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, ntu kwan.
Hom mma m’akowaa Lyman Wight nye m’akowaa Sidney Rigdon ntu kwan.
Hom mma m’akowaa Hyrum Smith nye m’akowaa Frederick G. Williams ntu kwan.

Hom mma m’akowaa Orson Hyde nye m’akowaa Orson Pratt ntu kwan nkɔ beebiara a m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, bɛse hɔn no, ama wɔaama mbrasɛm yinom a medze ama hom no ahyɛ mã, na hom ngyaa dza aka no nhyɛ me nsa. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/104.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 104
chapter_summary: 1–10, Ahotseweefo a wɔtõ nkabɔmu nhyehyɛɛ no mu mbra no ndom bɛkã hɔn; 11–16, Ewuradze wɔ nankasa No kwan a ɔfa do dze boa N’Ahotseweefo; 17–18, Asɛmpa mbra no na ɔhwɛ ma wɔboa ehiafo; 19–46, Wɔkyekyɛ dwumadzi na nhyira ma enuanom binom; 47–53, Nkabɔmu nhyehyɛɛ a ɔwɔ Kirtland no na nhyehyɛɛ a ɔwɔ Zion no no mu biara wɔdɛ odzi nankasa no dwuma; 54–66, Woetu Ewuradze no foto a wɔatsew ho no esi hɔ dɛ wɔdze betsintsim kyerɛwsɛm no; 67–77, Ɔwɔ dɛ wɔyɛ adwen kor dze hwɛ nkabɔmu nhyehyɛɛ ne sikakorabew nyina no do; 78–86, Hɔn a wɔwɔ nkabɔmu nhyehyɛɛ no mu no wɔdɛ wotua hɔn akaw nyina, na Ewuradze beyi hɔn efi ohia nkowaasom mu.

verses.text: Nokwar, mese hom, m’anyɛnkofo dɛ, mema hom afotu na mbrasɛm a ɔfa egyapadze nyinara a ɔyɛ nhyehyɛɛ yi a mehyɛɛ hom dɛ hom nkyekyer ma ɔmbɛyɛ nkabɔmu nhyehyɛɛ, na nhyehyɛɛ a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem a ɔwɔ m’asɔr mu, na ɔdze nkwagye bɛma nyimpa kɛpem dɛ mebɛba—
Mobɔ anohoba a otsim hɔ na ɔnnsakyer, na susuampaara dɛ hɔn a mehyɛɛ hɔn no bedzi nokwar no, wɔdze nhyira mbɔho behyira hɔn.
Mbom susuampaara dɛ wonndzi nokwar no, wɔbɛn ndom mu.
Dɛm ntsi, susuampaara dɛ mo nkowaa binom enndzi mbrasɛm no do, na mbom wɔnam enyiber nye ndaadaasɛm do atõ ahyɛmu no, medze ndom yaayaw na ɔyɛ dzen bɔdom hɔn.

Na emi, Ewuradze, mahyɛ ɔmom wɔ m’akoma mu dɛ, susuampaara dɛ obi a ɔkã nhyehyɛɛ no ho wobohu no dɛ ɔyɛ mbratonyi no, anaadɛ, ɔbɔtõ ahyɛmu a woedzi dze akyekyer hom no, wɔbɔdom no no nkwa nda nyina, na mebɛma nyia mepɛ no etsiatsia no do;
Na Emi, Ewuradze, wonnsi me atwetwe wɔ ndzɛmba yinom mu—

Na ɔtse dɛm, amma wɔaammfa hɔn a wɔnnyɛɛ bɔn no ammfora mbratofo no emmbu hɔn fɔ, amma afɔdzifo a wɔwɔ hom mu no emmfi nsa; osiandɛ emi, Ewuradze, mabɔ hom anohoba dɛ mebɛma hom enyimnyam ahenkyɛw wɔ m’abanyimfa.
Dɛm ntsi, susuampaara dɛ wohu hom dɛ hom yɛ mbratofo no, hom nnkotum efi m’ebufuhyew nsa wɔ hom nkwa nda mu.
Susuampaara dɛ osian mbrato ntsi, woetwa hom akyen no, hom nnkotum efi Satan n’ekutukubɔ mu ekesi ɔpon da no.

Na afei merema hom tum fi dɔn yi ara mu, na hom nhyehyɛɛ yi mu obiara a hom bohu dɛ ɔyɛ mbratonyi na oennu noho wɔ no bɔn a ɔayɛ ho no, wonyi no mfa no mma Satan n’ekutukubɔ; na orinnya tum biara mmfa bɔn bi mmba hom do.
Iyi nye me nyansaa, dɛm ntsi, mbrasɛm a medze ma hom nye dɛ, hom ntoto hom ndzɛmba nyina yie wɔ hom mu, na hom mfa obiara n’edwuma nhyɛ ne nsa.
Ama obiara eetum ebu n’edwuma a wɔdze ahyɛ ne nsa no ho nkontaa akyerɛ me.
Osiandɛ ohia dɛ Emi, Ewuradze, mebɛma obiara ebu n’edwuma ho nkontaa dɛ ɔhwɛfo wɔ asaase do nhyira ho, dza mayɛ na mesiesie dze ama m’abɔdze.
Emi, Ewuradze, metserɛɛw ɔsor mu na meyɛɛ asaase a ɔyɛ me nsaano edwuma ankasa; na ndzɛmba a ɔwɔ mu nyina yɛ medze.
Na ɔyɛ mo botae dɛ mehyɛ m’ahotseweefo hɔn ehiadze osiandɛ ndzɛmba nyina yɛ medze.

Mbom ɔwɔ dɛ wɔyɛ no mankasa mo kwan do; na hwɛ, dɛm kwan yi do na Emi, Ewuradze, maahyɛ ho ɔmom dɛ mebɛfa do dze m’ahotseweefo hɔn ehiadze ama hɔn, ama wɔaakrɔn ehiafo no, dɛm na ɔbɛma wɔabrɛ esikafo adze.
Osiandɛ asaase do ahyɛ mã, na pii wɔ ma ɔbor do; nyew, mesiesie ndzɛmba nyina, na medze ama adasamba dɛ wɔnhwɛ hɔnankasa hɔnho do.

Dɛm ntsi, sɛ obi fa me ndzɛmba a mayɛ no mu pii, na ɔammfa nedze no mu bi amma ehiafo na abɔbɔfo dɛ mbrɛ mbra a ɔwɔ m’asɛmpa no ho tse a, onyia no nye emumuyɛfo bɛma hɔn enyi do wɔ hɛl a ɔwɔ ahohyehye mu.
Na afei, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, dza mekã wɔ nhyehyɛɛ no n’egyapadze ho nye yi—

Wɔmma m’akowaa Sidney Rigdon ntsena bea a ɔtse seseiara no, na ɔmfa bea a ɔyɛ mbowawoma ho edwuma no nkã ho, mfa nhwɛ noho ber a ɔreyɛ edwuma wɔ mo wenyin ture mu no, dɛ mbrɛ mepɛ mpo, wɔ ber a mebɛhyɛ no.
Na hom nyɛ ndzɛmba nyina dɛ mbrɛ nhyehyɛɛ a wɔahyehyɛ ato hɔ no tse, nye dza dɔm a wɔwɔ nhyehyɛɛ no a ɔwɔ Kirtland asaase do no esi hɔn adwen pi wɔ ho anaa wɔdze ndze kor se no.
Na edwumadzi nye nhyira yi, na Emi, Ewuradze, medze ma m’akowaa Sidney Rigdon dɛ ɔnyɛ nhyira mma ɔno na n’asefo a wɔbɛba ekyir no nyina.
Na susuampaara dɛ ɔbrɛ noho adze wɔ, m’enyim no, mobɔbɔ nhyira a medze bɛma no no ho.
Na bio, hom mma m’akowaa Martin Harris mfa asaase a m’akowaa John Johnson dze n’egyapadze dadaw asesã no nyɛ no dwumadzi, ɔno nye n’asefo a wɔbɛba wɔ ekyir nyina;
Na susuampaara dɛ obedzi nokwar no, mobɔbɔ nhyira a medze bɛma ɔno na n’asefo a wɔbɛba ekyir nyina ho.
Na hom mma m’akowaa Martin Harris mfa ne sika nsi hɔ ma wɔmfa mbɔ me nsɛm dawur, dɛ mbrɛ m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba bɛkyerɛ no.
Na bio, hom mma m’akowaa Frederick G. Williams mfa bea a ɔtse seseiara no.
Na hom mma m’akowaa Oliver Cowdery mfa bea no a ɔtoa dan no a ɔbɛyɛ ɔfese a wobetsintsim nwoma wɔ no, ɔyɛ asaase a odzi kan no, na asaase so a n’egya tse do no.
Na hom mma m’akowaa Frederick G. Williams, nye Oliver Cowdery mfa ɔfese a wotsintsim nwoma no nye ndzɛmba nyina a ɔkã ho no.
Na iyi bɛyɛ dwumadzi a wɔdze bɛhyɛ hɔn nsa dɛ wondzi.
Na susuampaara dɛ wobedzi nokwar no, hwɛ, mibehyira hɔn, na mabɔ nhyira a medze bɛma hɔn no ho.
Na iyi nye dwumadzi a medze ama hɔn nye hɔn asefo a wɔbɛba no n’ahyɛse.
Na susuampaara dɛ wobedzi nokwar no, mobɔbɔ nhyira a medze bɛma hɔn nye hɔn asefo a wɔbɛba ekyir no nyina ho, nhyira mbɔho mpo.

Na bio, hom mma m’akowaa John Johnson mfa fie a ɔtse mu no nye egyapadze a ɔkã ho nyina, gyedɛ asaase a medze ato hɔ a wobesisi m’adan wɔ do no, dza ɔfa no dɛm egyapadze no ho no, nye dɛm nsaase a wɔabɔ dzin dze ama m’akowaa Oliver Cowdery no nko.
Na susuampaara dɛ odzi nokwar no, mobɔbɔ ne nhyira ho.

Na ɔyɛ me pɛ dɛ susuampaara dɛ Sunsum ne ndze no bɛda no edzi, na nhyehyɛɛ no pam no bɛkyerɛ, na ma nhyehyɛɛ no dze hɔn ndze bɛkã no, ɔbɔtɔn nsaase a wɔdze esi hɔ dɛ wobesisi m’ahotseweefo hɔn adan wɔ do no.
Na iyi nye dwumadzi a medze ama no a ɔbɛyɛ nhyira ama ɔno nye n’asefo nyina no n’ahyɛse.
Na susuampaara dɛ odzi nokwar no, mobɔbɔ nhyira a medze bɛma no no ho mbɔho.

Na bio, hom mma m’akowaa Newel K. Whitney mfa adan nye asaase a ɔtse mu seseiara no, na asaase a eguadzidan si do no, nye asaase so a ɔhyɛ kutuw a ɔda eguadzidan no n’anaafo, nye asaase so a wɔyɛ nsõ edwuma no.

Na iyi nyinara medze ama m’akowaa Newel K. Whitney na iyi yɛ nhyira a medze ma ɔno nye n’asefo a wɔbɛba nyina, ama eguadzidan no ho aaba mfaso ama me nhyehyɛɛ a makyekyer ama me stake a ɔwɔ Kirtland asaase do no.
Nyew, nokwar, iyi yɛ dwumadzi a medze ama m’akowaa N. K. Whitney, ɔyɛ eguadzidwuma no medze ama ɔno nye n’ananmusinyi, nye n’asefo a wɔbɛba nyina.
Na susuampaara dɛ odzi nokwar, na odzi me mbrasɛm do no, mobɔbɔ nhyira a medze bɛma no no ho mbɔho mbɔho.

Na bio, hom mma m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba mfa asaase a nkyɛ woribesi me dan wɔ do no, dza ne tsentsen yɛ ahoma eduanan na ne tɛtɛr so yɛ ahoma duebien no, nye egyapadze so a n’egya tse do seseiara no;
Na iyi nye dwumadzi a medze ama no a ɔbɛyɛ nhyira ama ɔno nye n’egya.
Na hwɛ, mowɔ egyapadze bi wɔ hɔ dze ma n’egya, dza ɔdze bɔhwɛ noho; dɛm ntsi, wɔbɛkan no akã m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba ne fifo ho;
Na susuampaara dɛ m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba bedzi nokwar ama me no, mobɔbɔ nhyira mbɔho egu ne fie do, nhyira mbɔho mbɔho mpo.
Na afei, mbrasɛm a ɔfa Zion ho a medze ma hom nye dɛ, wɔrennkã hom nye nkabɔmu nhyehyɛɛ a ɔwɔ Zion no mmbɔ mu dɛ hom yɛ kuw kor bio, gyedɛ ɔnam dɛm kwan yi nko do—
Hom akyekyer ewie no wɔbɛfrɛ hom Zion Stake Nkabɔmu Nhyehyɛɛ a ɔwɔ Kirtland Kuropɔn mu. Na hom nuanom no so kyekyer wie a, wɔbɛfrɛ hɔn Nkabɔmu Nhyehyɛɛ a ɔwɔ Zion Kuropɔn mu.
Na wɔbɛkyekyer no wɔ hɔnankasa hɔn edzin mu, na hɔnankasa dzin mu; na wobedzi hɔn dwuma nyina wɔ hɔnankasa hɔn dzin mu na hɔnankasa edzin mu;
Na hom so hom bedzi hom dwuma nyina wɔ homankasa dzin mu, na homankasa hom edzin mu.
Na dɛm na mahyɛ hom, dɛ hom nyɛ mfa mma hom nkwagye; nye hɔn so hɔn nkwagye, ɔnam dɛ wɔaapam hɔn na wɔ dza ɔbɛba no ho.
Ahyɛmu a wɔnam mbrato, enyiber nye ndaadaa nsɛm do atõ—

Dɛm ntsi, woegu hom nye hom nuanom dɛ hom yɛ nkabɔmu nhyehyɛɛ, ntsi obesi dɛm dɔn yi hom nnkã hɔn ho gyedɛ, wɔ kwan yi do nko dɛ mbrɛ mekãe no, gyedɛ nhyehyɛɛ yi mu abaguafo gye to mu na wɔbɔ hom bosa a hom behia, na dɛ mbrɛ abaguafo no ndze bɛkyerɛ.
Na bio, medze mbrasɛm yi ma hom wɔ dwumadzi a medze ahyɛ hom nsa no ho;
Hwɛ, egyapadze yinom nyinara yɛ medze, ɔnntse dɛm a, nna hom gyedzi yɛ kwa, na hom yɛ enyidosomkyerɛfo, na hom enndzi ahyɛmu a hom nye me edzi no do;
Na sɛ egyapadze no yɛ medze a, nna hom yɛ ahwɛfo, ɔnntse dɛm a, nna hom nnyɛ ahwɛfo.
Mbom, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, meyi hom dɛ edwumayɛfo wɔ me fie mu, edwumayɛfo ankasa.
Na botae iyi ho ntsi na mahyɛ hom dɛ hom nyɛ ahoboa na hom ntsintsim me nsɛm mpo, me kyerɛwsɛm ne mãhyɛ no, nyikyerɛ a medze ama hom nye dza ofi ber to ber mibeyi akyerɛ hom—
Ama maabɛkyekyer m’asɔr na ahenman wɔ asaase do, na mebesiesie mo nkorɔfo ama ber a menye hɔn bɛtsena, na aber no abɛn.
Na hom besiesie beebi a wɔdze bɛyɛ sikakoradze no ama homho, na hom ehyira do ama me dzin.
Na hom nyi obi wɔ hom mu a ɔbɔhwɛ sikakoradze no do, na wobehyira no ama dwumadzi yi.
Na ɔwɔ dɛ wɔsɔw sikakoradze no ano, na ɔwɔ dɛ wɔdze ndzɛmba a ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn nyina hyɛ sikakoradze no mu; na mma hom mu biara nnkã dɛ ɔyɛ nedze, anaadɛ ne fã bi yɛ nedze, na odzi wɔ hom nyina pɛpɛɛpɛr.

Na medze ma hom fi dɛm dɔn yi ara mu; na afei, hom nhwɛ na hom nkɛyɛ dwumadzi a medze ahyɛ hom nsa no, ndzɛmba a ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn no nnkã ho, osian nwoma ne ntsintsimii no ntsi, dɛm ndzɛmba a ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn dɛ mbrɛ makã no.

Na mfaso a obefi ndzɛmba a ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn no mu aba no bɔkɔ sikakoradze no mu, na wɔdze nsɔwano asɔw ano; na onnyi dɛ obiara fa bi yɛ biribiara, nna onnyi so dɛ obiara yi nsɔwano a wɔdze asɔw ano no, gyedɛ nhyehyɛɛ no ndze, anaadɛ wɔ mbrasɛm do.
Na dɛm na ɔsɛ dɛ hom kora mfaso a obefi ndzɛmba a ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn wɔ sikakoradze no mu ama wɔdze ato hɔ ama botae a ho tsew na ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn.
Na iyi na wɔbɛfrɛ no Ewuradze ne sikakoradze krɔnkrɔn; na woegya nsɔwano no wɔ ho ama wɔayɛ krɔnkrɔn na wɔatsew ho ama Ewuradze.
Na bio, wɔnyɛ sikakoradze kor so, na wonyi sikasɛm ɔhwɛfo ma ɔnhwɛ sikakoradze no do, na wɔmfa nsɔwano nsɔw ano;

Na sika nyina a hom benya efi hom dwumadzi mu no, egyapadze no ɔsɛ dɛ wotu no mpon no, a ɔyɛ adan anaa nsaase, anaa anantwi, ndzɛmba nyina gyedɛ nkyerɛwee krɔnkrɔn a no ho tsew no a makora do ama moho a wɔdze ato hɔ ama botae a ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn na no ho tsew no nko, na sika a hom nsa bɛkã no hom mfa ngu sikakoradze no mu ntsɛmara, na wɔnhyehyɛ no ɔha ɔha, anaa eduonum eduonum, anaa eduonu eduonu, anaa enum enum.
Mekyerɛ dɛ, sɛ hom mu biara nya dollar enum a, wɔmma ɔmfa ngu sikakoradze no mu; anaa sɛ onya du, anaa eduonu, anaa eduonum, anaa ɔha a, wɔmma ɔnyɛ no dɛmara;
Na mma hom mu biara nnkã dɛ ɔyɛ nankasa nedze, osiandɛ wɔrennkã dɛ ɔyɛ nedze, nna no mu biara so nnyɛ nedze.
Na onnyi dɛ woyi no mu biara fi sikakoradze no mu dze yɛ biribi anaadɛ wɔdze nsa kã, gyedɛ ɔnam nhyehyɛɛ no ne ndze do na hɔn nyina wɔagye ato mu.
Na iyi bɛyɛ nhyehyɛɛ no ne ndze na hɔn nyina agye ato mu—aama obi a ɔwɔ hom mu etum ase sikasɛm ɔhwɛfo no do dɛ ohia biribi a ɔtse dɛm dze aboa me wɔ me dwumadzi ho—
Sɛ ɔyɛ dollar enum, anaa dollar du, anaa eduonu, anaa eduonum, anaa ɔha a, sikasɛm ɔhwɛfo no dze sika a ɔrohwehwɛ no bɛma no dze aboa no wɔ no dwumadzi mu—
Gyedɛ wohu dɛ ɔyɛ mbratonyi, na ada nhyehyɛɛ no n’abaguafo enyim pefee dɛ ɔnnyɛ ɔhwɛfo nokwafo na onnyim nyansa so.
Mbom mber dodowara a ɔkã fɛkuw no ho na odzi mu wɔ mo no, na ɔyɛ nokwafo na nyansafo wɔ no dwumadzi ho no, iyi bɛyɛ dasedzi akyerɛ nyia ɔhwɛ sikakoradze no do no, ma ɔdze dza ɔrohwehwɛ no ama no.
Mbom sɛ ɔyɛ mbrato a, dza abaguafo no nye nhyehyɛɛ ndze no bɛkã no na sikasɛm ɔhwɛfo no bɛyɛ.
Na sɛ wohu so dɛ sikasɛm ɔhwɛfo no nnyɛ nokwafo na ɔnnyɛ ɔhwɛfo nyansafo so a, abaguafo no nye nhyehyɛɛ ndze no bɛkã ma woeyi no efi ne dzibew no do na woeyi nyimpa fofor dze no ahyɛ n’ananmu.
Na bio, nokwar, merekã biribi a ɔfa hom kaw ho—hwɛ, ɔyɛ me pɛ dɛ hom botua hom akaw nyina.
Na ɔyɛ me pɛ dɛ hom bɛbrɛ homho adze wɔ m’enyim, na hom dua hom mbɔdzembɔ na ahobrɛadze na gyedzi mpaabɔ do enya dɛm nhyira no.
Na susuampaara dɛ hom bɔbɔ mbɔdzen na hom abrɛ homho adze, na hom abɔ gyedzi mpaa no, hwɛ, mobɔdwedwe hɔn a hom dze hɔn kaw no hɔn akoma, kesi dɛ mebɛma wɔdze mboa bɛbrɛ hom ma hom dze agye homho.
Dɛm ntsi, hom nkyerɛw krataa ntsɛmara nkɔ New York na hom nkyerɛw dza mo Sunsum no bɛse hom no; na mobɔdwedwe hɔn a hom dze hɔn kaw no hɔn akoma ama eefi hɔn adwen mu, amma wɔaannhaw hom.
Na susuampaara dɛ hom bɛbrɛ homho adze na hom edzi nokwar, na hom abɔ me dzin ebisa no, mebɛma hom edzi konyim.
Mobɔ hom anohoba dɛ, wɔbɛgye hom prɛko pɛr efi hom nkowaasom mu.
Susuampaara dɛ hom nya kwan bɔ mbosa ɔha ɔha anaa mpempem araa kesi dɛ hom botum abɔ mbosa ara yie dze agye homho efi nkowaasom mu a, iyi yɛ hom ndzinoa.
Na hom mfa egyapadze a medze ahyɛ hom nsa no nsi ahoba mber prɛko pɛr yi mu, dɛ hom bɛyɛ adwen kor dze hom edzin ama anaadɛ hom bɛyɛ biribi fofor a hom hwɛ a obeye ama hom.

Medze ndzinoa yi ma hom prɛko pɛr; na hwɛ, sɛ hom hyɛ ase dɛ hom reyɛ ndzɛmba a medze ato hom enyim yi, dɛ mbrɛ me mbrasɛm se a, ndzɛmba yinom nyina yɛ medze, na hom yɛ m’ahwɛfo, na ofiwura no ronnhwɛ mma wommbububu ne dan enndua mu. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/105.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 105
chapter_summary: 1–5, Wɔbɛkyekyer Zion dɛ mbrɛ celestial ahenman mbra no tse; 6–13, Wɔtwẽ Zion no mponee no kɔ ekyir, hyɛber kakra; 14–19, Ewuradze bɔkõ Zion ɔkõ no; 20–26, Ber a Ahotseweefo no roboa hɔn ano no, ɔwɔ dɛ wohu nyansa, onnyi dɛ wotuw wɔ ndwuma akɛse ho; 27–30, Nsaase a ɔwɔ Jackson nye amansin a ɔtoatoa do no ɔwɔ dɛ wɔtɔ; 31–34, Elderfo no wɔ dɛ hɔn nsa ka endowment wɔ Ewuradze ne fi a ɔwɔ Kirtland no mu; 35–37, Wɔbɛtsew Ahotseweefo a wɔafrɛ hɔn nye hɔn a wɔasan mu eyi hɔn no nyina ho; 38–41, Ahotseweefo no wɔdɛ wɔma asomdwee frankaa do kyerɛ wiadze.

verses.text: Nokwar, mese hom a hom ehyia ha dɛ hom ribetsie m’anomusɛm a ɔfa mo nkorɔfo a woruhu amandze no hɔn mponee ho—
Hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, sɛ nnyɛ mo nkorɔfo hɔn mbrato a, mekyerɛ asɔrtɔw no, na nnyɛ ankorankor, nkyɛ obodu sisei wɔapon hɔn dada.

Mbom hwɛ, wonnsũaa dɛ wɔbɛyɛ setsie ama ndzɛmba a morohwehwɛ efi hɔn nsamu no ho, mbom emumuyɛ ahorow ahyɛ hɔn mã na wɔmmfa hɔn ahodze mma ehiafo nye hɔn a woruhu amandze wɔ hɔn mu no, dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɛ dɛ ahotseweefo yɛ;
Na wɔnnyɛ kor, dɛ mbrɛ celestial ahenman ho mbra no kyerɛ nkabɔmu no;
Na worunntum nnkyekyer Zion, gyedɛ wodzi celestial ahenman ne fapem mbra no do, annyɛ dɛm a munnkotum agye no aba mo hɔ.
Na sɛ obehia dɛ wodua dɛm amandzehu kwan yi do a, ɔsɛ dɛ wɔtsẽa mo nkorɔfo kɛpem dɛ wobosũa mbrɛ wosi yɛ setsie.
Mennkã iyi nnkyerɛ hɔn a woeyi hɔn dɛ wɔnhwɛ mo nkorɔfo do no, hɔn a wɔyɛ m’asɔr ne elderfo a wodzi kan no, na hɔndze wɔnnhyɛ dɛm afɔdzi yi ase;
Mbom mekasa kyerɛ mo nsɔr a wɔwɔ mbeambea no—dodowara bɛse dɛ: Hom Nyame no wɔ hen? Hwɛ, ɔbɛgye hɔn wɔ ɔhaw ber mu, annyɛ dɛm a yɛronnkɔ Zion hɔ, na yɛdze hɛn sika besie.
Dɛm ntsi, osian mo nkorɔfo hɔn mbrato ntsi, obeye ama me elderfo no dɛ wɔbɔtweɔn hyɛber kakra ansaana wɔapon Zion—
Ama hɔnankasa woeetum esiesie hɔnho, na ama wɔakyerɛkyerɛ mo nkorɔfo emudzi mu na woenya sũahu, na woeehu dza ɔfa hɔn ndwuma ho emudzi mu, nye ndzɛmba a morohwehwɛ efi hɔn nsamu.
Na worunntum nnyɛ iyi ekesi dɛ me elderfo no benya tum akyɛdze efi sor.
Na hwɛ, sɛ wodzi nokwar na susuampaara dɛ wɔkɔ do brɛ hɔnho adze wɔ m’enyim a, mesiesie endowment kɛsenara nye nhyira a mubohue egu hɔn do.
Dɛm ntsi, ohia ma me dɛ me elderfo no bɔtweɔn hyɛber kakra, ansaana wɔapon Zion.
Na hwɛ, moronnhwehwɛ mmfi hɔn nsamu mma wɔnnkõ Zion akõ no; na dɛ mbrɛ mekãe wɔ mbrasɛm dadaw no mu no, dɛmara so na mebɛyɛ—Mobɔ kõ hom kõ.

Hwɛ, masoma ɔsɛɛfo no dɛ ɔnkɔ nkɛsɛɛ na ɔnyɛ m’atamfo afoafo; na ɔnnkedzi mfe pii na woeyi hɔn efi hɔ amma woeenngu m’egyapadze ho fĩ, na wɔaannkã ebususɛm enntsia me dzin wɔ nsaase a mehyira do ama dɛ wɔmboaboa m’ahotseweefo ano wɔ hɔ no.

Hwɛ, mahyɛ m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba dɛ ɔnse me fie mu dɔm, m’akõfo mpo, me mberantsɛ, nye hɔn a hɔn enyi efir kakra no, dɛ wɔmboa hɔn ano na wɔnkɔ nkɔpon mo nkorɔfo, na wombubu m’atamfo hɔn abantsentsen nyina ngu famu, na wɔmbɔ hɔn aweɔmfo no mpetse;
Mbom me fie mu dɔm no enntsie me nsɛm.
Mbom susuampaara dɛ binom wɔ hɔ a woetsie me nsɛm no, sɛ wɔkɔ do dzi nokwar a, mesiesie nhyira nye endowment ama hɔn.
Matse hɔn mpaabɔ, na mebɛgye hɔn afɔrbɔ; na oye ma me dɛ wɔama wɔatsena hɔ dze ebodu sesei ama wɔdze asɔ hɔn gyedzi ahwɛ.
Na afei, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, medze mbrasɛm rema hom, na hom mu dodow biara a wɔaba ha na wobotum atsena mantɔw mu ha no, wɔmma wɔntsena;
Na hɔn a wonnkotum atsena a wɔwɔ ebusua ebusua wɔ boka mantɔw mu no, hom mma wontsintsim hyɛber kakra nkesi dɛ m’akowaa Joseph bɛkyerɛ hɔn dza wɔnyɛ;
Na mubotu no fo wɔ dɛm asɛm yi ho, na ndzɛmba biara a ɔdze bɛkyerɛ hɔn no bɛhyɛ mã.

Na hom mma mo nkorɔfo a wɔtse mantɔw mu ha nyinara ndzi nokwar na wɔmbɔ mpaa, na wɔmbrɛ hɔnho adze wɔ m’enyim, amma wɔaannda ndzɛmba a meeyi akyerɛ hɔn no edzi annkyerɛ hɔn kɛpem dɛ ɔbɛyɛ nyansadze wɔ mo mu.

Mma hom nnkã atsɛmbu ho nsɛm, nna mma hom mmfa gyedzi nye ndwuma akɛse nnhyehyɛ homho, mbom hom ntɔ hom bo mboaboa hom ano ara yie wɔ mantɔw kor mu dɛ mbrɛ hom botum, dɛ mbrɛ nkorɔfo no hɔn tsema bɛma ho kwan no;

Na hwɛ, mebɛma hom enya enyimpa na adom wɔ hɔn enyi do, ama hom ahom wɔ asomdwee na bambɔ, ber a hom rekasa kyerɛ nkorɔfo dɛ: Hom mbu atsɛn tsenenee na hom ndzi pɛrpɛr mma hɛn dɛ mbrɛ mbra no se, na wontua bɔn a wɔdze ayɛ hɛn no ho kaw.
Afei, hwɛ, mese hom, m’anyɛnkofo dɛ, dɛm kwan yi na hom nam do benya enyimpa wɔ nkorɔfo no enyi do, kɛpem dɛ Israel nsordaafo bɔdɔr.
Na ofi ber to ber mobɔgow nkorɔfo no hɔn akoma, dɛ mbrɛ mogoow Pharaoh n’akoma, kɛpem dɛ m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba nye me elderfo benya ber aboaboa me fie mu dɔm ano.
Na wɔasoma enyansafo ma wɔakɛyɛ dza mahyɛ hɔn a ɔfa asaase a ɔwɔ Jackson mansin nye amansin a etwa ho ehyia no no ntɔe ho no.
Na ɔyɛ me pɛ dɛ wɔtɔ dɛm nsaase yinom; na wɔtɔ wie a wɔmma ahotseweefo no mfa dɛ mbrɛ mbra a medze ama no a ɔfa etuhoakyɛ no kyerɛ.

Na wɔatɔ asaase no ewie no, meremmfa afɔdzi biara mma Israel nsordaafo no dɛ wɔafa hɔnankasa hɔn nsaase a wɔdze hɔn sika atɔ no dada, na woebubu m’atamfo hɔn abantsentsen a ɔwɔ do no, na wɔabɔ hɔn aweɔmfo no apetse, na woridzi m’atamfo hɔn wer, dze ekesi ebusuasantsen ebiasa na anan a wokyir me no do.
Mbom, odzi kan, wɔmma mo nsordaafo no ndɔr, na wɔmma wɔntsew hɔnho wɔ m’enyim, ama wɔaabɛyɛ fɛw dɛ ewia, na hɔn enyim aatsew dɛ bosoom, ama ne mfrankaa ayɛ aman nyina hu;
Ama wɔahyɛ ahenman nyina a ɔwɔ wiadze yi mu ma wɔaagye ato mu dɛ Zion ahenman no yɛ hɛn Nyankopɔn nye ne Christ hɔn ahenman ara ampa; dɛm ntsi, hom mma yendzi ne mbra do.
Nokwar, mese hom dɛ, obeye ama me dɛ m’asɔr no mu elderfo a wodzi kan no hɔn nsa bɛkã hɔn endowment a ofi sor no wɔ me fie, dza mahyɛ dɛ wonsi mma me dzin wɔ Kirtland asaase do no.
Na sɛ wɔpon Zion a, ekyir no hom mfa dɛm mbrasɛm a medze ama a ɔfa Zion ne mbra ho no ndzi dwuma ma ɔnhyɛ mã.
Ɔfrɛ da no aba, na mbom da a wɔdze yiyi mu so ne mber aso; na hom mma wɔnsan mu nyiyi hɔn a wodzi mu no.
Na wɔnam Sunsum no ne ndze do bɛda no edzi akyerɛ m’akowaa, hɔn a wɔasan mu eyi hɔn no; na wɔbɛtsew hɔn ho;
Na susuampaara dɛ wobedzi afotu a wɔdze ma hɔn do no, nda kakra ekyir no, wobenya tum dze ayɛ ndzɛmba nyina a ɔfa Zion ho.
Na bio, mese hom dɛ, hom mper nhwehwɛ asomdwee, nnyɛ dɛ wɔdze rema nkorɔfo a wɔatseetsee hom no nkõ, mbom hom mbisa mma nkorɔfo nyina;
Na hom mma asomdwee frankaa do, na hom mbɔ asomdwee ho dawur nkodu asaase ano nyina;
Na hom nye nkorɔfo a wɔatseetsee hom no nyɛ asomdwee nhyehyɛɛ, dɛ mbrɛ Sunsum no ne ndze a ɔwɔ hom mu no se hom, na ndzɛmba nyina bɔbɔ mu edzi dwuma dze ama hom yieyɛ.
Dɛm ntsi, hom ndzi nokwar; na hom nhwɛ na wonhu dɛ, menye hom wɔ hɔ kesi ewiei. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/106.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 106
chapter_summary: 1–3, Wɔfrɛ Warren A. Cowdery dɛ ɔnhwɛ asɔr a ɔwɔ apaamu hɔ no do; 4–5, Mbae a Otsĩa Ebien no remmba kan mba no do dɛ owifo; 6–8, Nhyira kɛse bedzi hɔn a wɔsom nokwar mu wɔ asɔr no mu no hɔn ekyir.

verses.text: Ɔyɛ me pɛ dɛ wobeyi m’akowaa Warren A. Cowdery na wɔahyɛ no sɔfopanyin ma ɔahwɛ m’asɔr a ɔwɔ Fahodzi asaase do no nye mantɔw a etwa ho ehyia no do.
Na ɔnkã m’asɛmpa a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no, ɔmma ne ndze do mbɔ nkorɔfo kɔkɔ, nnyɛ nankasa ne mbew do nko, na mbom wɔ amansin a etwa ho ehyia no so mu;

Na ɔmfa ne mber nyina nyɛ ɔfrɛ krɔnkrɔn a ɔkrɔn yi, dza emi medze ama no sesei yi, na onsi nketse nhwehwɛ sor ahenman no na no mu ndzeyɛtsenenee no, na wɔdze ndzɛmba nyina a ohia bɛkã no ho; osiandɛ odwumayɛnyi n’apaadze sɛ no.
Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, Ewuradze ne mbae no abɛn, na ɔbɛfa wiadze mprase dɛ anago owifo—
Dɛm ntsi, hom mbɔ hom asen do, ama hom aayɛ kan mba, na dɛm da no nnkɛfa hom mprase dɛ owifo.
Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, sor dzii dɛw ber a m’akowaa Warren bɔɔ no mu adze ma m’ahempoma no, na ɔtwẽe noho fii nyimpa ne ndzeyɛbɔn ho no.
Dɛm ntsi, nhyira akã m’akowaa Warren, na mubohu no mbɔbɔr; na ɔmmfa ho dɛ ndzɛmba hun ahyɛ n’akoma mu mã, susuampaara dɛ ɔbɛbrɛ noho adze wɔ m’enyim no, mebɛma no do.
Na mebɛma no adom na awerɛhyɛmu wɔ beebiara a obegyina; na sɛ ɔkɔ do yɛ dasegyefo nokwafo na ɔyɛ kan dze ma asɔr no a, mesiesie ahenkyɛw ato hɔ ama no wɔ m’Egya fie mu. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/107.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 107
chapter_summary: 1–6, Asɔfodzi ahorow ebien na ɔwɔ hɔ; Melchizedek dze na Aaron dze; 7–12, Hɔn a wokura Melchizedek asɔfodzi no wɔ tum dɛ wodzi dwuma wɔ Asɔr no mu dzibew nyina mu; 13–17, Bishop na n’apamfo na wɔhwɛ Aaron Asɔfodzi no do, dza odzi enyido ayɛdze ho dwuma no; 18–20, Melchizedek Asɔfodzi no na okura sunsum mu nhyira nyina ne nsaafee no; Aaron Asɔfodzi no na okura abɔfo hɔn som ne nsaafee; 21–38, President a Odzi Kan na n’Apamfo no, Duebien no, nye Eduosuon, hɔn a wɔbɔmu yɛ quorumfo banodzifo ahorow no, hɔn na ɔwɔ dɛ wɔbɔ adwenpɔw wɔ biribiara ho wɔ koryɛ na tseneneeyɛ mu; 39–52, Patriarch nhyehyɛɛ no fi Adam aber do dze kesi Noah aber do; 53–57, Tsetseberdo Ahotseweefo no hyiaa mu wɔ Adam-ondi-Ahman, na Ewuradze yii noho kyerɛɛ hɔn; 58–67, Duebien no wɔ dɛ wɔdze Asɔr no mu dzibew dzifo no sisi hɔn sibew do; 68–76, Bishopfo no nye atsɛmbuafo wɔ Israel; 77–84, President a Odzi Kan no na n’Apamfo no nye Duebien no na wɔbɔmu yɛ Asɔr n’asɛndzifo tsitsir; 85–100, Asɔfodzi presidentfo no na wɔhwɛ hɔnara quorum ahorow no do.

verses.text: Asɔfodzi ahorow ebien na ɔwɔ asɔr no mu, ɔno nye Melchizedek na Aaron dze a Levitical Asɔfodzi kã ho bi.
Siantsir a dza odzi kan no wɔfrɛ no Melchizedek Asɔfodzi no nye dɛ Melchizedek no nna ɔyɛ sɔfopanyin kɛse bi.
Ansaana wɔrobɔwo no no, nna dzin a wɔdze frɛ no nye Asɔfodzi Krɔnkrɔn a ɔwɔ Nyankopɔn ne Ba no ne Nhyehyɛɛ do.

Mbom ɔnam dɛ wɔpɛ dɛ wodzi Nyame Tumfo no ne dzin nyi anaa wobu no ntsi, aama woekwetsir dɛ nkorɔfo bɔbobɔ ne dzin basabasa ntsi, tsetseberdo asɔr no dze Melchizedek ne dzin too dɛm asɔfodzi no, anaa wɔfrɛɛ no Melchizedek Asɔfodzi.
Tumdzi nye dzibewdzi biara a ɔwɔ asɔr no mu no fam dɛm asɔfodzi yi ho.
Mbom asɔfodzi no wɔ mu nkyɛmu ebien anaadɛ etsitsir ebien—kor nye Melchizedek Asɔfodzi na kor so nye Aaron Asɔfodzi anaadɛ Levitical Asɔfodzi.
Elder dzibew hyɛ Melchizedek Asɔfodzi ase.
Melchizedek Asɔfodzi no wɔ tum dɛ ɔyɛ asɔr no ne president na n’apamfo no, na ɔwɔ tum na tumdzi dɛ ɔhwɛ asɔr no mu dzibewdzi nyina do wɔ mber biara mu wɔ wiadze yi mu, na ɔyɛ sunsum mu ndzɛmba so.
Asɔfodzi a Ɔkrɔn no ne President na n’Apamfo no a ɔwɔ Melchizedek nhyehyɛɛ mu no, no wɔ kwan dɛ wodzi dwuma wɔ asɔr no mu dzibew nyina hyɛ hɔn nsa.

Asɔfompanyin a wɔwɔ Melchizedek Asɔfodzi nhyehyɛɛ do no mu no hɔn gyinabew ma hɔn kwan ma wodzi dwuma biara a asɔr no mu president na n’apamfo no bɛkyerɛ, dza ɔfa sunsum mu ndzɛmba ho, na wotum so yɛ elder, ɔsɔfo (a ɔyɛ Levitical nhyehyɛɛ no), kyerɛkyerɛnyi, deacon nye asɔrba biara so ne dzibew mu.
Elder wɔ ho kwan dɛ sɛ sɔfopanyin no nnyi hɔ a ogyina n’ananmu dzi dwuma.

Ɔsɔfopanyin na elder na ɔwɔ dɛ wɔyɛ sunsum mu ndzɛmba ho dwuma, dza asɔr no n’ahyɛmudzi na mbrasɛm ma ho kwan no; sɛ banodzifo a hɔn dzibew krɔn sen hɔn no mu biara nnyi hɔ a, wɔwɔ ho kwan dɛ wodzi dwuma biara.
Asɔfodzi a otsĩa ebien no wɔfrɛ no Aaron Asɔfodzi, osiandɛ wɔdze maa Aaron nye n’asefo wɔ hɔn ebusuasantsen nyina.
Siantsir a wɔfrɛ no asɔfodzi kuma no nye dɛ, ɔfam dza ɔkrɔn no anaadɛ Melchizedek Asɔfodzi no ho, na wɔwɔ tum dɛ wɔyɛ enyido ayɛdze no.
Bishop na n’apamfo no nye asɔfodzi yi ne, president na n’apamfo na wokura dɛm asɔfodzi yi ho nsaafee anaadɛ tumdzi.
Obiara nnyi mbra mu kwan wɔ dzibew yi ho dɛ obokura asɔfodzi yi ho nsaafee, gyedɛ ɔyɛ Aaron n’asenyi ankasa.

Mbom dɛ ma Melchizedek Asɔfodzi mu sɔfopanyin wɔ tum dɛ odzi dwuma a ɔwɔ asɔfodzi kuma no mu nyina, sɛ Aaron n’asenyi ankasa nnyi hɔ a, otum yɛ edwuma wɔ bishop dzibew mu, sɛ, wɔafrɛ no na woeyi no esi hɔ na Melchizedek Asɔfodzi no president na n’apamfo no dze nsa egu no do dze dɛm asɔfodzi tum yi ama no a.
Tum na tumdzi a asɔfodzi a ɔkrɔn no, anaadɛ Melchizedek Asɔfodzi no wɔ nye dɛ obokura asɔr no mu sunsum mu nhyira nyina ne nsaafee—

Dɛ wobɛnya ndzinoa dze ehu sor ahenman no mu esumasɛm, wobue sor ma hɔn, wotum nye ɔdodow nhyiamu mba nye Abakamba no n’asɔrmba kasa, na ɔma wotum ba Nyame Egya no nye Jesus a ɔyɛ ahyɛmu fofor no ne ntamugyinanyi no enyim na wɔnye hɔn kasa.

Tum na tumdzi a asɔfodzi kuma no, anaadɛ Aaron Asɔfodzi no na okura abɔfosom ho nsaafee, wɔyɛ enyido ayɛdze, wɔkã asɛmpa no, wonuma hɔn a woenu hɔnho no dze hɔn kɔ bɔnfakyɛ mu, dɛ mbrɛ ahyɛmudzi na mbrasɛm ma ho kwan dɛ wɔnyɛ no.
Ohia dɛ woyi presidentfo, anaadɛ banodzi dzibewdzifo no fi nkorɔfo a woeyi hɔn esi hɔ dze nsa egu hɔn do na wɔdze dzibew horow yinom ahyɛ hɔn nsa dada no fi dɛm asɔfodzi ebien yi mu.

Melchizedek Asɔfodzi no mu no, asɔr no nyina bɔ mu dze gyedzi na mpaabɔ fua Asɔfompanyin Banodzifo baasa no a, kuw yi asan mu eyi hɔn na wɔahyɛ hɔn akɔ dɛm dzibew no mu dɛ wɔnyɛ Asɔr no ne President na n’Apamfo hɔn quorum.

Apamfo akwantufo duebien no na wɔfrɛ hɔn Asomafo Duebien no, anaadɛ Christ ne dzin ho adasegyefo soronko a wɔwɔ wiadze nyina mu—dɛm na ɔma nsonsonee ba hɔn na wɔ nkorɔfo a wɔafrɛ hɔn dze hɔn esisi gyinabew ma wodzi dwuma horow wɔ asɔr no mu.
Na hɔn so wɔ yɛ quorum bi a wɔwɔ tum kor noara a dɛm eguamutsenafo baasa a wɔakã hɔn ho asɛm dada no wɔ no.

Eduosuonfo no so wɔafrɛ hɔn dɛ wɔmbɔ asɛmpa no dawur, na wɔnyɛ adasegyefo soronko mma Amanamamfo a wɔwɔ wiadze nyina mu no—dɛm na ɔma nsonsonee ba hɔn nkorɔfo a wɔafrɛ hɔn dze hɔn esisi gyinabew horow ma wodzi dwuma wɔ asɔr no mu.
Na hɔn so wɔ yɛ quorum bi a wɔwɔ tum kor noara a dɛm adasegyefo soronko Duebien no anaadɛ Asomafo no a wɔabɔ hɔn dzin seseiara no wɔ.

Na adwen pɔw biara a quorum yinom mu obiara bɔbɔ no ɔwɔ dɛ hɔn nyina hɔn ndze yɛ kor; ɔkyerɛ dɛ, ɔsɛ dɛ ankorankor biara a ɔwɔ quorum no mu no n’adwen nye obiara n’adwen pɔw a wɔabɔ no bɛsaa wɔ nhyehyɛɛ biara a wɔbɛyɛ ho ama tum na ahoɔdzen aaba nhyehyɛɛ no mu a ɔkyerɛ dɛ ankorankor biara n’ano wɔ mu—
Hɔn mu dodow botum ehyia mu edzi dwuma, sɛ ɔba no dɛ hɔn nyinara nnkotum ehyia mu a.

Gyedɛ ɔtse dɛm, na ɔnntse dɛm a, nhyira remmba dɛm nhyehyɛɛ no do dɛ mbrɛ president baasa no hɔn quorum dze no tse tsetseberdo no, hɔn a wɔnam Melchizedek nhyehyɛɛ do hyɛɛ hɔn asɔfo no, na wɔyɛ nkorɔfo a wɔtsen na wɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn.

Na ɔsɛ dɛ dɛm quorum yinom, anaadɛ hɔn mu kor biara dze tseneneeyɛ, krɔnkrɔnyɛ, na ɔwɔ akoma a ɔyɛ botoo, ɔdwe, penkyɛr na gyedzi, ɔbrapa, nyimdzee, enyidahɔ, abotar, nyamesompa, enuadɔ na ayamuyie dze bɔ adwen pɔw biara.
Osiandɛ anohoba no nye dɛ, sɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom dɔɔ sõ wɔ hɔn mu a, wɔrennyɛ hɔn a wɔnnsow aba wɔ Ewuradze ne nyimdzee ho.

Na sɛ ɔba no dɛ quorum yinom mu bi bɔ adwen pɔw bi a ɔnntsen a, ɔwɔ dɛ wɔdze ba quorum horow no nyina enyim, hɔn a wɔyɛ asɔr no ne banodzifo a wokitsa tum wɔ sunsum mu dwumadzi ho no nhyiamu kɛse enyim; ɔnntse dɛm a, nkyɛ worunntum nnsan nka asɛm a wɔabɔ ho pɔw no ho asɛm.

Duebien no nye Abaguafo Banodzifo Etsitsir Akwantufo no, wodzi dwuma wɔ Ewuradze ne dzin mu, dɛ mbrɛ Asɔr ne President na n’Apamfo no bɛkyerɛ hɔn, dɛ mbrɛ nhyehyɛɛ a ofi sor no tse; dɛ wɔbɛkyekyer asɔr na wɔahwɛ ma dwumadzi a ɔwɔ mu nyina abɛyɛ kor wɔ aman nyina mu, odzi kan, kɔ Amanamamfo mu, na otsĩa ebien kɔ Jewfo hɔ.

Eduosuon no dzi dwuma wɔ Ewuradze ne dzin mu dɛ mbrɛ Duebien no anaadɛ Abaguafo Etsitsir a wotu kwan no bɛkyerɛ hɔn wɔ asɔr no ne nhyehyɛɛ nye no mu dwumadzi kor no ara a ɔwɔ aman nyina mu, odzi kan, kɔ Amanamamfo mu, na afei, kɔ Jewfo hɔ—
Wɔsoma Duebien no a wokitsa nsaafee no ma wɔkɛkã Jesus Christ n’asɛmpa no dze bue kwan no, odzi kan, wɔ Amanamamfo mu, na afei, Jewfo mu.

Abaguafo etsitsir a wɔtse Zion ne stake horow do no bɔ mu yɛ quorum a ɔnye presidentfo hɔn quorum no anaadɛ abaguafo etsitsir a wotu kwan no wɔ tumdzi kor no ara a wɔdze dzi asɔr no mu dwuma, wɔ hɔn adwen pɔw ne mbɔe mu.

Abaguafo etsitsir a wɔtse Zion ne stake horow do so bɔ mu yɛ quorum a wɔwɔ dɛm tumdzi kor no ara wɔ asɔr no mu dwumadzi mu, na wɔnye hɔn yɛ hɔn nhyehyɛɛ biara a wɔdze kɔto abaguafo Duebien a wɔwɔ stake a ɔwɔ Zion no enyim.

Ɔyɛ abaguafo etsitsir a wotu kwan no hɔn edwuma dɛ sɛ wohia mboa a, wobisa fi Eduosuon no hɔ nko, ma wɔboa hɔn wɔ hɔn ɔfrɛ ne dwumadzi pii a wɔwɔ dzi mu, dɛ, wɔkã asɛmpa no na wɔyɛ asɛmpa ayɛdze no kyɛn dɛ wɔbɛfrɛ binom.
Ɔyɛ Duebien no a wɔwɔ asɔr no nkorbata akɛse nyina mu no hɔn edwuma dɛ wɔnam nyikyerɛ kwan do hyɛ asɛnkãfo asomfo—
Dɛm asɔfodzi yi ne nhyehyɛɛ no woesi no pi ma oeefi egya nsamu akɔ babanyin hɔ, na odzi wɔ aba a wɔsaan mu yii no no n’asefo ankasa, hɔn a wɔbɔɔ hɔn anohoba no.
Dɛm nhyehyɛɛ yi, wɔhyehyɛɛ no Adam aber do dze sianee fi ebusuasantsen kor do baa ebusuasantsen kor so do wɔ dɛm kwan yi do:

Ofi Adam do kɔr Seth do, a Adam hyɛɛ no sɔfo ber a nna oedzi mfe eduosia akron, na ohyiraa no no, ne mfe ebiasa ansaana oruwu no (Adam), na ɔnam n’egya do na ne nsa kãa Nyankopɔn n’anohoba no, na dɛ n’asefo na Ewuradze asan mu eyi hɔn dɛ wonkura do nkesi asaase n’ewiei;
Osiandɛ ɔno (Seth) yɛ nyimpa a odzi mu, nna ɔsɛ n’egya papaapa, na ne nsunsuando nye dɛ ne ndzeyɛɛ nyina tse dɛ n’egya, na dza wɔnam do dze hu ɔno na n’egya ara nye ne mfe.
Na ber a Enos dzii mfe ɔha eduasa anan na abosoom anan ara na Adam dze ne nsa guu no do hyɛɛ no sɔfo.
Ber a Cainan dzii mfe eduanan no Nyankopɔn frɛɛ no wɔ sar no do, na ohyiaa Adam ber a nna orutu kwan akɔ Shedolamak mbew do no. Na ber a ne nsa kãa n’asɔfohyɛ no nna oedzi mfe eduowɔtwe esuon.
Ber a Mahalaleel dzii mfe ahaanan eduokron esia na nda esuon no, Adam dze ne nsa guu no do hyɛɛ no sɔfo, na ɔnoara so na ohyiraa no.
Ber a Jared dzii mfe ahaebien no, Adam dze ne nsa guu no do hyɛɛ no sɔfo, na ɔnoara so na ohyiraa no.
Enoch dzii mfe eduonu enum no, Adam dze ne nsa guu no do hyɛɛ no sɔfo; na odzii mfe eduosia enum no, Adam hyiraa no.

Na ohun Ewuradze, na ɔnye no nantsewee, na mber nyina nna ɔwɔ n’enyim; na ɔnye Nyankopɔn nantseew mfe ahaebiasa eduosia enum, a ɔkyerɛ dɛ nna oedzii mfe ahaanan eduasa ber a wɔsakyeer no a wɔannsɔ owu.
Methuselah dzii mfe ɔha no na Adam dze ne nsa guu no do hyɛɛ no sɔfo.
Lamech dzii mfe eduasa ebien no na Seth dze ne nsa guu no do hyɛɛ no sɔfo.
Noah dzii mfe du no na Methuselah dze ne nsa guu no do hyɛɛ no sɔfo.

Ber a aka mfe ebiasa ma Adam ewu no, ɔfrɛɛ Seth, Enos, Cainan, Mahalaleel, Jared, Enoch na Methuselah a nna hɔn nyina yɛ asɔfompanyin no, nye n’asefo nkaa nyina a wɔyɛ atseneneefo no na ɔnye hɔn kɔr mbɔnsa a ɔwɔ Adam-ondi-Ahman no mu na ɔdze ne nhyira a odzi ekyir no maa hɔn.
Na Ewuradze yii noho kyerɛɛ hɔn, na wɔsoɛree hyiraa Adam, na wɔfrɛɛ no Michael, ɔhenbabanyin, bɔfopanyin.
Ewuradze kyekyee Adam no werɛ, na ɔsee no dɛ: Meeyi wo esi hɔ dɛ ebɛyɛ edzikanyi; aman pii befi wo mu aba, na ɔwo yɛ hɔn do ɔhenbabanyin afebɔɔ.
Na Adam soɛree gyinaa mboanofo no finimfin; nna Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no ahyɛ no mã, ammfa no ho koraa dɛ oenyin posoposo, ɔhyɛɛ nkɔm wɔ dza ɔbɛba n’asefo do dze kesi ebusuasantsen a wɔbɛba ekyir yi do ho.
Ndzɛmba yinom no wɔakyerɛw ne nyina wɔ Enoch no nwoma mu, na wɔbɛgye ho dase ne mber pa mu.
Ɔyɛ Duebien no so hɔn edwuma dɛ wɔhyɛ asɔfo na wɔdze sisi hɔn dzibew horow a ɔwɔ asɔr no mu no do, dɛ mbrɛ nyikyerɛ no se:
Dze kɛma Christ n’asɔr a ɔwɔ Zion asaase do, dɛ wɔmfa nkã asɔr ne mbra a ɔwɔ asɔr no dwumadzi ho no ho—
Nokwar, mese hom dɛ; Dɔm Ewuradze na ɔse, ɔwɔ dɛ wonya elderfo banodzifo ma wɔhwɛ hɔn a wogyinagyina elder dzibew wɔ asɔr no mu no do.
Na asɔfo so a wɔbɔhwɛ asɔfo no hɔn dzibew do;
Na akyerɛkyerɛfo so a wɔbɔhwɛ hɔn a wogyina kyerɛkyerɛnyi dzibew do, nye deaconfo so dɛmara—

Dɛm ntsi, ofi deacon do kɔ kyerɛkyerɛnyi do; na ofi kyerɛkyerɛnyi do akɔ sɔfo do, na ofi sɔfo do akɔ elder do; ankorankor biara dɛ ma wɔdze no besi no, dɛ mbrɛ ahyɛmudzi na mbrasɛm a ɔwɔ asɔr no mu tse.
Nkyii nna aba Asɔfodzi a Ɔkrɔn no do, dza ɔsõ kyɛn ne nyina no.
Dɛm ntsi, obehia dɛ woyi obi so fi Asɔfodzi a Ɔkrɔn no mu ma ɔhwɛ Asɔfodzi no do, na wɔbɛfrɛ no Asɔr no mu Asɔfodzi a Ɔkrɔn hɔn President.
Anaa yɛbɛkã dɛ Asɔr no mu Ɔsɔfopanyin Banodzinyi a ɔhwɛ Asɔfodzi a Ɔkrɔn no do.
Dɛm nyimpa yi ara so na ɔhwɛ ayɛdze nyina ne nyɛe na ɔdze ne nsa gu nkorɔfo do, hyira asɔr no.
Dɛm ntsi, bishop ne dzibew nye no nnyɛ pɛr; osiandɛ bishop ne dzibew nye dɛ ɔhwɛ honam afamu ndzɛmba do;
Eso otwar dɛ woyi bishop fi Asɔfodzi a Ɔkrɔn no mu, gyedɛ ɔyɛ Aaron n’asenyi ankasa;
Na gyedɛ ɔyɛ Aaron n’asenyi ankasa, ɔnntse dɛm a, onnkotum ekura dɛm asɔfodzi ho nsaafee no.
Naaso, wotum san mu yi ɔsɔfopanyin, kyerɛ dɛ, obi a ɔwɔ Melchizedek nhyehyɛɛ no mu no si hɔ, ma ɔsom wɔ dɛm honam afamu ndzɛmba no, na ɔbɛfa Sunsum nokwafo no do enya nyimdzee wɔ dɛm ndzɛmba no ho;

Na afei so ɔbɛyɛ ɔtsɛmbuafo wɔ Israel mu, a ɔbɛyɛ asɔr no n’edwuma, dɛ ɔbɛtsena ase edzi mbratofo nsɛm na oetsie adasegyefo hɔn dasee a wɔdze bɛba abɔto ɔno na n’apamfo a oeyi hɔn anaa oribeyi hɔn efi asɔr no mu elderfo mu ma wɔaboa no no hɔn enyim ma woebua asɛm no wɔ mbra kwan do.
Iyi nye bishop a ɔnnyɛ Aaron n’asenyi ankasa, na mbom wɔahyɛ no Asɔfodzi a Ɔkrɔn a ɔwɔ Melchizedek nhyehyɛɛ no mu no ne dwuma.

Dɛm na ɔbɛyɛ ɔtsɛmbuafo, ɔdodow ɔtsɛmbuafo mpo wɔ nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Zion no mu, anaadɛ stake a ɔwɔ Zion no mu, anaa asɔr no nkorbata biara a woetu no esi hɔ wɔ dɛm ɔsomdwumadzi yi mu no, kɛpem dɛ wɔbɛtserɛw Zion no nkorbata mu ma ekehia dɛ wonya bishop anaa atsɛmbuafo wɔ Zion anaa beebi so.
Na susuampaara dɛ wobenya bishopfo binom so akã ho no, hɔn nyinara bedzi dwuma wɔ dzibew kor no ara mu.

Mbom Aaron n’asenyi ankasa dze, ɔwɔ mbra mu kwan dɛ ɔbɛkã president na n’apamfo ho, na okura dɛm dwumadzi yi ne nsaafee, dɛ nonko gyina dɛm bishop dzibew yi wɔ ber a apamfo biara nnkã no ho, gyedɛ ɔba no dɛ oredzi Asɔfodzi a Ɔkrɔn mu President, a ɔwɔ Melchizedek nhyehyɛɛ mu no n’asɛm a, na ɔretsena ase dɛ ɔtsɛmbuafo wɔ Israel mu.
Na dɛm abaguafo yinom mu biara na adwen pɔw biara nye dza dɛm mbrasɛm yi se no saa:

Bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, asɔr no mu dwumadzi a ho hia kɛse nye asɔr no mu asɛndzi a no mu yɛ dzen no, susuampaara dɛ atsɛmbu bi a bishop no anaa atsɛmbuafo no dze mae no annyɛ abodwee a, ɔwɔ dɛ wɔdze asɛm no kɛma asɔr no mu abaguafo no na hɔn so wɔdze kɔto Asɔfodzi a Ɔkrɔn hɔn President na n’Apamfo no enyim.

Na Asɔfodzi a Ɔkrɔn abaguafo no hɔn President na n’Apamfo no benya tum dze afrɛ asɔfompanyin binom, bɛyɛ duebien dɛm mpo ma wɔboa dɛ apamfo; na dɛm na Asɔfodzi a Ɔkrɔn hɔn President na n’Apamfo nye hɔn apamfo benya kwan etsie adasefo hɔn dasegye na wɔafa do abɔ adwen pɔw wɔ asɔr ne mbra kwan do.
Sɛ wɔbɔ adwen pɔw yi wie a, wɔrommbɔ do bio wɔ Ewuradze enyim; osiandɛ iyi nye Nyankopɔn n’asɔr mu abaguafo a ɔkrɔn kɛse, na adwen pɔw biara a otwa sunsum mu ekyingye nyina do.
Na obiara nnyi asɔr no mu a woyi no fir mu dɛ obegyina dɛm abaguafo yi enyim.
Susuampaara dɛ Asɔfodzi a Ɔkrɔn no hɔn President no bɔtõ mbra no, ɔwɔ dɛ wɔdze no ba ɔdodow abaguafo no enyim, na Asɔfodzi a Ɔkrɔn no n’apamfo duebien no ma wɔaboa.
Na hɔn adwen pɔw a wɔbɔbɔ wɔ ne tsir do no na obotwa ekyingye a ɔwɔ no ho nyina do.
Dɛm ntsi, obiara nnyi hɔ a wobeyi no efi Nyame ne pɛrpɛrdzi na mbra mu, ama wɔaayɛ biribiara esiado esiado no na awɔse mu, wɔ tseneneeyɛ na nokwar mu wɔ n’enyim.

Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, dwuma a president a ɔhwɛ deacon dzibew do yɛ nye dɛ ɔhwɛ deaconfo duebien do, na ɔnye hɔn tsena ase wɔ baguabɔ mu, na otu hɔn fo na ɔkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn hɔn ndwuma a ɔsɛ dɛ wɔyɛ, na wɔma hɔnho ntowdo nkorkor dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no wɔ ahyɛmu no mu no.

Na president no a ɔhwɛ akyerɛkyerɛfo dzibew do ne dwuma nye dɛ ɔhwɛ akyerɛkyerɛfo eduonu anan do, na ɔnye hɔn tsena ase wɔ baguabɔ mu, na ɔkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn hɔn dzibew no mu ndwuma, dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no ahyɛmu no mu no.

President a ɔhwɛ Aaron Asɔfodzi do no so ne dwuma nye dɛ ɔhwɛ asɔfo eduanan awɔtwe do, na ɔnye hɔn tsena ase wɔ baguabɔ mu, na ɔkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn ma wohu hɔn ndwuma, dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no ahyɛmu no mu no—
President yi wɔ dɛ ɔyɛ bishop; osiandɛ ɔyɛ asɔfodzi yi ne dwuma no mu kor.
Bio, president a ɔhwɛ elderfo dzibew no do no ne dwuma nye dɛ ɔhwɛ elderfo eduokron esia do, na ɔnye hɔn tsena ase wɔ baguabɔ mu, na ɔkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn dza wɔakyerɛw no ahyɛmu no mu no.
President yi na n’apamfo no yɛ dansewa wɔ eduosuon no ho, na wɔhyehyɛe maa hɔn a wonntu kwan nnkɔ wiadze nyina mu no.
Na bio, President a ɔhwɛ Asɔfodzi a Ɔkrɔn ne dzibew no do no ne dwuma nye dɛ ɔhwɛ asɔrtɔw nyina do, na ɔyɛ dɛ Moses—
Hwɛ, nyansa nye yi, nyew, dɛ ɔbɛyɛ adzehunyi, oyikyerɛfo, obi a otum kyerɛ biribi ase, nye nkɔnhyɛnyi, ɔwɔ Nyame n’akyɛdze nyina, a ɔdze ma asɔr ne tsir no.
Na dɛ mbrɛ enyido-adzehu a ɔkyerɛ nhyehyɛɛ a ɔwɔ Eduosuon no hɔn dwumadzi ho kyerɛ no, ɔwɔ dɛ woyi presidentfo beesuon fi eduosuon no mu ma wɔhwɛ hɔn do;
Na president a ɔtɔ do esuon wɔ dɛm presidentfo yinom mu no na ɔbɔhwɛ beesia no do;
Na dɛm presidentfo beesuon yi wɔ dɛ woyi eduosuon binom so kã eduosuon a wodzi kan no a hɔnankasa wɔkã ho no ho, ma wɔhwɛ hɔn do;
Na woyi eduosuon fofor so, kesi dɛ wobenya eduosuon mbɔho esuon, sɛ okehia dɛ edwuma a ɔwɔ wenyin ture no mu bɛgye dɛm a.
Na eduosuon yinom na wɔbɛyɛ akwantufo asomfo, na wobedzi kan akɔ Amanamamfo mu, na afei Jewfo mu.

Edzibewdzifo binom wɔ asɔr no mu a wɔnnka Duebien anaaso Eduosuon no so ho, na woyinom no mbrɛ hɔn dzibew ne kɛse tse biara wɔ asɔr no mu no da nkyɛn a, asodzi bi nnda hɔn do dɛ wobotu kwan akɔ amanaman mu, mbom sɛ okehia pɛpɛɛpɛ dɛ wotu a, ɔno wotum tu.
Dɛm ntsi, wɔmma obiara nsũa ne dwuma, na ɔmfa enyimpi ndzi dwuma wɔ dzibew a wɔdze ahyɛ ne nsa no.
Nyia ɔyɛ onyihanyi no mmfata dɛ obegyina, na nyia onnkosũa ne dwuma na ne dwumadzi nnsɔ enyi no nnkedzi mu dɛ obegyina. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/108.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 108
chapter_summary: 1–3, Wɔdze Lyman Sherman no bɔn akyɛ no; 4–5, Wɔbɛkan no akã elderfo a wɔyɛ Asɔr no mu banodzifo no ho; 6–8, Wɔfrɛ no dɛ ɔnkã asɛmpa no na ɔnhyɛ n’enuanom no dzen.

verses.text: Nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se wo, m’akowaa Lyman; wɔdze wo bɔn akyɛ wo, osiandɛ etsie me ndze na aba ha anapa yi dɛ erebɛgye afotu efi nyia meyi no esi hɔ no hɔ.
Dɛm ntsi, ma w’akoma ntɔ wo yamu, ɔfa no wo gyinabew wɔ sunsum mu ho, na mma mmpow dɛ ibetsie me ndze bio.
Na soɛr gyina, na ofi ndɛ kɔ no hwɛ yie dɛ ibedzi wo bɔhyɛ a abɔ nye dza ebɔ no do, na wɔdze nhyira a ɔsõ behyira wo.
Tweɔn abotar mu kesi dɛ me nkowaa bɛfrɛ nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn no, na wɔbɛkaa wo akã me elderfo a wodzi kan no ho na wɔnye wo akã me elderfo nkaa a masan mu eyi hɔn ma wɔanam asɔfohyɛ mu enya kyɛfa.
Hwɛ, sɛ ekɔ do dzi nokwar a, iyi nye Egya no n’anohoba a ɔdze abɔ wo.
Na ɔbɛyɛ hɔ ama wo wɔ dɛm da no mu dɛ ibenya kwan akã asɛmpa no, ofi dɛm da no kɔ wɔ beebiara a mobɔsoma wo ma akɔ.
Dɛm ntsi, hyɛ wo nuanom dzen wɔ wo nkɔmbɔtwetwe nyina mu, wɔ wo mpaabɔ nyina mu, wɔ wo afotu nyina mu nye wo ndzeyɛɛ nyina mu.
Na hwɛ, na hu dɛ, menye wo wɔ hɔ, na mibehyira wo na magye wo afebɔɔ. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/109.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 109
chapter_summary: 1–5, Wosi Kirtland Temple no dɛ ɔyɛ bea a Nyimpa Ba no bɛba abɛsera hɔ; 6–21, Ɔbɛyɛ mpaabɔ, akɔnkye, gyedzi, adzesũa, enyimnyam na fi a wɔyɛ ndzɛmba esiado esiado, na Nyankopɔn ne fi; 22–33, Ama nyia onnu noho na otsia Ewuradze no nkorɔfo no n’enyim egu ase; 34–42, Ama Ahotseweefo no akɔboaboa atseneneefo no ano dze hɔn akɔ Zion wɔ tum mu; 43–53, Ama wɔagye Ahotseweefo no efi ndzɛmba huhu a worubohue egu emumuyɛfo do wɔ nda a odzi ekyir no mu; 54–58, Ama aman na nkorɔfo nye asɔrasɔr esiesie hɔnho ama asɛmpa no; 59–67, Ama wɔapon Jewfo, Lamanfo na Israel nyina; 68–80, Ama wɔafa enyimnyam na abɔdzin ahyɛ Ahotseweefo no ahenkyɛw, na woenya onnyiewiei nkwagye no.

verses.text: Ndaase nkã wo dzin, O Israel Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, ɔwo a idzi ahyɛmu na ihu wo nkowaa a wɔdze hɔn akoma nyina nantsew nokwar mu wɔ w’enyim no mbɔbɔr—
Ɔwo a ehyɛɛ wo nkowaa dɛ wonsi ofi mma wo dzin wɔ dɛm bea yi do [Kirtland].
Na hwɛ, O Ewuradze, dɛ wo nkowaa ayɛ dza wo mbrasɛm se.

Na afei yɛserɛ wo, Egya Krɔnkrɔn, wɔ Jesus Christ ne dzin mu, wo Ba a ɔda wo bo mu no, ɔno ne dzin mu nkotoo na wobotum edzi adasamba hɔn nkwagye ho ayɛdze, yɛserɛ wo, O Ewuradze, dɛ gye fi yi, dza ɔyɛ hɛn a yɛyɛ wo nkowaa, hɛn nsaano edwindze yi, dza ehyɛɛ hɛn dɛ yensi no.

Na ɔwoara nyim dɛ yɛnam abɛbrɛsɛ kɛse mu dze yɛɛ dɛm edwuma yi; na yɛnam hɛn hia mu dze hɛn ahodze ama, ama wɔdze eesi fi dze ama wo dzin, ama Nyimpa Ba eenya beebi a ɔbɛda noho edzi akyerɛ no nkorɔfo.
Na dɛ mbrɛ ekãe wɔ nyikyerɛ a edze maa hɛn no mu, na efrɛɛ hɛn w’anyɛnkofo no, ekãa dɛ—Hom mfrɛ hom nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn no, dɛ mbrɛ mahyɛ hom no;

Na dɛ mbrɛ hom nyinara nnyi gyedzi no, hom mper nhwehwɛ enyiberdo na hom nkyerɛkyerɛ homho enyansasɛm no nkorkor; nyew, hom nhwehwɛ enyansasɛm mfi nwoma a odzi mu no mu, hom ndua adzesua nye gyedzi so do mper nhwehwɛ nwomasua mpo.
Hom mboaboa homho; na hom nsiesie biribiara a ohia no yie, na hom nkyekyer ofi, mpaabɔ fi mpo, akɔnkye fi, gyedzi fi, nwomasũa fi, enyimnyam fi, na ofi a wɔyɛ ndzɛmba esiado esiado, Nyankopɔn ne fi;
Ama hom fi mbae aayɛ wɔ Ewuradze ne dzin mu, ama hom edzifir aayɛ wɔ Ewuradze ne dzin mu, na hom nkyia nyina ayɛ wɔ Ewuradze ne dzin mu no, na hom ama hom nsa do wɔ sor dze ama Ɔsorsornyi no—
Na afei, Egya Krɔnkrɔn, yɛserɛ wo ma edze w’adom aboa hɛn, wo nkorɔfo, yɛrefrɛ hɛn nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn yi, ama yaayɛ dze ama w’enyimnyam na agye atomu;
Na wɔ kwan a wobohu dɛ yedzi mu, wɔ w’enyim, ama nyikyerɛ a edze maa wo nkorɔfo no mu anohoba a edze bɔɔ hɛn no aaba mu ama hɛn;

Ama w’enyimnyam no aatsena wo nkorɔfo do, nye wo fi yi do, dza seseiara yɛdze rehyɛ wo nsa yi, ama aatsew ho na aasan ho ma ɔaayɛ krɔnkrɔn, na ama w’enyim no krɔnkrɔn no aakɔ do atsena dan yi mu aber nyinara.
Na ama nkorɔfo nyinara a wɔbɛhɛn Ewuradze ne fi yi mu no aatse wo tum nkã, na wɔaahyɛ hɔn do ma wɔaatse nkã bi wɔ hɔn mu a ɔbɛma wɔagye atomu dɛ atsew ho, na dɛ ɔyɛ wo fie, wo krɔnkrɔnbea.
Na Egya Krɔnkrɔn, dom hɔn a wɔbɔsom wɔ fi yi mu nyinara ama woeetum akyerɛkyerɛ hɔn enyansasɛm efi nwoma papa mu, na ama wɔnam adzesua do, nye gyedzi so do aaper ahwehwɛ nwomasũa, dɛ mbrɛ akã no;
Na ama woeenyin wɔ wo mu, na hɔn nsa aakã Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no ne mãhyɛ no, na wɔaboaboa hɔnho dɛ mbrɛ wo mbra no se, na wɔaayɛ krado dɛ wɔbɛper enya biribiara a no ho hia no.
Na ama ofi yi aayɛ mpaabɔ fi, akɔnkye fi, gyedzi fi, enyimnyam fi na Nyankopɔn ne fi, ɔwoara wo fi mpo.
Ama wo nkorɔfo nyina hɔn fi yi mu mbae aayɛ wɔ Ewuradze ne dzin mu.
Ama hɔn fi yi mu edzifir aayɛ wɔ Ewuradze ne dzin mu;
Na hɔn nkyia nyina wɔaayɛ no wɔ Ewuradze ne dzin mu, wɔaama nsa a ho tsew do dze ama Ɔsorsornyi no;
Na dɛ, wɔremma kwan biara mma adze fĩ biara mmba wo dan mu mmbogu ho fĩ;

Na wo nkorɔfo tõ mbra no mu biara a, woeenu hɔnho ntsɛmara na wɔaasan aba wo nkyɛn, na woeenya enyimpa wɔ w’enyim, na aama nhyira a ɔwo ahyehyɛ dɛ wonhue ngu hɔn a wobedzi wo nyi wɔ wo fi mu no, wɔasan dze ama hɔn.
Na yɛserɛ wo, Egya Krɔnkrɔn, dɛ ma wo nkowaa mfi wo fi yi mu mpuei dɛ wo tum no ayɛ hɔn akontar, na ma wo dzin nda hɔn do, na w’enyimnyam no ntwa hɔn ho nhyia, na w’abɔfoe wɔnhwɛ hɔn do;

Na sɛ wofi bea yi do a woeetum agye enyigyesɛm yi ho dase kɛsenara wɔ nokwar mu, wɔ asaase ano nyina, ama woeehu dɛ iyi nye w’edwuma, na dɛ ama wo nsa do dze ahyɛ dza iduaa nkɔnhyɛfo no anomu kãe a ɔfa nda a odzi ekyir ho no mã.
Yɛserɛ wo, Egya Krɔnkrɔn, dɛ ma nkorɔfo a wɔbɔsom wɔ wo fi yi mu no ntahye, na wonya dzinpa na gyinabew wɔ wo fi yi mu nkodu ebusuasantsen nyina do nkesi mbersantsen;
Ama akodze biara a wɔbɔ dze tsia hɔn no rennsaa, ama nyia obotu mona dze apa hɔn no, nankasa nkɔtɔ mu;
Mma emumuyɛfo fekuw biara nnya tum mmfa nndzi konyim wɔ wo nkorɔfo a wɔdze wo dzin bɔto hɔn do wɔ wo fi yi mu no do;
Na sɛ nkorɔfo bi bɔsoɛr etsia wo nkorɔfo yi a ma w’ebufuhyew ndzɛw hɔn do;
Na sɛ wɔbɔ nkorɔfo yi a wo so bɔ hɔn bi; ɔwo kõ ma wo nkorɔfo dɛ mbrɛ eyɛɛ no ɔkõ da no mu no, ama wɔaagye hɔn efi hɔn atamfo nyina nsa.

Yɛserɛ wo, Egya Krɔnkrɔn, dɛ ma fɛr na ahobow kɛse, na enyimguase, na adwensɛe nkã dɛm nkorɔfo no a wɔatahye atorsɛm, wɔ wiadze mbea nyina mu, dze etsia w’akowaa anaa wo nkowaa no, sɛ woennu hɔnho a, ber a wɔbɔbɔ onnyiewiei asɛmpa no ho dawur wɔ hɔn asomu no;
Na ma hɔn ndwuma nyina nyɛ kwa, na ɔsorbo apra hɔn akɔ nye atsɛmbu a ɔwo nam w’ebufuhyew do dze reba hɔn do no, ama atorsɛm nye nsɛm a ɔnnsɛ a wɔkã tsia wo nkorɔfo no aabɔ adze.
O Ewuradze, ɔwo nyim dɛ nkowaa a wɔregye wo ho dase yi dzi bem wɔ w’enyim dza ɔnam do ma woehu dɛm amandze yi.
Dɛm ntsi, yɛtotɔ serɛ wo dɛ yi hɛn emu, na korakora fi dɛm kɔndua yi ase;
Bubu no fi hɔ, O Ewuradze; fa wo tum no bubu no fi wo nkowaa hɔn kɔn mu gu, ama yaasoɛr egyina dɛm ebusuasantsen yi mu na yaayɛ w’edwuma.
O Jehovah, hu wo nkorɔfo yi mbɔbɔr, na dɛ mbrɛ nyimpa nyina yɛ bɔn no, fa wo nkorɔfo hɔn mbrato kyɛ hɔn, na pepa fi hɔ afebɔɔ.
W’asɔfoe hɔn ngo sera yi, ma tum mfi sor mbɔsɔw ano mma hɔn.
Ma ɔnhyɛ mã mma hɔn, dɛ mbrɛ oguu binom do Pentecost da no; hue kasa horow akyɛdze no gu wo nkorɔfo do, ogya tɛkyerɛma no mpo, nye ne nkyerɛase.
Na ma w’enyimnyam ne mframa dzendzen no mbɛhyɛ wo fi yi mã.

Fa ahyɛmu ne dasegye no ma wo nkowaa, ama sɛ wɔkɔ dɛ wɔrokɔbɔ w’asɛm no dawur a, woeetum asɔw mbra no ano, na weesiesie w’ahotseweefo no hɔn akoma dze ama dɛm atsɛmbu nyina a osian hɔn mbrato ntsi, enam w’ebufuhyew do edze reba adasamba a wɔwɔ asaase do, amma wo nkorɔfo anntɔ bitsi wɔ ɔhaw da no mu.

Na kurow biara a wo nkorɔfo bɛhɛn mu, na nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ mu no bɛgye hɔn dasegye no ato mu no, ma w’asomdwee na wo nkwagye no mbra dɛm kuropɔn no do, ama wɔaboaboa ahotseweefo a wɔwɔ kuropɔn no mu no efi mu, na wɔdze daapem enyigye ndwom aba Zion, anaa ne stake horow, mbea a wankasa bɛkyerɛ hɔn no mu.
Na mma w’atsɛmbu mmba dɛm kuropɔn no do kɛpem dɛ wɔbɛyɛ dɛm adze yi ewie.

Na kuropɔn biara a wo nkowaa bɛhɛn mu na nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ mu no anngye wo nkowaa hɔn dasegye annto mu, na wo nkowaa bɔbɔ hɔn kɔkɔ dze agye hɔn efi dɛm ebusuasantsen asokyewfo yi ho no, ma dza efi wo nkɔnhyɛfo anomu akã no mbra dɛm kuropɔn no do.
O Jehovah, yɛserɛ wo dɛ gye wo nkowaa fi hɔn nsa na tsew hɔn ho fi hɔn bɔgyaa ho.
O Ewuradze, hɛn enyi nngye wɔ hɛn mfɛfo adasa hɔn nsɛɛe ho; hɔn akra som bo wɔ w’enyim.
Mbom otwar dɛ w’asɛm hyɛ mã, Ma w’adom no mboa wo nkowaa ma wɔnkã dɛ: Wo pɛ nyɛ hɔ, O Ewuradze, na nnyɛ hɛn pɛ.
Yenyim dɛ edua wo nkɔnhyɛfo anomu akã ndzɛmba a ɔyɛ hu a ɔfa emumuyɛfo ho wɔ nda a odzi ekyir no mu—dɛ ibohue w’atsɛmbu no a irunnsusu;
Dɛm ntsi, O Ewuradze, gye wo nkorɔfo fi emumuyɛfo hɔn mbusu mu, ma wo nkowaa ntum nsɔw mbra no ano, na wɔnkyekyer dasegye no, ama woeetum esiesie hɔnho dze ama ɔhyew da no.
Yɛserɛ wo, Egya Krɔnkrɔn, dɛ kaa nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Jackson Mansin mu, Missouri a ekuromfo no apam hɔn efi hɔn egyapadze ho no, na bu fi hɔ, O Ewuradze, yi hɔn fi kɔndua yi a wɔdze ato hɔn do yi mu.
Ɔwo nyim, O Ewuradze, dɛ emumuyɛfo atseetsee hɔn na wɔama woehu amandze kɛse; osian hɔn adzesoa kɛse ntsi, hɛn akoma dzi yaw ma obu do.

O Ewuradze, na ebɛma wo nkorɔfo asɔw dɛm amandzehu yi ekodu dabɛn, na hɔn nkorɔfo na hɔn mbofra so a afɔdzi nnyi hɔn ho hɔn sũ afow edu w’asomu, na hɔn bɔgyaa afow ebedzi dase wɔ w’enyim, na ennda wo dasegye edzi nnkyerɛ mma hɔn?
O Ewuradze, hu emumuyɛfo dɔm no a wɔapam wo nkorɔfo no mbɔbɔr ama woeegyaa adzesɛɛ, ama sɛ wohu nnuho n’adzeban a woeenu hɔnho wɔ hɔn bɔn ho.
Mbom sɛ wɔannyɛ no dɛm a, O Ewuradze, yi w’abasa no ho na pon dza edze ama dɛ ɔnyɛ Zion no mma wo nkorɔfo.
Na sɛ onnkotum aayɛ dɛm a, amma wo nkorɔfo hɔn botae annyɛ gyan wɔ w’enyim no, ma w’ebufuw ndzɛw hɔn do, na oebufuhyew aba hɔn do ama wɔaporɔw asɛɛ, hɔn ndwow nye hɔn nkorbata nyina, fi wi ase;
Mbom susuampaara dɛ wobonu hɔnho no, ɔwo wo yamu ye na eyɛ mbɔbɔrhufo, sɛ ehwɛ Nyia ɔwo Asera no ngo no n’enyim a, dan w’ebufuhyew no fi hɔ.

O Ewuradze, hu asaase do aman nyina mbɔbɔr; hu hɔn a wɔhwɛ hɛn asaase do mbɔbɔr; ma fapem a oye na odzi mu a wɔbɔɔ ho ban enyimyam mu, a hɛn egyanom wɔato no dzin, hɛn asaase n’Amambusɛm mbra, no ntsim afebɔɔ.
Kaa ahemfo, ahenmba, adehye, nye asaase do etsitsir, nye nyimpa nyinara, nye nsɔr, ehiafo na abɔbɔfo nyina, na hɔn a woruhu amandze wɔ asaase do;

Ama hɔn akoma aadwe ber a wo nkowaa befi wo fie mu efir edzi, O Jehovah, dɛ wɔrekɛgye wo dzin ho dase; ama hɔn adwen bɔn no eefi akɔ sɛ wohu nokwar enyim no a, na wo nkorɔfo enya enyimpa wɔ obiara enyim;
Ama asaase ano nyina eehu dɛ hɛn, wo nkowaa, yɛatse wo ndze, na dɛ ɔwo na asoma hɛn;
Na iyinom nyina mu no, wo nkowaa, Jacob ne mbabanyin eetum aboaboa atseneneefo ano na wɔaakyekyer kuropɔn krɔnkrɔn ama wo dzin, dɛ mbrɛ ehyɛɛ hɛn no.
Yɛserɛ wo dɛ ma Zion nnya stake binom so nkã dza ɔwo edze ama yi ho ama wo nkorɔfo a eroboa hɔn ano no dze tum kɛse na prɔmprɔmyɛ aapem aba mu, ama w’edwuma no do eetwa tsia wɔ tseneneeyɛ mu.
O Ewuradze, dɛm nsɛm yinom na afei yɛakã wɔ w’enyim a ɔfa nyikyerɛ na mbrasɛm a edze ama hɛn no ho, hɛn a wɔkan hɛn kã Amanamamfo ho no.
Mbom ɔwo nyim dɛ ewɔ dɔ kɛse ma Jacob ne mba a wɔabɔ hɔn apetse mbepɔw do mbertsentsen yi, wɔ da a fua na sum ahyɛ.
Dɛm ntsi, yɛserɛ wo dɛ, hu Jacob ne mba mbɔbɔr, ama ofi dɛm dɔn yi mu wɔaahyɛ ase dɛ wɔropon Jerusalem;
Ama wɔaahyɛ ase dɛ worububu nkowaasom kɔndua a ɔda David fi no.
Na Judah ne mba aahyɛ ase dɛ wɔresan akɔ asaase a ɔwo dze maa hɔn egya, Abraham no do.
Na ma Jacob n’asefo wɔaka no a osian hɔn mbrato ntsi ndom akã hɔn na wɔahwe hɔn no nnya nsakyer wɔ hɔn yerɛyerɛwyɛ na atsetsekwaa tsenabew mu mmfa mbra daapem asɛmpa ne mãhyɛ mu;
Ama wɔdze hɔn akodze a wɔdze kã bɔgya gu no eegu famu, na woeegyaa hɔn etuatsew no.

Na ama Israel n’asefo wɔaka nyina a woepia hɔn akɔ asaase n’ano nyina do no nyina eebenya nokwar no ho nyimdzee, woeenya gyedzi wɔ Messiah no mu, na wɔaapon hɔn efi atseetsee mu, na woeedzi dɛw wɔ w’enyim.

O Ewuradze, kaa w’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, na n’amandzehu nye ne haw nyina—mbrɛ oesi nye Jehovah edzi ahyɛmu, na ɔakã ntam akyerɛ wo, O Jacob no Tumfo Nyankopɔn, nye mbrasɛm a edze ama no no, ɔaper dɛ obedzi w’apɛdze do.
Ewuradze, hu ne yer na ne mba mbɔbɔr, ama wɔaama hɔn do wɔ w’enyim, na edze w’abaatanyɛ nsa no akora hɔn do.
Hu hɔn a wɔbɛn hɔn nyina so mbɔbɔr, ama hɔn adwen bɔn no eefi hɔn mu apem akɔ dɛ nsuyirii, ama wɔaasakyer hɔn na wɔnye hɔn akã Israel ho apon hɔn, na woeehu dɛ ɔwo nye Nyankopɔn.

O Ewuradze, kaa presidentfo no, presidentfo nyina a wɔwɔ w’asɔr mu mpo no, na ma wo nsa nyimfa nkrɔn hɔn, nye hɔn ebusuaebusua nyina, nye hɔn a wɔbɛn hɔn no ama hɔn edzin aakã hɔ na wɔakaa no daapem, fi ebusuasantsen do ekesi ebusuasantsen do.

O Ewuradze, kaa wo asɔr nyina, nye hɔn ebusuaebusua nyina, nye hɔn a wɔbɛn hɔn nyina, nye hɔn ayarfo nyina, na hɔn a woruhu amandze nyina, nye ehiafo na hɔn a wɔdwe nyina a wɔwɔ asaase do; ama ahenman no a ɔwo ama do esi hɔ a wɔammfa nsa ennsi no aabɛyɛ bepɔw kɛse ahyɛ asaase nyina mã;
Ama w’asɔr efi sar kebii no do aba, na ɔahyerɛn dɛ bosoom, ɔahyerɛn dɛ ewia, na ɔayɛ hu dɛ nsordaafo a wokitsa mfrankaa;

Na wɔahyehyɛ no dɛ ayefor ama dɛm da no a ebɛpa sor ntwamutam no efi hɔ, na ɔama mbepɔw aapem eesian wɔ w’enyim, na ɔama mbɔnsa do, na mbea a ɔyɛ krann no ayɛ tromtrom; ama w’enyimnyam no aahyɛ asaase do mã no.
Ama sɛ wɔhɛn totorobɛnto no dze ma ewufo no a, woehwim hɛn afa fua mu ma yeebehyia wo, na yɛnye Ewuradze atsena afebɔɔ.
Na hɛn ntar ho aatsew, na wɔdze tseneneeyɛ ntar ahyɛ hɛn, na yekura mberɛnkɔnson wɔ hɛn nsamu, na wɔdze enyimnyam ahenkyɛw ahyɛ hɛn na osian hɛn amandzehu ntsi, yenya onnyiewiei enyigye.

O Ewuradze Nyankopɔn Tumfo, tsie hɛn ntotɔserɛ mpaabɔ yi, na bua hɛn fi sor, wo krɔnkrɔn tsenabew no, bea a etse w’ahengua do, wɔ enyimnyam, enyidzi, tum, ahentum, ahoɔdzen, ahendzi, nokwar, pɛrpɛr, atsɛmbu, ehumbɔbɔr, na amãhyɛ a ɔmmbɔadze da, fi daapem kesi daapem.
O tsie, O tsie, O tsie hɛn, O Ewuradze! Na bua ntotɔserɛ mpaabɔ yi, na gye fi yi a yerutu ahyɛ wo nsa yi, hɛn nsaano edwindze yi a yeesi dze ama wo dzin yi;

Na asɔr yi so, dɛ edze wo dzin bɔto do. Na fa wo Sunsum no tum no boa hɛn, ama yeetum dze hɛn ndze afora seraphfo a wɔhyerɛn a woetwa w’ahengua ho no hɔn ndze mu, dze eyi wo ayɛw, atow Hosanna ama Nyame na Eguambaa no!
Na ma wɔmfa nkwagye mfura woyinom a, wɔyɛ wodze a wɔasera hɔn ngo yi, na w’ahotseweefo mfa enyigye ntsẽatsẽa mu kɛse. Amen na Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/110.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 110
chapter_summary: 1–10, Ewuradze Jehovah puee wɔ enyimnyam mu na ɔgye Kirtland Temple no to mu dɛ Ne fie; 11–12, Moses na Elias hɔn mu kor biara puee na wɔdze hɔn mber ano ho nsaafee ma; 13–16, Elijah san ba na ɔdze ne mber ano ho nsaafee ma dɛ mbrɛ Malachi bɔɔ ho anohoba no.

verses.text: Woyii akataenyim no fii hɛn adwen enyi, na wobuee hɛn ntseasee enyi.
Yehun Ewuradze dɛ ogyina asɛnkadaka no do wɔ hɛn enyim; na n’ananadze wɔdze sika kɔkɔɔ mapã asam hɔ.
N’enyiwa tse dɛ ogyaframee; tsinhwi a ɔwɔ ne tsir do no yɛ fitaa tse dɛ esukwankyɛba mapa; n’enyim hyerɛnee kyɛɛn ewia ne hyerɛn; na ne ndze tse dɛ esu akɛse a ɔrepem, Jehovah ne ndze mpo, rese dɛ:
Emi nye ɔkandzifo nye okyidzifo no; emi nye nyia ɔtse ase no, emi nye nyia wokum no no; emi nye hom dzimafo wɔ Egya no nkyɛn.
Hwɛ, wɔdze hom bɔn akyɛ hom; hom ho atsew wɔ m’enyim; dɛm ntsi, hom mma hom tsir do na hom ndzi dɛw.
Hom mma hom nuanom akoma ndzi dɛw, na hom mma mo nkorɔfo nyina akoma ndzi dɛw, hɔn na wɔdze hɔn ahoɔdzen, esi dɛm fi yi dze ama me dzin.
Na hwɛ, maagye fi yi ato mu, na me dzin bɛda do; na mbɔbɔrhu mu na mibeyi moho akyerɛ mo nkorɔfo wɔ fi yi mu.
Nyew, sɛ mo nkorɔfo dzi me mbrasɛm do, na woenngu dɛm ofi krɔnkrɔn yi ho fĩ a, mubopue hɔn do, na medze mankasa me ndze akasa akyerɛ hɔn.
Nyew, akoma mpem na mpempem na wobedzi dɛw kɛse wɔ nhyira a wobohue egu hɔn do nye endowment a wɔayɛ dze akyɛ mo nkowaa wɔ dan yi mu no ho.
Na ofi yi n’atsenkãyɛ bɛtahye anana asaase do; na iyi nye nhyira a wobohue egu mo nkorɔfo hɔn tsir do no n’ahyɛse. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

Ber a wɔtoow dɛm enyido-adzehu yi mu no, wobuee sor bio kyerɛɛ hɛn; na Moses puee hɛn do, na ɔdze nsaafee a wɔdze bɔboaboa Israel ano efi asaase ne mfɛndzanan nyina do no, nye dza wɔdze bedzi mbusuakuw du no kan efi etsifi asaase no do aba no maa hɛn.
Iyi ekyir, Elias puee, na ɔdze Abraham n’asɛmpa ne mberano no a ɔse, hɛn mu nye hɛn asefo na ebusuasantsen nyina a wobefi hɛn ekyir aba no, wobehyira hɔn no.
Ber a wɔtoow enyido-adzehu yi mu no, enyido-adzehu kɛse bi so a ɔyɛ enyimnyam baa hɛn do; na Elijah, nkɔnhyɛnyi no, nyia wɔfaa no kɔr sor a ɔannsɔ owu annhwɛ no, begyinaa hɛn enyim, na ɔsee dɛ:
Hwɛ, mber no asõ koraa, dza Malachi dze n’ano kãe no—dze gyee dase dɛ ɔno [Elijah] na wɔbɔsoma no ma ɔaaba, ansaana Ewuradze ne da kɛse a ɔyɛ hu no asõ—
Na ɔbɛdandan egyanom hɔn akoma aba mba do, na mba hɔn akoma aba hɔn egyanom do, amma maammfa ndom ammbɔbɔ asaase no—
Dɛm ntsi, dɛm mberano yi ho nsaafee no wɔdze ahyɛ hom nsa; na iyi bɛma hom ehu dɛ Ewuradze ne da kɛse a ɔyɛ hu no abɛn, oedu mbobow no ano mpo.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/111.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 111
chapter_summary: 1–5, Ewuradze hwɛ No nkowaa hɔn honam afamu ehiadze; 6–11, Ɔnye Zion bedzi no ehumbɔbɔr mu na Oesiesie ndzɛmba nyina ama No nkowaa hɔn yieyɛ.

verses.text: Emi, Ewuradze, hom Nyankopɔn nnyɛ dɛ m’enyi nngye kwan a hom etu yi ho, ɔmmfa ho dɛ ɔyɛ a hom yɛ dza ɔmmfata.
Mowɔ ahonyadze pii wɔ kuropɔn yi mu ma hom, dze ma Zion ne yieyɛ, na nkorɔfo dodowara wɔ kurow yi mu a worubodua hom do aboa hɔn ano dze ama Zion ne yieyɛ wɔ ne mber mu.
Dɛm ntsi, obehia dɛ hom nye nyimpa a wɔwɔ kuropɔn yi mu bɛyɛ anyɛnkofo dɛ mbrɛ wɔbɛkyerɛ hom, na wɔdze bɛma hom so.
Na ɔbɛba dɛ medze kuropɔn yi bɛhyɛ hom nsa wɔ ne mber mu, ama hom enya tum wɔ do, susuampaara dɛ wonnkohu hom nsumaa mu akwan; na n’ahonyadze a ɔyɛ sika na dwetɛ no bɛyɛ homdze.
Mma hom nndwendwen hom kaw ho, na mebɛma hom tum ma hom etua.
Mma hom nndwendwen Zion ho, na me nye no bedzi no mbɔbɔrhu mu.
Hom ntsintsim bea yi do, nye no nkurow a etwa ho ehyia nyina mu;
Na bea a, mpɛn pii, mepɛ dɛ hom tsena no, mo Sunsum no a ɔpem ba hom mu no bodua asomdwee na tum do ada no edzi akyerɛ hom.
Hom botum agye bea yi etua ho kaw. Na hom ebisa enyiberdo ehu nkorɔfo a tsetseberdo no wɔbɛkyekyeer kuropɔn yi;
Osiandɛ nnyɛ ahonyadze kor na ɔwɔ kurow yi mu ma hom.
Dɛm ntsi, hom nyɛ enyansafo tse dɛ mbowatsena, na eso, mma hom nnyɛ bɔn; wɔ ahoɔhar mu a hom botum dze agye no, mibesiesie ndzɛmba nyinara yie ama hom. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/112.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 112
chapter_summary: 1–10, Duebien no wɔ dɛ wɔdze asɛmpa no kɔ na wɔma kɔkɔbɔ ndze do dze bɔ aman na nkorɔfo nyina kɔkɔ; 11–15, Ɔwɔ dɛ wɔfa hɔn mbeamudua, wɔkã Jesus do, na wɔnyɛn No nguan no; 16–20, Hɔn a wɔgye President a Odzi Kan no na n’Apamfo no gye Ewuradze; 21–29, Sum kata asaase do, na hɔn a wɔgye dzi na wonuma hɔn no na wɔbɛgye hɔn nkwa; 30–34, President a Odzi Kan no na n’Apamfo nye Duebien no na wokura mberano ne mãhyɛ ne nsaafee no.

verses.text: Nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se ɔwo m’akowaa Thomas: matse wo mpaabɔ; na w’ayɛ dze abɛyɛ nkaadze wɔ m’enyim, dza aayɛ ama wo nuanom no a woyii hɔn dɛ wɔnkɛgye me dzin ho dase na wɔmfa nkɔ aman, ebusuakuw, kasahorow, na nyimpa nyinara mu, na wondua mo nkowaa do nhyɛ hɔn asɔfo no.
Nokwar, mese wo dɛ, ndzɛmba kakra bi wɔ w’akoma mu nye wo ho a Emi, Ewuradze, m’enyi nngye ho.
Eso, susuampaara dɛ abrɛ woho adze no, wɔbɛma wo do; dɛm ntsi, wɔdze wo bɔn nyinara akyɛ wo.
Ma w’akoma enyi ngye wɔ m’enyim; na ebɛgye me dzin ho dase, na nnyɛ Amanamamfo nko, na mbom ebɛgye akyerɛ Jewfo so; na edze m’asɛm bɔkɔ akɛpem asaase n’ano n’ano.
Dɛm ntsi, enye hɔn nsi, fi adzekyee kesi adzekyee; na ma wo kɔkɔbɔ ndze no nkɔ do ofi da to da; na sɛ adzesaa ba a, osian wo kasaa ntsi, mma hɔn a wɔwɔ asaase do no nntɔ nkom.
Ma wonhu wo tsenabew wɔ Zion, na mma nntu mmfi wo fie hɔ; osiandɛ Emi, Ewuradze, mowɔ edwuma kɛse bi wɔ hɔ a erebɛyɛ, dɛ ebɔbɔ me dzin dawur wɔ adasamba mu.
Dɛm ntsi, bɔ w’asen do wɔ edwuma no ho. Hyɛ wo nsokota, osiandɛ wɔasan mu eyi wo, na wo kwan da mbepɔw do, na aman pii mu.
Na wɔnam w’asɛm do nyimpa mbapɔmba no wɔbɛbrɛ hɔn adze, na ɔnam w’asɛm do bɔkrɔn akɔhweaban no.
Wo ndze bɛkã mbratonyi enyim; na sɛ ekã enyim a ma tɛkyerɛma a ɔsɛɛ nkorɔfo edzin no nngyaa ne nsɛnkekã.
Brɛ wo hoadze; na Ewuradze wo Nyankopɔn bosuo wo nsamu agye wo taataa, na ɔama wo wo mpaabɔ ho mbuae.

Minyim w’akoma mu, na matse wo mpaabɔ a ɔfa wo nuanom no ho. Mma nndɔ hɔn nnkyɛn binom, mbom ma wo dɔ a ewɔ ma hɔn nyɛ dɛ dza ewɔ ma wankasa woho; na ma wo dɔ nsõ nyimpa nyina do, nye hɔn so a wɔdɔ me dzin.
Na bɔ mpaa fa ma wo nuanom Duebien no. Osian me dzin no ntsi, kã hɔn enyim dzendzenndzen, na ma wɔnkã hɔn enyim wɔ hɔn bɔn nyina ho, na dzi nokwar wɔ m’enyim ma me dzin.
Na hɔn nsɔhwɛ, na abɛbrɛsɛ kɛse ekyir no, hwɛ, Emi, Ewuradze, mibenya tsema ama hɔn, na sɛ woemmpirim hɔn akoma, na wɔannyɛ asokyew a, wɔbɛsakyer hɔn, na mebɛsa hɔn yar.
Afei, mese wo dɛ, dza mekã kyerɛ wo no, mekã kyerɛ Duebien no nyina: Hom nsoɛr na hom mbɔ hom asen do, hom mfa hom mbeamudua, hom nkã mo do, na hom nyɛn mo nguan.

Mma hom mmema homho do; mma hom nntsew etua wɔ m’akowaa Joseph do; na nokwar, mese hom dɛ mekã no ho, na me nsa bɔkora no do, na nsaafee a medze ama no, na maatsen wɔ hom so do no, wɔrenngye mmfi no hɔ kesi dɛ mebɛba.
Nokwar, mese ɔwo, m’akowaa Thomas dɛ, ɔwo nye nyimpa a masan mu eyi dɛ onkura m’ahenman ne nsaafee no, dza ɔfa Duebien no a woetu kwan kɔ amanandze wɔ aman nyina do no—
Ama aayɛ m’akowaa a obobue ahenman n’abow wɔ mbea nyinara a m’akowaa Joseph, nye m’akowaa Sidney, nye m’akowaa Hyrum nnkotum aba hɔ no;
Na hɔn do na medze nsɔr nyina hɔn adzesoa asoa hɔn wɔ hyɛber kakra mu no.
Dɛm ntsi, beebiara a wɔbɔsoma hom no, hom nkɔ na mebɛkã hom ho; na beebiara a hom bɔbɔ me dzin no wobobue hom abow a biribi befir mu, ama woeetum agye m’asɛm.
Obiara a ɔgye m’asɛm no ɔgye me, na obiara a ɔgye me no, ɔgye hɔn, President a Odzi Kan na n’Apamfo no, hɔn na masoma hɔn no, hɔn na osian me dzin ntsi, mayɛ hɔn apamfo ama hom.

Na bio, mese hom dɛ, obiara a hom bosoma no wɔ me dzin mu no, na enuanom Duebien no, dze hɔn ndze akamfo no, na wɔaama no tumdzi, wɔ no kwan do no, benya tum dze ebue m’ahenman n’abow ama ɔman biara a ɔwɔ beebiara a hom bɔsoma hɔn no—
Susuampaara dɛ wɔbɛbrɛ hɔnho adze wɔ m’enyim, na wɔatsena m’asɛm mu, na wɔayɛ aso ama mo Sunsum ne ndze no.
Nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, sum kata asaase do, na sum kebii ahyɛ nkorɔfo adwen do, na honam nyina aprɔw wɔ m’enyim.
Hwɛ, awerdzi reba hɔn a wɔwɔ asaase do no do ntsɛm, ebufuhyew da, ɔhyew da, amamfoyɛ da, osũ, mmɔnka na kwadwomtwa da; na ɔbɛyɛ dɛ ekyinehyia-mframa, na ɔbɛkata asaase nyinara do, Ewuradze na ɔse.
Na me fi do na ɔbɛhyɛ ase efi, na me fi mu na obefi akɔ, Ewuradze na ɔse;
Ɔbɛhyɛ ase efi hɔn a wɔwɔ hom mu, Ewuradze na ɔse, hɔn a wɔkã dɛ wonyim me dzin na wonnyim me, na wɔkã ebususɛm dze tsia me wɔ me fi mu, Ewuradze na ɔse.
Dɛm ntsi, hom nhwɛ amma hom aammfa m’asɔr no ho nsɛm annhaw homho wɔ bea yi do, Ewuradze na ɔse.
Mbom hom ntsew hom akoma ho wɔ m’enyim; na afei hom nkɔ wiadze nyinara mu, nkɛkã m’asɛmpa no nkyerɛ abɔdze biara a ne nsa nnkãe no;
Na nyia ɔgye dzi, na wonuma no no, benya nkwa, na nyia ɔnngye nndzi, na woennuma no no wobobu no fɔ.

Na hom, Duebien no, na hɔn, President a Odzi Kan na n’Apamfo no a woeyi hɔn akã hom ho dɛ wɔnyɛ hom apamfo na banodzifo no, na wɔdze dɛm asɔfodzi yi mu tum no ama, wɔ nda a odzi ekyir yi na mber a odzi ekyir yi a ɔyɛ mberano ne mãhyɛ no,
Dɛm tum no a hom kura yi no, nye hɔn so a woekura bi no, wɔ ber ano biara mu no, ofi abɔdze ahyɛse no;
Na nokwar, mese hom dɛ, ne berano no mu nsaafee a hom enya yi fi egyanom hɔ, na ewiei koraa no, wɔdze asoma efi sor abrɛ hom.
Nokwar, mese hom dɛ, hwɛ, mbrɛ hom ɔfrɛ yi dua sõ a. Hom ntsew hom akoma mu nye hom ntar ho, amma woeemmbisa ebusuasantsen yi hɔn bɔgyaa emmfi hom nsamu.
Hom ndzi nokwar nkɛpem dɛ mebɛba, osiandɛ mereba ntsɛntsɛm; na m’akatua wɔ me nkyɛn dɛ medze rubotua nyimpa biara kaw dɛ mbrɛ n’edwuma tse. Meyɛ Alpha na Omega. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/113.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 113
chapter_summary: 1–6, Jesse no dusin, odubaa a ofi mu bae, nye Jesse no ndwow no wɔda no edzi; 7–10, Wɔfrɛ Zion n’asefo no a wɔabɔ hɔn apetse no dɛ wɔnsan mbra Ewuradze hɔ na wɔwɔ asɔfodzi no ho kwan.

verses.text: Woana nye Jesse ne Dusin no a wɔakã ho asɛm wɔ Isaiah Tsir 11, nkyekyɛmu a otsĩa 1, 2, 3, 4 na 5 no?
Nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se: Ɔno nye Jesus Christ.
Ebɛnadze nye odubaa no a wɔakã ho asɛm wɔ Isaiah Tsir a otsĩa 11, ne nkyekyɛmu a odzi kan no mu dɛ obefi Jesse ne Dusin no mu aba no?
Hwɛ, dɛm na Ewuradze se: Ɔyɛ akowaa a ɔwɔ Christ ne nsamu, ne fã bi yɛ Jesse n’asenyi, na ne fã bi so yɛ Ephraim n’asenyi, anaadɛ ofi Joseph fie, ɔno na wɔdze tum kɛse ama no.
Ebɛnadze nye Jesse no ndwow a wɔakã ho asɛm wɔ Tsir a otsĩa 11 ne nkyekyɛmu a otsĩa 10 no?

Hwɛ, dɛm na Ewuradze se, ɔyɛ Jesse n’asenyi, nna ɔyɛ Joseph so n’asenyi, na ɔno na asɔfodzi nye ahenman ne nsaafee no a ɔyɛ frankaa a wɔdze bɔboaboa mo nkorɔfo ano wɔ nda a odzi ekyir no mu no dzi wɔ.
Elias Higbee ne nsɛmbisa: Nhyɛ kasa a wɔakã wɔ Isaiah Tsir a otsĩa 52, nkyekyɛmu 1 no a ɔse: Zion, fa w’ahoɔdzen no fura no n’asekyerɛ nye dɛn—na ebɛn nkorɔfo so na Isaiah kyerɛ?

Ɔrekyerɛ hɔn a Nyankopɔn bɛfrɛ wɔ nda a odzi ekyir mu no, hɔn a wobokura asɔfodzi no tum no dze Zion aba bio no; na Israel no mponee; na ɔmfa n’ahoɔdzen no nfura no nye dɛ ɔmfa asɔfodzi tumdzi no nfura, dza odzi wɔ ɔno Zion, wɔ ebusuasantsen mu no; na ɔnsan so nkɛfa tum a ɔyeew no no.
Zion esiansian no ho efi no kɔn nkyehoma mu no a ɔwɔ nkyekyɛmu a otsĩa 2 no, yɛntse ase dɛn?

Ɔsɛ dɛ yɛtse ase dɛ worutu hɔn a wɔabɔ hɔn apetse ma wɔaka ase no fo dɛ wɔnsoɛr mfi bea a wɔahwe ase no na wɔnsan mbra Ewuradze nkyɛn; na sɛ wɔyɛ dɛm a, anohoba a Ewuradze dze bɔ hɔn nye dɛ ɔbɛkasa akyerɛ hɔn, anaadɛ ɔbɛma hɔn nyikyerɛ. Hwɛ nkyekyɛmu a otsĩa 6, 7 na 8. No kɔn mu nkyehoma no nye Nyame no ndom a ɔdze dom no no, anaadɛ Israel n’asefo no a wɔabɔ hɔn apetse Amanamamfo mu no.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/114.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 114
chapter_summary: 1–2, Hɔn a wokura dzibew wɔ Asɔr no mu a wonndzi nokwar no, wɔdze hɔn dzibew no bɛma binom.

verses.text: Nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se: Ɔyɛ nyansa wɔ m’akowaa David W. Patten mu dɛ ɔtoto n’edwuma no yie ntsɛm dɛ mbrɛ obotum, na ogyaa n’eguadzi nyina mu, ama oeetum akɛkã nkorɔfo bi a sɛ ɔnoara kã ho a wɔyɛ nyimpa duebien ho, ma wɔaakɛgye me dzin ho dase na wɔaakã nsɛmpa no akyerɛ wiadze nyina.
Na nokwar dɛm na Ewuradze se, susuampaara dɛ binom wɔ hom mu a wɔpow me dzin no, wɔdze binom bɛhyɛ hɔn ananmu na hɔn nsa akã hɔn asɔr mu dzibew no. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/115.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 115
