chapter_summary: 1–4, Ewuradze to N’Asɔr no dzin Jesus Christ N’Asɔr a ɔwɔ hɔ ma Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo; 5–6, Zion na ne stake yɛ bambɔ na sumabew ma Ahotseweefo no; 7–16, Wɔhyɛ Ahotseweefo no dɛ wonsi Ewuradze Ne fi wɔ Far West; 17–19, Joseph Smith kura Nyankopɔn n’ahenman ne nsaafee wɔ asaase do.

verses.text: Nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se ɔwo, m’akowaa Joseph Smith, Kakraba, nye m’akowaa Sidney Rigdon, nye m’akowaa Hyrum Smith so, nye w’apamfo a woeyi hɔn ama hom nye hɔn a wobeyi hɔn ekyir yi;
Na ɔwo so, m’akowaa Edward Partridge, nye w’apamfo;

Na mo nkowaa nokwafo no a wɔyɛ abaguafo etsitsir wɔ m’asɔr a ɔwɔ Zion mu, na dɛm na wɔbɛfrɛ no, nye hom a hom yɛ elderfo wɔ m’asɔr a ɔyɛ Jesus Christ N’Asɔr a ɔwɔ hɔ ma Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo no a wɔapetse wiadze nyina mu no;
Na dɛm na wɔbɛfrɛ m’asɔr wɔ nda a odzi ekyir no mu, Jesus Christ N’Asɔr a ɔwɔ hɔ ma Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo mpo.
Nokwar, mese hom nyina dɛ: Hom nsoɛr na hom nhyerɛn ama hom kan no aayɛ fasusu ama aman;
Ama hom ano a hom robɔboa wɔ Zion asaase do, nye ne stake horow mu no aabɛyɛ bambɔ nye guandɔbea ama hom wɔ ehum nye ebufuhyew a worubohue a wɔrommfora mu egu asaase nyina do no.
Hom mma kuropɔn Far West, no nyɛ asaase krɔnkrɔn a wɔatsew ho ama me; na wɔbɛfrɛ hɔ krɔnkrɔnbea kɛse, osiandɛ asaase a hom gyina do no yɛ krɔnkrɔn.
Dɛm ntsi, mehyɛ hom dɛ hom nsi fi mma me ama m’ahotseweefo aaboa hɔn ano wɔ hɔ na woeetum asom me.
Na hom mma wɔnhyɛ edwuma yi ase, na wɔntow fapem, na wɔnyɛ ahoboa edwuma wɔ dɛm ɔhyewber a ɔreba yi mu;
Na hom nhyɛ ase wɔ Ayɛwoho a ɔreba ne da a otsĩa anan no mu; na ofi dɛm aber dze kɔ no, hom mma mo nkorɔfo nyɛ edwuma enyiberdo nsi fi mfa mma me dzin;
Na ndɛ da yi n’afrenhyia pɛpɛɛpɛr hom mma wɔnhyɛ ase ntow me fi ne fapem no.
Dɛm na hom mma wɔnyɛ edwuma enyiberdo ofi dɛm aber yi kesi dɛ wobowie koraa, ofi kutuwdo-bo no do dze kesi etsifi hɔ, kodu dɛ biribiara nnkɛka a wonnwiee.
Nokwar, mese hom dɛ, mma hom mma m’akowaa Joseph anaa m’akowaa Sidney, anaa m’akowaa Hyrum, nnkenya kaw bio wɔ fi a worisi dze ama me dzin no ho.
Mbom hom mma wonsi fi mma me dzin wɔ nhwɛdo a mebɛkyerɛ hɔn dɛ wonsi no do.
Na sɛ mo nkorɔfo ennsi dan no wɔ nhwɛdo a mebɛkyerɛ hɔn president na n’apamfo no do a, merenngye hɔn nsamu dwumadzi no.
Mbom sɛ mo nkorɔfo si no wɔ nhwɛdo a mebɛkyerɛ hɔn president na n’apamfo no, m’akowaa Joseph na n’apamfo no do mpo a, mebɛgye mo nkorɔfo hɔn nsamu dwumadzi no.
Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, ɔyɛ me pɛ dɛ m’ahotseweefo bɔboaboa hɔn ano ntsɛm dze akyekyer kuropɔn Far West no;
Na ofi ber to ber wɔbɛkyerɛ m’akowaa Joseph mbea binom a ɔwɔ mantɔw no mu hɔ a hom besisi stake wɔ.
Na hwɛ, mebɛkã no ho, na matsew no ho wɔ nkorɔfo enyim; na medze ahenman yi nye no mu ɔsomdwuma no ne nsaafee no ama no. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.
Nyame frɛ Spring Hill Adam Ondi-Ahman, osiandɛ, ɔse dɛ, ɔyɛ bea a Adam bɛba abɛsera no nkorɔfo wɔ, anaa bea a Onyi a ne Nda Fir Tsetse bɛtsena ase, dɛ mbrɛ Daniel nkɔnhyɛnyi no kãe no.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/117.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 117
chapter_summary: 1–9, Ɔnnsɛ dɛ Ewuradze no nkowaa hɔn enyi ber wiadze ndzɛmba, na “egyapadze yɛ ebɛnadze ma Ewuradze?” 10–16, Ɔwɔ dɛ wɔpow ɔkra a ɔyɛ sunsum mu ketseaba, na hɔn afɔrbɔ bɛyɛ krɔnkrɔn ama Ewuradze.

verses.text: Nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se m’akowaa William Marks nye m’akowaa Newell K. Whitney so dɛ, wɔntow dwuma a woridzi no mu ntsɛm na wontu kwan mfi Kirtland asaase do, ansaana emi, Ewuradze masoma esukwankyɛba dze egu asaase no do.
Ma wonnyan, na wɔnsoɛr, na wɔmbra, na mma wonntsintsim osiandɛ emi, Ewuradze, na mahyɛ hɔn no.
Dɛm ntsi, sɛ wotsintsim a orunnwie yie mma hɔn.
Ma wonnu hɔnho wɔ hɔn bɔn nye hɔn enyiber apɛdze ho wɔ m’enyim, Ewuradze na ɔse; egyapadze yɛ ebɛnadze ma me? Ewuradze na ɔse.
Hom mma wɔndan Kirtland egyapadze no na wɔmfa ntua akaw, Ewuradze na ɔse, na biribiara a ɔbɛka ekyir no, ma ɔnka wo nsamu, Ewuradze na ɔse.
Ana sor ntumbowa nnyɛ medze nye nam so a wɔwɔ po mu, nye mbowa a wɔwɔ mbepɔw do no? Ana nnyɛ Emi na meyɛɛ asaase? Ana nnyɛ Emi na mukura aman nyina hɔn nsordaafo hɔn nkrabea?
Dɛm ntsi, ana munnkotum ayɛ ma nhyiren apaa mbea a ayɛ kɛsɛɛ do na wɔasow aba pii? Ewuradze na ɔse.
Ana asaase pii nnda Adam-ondi-Ahman mbepɔw no do, nye Olaha Shinehah sar no do, anaa asaase a Adam tsenaa do no, nna hom enyi ber dza ɔyɛ nsosɔwee, na hom pow nsɛm a no mu yɛ dur yi?
Dɛm ntsi, hom mbra mo nkorɔfo hɔn asaase do ha, Zion mpo no.

Ma m’akowaa William Marks ndzi nokwar wɔ ndzɛmba kumaabi ho, na ɔbɔhwɛ pii do. Wɔmma ɔntsena mo nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Far West nkuropɔn no ne finimfin na ɔnhwɛ hɔn do, na ma mo nkorɔfo no mfa hɔn nhyira, nhyira no.

Ma m’akowaa Newell K. Whitney, osian Nicolaitane Kuw no nye hɔn nsumaamu ekyiwadze nye ne kra a ɔyɛ sunsum mu ketseaba wɔ m’enyim ntsi n’enyi nto, Ewuradze na ɔse, na ɔmbra Adam-ondi-Ahman asaase do, na ɔmbɛyɛ bishop mma mo nkorɔfo no, nnyɛ dzin mu ara mbom wɔ ndzeyɛɛ mu, Ewuradze na ɔse.
Na bio, mese hom dɛ, mekaa m’akowaa Oliver Granger; hwɛ, nokwar, mese no dɛ wɔbɛkaa ne dzin wɔ krɔnkrɔnyɛ mu fi ebusuasantsen kesi ebusuasantsen, afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ, Ewuradze na ɔse.

Dɛm ntsi, wɔmma ɔmper enyiberdo nhwehwɛ m’asɔr mu President a Odzi Kan na n’Apamfo hɔn mponee, Ewuradze na ɔse; na sɛ ɔhwe ase a ɔbɔsoɛr bio, na n’afɔrbɔ bɛyɛ krɔnkrɔn mbordo ama me asen n’ahodze pii, Ewuradze na ɔse.
Dɛm ntsi wɔmma ɔmbra Zion asaase do ha ntsɛm, na wɔbɛyɛ no oguadzinyi ama me dzin wɔ me mber pa mu, ma mo nkorɔfo enya mfaso efi mu, Ewuradze na ɔse.
Dɛm ntsi, mma obiara mmbu m’akowaa Oliver Granger enyimtsia, mbom hom mma mo nkorɔfo hɔn nhyira mbra no do afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ.

Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, hom mma mo nkowaa a wɔwɔ Kirtland asaase do nyina no nkaa Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn, nye me fi no so, na wɔnhwɛ do na wɔmbɔ ho ban wɔ krɔnkrɔnyɛ mu, na sɛ mankasa me mber pa no sõ a, oebutuw sikasesafo no, Ewuradze na ɔse. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/118.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 118
chapter_summary: 1–3, Ewuradze bɔhwɛ Duebien no hɔn ebusua ebusua; 4–6, Wɔhyɛ dzibew a wɔada hɔ pan wɔ Duebien no mu mba mu no ananmu.

verses.text: Nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se: Hom nyɛ ehyiadzi kɛse ntsɛmara; hom mma Duebien no nsiesie hɔnho; na hom nyi nkorɔfo ma wɔnhyɛ hɔn a wɔahwe ase no hɔn ananmu.
Hom mma m’akowaa Thomas ntweɔn kakra wɔ Zion asaase do, na ɔmbɔ m’asɛm dawur.

Hom mma hɔn a wɔaka no nkɔ do nkã asɛmpa no mfi dɛm ber no mu, na sɛ wɔdze akoma a ɔyɛ botoo wɔ ɔdwe na ahobrɛadze, nye penkyɛr mu a, Emi, Ewuradze, mobɔ hɔn anohoba dɛ mebɛma hɔn ebusua ebusua hɔn ehiadze; na wobobue abow pa bi ama hɔn, ofi ndɛ kɔ.
Na Fefɛw a ɔreba yi hom mma womfi ha ntwa po kɛse yi nkɔ n’ekyir, na hɔ na wɔnda m’asɛmpa ne mãhyɛ no edzi nkyerɛ, na wɔngye me dzin ho dase.
Hom mma wongyaa m’ahotseweefo a wɔwɔ Far West, bea a worisi me dan no, na wɔnkɔ Ebɔbira ne da a otsĩa eduonu esia a ɔreba no mu, Ewuradze na ɔse.

Hom mma m’akowaa John Taylor, nye m’akowaa John E. Page so, nye m’akowaa Wilford Woodruff so, nye m’akowaa Willard Richards so nhyɛ hɔn a wɔahwe ase no ananmu, na asɔr mpanyimfo no nda hɔn dwumadzi fofor yi edzi nkyerɛ hɔn.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/119.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 119
chapter_summary: 1–5, Ɔwɔ dɛ Ahotseweefo no dze hɔn ahodze a ɔabor do no ma, na nkyii mfaso a wobenya wɔ hɔn dwuma a wobedzi wɔ afe no mu no, wɔkyɛ mu du, na wɔdze kor etua hɔn ebupɛn du; 6–7, Dɛm nyɛe yi bɛtsew Zion asaase ho.

verses.text: Nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se, mepɛ dɛ hom dze hom ahodze a abor hom do nyina hyɛ bishop a ɔwɔ m’asɔr mu wɔ Zion ne nsa,
Ma wɔdze si me fi, na wɔdze atow Zion ne fapem na wɔdze ama asɔfodzi no, na wɔdze etua President a Odzi Kan na n’Apamfo a wɔwɔ m’asɔr mu no hɔn akaw.
Na iyi bɛyɛ mo nkorɔfo hɔn ebupɛn du n’ahyɛse.
Na iyi ekyir no, hɔn a woetua ebupɛn du no botua hɔn mfaso no mu nkyɛmu du no mu kor afrenhyia biara; na iyi bɛyɛ mbra a ɔbɔwɔ hɔ ama hɔn afebɔɔ, dze ama m’asɔfodzi krɔnkrɔn no, Ewuradze na ɔse.

Nokwar, mese hom dɛ, ɔbɛba dɛ hɔn a wɔaboa ano wɔ Zion asaase do nyinara dze dza abor hɔn ahodze do no bɛyɛ hɔn ebupɛn du etua, na ɔwɔ dɛ wodzi dɛm mbra yi do, ɔnntse dɛm a, wonndzi mu a ɔsɛ dɛ wɔtsena hom mu.

Na mese hom dɛ, sɛ mo nkorɔfo enndzi dɛm mbra yi do, na woennsie no krɔnkrɔn, na woenndua dɛm mbra yi do ammfa anntsew Zion asaase ho amma me, ama me nhyehyɛɛ na m’atsɛmbu enntsim, aama hɔ ayɛ krɔnkrɔn mapã, hwɛ, nokwar, mese hom dɛ ɔrennyɛ Zion asaase mma hom.
Na iyi bɛyɛ mfatoho ama stake a wɔwɔ Zion nyinara. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

Nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se, dɛ afei mber no asõ a President a Odzi Kan na n’Apamfo no nye bishop na n’apamfo no a wɔyɛ m’Asɔr no n’abaguafo no; nye m’abaguafo etsitsir no na wɔbɔhwɛ do dze ama; na mankasa me ndze a ɔkasa kyerɛ hɔn, Ewuradze na ɔse. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/121.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 121
chapter_summary: 1–6, Nkɔnhyɛnyi no totɔ serɛ Ewuradze dze ma Ahotseweefo no a woruhu amandze no; 7–10, Ewuradze kã asomdwee ho nsɛm kyerɛ no; 11–17, Ndom nkã hɔn a wɔkã mbrato tsia Ewuradze no nkorɔfo no; 18–25, Worinnya kyɛfa wɔ asɔfodzi no mu na wobobu hɔn fɔ; 26–32, Wɔdze enyimnyam nyikyerɛ bɔ hɔn a wɔsɔw nsɔhwɛ akokodur mu no anohoba; 33–40, Siantsir a wɔafrɛ dodowara na kumaabi na wɔasan mu eyi hɔn; 41–46, Ɔwɔ dɛ wɔdze asɔfodzi no dzi dwuma wɔ kwan tsenenee nko do.

verses.text: O Nyankopɔn, ewɔ hen? Hen na wo ntamadan a ɔkata wo sumabew do no wɔ?

Ibesianka wo nsa ekodu dabɛn; na w’enyi, nyew, w’enyi buroburo no, ebɔtweɔn ekodu dabɛn na efi onnyiewiei ɔsorsor no mu ahwɛ bɔn a wɔdze reyɛ wo nkorɔfo nye wo nkowaa, na ama hɔn sufrɛ ehwira w’asomu?
Nyew, O Ewuradze, wobohu dɛm amandze yi na wɔasɔw dɛm atseetsee a ɔmmfa mbra kwan mu yi ekodu dabɛn ansaana ayamuhyehye ahyɛ w’abadaa mu wɔ hɔnho?

O Ewuradze Nyankopɔn Tumfo, sor nye asaase, nye po, nye dza ɔwɔ mu nyina yɛfo, ɔwo na ewɔ tum na ehyɛ abɔnsam nye sheol sum kebii do—tsen wo nsa; ma w’enyi nhwira; ma wonyi wo ntamadan no mfi hɔ; fi wo sumabew do pue; kyea w’aso, ma w’akoma ngow, na ma ayamuhyehye nhyɛ w’abadaa mu wɔ hɛn ho.
Ma w’ebufuhyew ndzɛw ntsia hɛn atamfo; na w’akomahyew mu no, fa wo nkrantsee dzi hɛn atamfo wer wɔ bɔn a wɔdze reyɛ hɛn ho.
Kaa w’ahotseweefo a woruhu amandze yi, O hɛn Nyankopɔn; na wo nkowaa bedzi dɛw wɔ wo dzin mu afebɔɔ.
Me ba, asomdwee nkã wo kra; w’akotorka na w’amandzehu no, ɔnnkɛkyɛr;
Na afei, sɛ esɔw no yie a, Nyankopɔn bɛma wo do wɔ sor; na ibedzi konyim wɔ w’atamfo nyina do.
W’anyɛnkofo gyina w’afã, na wɔdze enyigye akoma na ɔdɔ nsa bohuhor wo bio.
Innyae nnyɛɛ dɛ Job; w’anyɛnkofo nnkasa nntsia wo, nna wɔnnkã so dɛ wo mbrato so ntsi a, dɛ mbrɛ wɔdze yɛɛ Job no.
Na hɔn a wɔse dɛ osian wo mbrato ntsi no, hɔn enyidado bɛpa na dza woesusu no bɛnan dɛ ma ewia orupue no ne kan a ɔredzɛw no renan esukwankyɛba no;

Na Nyankopɔn so ama ne nsa do esi no pi resesã mber na hyɛber, na oefura hɔn adwen, amma woeenntum anntse n’anwanwadze ase; ama ɔaasɔ hɔn ahwɛ so, na ne nsa aakã hɔn wɔ hɔnankasa hɔn nyansaa na ndaadaa kwan do;
Na osiandɛ hɔn akoma aporɔw ntsi, ndzɛmba a wɔpɛ dɛ ɔba binom do, na wɔdɔ dɛ binom hu amandze no, bɛba hɔnankasa hɔn do pɛpɛɛpɛ.
Ama hɔn sẽ aafem so, na hɔn enyidado so aapa.
Na ɔnnkɛkyɛr biara na woedwuw hɔn asefo nyina efi wi ase ha, Nyankopɔn na ɔse, na hɔn mu kor mpo rennka a ɔtse ase.

Ndom nkã hɔn a wɔbɛma hɔn anantsir do etsia nyia masera no ngo, Ewuradze na ɔse, na wosũ dɛ wɔayɛ bɔn, ber a wɔnnyɛɛ bɔn biara wɔ m’enyim, Ewuradze na ɔse, mbom wɔayɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ m’enyim, nye dza mehyɛɛ hɔn no.
Mbom hɔn a wosũ mbrato ho no yɛ dɛm osiandɛ wɔyɛ bɔn no nkowaa, na hɔnankasa so wɔyɛ asokyew mba.
Hɔn na wɔkã ator ntam tsia mo nkowaa, ama woeetum dze hɔn aba ndɔmmum ase na owu mu—
Wondue, osiandɛ wɔafom mo mbɔdomaba ntsi wɔnnkɛma hɔn kwan ma hɔn nsa akã ayɛdze wɔ me fi mu.
Hɔn nkɛntsɛn rennyɛ mã, hɔn efi na hɔn asan bɛsɛɛ, na hɔn a wɔdaadaa hɔn no bobu hɔn enyimtsia.
Worinnya asɔfodzi mu kyɛfa, hɔn nye hɔn asefo fi ebusuasantsen kesi ebusuasantsen.
Nkyɛ obeye ama hɔn dɛ wɔdze ewuyambo bɛsɛn hɔn kɔn mu na wɔatow hɔn akyen po no bun mu.
Wondue, hɔn a wɔhaw mo nkorɔfo, na wɔpam hɔn na wokum hɔn, na wɔgye dase tsia hɔn, Dɔm Ewuradze na ɔse, ehurutsia ebusuasantsen no rimmfi hɛl afɔbu no mu.
Hwɛ, m’enyi hu na minyim hɔn ndwuma nyina, na mowɔ atsɛmbu ɔbɛba ntsɛmara a medze esie ama hɔn nyina wɔ ne hyɛber mu;
Na woeetu mber bi esi hɔ ama nyimpa biara, dɛ mbrɛ no ndwuma tse no.
Nyankopɔn nam no Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn do bɛma hom nyimdzee, nyew, Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn n’akyɛdze a onnyi kabea no do, dza wonnyii nnkyerɛe fi ber a wɔbɔɔ wiadze dze besi sesei no;
Dza hɛn egyanom aper atweɔn mber tsentsen dɛ wɔbɛda no edzi akyerɛ wɔ mber a odzi ekyir no mu, dza abɔfo twee hɔn adwen gyinaa do no, dɛ wɔdze esie ama hɔn enyimnyam ne mãhyɛ no;
Mber bi bɛba a wɔremmfa biribiara nnsuma, sɛ Nyame kor anaa enyame pii na wɔwɔ hɔ a, wɔbɛda no edzi akyerɛ.
Ahengua na ahenman, mpanyindzi na etum nyina wɔbɛda no edzi ama hɔn a wogyinaa akokodur mu dze maa Jesus Christ n’asɛmpa no.
Na sɛ wɔdze pampi so esisi sor anaa po, anaa asaase kɛsɛɛ, anaa ewia anaa bosoom, anaa nworaba ano a—

Hɔn mber a wɔdze kyin hɔnho nyina, nda nyina a wɔdze esi hɔ, abosoom, mfe nyina ne nhyehyɛɛ nye nda nyina hɔn nda, abosoom, na mfe na hɔn nda mu nda nyina, abosoom na mfe, na hɔn enyimnyam nyina, mbra, na mber a wɔahyehyɛ ato hɔ nyina, wɔbɛda no edzi wɔ mberano nda ne mãhyɛ mu—

Dɛ mbrɛ wɔhyɛɛ no wɔ Onnyiewiei Nyankopɔn Abaguafo a wɔbɔ enyame nyina do hɔn finimfin no ansaana wɔrobɔ wiadze yi no, dɛ wɔdze besie ekesi dɛ ɔrokɔ n’ewiei nye ewiei ber a nyimpa biara bɛhɛn n’onnyiewiei enyim na ɔbɛhɛn ne bɛkyebo ahomgye mu no.

Nsu a ɔrepem bɛda ho afon ekesi aber bɛn? Ebɛn tum na obotum esanka sor? Dɛ sɛ nyimpa botum atsen n’abasa a ɔyɛ mberɛw dze esianka Esutsen Missouri wɔ no kwan a ɔpem mu no, anaa wɔadan no ma wɔapem akɔ etsifi afamu mu mpo a, onnkotum esiw Otumfo kwan dɛ mma onnhue nyimdzee mmfi sor nngu Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo hɔn tsir do.
Hwɛ, wɔbɛfrɛ dodowara, na mbom kumaabi na wɔbɛsan mu eyi hɔn. Na ebɛnadze ntsi na wɔrennsan mu nnyi hɔn?
Osiandɛ hɔn akoma dzi wiadze ndzɛmba ekyir, na wɔper hwehwɛ nyimpa hɔ enyinyam ntsi, wonnsũa dɛm adzesũa kor yi—
Dɛ kyɛfa a ɔwɔ asɔfodzi no mu no nye sor tum no fam ho, na wonnkotum ahyɛ ɔsor tum do anaa wɔdze edzi dwuma gyedɛ wɔnam tsenenee fapem kwan do.

Dɛ wɔdze bɛma hɛn no dze, ɔyɛ nokwar; na mbom sɛ yɛyɛ dɛ yɛkata hɛn bɔn do, anaadɛ yɛma hɛn ahantanyɛ, nye hɛn nsusui hun ho kwan, anaadɛ yɛhwɛ anaa yedzi hɔn do tum dze haw adasamba hɔn akra wɔ akwan biara a ɔnntsen do a, hwɛ, ɔsorsor twe hɔnho; Ewuradze no Sunsum dzi yaw; na sɛ ɔtwe noho a, Amen nkã dɛm nyimpa no n’asɔfodzi anaa ne tumdzi no.
Hwɛ, afei n’enyi bɛba no ho no, nna woegyaa ne bra ahyɛ nankasa ne nsamu, dɛ ɔbɔwɔ dadzepoma ano ntsia, ɔatseetsee ahotseweefo, na ɔakõ etsia Nyankopɔn.

Ntɔhunii yaayaw a yeehu kyerɛ dɛ, ɔyɛ nyimpa dodowara hɔn awoo su na bɔbew dɛ, sɛ wonya tumdzi kakra bi a, dɛ mbrɛ wɔdwen no a, wɔhyehyɛ hɔnho ntsɛmara, dɛ wɔreyɛ dza ɔnntsen dze atseetsee hɔn a wɔhwɛ hɔn do no.
Dɛm iyi ntsi wɔafrɛ dodowara, mbom wɔbɛsan mu eyi kumaabi.
Tum anaa nhyɛdo biara nnyi hɔ a ɔwɔ dɛ osian asɔfodzi no ntsi wɔgye to mu, gyedɛ wɔnam ndzɛfɛdzɛfɛw, nye penkyɛr, nye botooyɛ, nye ɔdwe mu, nye ɔdɔ mapã kwan do nhwɛ hɔn do;
Ɔnam ayamuyie, na nyimdzee mapã do a ɔbɛma ɔkra enyin a enyidosomkyerɛ nye ndabraba biara mmbata ho—
Sɛ Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no kenyan wo a, fa ndamyɛ kã enyim mber pa mu, na ekyir no nya ɔdɔ kɛse ma nyia akã n’enyim no, amma ɔaanndwen dɛ eyɛ ne tamfo;
Ama oeehu dɛ wo nokwar dzi mu yɛ dzen sen owu ntampehoma.

Ma ayamuyie nhyɛ w’abadaa mu mã, a onngyaa da mfa mma nyimpa nyina, nye gyedzi fifo no, na ma ɔbrapa nsiesie w’adwen mu a onngyaa da, nkyii w’awerɛhyɛmu wɔ Nyame enyim bɛhyɛ dzen; na asɔfodzi ho nkyerɛkyerɛ mu ndzepa no bɔsosɔ wo kra do tse dɛ bɔw a ofi sor.

Na ibenya Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no n’anyɛnkoyɛ no aber nyina, na w’ahempoma bɛyɛ ahempoma a ɔnnsakyer wɔ tsenenee na nokwar mu; na w’ahendzi bɛyɛ ahendzi a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem na ɔbɛpem egu wo do efi afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ a ɔnnam nhyɛ kwan biara do.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/122.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 122
chapter_summary: 1–4, Asaase n’ano n’ano bɔhwehwɛ Joseph Smith ne dzin ekyir kwan; 5–7, N’esian na ne yaw bɛma no ntɔhunii a ɔbɔboa ne yieyɛ; 8–9, Nyimpa Ba no duaa iyinom nyina mu.

verses.text: Asaase n’ano bɔhwehwɛ wo dzin ekyir kwan, na nkwaseafo besi wo atwetwe, na hɛl bɔsoɛr etsia wo;
Na mbom nyia n’akoma mu tsew, na enyansafo, nye ebirɛmpɔn, nye atseneneefo bɛgye afotu, nye tumdzi, nye nhyira efi wo nsamu aber biara.
Na wo nkorɔfo runndua akɔnkɔnsafo hɔn dasegye do nndan hɔn ekyir mma wo da.

Ɔwɔ mu dɛ hɔn ndzeyɛɛ dze wo bɔto ɔhaw nye efiadze mu, naaso wobedzi wo nyi, na mbom wɔ mber tsiabaa mu, na wo ndze bɛyɛ hu wɔ w’atamfo finimfin sen awendadze bɔyafo, osian wo tseneneeyɛ ntsi; na wo Nyankopɔn begyina wo nkyɛn afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ.
Sɛ wɔdze wo dua abɛbrɛsɛ mu; sɛ ikegyina esian mu wɔ enuanom adaadaafo ntamu; sɛ ikegyina esian mu wɔ edwotwafo ntamu; sɛ ikegyina esian mu wɔ asaase anaa po do;

Sɛ wɔdze nsɛm a innyim to wo do; sɛ w’atamfo tu hyɛ wo do; sɛ wɔtsew wo fi w’egya na wo nã nye wo nuanom mbarimba na mbaa fekuw mu; na sɛ w’atamfo twe nkrantsee dze tsew wo fi wo yer no bo mu, nye wo mba nkyɛn, na wo babanyin panyin a mbrɛana oedzi mfe esia pɛr bosuo w’atar mu dzendzen, na ɔkã dɛ, M’egya, m’egya, ebɛnadze ntsi na erennye hɛn nntsena yi? O, m’egya, ebɛnadze na nkorɔfo yi dze rekɛyɛ wo? na sɛ wɔdze nkrantsee twe no fi wo nkyɛn, na wotwuw wo adze dze wo kɔ efiadze, na w’atamfo kyin wo ho dɛ mpataku a wɔrohwehwɛ eguambaa bɔgyaa;

Na sɛ wɔtow wo kyen mona mu, anaa wɔdze wo hyɛ ewudzifo nsa, na wobu wo okumfɔ; sɛ wɔtow wo kyen po bun mu; sɛ po asorɛkye nye wo dzi aper; sɛ ehum dzendzen bɛyɛ wo tamfo; sɛ sor yɛ kebii, na abɔdze-dze nyina bɔ mu siw wo kwan, na iyinom nyina ekyir no, sɛ hɛl ankasa bue n’anomu wɔ wo do a, me babanyin, hu dɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom nyina bɛma wo ntɔhunii, na ɔbɛyɛ wo mfaso.
Nyimpa Ba no duaa iyinom nyina mu. Ana eyɛ kɛse sen no?

Dɛm ntsi, mma mmpa abaw, na asɔfodzi no bɛka wo nkyɛn; ɔahyehyɛ n’ahe ama hɔn, worunntum nntra. Wonyim wo nda, na wɔnnkɛtsew wo mfe do; dɛm ntsi, mma nnsuro dza nyimpa bɛyɛ, osiandɛ Nyame nye wo wɔ hɔ afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/123.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 123
chapter_summary: 1–6, Ahotseweefo no wɔ dɛ wɔboaboa ano na wɔkyerɛw hɔn amandzehu nye atseetsee ho nsɛm na wotsintsim dze pue guado; 7–10, Dɛm sunsum kor no ara a ɔdze atorsɛm bae no, ɔnoara so na ɔma wɔtseetsee Ahotseweefo no; 11–17, Asɔrasɔr mu nkorɔfo dodowara hɔn nsa bɛkã nokwar no.

verses.text: Na bio, yɛrebosusu ho akyerɛ ama hom ahwɛ hia a ohia dɛ ahotseweefo no nyina boaboa nokwar nyimdzee nyina ano na ɔhaw na ndzeyɛbɔn nyina a nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ dɛm ɔman yi mu dze ayɛ hɔn;
Na hɔn egyapadze nyina so, na ɔsɛɛ dodow a wɔaba hɔn do ɔfa hɔn edzin ho na pira a wopirapiraa ankorankor, na wɔsɛɛ n’egyapadze ankasa so;
Na hɔn so a wɔkã ho ma wɔtseetsee hɔn no edzin, dɛ mbrɛ wobotum na nsa akã no wɔnhwehwɛ hɔn.

Anaadɛ wobotum eyi abaguafo binom esi hɔ ma wɔaahwehwɛ ndzɛmba yinom mu, na wɔaakyerɛw hɔn anomu nsɛm na nsew; nye hɔnho nsɛm so a ɔnnyɛ nokwar a woetsintsim wɔ nkrataa do dze ato gua na wɔaboaboa ne nyina so ano;

Na dza ɔwɔ dawurbɔ nkrataa nye nwoma tsitsir ahorow nyina mu, nye hɔn abakɔsɛm a ɔnnyɛ nokwar nyina so a wɔakyerɛw dze ato gua, nye dza wogu do rekyerɛw, nye hɔn a wɔrekyerɛw no edzin, na atseetsee nye ewudzi, na ndzɛmba a ɔmmfata nyina a wɔayɛ etsia dɛm nkorɔfo yi, na wɔdze nsɛmansɛma nyina ato gua—

Nnyɛ dɛ yɛdze bɔto gua ma wiadzemba nyina ehu nko, na mbom yɛdze bi so bɔkɔ akɛma aban ne mpanyimfo so ma woeehu sum mu na mbɔnsamdze a wɔayɛ dze etsia hɛn, na iyi bɛyɛ adze a odzi ewiei koraa a hɛn Sor Egya ama kwan ma ɔaba hɛn do ansaana yeetum hɛn nsa akã dɛm anohoba no a ɔbɛma wɔatwe no efi no sumabew hɔ no; amma aman nyina so enntum ennyi hɔnho emmfi afɔdzi mu ansaana ɔatsen no tum abasa no mu.

Ɔyɛ hɛn dwumason a ɔwɔ dɛ yedzi ma Nyankopɔn, sor abɔfo, hɔn na wɔnye hɛn bɛba ebegyina hɔ, nye hɛnankasa so hɛnho, hɛn yernom nye hɛn mba, a wɔasɔw yaw, na awerɛhow wɔ ewudzifo, etsirmɔdzenfo, na epoobɔfo nsa, hɔn a hɔn boafo nye dɛm sunsum no a ɔdze egyanom hɔn atorsɛm etsim, hɔn a woegya hɔn ator, na wɔdze ahyɛ mbofra hɔn akoma mu, na wɔdze adwensɛɛ ahyɛ wiadze mu mã, na worinyin ahoɔdzen mu kesi ahoɔdzen mu, na seseiara hɔn mu na ndabraba, nsisi, nye ndzeprɔwee nyina ne farba, na wiadze nyina si nkrum wɔ n’emumuyɛ no dur ase.
Ɔyɛ dadze kɔndua, ɔyɛ ntampehoma; wɔyɛ aponsa, nye nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn nye aban nkaba nye hɛl ankasa no mpokyerɛ.
Dɛm ntsi ɔyɛ hɛn dwumason a ɔsɛ dɛ yedzi, a yerinndzi mmfa mma hɛn yernom na mba nko na mbom yedzi ma ekunafo na ngyanka a hɔn kunnom na hɔn egyanom a woekum hɔn wɔ dɛm etsirmɔdzensɛm yi nsa;
Dza no sum mu ndwuma yɛ kebii araa ma hɛl ankasa mpo dze suro popo, na ogyina hɔ ahobow mu nye bɔmm, na abɔnsam ankasa mpo ne nsa him na ɔdwedwe.
Nna ɔyɛ dwumason so a ɔsɛ dɛ yedzi dze ma ebusuasantsen a wɔreba, nye hɔn a hɔn akoma mu tsew nyina.

Osiandɛ dodowara da ho wɔ asɔrasɔr, ekuw horow, na som horow mu wɔ asaase do a, nyimpa a wɔyɛ ndabrabafo nam hɔn ndaadaa kwan do efura hɔn enyi, na wɔayɛ krado dɛ wɔbɛdaadaa nkorɔfo na wɔdze nokwar no ehuntsa hɔn osiandɛ wonnyim bea a wobohu efi—
Dɛm ntsi, ɔsɛ dɛ yɛsɛɛ hɛn mber na yɛhwer hɛn nkwa dze twe ndzɛmba a osuma sum mu nyina ba kan mu, na yenyim hɔn; na wofi sor ada no edzi pefee akyerɛ hɛn—
Na ɔsɛ dɛ wɔdze enyimpi dzi iyinom ho dwuma.
Mma nyimpa biara mmbu dɛm ndzɛmba yinom tootooba; osiandɛ dza obesi ndaamba no dɔɔ sõ, dza ɔfa ahotseweefo no ho a ogyina dɛm ndzɛmba yinom do no.
Hom nyim, enuanom, dɛ wusihɛn kakraka no, adze ketseketse bi na ɔboa no ma sɛ ehum rutu a otum fa mframa na asorɔkye mu kɔ tɔɔtsee.
Dɛm ntsi, enuanom adɔfo, hom mma yɛmfa enyigye nyɛ ndzɛmba nyina a hɛn ahom botum; na nkyii yeetum egyina pintsinn dze enyidado mapã ahwɛ Nyame no nkwagye, nye n’abasa a ɔbɛda no edzi akyerɛ no.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/124.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 124
chapter_summary: 1–14, Wɔhyɛ Joseph Smith dɛ ɔmbɔ asɛmpa no dawur awɔse mu nkyerɛ ɔmampanyin a ɔhwɛ United States nye ambradofo, nye aman nyina do ahemfo; 15–21, Osian Hyrum Smith, David W. Patten, Joseph Smith Panyin, nye binom so a wɔkã atseasefo nye ewufo ho no, hɔn nokwardzi na papayɛ ntsi, wobehyira hɔn; 22–28, Wɔhyɛ Ahotseweefo dɛ wonsi enyigyebea mma ahɔho na wonsi temple so wɔ Nauvoo; 29–36, Ɔwɔ dɛ wɔyɛ enuma dze ma ewufo wɔ temple mu; 37–44, Mber nyina Ewuradze no nkorɔfo si temple ama wɔaayɛ ayɛdze krɔnkrɔn wɔ mu; 45–55, Wɔ se Ahotseweefo no dɛ osian hɔn atamfo a wɔretseetsee hɔn ntsi, mma wonnsi temple wɔ Jackson County; 56–83, Wɔkyerɛɛ kwan a wɔmfa do nsi Nauvoo Dan no; 84–96, Wɔfrɛɛ Hyrum Smith dɛ ɔmbɛyɛ patriarch, dɛ ɔngye nsaafee no, na ongyina Oliver Cowdery n’anan mu; 97–122, Wotuu William Law na binom fo wɔ hɔn edwumayɛ ho; 123–145, Wɔbobɔɔ wiadze mfɛndzanan na apaamu dzibewdzifo binom hɔn edzin na wɔdze hɔn quorum ndwuma a ɔsɛ dɛ wodzi hyɛ hɔn nsa.

verses.text: Nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se, ɔwo m’akowaa Joseph Smith, dɛ m’enyi agye w’afɔrbɔ nye dza agye ato mu no ho, na iyi ntsi na mama wo do, ama meedua ndzɛmba a ɔyɛ mberɛw wɔ asaase do ada me nyansaa edzi akyerɛ.

Wo mpaabɔ asɔ m’enyi; na no ho mbuae nye dɛ, mese wo dɛ, afei wɔafrɛ wo seeseiara dɛ bɔ m’asɛmpa no dawur awɔse mu, na stake yi a medze esi hɔ dɛ ɔnyɛ Zion no kutuwdo-bo no, wobotwuw ho ma ɔaayɛ hyɛnhyɛn tse dɛ ahemfie.
Ebɔbɔ dɛm dawur yi akyerɛ ahemfo a wɔwɔ wiadze ne mfɛndzanan nyina, akyerɛ president onyimdzefo a woeeyi no, nye ɔman a etse mu no mu ambradofo enyimdzefo, nye aman nyina a wɔapetse wiadze no.
Ma wɔnkyerɛw no wɔ ɔdwe sunsum na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no tum a ɔbɔwɔ wo mu no do, wɔ ber a erekyerɛw iyi.
Na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no bɛma ehu me pɛ wɔ dza ɔfa dɛm ahemfo nye edzibewdzifo yi wɔ dza ɔbɛba hɔn do wɔ mber bi a ɔbɛba mu.
Na, hwɛ, nkyɛ merebɛfrɛ hɔn ma wɔaahyɛ Zion ne kan na n’enyimnyam no nsew, na mber a wɔahyɛ dɛ wohu no mbɔrbɔr no no aso.

Dɛm ntsi, frɛ hɔn, na fa ndze kɛse bɔ wo dasegye no dawur, mma nnsuro hɔn, osiandɛ wɔtse dɛ nkyɛkyɛr, na hɔn enyimnyam nyina tse dɛ nhyiren a ɔwɔ hɔ a, ɔnnkyɛr na ɔapa, amma hɔn so ennya biribi annkã ammfa anngye hɔnho—

Na ama sɛ wɔpow mo nkowaa nye me dasegye a maada edzi akyerɛ hɔn no a, mabɛsera hɔn wɔ nsera da no mu, ber a mibeyi ntwamutam a ɔkata m’enyim no, na menye atseetseefo no bogu bea a enyidosomkyerɛfo gu no, ɔyɛ bea a asetwɛr wɔ no.

Na bio, mebɛba abɛsera hɔn na magow hɔn mu dodowara hɔn akoma dze ama hom yieyɛ ama hom eenya adom wɔ hɔn enyi do, ama wɔaaba nokwar ne kan no ho, na Amanamamfo so eenya nkwagye ntowdo anaadɛ wɔaama Zion do.
Osiandɛ me nsera da no reba ntsɛm wɔ dɔn a hom nnsusu mu; na henfa na mo nkorɔfo hɔn bambɔ wɔ, na hɔn a wobegya hɔn no so hɔn sumabew wɔ hen?
Hom nsoɛr, O asaase do ahemfo a hom wɔ! Hom mbra, O, hom mfa hom sika na dwetɛ nkã homho mbra, mfa mbɔboa mo nkorɔfo, hom mfa mbra Zion mbabaa fie.
Na bio, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, ma m’akowaa Robert B. Thompson mboa wo ma kyerɛw dɛm dawurbɔ yi, osiandɛ m’enyi agye no ho kɛse, na dɛ ɔnkã wo ho;
Dɛm ntsi, ma ontsie w’afotu, na medze nhyira mbɔho behyira no; ma ɔnyɛ nokwafo na ondzi nokwar wɔ ndzɛmba nyina mu ofi ndɛ kɔ, na ɔbɛyɛ kɛse wɔ m’enyi do.
Mbom ma ɔnkaa dɛ n’edwuma ho nkontaabu no mebebisa efi ne nsamu.
Na bio, mese wo dɛ, nhyira akã m’akowaa Hyrum Smith; na Emi, Ewuradze, modɔ no osian n’akoma n’emudzi ntsi, na osiandɛ ɔdɔ dza ɔtsen wɔ m’enyi do, Ewuradze na ɔse.

Bio, ma m’akowaa John C. Benett mboa wo wɔ wo dwuma a iridzi, edze m’asɛm rekɛma ahemfo nye nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ asaase do no, na ongyina ɔwo, m’akowaa Joseph Smith mpo ne nkyɛn, wɔ amandzehu ber mu; na sɛ otsie afotu a, n’akatua nnkɔbɔ no da.
Na osian no dɔ ntsi, sɛ ɔyɛ iyi a, ɔbɛyɛ kɛse, na ɔbɛyɛ medze, Ewuradze na ɔse. Mehu edwuma a ɔayɛ, na sɛ ɔkɔ do yɛ a, ɔbɛyɛ me enyisɔ, na medze nhyira na enyimnyam ahenkyɛw kɛse bɛhyɛ no.

Na bio, mese wo dɛ, ɔyɛ me pɛ dɛ m’akowaa Lyman Wight bɔkɔ do aka nyamesɛm no ama Zion, ɔmfa ɔdwe sunsum ngye mo ho dase nkyerɛ wiadze; na mebɛma no do tse dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ɔkɔr ntsaban do; na obenya enyimnyam na abɔdzin ama noara noho na me dzin.

Ama aber a obowie n’edwuma yɛ no, maagye no aba me nkyɛn, dɛ mbrɛ medze yɛɛ m’akowaa David Patten no mpo a ɔwɔ me nkyɛn seeseiara yi, nye m’akowaa Edward Partridge so, nye m’akowaa akɔdaa Joseph Smith, Panyin so, nyia ɔnye Abraham tse n’abanyimfa, nyia ɔyɛ nhyiranyi nye krɔnkrɔnnyi, osiandɛ ɔyɛ medze.
Bio, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, ndaadaa su biara nnyi m’akowaa George Miller mu; osian n’akoma n’emudzi ntsi, ɔwɔ dɛ wɔgye no dzi; na dɔ a ɔwɔ no wɔ me dasegye ho no ntsi, Emi, Ewuradze, modɔ no.

Dɛm ntsi, mekã kyerɛ wo dɛ, medze bishop dzibew no ayɛ nsɔwano esi ne tsir do, tse dɛ m’akowaa Edward Partridge, aama ne nsa aakã me fi mu dza wɔdze bɔ afɔr, ama oeetum ehue nhyira egu mo nkorɔfo ehiafo etsir do, Ewuradze na ɔse. Mma obiara mmbu m’akowaa George enyimtsia osiandɛ obedzi me nyi.
Hom mma m’akowaa George nye m’akowaa Lyman, nye m’akowaa John Snider, nye binom so nsi fi mfa mma me dzin, na m’akowaa Joseph bɛkyerɛ hɔn kwan a wɔmfa do nsi, na ɔakyerɛ hɔn bea so a wonsi no.

Ɔbɛyɛ fie a wɔtsena mu, fie a ahɔho befi ekyirekyir mbea do abɔsoɛ mu; dɛm ntsi, wɔmma ɔnyɛ fi pa, bea a odzi mu a ɔbɛma kwantunyi a ɔaberɛ enya apɔwmudzen nye bambɔ wɔ ber a ɔrodwendwen Ewuradze n’asɛm ho; na ɔayɛ kutuwdo-bo a meyi ama Zion.

Dɛm fi yi sɛ wosi dze ma me dzin a, na sɛ fi hwɛdofo a wobeyi no dɛ ɔnhwɛ do no amma kwan ma wɔammfa fĩ biara annkã a ɔbɛyɛ apɔwmudzen tsenabew. Ɔbɛyɛ krɔnkrɔn, annyɛ dɛm a Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn no nnkɛtsena mu.
Na bio, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, ma m’ahotseweefo nyina mfi ekyirekyir mbra.

Na soma asomafo ahoɔharfo, nyew asomafo a wɔasan mu eyi hɔn, na se hɔn dɛ: Hom mfa hom sika, nye hom dwetɛ, nye hom abo a ɔsom bo, nye hom tsetseberdo ndzɛmba nyina mbra; na hɔn a wɔwɔ nyimdzee wɔ tsetse ndzɛmba ho nyina a wɔpɛ dɛ wɔba no, botum aba, na hom mfa box dua, na fir dua, nye pine dua, nye asaase do ndua a ɔsom bo nyina mbɔmu mbra;
Na dadze nye kɔɔber, nye ayewa, nye zinc, nye hom asaase do ndzɛmba nyinara a ɔsom bo; na hom nsi fi mfa mma me dzin, mfa mma nyia ɔyɛ Ɔsorsornyi no ma ɔmbɛtsena mu.
Na wonnhun beebiara wɔ asaase do a obotum aba do na dza ɔyɛ homdze a ɔyewee no ɔdze asan aba bio, anaa dza oeyi efi hɔ no, asɔfodzi ne mãhyɛ no mpo.
Na enuma bura no dze, bi nnyi asaase do a m’ahotseweefo begyina mu enuma dze ama hɔn a woewu no—
Osiandɛ ayɛdze yi wɔyɛ no me fi nko mu, na mennkɛgye ato mu, gyedɛ hom hia nda mu nko, ber a hom nnkotum esi ofi ama me no.
Mbom mehyɛ m’ahotseweefo nyina dɛ wonsi fi mma me; na mema hom mber a ɔwar ma woeesi fi ama me; na mber yi mu dze mebɛgye hom enuma no ato mu.

Mbom hwɛ, dɛm mber yi a medze ama hom yi sɛ ɔsõ a mennkɛgye hom ewufo enuma no ato mu bio; na sɛ hom annyɛ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom ma mber a medze ama hom no sõ a, wɔbɔpow hom dɛ hom yɛ asɔr, nye hom ewufo, Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn na ɔse.

Na nokwar, mese hom dɛ, sɛ me ma hom mber a ɔwar ara yie dɛ hom mfa nsi fi mma me, fi a wɔyɛ ewufo enuma ayɛdze wɔ mu, ayɛdze a wɔhyehyɛɛ too hɔ ansaana wɔrotow wiadze ne fapem, na sɛ mber no pa ho a, munnkotum agye hom ewufo enuma no ato mu.
Na no mu na wɔdze asɔfodzi krɔnkrɔn ne nsaafee no ma, ama hom nsa aakã abɔdzin na enyimnyam.
Na mber yi ekyir no, hɔn a wɔabɔ hɔn apetse mbeambea do no hɔn ewufo enuma no mennkɛgye ato mu, Ewuradze na ɔse.
Na wɔahyehyɛ ato hɔ dɛ Zion, na ne stake, nye Jerusalem, dɛm mbea yinom a meyi esisi hɔ dze ayɛ guandɔbea yi, na ɔbɛyɛ mbea a hɔ na hom nyɛ hom ewufo enuma no.
Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, osi dɛn na hom ho ahohor bɔsɔ m’enyi, gyedɛ hom yɛ no wɔ fi a hom esi dze ama me dzin mu?

Na, osian iyi ntsi na mehyɛɛ Moses mbra dɛ onsi ntamadan ama wɔaasoa akã hɔm ho wɔ sar no do, na woeesi fi wɔ anohoba asaase no do, ama woeyi dɛm ayɛdze no a wɔdze esuma ansaana wɔrobɔ wiadze yi akyerɛ.

Dɛm ntsi, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, hom ngosera, nye hom ho ahohor, nye hom ewufo enuma no, na hom nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn, na hom nkaadze wɔ hom afɔrbɔ a Levi ne mbabanyin bɔ no, nye hom ebisadze a hom yɛ wɔ mbea krɔnkrɔn a hom nya Nyame anomunsɛm, nye hom mbra na atsɛmbu; ɔfa nyikyerɛ n’ahyɛse na Zion ne fapem, nye enyimnyam, abɔdzin, nye no mu mba hɔn endowment, wodua ayɛdze do si no pi wɔ me fi krɔnkrɔn mu, dza wɔhyɛ mo nkorɔfo aber nyina dɛ wonsi mma me dzin krɔnkrɔn no.
Na nokwar, mese hom dɛ, ma wonsi dɛm fi yi mma me dzin, ama meeyi m’ayɛdze akyerɛ mo nkorɔfo wɔ mu;
Osiandɛ mepɛ dɛ meyi ndzɛmba a wɔdze esuma ansaana wɔrotow wiadze ne fapem no kyerɛ m’asɔr, ndzɛmba a ɔfa mberano ne mãhyɛ no.
Na mebɛkyerɛ m’akowaa Joseph ndzɛmba nyina a ɔfa dɛm fi yi ho, nye asɔfodzi a ɔkã ho, nye bea a wonsi no.
Na hom nsi no bea a hom esusu dɛ hom besi no no, na hɔ nye bea a maasan mu eyi ama hom dɛ hom nsi no.
Sɛ hom dze hom ahoɔdzen nyina yɛ edwuma no a, mibehyira bea no do ma hɔ aayɛ krɔnkrɔn.
Na sɛ mo nkorɔfo tsie me ndze, nye mo nkowaa a meyi hɔn dɛ wondzi mo nkorɔfo enyim no hɔn ndze a, hwɛ, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, wonnkotu hɔn efi hɔn bea no do.

Mbom sɛ woenntsie me ndze anaa nkorɔfo a meyi hɔn no hɔn ndze a, wonnkehyira hɔn osiandɛ woegu me bea krɔnkrɔn, nye m’ayɛdze krɔnkrɔn, nye dza wɔakyerɛw ato hɔ, nye me nsɛm krɔnkrɔn a medze ama hɔn no ho fĩ.
Na ɔbɛba dɛ sɛ hom si fi ma me dzin, na hom annyɛ dza mese hom a, minnkedzi nsew a menye hom akã no do, na anohoba a hom enyi da do fi me nsamu no nnkɛyɛ hɔ, Ewuradze na ɔse.

Na nkyɛ ɔwɔ dɛ hom nya nhyira no, hom nam homankasa hom ndwuma do, nye hom nkwaseadze, nye hom ekyiwadze a hom yɛ wɔ m’enyim, hom twe ndom, ebufuw, ebufuhyew, na atsɛmbu gu homankasa hom etsifi, Ewuradze na ɔse.

Nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, sɛ medze mbrasɛm ma adasamba mu biara dɛ wɔnyɛ edwuma bi mma me dzin, na dɛm adasamba no kɔ na wɔdze hɔn ahoɔdzen nyina nye dza wɔwɔ nyina yɛ dɛm edwuma no, na woennya abagura, na hɔn atamfo siw hɔn kwan amma woenntum annyɛ dɛm edwuma no a, hwɛ, minnkebisa dɛm edwuma no ho asɛm efi dɛm adasamba no nkyɛn bio, mbom mebɛgye hɔn afɔrbɔdze ato mu.

Na emumuyɛ na mbrato a wɔayɛ dze etsia me mbra krɔnkrɔn nye me mbrasɛm nyina no, medze bogu hɔn a wosiiw m’edwuma kwan no hɔn etsifi, ekesi ebusuasantsen ebiasa na anan do, wɔ mber tsentsen a wonnkonu hɔnho, na wɔtan me no, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn na ɔse.

Dɛm ntsi na magye hɔn a mehyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnkyekyer kuropɔn na wonsi ofi mfa mma me dzin wɔ Jackson mansin mu, wɔ Missouri no, a hɔn atamfo siiw hɔn kwan no hɔn afɔrbɔdze no ato mu, Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn na ɔse.

Na mubobu hɔn atsɛmbu, ebufuw, nye ebufuhyew, osu nye yaw, nye asetwɛr bogu hɔn etsifi dze ebua hɔn ekesi ebusuasantsen ebiasa na anan do, wɔ mber tsentsen a wonnkonu hɔnho na wɔbɛtan me no. Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn na ɔse.
Na iyi na medze yɛ mfatoho ma hom, dze kyekye hom werɛ wɔ hɔn a wɔahyɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnyɛ edwuma na hɔn atamfo dze atseetsee esiw hɔn kwan no, Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn na ɔse.
Na Emi nye hom Ewuradze Nyankopɔn, na mebɛgye hom nuanom nyina a hɔn akoma mu tsew na woekuku hɔn wɔ Missouri asaase do no nkwa, Ewuradze na ɔse.

Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, mehyɛ hom bio dɛ hom nsi fi mfa mma me dzin, wɔ dɛm bea yi mpo do, ama hom dze aakyerɛ me dɛ hom dzi nokwar wɔ ndzɛmba nyina a mehyɛ hom no mu, ama meehyira hom, na medze abɔdzin, bɛkyebo, nye nkwa a onnyiewiei ahenkyɛw aasoa hom.

Na afei mese hom dɛ, ɔfa me fi a wɔsoɛe mu no, dza mahyɛ hom dɛ hom nsi mma ahɔho nsoɛe no, wonsi mfa mma me dzin, na wɔmfa me dzin nto do, na wɔma m’akowaa Joseph nye ne fifo nnya kyɛfa wɔ mu, ofi ebusuasantsen kesi ebusuasantsen.
Na ngosera yi na medze egu ne tsir do, ama ne nhyira no aakã n’asefo a wobefi n’ekyir aba nyina tsir do so.
Na dɛ mbrɛ mekãa asaase do mbusuakuw ho asɛm kyerɛɛ Abraham no, dɛmara so na mekã kyerɛ m’akowaa Joseph: Wo mu na w’asefo mu na wobehyira mbusuakuw a wɔwɔ asaase do.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mma m’akowaa Joseph na n’asefo a wobesi n’ekyir aba no nnya kyɛfa wɔ dɛm dan no mu, ofi ebusuasantsen kesi ebusuasantsen, afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ, Ewuradze na ɔse.
Na ma wɔmfrɛ dɛm dan no Nauvoo Dan; na wɔmma hɔ nyɛ enyigye tsenabew mma nyimpa, na ɔnyɛ ahomgyebea mma kwantunyi fonafo, ama ɔaadwendwen Zion n’enyimnyam, nye no kutuwdo-bo no, n’enyimnyam.
Ama oeenya afotu so efi hɔn a medze hɔn esi hɔ dɛ ndua a wɔagye dzin kɛse, na wɔtse dɛ aweɔmfo a wɔwɔ n’afasu do no.

Hwɛ, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, ma m’akowaa George Miller, nye m’akowaa Lyman Wight, nye m’akowaa John Snider, nye m’akowaa Peter Haws, wɔnhyehyɛ hɔn ho na wonyi hɔn mu kor ma ɔnyɛ president wɔ hɔn quorum no do ama woeesi dɛm dan no.
Na wɔnkyerɛw kuw n’amambu nhyehyɛɛ ama wɔdze agye dwetsir a wɔdze besi dan no.

Na ɔnnsɛ dɛ wɔgye sika a onndu dollar eduonum wɔ nyimpa kor biara hɔ dɛ ɔyɛ ne kyɛfa wɔ dwetsir wɔ dan no ho, na wɔbɛma kwan ma wɔagye dollar mpem-duenum efi nyimpa kor biara hɔ dɛ ne dwetsir wɔ dan no ho.
Mbom ɔnnsɛ dɛ wɔma hɔn kwan ma wɔgye ma ɔbor dwetsir dollar mpem-duenum fi nyimpa kor biara hɔ.
Na ɔnnsɛ dɛ wɔma hɔn kwan ma wɔgye sika a onndu dollars eduonum dɛ ɔyɛ ne kyɛfa wɔ dwetsir a ɔwɔ dan no ho fi nyimpa kor biara hɔ.
Na ɔnnsɛ dɛ wɔma hɔn kwan ma wɔgye obiara, ma obenya kyɛfa wɔ dwetsir a ɔwɔ dan no ho mu, gyedɛ onyia no etua no dwetsir dze ahyɛ hɔn nsa dɛm aber no ara a onya mu kyɛfa no.
Na sika a obotua dze ahyɛ hɔn nsa mu no ɔno do na hom bɔhwɛ ama no ne kyɛfa dodow wɔ dan no mu; mbom sɛ oenntua biribiara annhyɛ hɔn nsa a, mma wɔmma no kyɛfa biara wɔ dan no ho.

Na sɛ hom yɛ m’apɛdze a, obiara a obotua dwetsir biara ahyɛ hɔn nsa no, bɛyɛ dwetsir wɔ dɛm ofi no mu, dze ama nankasa noho, nye n’ebusuasantsen a wobedzi n’ekyir, ofi ebusuasantsen kesi ebusuasantsen, wɔ mber tsentsen biara a hɔn dzin da do no, anaadɛ wɔnnkɔtɔn anaa wɔnnkɛdan kyɛfa wɔ dwetsir no ama obi wɔ hɔnankasa hɔn pɛ anaa nyɛe do, Ewuradze hɔn Nyankopɔn na ɔse.

Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, sɛ m’akowaa George Miller, nye m’akowaa Lyman Wight, nye m’akowaa John Snider, nye m’akowaa Peter Haws, hɔn nsa kã dwetsir biara wɔ sika mu anaa egyapadze a ɔsom dwetsir no ano pɛpɛɛpɛr a, mma wonnyi no mu bi mmfa nnyɛ biribi fofor, na wɔmfa nyɛ dan no ho dwetsir nko.

Na sɛ woyi dwetsir no mu bi dze kɔ beebi fofor a nyia ɔhwɛ dwetsir no do no nnyim ho hwee, na wɔammbɔ ho mpɛn anan enntua enngu dan no dwetsir mu bio a, ndom bɛkã hɔn, na woeyi hɔn efi hɔn gyinabew do, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn na ɔse; na emi, Ewuradze, meyɛ Nyankopɔn a wonnsi me atwetwe wɔ dɛm ndzɛmba yinom mu.

Nokwar, mese hom dɛ, hom mma m’akowaa Joseph ntua dwetsir nhyɛ hɔn nsamu wɔ dɛm dan no ne nsii ho, dɛ mbrɛ ɔhwɛ a oye ma no, mbom m’akowaa nnkotum etua dwetsir a ɔbor dollar mpemduenum wɔ dan no ho, nna ɔnnsɛ so dɛ otua dollar a onndu eduonum; na dɛmara na ɔsɛ dɛ obiara so yɛ, Ewuradze na ɔse.
Na binom so wɔ hɔ a wɔpɛ dɛ wohu dza mepɛ dɛ wɔyɛ, osiandɛ woebisa efi me nsamu.

Dɛm ntsi, dza mekã kyerɛ hom wɔ m’akowaa Vinson Knight ho nye dɛ, sɛ ɔpɛ dɛ ɔyɛ me pɛ a ɔmfa dwetsir nto dɛm dan no ase mma noho, nye n’ebusuasantsen a wobesi n’ekyir, ofi ebusuasantsen kesi ebusuasantsen.

Na hom mma ɔmma ne ndze do ntsẽa mu wɔ nkorɔfo no finimfin, ntotɔ nserɛ mma ehiafo na abɔbɔfo; na mma onnya abagura anaadɛ no werɛ nnhow; na mebɛgye n’afɔrbɔdze, na ɔnnkɛyɛ me dɛ Cain n’afɔrbɔdze no, na ɔbɛyɛ medze, Ewuradze na ɔse.
Hom mma n’ebusua ndzi dɛw na wɔntwe hɔnho mfi amandzehu ho; osiandɛ masan mu eyi no asera no ngo, na wobedzi no nyi wɔ ne fi mu, na medze no bɔn nyina bɛkyɛ no, Ewuradze na ɔse. Amen.
Nokwar, mese hom dɛ, hom mma m’akowaa Hyrum ntua dwetsir nto dan no ase dɛ mbrɛ ɔhwɛ a oye ma no, mfa mma nankasa noho nye n’ebusuasantsen a wobedzi n’ekyir, ofi ebusuasantsen kesi ebusuasantsen.

Hom mma m’akowaa Isaac Galland ntua dwetsir nto dɛm dan no ase; na Emi, Ewuradze, osian edwuma a ɔayɛ no ntsi modɔ no, na medze no bɔn nyina bɛkyɛ no; dɛm ntsi, hom nkaa ne kyɛfa a ɔwɔ no wɔ dɛm dan no mu no ho fi ebusuasantsen kesi ebusuasantsen.

Hom nyi m’akowaa Isaac Galland wɔ hom mu, na m’akowaa William Marks nhyɛ no sɔfo, na onhyira no, ma ɔnye m’akowaa Hyrum nkɔ nkɛyɛ edwuma a m’akowaa Joseph dze bɛma hɔn dɛ wɔnyɛ no, na wobehyira hɔn pii.
Hom mma m’akowaa William Marks ntua dwetsir nto dɛm dan no ase dɛ mbrɛ ɔhwɛ a oye ma no, mfa mma nankasa noho nye n’ebusuasantsen a wobedzi n’ekyir, ofi ebusuasantsen kesi ebusuasantsen.
Hom mma m’akowaa Henry G. Sherwood ntua dwetsir nto dɛm dan no ase, dɛ mbrɛ ɔhwɛ a oye ma no, mfa mma nankasa noho, nye n’ebusuasantsen a wobedzi n’ekyir, ofi ebusuasantsen kesi ebusuasantsen.
Hom mma m’akowaa William Law ntua dwetsir nto dɛm dan no ase, mfa mma nankasa noho, nye n’ebusuasantsen a wobedzi n’ekyir, ofi ebusuasantsen kesi ebusuasantsen.
Sɛ ɔbɛyɛ me pɛ a, mma ɔmmfa n’ebusua nnkɔ boka nsaase do, mma ɔnnkɔ Kirtland, naaso Emi, Ewuradze mebɛkyekyer Kirtland, mbom Emi, Ewuradze mowɔ ntsẽa a mesiesie ato hɔ ama hɔn a wɔtse hɔ no.

Na wɔ m’akowaa Almon Babbitt ho no, ndzɛmba pii wɔ hɔ a memmpɛ wɔ no ho; hwɛ, ɔpɛ dɛ ɔyɛ dza n’adwen kã kyerɛ no sen dza Emi makyerɛ, dza m’Asɔr mu President a Odzi Kan na n’Apamfo Kuw no bɛkã mpo, na ɔdze sika nantwi no honyi esi hɔ dɛ mo nkorɔfo nsom no.
Mma wɔmma nyimpa biara a ɔaba ha a ɔrobɔ mbɔdzen dɛ obedzi me mbrasɛm do no mmfi ha nnkɔ.
Sɛ wɔtse ha a hom mma wɔntsena mma me; na sɛ wowu so a hom mma wonwu mma me; na wɔbɔhom efi hɔn berɛ nyina mu wɔ ha, na wɔasɔw hɔn edwuma do.

Dɛm ntsi, hom mma m’akowaa William mfa no werɛ nhyɛ mo mu, na mma onnsuro mma n’ebusua, osian yarba a ɔwɔ asaase no do no ntsi. Sɛ edɔ me a, dzi me mbrasɛm do; na yarba a ɔwɔ asaase no do no bɛdan ayɛ enyimnyam ama hom.

Hom mma m’akowaa William mfa ndze kɛse, nye enyigye kɛse nkɔbɔ m’asɛmpa a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no dawur, dɛ mbrɛ mo Sunsum no bɛkã no no, mfa nkyerɛ hɔn a wɔwɔ Warsaw, nye hɔn a wɔwɔ Carthage so, nye hɔn a wɔwɔ Burlington so, nye hɔn a wɔwɔ Madison so, na ɔntweɔn abotar mu nye enyiberdo nkesi dɛ obenya nkyerɛkyerɛ bi so bio wɔ me wiadze mfɛndzanan nhyiamu n’ase, Ewuradze na ɔse.

Sɛ ɔbɛyɛ me pɛ a hom mma ofi ndɛ kɔ no ontsie m’akowaa Joseph n’afotu, na ɔmfa n’enyigye a ɔwɔ no mboa ehiafo, na ɔmfa m’asɛm krɔnkrɔn no a wɔakyerɛ ase fofor no nto gua mfa mma hɔn a wɔwɔ asaase do no.
Na sɛ ɔyɛ iyi a medze nhyira mbɔho behyira no, amma woeennyi no tokyen, na woeennhu n’aba so dɛ wɔreserɛserɛ adze.

Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, hom nyi m’akowaa William, na wɔnhyɛ no sɔfo, na wɔnsera no ngo ma ɔmbɛyɛ m’akowaa Joseph ne pamfo, nhyɛ m’akowaa Hyrum n’ananmu, ama m’akowaa Hyrum aakɛfa Asɔfodzi nye Patriarch dzibew no a ɔyɛ ne kyɛfa no no a n’egya nam nhyira do dze maa no no.
Na ofi ndɛ kɔ no, obokura patriarch dzibew nhyira nsaafee no dze nhyira egu mo nkorɔfo nyina tsir do.

Ama obiara a obehyira no no eenya nhyira, na obiara a ɔdze ndom no bɛkã no eenya ndom; na biribiara a ɔbɛkyekyer wɔ asaase do no wɔbɛkyekyer wɔ sor; na biribiara a ɔbɛsan wɔ asaase do no wɔbɛsan wɔ sor.
Na ofi dɛm mber yi kɔ no meyi no dɛ ɔnyɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi, na adzehunyi, na oyikyerɛfo mma m’asɔr, na m’akowaa Joseph so ara.

Ama ɔnye m’akowaa Joseph aabɔ mu edzi dwuma; na ama oeenya afotu efi m’akowaa Joseph hɔ, ɔno na ɔdze nsaafee no bɛkyerɛ no a ɔbɛnam do dze ebisa na oenya, na wɔdze dɛm nhyira kor no ara, na enyimnyam, na enyidzi, na asɔfodzi, na asɔfodzi akyɛdze no bɛyɛ ahenkyɛw asoa no, dza mber bi wɔdze hyɛɛ nyia nna ɔyɛ m’akowaa Oliver Cowdery no;
Ama m’akowaa Hyrum aagye dase wɔ ndzɛmba a medze rebɛkyerɛ no no ho, ama wɔaakaa ne dzin enyidzi mu ara fi ebusuasantsen kesi ebusuasantsen, afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ.

Hom mma m’akowaa William Law so ne nsa nkã nsaafee no a ɔbɛfa do dze ebisa ma ne nsa akã nhyira no, hom mma ɔnyɛ ahobrɛadze wɔ m’enyim, na mma ɔnnyɛ ndabrabanyi, ama oeenya mo Sunsum no a ɔyɛ Ɔwerɛkyekyefo no mpo, ɔno na ɔbɛda nokwar a ɔwɔ ndzɛmba nyina mu edzi akyerɛ no; na ɔakyerɛ no dɔn noara mu dza ɔsɛ dɛ ɔkã.
Na nsɛnkyerɛdze yinom na obedzi n’ekyir—ɔbɛsa yar, obotu mbɔnsam, na hɔn a wɔbɛma no owubɔr biara ma ɔanom no, ɔnnkɛyɛ no hwee;
Na ɔbɛnantsew akwan a mbowatsena a bɔr wɔ hɔn anomu mu na wonnkotum asɔw n’anantsir, na ɔdze n’adwen mu nsusui botu dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse nkɔr ntsaban do.
Na sɛ mebɛma oenyan ewufo mpo a, mma ɔnnkam ne ndze do.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mma m’akowaa William ntsẽa mu kɛse na mma ɔnnkam do, ɔmfa dɛw na ehurusi ntow hosaana mma nyia ɔtse ahengua do afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ no, Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn no na ɔse.

Hwɛ, mese hom dɛ, mowɔ dwuma bi wɔ hɔ ma m’akowaa William, nye m’akowaa Hyrum, ɔyɛ hɔn nkotoo, na hom mma m’akowaa Joseph ntsintsim wɔ fie, osiandɛ wohia no. Hɔn a wɔaka no mebɛkyerɛ hɔn dza wɔnyɛ ekyir yi. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.
Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, sɛ m’akowaa Sidney bɔsom me na ɔayɛ ɔpamfo ama m’akowaa Joseph a, hom mma ɔnsoɛr na ɔmbra na ombegyina dzibew a wɔfrɛɛ no mu no na ɔmbrɛ noho adze wɔ m’enyim.

Na sɛ ɔbɔbɔ me afɔr a ɔsɔ enyi, na ɔagye ato mu na ɔnye mo nkorɔfo atsena a, hwɛ, Emi, Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn bɛsa no yar ma ɔaatse apɔw; na ɔbɛma ne ndze do bio wɔ mbepɔw no do, na ɔayɛ ɔkasamaafo wɔ m’enyim.
Hom mma ɔmbra na ɔnye n’ebusua mbɛtsena ɔbrɔn a m’akowaa Joseph tse mu no mu.
Na n’akwantu nyina mu no, hom mma ɔmma ne ndze do tse dɛ ɔdze totorobɛnto, na ɔmbɔ hɔn a wɔwɔ asaase do kɔkɔ dɛ wonguan mfi ebufuhyew a ɔreba no ho.
Hom mma ɔmboa m’akowaa Joseph, na hom mma m’akowaa William Law so mboa m’akowaa Joseph ma ɔmbɔ dawur awɔse mu nkyerɛ asaase do ahemfo, dɛ mbrɛ makã akyerɛ hom dada no mpo.
Sɛ m’akowaa Sidney bɛyɛ me pɛ a, mma hom mma no kwan mma onnyi n’ebusua mmfa hɔn nnkɔ boka nsaase do no, mbom hom mma ɔnsesã hɔn tsenabew no, dɛ mbrɛ makã no dada no.
Hwɛ, ɔnnyɛ me pɛ dɛ, ɔbɛper ahwehwɛ bambɔ na sumabew efi kurow a medze ama hom no no, Nauvoo kuropɔn no mpo.
Nokwar, mese hom dɛ, seseiara mpo, sɛ obetsie me ndze a, obowie yie ama nankasa. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm so. Amen.
Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, hom mma m’akowaa Amos Davies ntua dwetsir nhyɛ hɔn a meyi hɔn dɛ wonsi dan a wɔsoeɛ mu no nsa, Nauvoo Dan no mpo.
Hom mma ɔnyɛ iyi sɛ obenya kyɛfa wɔ mu a, na ontsie m’akowaa Joseph n’afotu, na ɔmfa nankasa ne nsa nyɛ edwuma ama nkorɔfo eenya awerɛhyɛmu wɔ no mu.
Na sɛ ɔkyerɛ dɛ odzi nokwar wɔ ndzɛmba nyina a wɔdze bɛhyɛ ne nsa no mu a, nyew, wɔ ndzɛmba kumaabi mu mpo a, wɔbɛyɛ no ɔhwɛfo wɔ pii do;
Hom mma ɔmbrɛ noho adze ama wɔaama no do, Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm, Amen.
Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, sɛ m’akowaa Robert D. Foster betsie me ndze a, hom mma onsi dan mma m’akowaa Joseph, dɛ mbrɛ nhyehyɛɛ a ɔnye no ayɛ no tse, na wobobue abow no ama no fi ber to ber.
Na hom mma onnu noho wɔ n’egyangyandze nyina ho, na ɔmfa ayamuyie mfura; na ongyaa dɛ ɔbɛyɛ dza omuo, na ɔmfa ne kasa dzen no nto nkyɛn.
Na ontua dwetsir so ngu Nauvoo Dan no quorum no nsamu mfa mma nankasa noho nye n’ebusuasantsen a wobedzi n’ekyir no, fi ebusuasantsen kesi ebusuasantsen;

Na ontsie mo nkowaa Joseph, nye Hyrum, nye William Law hɔn afotu, nye hɔn a wɔama hɔn tum na mafrɛ hɔn dɛ wɔmbɔtow Zion ne fapem no; na ɔbɛyɛ yie dze ama nankasa afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, mma hom mma obiara kwan mma onntua dwetsir mma quorum a ɔhwɛ Nauvoo Dan ne nsii do no gyedɛ onyia no enya gyedzi wɔ Mormon Nwoma no mu, nye nyikyerɛ a medze ama no mu, Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn no na ɔse.
Na biribiara a ɔbor do anaa osuar sen iyi no fi abɔnsam, na ndom na obedzi ekyir na nnyɛ nhyira bi, Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn no na ɔse. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ hom mma kuw a ɔhwɛ Nauvoo Dan ne nsii do no nsa nkã akatua a ɔsɛ wɔ hɔn edwumayɛ ho wɔ Nauvoo Dan a worisi no ho; akatua a ɔnye bo no sɛ a homankasa hom gye to mu no, hom ntua mma hɔn.

Na sɛ obehia a, hom mma obiara a otua dwetsir no ntua hɔn akatua no mu kyɛfa ama hɔn so wɔdze aahwɛ hɔnho, Ewuradze na ɔse; ɔnntse dɛm so a, hom mfa hɔn edwumayɛ no nyɛ hɔn so hɔn dwetsir wɔ dan no ho. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

Nokwar, mese hom dɛ, afei medze dzibewdzifo a ɔwɔ m’Asɔfodzi ho no ma hom, ama hom eekura dɛm nsaafee no, dɛm Asɔfodzi no a ɔwɔ Melchizedek ne nhyehyɛɛ do no, dza ɔyɛ me Ba a Wɔwoo no Kortonoo ne nhyehyɛɛ do no.

Odzi kan, medze Hyrum Smith ma hom dɛ ɔnyɛ patriarch mma hom a okura, m’asɔr mu nhyira nsɔwano no, dza ɔyɛ anohoba Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn a wɔfa do sɔw hom ano dze kesi ɔpon da mu no, amma hom aannhwe famu wɔ nsɔhwɛ dɔn no a ɔbɛba hom do no mpo mu.
Medze m’akowaa Joseph ma hom dɛ ɔnyɛ elder banodzinyi a ɔda m’asɔr nyina ano, dɛ ɔnyɛ obi a ɔkyerɛ ndzɛmba ase, oyikyerɛfo, adzehunyi, na nkɔnhyɛnyi.
Medze m’akowaa Sidney Rigdon nye m’akowaa William Law ama no dɛ wɔnyɛ n’apamfo, na hɔn nyina mbɔ mu nyɛ quorum na President a Odzi Kan na n’Apamfo na wobohu dza ndaama obesi asɔrtɔw no nyina do.
Medze m’akowaa Brigham Young ma hom dɛ ɔnyɛ president wɔ akwantufo Duebien abaguafo no do;
Dɛm Duebienfo yi na wokura nsaafee a wɔdze bue m’ahenman ne tumdzi no ma asaase ne mfɛndzanan, na ɔno n’ekyir wɔdze m’asɛm no kɛma abɔdze biara.
Hɔn nye Herber C. Kimball, Parley P. Pratt, Orsan Pratt, Orson Hyde, William Smith, John Taylor, John E. Page, Wilford Woodruff, Willard Richards, Geroge A. Smith.
Mafa David Patten ama mankasa moho; hwɛ, obiara nnkotum agye n’asɔfodzi no efi ne nsamu; mbom, nokwar, mese hom dɛ wobotum afrɛ binom so ama hɔn dɛm dzibew kor no ara bi.
Na bio, mese hom dɛ, mema hom abaguafo etsitsir ma wɔaayɛ kutuwdo-bo ama Zion.

Hɔn edzin nye, Samuel Bent, Henry G. Sherwood, George W. Harris, Charles C. Rich, Thomas Grover, Newel Knight, David Dort, Dunbar Wilson—Seymour Brunson dze maafa no ama mankasa moho; obiara nnkotum agye n’asɔfodzi no efi ne nsamu, mbom wobotum eyi obi ama no dɛm asɔfodzi kor noara bi dze ahyɛ n’ananmu; na nokwar, mese hom dɛ, hom nhyɛ m’akowaa Aaron Johnson ɔsɔfo mfa nhyɛ n’ananmu—David Fullmer, Alpheus Cutler, William Huntington.
Na bio, medze Don C. Smith ma hom dɛ ɔmbɛyɛ president wɔ asɔfompanyin quorum no do;
Dɛm ayɛdze yi na wɔahyehyɛ ato hɔ a no mu mba no na wɔsɛ dɛ woyi hɔn si hɔ ma wɔyɛ president anaa stake horow a wɔapetse mbea nyina do no asomfo.
Na sɛ wɔpɛ a, wobotum etu kwan so, mbom ɔwɔ dɛ wɔhyɛ hɔn asɔfo yɛ hɔn president si hɔ, iyi nye dzibew a wɔfrɛɛ hɔn mu no, Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn no na ɔse.
Mayɛ Amasa Lyman na Noah Packard apamfo, aama wɔaahwɛ asɔfompanyin quorum a ɔwɔ m’asɔr mu no do, Ewuradze na ɔse.

Na bio, mese hom dɛ, medze John A. Hicks, Samuel Williams, nye Jesse Baker ama hom, woyinom hɔn asɔfodzi nye dɛ wɔbɔhwɛ elderfo hɔn quorum no do, dɛm quorum yi wɔahyehyɛ ato hɔ ama asɔfo a wosi hɔ; eso wobotum etu kwan na mbom, wɔahyɛ hɔn asɔfo dze hɔn esi hɔ dɛ wɔmbɛyɛ m’asɔr mu asomfo, Ewuradze na ɔse.
Na bio, medze Joseph Young, Josiah Butterfield, Daniel Miles, Henry Herriman, Zera Pulsipher, Levi Hancock, James Foster ama hom dɛ wɔnhwɛ eduosuonfo quorum no do;

Dɛm quorum yi na wɔahyehyɛ ato hɔ ama elderfo a wotu kwan dɛ wɔnkɛgye me dzin ho dase wɔ wiadze nyina mu, wɔ beebiara a abaguafo etsitsir a wotu kwan, m’asomafo bɔsoma hɔn dɛ wonkesiesie kwan nto m’enyim no.

Soronko a ɔda dɛm quorum yi nye elderfo quorum mu no nye dɛ kor wɔ dɛ otu kwan aber nyina, na kor no so wɔ dɛ ofi ber to ber ɔhwɛ nsɔr no do, kor asɛdze nye dɛ ofi ber to ber ɔbɛyɛ banodzifo, na kor no dze ɔnnyɛ asɛdze dɛ ɔbɛyɛ banodzifo, Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn na ɔse.

Na bio, mese hom dɛ, medze Vinson Knight na Samuel H. Smith ma hom, nye Shadrach Roundy, sɛ ɔbɛpɛ a, dɛ wɔnhwɛ bishop na n’apamfo no do, dɛm bishop na n’apamfo yi wɔakã ho asɛm wɔ Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi nwoma no mu.
Na bio, mese hom dɛ, Samuel Rolfe na n’apamfo a wɔhwɛ asɔfo do, nye akyerɛkyerɛfo hɔn president nye n’apamfo, nye deaconfo hɔn president na n’apamfo, nye stake president na n’apamfo.
Medze dɛm dzibew yinom a wɔabobɔ edzin wɔ etsifi ha yi nye ne nsaafee ma hom, ma wɔdze aboa, na wɔdze aahwɛ do, wɔ ɔsomdwuma no ntsi na wɔ m’ahotseweefo emudziyɛ ntsi.
Na, mbrasɛm a medze ma hom nye dɛ, hom mfa nkorɔfo nsisi dzibew yinom mu na hom ngye dɛm edzin a maabobɔ no nto mu, anaaso wɔ me wiadze mfɛndzanan ehyiadzi no mu no, hom botum dɛ hom nnkɛgye ato mu.
Na hom nsiesie dɛm adankora yinom mma dɛm dzibew yinom wɔ ber a hom risi fi ama me dzin no, Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn na ɔse. Ɔnyɛ hɔ dɛm. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/125.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 125
chapter_summary: 1–4, Ahotseweefo no wɔ dɛ wɔkyekyer nkurow na wɔboa hɔn ano kɔ stake dodow a ɔwɔ Zion no mu no.

verses.text: Ebɛnadze na Ewuradze pɛ wɔ ahotseweefo a wɔwɔ Iowa apaamu no ho?

Nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se, mese hom dɛ, sɛ hɔn a wɔdze me dzin ato hɔn do na wɔrobɔ hɔnho mbɔdzen dɛ wɔbɛyɛ m’ahotseweefo no, sɛ wɔbɛyɛ m’apɛdze na woedzi me mbrasɛm a medze ama hɔn no do a, wɔmma wɔmboa hɔn ano, na wɔnkɔ mbea a mebɛma m’akowaa Joseph akyerɛ hɔn no, na wɔnkyekyer nkurow wɔ hɔ mma me dzin, ama woeesiesie hɔnho dze atweɔn mber a ɔreba no.
Hom mma wɔnkyekyer kurow mma me dzin wɔ asaase a ɔnye Nauvoo dzi abɔenyim no do, na wɔnto no dzin Zarahemla.

Na hom mma hɔn a wofi boka, nye anee, nye etsifi nye anaafo a wɔwɔ pɛ dɛ wɔbɛba abɛtsena hɔ no mfa hɔn egyapadze dɛ mbrɛ makyerɛ wɔ Nashville kurow mu, anaaso Nauvoo kurow mu, nye stake nyina a makyerɛ do, Ewuradze na ɔse.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/126.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 126
chapter_summary: 1–3, Wɔkamfo Brigham Young no dwumadzi na wɔse no dɛ mma onntu kwan nnkɔ ekyir bio.

verses.text: Onuabanyin na dɔfo-pa, Brigham Young, nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se wo: M’akowaa Brigham, moronnhwehwɛ mma nngya w’ebusua hɔ dɛ mbrɛ ayɛ no mber a etwa mu kɔ no, osiandɛ w’afɔrbɔdze asɔ m’enyi.
Mehu w’edwuma nye fona a afona wɔ akwantu mu wɔ me dzin ntsi.
Dɛm ntsi mehyɛ wo dɛ soma ma wɔmfa m’asɛm no nkɔ mbeambea, na tsena hɔ hwɛ w’ebusua do yie fitsi aber yi na afebɔɔ. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/127.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 127
chapter_summary: 1–4, Joseph Smith dzi dɛw wɔ atseetsee na abɛbrɛsɛ mu; 5–12, Ɔwɔ dɛ wɔkyerɛw enuma a wɔyɛ ma ewufo ho nsɛm to hɔ.

verses.text: Susuampaara dɛ Ewuradze eyi akyerɛ me dɛ m’atamfo a wɔwɔ Missouri nye ɔman yi mu nyina da ho kã mo do; na susuampaara dɛ mennyɛɛ biribiara na wɔkã mo do bio, na wɔkã mo do gyan, na wonnyi biribiara a ɔsɛ anaa ɔbɛn pɛrpɛrdzi anaa nokwar wɔ hɔn afa a wɔkã dze tsia me no; na susuampaara dɛ hɔn ndzeyɛɛ nyina nye dza wɔkã tõ mo do nyina yɛ akɔhwisɛm a obir tuum no, madwen ho dɛ, osian mankasã mo nkwa nye dɛm nkorɔfo yi hɔn nkwa ho ntsi, ɔsɛ dɛ mifi bea yi do hyɛber kakra. Mepɛ dɛ mekã kyerɛ hɔn a menye hɔn wɔ dwumadzi biara no dɛ, medze biribiara ahyɛ m’ananmusifo nye me nkrakyefo no nsa, hɔn na wɔbɔhwɛ ekyir ama me, na wobedzi dwuma nyina ntsɛmara na pɛpɛɛpɛr dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɛ, na wɔbɔhwɛ etua m’akaw nyina wɔ ne ber mu, na dwuma biara a obehia dɛ wodzi no wobedzi dɛ mbrɛ ɔfata. Sɛ metse dɛ ehum no a etu no abɔ adze a, mebɛsan aba hom nkyɛn bio.

Na esian a wɔafrɛ me dɛ mundua mu no yɛ m’enyi do biribi ketseketse bi, osiandɛ nyimpa ho ɔtan na ebufuw yɛ adze a osi daa wɔ m’abrabɔ mu; na ne siantsir no yɛ esumasɛm ma me, gyedɛ ɔyɛ biribi a wɔahyehyɛ ato hɔ ama me ansaana wɔrobɔtow wiadze ne fapem, na dɛ ɔyɛ biribi papa anaa bɔn bi ntsi, dɛ mbrɛ hom bɛfa no biara no. Homankasa hom mbu ho atsɛn nhwɛ. Nyame nyim ndzɛmba yinom nyina, dɛ oye anaa omuo. Naaso, nsu a ɔdɔ na ɔyɛ me kyɛfa a ɔwɔ dɛ mobor wɔ mu. Ne nyinara abɛyɛ me nyimpa su a ɔtɔdo ebien; na metse nkã bi, tse dɛ Paul, mehyɛ moho enyimnyam wɔ abɛbrɛsɛ mu; na ndɛ da yi na m’egyanom hɔn Nyankopɔn no eyi me efi ne nyina mu, na obeyi me efi mu ofi ndɛ kɔ, na hwɛ, mibedzi m’atamfo do konyim, osiandɛ Ewuradze Nyankopɔn na ɔakã.
Dɛm ntsi; hom mma ahotseweefo nyina ndzi dɛw, na hɔn enyi ngye kɛse; na Israel ne Nyankopɔn no nye hɔn Nyankopɔn, na obosusu akatua a ɔsɛ dze egu hɔn ahyɛdofo nyina tsir do.

Na bio, nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se: Hom mma me temple ho dwumadzi no, nye ndwuma a medze ama hom dɛ hom nyɛ no nkɔ do, na mma hom nngyaa mu nngu hɔ; na hom mma hom mbɔdzembɔ, nye aperdzi, na abotar, nye hom ndwuma nyɛ mbɔho ebien, na hom akatua nnkɔbɔ hom. Dɔm Ewuradze na ɔse. Na sɛ wɔtseetsee hom a, dɛmara so na wɔtseetsee nkɔnhyɛfo nye atseneneefo a wodzii hom enyim no. Na iyi nyina ho akatua wɔ sor.
Na bio, mekã hom asɛm bi a ɔfa hom ewufo hɔn enuma ho.

Nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se hom a ɔfa hom ewufo ho: Sɛ hom mu biara gyina ma wonuma no dze ma hom ewufo a, ɔwɔ dɛ hom ma ɔkyerɛwfo wɔ hɔ, hom mma nankasa mfa n’enyi ngye hom enuma no ho dase; na hom mma nankasa mfa n’aso ntsie, ama oeetum agye dase nokwar mu, Ewuradze na ɔse;
Ama dza hom bɛkyerɛw nyina no woeetum akyerɛw wɔ sor; biribiara a hom bɛkyekyer wɔ asaase do no wɔbɛkyekyer wɔ sor; biribiara a hom bɛsan wɔ asaase do no, wɔbɛsan wɔ sor;
Na nkyɛ medze ndzɛmba pii resan aba asaase do, dza ɔfa asɔfodzi ho, Dɔm Ewuradze na ɔse.
Na bio, hom mma wɔnhyehyɛ dza wɔakyerɛw nyina esiado esiado, ama wɔdze eesie wɔ me temple krɔnkrɔn no mu, na wɔakaa no afebɔɔ fi ebusuasantsen kesi ebusuasantsen do, Dɔm Ewuradze na ɔse.

Mese ahotseweefo nyina dɛ, medze ɔpɛ kɛse pɛɛ dɛ migyina hɔ kã biribi a ɔfa ewufo enuma ho Kwesida a ɔreba yi fi bea a wogyina kasa no. Na mbom susuampaara dɛ onnyi mo tum mu dɛ mebɛyɛ dɛm ntsi, mebɛkyerɛw Ewuradze ne nsɛm ofi ber to ber, wɔ dɛm asɛm no ho, na medze abrɛ hom, nye ndzɛmba pii binom so.

Na seseiara medze mo nwoma a merekyerɛw no aba ewiei, osiandɛ minnyi mber pii; osiandɛ ɔtamfo no ayɛ krado, na dɛ mbrɛ Agyenkwa kãe no, ɔhenba a ɔwɔ dɛm wiadze yi mu no reba, na mbom onnyi biribiara wɔ mo mu.

Hwɛ, me mpaa a mobɔ ma Nyame nye dɛ wɔngye hom nyina nkwa. Na medze moho ama hom dɛ hom ɔsomfo wɔ Ewuradze mu, nkɔnhyɛnyi na adzehunyi wɔ Jesus Christ N’Asɔr a ɔwɔ hɔ ma Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo No mu.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/128.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 128
chapter_summary: 1–5, Apaamu na wiadze mfɛndzanan Asɔr akyerɛwfo no wɔ dɛ wɔkyerɛw gye dase wɔ enuma a wɔyɛ ma ewufo no ho nokwar; 6–9, Hɔn dza wɔakyerɛw no wɔkyekyer no asaase do na wɔkyerɛw no wɔ ɔsor so; 10–14, Enuma bura no gyina hɔ ma owumaa mu; 15–17, Elijah dze tum a wɔdze yɛ enuma ma ewufo no asan ama; 18–21, Wɔdze tsetseberdo nsaafee, ahoɔdzen na tum na tumdzi asan ama; 22–25, Wɔkã enyigye na enyimnyam nsɛm no kyerɛ atseasefo nye ewufo.

verses.text: Dɛ mbrɛ mekyerɛwee wɔ mo nwoma a medze brɛɛ hom ansaana mirifi me bea no do no mu dɛ mebɛkyerɛw hom ofi ber to ber na makã hom nsɛm a ɔfa ndzɛmba pii ho no, afei morosɔw ewufo hɔn enuma ho asɛm no do, dɛ mbrɛ dɛm asɛm yi hyɛ m’adwen do, na ɔhyɛ me nkãtse do dzendzenndzen, fi ber a m’atamfo hyɛɛ ase dɛ woritsiw me no.

Mekyerɛɛw nyikyerɛ ho kasafua kakra bi a ɔfa ɔkyerɛwfo ho. Mowɔ adwen kakra bi dze kã nsɛm yi ho a afei misi no pi yi. Ɔno nye dɛ ɔwɔ mo nwoma dadaw no mu dɛ ɔwɔ dɛ ɔkyerɛwfo wɔ hɔ, a ɔbɛyɛ dasefo, na ɔdze nankasa n’aso tse dza wɔkã nyina, ama oeetum akyerɛw dza ɔyɛ nokwar wɔ Ewuradze enyim.

Afei, ɔfa dɛm nsɛm yi ho no, ɔbɛyɛ fona kɛse ama nsɛnkyerɛwnyi kortoo dɛ no nko bɔwɔ hɔ aber biara na obedzi dwuma no nyinara. Mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ a hom beyi dɛm fona yi efi hɔ no, hom botum ama kurow no mu ward biara afa ɔkyerɛwfo a odzi mu a obotum akyerɛw nsɛm a ɔkɔ do no yie na hom mma ɔnkyerɛw ndzɛmba a wɔyɛ nyina pɛpɛɛpɛr na ɔngye ho dase dɛ ɔdze n’enyi hunii, na ɔdze n’aso tsee, na ɔnkyerɛw da no, nye edzin, nye dza ɔkekã ho nyina a osi hɔ no; na ɔnkyerɛw hɔn a wɔwɔ hɔ bi no hɔn mu baasa edzin, sɛ binom wɔ hɔ a, wobotum wɔafrɛ hɔn aber biara mu dɛ wɔngye dase wɔ dza osii ho a, ama adasegyefo beenu anaa baasa anomu no wɔafa do esi asɛm biara ngyinae.

Afei, hom nyi wiadze mfɛndzanan ɔkyerɛwfo panyin kor so wɔ hom mu a hom dze kyerɛwsɛm no nyina bɛhyɛ ne nsa, na wɔdze dasegye krataa a hɔn edzin hyɛ ase dɛ dza wɔakyerɛw wɔ mu no nyina yɛ nokwar. Nkyii wiadze mfɛndzanan ɔkyerɛwfo panyin no akyerɛw no wɔ asɔrtɔw no abakɔsɛm nwoma no mu na ɔdze adasegye nkrataa nyina nye adasegyefo a nna wɔwɔ hɔ no nyina so akã ho, na nankasa so ɔakyerɛw nedze akã ho dɛ, ɔgye dase dɛ nsɛm a wɔakyerɛw nyina yɛ nokwar, na dɛ onyim dɛm nkorɔfo no na hɔn suban, na onyim so dɛ asɔr no na oyii hɔn dze dɛm dwumadzi no hyɛɛ hɔn nsa. Na sɛ ɔkyerɛw iyi wɔ asɔrtɔw no abakɔsɛm nwoma no mu a, nna kyerɛwsɛm no yɛ nokwar na ɔbɛyɛ krɔnkrɔn so, na obeyi ayɛdze no ano tse dɛ mbrɛ ɔdze n’enyi hunii na ɔdze n’aso tsee, na ɔakyerɛw nsɛm no wɔ asɔrtɔw no abakɔsɛm nwoma no mu.

Hom bɔdwen dɛ nhyehyɛɛ yi yɛ soronko dodow; na mbom hom mma menkã nkyerɛ hom dɛ ɔyɛ Nyame ne pɛ ho nhyehyɛɛ dɛ yɛbɛyɛ dze edzi ayɛdze nye mboaboaho a Ewuradze hyehyɛɛ too hɔ dada ansaana wɔrotow wiadze ne fapem, dze ama ewufo hɔn nkwagye, hɔn a wobowu a woennya asɛmpa no ho nyimdzee no do.

Na bio, mepɛ dɛ hom kaa dɛ John Oyikyerɛfo no nna ɔrodwendwen dɛm asɛm yi ara a ɔfa ewufo ho no, ber a ɔkãa wɔ Nyikyerɛ 20:12—Na muhun ewufo nkakraba nye akɛse, dɛ wogyinagyina ahengua no enyim; na woebuebue nwoma mu; na wobuee nwoma bi so a ɔyɛ nkwa nwoma no mu; na wɔnam dza wɔakyerɛw wɔ nwoma no mu no do buu ewufo no atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ndwuma tse.

Hom bohu wɔ dɛm ɔserɛkã a wɔakã yi mu dɛ wobuebuee nwoma mu; na wobuee nwoma bi so a ɔyɛ nkwa nwoma no mu; na mbom wɔnam dza wɔakyerɛw wɔ nwoma no mu no do buu ewufo no atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ndwuma tse; iyi no nsunsuando nye dɛ, dɛm nwoma a wɔakã ho asɛm yi bɛyɛ nwoma a wɔakyerɛw hɔn ndwuma wɔ mu no, na iyi kyerɛ nsɛm a wɔakyerɛw ato asaase yi do. Na nwoma no a ɔyɛ nkwa nwoma no nye nsɛm a wɔakyerɛw wɔ sor no; dɛm nsɛm yi nye nkyerɛkyerɛ a wɔdze hyɛɛ hom wɔ nyikyerɛ a mekyerɛwee wɔ mo nwoma a medze brɛɛ hom ansaana miribefi me bea a nna mowɔ mu no, dzi ehyia pɛpɛɛpɛr—dɛ nsɛm a hom bɛkyerɛw nyina na wɔbɛkyerɛw no wɔ sor.

Afei, dɛm ayɛdze yi no su wɔ asɔfodzi tum no mu dɛ mbrɛ Jesus Christ ne nyikyerɛ tse, dɛ biribiara a hom bɛkyekyer wɔ asaase do no, wɔbɛkyekyer wɔ sor, na biribiara so a hom bɛsan wɔ asaase do no, wɔbɛsan wɔ sor. Anaadɛ, sɛ yɛbɔhwɛ nkyerɛase no wɔ kwan fofor do a, biribiara a hom bɛkyerɛw wɔ asaase do no, wɔbɛkyerɛw wɔ sor, na biribiara a hom nnkɛkyerɛw wɔ asaase do no, wɔnnkɛkyerɛw wɔ sor; na dɛm nwoma no mu na wɔbɔhwɛ ebu hom ewufo atsɛn, dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ndwuma tse, na sɛ hɔnankasa na wɔbɛyɛ dɛm ayɛdze no ama hɔnho, anaadɛ hɔnankasa hɔn ananmusifo na wobegyina ayɛ ama hɔn, dɛ mbrɛ ayɛdze a Nyankopɔn ahyehyɛ ato hɔ dada dze ama hɔn nkwagye ansaana wɔrobɔtow wiadze fapem, dɛ mbrɛ nsɛm a wɔakyerɛw ato hɔ a ɔfa hɔn ewufo ho no tse.

Binom bɔdwen dɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ a yɛrekã ho asɛm yi yɛ asɛm fofor—tum a ɔkyerɛw anaadɛ ɔkyekyer wɔ asaase do na ɔkyekyer wɔ sor so. Naaso, wiadze ne mber nyina mu no, aber biara a Ewuradze nam nyikyerɛ do dze asɔfodzi mberano no bɛma nyimpa bi, anaa nyimpa kuw bi no, daa ɔdze dɛm tum yi ma. Dɛm ntsi biribiara a dɛm nyimpa no nam tumdzi mu bɛyɛ wɔ Ewuradze ne dzin mu no, na wɔyɛɛ no ampaara nye nokwar mu, na wɔkyerɛɛw ho nsɛm nokwar mu no, dɛm kyerɛwsɛm no bɛyɛ mbra wɔ asaase do nye sor so, na wonnkotum apepa da, dɛ mbrɛ Jehovah kokroko ahyɛ ho mom no. Iyi yɛ nokwasɛm. Woana botum etsie?

Na bio, hom nhwɛ dza ɔfa iyi ho a wɔakyerɛw wɔ Matthew 16:18, 19: Na mese wo so dɛ, Ɔwo nye Peter, na ɔbotan yi do na medze m’asɔr besi; na samanadze aponkɛse nnkedzi do nyim. Na medze sor ahenman ne nsaafee bɛma wo; na biribiara a ebɛkyekyer wɔ asaase do no, wɔbɛkyekyer wɔ sor; na biribiara a ebɛsan wɔ asaase do no, wɔbɛsan wɔ sor.

Seseiara esumasɛm kɛse na ɔsõ a ɔwɔ asɛm yi nyina mu, nye dza ɔyɛ asɛm a ɔda hɛn enyim yi mu no mu adze pa a ɔkrɔn nye dɛ yɛbenya Asɔfodzi Krɔnkrɔn no mu tum. Na nyia wɔdze dɛm nsaafee yinom ama no no nnkɛberɛ koraa na oenya nyimdzee wɔ adasamba hɔn nkwagye ho, hɔn a woewu nye hɔn a wɔtse ase nyina.

Iyi mu na enyimnyam nye enyidzi nye bɛkyebo na onnyiewiei nkwa wɔ—Enuma ayɛdze a wɔdze nyimpa hyɛ nsu mu no yɛ nhyehyɛɛ a ɔda hɔ dze kyerɛ owu ama fapem kor nye kor so aayɛ kor; sɛ wɔdze hom hyɛ nsu mu na hom fi nsu no mu pue a, ogyina hɔ ma dɛ ewufo asoɛr na wofi hɔn nda mu reba, dɛm ntsi, dɛm ayɛdze yi, wɔhyehyɛe too hɔ ama ɔnye ewufo hɔn enuma ayɛdze no aayɛ adze kor, dza ogyina hɔ ma ewufo no.

Dɛm ntsi, wɔyɛɛ enuma bura no ama oeegyina hɔ ama owumaa, na wɔahyɛ dɛ, ɔwɔ dɛ ɔkɔ beebi a ɔwɔ famu ama hɔn a wɔwɔ nkwa mu no eetum ehyia na woeehu atseasefo nye ewufo, ama ndzɛmba nyina eenya hɔn sɛfo, na ama kor nye kor no edzi ehyia—ama dza ɔyɛ asaase dze no aasɛ dza ɔwɔ sor no, dɛ mbrɛ Paul akã wɔ 1 Corinthfo 15:46, 47 na 48:

Naaso, nnyɛ sunsum dze na odzi kan, mbom honam mu dze no a; na nkyii sunsum dze no aba. Nyimpa a odzi kan no fi famu, ɔyɛ famunyi, nyimpa a otsĩa ebien no yɛ Ewuradze a ofi sor. Dɛ mbrɛ famunyi no tse no dɛm ara so na famufo so tse; na dɛ mbrɛ sornyi no tse no dɛm ara so na sorfo so tse. Na dɛ mbrɛ hom akyerɛw wɔ asaase do a ɔfa hom ewufo ho yɛ nokwar no, dɛmara na ma wɔakyerɛw wɔ sor no so tse. Dɛm ntsi, iyi nye nsɔwano na nkyekyeree tum no, na asɛm kor no ara so nye dɛ, ahenman no ne nsaafee no wɔ nyimdzee saafee no mu.

Na afei, mo nuambanyin na me nkyerɛbaa adɔfo, hom mma minsi no pi nkã nkyerɛ hom dɛ, dɛm fapem yinom na ɔwɔ hɔ a ɔfa ewufo na atseasefo ho a ɔnnsɛ dɛ yebu hɛn enyi gu do, dza ɔfa hɛn nkwagye ho. Osiandɛ hɔn nkwagye hia na oye ma hɛn nkwagye so, dɛ mbrɛ Paul kãe wɔ egyanom ho dɛ—sɛ wokwetsi hɛn a Ewuradze remma wondzi mu—anaadɛ hɛn ewufo kwetsi hɛn a Ewuradze nnkɛma woedzi mu.
Na afei, ɔfa ewufo ho no, mebɛkã hom nsɛm bi so a Paul kãe wɔ, 1 Corinthfo 15:29 mu dɛ: Ɔnntse dɛm a, hɔn a wonuma hɔn ma ewufo no, wɔbɛyɛ dɛn? Sɛ ewufo nnyan koraa a, ɔyɛ dɛn na wonuma hɔn ma ewufo?

Na bio, ɔfa ɔserɛkã yi ho no, mebɛma hom ɔserɛkã fi nkɔnhyɛfo no kor hɔ, a ɔdze n’enyi sii asɔfodzi ne nsanananmu no do, nye enyimnyam a wɔbɛda no edzi wɔ nda a odzi ekyir no mu, na dza ɔyɛ soronko a ɔfa asɛmpa a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no ho nyina nye ewufo enuma no; osiandɛ Malachi kãe wɔ ne kyerɛwsɛm tsir a odzi ewiei, nkyekyɛmu 5 na 6 dɛ: Hwɛ mobɔsoma nkɔnhyɛnyi Elijah mabrɛ hom ansaana Ewuradze ne da kɛse a ɔyɛ hu no edu. Na ɔbɛdandan egyanom hɔn akoma aba mba do, na mba hɔn akoma aba hɔn egyanom do; amma maammfa ndom mammbɔbɔ asaase no.

Nkyɛ ɔwɔ dɛ mekyerɛ hom iyi ase pefee, na dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse yi ara ɔda mo botae no edzi ara yie. Oye dɛ hom hu, wɔ dɛm asɛm yi mu, dɛ wɔdze ndom bɔbɔ asaase yi gyedɛ nkafamdze bi bɛsẽ egyanom na mba no ntamu wɔ asɛm bi anaa biribi ho—na hwɛ, ebɛnadze nye dɛm asɛm no? Ɔno nye dɛm ewufo enuma no. Osiandɛ sɛ yɛnnkã hɔn ho a, wonnkotum edzi mu, nna sɛ hɔn so wɔnnkã hɛn ho a, yennkotum edzi mu, nna sɛ hɔn a wowui wɔ asɛmpa no mu no so nnkã hɛn ho a hɔn nye hɛn so nnkotum edzi mu; osiandɛ ohia wɔ dɛm mber yi a wɔahyehyɛ ato hɔ ama mberano ne mãhyɛ yi, dɛm mberano yi na ɔahyɛ ase reda no edzi, ama nkabɔmu a odzi mu, nye mberano nyina, nye nsaafee, nye etum, nye enyimnyam nyina ne nkabɔmu no aaba, na wɔbɛda no edzi fitsi Adam n’aber do dze ebesi aber yi mu. Na nnyɛ iyi nkõ, mbom ndzɛmba a wɔnndaa no edzi da fi wiadze ne fapem, na mbom wɔdze esuma enyansafo nye enyimdzefo no, wɔbɛda no edzi akyerɛ mbɔdomaba nye enumfoanomba wɔ dɛm mberano ne mãhyɛ yi mu.

Seseiara, ebɛn asɛm na yɛatse efi asɛmpa a hɛn nsa akã yi mu? Enyigye ndze! Ehumbɔbɔr ndze a ofi sor; nye nokwar ndze a ofi asaase mu; enyigyesɛm dze ma ewufo; enyigye ndze dze ma atseasefo nye ewufo; enyigyesɛm a ɔyɛ dɛw kɛse. Hwɛ hɔn a wɔdze enyigyesɛm kɛse ba no mbrɛ hɔn anan ho si yɛ fɛw wɔ mbepɔw do, na wɔse Zion dɛ: Hwɛ, wo Nyankopɔn dzi hen! Dɛ mbrɛ Carmel do bɔw tse no, dɛmara na Nyankopɔn ho nyimdzee so besian aba hɔn do!

Na bio, ebɛn asɛm na yɛtse? Enyigyesɛm fi Cumorah! Moroni a ɔyɛ bɔfo a ofi sor reda nkɔnhyɛfo no hɔn nsɛm ne mãhyɛ no edzi—nwoma a wɔrebɛda no edzi no. Ewuradze ne ndze fi Fayette sar no do, nye Seneca mansin mu reda adasegyefo baasa no a wɔbɛgye nwoma no ho dase no edzi! Michael ne ndze fi Susquehanna esuegya, riyi abɔnsam no a ɔdaan noho dɛ kan bɔfoe no edzi akyerɛ! Peter, James nye John ndze wɔ Susquehanna Mansin mu, nye Colesville, Broome mansin a ɔwɔ Susquehanna esutsen ho no, wɔreda hɔnho edzi dɛ hɔn na wokura ahenman no ne nsaafee nye mberano ne mãhyɛ!

Na bio, Nyankopɔn ne ndze wɔ akɔkora Egya Whitmer ne pia mu, wɔ Fayette, Seneca mansin mu, wɔ mber pii mu, nye mbea ahorow pii do, wɔ Jesus Christ N’Asɔr a ɔwɔ hɔ ma Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo yi hɔn akwantu nye hɔn abɛbrɛsɛ nyina mu! Na Michael, ɔbɔfopanyin no ne ndze; Gabriel nye Raphael hɔn ndze, nye abɔfo horow, fi Michael anaa Adam do dze besi dɛm aber yi mu, hɔn nyina ada hɔn mberano, hɔn kyɛfa, hɔn nsaafee, hɔn enyidzi, hɔn ahendzi nye enyimnyam edzi, nye hɔn asɔfodzi tum no; wɔdze nkyerɛkyerɛ nkakrankakra, wɔdze ahyɛdze tsia ahyɛdze, wɔdze kakra ma ha a, nna wɔdze kakra ama hɔ no so; wɔakã dza ndaamba ɔbɛba dze akyekye hɛn werɛ, dze esi hɛn enyidado pi!

Enuanom, ana ɔnnsɛ dɛ yɛkɔ do boa wɔ dɛm dwumadzi kɛse yi mu? Hom nkõ nkɔ hom enyim na mma hom nnsan hom ekyir. Hom nnya akokodur, enuanom; na wɔnkɔ do, nkedzi konyim! Hom mma hom akoma ndzi dɛw, na hom enyi ngye kɛse. Hom mma asaase ntow ndwom. Hom mma ewufo mbɔ onnyiewiei ayɛyi ndwom ho dawur mfa mma Ɔhen Immanuel no a ɔhyehyɛe too hɔ ansaana wɔrobɔ wiadze no, dza ɔbɛma yeetum apon hɔn efi efiadze; na adaduafo eenya hɔn fahodzi.

Hom mma mbepɔw ntsẽatsẽa mu enyigye mu, na hom mbɔnsa nyina ntsẽa mu kɛse; na hom po nye asaase kɛsɛɛ nyina nkã hom Onnyiewiei Hen no n’anwanwadze! Na hom esutsen, nye esuwa, nye woransu, hom mpem nsian enyigye mu. Hom mma ndupɔn nye hamu ndua nyi Ewuradze ayɛw; na mbotan a wotsim nsu enyigye mu mbɔ ose! Na hom mma ewia, bosoom, nye anapa nworaba mbɔ mu ntow ndwom, hom mma Nyankopɔn ne mba nyina ntsẽa mu enyigye mu! Na hom mma onnyiewiei abɔdze nda ne dzin edzi afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ. Na bio, mese mbrɛ odua yɛ enyimnyam wɔ ndze a yɛtse fi sor dɛ ɔrobɔ enyimnyam, nye nkwagye, nye enyidzi, nye bɛkyebo, nye onnyiewiei nkwa, ahenman, mpanyindzi, nye etum ho dawur wɔ hɛn asomu!

Hwɛ, Ewuradze ne da kɛse no abɛn; woana na obotum atsena ase wɔ da a ɔbɛba no mu, woana na obotum egyina ber a obopue no? Osiandɛ ɔtse dɛ ɔberfo n’abergya, ɔtse dɛ ɔtanhofo semina; na ɔbɛtsena ase dɛ dwetɛ namfo na yiyimufo, na ɔbɛtsew Levi mbabanyin ho, na ɔapɔw hɔn ho dɛ sika na dwetɛ, ama wɔdze ayɛyɛdze ama Ewuradze wɔ tseneneeyɛ mu. Dɛm ntsi, hom mma hɛn a yɛyɛ asɔr na dɔm yi, na yɛyɛ Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo yi, yɛmbɔ afɔr mma Ewuradze wɔ tseneneeyɛ mu; na sɛ wowie ne temple krɔnkrɔn no si a, hom mma yɛmfa nwoma a hɛn ewufo ho nkyerɛwee a odzi mu wɔ biribiara mu no nkɔto mu.
Enuanom, mowɔ nsɛm pii kã kyerɛ hom wɔ dɛm asɛm yi ho; na mbom seseiara dze, medze bɛba ewiei, na mobɔsɔw do da bi so. Mara hom akowaa brɛfo na nyɛnko a ɔmmpaa mmfi hom ho,

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/129.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 129
chapter_summary: 1–3, Nkorɔfo a woewuwu na wɔasoɛr efi owu mu nye hɔn a wɔwɔ esunsum nyimpadua nyinara wɔ sor; 4–9, Wɔama nsaafee a ɔbɛma woehu asomafo a wɔwɔ ntwamutam no ekyir.

verses.text: Abɔdze ahorow ebien na wɔwɔ sor. Hɔn nye: Abɔfo, a wɔyɛ nyimpa-su bi a woewu na wɔasoɛr, wɔwɔ honam na mbiew nyimpadua—
Mfatoho bi nye dza, Jesus kãe no: Hom nsuo mo mu nhwɛ, osiandɛ sunsum nnyi honam na mbiew dɛ mbrɛ hom hu me dɛ mowɔ yi.
Otsĩa ebien nyimpa atseneneefo a woedzi mu hɔn esunsum, hɔn a wɔnnsoɛree mmfii owu mu, na mbom woenya dɛm enyimnyam kor no ara bi.
Sɛ ɔsomafo bi ba na ɔse ɔdze nsɛm bi fi Nyankopɔn hɔ nam a, tsen wo nsa ma no na se no dɛ onkyia wo.
Sɛ ɔyɛ ɔbɔfo a obekyia wo, na ebɛtse nkã dɛ esuo ne nsamu.
Sɛ ɔyɛ nyimpa tsenenee a wɔama oedzi mu no sunsum a, ɔbɛba wɔ n’enyimnyam mu; osiandɛ ɔno nko nye kwan a obotum afa do aba—
Bisa no dɛ ɔmfa ne nsa nto wo nsamu nkyia wo, na ɔnnkɛkekã noho da, osiandɛ otsia sor mbra dɛ ɔtseneneenyi bɛdaadaa obi; na mbom ɔbɔkɔ do dze ne nsɛm a ɔdze nam no ama.
Sɛ ɔyɛ abɔnsam a ɔadan noho kan bɔfoe a, sɛ ebisa no dɛ ɔmfa ne nsa nto wo nsamu nkyia wo a, ɔbɛtsen ne nsa ama wo, na ennkɛtse hwee wɔ wo nsamu; na dɛm ntsi eetum ehu no.
Dɛm nsaafee tsitsir ebiasa yi na hom botum afa do ehu sɛ dwumadzi biara fi Nyankopɔn hɔ.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/130.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 130
chapter_summary: 1–3, Egya na Ɔba no botum eyi hɔnho ankasa akyerɛ nyimpa; 4–7, Abɔfo tse celestial wiadze mu; 8–9, Celestial asaase no bɛyɛ Urim na Thummim kɛse bi; 10–11, Wɔdze ɔbo fitaa ma hɔn a wɔhɛn celestial wiadze mu nyina; 12–17, Wɔdze Mbae a Otsĩa Ebien no esuma Nkɔnhyɛnyi no; 18–19, Nyansa biara a yebenya wɔ dɛm asetsena yi mu no, nye hɛn bɔsoɛr wɔ Owusoɛr no mu; 20–21, Nhyira nyina nam setsie a yɛdze ma mbra no do ba; 22–23, Egya no na Ɔba no wɔ honam na mbiew nyimpadua.

verses.text: Ber a Agyenkwa no bɛba no yebohu dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse no ara, yebohu no dɛ ɔyɛ nyimpa tse dɛ hɛnankasa.
Na dɛ mbrɛ yɛtse ase ekuwekuw wɔ ha yi, dɛmara so na yɛbɛtsena wɔ hɔ so, soronko a ɔbɛba mu ara nye dɛ yebenya onnyiewiei enyimnyam akã ho, dɛm enyimnyam no dze yennyi no seseiara.

John 14:23—Egya na Ɔba no hɔn mbae a wɔakyerɛw no wɔ dɛm nkyekyɛmu yi mu no kyerɛ dɛ wɔbɛda hɔn ho edzi ankasa akyerɛ no; na mbom adwen a ɔkyerɛ dɛ Egya na Ɔba no tse nyimpa n’akoma mu no yɛ asɔrasɔr nkyerɛkyerɛ, na ɔnnyɛ nokwar.
Asɛm a wobisae dɛ—Ana Nyankopɔn ne mberbu, ɔsorbɔfo ne mberbu, nkɔnhyɛnyi ne mberbu, nyimpa ne mberbu nngyina ɔsor nworaba kor a wɔtsetse mu no do bi no ho mbuae?
Mbuae a medze ma nye dɛ, Nyew. Mbom abɔfo biara nnyi hɔ a wɔsom wɔ asaase yi do, gyedɛ hɔn a wɔtse do anaa wɔatsena do pɛn no.
Abɔfo nntse ɔsor nworaba a ɔtse dɛ hɛn asaase yi do,
Mbom wɔtse Nyame ne nkyɛn, wɔ bea a hɔ hyerɛn dɛ ahwehwɛ na ogya po, bea a ndzɛmba hɔn enyimnyam da edzi, dza etwa mu kɔ, dza ɔwɔ hɔ seseiara nye dza ɔbɛba nyina, na wɔwɔ Ewuradze n’enyim aber nyina.
Bea a Nyankopɔn tse no yɛ Urim na Thummim kɛse bi.

Asaase yi, sɛ wɔtsew ho na ɔyɛ bɛkyebo tsenabew a, ɔbɛyɛ hyɛnhyɛn tse dɛ ahwehwɛ, na ɔbɛyɛ Urim na Thummim dze ama hɔn a wɔbɛtsena do no, hɔ na ndzɛmba nyinara a wɔwɔ ahenman a onndzi mu papa, anaadɛ ahenman nyina a hɔn nhyehyɛɛ wɔ famu no, wɔbɛda no edzi akyerɛ hɔn a wɔtsena do no, na asaase yi bɛyɛ Christ dze.
Nkyii na ɔbo fitaa no a wɔakã ho asɛm wɔ Nyikyerɛ 2:17 no bɛba abɛyɛ Urim na Thummim ama ankorankor biara a ne nsa bɛkã bi, ɔno na ɔbɛma ndzɛmba a ɔwɔ ahenman a ɔkrɔn mu no ada edzi,
Na wɔdze ɔbo fitaa ma ankorankor biara a ɔba celestial ahenman mu no, no do na wɔakyerɛw dzin fofor bi wɔ, na obiara nnyim gyedɛ nyia ne nsa bɛkã no nkõ. Dzin fofor no nye asɛntsitsir no.
Mehyɛ nkɔm, wɔ Ewuradze Nyankopɔn ne dzin mu dɛ, ɔhaw a ɔdze bɔgyagu pii bɛba no a ɔbɛhyɛ ase ansaana Nyimpa Ba no aba no, ɔbɛhyɛ ase efi Carolina Anaafo.
Obotum efi nkowaasomsɛm mu aba. lyi ndze bi na ɔdaa no edzi kyerɛɛ me wɔ ber a morobɔ mpaa enyiberdo wɔ asɛm bi ho, wɔ Mumu 25, 1832.
Da no nna morobɔ mpaa enyiberdo dɛ mubohu ber a Nyimpa Ba no bɛba, ber no na metsee ndze bi dɛ ɔrekã nsɛm a odzi do yi:
Joseph, me babanyin, sɛ etsena ase kodu dɛ ibedzi mfe eduowɔtwe enum a, ibohu Nyimpa ba no n’enyim, dɛm ntsi mma nnhaw me wɔ dɛm asɛm yi ho bio.
Afei nna munntum nnhu dɛ sɛ mbae yi rekyerɛ mfe apem n’ahyɛse anaa mbae dadaw bi, anaadɛ mubowu na meehu n’enyim.
Megye dzi dɛ Nyimpa Ba ne mbae no nnkɛba ntsɛm akyɛn dɛm mber no.
Nyansa biara a yebenya wɔ dɛm nkwa ber yi mu no, nye hɛn bɔsoɛr wɔ owusoɛr no mu.
Na sɛ obi nam no mbɔdzembɔ na setsie do sũa adze na onya nyimdzee na nyansa wɔ nkwa ber yi mu sen obi so a, ne gyinabew bɔkrɔn asen ɔkor no nedze wɔ wiadze a ɔbɛba no mu.
Mbra bi wɔ hɔ, a wɔhyɛɛ ho ɔmom wɔ sor, ansaana wɔrotow wiadze fapem, a wɔnnkantse no da, ɔno na nhyira nyina gyina do.
Na sɛ yenya nhyira bi fi Nyankopɔn hɔ a, nna ɔkyerɛ dɛ yedzi dɛm mbra no a nhyira nyina gyina do no do.

Egya no wɔ nyimpadua a ɔyɛ honam na mbiew dɛ mbrɛ nyimpa wɔ, Ɔba no so dɛmara, mbom Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no nnyi nyimpadua a ɔyɛ honam na mbiew, mbom ɔyɛ Sunsum nyimpa-su. Sɛ ɔnntse dɛm a, nkyɛ Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no nnkotum atsena hɛn mu.
Nyimpa botum ne nsa akã Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no, obesian no do na ɔnye no nnkɛtsena.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/131.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 131
chapter_summary: 1–4, Celestial awar ho hia ma nkwagye ntowdo a ɔwɔ ɔsorsor no; 5–6, Wɔkyerɛkyerɛ mbrɛ wosi sɔw nyimpa ano ma onnyiewiei nkwa mu; 7–8, Sunsum nyina yɛ abɔdze-dze.

verses.text: Sor ahorow ebiasa anaadɛ ntwerba ebiasa na ɔwɔ celestial enyimnyam mu,
Sɛ nyimpa pɛ dɛ onya dza ɔkrɔn koraa no a, ɔsɛ dɛ ɔkɛhɛn dɛm asɔfodzi nhyehyɛɛ yi mu [mekyerɛ awar na ahyɛmudzi fofor a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no].
Na sɛ ɔannyɛ dɛm a, onnkotum enya.
Obotum ahɛn fofor mu, mbom ɔno bɛyɛ n’ahendzi n’ewiei, na onnkotum enya mpontu biara.
(Esusow Aketseaba 17, 1843.) Nkɔnhyɛ asɛm a osi pi mbordo nye ber a nyimpa bohu dɛ wɔnam nyikyerɛ na nkɔnhyɛ sunsum do asɔw no ano dze ama onnyiewiei nkwa wɔ Asɔfodzi Krɔnkrɔn no tum no mu.
Wonnkotum agye nyimpa nkwa wɔ no kotooyɛ mu.
Abɔdze-dze biara nnyi hɔ a ɔnnyɛ hwee. Sunsum nyinara yɛ abɔdze-dze, mbom ɔyɛ mehemehe anaadɛ ɔtsew, gyedɛ enyi a ho tsew nko na oeetum ehu;
Yennkotum ehu no, na mbom ber a wɔbɛtsew hɛn nyimpadua ho no, yebohu dɛ adze nyina yɛ abɔdze-dze.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/132.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 132
chapter_summary: 1–6, Wɔnam ahyɛmudzi fofor a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no do nya nkwagye ntowdo; 7–14, Wɔda dɛm ahyɛmudzi no ho mbra na nhyehyɛɛ; 15–20, Celestial awar na ebusuatɔw no nkɔdo no nna ɔma nyimpa tum bɛyɛ enyame; 21–25, Kwan tsẽaba na no mu yɛ nkekãnkekã no na wɔfa do kɔ onnyiewiei nkwa mu; 26–27, Mbra a wɔdze mae a ɔfa hɔn a wɔkasa tsia Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no; 28–39, Onnyiewiei ndɔree na nkwagye ntowdo ho anohoba no wɔdze bɔ nkɔnhyɛfo na Ahotseweefo no wɔ mber nyina mu; 40–47, Wɔma Joseph Smith tum dɛ ɔnkyekyer na ɔnsɔw ano wɔ asaase na sor; 48–50, Ewuradze sɔw no nkwagye ntowdo ano wɔ no do; 51–57, Wotu Emma Smith fo dɛ onnya gyedzi na ondzi nokwar; 58–66, Wɔda mbra a wɔdze hwɛ awar pii do edzi.

verses.text: Nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se m’akowaa Joseph, susuampaara dɛ ebisa efi me nsamu dɛ epɛ dɛ ihu siantsir a Emi, Ewuradze mubuu mo nkowaa Abraham, Isaac, nye Jacob nye mo nkowaa Moses, David nye Solomon no bem dɛ mbrɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ ne fapem no kyerɛ wɔ hɔn yernom na nwewefo pii mfefaree no ho, na epɛ dɛ etse ase no—
Hwɛ, na hu dɛ Emi nye Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn no, na mebɛma wo mbuae a ɔfa dɛm asɛm no ho.
Dɛm ntsi, siesie w’akoma fa gye, na dzi nkyerɛkyerɛ a medze rebɛma wo yi do osiandɛ hɔn a wɔada dɛm mbra yi edzi akyerɛ hɔn no otwar dɛ wodzi do.

Na hwɛ, mereda ahyɛmudzi fofor a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem bi edzi akyerɛ wo, na sɛ enndzi dɛm ahyɛmudzi no do a, nna wobobu hom fɔ, osiandɛ obiara nnyi hɔ a ɔbɔpow dɛm ahyɛmudzi yi na wɔbɛma no kwan ma ɔaahɛn m’enyimnyam mu.
Na hɔn a wobenya me nsamu nhyira no nyina bedzi mbra a dɛm nhyira no fam ho, nye dza ɔkekã ho nyina a wɔhyehyɛe ansaana wɔrotow wiadze fapem no do.

Na ɔfa ahyɛmudzi fofor a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem ho no, wɔhyehyɛe too hɔ maa m’enyimnyam ne mãhyɛ no, nyia obenya ne mãhyɛ no otwar dɛ na ɔwɔ dɛ odzi mbra no do, ɔnntse dɛm a wobobu no fɔ, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn na ɔse.

Na nokwar, mese hom dɛ, dɛm mbra ho nhyehyɛɛ nye iyinom: Ahyɛmudzi, nhyehyɛɛ, nkyekyeree, asɛdze, nsewdzi, bɔhyɛ, nyɛe, nsesemu, fɛkuwbɔ anaa enyidakwan nyina a wɔannyɛ na, wɔannam nyia wɔasera no ngo dze ama aber yi nye mbersantsen nyina mu no ammfa anohoba Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no annsɔw ano ma wɔannhɛn mu no, na ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn mu krɔnkrɔn, nyikyerɛ nye mbrasɛm no duaa me nyimpa a meyi no na wɔasera no ngo no do mmaa no, ɔno na meyi no wɔ asaase do dɛ onkura dɛm tum yi (na meyi m’akowaa Joseph dɛ onkura dɛm tum no wɔ nda a odzi ekyir no mu, na obiara nnyi hɔ gyedɛ nyimpa kortonoo na wɔdze dɛm tum yi nye dɛm asɔfodzi ne nsaafee yi ama no wɔ asaase do) owuekyir no biribi papa biara anaa tum biara anaa nhyɛ biara, osiandɛ sɛ nyimpa wu a, nhyehyɛɛ biara a wɔannyɛ no wɔ kwan yi do no ba ewiei.
Hwɛ, me fi yɛ fi a wɔyɛ no mu biribiara esiado esiado, na ɔnnyɛ fi a basabasa biara wɔ mu, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn na ɔse.
Ana mebɛgye afɔrbɔdze a wɔammbɔ no wɔ me dzin mu? Ewuradze na ɔse.
Anaadɛ mebɛgye biribi efi hom nsamu a nnyɛ emi na medze mae?
Ana mebɛma hom biribi a ɔmmfa mbra kwan do, Ewuradze na ɔse, dɛ mbrɛ emi nye m’Egya mpo hyehyɛe maa hom ansaana wɔrobɔ wiadze?
Emi nye Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn; na mema hom mbrasɛm yi—dɛ obiara mmba Egya no hɔ gyedɛ ɔnam mo do anaa ɔnam m’asɛm a ɔyɛ me mbra no do, Ewuradze na ɔse;

Na biribiara a ɔwɔ wiadze mu, sɛ wɔnam nyimpa do, anaa ahengua do, anaa mpanyindzi, anaa etum, anaa ndzɛmba a wɔwɔ dzin, biribiara a wɔyɛe no, sɛ nnyɛ emi na meyɛe, anaa wɔammfa m’asɛm do yɛe a, wɔbɔtow akyen, Ewuradze na ɔse, na nyimpa no wu ekyir no ɔnnkɛka hɔ, nna ɔnnkɛka hɔ so wɔ owusoɛr ekyir, Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn no na ɔse.
Na ndzɛmba biara a ɔbɛka hɔ no fi emi; na biribiara a ommfi emi no wɔbɔwosow no na wɔasɛɛ no.

Dɛm ntsi, sɛ ɔbarimba war yer wɔ wiadze mu, na sɛ nnyɛ mo do anaa m’asɛm do na oduae waree a, ahyɛmu a ɔnye no dzii no dzi mu mber dodow biara a ɔnye no wɔ hɔ, na sɛ wowu na wofi wiadze mu a, hɔn awar nye ahyɛmudzi no nnyi tum biara bio; dɛm ntsi, mbra biara nnkyekyer hɔn bio ber a woefi wiadze mu no.

Dɛm ntsi, ber a woefi wiadze mu no wɔnnwar anaa wɔmmfa anaa mma awar so; mbom wɔyɛ hɔn abɔfo wɔ sor; dɛm abɔfo no yɛ nkowaa asomfo wɔbɔsom hɔn a woedzi mu na wɔafata onnyiewiei enyimnyam a ɔsõ tra do pii no.

Osiandɛ dɛm abɔfo yinom enndzi me mbra do; dɛm ntsi, wonnkotum adɔr, mbom wɔbɛtsena hɔ ankorankor a wonnkenya nkwagye ntowdo, wɔ hɔn nkwagye tsenabew mu, akɔ mbersantsen mu; na ofi dɛm ber dze kɔ no wɔnnyɛ enyame, mbom wɔyɛ Nyame n’abɔfoe afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ.

Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, sɛ ɔbarimba war yer, na ɔnye no dzi ahyɛmu wɔ aber yi na mbersantsen nyina mu, na sɛ woenndua mo do anaa m’asɛm a ɔyɛ me mbra do enndzi dɛm ahyɛmu no, na nyia mafɔw no ngo na meyi no esi hɔ ama dɛm tum no enndua anohoba Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn do annsɔw ano a, sɛ wofi wiadze yi mu a ɔnam dɛ nnyɛ emi na mekãa hɔn bɔɔ mu na woenndua m’asɛm do so yɛe ntsi, Ewuradze na ɔse; sɛ wofi wiadze yi mu a onnyi tum biara wɔ hɔ, osiandɛ wɔama abɔfo na enyame dwumadzi wɔ hɔ, ntsi wonnkotum apa hɔn ho akɔ, dɛm ntsi, wonnkotum enya m’enyimnyam no; osiandɛ wɔahyehyɛ biribiara esiado esiado wɔ me fi, Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn no na ɔse.
