Na bio, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, sɛ ɔbarimba nam m’asɛm a ɔyɛ me mbra no do war yer, na odua ahyɛmudzi fofor a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no do yɛ, na nyia wɔasera no ngo, na woeyi no esi hɔ ama no dɛm tum no nye asɔfodzi nsaafee no dua anohoba Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no do sɔw ano ma hɔn na ɔse hɔn dɛ—Hom bɔsoɛr wɔ owusoɛr a odzi kan no mu; na sɛ ɔba dɛ owusoɛr a odzi kan no ekyir a owusoɛr a odzi do no; na wobenya ahengua, ahenman, mpanyindzi, na tumdzi, ahendzi, mbea a ɔkrɔn na bun mu nyina edzi—nkyii wɔbɛkyerɛw no wɔ Eguambaa no Nkwa Nwoma no mu dɛ, onnkedzi ewu dɛ ɔbɛkã ɔtseneneenyi no bɔgyaa egu, na sɛ wɔtsena m’ahyɛmu no mu, na oenndzi ewu dɛ ɔbɛkã ɔtseneneenyi no bɔgyaa egu a, biribiara a m’akowaa dze egu hɔn do no bɛba mu wɔ aber yi mu nye mbersantsen nyinara mu; na sɛ wofi wiadze yi mu so a, ɔbɛyɛ hɔ dɛmara ama hɔn na wɔbɛpa abɔfo, na enyame a wɔdze hɔn esisi hɔ no ho akɔ hɔn nkwagye ntowdo na enyimnyam mu wɔ ndzɛmba nyina mu, dɛ mbrɛ wɔsɔɔw ano dze guu hɔn etsir do no, dɛm enyimnyam no bɛhyɛ mã na hɔn asefo wɔakɔ do afebɔɔ ekesi afebɔɔ.

Nkyii wɔbɛyɛ enyame, osiandɛ wonnyi ewiei; dɛmara na wɔbɛyɛ fi daapɛm kesi daapɛm, osiandɛ mbrɛ wɔtse no ara na wɔtse, afei wɔbɔbɔ adze nyina do, osiandɛ ndzɛmba nyinara hyɛ hɔn ase. Nkyii wɔbɛyɛ enyame, osiandɛ wɔwɔ tum nyinara, na abɔfo hyɛ hɔn ase.
Nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, gyedɛ hom dzi me mbra do, annyɛ dɛm a, hom nnkotum enya enyimnyam yi.
Osiandɛ abow no yɛ tsẽabaa na nkekãnkekã, na kwan no yɛ ketseabaa dze kɔ nkwagye ntowdo na nkwa ntoado no na kumaabi na wohu, na ɔnam dɛ hom anngye me wɔ wiadze mu no ntsi na hom nnyim me.
Mbom sɛ hom gye me wɔ wiadze mu a, nkyii hom bohu me, na hom benya hom nkwagye ntowdo; na bea a mowɔ no hom so aaba hɔ.
Iyi nye onnyiewiei nkwa no—dɛ hom bohu Nyame nyansafo, nokwafo nkotoo no, nye Jesus Christ a ɔsomaa no no. Emi nye ɔno. Dɛm ntsi hom ngye me mbra.
Abobow a ɔyɛ tɛtɛr na kwan a ɔyɛ tɛtɛɛtɛr; nye dza wɔdze kɔ owu mu na piinara na wɔfa mu, osiandɛ wɔnngye me, nna wonndzi me mbra do.

Nokwar, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, sɛ ɔbarimba war yer dɛ mbrɛ m’asɛm se na wɔdze anohoba Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no sɔw awar no ano tse dɛ mbrɛ m’ahyehyɛ ato hɔ, na ɔbarimba no anaa ɔbaa no yɛ bɔn anaa ɔtõ ahyɛmudzi fofor a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem ne mbra no mu biara, na wɔkã nsɛm bɔn tsia Nyankopɔn, na woenndzi ewu biara a no mu no wɔkãa ɔtseneneenyi no bɔgyaa gui a, wɔbɔsoɛr wɔ owusoɛr a odzi kan no mu, na wɔahɛn hɔn nkwagye ntowdo mu; mbom wɔbɛsɛɛ hɔn honam, na woeyi hɔn ama Satan n’ekutukubɔ ekesi ɔpon da no, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn na ɔse.

Kasa a hom kã dze tsia Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no, wɔnnkɛfa akyɛ hom wɔ wiadze yi mu, nna sɛ hom fi wiadze yi mu so a wɔnnkɛfa akyɛ hom, ɔno nye dɛ, hom dzi ewu na hom kã ɔtseneneenyi no bɔgyaa gu, na wɔpen do dɛ woku me, wɔ ber a hom nsa akã m’ahyɛmudzi fofor a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn na ɔse; na nyia oenndzi dɛm mbra yi do no nnkotum ahɛn m’enyimnyam no mu, mbom wobobu no fɔ, Ewuradze na ɔse.
Emi nye Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn, na medze m’Asɔfodzi Krɔnkrɔn ne mbra no a emi na m’Egya hyehyɛe too hɔ ansaana wɔrobɔ wiadze no, bɛma hom.
Abraham ne nsa kãa ndzɛmba nyina, biribiara a ne nsa kãe no ye, nyikyerɛ na mbrasɛm a wɔnam m’asɛm do dze mae, Ewuradze na ɔse, na ɔahɛn ne nkwagye ntowdo mu na ɔtsena n’ahengua do.

Abraham ne nsa kãa anohoba a ɔfa n’asefo, nye eduaba a wofi n’asen mu ho—na n’asen mu na hom fi, nyia ne dzin dze Joseph a ɔyɛ m’akowaa no—hɔn a wɔbɔkɔ do mber tsentsen biara a wɔbɛtsena wiadze yi mu; na dɛ ɔfa no Abraham na n’asefo ho no dze, sɛ wofi wiadze yi mu so mpo a, wɔbɔkɔ do dɛmara; wɔwɔ wiadze yi mu o, wofi wiadze yi mu o, wɔbɔkɔ do adɔr pii dɛ nworaba; anaa, sɛ wɔse hom dɛ hom nkan anhwea a ogu mpoano a hom nnkotum akã no dodow no.
Dɛm anohoba yi yɛ hom so homdze, osiandɛ hom yɛ Abraham dze, na anohoba no wɔbɔe maa Abraham; na dɛm mbra yi yɛ m’Egya no ndwuma no nsɔwdo, no mu na ɔhyɛ noho enyimnyam.
Dɛm ntsi, hom nkɔ, na hom nkɛyɛ Abraham no ndwuma; hom mbɛhyɛ me mbra yi ase na wɔbɛgye hom nkwa.
Mbom sɛ hom ammbɛhyɛ me mbra yi ase a, hom nsa nnkɛkã m’Egya n’anohoba no a ɔdze bɔɔ Abraham no.

Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ Abraham mbra, na Sarah dze Hagar maa Abraham ma ɔwaar no. Na ebɛnadze ntsi na ɔyɛɛ dɛm? Osiandɛ mbra no nye no; na ɔnam Hagar mu na nkorɔfo pii fi bae. Dɛm ntsi, iyi kã ndzɛmba binom so ho na ɔhyɛ anohoba no mã.
Dɛm ntsi ana Abraham kɛhyɛɛ afɔbu ase? Nokwar, mese hom dɛ, Oho; osiandɛ Emi, Ewuradze na mehyɛɛ no.
Wɔhyɛɛ Abraham dɛ ɔmfa ne babanyin Isaac mbɔ afɔr; eso, wɔakyerɛw dɛ: Mma nndzi ewu. Naaso Abraham ammpopo ne tsir, na dɛm ntsi, wɔdze tseneneeyɛ bɔɔ n’abaw do.

Abraham nyaa nwewefo, na wɔwoo mba pii maa no; iyi ho ntsi, wɔdze tseneneeyɛ bɔɔ n’abaw do, osiandɛ wɔdze hɔn maa no, na ɔtsenaa me mbra mu; na Isaac na Jacob so annyɛ ndzɛmba biara annkã dza wɔhyɛɛ hɔn no ho; na ɔnam dɛ wɔannyɛ ndzɛmba biara annkã dza wɔhyɛɛ hɔn no ho ntsi, wɔahɛn hɔn nkwagye ntowdo mu, dɛ mbrɛ anohoba no tse, na wɔtsena ahengua do, na wɔnnyɛ abɔfo, mbom wɔyɛ enyame.

David so nyaa yernom na nwewefo pii na mo nkowaa Solomon na Moses so dɛmara, nye mo nkowaa binom so dɛmara, fi abɔdze ahyɛse dze besi dɛm mber yi mu; na wɔannyɛ bɔn wɔ biribiara mu gyedɛ wɔ ndzɛmba a woennya emmfi mo hɔ no nko.

Emi na medze David ne yernom na nwewefo no duaa m’akowaa Nathan do dze maa no, nye nkɔnhyɛfo binom so a nna wɔwɔ dɛm tum yi ne nsaafee no, na dɛm ndzɛmba yinom nyina mu no ɔannyɛ bɔn enntsia me gyedɛ Uriah nye ne yer hɔn asɛm no ho nko; na dɛm ntsi oefi no nkwagye ntowdo ho ahwe ase, na oenya ne kyɛfa; na ofi wiadze yi mu a ne nsa nnkɛkã hɔn bio, osiandɛ medze ama obi so, Ewuradze na ɔse.
Emi nye Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn no, na mama ɔwo, m’akowaa Joseph, dzibew bi, na medze ndzɛmba nyina asan aba. Bisa dza epɛ, na wɔdze bɛma wo dɛ mbrɛ m’asɛm se.

Na dɛ ebisa adze a ɔfa awartõ ho no, nokwar, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, sɛ ɔbarimba nya yer wɔ ahyɛmudzi fofor a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no mu, na sɛ ɔbaa no nye ɔbarimba bi so wɔ hɔ, na nnyɛ emi na menam ngosera krɔnkrɔn do dze maa no a, nna ɔatõ awar na wɔbɛsɛɛ no.
Sɛ onnyi ahyɛmudzi fofor a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no mu, na ɔnye ɔbarimba bi so wɔ hɔ a, nna ɔatõ awar.
Na sɛ no kun nye ɔbaa bi so wɔ hɔ, na sɛ kun no hyɛ bɔhyɛ ase a, nna ɔatõ no bɔhyɛ no, na ɔatõ awar.

Na sɛ ɔbaa no nntõo awar, na odzi bem, na ɔnntõo no bɔhyɛ no, na onyim, a meda no edzi kyerɛ wo, m’akowaa Joseph a, nkyii na ɔnam m’Asɔfodzi Krɔnkrɔn no tum do no ibenya tum afa ɔbaa no dze no ama nyia ɔnntõo awar na oedzi nokwar; na wɔbɛyɛ no ɔhwɛfo wɔ dodowara do.
Na medze asɔfodzi ne nsaafee na tum no ama wo, no mu na medze ndzɛmba nyina asan aba, na mema ihu ndzɛmba nyina wɔ ne mber mu.

Na nokwar, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, biribiara a ebɔsɔw ano wɔ asaase do no wɔbɔsɔw ano wɔ sor; na biribiara a ebɛkyekyer wɔ asaase do wɔ me dzin mu na m’asɛm do no, wɔbɛkyekyer wɔ sor afebɔɔ, Ewuradze na ɔse; na obiara a edze no bɔn bɛkyɛ no wɔ asaase do no, wɔdze bɛkyɛ no wɔ sor afebɔɔ; na obiara a ammfa no bɔn annkyɛ no wɔ asaase do no wɔnnkɛfa akyɛ no wɔ sor.
Na bio, nokwar, mese, obiara a ibehyira no no mibehyira no, na obiara a edze ndom bɛkã no no mobɔdom no, Ewuradze na ɔse; osiandɛ Emi, Ewuradze nye wo Nyankopɔn.

Na bio, nokwar mese ɔwo, m’akowaa Joseph dɛ, biribiara a edze bɛma wɔ asaase do, na obiara a enam m’asɛm do dɛ mbrɛ me mbra se no do dze bɛma no no, nhyira na mo tum na ɔbɛba do na nnyɛ ndom bi, Ewuradze na ɔse, na wonnkobu no fɔ wɔ asaase do nye sor.

Na Emi nye Ewuradze wo Nyankopɔn, na menye wo bɔwɔ hɔ ekesi wiadze n’ewiei mpo, nye mbersantsen mu; na nokwar, masɔw wo nkwagye ntowdo ano ama wo, na mesiesie ahengua ama wo wɔ m’Egya n’ahenman no mu, nye w’egya Abraham ho.

Hwɛ, mehu w’afɔrbɔdze nyina, na medze wo bɔn nyina bɛkyɛ wo; mehu w’afɔrbɔdze wɔ setsie a ayɛ ama dza mesee wo nyina. Dɛm ntsi, kɔ na mesiesie kwan ama wo a ebɛfa do efi nsa, dɛ mbrɛ megyee Abraham n’afɔrbɔdze a ɔyɛ ne babanyin Isaac no.

Nokwar, mese wo dɛ: Medze mbrasɛm yi ma m’abaawa, wo yer Emma Smith, nyia medze no maa wo no, dɛ ɔntwe noho na mma ɔnnfa noho nhyɛ dza mehyɛɛ wo dɛ fa bɔ afɔr ma no no, osiandɛ meyɛɛ dɛm, Ewuradze na ɔse, dze sɔɔ hom nyina hwɛe, dɛ mbrɛ medze yɛɛ Abraham no, na ama meetum edua ahyɛmudzi na afɔrbɔ do ebisa afɔrbɔ efi hom nsamu.

Na ma m’abaawa Emma Smith, ngye hɔn a wɔdze hɔn ama m’akowaa Joseph nyina a hɔnho san na hɔn ho tsew wɔ m’enyim no; na hɔn a hɔn ho nntsew, na wɔakã dɛ hɔn ho tsew no, wɔbɛsɛɛ hɔn, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn na ɔse.

Na emi nye hom Ewuradze wo Nyankopɔn, na hom ntsie me ndze; na mama kwan dɛ wɔnyɛ m’akowaa Joseph ɔhwɛfo wɔ ndzɛmba pii do; osiandɛ oedzi nokwar wɔ ndzɛmba kumaabi ho, ntsi ofi aber yi dze kɔ no mebɛhyɛ no dzen.

Na mehyɛ m’akowaa Emma Smith dɛ, ɔntsena m’akowaa Joseph ho na ɔntakyer no nko a obiara nnkã ho. Mbom sɛ oenndzi dɛm mbrasɛm yi do a wɔbɛsɛɛ no; Ewuradze na ɔse, na Emi nye Ewuradze wo Nyankopɔn, sɛ oenndzi me mbrasɛm yi do a, mebɛsɛɛ no.

Mbom sɛ oenndzi mbrasɛm yi do a, afei m’akowaa Joseph nyɛ ndzɛmba nyina mma no, dɛ mbrɛ ɔakã no, na mibehyira no na mama ɔadɔr, egyanom na nanom, nuambanyin na nkyerɛbaa, adan na nsaase, yernom na mba, ɔha na no mbɔho, nye onnyiewiei nkwa ahenkyɛw wɔ wiadze a onnyiewiei mu.

Na bio, nokwar, mese, hom mma m’abaawa mfa m’akowaa Joseph no mfom nkyɛ no; na nkyii wɔdze no so no mfom bɛkyɛ no, dza ɔayɛ etsia me no; na Emi, Ewuradze wo Nyankopɔn no mibehyira no, na mama ɔadɔr, na mama n’akoma edzi dɛw.

Na bio, mese, mma m’akowaa Joseph nnyi ne nsa mmfi n’egyapadze ho, amma ɔtamfo aammba ammbɛsɛɛ no, osiandɛ Satan rohwehwɛ asɛɛ no, na Emi nye Ewuradze wo Nyankopɔn, na ɔno yɛ m’akowaa; na hwɛ, mekã no ho, dɛ mbrɛ mekãa Abraham, w’egya ho kɔr no nkwagye ntowdo na enyimnyam mu no mpo.
Afei ɔfa asɔfodzi no ho mbra no, ndzɛmba pii wɔ ho.

Nokwar, sɛ m’Egya nam mankasa me ndze do frɛ nyimpa bi, dɛ mbrɛ ɔdze yɛɛ Aaron a, na wɔnam nyia ɔsomaa me ne ndze do, na medze asɔfodzi yi no tum nsaafee akyɛ no, sɛ ɔyɛ biribiara wɔ me dzin mu, dɛ mbrɛ me mbra na m’asɛm se a, ɔnnkɛyɛ bɔn, na mubobu no bem.
Dɛm ntsi, mma obiara nnhaw m’akowaa Joseph, osiandɛ mubobu no bem; na ɔbɛyɛ afɔrbɔdze no a morohwehwɛ efi ne nsamu wɔ ne mbrato ho no, Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn na ɔse.

Na bio, ɔfa no asɔfodzi na ne mbra ho no—sɛ ɔbarimba biara kɛgye ɔbaabun awar, na ɔpɛ dɛ ɔkɛgye ɔbaabun bi so awar kã ho, na sɛ nyia odzi kan no pen do, na sɛ ɔkɛgye dza otsĩa ebien no awar, na hɔn nyina yɛ mbaabun na wɔmmbɔɔ banyin fofor biara anohoba a, nna odzi bem; na ɔnnkɔto awar osiandɛ wɔdze hɔn ama no; na ɔnnkɛma ɔato awar osiandɛ wɔyɛ nedze na wɔnnyɛ obiara dze.
Na sɛ wɔnam mbra yi do ma no mbaabun du a, ɔnnkɛma ɔato awar, osiandɛ wɔyɛ nedze na wɔdze hɔn ama no; dɛm ntsi odzi bem.

Mbom, sɛ mbaabun no mu kor anaa du no mu bi, ɔaagye no awar ekyir no, kɔ banyin fofor bi so hɔ a, nna ɔato awar na wɔbɛsɛɛ no; osiandɛ wɔdze hɔn ama no dɛ wɔndɔr na wɔnhyɛ asaase do mã, dɛ mbrɛ me mbrasɛm no se, na wɔnhyɛ anohoba a m’Egya dze mae ansaana wɔrotow wiadze ne fapem no mã, dze ama hɔn nkwagye ntowdo wɔ wiadze a onnyiewiei no mu, ama woeetum ekura nyimpa hɔn akra; na iyi mu na ɔma m’Egya n’edwuma kɔ do, ama wɔaahyɛ no enyimnyam.

Na bio, nokwar, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, sɛ ɔbarimba biara a okura dɛm tum yi ne nsaafee, wɔ yer, na ɔkyerɛkyerɛ no m’asɔfodzi no ho mbra a ɔfa dɛm ndzɛmba yinom ho a, afei ɔbɛgye edzi na ɔagye no ato mu, annyɛ dɛm a wɔbɛsɛɛ no, Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn no na ɔse; na mebɛsɛɛ no; na mobɔkrɔn me dzin wɔ hɔn a wɔgye me mbra na wodzi do nyina do.

Dɛm ntsi, sɛ ɔbaa no anngye mbra yi a, ɔbɛyɛ me mbra, dɛ ɔbarimba no gye ndzɛmba nyina a Emi, Ewuradze ne Nyankopɔn, dze bɛma no no, osiandɛ ɔbaa no anngye enndzi na ɔanngye no annto mu dɛ mbrɛ m’asɛm se ntsi, afei ɔbɛyɛ mbratonyi; na wobeyi ɔbarimba no efi Sarah ne mbra no mu, ɔno ɔgyee Abraham too mu dɛ mbrɛ mbra no se, ber a mehyɛɛ Abraham dɛ ɔmfa Hagar nyɛ ne yer no.
Na afei, ɔfa no mbra yi ho, nokwar, nokwar, mese wo dɛ, mebɛda pii edzi akyerɛ wo ekyir yi, dɛm ntsi, ma iyi ndɔɔ sõ mma wo mber yi mu. Hwɛ, Emi nye Alpha na Omega. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/133.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 133
chapter_summary: 1–6, Wɔhyɛ Ahotseweefo no dɛ wonsiesie hɔnho mma Mbae a Otsĩa Ebien no; 7–16, Wɔhyɛ nyimpa nyina dɛ wonguan mfi Babylon, wɔmbra Zion, na wonsiesie hɔnho mma Ewuradze Ne da kɛse no; 17–35, Obegyina Bepɔw Zion do, aman nyina bɛyɛ asaase kor, Israel ebusuakuw a ɔayew no bɛsan aba; 36–40, Wɔnam Joseph Smith do dze asɛmpa no asan aba aama wɔaakã wɔ wiadze nyina mu; 41–51, Ewuradze besian emumuyɛfo do wɔ awerdzi mu; 52–56, Ɔbɛyɛ no wɔ No ɔpon ber no mu; 57–74, Ɔwɔ dɛ wɔdze asɛmpa no kɔ ma ɔkɛgye Ahotseweefo no nkwa na ɔsɛɛ emumuyɛfo no.

verses.text: Hom nyɛ aso, O m’asɔr mu mba, Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn na ɔse, na hom ntsie Ewuradze n’asɛm a ɔfa hom ho—
Ewuradze rebɛba ne temple mu awerɛfir mu; Ewuradze dze ndom besian aba wiadze ebobu atsɛn; nyew, ɔreba aman nyina a hɔn werɛ efir Nyame, nye hɔn a wɔnnyɛ atseneneefo wɔ hom mu nyina do.
Na obeyi n’abasa krɔnkrɔn no ho akyerɛ aman nyina, na asaase n’ano nyina bohu hɔn Nyankopɔn no nkwagye.
Dɛm ntsi, hom nsiesie, hom nsiesie homho, O mo nkorɔfo; hom ntsew homho; O m’asɔr mu mba, hom a mannhyɛ hom dɛ hom ntsimtsim no, hom mboa hom ano na hom nkɔ Zion asaase do.
Hom mfi Babylon. Hom ntsew homho, hom a hom soso Ewuradze no nkuraba.
Hom mfrɛ hom nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn no, na hom nkasa nkyerɛ homho nkorkor. Na hom mma obiara mbɔ Ewuradze ne dzin.
Nyew, nokwar, mese hom dɛ, mber asõ a Ewuradze ne ndze rese hom dɛ: Hom mfi Babylon; hom mboa hom ano mfi aman no mu, hom mfi mframa anan no mu, hom mfi sor n’ano kor nkɔ kor.

Hom nsoma m’asɔr mu elderfo no ma wɔnkɔ aman a ɔwɔ ekyirekyir no mu; na wɔnkɔ po n’esupruw do; hom nsoma hɔn ma wɔnkɔ anana nsaase do; hom mfrɛ aman nyina, odzi kan, hom mfrɛ Amanamamfo no, nkyii hom mfrɛ Jewfo so.

Na hwɛ, na hu, dɛm nye hɔn frɛ no, na Ewuradze ne ndze a ɔkɔ nkorɔfo nyina hɔ nye dɛ: Hom nkɔ Zion asaase do, ama mo nkorɔfo hɔn ahe aatserɛw, ama ne stake no mu aayɛ dzen, na ama Zion aakɔ mbeambea a woetwa ho ehyia no.
Nyew, hom mma hom frɛ nkɔ nkorɔfo nyina mu dɛ: Hom nnyan na hom nsoɛr nkehyia Ayeforkun no kwan; hwɛ na hu, Ayeforkun no reba; hom mfi nkehyia no kwan. Hom nsiesie homho mma Ewuradze ne da kɛse no.
Dɛm ntsi, hom nweɔn, na hom nnyim da no nye dɔn no.
Dɛm ntsi, hom mma hɔn a wɔwɔ Amanamamfo mu no nguan nkɔ Zion.
Na hom mma hɔn a wɔwɔ Judah no nguan nkɔ Jerusalem, wɔnkɔ mbepɔw do Ewuradze ne fi no mu.
Hom mfi aman mu, hom mfi Babylon mpo, hom mfi emumuyɛ mu, dza ɔyɛ sunsum mu Babylon no.
Mbom, nokwar, dɛm na Ewuradze se, mma hom nkɔree no nnyɛ ntsɛntsɛm, mbom hom mma wonsiesie ndzɛmba nyina wɔ hom enyim; na nyia ɔrokɔ no, mma ɔnnhwɛ n’ekyir amma ɔsɛɛ aammba no do awerɛfir mu.
Hom nyɛ aso ntsie, O hom asaase do mba. M’asɔr mu elderfo, hom nyina mbɔ mu ntsie, na hom ntse Ewuradze ne ndze; na ɔfrɛ nyimpa nyina, na ɔhyɛ nyimpa nyina a wɔwɔ beebiara dɛ wonnu hɔnho.
Na hwɛ, Ewuradze Nyankopɔn asoma ɔbɔfo a ɔretsẽatsẽa mu wɔ sor dɛ: Hom nsiesie Ewuradze no kwan, na hom mma n’atsempɔn ntsentsen, na ne mbae no abɛn—
Nkyii Eguambaa no begyina Bepɔw Zion do, na mpem ɔha eduanan anan no a wɔakyerɛw n’Egya ne dzin wɔ hɔn momapɔw do no bɛkã no ho.
Dɛm ntsi, hom nsiesie homho mma Ayeforkun ne mbae no; hom mfi, hom mfi nkehyia no kwan.
Na hwɛ, obegyina bepɔw Olivet do, wɔ po kɛse no do, bun kɛse no mu mpo, na oegyina po n’esupruw do, nye Zion asaase do.
Na ɔdze ne ndze bɛkasa fi Zion, na ɔbɛkasa efi Jerusalem na wɔbɛtse ne ndze wɔ nkorɔfo nyina mu;
Na ndze no bɛyɛ dɛ esu pii ndze, na tse dɛ senaman kɛse ndze, dza obobubu mbepɔw egu famu, na wonnkohu mbɔnsa koraa.
Na ɔbɛhyɛ bun kɛse no, na wobepĩa no akɔ ekyir dze akɔ etsifi aman no mu, na esupruw no bɛyɛ asaase kor;
Na Jerusalem asaase nye Zion asaase bɛsan hɔn ekyir akɔ hɔnankasa hɔn bea do, na asaase bɛyɛ dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse dada ansaana wɔrekyekyɛ mu no.
Na Ewuradze, Agyenkwa no mpo, begyina no nkorɔfo hɔn finimfin, na oedzi hen wɔ honam nyina do.
Na hɔn a wɔwɔ etsifi aman do no bɛkaa Ewuradze na wɔaba n’enyim; na hɔn nkɔnhyɛfo bɛtse ne ndze, na wɔnnkɛfa hɔnho esie bio; na wɔbɔbɔ mbotan no, na esukwankyɛba bɛpem esian wɔ hɔn enyim.
Na wɔbɔtow atsempɔn wɔ bun kɛse no finimfin.
Wɔbɛhyɛ hɔn atamfo do.
Na sar kɛsɛɛ do na nkwa nsu bɛpem; na asaase a etwee no nnkɛyɛ asaase kwawee bio.
Na wɔdze hɔn akoradze mapa no bɛbrɛ mo nkowaa, Ephraim ne mba.
Na akoko a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem ahe do bɔwosow wɔ hɔn enyim.
Na hɔ na wɔbɔhwe ase, na Ewuradze no nkowaa dze hɔn nsa, Ephraim ne mba no mpo, dze enyimnyam ahenkyɛw bɛhyɛ hɔn, wɔ Zion mpo.
Na wɔdze daapem enyigye adwontow bɛhyɛ hɔn mã.
Hwɛ, iyi nye nhyira a Nyankopɔn a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem dze bogu Israel ebusuakuw do, na ɔdze nhyira soronko bogu Ephraim na ne mfɛfo hɔn tsir do.
Na hɔn a wɔyɛ Judah n’ebusua so, hɔn yaw ekyir no wɔdze krɔnkrɔnyɛ bɛtsew hɔn ho wɔ Ewuradze n’enyim, ma wɔaatsena n’enyim adzekyee na adzesaa, afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ.

Na afei, nokwar, Ewuradze na ɔse, ama hom eehu dɛm ndzɛmba yinom wɔ hom mu, O hom a wɔtse asaase do, masoma mo bɔfoe ma ɔdze asɛmpa a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no rikyin sor, na ɔada noho edzi akyerɛ binom na ɔdze ama adasa, na ɔbɛda noho edzi akyerɛ dodow biara a wɔtse asaase do.
Na wɔbɛkã asɛmpa yi akyerɛ ɔman, ebusua, kasa nye nyimpa nyina.
Na Nyame no nkowaa bɔkɔ, dze ndze kɛse ase dɛ: Hom nsuro Nyame na hom mfa enyimnyam mma no, osiandɛ n’atsɛmbu ber no aba;
Na hom nsom nyia ɔyɛɛ sor na asaase, na po, na nsunyiwa no—
Hom mbɔ Ewuradze ne dzin adzekyee na adzesaa nse dɛ: O kɛtseankyɛ esunsuan ɔsorsor mu, na nkyɛ esian famu, na ama mbepɔw apem asen wɔ w’enyim.
Na wobobua egu hɔn etsifi; na Ewuradze n’enyim hɔ bɛyɛ dɛ ogya a ɔrenan na ɔrehyew, na ɔbɛyɛ dɛ ogya a ɔma esu hur.
O Ewuradze, ɔwo ibesian famu na ada wo dzin edzi akyerɛ w’atamfo, na aman nyina ho bɔpopo wɔ w’enyim—
Ber a eyɛ ndzɛmba huhuuhu, ndzɛmba a hɔn enyi nnda kwan a;
Nyew, sɛ isian famu na mbepɔw pem sen wɔ w’enyim a, ɔwo behyia nyia odzi ehurusi na ɔyɛ ndzeyɛtsenenee, nyia ɔkaa wo wɔ w’akwan mu.
Na fi wiadze ahyɛse, nyimpa biara nntsee nna aso biara mmbɔɔ do, eso ɔmmfaa n’enyi nnhun, O Nyankopɔn, kã wo nko, ndzɛmba akɛse a ɔwo esiesie ama nyia ɔtweɔn wo.
Na wɔbɛse dɛ: Woana nye nyia ofi Nyame ne nkyɛn wɔ sor hyɛ bɔgyaben atar resian ba yi, nyew, ofi mbeambea a wonnyim do a ɔhyɛ n’enyimyam afadze, na orutu kwan wɔ n’ahoɔdzen akɛseyɛ mu yi?
Na ɔbɛse dɛ: Emi nye nyia ɔkasaa tsenenee mu, otumfo a ɔgye nkwa no.
Na Ewuradze bɛhyɛ afadze memen, na n’atar tse dɛ obi a otsiatsia wenyintwer do ne dze.
Na n’enyimnyam bɛyɛ kɛse araa ma ewia dze n’enyim esuma wɔ enyimguase mu, na bosoom bɔpow dɛ ɔbɛma ne kan ahyerɛn, na wobohwim nworaba efi hɔn ananmu.
Na wɔbɛtse ne ndze dɛ: Mo nko ara na metsiatsia wenyintwer no do, na medze atsɛmbu aba nyimpa nyina do; nna hɔn mu biara nnkã mo ho;

Na metsiatsia do wɔ m’ebufuhyew mu, na metsiatsia hɔn do ebufuw mu ara, na misiw hɔn wɔ m’ebufuhyew mu na hɔn bɔgyaa apetse me ntar mu, na ɔakekã m’efuradze nyina mu, osiandɛ ndɛ nye awerdzi da a nna ɔwɔ m’akoma mu no.
Na afei, mo nkorɔfo a wɔapon hɔn no hɔn afe asõ; na wɔbɛkã hɔn Ewuradze n’adɔyɛ nye dza ɔdze ama hɔn nyina, dɛ mbrɛ ne papayɛ tse, na n’adɔyɛ tse afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ.
Hɔn amandzehu nyina mu ohun amandze. Na n’enyim ɔbɔfo no gyee hɔn nkwa, wɔ no dɔ, na ehumbɔbɔr mu, na ɔpoon hɔn, na ɔsoaa hɔn, na otuur hɔn wɔ tsetseberdo nda no mu nyina;
Nyew, na Enoch so, nye hɔn a wɔnye hɔn wɔ hɔ no; nkɔnhyɛfo a wodzii n’enyim no; na Noah so, nye hɔn a wodzii n’enyim no; na Moses so, nye hɔn a wodzii n’enyim no;
Na ofi Moses do kesi Elijah do, na ofi Elijah do kesi John do, nyia nna ɔkã Christ ho wɔ ne owusoɛr mu no, nye asomafo krɔnkrɔn no, nye Abraham, Isaac nye Jacob bɔwɔ Eguambaa no enyim.

Na ahotseweefo hɔn owumaa do bobuebue na wobefifi mu epue; na wɔbɛba ebegyina Eguambaa n’abanyimfa, ber a ɔbɛba ebegyina Bepɔw Zion nye kurow krɔnkrɔn no do, Jerusalem Fofor no; na wɔbɔtow Eguambaa no ndwom, adzekyee na adzesaa afebɔɔ kesi afebɔɔ.
Na dɛm ntsi, ama nyimpa enya kyɛfa wɔ dɛm enyimnyam a wɔrebɛda no edzi no mu, Ewuradze asoma n’asɛmpa ne mãhyɛ no, n’ahyɛmu a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no, ɔkyerɛkyerɛ mu mberɛw yɛ mu na pefee mu—

Dze esiesie mberɛwyɛfo ama dɛm ndzɛmba no a ɔreba asaase do no, nye Ewuradze no soma no wɔ da a mberɛwyɛfo bɛhyɛ enyansafo fɛr no mu, na ekumaba no abɛyɛ ɔman a ɔyɛ dzen; na nyimpa beenu bɛma hɔn ɔpedu eguan.
Na Ewuradze nam ndzɛmba a ɔyɛ mberɛw do dze no Sunsum no tum no apose aman.
Na dɛm ntsi, na wɔdze dɛm mbrasɛm yi mae; wɔhyɛɛ hɔn wɔ da a wɔdze maa hɔn no mu dɛ wɔmfa nsuma wiadze, mbom afei ɔwɔ dɛ ɔkɔ honam nyina hɔ—
Na iyi yɛ Ewuradze a odzi hen wɔ honam nyina do no n’adwen na ne pɛ.
Na nyia onu noho na ɔtsew noho wɔ Ewuradze n’enyim no wɔbɛma no nkwa a onnyiewiei.
Na hɔn a wonntsie Ewuradze ne ndze no, hɔn na dza nkɔnhyɛnyi Moses kyerɛwee, dɛ wobotwa hɔn akyen efi nyimpa mu no bɛyɛ hɔ wɔ hɔn do.

Na dza nkɔnhyɛnyi Malachi so kyerɛwee dɛ: Na hwɛ, da no reba, ɔbɛhyew dɛ fononoo, na ahopɔwfo nyina, na hɔn a wɔyɛ emumuyɛ nyina bɛyɛ dɛ mburonan; na da a ɔreba no bɛhyew hɔn, dɔm Ewuradze na ɔse, dɛ orinngya hɔn ndwow anaa abaw.
Dɛm ntsi, iyi bɛyɛ mbuae a Ewuradze dze bɛma hɔn:
Dɛm da no a mebaa mankasa medze hɔ no, obiara nnyi hom mu a ɔgyee me, na wɔpaam hom fii hɔ.
Ber a mefrɛɛ bio no, hɔn mu biara nnyi hɔ a ɔgyee do; eso m’abasa nnyɛ tsia dɛ onnkotum apon, anaadɛ mo tum nnkotum agye nkwa.
Hwɛ, me nkaenyim wew po. Mema esutsen dan sar; hɔn nam bɔn, na osian nsukɔm ntsi wowu.
Medze tuntum fura ɔsorsor, na meyɛ hɔn akataho eyitam.
Iyi na hom benya efi me nsamu—hom bɛda famu awerɛhow mu.
Hwɛ, na hu dɛ, obiara nnyi hɔ a ɔbɛgye hom; osiandɛ hom enntsie me ndze ber a mefrɛɛ hom fii ɔsorsor no, hom anngye mo nkowaa enndzi, na ber a wɔsomaa hɔn wɔ hom hɔ no hom anngye hɔn.
Dɛm ntsi, wɔsɔɔw dasegye no ano na wɔkyekyeer mbra no, na woyii hom maa sum.
Iyinom bɔkɔ ekyirekyir sum mu, bea a sũ na nkekamu nye asetwɛr wɔ.
Hwɛ, Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn no na ɔakã. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/134.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 134
chapter_summary: 1–4, Aban wɔdɛ ɔkora obiara ne fahodzi wɔ dza nankasa ne tsibowa se no ho na ɔsom wɔ kwan a ɔpɛ do; 5–8, Nyimpa nyina wɔ dɛ wɔgye hɔn aban abamba na wɔkyerɛ obu na enyidzi ma mbra no; 9–10, Ɔnnsɛ dɛ nyamesomfo ekuwekuw no nya tum a wɔdze bobua amansɛm; 11–12, Nyimpa wɔ mbra kwan dɛ wɔsoɛr gyina bɔ hɔnho na hɔn egyapadze ho ban.

verses.text: Yɛgye dzi dɛ Nyame na ɔhyehyɛɛ aban dze maa nyimpa ne yieyɛ, na dɛ nyimpa wɔ nkontaabu dze ma hɔn wɔ biribiara a wɔbɛyɛ, nye mbra so a wɔbɛhyɛ na kwan so a wɔbɛfa do dze edzi dwuma ho, dɛ mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ a ɔmamfo benya asetsena pa na abanbɔ.

Yɛgye dzi dɛ aban biara nnkotum atsena ase asomdwee mu, gyedɛ ɔayɛ ne mbra na ɔahwɛ ma woedzi do ma wɔabɔ ankorankor biara no ho ban, wɔama no fahodzi ma oeetum edzi no dwuma a ne tsibowa no kã no pɛr, ɔaakora n’egyapadze do na ɔaabɔ no nkwa ho ban.

Yɛgye dzi dɛ ohia dɛ aban nyina hwehwɛ aban mu dzibewdzifo na asɛndzifo a wɔbɔhwɛ ma woedzi dɛm mbra no do; na dɛm nyimpa no so wɔ dɛ wɔyɛ nkorɔfo a wɔdze mbra no bedzi pɛrpɛr, na wɔnnkɛyɛ enyimhwɛ biara, na wobetsie ɔmamfo no hɔn ndze wɔ ɔman a wodzi hɔn amansin, anaa ahenman no hɔn pɛ.

Yɛgye dzi dɛ Nyankopɔn na ɔdze nyamesom bae; na dɛ adasa dan no, na no nkotoo na wɔdan no dze som, gyedɛ hɔn nyamesom mu nsusui no ma wotsia binom hɔn kyɛfa anaa hɔn ahotɔ; mbom, yɛnngye nndzi dɛ ɔwɔ dɛ nyimpa ne mbra tsia mu na ɔkyerɛ kwan a wɔmfa do nsom, dze kyekyer adasa hɔn adwen anaa dze kyerɛ ɔmamfo anaa ankorankor mbrɛ wonsi nsom; na aban asɛndzifo no hwɛ siw emumuyɛdze ano, mbom onnyi dɛ wɔhyɛ nkorɔfo adwen do; ɔwɔ dɛ wɔtwe ndzebɔnyɛfo aso, na mbom wɔnnhyɛ ɔkra ne fahodzi do.

Yɛgye dzi dɛ ɔwɔ dɛ nyimpa nyina ma aban biara a wɔhyɛ n’ase no tsipia na wɔgye no abamba, na aban no so ne mbra bɔ hɔn kyɛfa na dza odzi wɔ hɔn no ho ban, na na basabasayɛ etuatsew mmfata ɔmanmunyi a wɔbɔ no ho ban, na ɔsɛ dɛ wɔhwɛ twẽ hɔn aso, aban nyina wɔ ho kwan dɛ ɔyɛ dɛm mbra no wɔ hɔn atsɛmbu nsusuii mu a ɔbɛma ɔmamfo enya eyiedzi; na aber kor no ara so, wɔahwɛ esuo nyimpa biara ne fahodzi mu wɔ dza nankasa ne tsibowa ntsewee se no ho.

Yɛgye dzi dɛ ɔsɛ dɛ wodzi nyimpa biara ne gyinabew biara a ɔwɔ mu no nyi, ahwɛfo nye asɛndzifo na hɔn a wɔtsetse dɛm a wɔdze hɔn esi hɔ dɛ wɔmbɔ abɔbɔfo ho ban na wontsia ndzebɔnyɛfo no; na nyimpa nyina wɔ dɛ wobu na wodzi mbra nyi wɔ akwan horow nyina mu, na sɛ ammba no dɛm a, basabasayɛ na nhyɛ na ɔbɛhyɛ asomdwee na ahomka ananmu; wɔyɛɛ nyimpa ne mbra maa nyimpa ama wɔdze atoto hɛn ndzɛmba nyina yie ama ankorankor nye ɔman, wɔ onua na onua ntamu; na mbra krɔnkrɔn a ofi sor no, kyerɛkyerɛ mbra a ɔfa sunsum mu ndzɛmba ho, dze ma gyedzi na ɔsom, na ebien nyina no, nyimpa beyi ano akyerɛ ne Yɛfo.

Yɛgye dzi dɛ ahwɛfo, aman, na aban wɔ ho kwan, na ɔyɛ hɔn asɛdze so dɛ wɔyɛ mbra dze bɔ ɔmamfo nyina ho ban ama woeenya ho kwan dze hɔn nyamesom ho gyedzi a wɔwɔ no ayɛ edwuma; mbom yɛnngye nndzi dɛ wɔwɔ ho kwan wɔ mbra mu, nna ɔmmfa kwan mu so dɛ wobesiw ɔmamfo kwan wɔ dɛm ndzinoa yi ho, anaadɛ wobesiw hɔn kwan ma wɔadwen dza wɔpɛ ho, wɔ ber a wɔdze obu na enyidzi ma mbra no, na dɛm gyedzi a wɔwɔ no wɔ nyamesom mu no nnkyerɛ dɛ wɔrokõ tsia anaa wɔrema binom ayɛ basabasa dze etsia aban no.

Yɛgye dzi dɛ hɔn a wɔyɛ bɔn no wɔ dɛ wɔtwẽ aso dɛ mbrɛ bɔn a wɔyɛe no tse; dɛ ewudzi, etuatsew, adzewia nye basabasayɛ a ɔhaw binom hɔn asomdwee no, ɔsɛ dɛ wɔtwẽ aso dɛ mbrɛ bɔn no ne su tse na hɔn ntɔyɛɛ dɛ wɔbɛyɛ tse; na osian ɔman mu asomdwee na ahotɔ ntsi, ɔsɛ dɛ nyimpa nyina bɔ mbɔdzen dɛ mbrɛ wobotum dze hɔn a wɔyɛ bɔn tsia mbra pa no nyina ba ma wɔtwẽ hɔn aso.

Yɛnngye nndzi dɛ ɔtsen dɛ wɔdze nyamesom ho nhyɛdo bɔforafora amansɛm mu, dza ɔbɛma wɔakã nyamesom kuw kor efũa na woebu kor so no sunsum mu ndzinoa nyimtsia, na dɛm ntsi, kuwmba a wɔwɔ mu no hɔn ankorankor kyɛfa, dɛ wɔyɛ ɔmamfo no, bɛkam hɔn.

Yɛgye dzi dɛ kwan da hɔ dɛ nyamesom ekuwekuw no mu ba biara a ɔbɛkyerɛ su biara a ɔnnyɛ no wɔtsẽa no, dɛ mbrɛ dɛm kuw no ne mbra na nhyehyɛɛ tse; gyedɛ dza wɔyɛe no yɛ biribi a ɔfa hɔn fɛkuwbɔ ne ngyina pa ho; mbom yɛnngye nndzi dɛ nyamesom kuw biara wɔ tum dɛ wodzi asɛm wɔ nyimpa n’egyapadze anaa no nkwa ho, dɛ wɔbɛgye wiadze yi mu ahodze efi hɔn nsamu, anaadɛ wɔdze hɔn bɔto ɔfona mu, dɛ wobeyi hɔn nkwa anaa ne mfɛfɛkuwa efi hɔ anaadɛ wobepira hɔn wɔ kwan biara do. Dza wobotum ayɛ ara nye dɛ wobeyi dɛm nyimpa no edzi efi hɔn kuw no mu, na wɔatwẽ hɔnho efi hɔn fɛkuw no ho.

Yɛgye dzi dɛ ɔwɔ dɛ wɔma nyimpa kwan ma wɔdze bɔn bi a obi dze ayɛ hɔn, anaa hɔn ayawdzi bi a wɔakã ho asɛm ma annyɛ hɔn abodwee no kɔto aban asɛndzifo enyim ma wɔsan hwehwɛ mu bio ma hɔn, biribi tse dɛ obi a wɔayɛ no basabasa anaadɛ wɔagye n’egyapadze efi ne nsamu, anaa woegu ne dzin ho fĩ, wɔ ber a mbra wɔ hɔ a wɔdze bɔ iyinom ho ban; mbom yɛgye dzi dɛ nyimpa nyina wɔ ho kwan dɛ wotwitwa gye hɔnho, hɔn anyɛnkofo, hɔn egyapadze, nye hɔn aban, fi ɔhaw a ɔmmfa kwan mu nye nsisi ho wɔ ohia ber mu, na ɔnnkɛba no dɛ wonnkotum dze asɛm no akɔ mbra ase ma ahotɔ aba.

Yɛgye dzi dɛ ɔfata dɛ wɔkã asɛmpa no kyerɛ asaase do aman nyina, na wɔbɔ atseneneefo kɔkɔ ma wɔtwẽ hɔnho fi wiadze mu ndzeyɛprɔwee ho, mbom yɛnngye nndzi dɛ oye dɛ wɔbɔtõtõ hɔn a wɔwɔ nkowaasom ase na hɔn wuranom ntamu, anaadɛ wɔbɛkã asɛmpa no akyerɛ hɔn, anaadɛ wobonuma hɔn, a otsia hɔn wuranon hɔn pɛ anaadɛ wɔdze hɔnho bɛhyehyɛ hɔn do, anaadɛ wɔbɛyɛ biribi a ɔnnkɛma woenya abodwee wɔ hɔn asetsena mu, amma dɛm ndzeyɛɛ no aammfa ɔhaw ammba ɔmamfo hɔn abrabɔ mu; yɛgye dzi dɛ dɛm ntõtõ ananmu no mmfa mbra mu na ɔnntsen so. Aban biara a ɔma kwan ma nyimpa som nkowaasom mu no nnya etsidaa.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/135.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 135
chapter_summary: 1–2, Wokum Joseph na Hyrum wɔ hɔn gyedzi ho ntsi wɔ Carthage Efiadze; 3, Wɔda Nkɔnhyɛnyi no gyinabew a ɔkrɔn no edzi; 4–7, Hɔn bɔgyaa a afɔdzi biara nnyi ho no gye dase wɔ nokwar no nye dwuma a ofi sor ho.

verses.text: Dza yɛdze sɔw dɛm nwoma yi na Mormon Nwoma no ano nye nsɛm a ɔfa Joseph Smith, Nkɔnhyɛnyi no, nye Hyrum Smith Patriarch no, hɔn kum a wokuum hɔn wɔ hɔn gyedzi no ntsi ho asɛm. Wɔtoow hɔn etur wɔ Carthage efiadze, wɔ Obiradzi 27, 1844 bɛyɛ ewimbir ndɔnnum. Dɔm bi a wɔdzedze akodze—wɔakekã hɔn enyim tuntum—hɔn dodow fi 150 kɛpem 200 na wodzii dɛm dwuma no. Hyrum na wodzii kan toow no na ɔrohwe ase bɔkɔɔ no ɔtsẽaa mu dɛ: Mayɛ owufo! Joseph huruwii duaa tokura mu, na ber a ɔreyɛ dɛm no, wɔtoow no kum no, ɔtsẽaa mu dɛ: O Ewuradze me Nyankopɔn! Ber a hɔn beenu nyina wui ekyir no mpo, wɔtotoow hɔn etur bio pirapiraa hɔn yayaayaw, hɔn beenu nyina nyaa akorabo anan.

John Taylor nye Willard Richards a wɔyɛ Duebien no mu beenu nye nkorɔfo a nna wɔwɔ dan mu hɔ dɛm aber no nka; John Taylor no wɔtoow no akorabo anan pirapiraa no yayaayaw, mbom ekyir no ɔtsee apɔw; na ɔnam Nyankopɔn n’adom ntsi, nyia odzi ekyir no oguanee a akorabo mpo enntue n’atar mu.

Joseph Smith, Ewuradze no Nkɔnhyɛnyi na Adzehunyi no, sɛ iyi Jesus nko si nkyɛn a, ɔayɛ adze pii ama adasa a wɔwɔ wiadze yi mu dze ama hɔn nkwagye sen nyimpa biara a ɔatsena ase pɛn wɔ mu. Mfe eduonu pɛr ntamu no, ɔdze Mormon Nwoma aba a ɔnam Nyankopɔn n’akyɛdze na no tum do kyerɛɛ ase, na ɔnam nankasa no do so na wɔdze epue guado wɔ asaasetɔw ebien mu; ɔdze daapem asɛmpa ne mãhyɛ no, a ɔwɔ mu no, akɔ asaase ne mfɛndzanan nyina; na ɔdze nyikyerɛ na mbrasɛm a ɔyɛ dɛm Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi nwoma yi, nye enyansasɛm na nkyerɛkyerɛ binom so a ohia ma adasamba hɔn yieyɛ epue guado; ɔaboaboa Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo mpempem ano, ɔakyekyer kuropɔn kɛse, ɔbɛyɛɛ atsenkã na oegya dzin a wonnkotum apepa da. Ɔtsenaa ase dɛ okunyin, na owuu dɛ okunyin wɔ Nyankopɔn nye no nkorɔfo enyim; na ɔtse dɛ Ewuradze no nkorɔfo a wɔseraa hɔn ngo wɔ tsetseberdo no, ɔdze nankasa no bɔgyaa asɔw no ndwuma ano; na no nuabanyin Hyrum so yɛɛ dɛmara. Ber a wɔtse nkwa mu no, hɔn mu ammpaapaa na owu mu so hɔn mu anntsetsew!

Ber a Joseph kɔr Carthage dɛ orikeyi noho ama dɛm enyidaho bɔn mbra nhyehyɛɛ no, bɛyɛ nda ebien anaa ndaansa ma woekum no no, asɛm a ɔkãe nye dɛ: “Metse dɛ eguambaa a wɔdze no rokɔ ekumii; mbom mayɛ komm dɛ ɔhyewber n’anapa; bɔn biara nnyi me tsibowa mu a otsia Nyankopɔn na nyimpa nyina. Mubowu a afɔdzi nnyi mo ho, na wɔbɛkã wɔ mo ho dɛ—wokum no okummon.”—Dɛm anapa no ara ber a Hyrum yɛɛ krado dɛ ɔrobɔkɔ no—yɛbɛkã dɛ ɔrokɔ ekumii no? nyew dɛm na ɔtse—ɔkenkaan dɛm nsɛm yi a ɔwɔ Ether tsir duebien dze rokɔ n’ewiei no wɔ Mormon Nwoma mu na ɔdaan krataa no too do.

Na ɔbaa dɛ mobɔɔ mpaa maa Ewuradze dɛ ɔmma Amanamamfo adom, ama wɔaayɛ ayamuyie. Na ɔbaa dɛ Ewuradze see me dɛ: Sɛ wɔannyɛ ayamuyie a ɔmmfa woho, ɔwo edzi nokwar; dɛm ntsi, wo ntar bɛyɛ wansawansa. Na osiandɛ ehu wo mberɛwyɛ ntsi, wɔbɛma woho ayɛ dzen, araa mpo ma edze akɛtsena bea a mesiesie wɔ m’Egya fie no. Na afei emi … , menye Amanamamfo no ridzi nkra, nyew, nye mo nuanom so a modɔ hɔn no, kɛpem aber a yebehyia mu wɔ Christ n’atsɛmbu-egua no enyim, hɔ na adasa nyina bohu dɛ hom bɔgyaa nnkekãa me ntar mu. Adasegyefo no ewuwu, naaso hɔn dasee no da ho reyɛ edwuma.

Kwakwar 1844 na Hyrum Smith dzii mfe eduanan anan, na Joseph Smith so dzii mfe eduasa awɔtwe wɔ Mumu, 1843; na ofi ndɛ dze kɔ no, wɔdze hɔn edzin bɛkã nkorɔfo a wɔyɛɛ mogyadasefo wɔ nyamesom ho no edzin ho; na ɔman biara mu obiara a ɔbɛkenkan Mormon Nwoma no, nye asɔr no ne Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi nwoma yi bɛkaa dɛ nwoma yinom no bo no yɛ bɔgya a ɔsom bo mapa a ɔwɔ mfe aha dza ɔtɔdo duakron no mu no ama eepuei abɛgye wiadze a ɔasɛɛ no ne nkwagye; na sɛ gya no tum pra duamon ho dze ma Nyankopɔn n’enyimnyam a, nna ɔnnkɛyɛ dzen koraa dɛ ɔbɛhyew nduawui dze atsew wenyin ture no ho efi ndzɛmba bɔn ho. Wɔtsenaa ase maa enyimnyam; na wowui maa enyimnyam; na enyimnyam so nye hɔn onnyiewiei akatua. Ofi ber to ber hɔn edzin bɛkã hɔn asefo do dɛ bota mapa a wɔatsew ho.

Nna wonndzi fɔ wɔ bɔn biara ho, dɛ mbrɛ aber biara wɔdze hɔn kɔ asɛndzi a wobu hɔn bem no, na atamfo nye emumuyɛfo na wɔyɛɛ kor pamee dze hɔn koguu efiadze; na wɔdze hɔn bɔgyaa a afɔdzi nnyi ho a oguu Carthage efiadze famu ayɛ nsɔwano kɛse asɔw Mormonsom ano a asɛndzibea biara a ɔwɔ asaase do nnkotum apow, na hɔn bɔgyaa a afɔdzi nnyi ho no ayeyɛ Illinois Ɔman ahyɛnsew no ho ɔnye awerɛhyɛmu wɔ Ambrado no n’anohoba a ogyina Ɔman no anan mu bɔe a woenndzi do no do, ayɛ dasegye ama asɛmpa a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no nokwar a ɔkyerɛ dɛ wiadze mu mba nnkã nokwar, na hɔn bɔgyaa a afɔdzi nnyi ho no wɔ ahotɔ frankaa nye America aman hɔn magna charta (fahodzi buukuu) mu, na ɔyɛ ananmusinyi so dze ma Jesus Christ no som no, na ɔbɛkã hɔn a wɔyɛ anokwafo wɔ aman nyina mu no hɔn akoma; na hɔn bɔgyaa a afɔdzi nnyi ho nye mogyadasefo so hɔn bɔgyaa a afɔdzi nnyi ho no wɔ dɛm afɔrmbukyia a John hunii no ase, na obosũ afrɛ Dɔm Ewuradze kesi dɛ obedzi wer ama dɛm bɔgya no wɔ asaase do. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/136.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 136
chapter_summary: 1–16, Mbrɛ wobesi ahyehyɛ Israel n’asese no dze atweɔn kwan a wobotu akɔ anee afamu no wɔkyerɛ mu; 17–27, Wɔma Ahotseweefo no asɛmpa ho nkyerɛkyerɛ pii a wɔbɛfa do dze abɔ hɔn bra; 28–33, Ahotseweefo no wɔdɛ wɔtow ndwom, saw, bɔ mpaa na wosũa nyansa; 34–42, Woku nkɔnhyɛfo ama wɔaabɔ hɔn abɔdzin na woeebu emumuyɛfo fɔ.

verses.text: Ewuradze N’Asɛm na ne Pɛ a ɔfa Israel hɔn Asese ho wɔ kwan a worutu akɔ Anee no ho:

Hom mma nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Jesus Christ N’Asɔr a ɔwɔ hɔ ma Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo No, nye hɔn a wɔnye hɔn rutu kwan nyina no nkyɛ hɔn mu ekuwekuw, na wondzi ahyɛmu na wɔmbɔ anohoba dɛ wobedzi Ewuradze hɛn Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm do na wɔanantsew n’atsempɔn nyina mu.
Hom nhyehyɛ ekuwekuw no ɔha ɔha na ne asahen, eduonum eduonum na ne asahen na du du na ne asahen, na president kor na n’apamfo beenu ada tsir, a hɔn nyina hyɛ Asomafo Duebien no ase.
Na iyi bɛyɛ hɛn ahyɛmudzi—dɛ yɛbɛnantsew Ewuradze n’ayɛdze nyina mu.
Hom mma kuw biara nhwehwɛ anantwi, hwiir a wɔdze twẽ ndzɛmba mma hɔnho, na wɔmfa edziban, ntar, nye ndzɛmba binom so a ohia a wobotum afa nkã ho wɔ hɔn akwantu no mu.
Sɛ wowie ekuwekuw no hyehyɛ a, hom mma wɔnkɔ ahoɔdzen mu ara, nkesiesie hɔ mma hɔn a wɔbɛka ekyir no.

Hom mma kuw biara nye hɔn asahen na presidentfo no mbɔ adwen pɔw wɔ hɔn mu dodow a wobotum akɔ fefɛwber a ɔreba yi mu; nkyii hom nyi nyimpa a wɔdɔɔ sõ ara yie a hɔn ho yɛ dzen na wɔawea so ma wɔmfa anantwi na hwiir no bi, nye aba, nye ekuadwuma ho ndzɛmba, na wɔnkɔ dɛ edzikamfo nkesiesie bea no do ama woeetum edua eduadzewa wɔ fefɛwber no mu.

Hom mma kuw biara mfa hɔn ahonyadze mu dodowara a wobotum nkɔ, na wɔmfa ehiafo na ekunafo, nye ngyanka nye hɔn a wɔkɔ akõno no hɔn ebusuafo, amma ekunafo na ngyanka no hɔn sũ aammfow annkɔ Ewuradze n’asomu enntsia nkorɔfo yi.
Hom mma kuw biara nsisi adan na wonsiesie asaase no na wondua edziban wɔ do mma hɔn a wɔbɛka ekyir hyɛber yi mu no; iyi nye dza Ewuradze pɛ dɛ nkorɔfo yi yɛ.
Hom mma nyimpa biara mfa ne nyansaa na n’ahonyadze mboa nkorɔfo yi ma wɔnkɔ bea a Ewuradze bɛkyerɛ dɛ wɔnkyekyer Zion stake no.
Na sɛ hom dze akoma a no mu tsew, nye nokwardzi yɛ iyi a, wobehyira hom; wobehyira hom nguan, nye hom anantwi, nye hom haban, nye hom efi, nye hom ebusuafo.
Hom mma mo nkowaa Ezra T. Benson nye Erastus Snow nkyekyer kuw.
Na hom mma mo nkowaa Orson Pratt na Wilford Woodruff so nkyekyer kuw.
Hom mma mo nkowaa Amasa Lyman nye George A. Smith so nkyekyer kuw.
Na hom nyiyi presidentfo nye asahen ɔha ɔha, nye eduonum eduonum, nye du du.
Na hom mma mo nkowaa a hom eyiyi hɔn no nkɛkyerɛkyerɛ m’apɛdze yi mu nkyerɛ ahotseweefo no, ama wɔaaboaboa hɔnho ayɛ krado dɛ wɔbɔkɔ asomdwee asaase no do.
Kɔ wo kwan na kɛyɛ dza makã akyerɛ wo no, na mma nnsuro w’atamfo; osiandɛ wonnkenya tum dze esiw m’edwuma kwan.
Mobɔpon Zion wɔ mankasa me mber pa mu.
Na sɛ nyimpa bi rohwehwɛ ama noho do, na ɔannhwehwɛ m’afotu ekyir kwan a, onnkenya tum biara, na no kwasea wɔbɛda no edzi.
Hom nhwehwɛ; na hom ndzi anohoba a hom dze abobɔ homho nkorkor no do; na mma hom enyi mmber dza ɔyɛ hom nua dze.
Hom ntwe homho mfi bɔn yi ho dɛ hom nnkɔbɔ Ewuradze ne dzin egyangyan, na Emi nye Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn, hom egyanom Nyankopɔn no mpo, Abraham, na Isaac na Jacob Nyankopɔn no.
Emi nye nyia odzii Israelmba no kan fii Egypt asaase do, na matsen me nsa wɔ nda a odzi ekyir yi mu dze regye mo nkorɔfo Israel.
Hom ngyaa dɛ hom nye homho bedzi aper; hom ngyaa dɛ hom bɛkã asɛmbɔn akyerɛ homho nkorkor.
Hom ngyaa nsãbow; na hom mma hom nsɛm nhyɛ ankorankor nkuran.
Sɛ hom fɛm biribi fi hom nyɛnko hɔ a, hom mfa dza hom fɛmee no nsan mma no; na sɛ hom nnkotum etua kaw a, hom nkɛkã nkyerɛ hom nyɛnko no ntsɛm, amma woeemmbu hom fɔ.
Sɛ hom nyɛnko yew n’adze bi na hom hu a, hom mbɔ mbɔdzen nhwehwɛ kesi dɛ hom bohu na hom mfa nsan mma no.
Hom mbɔ mbɔdzen nhwɛ dza hom wɔ do yie, ama hom aayɛ edwumayɛfo enyansafo; osiandɛ ɔyɛ akyɛdze a Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn dze akyɛ hom kwa, na hom yɛ n’edwumayɛfo.
Sɛ hom enyi gye a, hom mfa adwontow, nye ayerbɔ, nye asaw, nye ayɛyi mpaabɔ, nye ndaase nyi Ewuradze ayɛw.
Sɛ hom werɛ how a, hom mfa ntotɔserɛ mfrɛ Ewuradze hom Nyankopɔn, ama hom akra eedzi dɛw.
Mma hom nnsuro hom atamfo, osiandɛ wɔhyɛ me nsamu na dza mepɛ na medze bɛyɛ hɔn.
Ɔsɛ dɛ wɔsɔ mo nkorɔfo hwɛ wɔ ndzɛmba nyina mu, ama woeesiesie hɔnho dze agye enyimnyam a mowɔ dze ma hɔn no, Zion enyimnyam no mpo; na nyia onnkotum asɔw asotwe no mmfata ahenman no.
Hom mma nyia onnyim no mbrɛ noho adze nsũa nyansa, na ɔmfrɛ Ewuradze ne Nyankopɔn, ama woeebue n’enyiwa ma oeehu, na woeebue n’asowa ma ɔaatse;
Na masoma mo Sunsum ma ɔkɔ wiadze dɛ ɔnkɛtsew ahobrɛadzefo nye hɔn a wɔbotow, no enyi na ɔdze afɔbu ama ndzebɔnyɛfo.
Hom nuanom apow hom nye hom dasegye, ɔyɛ ɔman a wɔapam hom no mpo;
Na afei, hɔn mbusu da no aba, awerɛhow da no mpo, tse dɛ ɔbaa a ɔrokõ awoo; na hɔn awerɛhow bɛyɛ kɛse gyedɛ wonu hɔnho ntsɛntsɛm, nyew, ntsɛntsɛm.
Osiandɛ woeku nkɔnhyɛfo, nye hɔn a wɔsomaa hɔn wɔ hɔn nkyɛn no; na wɔakã bɔgya a onndzi fɔ egu, dza osũ fi daadze tsia hɔn no.

Dɛm ntsi, mma dɛm ndzɛmba yinom nnyɛ hom ahobow, osiandɛ hom ho nnyae nntsewee; hom nnkotum egyina m’enyimnyam ano; mbom sɛ hom dzi me nsɛm a medze ama hom no do nokwar mu a hom bohu, ofi Adam n’aber do kesi Abraham do, ofi Abraham do kesi Moses do, ofi Moses do kesi Jesus nye n’asomafo do, na ofi Jesus nye n’asomafo do kesi Joseph Smith do, nyia menam m’abɔfoe do, mo nkowaa asomafo, na mankasa me ndze a ofi sor do frɛɛ no no, dɛ ɔmfa m’edwuma mbra kan mu;
Ɔtoow ne fapem no, na odzii nokwar; na mafa no aba me nkyɛn.
No wu no ayɛ dodowara ahobow; mbom ohia dɛ ɔdze no bɔgyaa sɔw ne dasegye ano, ama wɔaahyɛ no enyimnyam na woeebu emumuyɛfo fɔ.
Ana menngyee hom mmfi hom atamfo nsamu? Dza ɔwɔ mu ara nye dɛ megya dase wɔ me dzin ho.
Dɛm ntsi, afei, hom nyɛ aso, O nkorɔfo a hom wɔ m’asɔr mu; na hom elderfo, hom mbɔ mu ntsie; hom nsa akã m’ahenman no.
Hom ndzi me mbrasɛm nyina do enyiberdo, amma atsɛmbu aammba hom do, na hom gyedzi aammpa, na hom atamfo eenndzi hom do konyim. Na, merennkã biribiara bio seseiara. Amen na Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/137.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 137
chapter_summary: 1–6, Nkɔnhyɛnyi no hu no nuabanyin Alvin wɔ celestial ahenman no mu; 7–9, Wɔda ewufo hɔn nkwagye ho nkyerɛkyerɛ edzi kyerɛ; 10, Wɔgye mbofra nyina nkwa wɔ celestial ahenman no mu.

verses.text: Wobuee ɔsorsor kyerɛɛ hɛn, na muhun Nyankopɔn ne celestial ahenman no, nye enyimnyam a ɔwɔ mu no, na dɛ, nna mowɔ honandua mu anaa minnyi mu no, munnkotum akyerɛ.
Muhun abow fɛɛfɛw mapã no a dɛm ahenman no mu adzedzifo no bɛhɛn mu no, dza ɔtse dɛ ogyaframee a otwa no ho no;
Na Nyankopɔn n’ogyaframee ahengua no so, dza Egya no na Ɔba no tse do no.
Muhun ahenman no mu akwan fɛɛfɛw no, dza ɔyɛ dɛ wɔdze sika asam do no.
Muhun Egya Adam na Abraham; nye m’egya na me nã; na mo nuabanyin Alvin a nna oewu dadaada no;

Na ɔyɛɛ me ahobow dɛ oenya dɛm ahenman no mu bi ayɛ hɔndze, osiandɛ minyim dɛ, ofii wiadze yi mu dadaada ansaana Ewuradze rema ne nsa do dɛ ɔdze roboaboa Israel hɔn ano mber a otsĩa ebien no, na woennuma no so amma bɔnfakyɛ.
Dɛm na Ewuradze ne ndze baa mo hɔ dɛ: Hɔn a woewuwu nyina a woennya asɛmpa yi ho nyimdzee no, a sɛ wɔmaa wɔtsenaa ase a, nkyɛ wɔbɛgye no nyina bɛyɛ Nyankopɔn ne celestial ahenman no mu adzedzifo;
Hɔn so a wobowu fi ndɛ dze kɔ no, a woennya ho nyimdzee no, a sɛ wonyae a, nkyɛ wɔdze hɔn akoma nyina bɛgye no, bɛyɛ dɛm ahenman no mu adzedzifo;
Na Emi, Ewuradze mubobu nyimpa nyina atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ndwuma tse, dɛ mbrɛ hɔn akoma ne pɛ tse.
Na muhunii so dɛ mbofra nyina a wowu ansaana woedu nkontaabu mfe mu no nya nkwagye wɔ celestial ahenman no mu.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/138.title: Nkyerɛkyerɛ na Ahyɛmudzi 138
chapter_summary: 1–10, President Joseph F. Smith dwendwen Peter ne kyerɛwsɛm no nye hɛn Ewuradze ne sera a, ɔkɛseraa esunsum wiadze no ho; 11–24, President Smith ohu atseneneefo a woewuwu no dɛ woehyia mu wɔ paradise, na Christ ne somdwumadzi wɔ hɔn mu; 25–37, Ohu mbrɛ wosii hyehyɛɛ asɛmpakã dwuma no wɔ esunsum no mu; 38–52, Ohu Adam, Eve na nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn pii wɔ sunsum wiadze, na wosusu dɛ hɔn sunsum asetsena a nna wɔwɔ mu ansaana wɔrobɔsoɛr efi ewufo mu no tse dɛ wɔwɔ nkowaasom mu; 53–60, Ahotseweefo a woewuwu aber yi mu kɔ do yɛ hɔn edwuma wɔ sunsum wiadze mu.

verses.text: Ɔbɛsɛ ne da a otsĩa ebiasa, wɔ afe apem ahaakron eduawɔtwe, metsena me dan mu rodwendwen kyerɛwsɛm no ho;
Nna morodwendwen werdam kɛse no a Nyame ne Ba no bɔe dze poon wiadze;
Nye ɔdɔ kɛse na ɔdɔ nwanwa a Egya na Ɔba no kyerɛe wɔ Pomfo no no wiadze mbae mu.
Dɛ ɔnam no werdambɔ no do, nna sɛ yɛyɛ setsie ma asɛmpa ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no a, adasamba benya nkwagye.

Ber a mugu do rodwendwen dɛm no, m’adwen twee kesii Ɔsomafo Peter ne kyerɛwsɛm no, nye tsetse ahotseweefo no a wɔbɔɔ hɔn petsẽe Pontus, Galatia, Cappadocia, na Asia mbea bi so do no do, hɔ na ber a wɔbɔɔ Ewuradze mbeamudua mu ekyir no wɔkãa asɛmpa no.
Mubuee Bible no na mekenkaan Peter nwoma a odzi kan no tsir ebiasa na anan, na ber a mekenkanee no asɛm a odzi do yi tɔɔ mo do ara yie, seen dza da biara mekenkan a ɔyɛ me no:
“Osiandɛ Christ so hun bɔn ho amandze prɛko, nyia ɔtsen hunii maa hɔn a wɔnntsen, ama ɔdze hɛn aakɔ Nyankopɔn nkyɛn; wokum no honam mu, na wɔmaa onyaa nkwa wɔ sunsum mu;
Ɔno mu so na ɔnam kɔree kɛkãa asɛm kyerɛɛ esunsum a wɔwɔ efiadze a,
Tsetseber no wɔyɛɛ asoɔdzen, wɔ ber a Nyame ne penkyɛr tweɔnee no, wɔ Noah nda no a wɔrepam hɛn no mu, no mu na, akra kakra, mekyerɛ baawɔtwe, nyaa nkwa wɔ nsu no mu” (1 Peter 3:18–20).
“Na iyi ntsi na asɛmpa no wɔkãa kyerɛɛ ewufo no so, ama woeebu hɔn atsɛn dɛ nyimpa a wɔwɔ honam mu, na wɔaatsena ase dɛ mbrɛ Nyame tse wɔ sunsum mu.” (1 Peter 4:6).
Na ber a morodwendwen dɛm ndzɛmba yinom a wɔakyerɛw ho no, wobuee me ntseasee enyiwa, na Ewuradze no Sunsum besii mo do, na muhun ewufodɔm, nkakraba nye akɛse.
Na hɔn esunsum a wodzii pɛrpɛr dɔmtutuw a obi nntum nnkan hɔn; hɔn a wodzii Jesus no ho dase nokwar mu ber a nna wɔtse atseneneefo mu no aboa hɔn ano wɔ fakor;
Na hɔn na wɔbɔɔ afɔr wɔ Nyankopɔn ne Ba n’afɔrbɔ kɛse no ne saso do, na wɔsɔɔw abɛbrɛsɛ wɔ hɔn Pomfo ne dzin mu.
Woyinom nyina efi ɔnnkyebo asetsena mu, na wɔnam Nyame Egya na ne Ba a Wɔwoo no Kortoo no no hɔn adom do nyaa enyidado a osi pi wɔ enyimnyam wusoɛr no mu.
Muhun dɛ enyigye dɛw na ahyɛ hɔn mã, na wɔabɔ mu ridzi ehurusi osiandɛ hɔn ɔgye da no abɛn.
Woehyia mu rotweɔn Nyame ne Ba no ne mbae a, ɔreba sunsum wiadze abɛda no edzi akyerɛ hɔn dɛ ɔapon hɔn efi owu ne nkyehoma mu no.

Wɔdze bɛma hɔn huntuma a wɔadeda no asan aba no bɔbea a odzi mu no mu, na mbiew besi mbiew enyim, na ntsin na honam aaba ho, na sunsum na nyimpadua bɔbɔ mu, na hɔn mu nnkɛtsetsew bio, ama woetum enya enyigye ne mãhyɛ.
Ber a dɔmtutuw no rotweɔn na woridzi nkɔmbɔ, woridzi ehurusi wɔ dɔn a wɔbɛgye hɔn efi owu no mpokyerɛ mu no, Nyame ne Ba no puee hɔ, ɔbɔɔ ahotɔ ho dawur kyerɛɛ, ndɔmmumfo a wodzii nokwar no;
Ɔkãa asɛmpa a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no kyerɛɛ hɔn, owusoɛr ho nkyerɛkyerɛ no nye adasa hɔn asehwe ho mponee, na mponee efi ankorankor biara no bɔn ho wɔ nnuhu ngyinado ho.
Mbom ɔannkɔ emumuyɛfo hɔ, nna hɔn a wɔannsom Nyame nye hɔn a woennu hɔnho na hɔn a woguu hɔnho fĩ wɔ ber a wɔwɔ honam mu no, wɔamma ne ndze do wɔ hɔn mu;
Nna etuatsewfo no a wɔpoow tsetseberdo nkɔnhyɛfo no hɔn dasegye na kɔkɔbɔ no ennhu no, nna eso wɔannhwɛ n’enyim.
Bea a woyinom wɔ no, sum ahyɛ hɔ mã, na atseneneefo no mu dze, asomdwee ara nko;
Na ahotseweefo no dzii dɛw wɔ hɔn pon no ho, nna wobuu ntwɛr na wɔgyee too mu dɛ Nyame ne Ba no yɛ hɔn Pomfo na Ɔgyefo fi owu na hɛl nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn mu.
Hɔn enyim hyerɛnee, na Ewuradze n’enyim kan no tɔɔ hɔn do, na wɔtoow ayɛyi ndwom maa ne dzin krɔnkrɔn no.

Mo ho boow me, osiandɛ metsee dɛ Agyenkwa no yɛɛ ne ɔsomdwuma bɛyɛ mfe ebiasa wɔ Jewfo nye hɔn a wɔyɛ Israelfifo no mu, ɔbɔɔ mbɔdzen kyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔn asɛmpa a ɔwɔ hɔ daapem no na ɔato nsa afrɛ hɔn akɔ nnuho mu;

Naaso, no ndwuma akɛse, nye anwanwadze, nye tum na tumdzi a ɔyɛe dze bɔɔ nokwar no ho dawur nyina ekyir no, mbom nyimpa kumaabi na wotsie ne ndze, na wodzii dɛw wɔ n’enyim, na wonyaa nkwagye wɔ ne nsamu.
Mbom ɔdze mber kumaabi yɛɛ no ɔsomdwuma no wɔ ewufo mu, fitsi mbeamuduamubɔ no do dze kesi no wusoɛr no;

Na Peter ne nsɛm a ɔkãe no yɛɛ me ahobow—dza ɔsee dɛ Nyame ne Ba kɔree kɛkãa nyamesɛm kyerɛɛ esunsum a wogu efiadze, hɔn a mber bi wɔyɛɛ asoɔdzen, wɔ mber bi no a Nyankopɔn ne penkyɛr tweɔnee wɔ Noah n’aber do—na mbrɛ osii kãa asɛmpa no kyerɛɛ dɛm esunsum no, na odzii dwuma a no ho hia wɔ hɔn mu dɛm mber tsiabaa no.
Na me ahobow mu no, m’enyiwa buei, na me ntseasee nyaa nkenyan, na muhun dɛ Ewuradze nankasa ɔannkɔ emumuyɛfo na asokyewfo no a wɔpoow nokwar no hɔn mu, dɛ ɔrekɛkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn;

Mbom hwɛ, oyii binom fii atseneneefo no mu, ɔboaboaa no dɔm ano na oyii asomafo, na ɔdze tum na tumdzi, ɔmaa hɔn tum dɛ wɔmfa asɛmpa ne kan no nkɛma hɔn a wɔwɔ sum no mu, nyimpa esunsum nyina mpo; na dɛm kwan no do na wɔnam dze kãa asɛmpa no kyerɛɛ ewufo no.
Na asomafo a wɔasan mu eyi hɔn no kɔree kɛdaa Ewuradze n’enyisɔ da no edzi na wɔbɔɔ ahotɔ ho dawur kyerɛɛ ndɔmmumfo a wɔakyekyer hɔn no, nye hɔn so a wobonu hɔnho na wɔagye asɛmpa no mpo.
Dɛm na wɔnam kãa asɛmpa no kyerɛɛ hɔn a woennya no ho nyimdzee na wowui wɔ hɔn bɔn mu, anaadɛ hɔn a wɔpoow nkɔnhyɛfo no na wowui wɔ hɔn mbrato mu no.
Woyinom na wɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔn gyedzi wɔ Nyame mu, bɔn ho nnuho, hɔn a wonuma hɔn ma ewufo dze kɔ bɔnfakyɛ mu, nsa a wɔdze gu tsir do dze nya Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn n’akyɛdze no,
Nye asɛmpa ne fapem nyina so a no ho hia a ɔsɛ dɛ wohu ana wɔafata ma woeebu hɔn atsɛn dɛ nyimpa a wɔwɔ honam mu, ma wɔaatsena ase dɛ mbrɛ Nyame ne pɛ tse wɔ sunsum mu.
Na dɛm na wɔdaa no edzi wɔ ewufo mu, nkakraba na akɛse nyina, hɔn a wɔnntsen nye agyedzifo nyina, dɛ ɔpon nam Nyame ne Ba n’afɔr a ɔbɔe wɔ mbeamudua no do no aba.
Dɛm na wɔmaa muhunii dɛ Ɔpomfo no ne mber a odzii wɔ esunsum wiadze hɔ no ɔdze kyerɛkyerɛe na osiesiee nkɔnhyɛfo agyedzifo a wɔgyee no ho dase wɔ honam mu no esunsum;
Aama wɔdze ɔpon ho nsɛm no aakɛma ewufo nyina, hɔn a osian hɔn etuatsew na mbrato no ntsi nankasa enntum annkɔ hɔn nkyɛn no, ama ɔnam no nkowaa hɔn ɔsomdwuma no do hɔn so wɔaatse ne nsɛm no.
Etsitsir na ekunyim a wohyiaa mu no hɔn mu kor nye Egya Adam, nyia ne Nda fir Tsetse no na adasa nyina egya no,
Nye hɛn Nã Eve onyimnyamfo no, nye ne mbabaa agyedzifo piinara a wɔtsenaa ase mfe pii na wɔsoom Nyame tseasefo nokwafo no.
Abel, mogyadasefo a odzi kan no, nye ne nuabanyin Seth; a ɔyɛ ekunyinfo no mu kor, a ɔsɛ n’egya Adam papaapa no.
Noah, nyia ɔbɔɔ nsuyirii ho kɔkɔ no; Shem, ɔsɔfopanyin kɛse no; Abraham, agyedzifo hɔn egya no; Isaac, Jacob na Moses, Israel hɔn mbramafo kɛse no;
Nye Isaiah, nyia ɔdaa no edzi dɛ wɔasera Ɔpomfo no ngo na ɔmbɔ ahotɔ ho dawur nkyerɛ ndɔmmumfo, no na ombue hɔn a wɔakyekyer hɔn egu efiadze no hɔn mbobow no so wɔ hɔ bi.
Na Ezekiel, nyia onyaa enyido-adzehu na ohun bɔnsa bi a mbiew a no ho akokwa gu mu a wɔdze honam bɛkata ho a, owusoɛr ber no wɔbɔsoɛr bio, dɛ akra atseasefo no;
Daniel a odzii kan hunii na ɔkãa dɛ wɔbɛkyekyer Nyankopɔn n’ahenman wɔ nda a odzi ekyir no mu no, na wɔnnkɛsɛɛ no bio, eso wɔnnkɛfa ama nyimpa biara no;
Elias, nyia nna ɔnye Moses wɔ Nɔsakyeree Bepɔw do no;
Nye Malachi, nkɔnhyɛnyi no a ɔkãa dɛ Elijah bɛba no—nyia Moroni so kãa no ho asɛm kyerɛɛ Joseph Smith no, daa no edzi dɛ ɔbɛba ansaana Ewuradze ne da kɛse huhuuhu no aba no—hɔn so wɔ hɔ bi.
Nkɔnhyɛnyi Elijah na ɔdze anohoba a wɔbɔe kyerɛɛ egyanom no bɛhyɛ mba hɔn akoma mu,

Ɔkyerɛ dwuma kɛse a ndaamba wobedzi wɔ Ewuradze ne temple horow no mu wɔ mberano ne mãhyɛ mu, dze apon ewufo nkwa, na wɔdze asɔw mba ano ama hɔn awofo amma wɔaammfa ndom annsɛɛ wiadze nyina wɔ ne mbae no mu.
Woyinom nyina nye dodowara so, nye nkɔnhyɛfo so mpo a, wɔtsenaa Nephifo mu na wɔgyee dase wɔ Nyame ne Ba ne mbae ho no, hɔn nyina fora dɔmtutuw no a, nna woehyia mu na wɔrotweɔn hɔn ɔgye da no.
Osiandɛ ewufo no ahwɛ kwan akyɛr, ofi ber a hɔn esunsum twee hɔnho fii hɔn honandua mu dɛ wɔwɔ nkowaasom mu.
Woyinom na Ewuradze kyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔn, na ɔmaa hɔn tum ma no wusoɛr ekyir no, wonyanee fii ewufo mu, na wɔkɛhɛɛn n’Egya n’ahenman mu no, hɔ na wɔdze bɛkyebo ahenkyɛw na onnyiewiei nkwa bɛma hɔn.
Na ofi dɛm mber dze kɔ no, wɔbɔsɔw hɔn dwumadzi no do dɛ mbrɛ Ewuradze bɔɔ ho anohoba no, na woeenya kyɛfa wɔ nhyira nyina a woesiesie ato hɔ ama hɔn a wɔdɔ no no.

Nkɔnhyɛnyi Joseph Smith nye m’egya, Hyrum Smith, Brigham Young, John Taylor, Wilford Woodruff, nye esunsum binom so a wɔasan mu eyi hɔn a woesiesie hɔn esie dɛ wɔbɛba wɔ ne mberano mu ebosuo mu ma wɔaatow dwuma a wobedzi wɔ da kɛse a odzi ekyir mu ne fapem,
A temple ne nsisii, na ayɛdze ne nyɛe wɔ mu dze apon ewufo nkwa no, hɔn so wɔ sunsum wiadze no mu kã ho.
Muhun dɛ hɔn so wɔfora akɛsefo na etsitsir no a wɔsaan mu yii hɔn ahyɛse no dɛ wɔmbɛyɛ Nyankopɔn N’Asɔr no do ahwɛfo no.

Ansaana wɔrobɔwo hɔn no mpo, nna hɔn nye binom so, nsa akã hɔn adzesuadze a odzi kan no wɔ esunsum wiadze na wosiesiee hɔn dɛ wɔbɛba wɔ Ewuradze ne mber a wɔahyehyɛ ato hɔ no mu abɛyɛ edwuma wɔ no wenyin ture mu dze ama akra eenya nkwagye.

Muhun dɛ elderfo agyedzifo a wɔwɔ mberano yi no mu no, sɛ wofi asetsena a ɔnnkye bo no mu a, wɔnam Nyame ne Ba a Wɔwoo no Kortoo no no werdambɔ no do sɔw hɔn edwuma do kã asɛmpa no a ɔfa nnuho na ɔpon ho no wɔ hɔn a wɔwɔ sum mu na wɔhyɛ bɔn nkowaasom ase wɔ ewufo esunsum wiadze kɛse no mu.
Ewufo a wonu hɔnho no, wɔnam Nyankopɔn ne fie mu yɛdze ho setsie do wɔbɔpon hɔn.
Na sɛ wotua hɔn mbrato ho kaw no wie, na wɔhohor hɔn ma hɔn ho tsew a, hɔn nsa bɛkã hɔn akatua dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ndwuma tse, osiandɛ wɔyɛ nkwagye mu adzedzifo.
Dɛm na woyii enyido-adzehu a ɔfa ewufo hɔn ɔpon ho no kyerɛɛ me, na megye dase, na minyim dɛ dɛm dasegye yi yɛ nokwar, ɔnam hɛn Ewuradze na Agyenkwa, Jesus Christ ne nhyira do, ɔnyɛ dɛm so. Amen.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/od/1.title: Asɔr Dawurbɔ 1
text: Dze Ma Nyia Ɔfa No ho:

Dawurbɔ krataa mu nsɛm a ofi Salt Lake City, a wɔdze apetse guado a ɔwɔ amansɛm botae a ɔfa Utah Commission ne amandzɛɛbɔ bi a ɔnnkyɛree yi ɔdze kɛmaa Ɔsoafo a ɔhwɛ Ɔman mu nsɛm do no kyerɛ dɛ, wɔda ho ma kwan ma wɔwar pii, na dɛ, Obiradzi a ɔabɛsen kɔ, anaadɛ afe a oetwa mu kɔ no, nyimpa eduanan na no mboree awar wɔ dɛm kwan no do wɔ Utah; na dɛ Asɔr no ne banodzifo no hɔn baguado nsɛm mu no wɔakyerɛkyerɛ a ɔfa awar pii ho na wɔhyɛ nkorɔfo nkuran so dɛ wɔnkɔ do wɔ ho—

Dɛm ntsi, emi a meyɛ President wɔ Jesus Christ N’Asɔr a ɔwɔ hɔ ma Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo No mu, kã to gua dɛ dɛm nsɛm a wɔakã ato hɛn do nyina yɛ atorsɛm. Yɛnnkyerɛkyerɛ awar dodow anaa awar pii ho asɛm, na yɛmma kwan so dɛ nyimpa biara nwar pii, na mekã so dɛ ɔnnyɛ nokwar dɛ yɛama wɔayɛ awar pii ho som wɔ hɛn Temple no mu biara anaadɛ wɔ hɛn Ɔman yi mu beebiara.

Wɔbɛkãa kyerɛɛ hɛn dɛ nyimpa kor bi awar dɛm wɔ Endowment Fi mu, wɔ Salt Lake City mu wɔ Fefɛwber, 1889, mbom munntumii nnhun nyia ɔyɛɛ dɛm som no, na minnyim biribiara a wɔyɛe wɔ hɔ no ho hwee. Ɔnam dɛm nsɛm yi ara ntsi, mahyɛ ma woebubu Endowment Fi no egu famu ntsɛmara.

Susuampaara dɛ wɔayɛ mbra wɔ Mbrahyɛ Baguabea dze etsia awar pii a wɔdze ato gua ma ɔabɛyɛ mbra a asɛndzibea a ɔkrɔn tsitsir a wɔapen do akã amambusɛm ho no, mekã to gua dɛ mibedzi dɛm mbra no do, na medze tum a mowɔ no wɔ Asɔr no do dɛ emi na meyɛ banodzinyi no mobɔhwɛ ma asɔrmba no mu biara so eedzi do dɛmara.

Biribiara nnyi me nkyerɛkyerɛ mu anaa hɔn a wɔkã mo ho hɔn nkyerɛkyerɛ mu a ɔfa awar ho a yɛdze maa Asɔr no wɔ mber a wɔkyerɛe no mu, dza wosusuu dɛ yɛdze hyɛɛ hɔn adwen mu wɔ awar pii ho, anaadɛ yɛhyɛɛ hɔn nkuran wɔ ho, na sɛ Asɔr no mu Elder bi akã kasa bi a ɔkyerɛ dɛm nkyerɛkyerɛ no a, wɔakã n’enyim ntsɛmara wɔ ho. Na afei mobɔ no dawur kyerɛ ɔmamfo dɛ, m’afotu a medze ma Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo nye dɛ, mma wɔnnwar awar biara a mbra a ɔwɔ asaase no do no tsia.
Wilford Woodruff
Jesus Christ N’Asɔr a ɔwɔ hɔ ma Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo No ne President.
Kasa a President Lorenzo Snow dze too gua:

“Mekekã moho dɛ Wilford Woodruff na ɔyɛ Jesus Christ N’Asɔr a ɔwɔ hɔ ma Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo No ne President, na ɔno nkotoo nye nyimpa a ɔwɔ asaase do seseiara a okura nsaafee a wɔdze sɔw ayɛdze ano, yɛgye to mu ampa dɛ ɔnam no tum a ɔwɔ ntsi, ɔfa kwan mu dɛ ɔdze Manifesto (Mpaamukã) no a wɔkyerɛɛw no Fankwa 24, 1890 a wɔakenkan wɔ Asɔr ne Wiadze Mfɛndzanan Ehyiadzi yi ase no to gua. Yɛgye dza ɔakã ato gua a ɔfa awar pii ho no to mu dɛ ɔyɛ nsɛm a tum wɔ mu na ɔkyekyer hɛn.”
Salt Lake City, Utah, Ɔbɛsɛ 6, 1890.

Ewuradze nnkɛma emi anaa nyimpa biara a ogyina hɔ dɛ Asɔr yi ne President no kwan mma onngya hom nnkɔ mfom mu. Iyi nnyi nhyehyɛɛ no mu. Ɔnnyɛ Nyankopɔn ne pɛ. Sɛ ɔba m’adwen mu dɛ mebɛyɛ dɛm a, Ewuradze beyi me efi me gyinabew no do, na dɛmara na Ɔdze bɛyɛ nyimpa biara so a ɔbɛyɛ n’adwen dɛ ɔbotwe adasamba efi Nyankopɔn ne nyia ɔda adasa hɔn ndaamba edzi kyerɛ no nye hɔn dwumadzi ho. (Asɔr no ne Wiadze Mfɛndzanan Ehyiadzi a wɔyɛ no mprɛnu wɔ afe mu no no mu dza ɔtɔ do Eduosia-biako, Dwowda, Ɔbɛsɛ 6, 1890, Salt Lake City, Utah. Wɔdze baa Deseret Evening News mu Ɔbɛsɛ 11, 1890, krataafã 2.)
Ɔmmfa ho dɛ obi tse ase anaa owu, anaa obi a wɔafrɛ no dɛ ɔnhwɛ Asɔr yi do, wɔwɔ dɛ wɔdze Otumfo Nyankopɔn ne nkenyan hwɛ do. Sɛ wɔannyɛ no wɔ dɛm kwan yi do a, wonnkotun ayɛ koraa. …
Menyaa nyikyerɛ bi a ɔnnkyeree, a no ho hia me papaapa, na mebɛkã dza Ewuradze akã akyerɛ me no akyerɛ hom. Hom mma montwe hom adwen mbra dza wɔfrɛ no mpaamukã no do. …

Ewuradze ase me dɛ mimbisa Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo no asɛm, na Ɔkãa kyerɛɛ mo so dɛ, sɛ wobetsie dza makã akyerɛ hɔn no a, wɔnam Nyame no Sunsum na no tum no do a, hom bɛma mbuae kor, na hɔn nyinara benya gyedzi kor wɔ dɛm asɛm yi ho.

Asɛmbisa no nye yi: Akwan no no mu mmuana na ɔwɔ dɛ Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo fa do—dɛ wɔbɔkɔ do awar pii, dza otsia ɔman no ne mbra na dɛm ntsi nyimpa ɔpepe eduesia kasa tsia, na wɔdze nsa bɔto Temple nyina do, na wɔnam do ayew ne nyinara, na woegyaa ayɛdze nyina a wɔyɛ wɔ mu no yɛ, dza wɔyɛ ma atseasefo na ewufo nyina, na wɔdze President a Odzi Kan na n’Apamfo, na Duebien no, na ebusua ebusua a wɔwɔ Asɔr no mu no hɔn etsir bɔkɔ akɔto efiadze, na wɔdze nsa ato nkorɔfo hɔn egyapadze do (iyinom nyina bɛma woegyaa dɛ wɔbɔwar pii); anaadɛ, ɔnam hɛn nokwardzi a yɛwɔ no wɔ fapem yi ho ntsi, yɛayɛ iyinom na yehu amandze ekyir no, dɛ yebegyaa dɛm adze yi yɛ, na yedzi ɔman no ne mbra do, dza ɔbɛma woegyaa Nkɔnhyɛfo, Asomafo na egyanom wɔ fie, ama woeetum akyerɛkyerɛ nkorɔfo no na woeetum ayɛ Asɔr no mu edwuma, na Ahotseweefo no hɔn nsa akã Temple no nyinara so, ama woeetum ayɛ Asɛmpa no ho ayɛdze no dze aama atseasefo na ewufo nyina no a?

Ewuradze nam enyido-adzehu na nyikyerɛ do daa dza sɛ yenngyaa dɛm awar pii no a obesi edzi kyerɛɛ me. Sɛ … yenngyaa dɛm adze yi yɛ a, nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Logan temple yi mu no hɔn mu biara noho nnkɛba mfaso ama hɛn; osiandɛ wobegyaa ayɛdze nyinara yɛ wɔ Zion asaase nyinara do. Basabasayɛ bɛba Israelman nyinara mu, na wɔdze mbarimba pii bogu efiadze. Dɛm amandzehu yi bɛba Asɔr no nyinara do na wɔahyɛ hɛn ma yeegyaa dɛm adze yi yɛ. Seseiara asɛmbisa a ɔwɔ hɔ nye dɛ, ɔwɔ dɛ wodua dɛm kwan yi do gyaa dɛm adze yi yɛ anaa wodua kwan a Ewuradze ada no edzi akyerɛ hɛn no do, dɛ mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ a hɛn nkɔnhyɛfo na Asomafo na egyanom benya fahodzi, na temple no nyinara aka nkorɔfo no nsamu, ma woeetum apon ewufo. Nyimpa pii na dɛm nkorɔfo yi agye hɔn dada efi efiadze wɔ sunsum wiadze no mu, ana wɔnkɔ do ndzi dɛm dwuma yi anaa wongyaa dzi? Iyi nye asɛmbisa a medze to Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo no enyim. Ɔwɔ dɛ homankasa hom bua ma hom ho. Mepɛ dɛ homankasa hom nyi ano mma hom ho. Mirinnyi ano mbom mese hom dɛ, nkyɛ mbrɛ asɔrmba nyinara hɛn gyinabew bɛyɛ pefee nye no, sɛ yɛammfa kwan a yɛfaa do no do.

Muhun dza sɛ wɔannyɛ ho biribi a nkyɛ obesi pefee wɔ enyido-adzehu mu. Dɛm sunsum yi bɛhyɛɛ mo do akyɛr. Mbom mepɛ dɛ mekã iyi: Sɛ ɔsorsor Nyankopɔn annhyɛ me dɛ menyɛ dza meyɛe no a, nkyɛ memaa temple no nyina fii hɛn nsa, nkyɛ mankasa mokɔr efiadze, na memaa nyimpa biara so kɔr hɔ bi, na ber no sõo dɛ ɔwɔ dɛ meyɛ dza wɔhyɛɛ me no, biribiara daa edzi pefee maa me. Mokɔr Ewuradze enyim, na mekyerɛɛw dza Ewuradze see me dɛ menkyerɛw no. …

Medze iyi to hom enyim ama hom aadwendwen na hom esusu ho. Ewuradze ridzi dwuma wɔ hɛn mu. (Cache Stake Ehyiadzi, Logan, Utah, Kwesida Ɔberɛfɛw 1, 1891. Wɔdze baa Deseret Weekly mu, Ɔberɛfɛw 14, 1891.)

Afei mebɛkã dza wɔdaa no edzi kyerɛɛ me na dza Nyame ne Ba no yɛɛ wɔ dɛm adze yi mu no akyerɛ hom. … Dɛ Otumfo Nyankopɔn tse ase yi, sɛ wɔannda dɛm ndzɛmba a ɔwɔ mpaamukã no mu no edzi a, nkyɛ ɔbɛba mu. Dɛm ntsi, osian dza ɔwɔ Nyame ne Ba no nankasa n’adwen mu ntsi, ɔyɛɛ ne pɛ dɛ wɔda dɛm ndzɛmba yinom edzi kyerɛ Asɔr no na wiadze. Ewuradze ahyɛ Zion ne nkyekyeree ho ɔmom. Ɔahyɛ ɔmom wɔ temple no nwiei ho. Ɔahyɛ ɔmom dɛ wɔnyɛ nkwagye ayɛdze bi mfa mma atseasefo na ewufo wɔ mbepɔw yinom hɔn mbɔnsa no mu. Na Otumfo Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ ɔmom dɛ mma Abɔnsam nnsiw ho kwan. Sɛ hom botum atse dɛm adze no ase a, ɔno nye ne saafee. (Ɔsom horow a wɔyɛɛ wɔ ber a worutu Salt Lake Temple no ahyɛ Nyankopɔn nsa no dza ɔtɔ do esia no no mu nsɛm, Ebɔbira, 1893. Tu Hyɛ Nyame Nsa Som mu Nsɛm a wɔdze akyerew-fir tsintsimii, Abakɔsɛmsie Bea, Asɔr Abakɔsɛm Asoɛe, Salt Lake City, Utah.)

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/od/2.title: Asɔr Dawurbɔ 2
text: Dze Ma Nyia Ɔfa No ho:

Jesus Christ N’Asɔr a ɔwɔ hɔ ma Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo No ne Wiadze Mfɛndzanan Ehyiadzi a wɔyɛ no mprɛnu wɔ afe mu no dza otsĩa 148 a wɔyɛɛ wɔ Fankwa 30, 1978 mu, dza odzi do yinom President N. Eldon Tanner, Ɔpamfo a Odzi Kan wɔ President a Odzi Kan na n’Apamfo Kuw wɔ Asɔr no mu no dze too gua:

Obiradzi ne nda a odzi kan no mu wɔ afe yi mu no, President a Odzi Kan no na n’Apamfo dze too gua dɛ President Spencer W. Kimball enya nyikyerɛ dɛ wɔmma asɔfodzi na temple nhyira no nsõ Asɔr no mu mbanyin nyinara a wodzi mu no do. President Kimball ase me dɛ memfa nto hɔn a wɔaba wiadze mfɛndzanan ehyiadzi yi ase no enyim dɛ, onyaa nyikerɛ no wɔ aber a, ɔdwendween ho wɔ n’akoma mu na ɔbɔɔ ho mpaa mber pii wɔ temple krɔnkrɔnbea no n’adankora krɔnkrɔn no mu, na ekyir no ɔdze too n’apamfo no enyim ma wosusuu ho na wɔgyee too mu. Nkyii ɔdze too Asomafo Duebien Quorum no enyim, hɔn nyinara gyee too mu, na nkyii ɔdze too Asɔr no ne Dzibewdzi Etumdzifo Etsitsir no nyinara enyim na hɔn so gyee too mu.
President Kimball ase me dɛ afei menkenkan krataa yi:
Obiradzi 8, 1978
Wɔdze ma wiadze mfɛndzanan na apaamu asɔfodzi edzibewdzifo nyinara a wɔwɔ Jesus Christ N’Asɔr a ɔwɔ hɔ ma Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo a wɔwɔ wiadze nyinara mu:
Enuanom Adɔfo:

Dɛ mbrɛ hɛn nyinara gye ho dase dɛ Ewuradze n’edwuma retserɛw wɔ asaase ne mbea nyinara do no, ayɛ hɛn enyigye dɛ aman pii mu nyimpa agye asɛmpa no a wɔasan dze aba no no mu nsɛm no ato mu, na ɔnam do ma wɔabɔdɔm Asɔr yi ma no mu nyimpa gu do rodɔr. Iyi na ekenyan hɛn ma yeenya pɛ dɛ yɛbɛma Asɔr yi no mu mba nyinara a wodzi mu no hɔn nsa akã ndzinoa na nhyira nyinara a asɛmpa no dze ma no.

Dɛ mbrɛ yenyim no, Asɔr no mu nkɔnhyɛfo na presidentfo no a woedzi hɛn enyim kan no bɔɔ anohoba dɛ Nyame ne onnyiewiei nhyehyɛɛ mu no, mber bi bɛba a hɛn enuanom nyinara a wodzi mu no hɔn nsa bekã asɔfodzi no, na yehu dɛm nkorɔfo no a wɔdze asɔfodzi no akam hɔn no hɔn nokwardzi, yɛdze mber tsentsen atotɔ aserɛ enyiberdo ama hɛn enuanom anokwafo yinom, yedzi mber pii wɔ Temple no n’Abansor dze ntotɔserɛ ma Ewuradze dɛ ɔma hɛn ɔsor kwankyerɛ.

Oetsie hɛn mpaabɔ, na ɔnam nyikyerɛ do esi no pi dɛ anohoba no a ɔabɔ no mber tsentsen a wɔabɛsen kɔ no asõ dɛ Asɔr no mu banyin biara a odzi mu no ne nsa bɛkã asɔfodzi krɔnkrɔn no, na oenya tum no dze edzi no dwuma krɔnkrɔn, na ɔnye n’adɔfo enya nhyira biara a ofi mu ba no a temple mu nhyira kã ho. Dza ɔkã ho so nye dɛ, wɔbɛyɛ ayɛdze dze ahyɛ Asɔr no mu mbanyin nyinara a wodzi mu dze asɔfodzi aahyɛ hɔn a, wɔronnhwɛ ebusuakuw no a ofi anaa no wer enyi. Wɔhyɛ Asɔfodzi banodzifo no dɛ, dɛ ɔyɛ Aaron anaa Melchizedek Asɔfodzi no, wɔmfa kwan a wɔahyehyɛ ato hɔ no do pɛpɛɛpɛr nye hɔn a wɔbɛyɛ ayɛdze ama hɔn no mpɛnsampɛnsamu yie ama woeehu dɛ, nokwar, wodzi mu dɛ mbrɛ emudzi nhyehyɛɛ no tse.

Yɛkã no botooyɛ mu dɛ, afei Ewuradze ada ne pɛ edzi wɔ nhyira a ɔpɛ dɛ ne mba nyinara a wɔwɔ asaase nyinara do a wɔbɛyɛ setsie ama no nkowaa a ɔama hɔn tum no ndze, na woesiesie hɔnho dɛ hɔn nsa bekã asɛmpa no mu nhyira nyinara.
Hɛnara Anokwafo,
Spencer W. Kimball
N. Eldon Tanner
Marion G. Romney
President a Odzi Kan na n’Apamfo no

Yenyim dɛ Spencer W. Kimball yɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi, adzehunyi, na oyikyerɛfo, na ɔyɛ Jesus Christ N’Asɔr a ɔwɔ hɔ ma Nda a Odzi Ekyir Ahotseweefo ne president, yesusu dze to gua dɛ hɛn a yɛyɛ asɔrmba a yeehyia wɔ baguabɔ mu dɛ yɛbɛgye dɛm nyikyerɛ yi ato mu dɛ ɔyɛ Ewuradze n’asɛm na ne pɛ. Meserɛ dɛ hɔn a wɔgye to mu nyinara mma hɔn nsa nyimfa do. Hɔn a wotsia so nyɛ dɛm asɛnkyerɛdze kor noara.
Hɔn nyina a wɔtoow aba no gyee dza wɔkãa ho nsɛm no too mu.
Salt Lake City, Utah, Fankwa 30, 1978.
